name: L'IDÉAL, ( à 2 min du métro Pie-IX ).
summary: Newly furnished appartment. You will feel the comfort and warmth as you walk in. Everything has been designed to make your stay as pleasant as possible. This apartment is ideal for its location and security (keypad lock). It is perfect for couples, or for passing travelers. Can accommodate a maximum of 4 with the sofa-bed. For your convenience will will also supply you with my private parking for one car.
space: Quality, tranquility, security and comfort. keyless lock system. The code will be provided the day of your arrival. The entrance doors lock automatically. All furniture, appliances are new and the house is perfectly clean, the mattress and bedding qualities. It's missing is you Thank you for removing your shoes and boots.
description: Newly furnished appartment. You will feel the comfort and warmth as you walk in. Everything has been designed to make your stay as pleasant as possible. This apartment is ideal for its location and security (keypad lock). It is perfect for couples, or for passing travelers. Can accommodate a maximum of 4 with the sofa-bed. For your convenience will will also supply you with my private parking for one car. Quality, tranquility, security and comfort. keyless lock system. The code will be provided the day of your arrival. The entrance doors lock automatically. All furniture, appliances are new and the house is perfectly clean, the mattress and bedding qualities. It's missing is you Thank you for removing your shoes and boots. Appartment, you have access to the back balcony and in the shed there are chairs. There is also an ashtray for smokers The backyard is private for the owner's. I live on first floor and will always be there to meet your needs. In front of the CEGEP Maisonneuve, on Pi
neighborhood_overview: In front of the CEGEP Maisonneuve, on Pierre de Coubertin. It is walking distance to Saputo Stadium, Olympic stadium, Planetarium, Biodome, Insectarium and much more.
notes: To visit L'IDEAL, copy this link (Hébergement L'IDÉAL ) in your search engine on Youtube. Hébergement L'IDÉAL
transit: Two minutes walk to the Pie-IX metro station, you can get dowtown in less than 15 minutes without changing lines. Restaurant and grocery stores are nearby and a short walking distance.  On-street parking is allowed, but be careful there are areas for residents with vignettes. If you need a parking place (1 vehicule only) please mention this when reserving.
access: Appartment, you have access to the back balcony and in the shed there are chairs. There is also an ashtray for smokers The backyard is private for the owner's.
interaction: I live on first floor and will always be there to meet your needs.
house_rules: Le son de la musique ou de la TV, doit être à un niveau raisonnable en tout temps, pour ne pas nuire au voisin. Il y a un autre logement à coté du votre. Ne pas admettre d'inviter après 22 heures Ne pas oublier d'enlever vos souliers. Merci

host.host_about: Je possède cette maison depuis plus de 40 ans, mes enfants ont tous habités un moment ou l’autre en haut ainsi que quelque locataire, mais maintenant tout à été refait et c’est devenu un hébergement touristique bien meublé et complet maintenant c’est à vous d’en profiter.

reviews.comments: Très propre et confortable .
Very comfortable, and professional, very clean and homey. Thank you for hospitality.
We had an excellent stay at William's place. He did everything to make us welcome and his apartment is the nicest we have ever stayed in.

Appartement très bien situé, bien équipé et très convivial. Propriétaire très disponible et à l'écoute des besoins des locataires. Nous avons, entre autres, beaucoup apprécié l'attention du propriétaire pour les choses du quotidien tels que du lait et de la crème pour le café, d'est K-Cup pour la keurig, jus d'orange, muffins.
Tout a été parfait pour Nous William a été tres accommodant nous avons tres apprécié .

Perfect place to stay - very clean, spacious, and modern. It's also newly renovated so everything is very new. Right near the metro station and a free private parking spot is available if you need it. It was very relaxing. The communication with William and Susan was great. I would receive a reply within minutes whenever I needed to know something. When I arrived, William came out to help me find his parking spot and offered to help me with my things. I would definitely stay here again.
A wonderful place to stay. Very clean and a fairly convenient location.

Endroit hyper propre, confortable, tranquille et très facile d'accès.  Nos hôtes s'assure de notre confort et de notre satisfaction.
À recommander sans hésiter !

N'hésitez surtout pas , difficile de trouver mieux  :)
Do not hesitate , book, , not easy to find a such cosy place.

This place is awesome! It is very clean and spacious. The parking spot was very useful. William is a great host, very easy to communicate with and message. I will definitely be back! Highly recommend.

Sue and Williams's place is extremely clean and everything is new. They have a lot of appliances for everyone's needs. They welcomed us with muffins, water, juice boxes and coffee (keurig machine) and just doing little things like putting up our wiper blades up so they don't freeze overnight. You will not be disappointed if you book with them :)

Anyone staying in Montreal would be lucky to have Sue & Will as their hosts. It is obvious that Susan takes this seriously and wants to make sure that you have the best trip possible. This was my first Airbnb and it was 10x better than any hotel and at a great rate. The apt was emaculate; she had it decorated for the holidays and had snacks I love, (toaster streudels) in the freezer. The metro is so close.  Can't say enough of what good hosts they were,(Will even brushed our car off for us) thanks guys!
Le logement respecte les descriptions. Superbe location, confortable et très sécuritaire. Je recommande sans hésiter!
William et Sue sont des hôtes exceptionnels. Le logement est totalement rénové avec le plus grand soin. Fantatisque à 2 pas du métro.
C'est ma 2ème visite chez William et ce n'est certainement pas la dernière ! à recommander sans hésiter

If you stay at William and Susan's place, you'll be extremely satisfied!  The apartment was super clean, beautiful, welcoming, and safe.  They pay attention to all the details, provide everything needs for a comfortable stay, and go far above and beyond what could be expected as hosts.  I highly recommend this apartment!

Williams and Sue's place was fantastic! It's clean, modern, quiet and central. We were able to park our car at the apartment so we used Uber and the Metro which was a two minute walk from the apartment. We were able to walk to the Olympic park and bio dome and took the metro to the Montreal Canadians game which saved us on car parking. Sue was very responsive to our message and made us feel very welcome! We would definitely recommend their apartment and would love to stay again! Thank you for making our stay so pleasant, Hannah and Dan.
Excellent appartement !

We had excellent communication from William and Susan right from the get go! Even before we booked with them, they very promptly responded to our messages. They offered us a lot of extra help when we first arrived, they let us park our car earlier on the day we arrived as well and we received a warm goodbye when we left the next day. The apartment is Beautiful, homey, very clean, and we walked into a lot of extras that we were not expecting… Food and drinks in the fridge, food in the freezer, complementary goodies on the dining room table with a welcoming note from William and Susan... and more. All-in-all, we had a wonderful stay and are looking forward to staying in this apartment again!

À deux minutes de marche du métro Pie-IX et dix minutes du magnifique Jardin Botanique, avec le biodôme et l'insectarium... C'est parfait ! Plusieurs restaurants sont à proximité, et si on veut profiter du calme et du confort de l'appartement la livraison est possible ! Nous avons beaucoup aimé le restaurant indien tout près. Un énorme merci à nos hôtes qui sont attentionnés. William m'a écrit afin de vérifier que notre séjour se passait bien et s'est montré disponible, bien que nous ne nous soyons pas croisé. Si nous avons à revenir dans le secteur L'Idéal sera sur notre liste !

Appartement très propre et confortable.
Petites attentions très appréciées.
Propriétaires très disponibles.
Stationnement facile et libre.

L'idéal a été super lors de mon court séjour à Montréal! Le milieu est très calme, à quelques minutes de tout ce qui est nécessaire et environ à dix minutes de centre-ville. La communication avec William se fait très bien si jamais il y a des questions.
Je recommande ce logement à tous qui vient visiter Montréal!

The space and location are perfect.   It was nice to have the biodome, stadium, and Metro all within a quick walking distance from us when my group stayed over.  The place in itself is clean and nicely decorated.  The hosts are always quick to respond, and very friendly.  They provide complimentary treats as well!  All in all we had a positive stay, and I would definitely recommend this place to others!

Appartement très agréable à vivre et bien équipé. William et Susan sont super attentifs à ce que tout se passe bien et ont toujours de gentilles attentions. L'appartement est très propre et il y fait bon vivre le temps d'un séjour. Le quartier est sympa et la proximité du Métro rend Montréal centre facilement accessible. Pour les courses, il y a le Super C et surtout le marché Maisonneuve où l'on trouve tout et de bonne qualité.
Bref : une recommandation 5 étoiles sans hésiter.
Excellent endroit!  Fort agréable!   Propriétaires disponibles et généreux!
Excellent hôte Airbnb, tout est adéquat!! fortement recommandé...
Couldn't have been better. Great location, communication was fast, place is very nice, parking spot is an excellent bonus. I'd stay here again for sure.

The place is very clean, well-equipped, and organized.  The host is very friendly and prompt on communication; ensuring we feel comfortable and welcome.  We like the electronic key lock so we don't have carry a key.  Also, it has parking on-premise which is very useful.  It is about 15 min drive to downtown which is easy and quick.  We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend this place to others!

Très bon accueil. William a été très accommodant concernant notre heure d’arrivée. Le réfrigérateur était vraiment bien garni avec petites gâteries fort appréciées. Le lit est confortable. La cuisine bien équipée. Tout est propre et bien rangé. La connexion WI-FI efficace. Divan propre et confortable. Le code d’entrée au lieu de la traditionnelle clé est vraiment fonctionnel. Accès au métro en cinq minutes. Très belles ruelles fleuries à emprunter pour se rendre sur la rue Ontario.
Excellent place. Very clean. Well kept. Close to transportation. Excellent hosts.

The place was nice and clean. The setup was comfy and made me felt like home (and much better). Sue wrote many tips and notes to help us get familiar with the utilities, and she also left treats(cookies and muffins) for us. They reply to our message very promptly and accommodate our last minute change generously. Location is away from downtown area, but only 5min walk to metro (subway) which makes transportation convenient. Highly recommended.
This is a wonderful location and a really nice apartment! I am really excited to return to Montreal again soon. Everything you need is in the apartment and it looks amazing!

My wife and 13 year old son drive from CT to Montreal for the busiest weekend of the year: the Grand Prix du Montreal (F1).  Sue and William were absolutely phenomenal hosts and made us feel at home.  Blueberry muffins on the counter, a fully stocked refrigerator, air conditioning, and very attentive to all of our many questions.  Metro was an easy walk from the condo and there was parking for our car in the driveway.  I travel frequently, but will stay with Sue again when next back in Montreal.  What a pleasure!

We stayed for four nights in William and Susan's upstairs apartment. Their place is a delightful little gem! Plenty of space and privacy for three of us. The entire apartment was spotless, nicely furnished and everything in it was very good quality, which we appreciated because it felt like home. 

Susan greeted us when we arrived and was accessible by text if we needed anything. There were muffins, cookies and a homemade baguette waiting for us when we arrived and the kitchen was fully stocked. The neighborhood was quiet and very close to the Jardin Botanique where we were working. 

We wouldn't hesitate to book again and highly recommend this perfect apartment to anyone staying in Montreal.
nous avons reçu un excellent accueil, beaucoup d attention de la part de notre hote, je le recommande vivement
Very clean and well maintained.  They were quick to respond to any questions that we had.  Would definitely recommend this place.

This is an exceptional property. It is an excellent value and just so inviting! This was our first Airbnb experience, and I would not hesitate to do this again! We received a friendly greeting from Sue when we arrived. There was a designated parking space which is a huge deal if you are at all familiar with Montreal. We were so excited noticing all the special touches when we arrived. Everything is very neat and professional. There are little typed notices for how to work things, the wifi code, and the lovely homemade snacks on the table (which were awesome). The unit is immaculate. I cannot stress that enough. It is truly immaculate. Everything has been recently upgraded. The linens are wonderful and soft. William and Sue have thought of everything! There are condiments, coffee and emergency food supplies, a hair dryer, a sewing kit, a first aid kit - I mean, really, they have thought of everything. I would not hesitate to return to L'Ideal, and I would not hesitate to recommend it. My only disappointment was that we were only able to stay for two nights. I easily could have lived there!
Our stay was great. The apartment is well stocked and hosts were very gracious and hospitable. Would not hesitate to stay with them again or recommend them to a friend.

We stayed here for Comic con and while we drove into Downtown Montreal, it was only a 2 minute walk to the subway. The apartment was incredibly clean and well stocked with anything we could have needed. The area was quiet and within walking distance to the Biodome/Botanical Gardens. We appreciated all the little touches. Sue and William were on hand for any questions we might have had, but were not intrusive. We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone.

A great apartment for a stay in Montreal It is just a few minutes walk from the metro station. The house is well equipped with everything you need to enjoy your stay. The hosts were very nice and friendly and even left us sweet home baked treats and a freezer with breakfast food. The house is super clean and comfortable modernly decorated . We will definitely stay there in the future. 
Thanks for everything! 
We loved our stay!
Bellissimo appartamento vicinissimo alla fermata metropolitana. Pulito luminoso tranquillo. William and Sue sono gentilissimi e molto disponibili voto 10 +

Safe, cute, clean place close to the metro and botanical gardens. William and Sue obviously care about the apartment -- it was well-decorated and meticulously clean. Great communication. Full size fridge in nice kitchenette. Homemade cookies and muffins as well. Quality linens. I felt quite spoiled.

Appartement très bien équipé, très propre, très confortable, situé à environ 200 m du métro, avec une place pour garer la voiture. Nous avons très bien été accueillis par Suzanne et des petits muffins et cookies avaient été préparés à notre intention pour le petit déjeuner. Thé, café et d'autres aliments à notre disposition dans le frigo et le congélateur. Le logement dispose d'une climatisation et d'un petit balcon. William est adorable, très prévenant. Bref, une très bonne expérience pour nous (couple + ado de 14 ans). Merci William ! Corinne M.
The apartment looks even better in person! It was very clean and our host was very accommodating to our needs. I will surely come back here if I return to the city.
L'ideal was the perfect Airbnb experience, William and Susan provided us with everything we needed to feel comfortable and home away from home!

What a fantastic apartment. Beautifully set out and perfect for a family of four. It was a short metro ride from the centre/tourist areas and in a quiet residential area near the Olympic Park. The boys lovely the freshly baked muffins and cookies and they didnt last long. Would definitely recommend this as a place to stay in Montreal.
Je conseille l'emplacement proche du métro ou bus. C'est moderne, fidèle au photos, et très propre. L'accueil des propriétaires est chaleureux.

Un appartement superbe, proche du jardin botanique, du métro, nous avons découvert Montréal en famille avec beaucoup de plaisir. William est attentif à ce que nous ne manquions de rien. Nous recommandons cet endroit sans hésitation!

Excellent emplacement, à 2 minutes à pied du métro et du stade olympique. Accueil sympathique et personnalisé, tout est bien réfléchi et fourni. Propre, tranquille et douillet. Je recommande fortement.

Best Airbnb experience ever! William and Sue clearly put in a lot of thought into preparing the apartment for their guests - everything that one could possibly need while traveling was provided including shower essentials, some basic food staples (milk, cream, eggs, coffee, even some frozen snacks), and an abundance of towels. They had even provided very delicious homemade treats! The neighborhood was quiet and the apartment was clean and spacious (even for four people -- the sofa bed is quite comfortable). I strongly recommend staying at William's and Sue's and I will definitely book this apartment again the next time I'm in Montreal :)
Great!

appartement conforme à la description. Très propre. Literie  très confortable. 
A 2mn du métro, puis 15mn du centre en métro (sans changement).
Cuisine bien aménagée, Appartement calme.
Les wc sont dans la salle de bain ce qui la rend un peu petite.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

My wife and I stayed here for only one night and Its truly one of the best airbnb stays we've ever experienced!  The hosts were on hand on arrival and so pleasant and helpful with directions and ideas of things to do. The apartment is a five minute walk to the Olympic stadium and underground metro system. Also bars and restsurants within 10 minutes walk (le blind pig and tannerie were very good!)  It's such a nice place to stay with absolutely everything you could need AND more! Basic provisions in the fridge which were most welcomed after a long drive.  Comfy bed. Excellent wifi.  Small balcony to sit outside. We will definitely be coming back next time we're in Montreal and stay for longer,  thank you both for your kindness and hospitality!

Me and my daughter had the fantastic time staying at William's place. There were many things prepared: snacks, basic ingredients to cook, some juice, and there even were homemade cookies. The house was VERY clean, everything was well organized. We could get immediate response for the things we asked for. The house was 2 minutes walk from the subway, which was a good thing. We hope that we could stay at William's place when we have the chance to go back to Canada.

We absolutely loved our stay at William and Sue's place! It was spacious, bright, very clean, and in a lovely neighbourhood. They went above and beyond to make us feel welcome! It is close to the Botanical Gardens and the Metro - very easy to get around! We will definitely be back!

Séjour agréable chez un hôte très sympathique et dans un appartement confortable et très propre disposant de toutes les commodités.
Rien n'a manqué pour que notre séjour se passe dans de bonnes conditions.
Je recommande vivement!!

Very pleasant experience with the host.  William and Sue were very courteous and friendly as well as providing us with helpful guidance and recommendations during our stay.  The apartment is extremely clean and has all the amenities that you need readily available.  They also provided some homemade baked goods which were truly delightful.   Highly recommended.

Attractive, comfortable and very clean apartment located near attractions  (Jardin Botanique, Insectarium, Biodôme, Planétarium and Stade Olympique).  It is a few minutes walk from the subway station.  The apartment is located on the second floor of a house at the corner of Bourbonnière and Pierre-de-Coubertin.  
Communications with William and Sue were prompt and informative.  The check-in and check-out were very easy.  I appreciated the welcoming muffins and cookies, in addition to the basic foods left in the fridge and kitchen cupboards.  
Both William and Sue were welcoming and hospitable making the stay most comfortable and enjoyable.

Thanks to William and Susan for being so helpful and thoughtful. The survival
kit was fantastic and unexpected of but they gave us a great breakfast treat! The place is marvelous. Super clean and super comfortable. Definitely a place worth staying at when you are in Montreal. Our stay was short but definitely was worth it!
The place is very nice and clean. William and Sue are great. I would stay here again next time in Montreal.

I've stayed in many Airbnbs and this one deserves a prize.  Expectations were high with all of the great reviews and everything was just as good, or better, than what the other reviews claim.  The area is quiet and residential, not bustling like downtown Montreal and you need to walk a few blocks for anything, including the subway which is very convenient.   Very close to the botanical garden (+great restaurant) and the impressive Olympic sports center where you can get a day pass for $6.  Will be back!

Fantastique emplacement! Je suis un utilisateur très régulier de Airbnb, et ce logement m'a completement conquis!

Douillet, bien aménagé, abordable et confortable, il est très bien situe, dans un quartier calme et très près des transports en commun. L'entrée entièrement autonome, extrêmement simple, y est un gros plus.

William et Susan sont des hôtes discrète, charmants mais extrêmement attentionnés et professionnels. Rien n'est laissé au hasard et les petites attentions à l'intérieur sont divines.

Mon nouveau must!

Situé à 2 minutes de marche de la station de métro, il était facile de ce déplacer au centre-ville. L'appartement était très propre. L'accès facile! Nous nous sentions en sécurité. Même si nous étions en pleine canicule, l'appartement est équipée d'une air climatisé murale et l'air est bien circulé donc nous avons très bien dormi.

Merci encore!

Had an amazing stay. As other people indicated, super nice extra touches were abound in the place, such as fridge stocked with eggs, milk, Keurig machine with a selection of hot drinks, cereals in the cupboard, and generally the place was very nicely decorated and clean. We had a personal greeting from Sue despite having encountered issues on the way and making us late. Subway was also only just a 5 minute walk away, in a nice feeling neighbourhood. Highly recommended.

This apartment is perfect. So well equipped and well located, near the Metro and the Olympic stadium area. Loved it,  and was sad to leave. A real home from home and William and Sue are lovely people who made us feel very welcome xxx

What a wonderful place!  I would highly recommend.  The space was clean, organized, and well prepared for our visit.  The 2 minute walk to the Metro was ideal for getting around Montreal.  William and Susan were excellent hosts.  When in Montreal I would not hesitate to book again.

This was my first time using Airbnb so I was not sure what to expect. Susan and William absolutely blew me away with their hospitality and kindness. We drove in a bit late into Montreal but Susan came out to greet and welcome us. The apartment was extremely clean and organized. There was coffee available, cupboards and fridge had food for our disposal and the nicest touch was the homemade bakery items and crepes. There was also a private parking spot available for our car, which was appreciated. If we had any questions or concerns, Susan would respond within minutes and would ensure the problem is taken care of on the spot. When we come to Montreal in the future, we will most definitely book this apartment again instead of going to a hotel!

This is an extremely clean and well-kept accommodation.  You will find all the usual amenities plus more, such as a refrigerator stocked with eggs, homemade jam, milk, margerine, and condiments, etc.  You are greeted by an array of home baked muffins and cookies. Communication was easy and excellent when we had a problem with the cable service.  William and Susan were there in a flash to help us out.  This one bedroom apartment is in an ideal location for walking to the Botanical Gardens, Olympic stadium, and Biodome, and has easy access to the metro and bus service.  Very quiet...like a little oasis in the city of Montreal.

We recommend William and Susan’s Place to anyone traveling to Montreal!!
The hosts are delightful, the place is immaculate, beautiful, comfortable, and VERY well-equipped. They obviously take great pride in offering an exceptional experience  to their guests. 
In addition, the location is excellent - situated in a quiet tree lined neighborhood, very close to the metro which is very clean and efficient. In addition, the wonderful Olympic Park is close by with its gorgeous botanical gardens and much more.  We felt very comfortable strolling around the area. 
A good grocery store and casual dining spots are nearby; very convenient!
Truly an A-Plus choice!!

Pour preuve de notre satisfaction, c'est la seconde fois que nous séjournons à l'idéal.

L'appartement a vu son équipement amélioré (clim, aspirateur Dyson, etc.). Et il y a toujours les gâteaux (maison) de bienvenue ainsi que deux/trois bricoles dans le frigo pour la survie des premiers instants (pouvoir se faire un bon café sans avoir à faire les courses tout de suite, par exemple).

Bref un chouette condo, chez des chouettes gens. Allez-y en confiance. Mais pas lorsque nous y retournerons nous-même;-)
This condo was immaculate, with many nice amenities and touches, and in a great location. Highly recommended! I look forward to returning for a longer stay some time! Miles

Probably the best airbnb I have been to, and I've been to quite a few entire apartment airbnb's. William and Sue were great hosts. We arrived late at night and Sue walked out in the rain and freezing weather to make sure we were able to get in safely. They also left homemade treats and some food in the fridge! 

As for the apartment, it's located very close to the metro station so we had no trouble accessing the city at all. The apartment was pretty much spotless. Sheets smelled clean, every room was very clean. I was very happy with my stay here and would absolutely recommend. You won't regret it!
Fantastic stay, and the hosts thought of everything! Honestly could not ask for a better experience :)

I enjoyed a comfortable and restful stay at William and Susan’s cozy, immaculate apartment. The cleanliness, amenities, and warm personal touches made me feel immediately at home. The thought and care that they put into creating a welcoming space were evident throughout. As hosts, they showed the perfect blend of attentiveness, warmth, and professionalism that made our communications and interactions pleasant and easy.

I appreciated having a fully equipped kitchen and staple pantry items such as pasta for complimentary use. (Groceries at Marche Maisonneuve were a quick ride away on the 139 bus from Pie-IX station.) The sparkling new appliances and furnishings and modern heating system made for a comfortable, problem-free stay in late-November temperatures.  Entering and exiting the apartment was safe and easy, with the keyless lock system in place.

Thoughtful touches included plentiful linens, spare umbrellas in the closet, and various toiletry/personal care items available for use. Susan checked in regularly to make sure our stay was going well.

The location was convenient: easy access to the center of the city, but removed enough for a quiet retreat from the bustle. I enjoyed catching a glimpse of everyday life in the residential Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighborhood. (College de Maisonneuve, literally across the street, serves post-high school/pre-college students, coming and going throughout the day.)

Staying at L’Ideal on our first trip to Montreal and as our first use of Airbnb was a choice I was glad to have made. I look forward to returning to Montreal (am now very much a fan) and staying here again.

Wow!  I am a very picky person and not easily impressed, but staying at this Airbnb exceeded all my expectations!  Everything was exactly as promised.  Communication and information was precise, great location, off-street parking, private entrance and the apartment was exceptionally clean and updated.  William and Sue even provided homemade treats and stocked many basics such as coffee, milk and more.  They were friendly and attentive while still respecting one's privacy.  Great hosts and a great service - I would definitely stay again!  Thanks William and Sue.

Second time at Will & Sue's was just as wonderful as the first. The little snacks she leaves are real nice touch for a true b&b experience. Place is perfect and the hosts are there for you when you need them late on new years and can't find any food. But they give you plenty of space. Really feels like home away from home. Can't thank you guys enough!
Cet endroit est un must ...

William and Susan were amazing! The place was perfectly located for our needs and we really could not have asked for more. They were attentive, caring and professional. They answered every question quickly, we’re always available for communication and the place was beautiful, full of thoughtful details. We really can’t say enough good things! Would absolutely recommend!

William’s apartment is charming and it’s the cleanest house I ever rented.  

Ils ont inclu une touche spéciale et sont d’une gentillesse et disponibilité incroyables.

Un vrai bijou.  The place to rent in Montreal 

Merci énormément
Je ne dirai qu'une chose, laissez-vous tenter par ce logement, vous ne serez pas déçu.

Beautiful and comfortable accommodations!  And we were welcomed with tasty treats.  Communication was clear; check-in and check-out was a breeze.  Would highly recommend to any couple visiting the area.

We loved our time at William and Susan’s place, it was hard to even leave to explore Montreal because it was so welcoming and relaxing—so tempting to stay in and nap! It was very very clean, stylish, and had lots of thoughtful touches-including some baked goods. The location was great, short walk to metro and just a described, downtown within minutes by the metro! When we come back to Montreal we will definitely stay here again! Nothing bad to say and nothing to improve on, everything was wonderful! Great at communicating and giving us recommendations!

Quelle belle expérience.  Un accueil chaleureux, un endroit équipé de tout ce que tu peux avoir besoin pour un séjour des plus agréables.  N’oublions pas de mentionner que l’endroit est d’une propreté impeccable.    Nous avons même eu droit à quelques gâteries faites maison.  (Muffins, biscuits)   Le fait que leur gîte est à deux pas d’une bouche de métro rend notre séjour encore plus plaisant.   Je n’hésiterai aucunement à y retourner ou encore à le référer à un ami ou à qui veux bien l’entendre.

It will be definitely my first recommendation to all my friends who plan to visit Montreal. It has everything that you are looking for: great hospitality, super cleanliness, and super easy public transportation!!

This place was great. Cozy, clean, minutes from metro, short walk from the lively Ontario street. 

We stayed in and cooked, and the kitchen had everything we needed and more (flour, milk, coffee..) we felt like home. Really appreciated! Thanks again William!
Tout est impeccable, bien localisé et hôtes attentionnés
Très belle appartement, parfait pour des activités près du stade.

Brilliant apartment. Brilliant hosts. Very convenient for travel. Cannot recommend highly enough. Did not have a great deal of contact with William and Sue as we were out every day, but were very aware that they were there if we needed them. Cannot praise the apartment and our welcome enough.
Super close to the Metro and Botanical Gardens! Very cute!

Des hôtes qui méritent grandement leur « Super host ». Une valeur sure, un quartier génial avec accès facile à la ville, de petites attentions qui font toute la différence et la propreté impeccable des lieux : je n’ai que de bons mots. Vraiment, j’y retournerais n’importe quand. Merci!

Cet appartement est comparable au suite offerte dans les hôtels mais à moindre prix. De plus, cette appartement nous permet de vivre une expérience touristique extraordinaire afin de se «mêler» à la population.  De plus, avec la station de métro à moins de 5 minutes à pied, nous sommes en pleins cœur du centre-ville en moins de 15 minutes.  Sincèrement, WOW. À vivre et revivre.
Parfait endroit, l’arrivée est très bien organisée et tout est fait pour bien vous accueillir, un endroit où aller les yeux fermés

Susan and William were great hosts. Everything we needed were available. The place is clean and is close to public transit, the Biodome and the Botanical garden. Highly recommended if you're looking for a place to stay in when visiting Montreal.

Appartement simple mais très chaleureux autant que les hôtes!!  Très bel accueil de William et Suzan qui sont venus m’accueillir à mon arrivée et avait laissé de petites gâteries dans l’appartement même si mon séjour n’était que d’un seul jour.  L’appartement était d’une propreté sans égale et le lit très confortable.  Je le recommande sans aucune hésitation!

We had an amazing stay in William and Susan’s place! They have everything you need, and more, and were such amazing hosts! The location was great right beside the metro, and the apartment was very cute and nicely done.

A superior sweet home just a block away from the Botanical Garden, Olympic Park and the Biodôme. Few minutes walk to the nearest metro station and fantastic Poutine Centrale. Susan and William gave us the warmest welcome and helped us to find a parking lot so we could leave our car for a whole day. The room was tidy, clean and spacious with whatever-you-need and cute decorations. Just a small tip that you may wanna bring your own bathing things as they only have basic toiletries.

appartement trais beau et très propre 
accueil très sympathique
il est juste un  peu difficile de monter des bagages lourds  dans l escalier

Merveilleux séjour à l'idéal, William & Susan sont des hôtes merveilleux, très arrangeant, de multiples petites attentions à l'arrivé dans les lieux. Je le recommande chaudement et si je suis amené à revenir à Montréal, je reviendrais tout de suite dans ce logement.

Je retournerai certainement lors de mes prochaines escapade à Montréal. La proximité à la station de métro rend les déplacements facile. Puis c'est très près de nombreuses attractions importante de cette ville. L'appartement est super confortable, très propre et bien équipé. Le stationnement inclus évite des tracas.

Appartement idéal pour passer un séjour parfait! Tout est là : propreté irréprochable, lit super confortable, air climatisé, câbles USB pour brancher nos appareils, petits muffin faits maison, accueil chaleureux, stationnement privé, métro juste en face. Que demander de mieux! Je recommande chaleureusement ce logement.

This apartment is the perfect space to getaway to and explore Montreal!! William and Susan put a lot of love and thought to their space!!  All you need to bring is your luggage of clothing as they have everything you can think of in the comfort of your own home.  It’s convenient to the city, right by Olympic Park, close to the Metro , and provides great amenities like parking and a touchless keypad.  We felt very secure.   William and Susan are very sweet, making sure we were comfortable and easily reachable for any questions.   They welcomed us with desserts!!  We would definitely come back again!!
accueil chaleureux, appartement douillet ; c'est notre 3eme séjour à l'idéal.

Apartment is really nice (better than expected), we got late at night and there were homemade coockies and Muffins for us, which was really nice after a long trip. Also cleaning was perfect.
Apartment is very near the Botanic Garden and the Olympic stadium, as well as 2 or 3 blocks from the Subway/Metro.
Hosts care and hospitalitty were great, probably one of the best hosts I had in Airbnb.
Susan and William were wonderful hosts and were very responsive and helpful. A great charming place to stay!

L'acceuil chaleureux, les touches d'attention, la déco, la propreté ont fait tout une différence et nous donnons 5/5. Même si le logement se situe dans un coin de rue, c'est relativement tranquil et le métro n'est pas loin à pied. Nous aurions aimé que la salle de bain soit un peu plus grande mais néanmoins elle reste propre et fonctionnelle.
Logement impeccablement tenu à deux pas du parc olympique. Place de stationnement privative. Hôte à disposition pour tous renseignements. Très bon rapport qualité/prix.

What a wonderful place! Susan was so kind and made sure we were comfortable. The apartment had great amenities and such thoughtful touches to it. The apartment was easy to locate with the directions Susan and William provided . Will definitely stay here again when we come back !

We had a wonderful stay at William and Susan's place!  It's bright, spacious, clean and has everything you need and more.  The Metro is less than 5 minutes away walking, the kitchen is stocked and our stay was quiet and comfortable.  Will definitely stay again!  Thank you!

I would 100% recommend this place to anybody traveling to montreal, it’s within walking distance to the Saputo Stadium and some bars/pubs located on Ontario street. William and Sue were very friendly and you’ll notice within minutes of walking in why they’re super hosts.
Le séjour était parfait, appartement très propre, calme, climatisation, très bien équipé pour un super séjour. Metro à 2 minutes à pied et William est super accueillant.

Nous avons passé un super séjour en famille avec deux jeunes enfants chez William ! L’appartement est idéalement situé (tout proche du métro) très propre et très confortable ! Nous avons eu un accueil des plus chaleureux et convivial.
 Nous recommandons fortement L’idéal pour séjourner à Montréal notamment avec des enfants !

As advertised... this was our first-ever stay at an Airbnb and our expectations were significantly surpassed! The space is very clean, offers parking, all amenities and is very conveniently located. Even better, William and Susan are quick to respond and super friendly and helpful. We loved our stay at their location and will not hesitate to return or recommend to friends and family.

We couldn't have asked for a better, more relaxing experience visiting Montreal for the first time. The apartment was very comfortable, beautifully appointed, and exceptionally clean. The beds and linens were super soft and Susan furnished us with milk, cream, tea & coffee as well as water and some lovely baked goods. We were also conveniently located a short walk to the metro and the Olympic Center. Additionally, we really appreciated the free parking and the extra time Susan and William took to greet and welcome us and to help us navigate the city. We are very grateful and lucky to have stayed here!
Perfect place in an amazing location.  Highly Recommend for any stay in Montréal.
Nous avons adoré notre séjour et nous recommandons sans hésitation :)

the apartment was amazing, much better than the photo and what we expected. lt had everything we needed. Willam and Suzanne we great hospital hosts, quick to respond, and provided great tips. The area surrounded with good restaurants. If we were to stay in Montreal a few more days, we'd pick this apartment again.
We had an excellent time.This room is clean and comfortable.The host is very kind.

Excellent séjour chez William et Suzanne. Idéal pour visiter Montréal tout en étant dans un quartier calme. Le métro est à 2 minutes à pied et amène dans le centre en 15 minutes. L'appartement est très propre et nous avons été accueillis par des petits cookies et autres muffins faits maison qui étaient excellents.  L'idéal porte bien son nom. Nous recommandons sans hésitation.

We had a great stay at William and Susan's place. Our hosts greeted us on arrival and answered any questions we had (such as location to nearest metro). We were able to park our large Honda Odyssey van in the space in the back alley. The code access to the building and apartment is very convenient (no need to carry any keys). Access is a walk around to the front, take 5-6 steps to the front door and inside are additional steps to your apartment. We enjoyed the very spacious interior which has a separate living room (with tv), one queen-size bed in the bedroom, a bathroom, and a kitchen (with full-size fridge and stove) and dining room. The place is cute and immaculately clean! We enjoyed the special touches such as the cookies, muffins and beverages. I highly recommend anyone to stay here.
Lovely flat, beautifully clean. Communication was fast and helpful, and the pastries and supplies they left for us were a lovely touch. We would definitely stay again
Great place, very clean and welcoming! 2 minutes from the subway station. Check in is very easy and flexible. I will definitely check if the place is available next time I am travelling to Montreal.

Excellent place to stay! Sparkling clean and cozy. This Airbnb also provides beyond normal supplies such as bottled waster, milk, cream, eggs and muffins etc. Which saved me a trip on the first day to do the grocery shopping. Susan is very hospitable and easy to communicate with. I would highly recommend her place.

Over the last several years I've stayed in AirBnB places in Toronto and Montreal, and this was my mom's first AirBnB experience. We greatly valued the cleanliness and lovely spacious apartment, as well as the many thoughtful touches (e.g., hair dryer, cleaning supplies, keypad lock, appliance instructions, glasses cleaner, home-made baked goods, stocked fridge). I also enjoyed getting a local experience being close to the Olympic Park and exploring Hochelaga- Maisonneuve. The hosts greeted us upon arrival in person and were very responsive to questions. The neighborhood was peaceful, and a convenience store and metro station were easy to access. I had previously stayed in Old Montreal 5 years ago, and I liked this experience better. I'd happily return to your place!

This a charming apartment, exactly as described and more.  Clean, close to metro, comfortable bed and many extra touches, including some homemade baking, and lots of basic food amenities. Also we arrived in Montreal during a “Heat Warning” and it was wonderful to walk into a lovely cool apartment.

William’s place is clean, tidy, and cozy especially after a long day’s drive.  The hosts were very hospitable in ensuring we checked in alright and had provided some snacks and drinks for us in the fridge and kitchen table when we had arrived.  I recommend staying here if you want to stay in a quiet neighbourhood and want a good night’s rest.

Le logement est très agréable, l'emplacement correspond parfaitement à l'annonce près du métro et les hôtes sont très prévenants, réactifs tout en restants discrets. L'appartement est très propre, bien équipé et nous y avons passé 3 semaines comme chez nous.

Cet appartement dépasse largement la description et nous avons été très agréablement surprises par la propreté, le niveau d'équipement et la déco. En plus il est très bien situé à 2 min du métro. Mais ce que nous avons le plus apprécié, c'est l'accueil, la gentillesse et la disponibilité tout en discrétion des  hôtes. 
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse.

William's place was extra comfortable and exceeded our expectations on all levels. The three of us (all adults) were very comfortable. Everything we needed was provided. They are kind and helpful hosts. Most welcoming. We only stayed two nights but this would be an excellent location for a longer stay. We heartily recommend this place.
Super clean great location includes parking definitely recommend
Comfortable, well laid out space with lots of light and everything you need to make a meal and to relax.  For us it was a home away from home.

This place far exceeded our expectations. The pictures don’t do this place justice. Everything we could have needed was available in the space. Everything was so professional and thought out it was like staying at a 5 star hotel but with the feel of home. The neighborhood felt peaceful and safe. The provided parking space was great and we had plenty of room! There was not a single think lacking here. We only wish we had more time to stay. Thank you Susan for being so prompt in meeting us and suggesting where to go for breakfast. Your passion for  hospitality was so felt by my husband and I.

Un appartement et un accueil exceptionnel ! Tout y est : propreté, belle decoration, équipements, petites attentions, super literie ! Je recommande ce logement sans hésiter! C'est l'idéal, ni plus ni moins ;)

C’est ma meilleure expérience Airbnb à ce jour. Les hôtes sont attentionnés et communicatifs. Il y a beaucoup de touches d’attention dans l’appartement. Très bien aménagé contrairement à d’autres appartement qui sont des coquilles vides. Je m’y suis senti comme un invité chez eux. Le stationnement privé est fourni. L’entrée est autonome. C’est près du métro et du Parc Olympique. Je le recommande vivement.
All round fantastic! both Susan and William checked to see if we had any questions and the flat was beautifully supplied

We had a great stay here; while the location is closer to the Olympic Park, it is easy to get to other landmarks through Montréal by the green Métro line. We mostly interacted with Susan, who was very responsive to our needs and concerns. The interior here is adequately furnished, and the furniture and fixtures are modern and up to date.
25$ uber from city centre which was a drag but extremely clean good amenities and service.

Best airbnb experience I ever had. Place is very clean and close to metro. Host greeted us when we arrived and gave us some local tips. Homemade cookies and muffins, coffee, and some breakfast were provided in the house for convenient! Definitely recommend!
excellent

Located outside of downtown,  very close to the Olympic Parc it was very easy to get to (we drove).

Aside from all the standard amenities there were a lot of thoughtful touches like homemade strawberry jam in the fridge as well as some bread, eggs and other staples (oh and  homemade cookies + muffins). Also having many usb outlets was very convenient.

William and Susan were very welcoming and helpful, they even cleared the snow off our car while we were out at dinner.

Great place!

L'Idéal, c'est carrément l'idéal pour un séjour Montréalais.  À deux pas du métro, quartier tranquille, accueil chaleureux et petites attentions... tout y était pour nous charmer et nous faire passer du bon temps.  Je recommande chaudement ce nid douillet!
Awesome place. Two blocks from the metro. Parking. Sparkling clean. Stylish. We'd love to return again.

William and Susan are expert hosts who warmly welcomed us when we arrived and even helped us scrape all the Montreal ice off our car as we headed out ;) The home is clean and full of thoughtful touches and perfectly located next to the metro. We would definitely stay again.
Impeccable.  Petites attentions, propreté irréprochable, hôte disponible, confort.  On recommande sans hésiter.

Warm welcome from William. Lots of wonderful little details that contributed to a wonderful stay. Free parking, home made baking on the table and a super comfortable bed. It had a very homey feeling...like visiting your favorite aunt!

WoW! Quel accueil! William est vraiment charmant. Tout était parfait! Super propre, super bien équipé, excellente literie et plein de belles attentions. Je le recommande  vraiment et nous comptons bien y retourner! Merci encore à William!

We had a wonderful experience in this place.  The apartment had everything one could want for a stay in Montreal.  The Metro is close as are other activities.  Susan and William were excellent hosts and we highly recommend them.

Quel gite extraordinaire avec des petites gâteries pour se faire à déjeuner. Des meubles super confortable et des propreté exemplaire.  Des hôtes convivial et un accueil exemplaire.  Le seul regret c'est d'être resté qu'une nuit. Nous y reviendrons au prochain passage à Montréal. Merci William et Susan.
Very clean and comfortable!   Really enjoyed staying here.
Tout était parfait, chaleureux et propre ! C’est le meilleur Airbnb que j’ai vu! Au delà de mes attentes!

Logement idéal, propreté irréprochable, bien équipé, nous n'avons manqués de rien
endroit très calme, on y dort très bien, lit très confortable
je recommande

name: Apartment is Sold.
summary: A very spacious and neat 3 bed room apartment with a marvelous sea view over the marmaris Bay in the European side of Istanbul. The apartment is fully furnished to the highest standards and fully equipped kitchen. Dish washer washing machine etc.
description: A very spacious and neat 3 bed room apartment with a marvelous sea view over the marmaris Bay in the European side of Istanbul. The apartment is fully furnished to the highest standards and fully equipped kitchen. Dish washer washing machine etc.
house_rules: This is a private apartment inside a secured compound and is a self catering place except for housekeeping which will be on demand during the stay with additional charge.

name: Hyatt Kaanapali Beach FANTASTIC OFFER!
summary: Take advantage of this AMAZING deal!  A 2BR/2Bath luxury residence in the Hyatt Kaanapali Resort!!! My place is close to The Beach. My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids). This is a 2-bedroom/2-bath residence within the Hyatt Resort.  Price includes use of all resort amenities.
description: Take advantage of this AMAZING deal!  A 2BR/2Bath luxury residence in the Hyatt Kaanapali Resort!!! My place is close to The Beach. My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids). This is a 2-bedroom/2-bath residence within the Hyatt Resort.  Price includes use of all resort amenities.

host.host_about:
I am the owner of a small, boutique travel company renting on behalf of owners at a select number of luxury properties across the US, all of which I travel to and frequently stay at myself.  The Hyatt Grand Aspen is the only Aspen property I have elected to add to my exclusive portfolio because it is simply the best-of-the-best, and when I am visiting Aspen, there is no place else I would rather stay!

My calendar is updated almost daily, and I will respond to your inquiry and work through the entire booking process with you in a very prompt, thorough, and professional manner.

reviews.comments: The Hyatt Kaanapali was in a great location. We loved having direct access to the beach. It made taking our 1 year out so much easier. The resort’s pool was also very pleasant and family friendly. The resort and room itself were very well appointed and made the experience very enjoyable. We’d definitely stay again if we can. Tami was easy to work with and made the whole exchange easy even though we were new to Airbnb.

name: Voted “Best of Williamsburg” / 1000 sqft Loft
summary: Set in booming Williamsburg - just 1 stop from Manhattan - this 1000 sq ft loft has 13ft ceilings, huge windows with views of the East River, a built in home theater, king bed, full kitchen, large dining table, work station and is beautifully decorated with Restoration Hardware furniture + a NEW massive rooftop. Surrounded by dozens of amazing cafes, restaurants, bars and iconic Brooklyn hot spots like the Wythe Hotel and the Brooklyn Brewery. Whole Foods and Soul Cycle are around the corner.
description: Set in booming Williamsburg - just 1 stop from Manhattan - this 1000 sq ft loft has 13ft ceilings, huge windows with views of the East River, a built in home theater, king bed, full kitchen, large dining table, work station and is beautifully decorated with Restoration Hardware furniture + a NEW massive rooftop. Surrounded by dozens of amazing cafes, restaurants, bars and iconic Brooklyn hot spots like the Wythe Hotel and the Brooklyn Brewery. Whole Foods and Soul Cycle are around the corner. Entire apartment + huge rooftop patio Located in the best 2 square blocks of Williamsburg.  A block away from the famous Schmorgasburg! Local food favorites are: Toby's Coffee, Cafe Mogador, Van Leeuwen Ice Cream, and Birds of Feather (Chinese). 5 minutes from Bedford subway station; 3 minute to Manhattan ferry access; parking available next door
neighborhood_overview: Located in the best 2 square blocks of Williamsburg.  A block away from the famous Schmorgasburg! Local food favorites are: Toby's Coffee, Cafe Mogador, Van Leeuwen Ice Cream, and Birds of Feather (Chinese).
transit: 5 minutes from Bedford subway station; 3 minute to Manhattan ferry access; parking available next door
access: Entire apartment + huge rooftop patio

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Canadian born, Idaho raised, Colorado educated, New York trained, aspiring change maker

reviews.comments:
Logan is a great host! He did everything to make us feel comfortable. He even changed his own flight tickets to be there at our arrival!
The apartment is great. It’s a very nice loft, in a typical Brooklyn style, with modern equipment. It looks exactly like in the pictures, with a very high cellar and a lot of space. 
It’s located in the heart of Williamsburg, a really great neighborhood with many nice restaurants, bars, and shops. Plus it’s only one stop from Manhattan with the L line, in a calm street, close to the east river, which is a very pleasant environment.

We had a great time and would be very happy to stay again at Logan’s place for our next trip to NYC!
Great place, great neighborhood! Excellent place for unwinding and relaxing. Loved being so close to the East River during such beautiful fall weather. Thanks, Logan!
Logan's spot was amazing. Perfect place to experience Williamsburg. The projector screen on the big wall was so cool

This is a sweet loft! Awesome location right near a bunch of good shops and restaurants. We were very comfortable, his sofa is amazing! The bed was cozy. We'd totally stay here again. Way more room than you'd get in any hotel. Logan was very responsive with any questions I had. I really enjoyed this place and will stay here again if it's available.
Logan was an incredible host and his apartment is wonderful. Everything was accurately described in the add and Logan was easy to reach if needed.
Logan's home is very spacious. Decently decorated with a great taste of art. Love it very much and will recommend to my friends.
Loft is exactly as advertised - very open, full of light, and comfortable.  Easy access to NYC and the heart of Williamsburg.  Would stay again for sure.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Loved everything about this place! Large airy apartment, big windows with views of the Hudson river and Manhattan.  Immaculately kept and furnished. I would highly recommend staying here! Logan and his girlfriend are amazing hosts, and we had everything we needed for our stay. Can't wait to come back!

This apartment is incredible. Smack in the middle of Williamsburg, there are a million restaurants nearby, and the river is just 1 block away. Amazing views of Manhattan! The Bedford metro is a few minute walk away, and only 1 stop from Manhattan! Apartment: The best value for the buck I've had on Air BnB. The ceiling is crazy high - like 15 feet. There's lot of natural light (and good blinds), and the decoration is industrial chic -- very Brooklyn.  King size bed was super cozy. Logan had everything arranged for us on arrival.  Really couldn't recommend a better place to stay in Brooklyn.
Perfect location, spacious and great decor. Logan was always available and extremely polite. Would definitely stay there again.
Had a great time at Logan's. The apartment exceeded expectations: spacious, very conveniently located in Williamsburg, etc. Logan was a great host.

Logan's space is as advertised - spacious, well-kept, and right in the heart of Williamsburg. The huge windows (hello sunlight) looking out to the East River/lower Manhattan and the projector set-up are added bonuses (not to mention the rooftop deck - more awesome views of lower Manhattan). The Bedford subway station, Whole Foods, Smorgasburg and Rough Trade records are within close walking distance. Had a very enjoyable experience at Logan's spot, and would stay there again in a heartbeat.

Wow ! that's the first thing that comes to mind when you enter Logan's apartment. I've stayed there twice and would do so many times.
Spacious, super well decorated and bright. Great location on Brooklyn, close to everything but at a quiet street. 
Logan is extremely polite and always available. 
It's a great place to stay, but if you do, please take care of it. It would be a shame not to :-)
Wonderful host and such a lovely place to stay!
Logan is a great host and his loft is amazing. Perfect location. Bed is super comfortable. Honestly we couldn't have been happier.
Large space, great location, super comfy bed.
A beautiful, spacious apartment in a perfect location. This is a gem at a reasonable price. Logan is great to work with as well. We loved it.
Nice space, very open and sunny. And nicely tucked away from the noise of the city.

Logan is a brilliant host - receptive and warm. His place is gem, right in the heart of Williamsburg. Minutes away from the Wythe Hotel and my favourite store Pilgrim & Surf. The flat itself is spacious. Really enjoyed the little touches that make this place a cosy home. Would highly recommend it.
Great, clean and spacious place to explore NYC from. Logan was communicative and flexible. I would stay here again!

Logan's loft was nothing short of incredible. It is very spacious, is conveniently located near everything Williamsburg has to offer, and has great views of the city . The rooftop patio is a superb place to relax after a day in the city. Logan's loft is a one of a kind place!

Logan was easy to communicate with. Check-in was no problem, and he gave excellent recommendations for the neighborhood.

Overall, I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Beautiful space. Great location. Very hospitable hosts. Would recommend to anyone looking in the area.
Very clean and well decorated loft apartment, great location. Fantastic value.
Ihana asunto, kivalla paikalla. En tavannut Logania, mutta avainten saaminen sujui vaivatta. Suosittelen lämpimästi.

Logan was exceptionally helpful in sharing his space with my parents who were in town for my wedding. The space is so amazingly gorgeous and well-appointed, and the location is fantastic. Check-in was a snap, and everything was perfectly clean and tended to. Not a single complaint or concern at all. 5 out of 5 stars, and highly recommended! Thanks Logan!
Cool space, great location, comfy bed. Second time I've stayed here and would do so again.

Un endroit exceptionnel très bien situé à Brooklyn. Décoré avec beaucoup de goût et très bien équipé. Sans parler du Rooftop de la résidence équipé de tables et chaises longues. Nous gardons cette adresse pour un prochain séjour !

We loved Logan’s beautiful place in Williamsburg! It was exactly what we were looking for (great location, subway close by, and amazing food). All of his local suggestions were great too! I would definitely recommend it.
Fantastic place.  Great neighborhood.  Easy walk to everything.  Easy subway, taxi, Uber, ferry to Manhattan.  Would definitely stay here again.

Beautiful apartment in lovely area!! I highly reccomend staying here. There are so many good restaurants in the area and only a 10 minute walk to the L train line. Only thing is we had a little encounter with a cockroach but there was some spray in the bathroom.
Logan was s great host, his place is very comfortable and he was more than accommodating.
Logan was very responsive and communicated well. The place was great, big and well furnished, and lots of places within walking distance. Would stay here again!
great place to stay to explore manhattan, williamsburg and broooklyn. would recommend. easy communication with responsive host.
Great loft, awesome location, cool decor! Overall perfect spot to stay!

Logan's place is GREAT! My two friends and I came to this Brooklyn loft on a girl's trip and loved it. Every night, after the long days of walking around the city, it was the coziest and artsiest place to come back to. Logan also gave us some good recommendations for places in the area which were all amazing! Parking is limited though, we had the horrible experience of getting multiple tickets for not reading the street parking signs closely enough, but nonetheless, it was fun. For the most part, we could find street parking not far at all, but be aware of those signs! Overall, you definitely get the true Brooklyn feel in this loft and in this location. Logan's communication and hospitality was great. I hope one day we can stay here again!

We enjoyed the time in your generous and stylish Appartement very much! It was in a very nice neighbourhood, near to subway an busses and the ferry to Manhattan! In these cold days was it warm and friendly. We were sad when we left and are looking forward to come back!

name: BEACH ESCAPE
summary: Summer is here enjoy the beach on your door step, work on that tan or simply unwind .Perfect for Winter getaways also enjoy a nice glass of wine by the open fire, or Perhaps a soak in the spa overlooking Pittwater. Located on the beach, you'll feel like your miles away from anywhere a tranquil setting for any holiday.  Drift off to sleep with the sound of the waves lapping up on the beach.  The House is spilt over 4 levels with a lounge room on each level , lots of space for adults & children.
space: There are 4 lounge areas that guests and family's can spread out so there's enough space for everyone. Outdoor deck over looking Pittwater with a 10 seater table, also an internal courtyard with lounge area and a lower deck over looking the beach with built in spa.
description: Summer is here enjoy the beach on your door step, work on that tan or simply unwind .Perfect for Winter getaways also enjoy a nice glass of wine by the open fire, or Perhaps a soak in the spa overlooking Pittwater. Located on the beach, you'll feel like your miles away from anywhere a tranquil setting for any holiday.  Drift off to sleep with the sound of the waves lapping up on the beach. There are 4 lounge areas that guests and family's can spread out so there's enough space for everyone. Outdoor deck over looking Pittwater with a 10 seater table, also an internal courtyard with lounge area and a lower deck over looking the beach with built in spa. neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a busy thriving coastal area, with lots of boutique shops, Restaurants  ,Bars & even a cinema. Theres a beach around e very corner and Palm beach is located 5-10 minutes drive away the home of Australias Home & Away. Palm beach also have great shopping and food outlets.  You can catch a ferry across the water to the central coast for a day out from palm beach.
transit: Car is the easiest to get around, although there is a bus stop at the end of the road with is easy to use also.

host.host_about:
I Like to make sure that all guests are comfortable and can get the most out of what Sydney and the northern Beaches has to offer.

Love the finer things in life , the best of the best.

My motto is try to be the best person you can and look after one another
 "Life's too short"

reviews.comments: Amazing place, very clean on arrival. They were always available for any questions we had. It was a great stay!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, Bailey was a fantastic host, extremely accommodating. The property and location was better than we expected.
Bailey had stocked the fridge and pantry with a few of the essentials for our arrival, a very welcoming touch. Bedrooms and living areas were large and very comfortable. Tranquil location, with beautiful views of Pittwater.
Looking forward to our next stay at Bailey's place.
we loved our stay in avalon. place was amazing. views were great and the community was just lovely

Amazing house with direct access to the beach and private jetty. We had a ball! (Website hidden by Airbnb) you can think of IS in the house. This is not one of those properties that have "RENTAL" written all over it, this is a HOME. 
Breakfasts on the verandah overlooking  the water and the sound of waves crashing against the shore is something special. 
The house is large enough for a large group, where everyone is comfortably accommodated yet have enough privacy to feel completely disconnected from the group due to the bedrooms being located over three different levels. 
Tip: you might want to grab a sleeping eye mask as it get pretty bright in the house once the sun is up.

Loved our stay at Bailey amazing home in Avalon! The quality of decor and all his pieces throughout the house very tastefully done. Didn't want to leave and the view from the deck is breathtaking. Down a few steps off the deck and you are swimming in the clear waters of Pittwater.
Accommodated our large group very well and hope to return again. 
Thanks Bailey for the starter pack in the kitchen. Yummy! Great host! 
Cheers Liz

An awesome and amazing house that just made for such a relaxing and easy weekend away. The view is just stunning and the house is very nicely decorated with all the essentials. Loved that the house had access to a private beach. Bailey was so easy to communicate with and always replied promptly to any questions. Thank you for making our stay so lovely.

Bailey was a great host! 
He responded immediately to the reservation and got us out of a sticky situation! 
The house is absolutely amazing! Has beach acess and the best view of Pittwater! We had the best backdrop and wedding photos! 
The house is super clean! Modern and comfortable beds. The 4 levels and total of 14 bedroom just gave everyone that extra room to breath and space to move! 
We will definitely be back!
Great place, very special spot. Private access to the beach and spacious home, great for large groups. Go for it!!
Beautiful, tranquil location on beach. Excellent for entertaining and kids. Place was very clean and well-appointed.
One of the most amazing places I have been to. 100% recommend it

Had a great stay! Fitted our extended family very comfortably and we loved the location and the balcony view. The inclinator made things easy for our elderly guests as the house goes over several levels. Bailey was a great communicator and Paradise Beach is a quiet place to swim and full of character!

Our family enjoyed a fantastic stay at Beach Escape to celebrate my mum's 60th birthday. 
There was a lot of planning and logistics in the lead up to our stay and Bailey was always prompt and accommodating with questions. 
It's a great house for a large family, offering us the perfect bedroom configuration for 9 adults and 4 kids as well as plenty of living space so we weren't living on top of each other. 
We loved the beautiful Pittwater views and dining outdoors on the large deck facing the view.
Beach Escape is also pet friendly which meant all our family were welcome. 
It was fantastic having the amenities of Avalon only 5 mins drive away but feeling like we were in a quiet secluded area far away from the hustle & bustle of Sydney. 
There's plenty of pedestal fans but no air con & blinds on west facing windows made for a hot stay on the days that reached almost 40 degrees. But it meant we made the most of the wonderful harbour beach down the stairs. 
Would highly recommend Beach Escape to large groups.

This house is perfect for a large extended family group. It has so much room that you can go off and have a quiet time by yourself even if the house is fully occupied. The beds, bedding and towels are high quality, and the kitchen has everything you need to cater for a large group. The private beach and the hot tub are wonderful for just hanging out and relaxing. The house's many levels mean that even crying babies don't disturb others in the house.
Waking up to the gorgeous views of the trees, boats and water can't be matched. I would highly recommend this house and would come back.

A very large home that can genuinely handle a larger group. Lots of retreat areas so people can spread out. Location is the quintessential waterfront Pittwater experience. The host was good on the communication and any issues or advice quickly addressed. Highly recommend this property

We were made to wait almost two hours out the front without any information from the host as to how to get into the house. Thursday was my actual birthday and this almost had us packing up and heading home - we were minutes away from cancelling the weekend as we had no way of getting in to the house we had booked for 12 guests. We then get inside and everyone starts to arrive and we all shower and use the toilets. By the time we come out the smell of raw sewage is so unbearable that we can't use the balcony for the dinner we had planned or open any windows on a hot day in a house that has no air con (not that air con was ever listed or promised however). The smell only got worse throughout the weekend as we continued to use the bathrooms. 6 out of 12 guests chose to leave on Friday as a result - ruining the weekend we had planned for my birthday. Two of the couples who left had travelled interstate for this. So they had paid for 3 nights and only got to stay 1 in rooms that stunk of sewage. This could have and should have been resolved on Friday or Saturday - but no solution was offered and we were expected to stay in a house that stunk of sewage. On top of this on Friday, as we bring items down from the car into the house we place two cases on a shelf along the kitchen wall and it comes off completely and lands on my foot. After looking at how it was constructed, a 30-50kg shelf was screwed together by 4 small screws and was never constructed to hold any sort of weight, making it a danger to guests. And lastly, the alarm. At 2.30am on the Saturday morning the house alarm (that we had been told did not work) began going off and woke everyone in the house. The four surrounding suburbs encountered a blackout and as a result the alarm went to auxiliary power and then went into alarm (the blackout is obviously not the owners fault) The alarm continued to go off for an hour and there was no information anywhere as to how to make it stop. We were left to figure this out for ourselves. The number we called inside the panel had no idea, the host was not contactable and the lady he put us in touch with suggested "we push a couple of buttons". The house should not have been rented out with the sewage pump the way it was and the host should have information on hand for his alarm system. We know that the host MAY not have known the pump was broken, but we did make him aware as soon as we noticed it within a couple of hours of arriving and no solution was offered for the three day stay. If we had...

A wonderful home away from home. There was enough space to cater and allow for our family of seven couples with little ones in tow. Beautiful view and location. The kiddies loved having their own private beach and bird visitors of cockatoos, kookaburras and lorikeets every day. Just a note to make sure the fridges are cleared of food prior to the next visitors stay.

This spacious property is truly amazing with stunning features and beautiful views on every level. Bailey's hospitality was exceptional. I would highly recommend this property for a relaxing holiday, especially for large groups of 6 or more.

Location is to die for and the beach perfect for regular visits. Great for little kids. The view from both living areas and many of the bedrooms is spectacular. Becuas each room is so beautiful, there were not arguments about who got which room. The living space is one of the most beautiful homely area for relaxing. All in all a most spectacular house.

We had a group of 13 and all had a great time there. The house was clean and well equipped from the bathrooms to the kitchen. The house was spacious and having 4 bathrooms between a large group was definitely handy. A few items including milk and soft drinks were supplied and left in the fridge which was a nice touch. Can't fault this house. We all had a fun and memorable stay!

This house was so beautiful! The location was breath-taking and the house was a delight. The house plan is very well thought through, clean and homely. Our group loved the weekend away, would highly recommend. The host was also very accommodating :D

What a great time! We will definitely be back. We stayed over with 5 families and each of us had our own space to hang out and relax. The property is very family-friendly and even our dogs had a fantastic time frolicking on the beach. The beds were super comfy and our host Bailey was available at any time to answer any queries promptly. Thanks Bailey, looking forward to the next trip. Highly recommended!

A wonderful spot! We had 10 adults and 5 children in our group and we all had a wonderful time! There were lots of living areas so everyone could have their own space. The private beach was a hit with the kids and adults alike. Amazing sunsets, and we kept warm with the log fire. The kitchen was on the small size for the size of the house - in saying that, I would happily return!

We had the most amazing time. The house was perfect in every way to accommodate our large family. The location is central to everything and right on the beach. It was also perfectly for the children.
The water views were stunning, the living space was beautiful with the open fire place and the beds were really comfortable.
We can't wait to return and stay there again, it was truly the most perfect place.
Thanks for a great stay Bailey! The house was amazing and miss waking up to that incredible view! Would definitely stay here again.

Great location spacious accomodation 
Great views
My wife and 4 kids had a great week in the house. Location and house were both great and Bailey sorted out everything we needed. Highly recommended!

Bailey has been an absolutely perfect host - he has gone out of his way by providing everything you would need to stay here. The house is amazing and the views and location are spectacular. It is all of the little things that made our holiday feel just like home. I would highly recommend staying here with families and friends.

Beautiful home, the pictures don't do this place justice. The spa overlooking the water at sunset - absolutely perfect. Very spacious, amazing views of the water from all the rooms. Close to the supermarket, restaurants, bottle-o. Great location. Perfect size for 10 guests, and would comfortably accommodate 14. Bailey was great with communication. Can't wait to plan another stay, will definitely recommend to friends and family.
Beautiful views, spacious living areas and sleeping quarters, quiet neighbourhood. Very little to complain about. Bailey is very responsive and helpful for any queries.

The house is as described and more.  We hosted our mums 80th birthday here and she was blown away by the location.  We had 14 family members staying all having their own great size rooms and areas so we did not feel on top of each other.  I would recommend and will be back again.

This place looks great in the photos but really exceeded our (Website hidden by Airbnb) was perfect for our family group of three generations with bedrooms on different levels and a number of living spaces. It was spacious, comfortable and stylish and such an idyllic location. Bailey was a great host. He promptly responded to our questions and we really appreciated the early check-in and late check out. We really didn't want to leave. Highly recommended. Many thanks Bailey.
Roger

The celebration of our Mum's 90th was made very special by a magnificent house in an amazing location. The house had everything we needed or could wish for.  At one stage we had 12 people and it never felt crowded.  All communication was clear and very prompt - a great host.

This is a wonderful house in a stunning location. We celebrated my 60th birthday here over the weekend. We were a large group of 12 adults and 2 toddlers and the house suited us perfectly . We liked the multiple living areas and we had all our meals on the gorgeous balcony overlooking the view . The 3 fridges were much appreciated. 
It was fabulous to have our own beach with the toddlers !

The house is amazing, spread over four levels and with spectacular views of Pittwater. We used the house as a base for our wedding in Avalon and it was perfect to have family all stay under the same roof as well as to get organised in the morning of our big day.

The hosts are great and are quick to respond to messaging and with Netflix, Fox and wifi available it was easy to entertain the kids.

Thanks again, we hope to come back someday to relive such an amazing time away.

A lovely house with great views over the bay and water. Lovely bedrooms, lounge areas and large decks for relaxing. Stairs down to the private beach and sea pool.
Built down the hillside with multiple levels with a self-contained area on lowest level. Although quite a few stairs - only an issue if anyone has mobility restrictions.

A group of 11 of us (all adults) stayed at Bailey's place last weekend for a wedding, and it was amazing! I would highly recommend staying here. The place is exactly as described, check in was super easy and Bailey was very responsive and chilled out. The views were breath-taking, we had plenty of space (most couples had own bathrooms or shared between 2), and the beds were really comfy too. Pretty much had our own private beach as well! All in all, a very relaxing stay and perfect place to escape and unwind. Thanks for a great stay Bailey :)

Brilliant location and house is spacious and very well thought out. Bailey is always around to help out if you have any questions.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

A beautiful home in a stunning location. Perfectly located close to everything but very tranquil and peaceful. Visited by birds, galahs, cockatoos and lorikeets every morning. The house was so comfortable for 10 of us, so much room and lots of privacy. Couldn’t have asked for a better house for our family reunion. Bailey was very amenable with check in and check out.
