We had our grandmother who loved the inclinator, young kids who adored the beach and the wildlife, and adults who enjoyed their evening cocktail on the beautiful balcony watching the sun set.  A perfect house for everyone. Thanks for a memorable stay.

Such a tranquil location with stunning views everywhere you look. The house is perfect for a large group and communication with Bailey has been fantastic, he has been very quick to respond. A little car juggling may be required however a small price to pay for this top location.

Our stay at Beach Escape was terrific. The location is incredible and although it doesn't have it's own private jetty, there is a public one 100m away. We spent the days boating on beautiful Pittwater and at the basin and retreated back to the house at dusk. Bailey's house in fabulous, with incredible views across Pittwater. Each level has a lounge room and private space for guests. We certainly would love to come back and stay at the Beach Escape.

The situation of this house on Pittwater with steps down to a small, perfect beach and swimming area is astounding.  Every evening we watched the sun set from the main terrace, through the trees, over the boats and behind the hills on the far side of the bay.  Although slightly tired, the house was robust and very well designed, cascading down the hillside with light, views and seating areas at all levels.  Everything worked (excellent shower pressure) and we especially appreciated the enormous supply of soaps, shampoos, white towels and stripey beach towels.  We will return as often as we possibly can for more of this magic.
This is a perfect getaway beach house. The beach is right below the house and at night there is a warm jacuzzi to relax. Highly recommend to stay at this house if with a huge family!

We absolutely loved staying at Bailey's amazing beach palace. You couldn't have asked for a better location overlooking the water. The layout of the house is unique and the styling is chic. We thank you bailey for your hospitality.

Wow what a place! We had the most amazing time staying at this property. Bailey the host was very easy to deal with and was quick to help with any issues we had. The access to the beach from the property made our stay. It’s a perfect beach to relax the day away and great for the kids too! The house is huge and can easily accommodate large groups or a few families without getting in each other’s space. The location is beautiful for walks, some amazing houses and greenery to look at. Also there is a cute little cafe just up the road for morning coffees if needed within walking distance. The main town is gorgeous with lots of shops and cafes to keep any one occupied. Loved our stay. Thanks so much.

This was an amazing property that impressed all of our guests. The house was very well presented and clean. Everything was provided and much appreciated. We unfortunately had a rainy week but made the most of the spa. The multi levels made for a great way to get some privacy and shift people around for entertaining. We will definitely book again.

Bailey’s place is exceptional and comfortably fits 14 people without feeling like you’re living on top of each other. There are spacious rooms on each floor and views from every level. We absolutely loved staying here and thoroughly recommend it to anyone.
Amazing house & location. I suggest you prepare ahead so that you take everything you need, as in groceries with you, and then stay, relax and unwind! We’d definitely stay again.

This is a superb place. We had family visiting from overseas and the generous space was perfect for our group. All bedrooms are well-appointed and beds are incredibly comfortable. The house was very clean, and the kitchen had everything we needed. Views over Pittwater are spectacular - we enjoyed swimming and soaking in the spa - and the neighborhood is quiet. The walk to Avalon Beach is easy and peaceful. Bailey was a great host - check in and check out very straightforward. Would love to stay here again sometime!!
Beautiful spacious house on the waterfront. Whether inside or outside there are plenty of great areas in a fantastic location. Different floors allow guests your independence. Would recommend

A perfect retreat with perfect view! We were a big group and yet didn’t feel on top of each other. The outdoor hot spa with view over Pittwater was definitely a highlight. The direct access to the beach was a great bonus. Bailey was a fab host, very responsive and accommodating. Some of the cabinets and drawers could be more tidy and the bbq wasn’t cleaned properly, but we had a fab stay overall and would recommend the house to other travellers. We’ll definitely love to stay again.

Thanks bailey! Your home is beautiful myself and my guests enjoyed every hour of our stay. There were so many rooms and levels that we could just have our time if we needed. Everything about the trip was perfect I would defidefinely come back, perhaps in summer this time!
Bailey is very responsive. Beautiful place and awesome location. Highly recommend!
Need to get away with some friends to chill and connect? Baileys beach escape is perfect! Beach off the back garden, tonnes of room for time to yourself and great views from nearly every room.
Amazing property, great host & perfect location!
14 lovely ladies had a lovely time at this beautiful house with amazing views from almost every room,location is perfect close to many amenities and activities.
Really enjoyed the place and its location. The place was amazing!

Wonderful long weekend away at Bailey’s house.

Beautiful beach front location with amazing views from the spa and outdoor eating area. 

Everyone had a comfy bed and their own bath and beach towel. Plenty of pillows and blankets. 

So much space for a large group - lots of little hideaway areas to relax / get privacy.

Kitchen was well stocked with everything you could need, including ice. 

So many thoughtful extra touches such as body wash, shampoo and books to borrow! 

Highly recommend.
The house is lovely. Lots of bedrooms and separate living areas, so great for a large group. We had a wonderful stay. Thanks so much. Highly recommend

Baileys house is great there are many areas to have your own space. Beautiful view and decor very relaxing and tasteful. Can’t wait to stay again! Thanks again
Chris & Marcia Allen

Absolutely stunning house and location ! Great accomodating host! Perfect place for our wedding weekend! 

Thank you Bailey !

This is a tremendous location for a weekend of pure enjoyment. The house has everything from delightful living spaces to cosy bedrooms and a view ovewr Pittwater which cannot be  beaten.  Couple this with your own little beach and you have something special.

Thank you very much. 
We really enjoyed and this was absolutely great  & fantastic place for us.

Recommended!
Great place with plenty of space. Would definitely stay again.
House is run down needs maintenance spa didn’t work deck rotten next to spa kids foot nearly went through. House cleanliness not to satisfaction

This place is amazing!! The house and views are better than expected and everything is provided so all you have to do is relax or for those that’s up for adventure there’s so much happening around the area. Bailey has been great and we have already booked to stay again during the new year weekend!

Bailey’s home on Whale Beach is gorgeous. Palatial and nuzzled into a hill, it is essentially a vertical house with many bedrooms and lots of different common areas to relax, including three decks. The home is extremely comfortable and I highly recommend it. Plus, Bailey was incredibly nice and communicative while planning our stay. Overall a 10 out of 10!

Again we had an amazing time. The place was clean, beds were comfortably and checkin was a breeze. The view and backyard down to the beach is what this place is all about!  Bailey is a great host, we will no doubt stay again. Just a note for those that cannot stand heat the place has no air conditioning so it gets very hot during day and night but there are fans and the beach right at the doorstep to cool off.
The house was amazing, as were the views. A really lovey weekend with friends. Wish we could have stayed longer.

Such a beautiful home! Perfect for friends or families as there is so much space to have a bit of time apart. The location on the beach and the hot tub were added bonuses! We walked down to Clareville Kiosk for a delicious dinner as well. Such a perfect weekend! Thanks Bailey :)
Bailey was an outstanding host. Easy to communicate with and the house is amazing. What a spectacular view! Thanks Bailey.

Nice beach escape! Lovely view to wake up to each morning.  Many areas to gather with the family. Might get a little hot in the summer tho, as there is no air-conditioning. But many fans provided. Place needs a little more maintenance but overall still cozy and nice. Good responsive host too.
We had a great weekend. House and location are beautiful

name: Spacious Studio - Waimea Bay Pointe
summary: Our beach cottage is ocean-side, between Three Tables & Waimea Bay on our gated family property. It's behind the main house, but you'll have full access to the front yard facing the rocky coastline & Pacific Ocean, 30 yards away. You’ll love this studio because of how spacious it is; its mountain & ocean views & its convenient location to all things North Shore! This unique 2-level unit is good for couples, solo adventurers, & business travelers, but may not be suitable for toddlers (stairs).
space: There are beach/ocean/mountain views from every window, and the vaulted ceiling compliments the open floor-plan. Ceiling fans keep it cool during the winter season and an a/c keeps it cool during the hotter summer months. The studio is connected by a breezeway to the owner's home, but is above their main floor, so it feels unattached. The entrance is next to your carport parking stall, and the carpeted stairs takes you upstairs to the living area.  The Kitchenette: Apartment refrigerator/freezer, microwave, blender, coffee maker, toaster, and double burner. (No oven) Assortment of pots and pans, dishes, glasses, coffee cups and utensils. Paper towels, dish soap, sponge and dish-towels.  Sleeping arrangements: One Queen and one Full-size Pune'e (day bed) with bedding for both. We will make up the Pune'e upon request. Bathroom: One bathroom with shower and four sets of towels. Starter toilet paper, soap and shampoo. Washer/Dryer & Clothesline is downstairs. Laundry basket, clothespins, l
description: Our beach cottage is ocean-side, between Three Tables & Waimea Bay on our gated family property. It's behind the main house, but you'll have full access to the front yard facing the rocky coastline & Pacific Ocean, 30 yards away. You’ll love this studio because of how spacious it is; its mountain & ocean views & its convenient location to all things North Shore! This unique 2-level unit is good for couples, solo adventurers, & business travelers, but may not be suitable for toddlers (stairs). There are beach/ocean/mountain views from every window, and the vaulted ceiling compliments the open floor-plan. Ceiling fans keep it cool during the winter season and an a/c keeps it cool during the hotter summer months. The studio is connected by a breezeway to the owner's home, but is above their main floor, so it feels unattached. The entrance is next to your carport parking stall, and the carpeted stairs takes you upstairs to the living area.  The Kitchenette: Apartment refrigerator/freezer,
neighborhood_overview: In the summer, we have the best view for the Fourth of July Annual Paddleboard race that starts from Sunset Beach and ends right here in Waimea Bay! From November to May, you can whale-watch from the yard or along the coastline. In the winter, front row seats to spectacular monster waves 20 - 40 feet high!
notes: There is NO SMOKING in or around the unit. We have designated an area under the tent in the front yard where smoking is allowed if unoccupied. Foodland supermarket is 1/4 mile down the road and has all your grocery and sundry needs, and features a deli and coffee shop. Just around the corner from Foodland and directly across Sharks Cove is a "food court" with food trucks offering everything from shave ice & fish tacos to burgers & sandwiches. The Sea Maids boutiques sell pareos, bikinis, surf trunks, slippers & hats. There are snorkel, surfboard and bike rentals there too!
transit: Having a rental car is optimal for exploring this island, but the bus system here can take you to Haleiwa, Waikiki, and circle island! Information can be obtained at (URL HIDDEN)  The bike path from Three Tables beach will take you all the way to Back Yards, past Sunset Beach. Bike rentals can be found with Joe & Carrie at (URL HIDDEN) | (EMAIL HIDDEN) | (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) or at the Sea Maids shops at Sharks Cove.
access: Beach: 3 minute walk - Three Tables to the North, Waimea Bay to the South. Front yard: Grassy yard and covered patio area with tables and chairs. Please join us for our family gatherings on holidays and the weekend!  Rocky shoreline: If you have good balance, you may use the wooden stairs along the wall to the rocks. Proceed at own risk! Do NOT access if the waves are big. This shoreline is protected by the Hawaii Marine Life Conservation District, so nothing may be taken... no fish, shells, rocks, seaweed...nothing! Pole fishing is allowed as long as you are casting your line INTO Waimea Bay.
interaction: We love to talk about our favorite places, activities and foods to eat here on the North Shore, but if you prefer to adventure on your own,  you'll find lots of information in the Guest Book. Again, this is our family property, and we like to get together with family and friends and welcome you to join us for a BBQ, impromptu meal or just to “talk story.” Some activities/places to see within a mile radius is Sharks Cove for summer time tide pool exploration and winter time surf watching; the Heiau in Pupukea which overlooks Waimea Bay and the North Shore coastline; and Waimea Valley Park for nature lovers.
house_rules: Hawaiian style:  1) ALL FOOTWEAR STAYS DOWNSTAIRS, on the tiled area. That means shoes, slippers, sandals, flip-flops/thongs (but don't say that in Hawaii, we call 'em SLIPPAHS!), reef-walkers, slip-ons, Crocs, etc.  2) RINSE OFF ALL SAND BEFORE ENTERING THE HOUSE. Chances are, if you survived the pounding shore break at Waimea, you got a load of sand in your bathing suit. This will clog up the plumbing in the shower, so PLEASE leave the sand at the beach or rinse out your suits with the hose before entering the studio. 3) Do not hang beach towels on balcony. DO hang them on the clothesline downstairs. 4) Do not use the white bath towels for food spills, muddy feet or makeup removal, etc. That's what the rags (under the kitchen and bathroom sinks) and black wash towels are for!   5) No extra guests. 6) RESPECT the ocean. NEVER turn your back on her. If in doubt, don't go out. Swim at beaches that have a lifeguard nearby.

host.host_about: My siblings and I live on and maintain this property at Waimea Bay Pointe. We are the third generation of our family working, playing, and living on the North Shore alongside our 4th & 5th generations. Though much has changed along this 7 mile coastline, we still enjoy and want to share this piece of paradise with those who are humbled by its natural beauty, respectful of the local culture and using its resources with deep appreciation.

reviews.comments: Melissa made us feel welcome as soon as we arrived. She was very hospitable and was available if we needed, but also left us to our own devices too. We were so impressed with the location and the cleanliness of the property. We will absolutely recommend this property to others!

Melissa is the ultimate host. She provided great pre check in information and met us upon our arrival. The studio was exactly as the pictures on the listing. We had the entire unit which was spacious with a full kitchen to cook meals. The bonus was wonderful cool breezes and ocean sounds. 

The location is ideal for attending the Van's Triple crown Surfing contests or wanting to be near the North Shore with the many beach options. Melissa provided some great options on where to eat, what to see and where to buy groceries. 

We are definitely planning on coming back to stay here and highly recommend Melissa as your AirBNB host.
Awesome host and the place is spacious with everything you need clean and working properly and one thing im scare of airbnb but this one have a very very very comfortable bed and pillows.

We had a very good welcoming from Melissa and she was very helpful with recomendations during our stay! We massaged about places to go and she responsed direcly! 

The house was really nice and super clean and had everything we could ask. It was in walking distance to a really really nice foostruck park and sunset beach which was totally wonderful! We will absolutely stay there again if we return!

We had a fantastic stay at Melissa's  studio. It was so spacious and clean, and contained everything that we needed and more.  We loved how breezy it was and that we could see the ocean from almost every window! It was so centrally located to drive to Haleiwa, beaches at the Eastern end of the Northshore, and Turtle Bay, and was a very short walk to Waimea Bay, Foodland and the Food Trucks. Melissa and her family were all so lovely but also very respectful of our privacy, and with the studio being stand alone from the other houses it was easy to relax and feel at home in the studio. We will miss falling asleep and waking up to the sound of the ocean and the amazing sunsets from the back lawn and hope to return soon!

If you visit during winter, and the big surf arrives, you will have an exclusive ringside seat to one of the greatest athletic events on earth.  And you can walk to the Pipeline and Sunset Beach.  The North Shore is surfing's mecca, and you're at the center of the action.  Take cameras and big lenses if you have them.  When the surf is not up, enjoy a swim at Waimea Bay Beach Park, a short walk away.  Don't miss a Mahi sandwich or plate lunch at Ted's Bakery, just up the road.  Finish the meal off with a slice of chocolate haupia pie.  The quarters are spacious and comfortable and private.  The furnishings by Nak on Wood complete the beach decor (go Nakamura brothers).  You're a visitor in a friendly, family compound.  If you get a chance ask Marlene to share her story of the land, she'll tell you a wonderful, Hawaiian melting pot tale.  We'd be content to live at Waimea Point, if it was possible.  It was a unique privilege to be able to visit.

If you want to stay on the North Shore and not have to deal with driving everywhere or high fees this is the place for you. 5 min walk to Foodland and 2 min walk to the beach at Waimea Bay. Though the real trip is sitting on the patio watching the sun set over Keana Point!

We had a great time on the North Shore and the apartment in Waimea was perfect. Comfortable and with a convenient location. We watched big wave surf competition from the front lawn when the surf was high. Everything you want to do on the north shore is easily accessed from there- surfing, stand up paddle, hiking, snorkeling, kayaking, SCUBA, whatever. The food options are plentiful and outstanding. Our hosts were friendly and we had lots of privacy. Check in/out was easy. We wouldn't have changed a thing about our vacation there.

Great location and great place to stay. When I booked I thought the place was directly on the waterfront but it was a house back but the place was fantastic and still had access to the ocean views when you walked to the front yard. Kitchen was good but no oven. 
Had a lovely stay and would definitely come back.

Location, location location! If you want to be able to walk to the beach, take a quick drive into town, and watch the waves from your yard, this is a great place. To make it even better, Melissa and her family are all very nice and hospitable, and have provided a couple extras such as TV with streaming movies. We enjoyed winding down to Netflix after days of beaches, waterfalls, and food trucks.

Be aware that this is one unit in a complex that includes other residences where the family lives. It's a loft above the garage area. You'll occasionally see small ants or geckos inside, which is typical everywhere in Hawaii. Also, don't expect to have a private feel, or an unobstructed ocean view from the studio. If that's all OK, I highly recommend staying here.

After a couple of days closer to Honolulu with friends this was the perfect retreat for us to relax and enjoy the great beaches of the North Shore. The apartment was exactly as described and fully equipped with all necessary appliances and has a feel like home atmosphere. The apartment doesn't have an open view on to Waimea Bay but we didn't expect that, as it was clearly described in the location profile. Instead the great view on to the famous surfing spot of Waimea Bay Point can be enjoyed from the garden which is being shared with Melissa and her very nice family. But this of course does not mean that you cannot have full privacy. During our stay we occasionally met Marlene, Melissa's  sister, who was always nice and fun to talk to and gave us a lot of valuable information. Haleiwa itself, which is a 10 minutes drive by car, offers nice restaurants, cafes, food trucks, souvenir shops and boutiques, so it is a nice place to hang around in the evening. And if you want occasionally the big city lights, Honolulu is only a 1 hour drive away. Even though the waters at the North Shore are much rougher and not always allow swimming, we would always prefer to stay here and if waters are getting too rough go for a swim to Kailua etc. by car
This is truly an amazing, gem of a place!!  And, Missy, who oversees the guests' stays, is simply marvelous...

Melissa's place was amazing, really clean and as described. Was perfect for our babymoon. Within walking distance to waimea beach and food land and an easy drive to haleiwa and pipeline. 
The condo is private and quiet with lots of space for 2. Basic kitchen setup allowed us to cook breakfast and snacks. 
Bed was really comfy, 3 ceiling fans kept the place cool and an AC unit for safe measure. 
Melissa was very friendly and even invited us for Taco Tuesdays with her family. I would highly recommend this place if you want to get away from the tourist heavy Waikiki and experience  

Six thumbs up!

Amazing!  Seriously...we loved this place and Melissa is a great host!  The views on the back patio are to die for and the apartment is spacious and comfy.  We spent one relaxing evening with take out from the elephant food truck (per Melissa's suggestion AND within walking distance) watching the sunset on their back patio.  Loved it!!  We had our coffee on their patio many mornings as well.  Walking distance to Three Tables, Shark's Cove, and Waimea Bay.  I could go on and on.  This place will not disappoint!

Our stay was nothing short of perfect! We were only a quick 5 minute walk to the beautiful Waimea Bay and also the best food truck park I have ever been to. We ate there several times as there were so many choices to chose from. Melissa's apartment was very clean and stocked full of necessities, including towels and snorkel gear. Melissa was happy to recommend places to eat and activities to partake in. Per Melissa's recommendation, we took a zip line tour and my husband went shark diving (yikes!). I would highly recommend staying at her quaint abode. Again, the beach is a short hike away! Was a wonderful North Shore experience and we would definitely stay there again should our travels ever take us that way. Thank you, Melissa!

Just as it was described.  Loved the Local feel of staying in this beautiful Studio. Melissa and her family were wonderful host. My favorite part was being able to BBQ down on the water’s edge at sunset every night.

Awesome place, but an even better host family! Absolutely amazing location that is walkable/bikeable to the beach, food trucks, and the grocery store. My wife and I look forward to returning next year!

Tucked off the main drag this apartment offers you peace and quiet whilst still being in walking distance to everything you need! 

Two beaches are less than 5 minutes stroll and the food trucks and supermarket are less than 10 minutes alway. 

Melissa was a welcoming host who made us feel so at home!
Gorgeous spot. Definitely will stay here again!

Melissa's place was everything as described. It was a short walking distance to two amazing beaches. Snorkel gear, towels and an ice chest, all provided, made for a wonderful day at the beach. Make sure you visit the food truck park and the awesome town of Haleiwa. The grocery store was minutes away by car. We truly felt at home, the studio has everything you would need. By far, the best part is watching the sunset right off Melissa's private patio. We grabbed a pizza and a bottle of wine and enjoyed the views! You will not be disappointed!

Oh my goodness the views!!! Even though we can't see it from the house the view is just in the backyard.  It's gorgeous! 

The address is not accurate in (Hidden by Airbnb) but I hope Melissa would have changed it by now as we got really lost!

The house was very spacious and comfortable and the hosts are fantastic and welcoming.  The location is great - ta really close to food land and food trucks but I would seriously encourage you to hire a car (we didn't!)

Normally I can't sleep without blackout curtains (Melissa's place is really bright) but I couldn't wake up even when the sun is up cos I am so relaxed and comfortable there!

Melissa has a lovely place to stay.  It is open, clean, well equipped, nicely laid out and close to everything.   The shower has nice water pressure.  Everything in her place smells good and is fresh.  The TV was excellent with lots of good programming available.  The kitchen amenities are modest, but workable for tea/coffee and a light breakfast.  The sheets were pristine and the bed comfortable.  Her place is right off of the main beach road so you do hear morning (7am) and evening traffic, but it is very quiet at night and during the rest of the day.  It also is up a flight of stairs.  Melissa and her family are very kind and generous people.  We really enjoyed them and our stay overall and recommend it.
Great location between two magnificent beaches

The location is perfect - four beaches, all different & special, within easy walking distance.  Stunning sunsets every night from the property & any of these four beaches.
White sheets, towels & walls works for me every time.  Nothing says "Aloha" like white!
Laundry facilities were a plus for us after but all we needed was a bikini & sarong so pack light!
Food trucks & Supermarket very close & meeting all our needs.
Perfect wind down & relax for us here at Melissa's..... recommended!

The apartment is comfortable and clean with everything you need. It is super closer to Waimea bay and sunset beach. Would be awesome to stay during peak surf season as you can walk/ ride and don't have to find parks.
My husband and I were very happy with our stay and would definitely recommend to other couples who love the beach!
Realmente disfrutamos de nuestra estadía en el estudio . La vista al océano era soñada como así los atardeceres. Melissa y Marlene muy amables y atentas . Super recomenendable ! Sin dudas volvería!
Melissa was friendly, responsive and attentive! Great location, gorgeous north shore property.

Melissa’s place was a nice studio on the north shore of Oahu with a gorgeous ocean view from the back yard. We were only separated from the ocean by rocks! It was a beautiful and relaxing place and a short walk, only a few blocks to a beach to the left or right. We had our most authentic relaxing Hawaiian Experience ever (and I️ have been to Hawaiian island more than 10 times) as we were in a residential area. Melissa shared her family history and Hawaiian culture with us and was so warm and welcoming! We had everything we needed to enjoy the beach- snorkel gear and beach towels included.

Melissa was a wonderful host and the studio was perfect. We felt very comfortable in the space. It was larger than expected which was a nice surprise. It was very private, bright and airy. It had everything that we needed. It was beautifully presented and very clean when we arrived. Melissa has thought of everything. Soft white sheets and towels. A smart TV on an arm that can be viewed from the couch, kitchen or day bed. We loved the location. 3 min to Waimea Bay and about the same to the shops and food trucks. We will definitely be back!

The studio was spacious, clean, and comfortable. We appreciated the personal touches, like Melissa’s dad’s artwork and another family member’s woodwork. Melissa and her family were welcoming and friendly. The north shore location was excellent, with a spectacular view from the property’s lawn and picnic seating area. It was an easy walk to the supermarket and the beautiful local beaches.

After spending the first part of our trip in Waikiki, the North Shore was so relaxing and this location is breath taking. Not to mention it's really close to the grocery store and the local food scene.
Was a great place to stay, amazing views. Right on the ocean. Not far from dinning & pipeline

Very nice place to stay, spacious and clean with a number of amenities. Good location, being walkable to spots like Banzai Pipeline, with food trucks and a supermarket closer, as well as not far by car from other North Shore locations. Good communication with the host.

****5 star rating***** for this accomodation!
We stayed one week with Melissa and her family and it was the most wonderful stay! The studio was spacious, bright and had everything we needed. Melissa and her family were most welcoming and we almost every day went to their backyard to watch the totally amazing scenery. The most perfect location on the North Shore - close to everything (the supermarket Foodland, the food trucks, the pipeline, many other beaches, Waimea Valley and so many other great things)!

The 5 top things we appreciated the most are:
- 3-4 min walk to Waimea Beach and Three Tables (both amazing beaches), which also meant we could leave our car at home and not fight for a parking space with everyone else.
- Great wifi
- Comfy bed
- Beach gear that we could borrow, a washing machine and dryer also on site
- The studio itself - it wasn't what I would call a luxury residence, but it just had everything you needed and was so well-planned, comfortable and cosy!
And last, but not least - Melissa and her family!

A couple of things that are good to know:
- This residence is close to the road and there is a lot of traffic and ambulances/rescue vehicles passing by
- Since this is an ocean property the waves outside pound against the rocks (which we love!)
If you do need really quiet when going to sleep - bring your ear plugs, because it gets a bit noisy sometimes, but don't let that stop you from staying here! 

In our book, this is a 5-star residence! We would love to come back again.
Thanks for everything, Missy! :)

Hawaii's Best Kept Secret. After traveling extensively through the North Shore, we can say without a doubt the property location and serene views of Waimea Bay are among the best on the island if not in the continental United States. We were blown away (almost literally by the false Ballistic Missile warning) by Melissa's hospitality and generosity. We sat for hours and watched big wave surfers attempt to ride massive waves from their backyard. If big waves are in season (Winter)  and the conditions are right you are in for some entertainment. The unit was charming, clean, and so worth the drive! This property and immediate surroundings were so incredible we actually got engaged here. You can hear the waves breaking (in season) from your bed. 

The unit was surrounded by lush vegetation and breathtaking views. As I understand it this property overlooks the exact location where James Cook "discovered" Hawaii and came ashore. I get why, it's stunning. The beach is a short walk (like 1 minute). The unit is the perfect beach retreat and offers a lot of privacy. I recommend grilling here at sunset with fresh fish. I can't speak highly enough about our hosts. As a New Yorker, I have to try to be more like them, calm, helpful, collected, funny, and at peace. This place is a dream. We stand by our decision that IF THE WORLD ENDS TOMORROW, THIS IS WHERE WE WOULD WANT TO BE.

We had a wonderful stay at this property.

The location was superb and the accommodation was fabulous. It was spacious, clean and very comfortable.     All that we hoped it would be. Whilst we didn’t have full ocean views from the accommodation we did have full access to the front yard where we spent most evenings listening to the crashing waves and having a beer or two. We had the choice of Waimea Beach one way and Three Tables Beach the other, both only minutes away.  Foodland and places to eat were within easy walking distance.

I have always wanted to visit the North Shore and couldn’t have picked a nicer play to stay with such a welcoming family. They were kind, helpful and always there when we needed them. 

If you want to somewhere to stay on the North Shore then this is the place to go.

Thanks Melissa and Marlene.

We had a round trip over Oahu and I'm glad that we have found Melissa's place! What can I say It's not just the cozy appartment itself but Melissa's kindness far exceeded our expectations. Because of It's perfect location you're literally in the middle of the North Shore! In few minutes drive you can find everything you need like shops and restaurants but Kaena Point or Turtle Bay (the two opposite sides of northern O'ahu) are not even more than 30 minutes away. Morover If you go there in winter (as we did) the word famous surf spots like Banzai Pipeline are just few minutes away! In january/february don't forget to check the surf competition calendar so If you're lucky then you can see the word's greatest riders on the legendary waves. One morning Melissa wrote us to visit the Banzai Pipeline as soon as we can because of the Volcom PipelinePro Word Championship has just began so we did and it was awsome. (Thank you Melissa once again for the tip!!!) She was so helpful as She gave us super useful daily tips about the area and also helped us to find some vegetarian/vegan eating places. But not even her kind words but the fresh fruits and vegetables She took us every day were so kind - she made us feel like being part of her family. The apartment looks big in the picrures but It's even bigger in the reality! It's well equiped, super cozy and absolutely clean - one of our best airbnb appartments so far!!! We realy enjoyed our stay there and hope we can get back one day! So If you're about to discover the northern side of O'ahu then stop searching because Melissa's appartment is the place you're looking for!!!!
Great spot !

This property and apartment is truly a piece of paradise, a place that my husband and I were lucky to call home for just over a week. We enjoyed our accommodation and stay on the North Shore so much that we tried to extend our visit only to find that there were no flights back home to accommodate us. 

Melissa was a wonderful host, she and her sister Marlene were extremely welcoming and kind. The apartment itself was clean, smelt great, comfortable, filled with beautiful artwork created by their late father that illustrated some of the wonderful history of Waimea Bay. It just had such a warm and lovely feel, it has everything you need and more. 

The sound of the ocean was a constant, and the front yard was just magic. You could see Waimea Bay and ocean forever, lots of whales breaching daily, its safe to say we spent a lot of time enjoying this view with friends who were staying close by. There were many nights watching the sunset with a drink in hand, and BBQ cooking, it was pure relaxation. 

The location to Food Land and the famous food trucks (which has amazing food) was an easy 5-7minute walk. Visiting Pipeline was almost a daily ritual, it was approximately a 25-30 minute walk, 7minute cycle or a short drive. Some great local hikes are in the area and if you have a car, driving up to Turtle Bay and visiting the town of Haleiwa is a must! 

We will certainly be back to visit this incredible place that Melissa and her family are so lucky to call home.

Great place. We were barely there but it was so lovely. Perfect location! The backyard is the ocean! It is so pretty . 
Great host! Answers text right away!

素晴らしいｽﾃｲをする事ができました!ﾉｰｽｼｮｱでｽﾃｲするのは初めてだったのですが､ﾚﾝﾀｶｰの駐車ｽﾍﾟｰｽも十分の広さですし､ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝも最高ですし､ｱﾒﾆﾃｨ含む部屋･設備も期待値通りで､非常に満足する事ができました｡
また､Melissaさんを始めとするご家族の皆さんの温かいおもてなしですごくﾘﾗｯｸｽする事が出来ました｡これが一番良いﾎﾟｲﾝﾄかもしれません｡
歩いて数分の所にｽｰﾊﾟｰもありますし､ｷｯﾁﾝｸﾞｯｽﾞやBBQｾｯﾄも整っているため､ご飯も作りながら楽しく過ごす事が出来る点も◎です!
Awesome place right on Waimea point. Convenient for any stay on the North Shore.

Love this place. Perfect location on the North Shore, close to everything you need for a relaxing trip. The Studio is super clean, safe and comfy style. Melissa is an amazing host and is always available with great tips. This is my second time staying with them and I can’t wait to go back.

You know its going to be a great stay when the host greets you with hug. The studio apartment on Melissa's property is a large, bright, spotless space in one of the most beautiful locations in the world. Its walking distance to groceries, food trucks and several of the best beaches on the North Shore. It is the perfect North Shore location with an incredible view! Highly recommended.

We loved having our breakfast on the patio overlooking the ocean, and being able to walk to several beaches.  Melissa also had some great tips about restaurants and food carts to try.  The studio was large and laid out well, and its many windows allowed for both privacy and cross-ventilation.

Best location on the North Shore by far! We were blown away by the views and close proximity to many different beaches. Each beach is just a 2-3 minute walk away from the house in any direction, and Foodland was so close that we walked to get groceries also. Melissa went above and beyond to make our stay great, and was very quick to respond and communicate if we needed to. Everything was clean, neat, and instructions easy to follow. On our morning walks on Waimea Beach we saw whales breaching right off shore! This was a perfect place to relax and enjoy our babymoon away from the traffic and loud touristy areas on the island.

We loved our stay at Melissa’s studio. Absolutely incredible location - perfect for getting to world famous beach breaks. Also close to great local supermarket and food options. Spotless and spacious studio. Would book again and can’t wait to return! Melissa met us when arrived and gave us a great run down of the accommodation and North Shore area. Thank you!!

This studio is the perfect getaway. We used it as a staycation spot. You could walk to Waimea bay if chosen or you could drive to one of the many other beaches located very close by.  Not far from Haleiwa for shopping and/or eating. However, my husband and I love to visit the food trucks just up the street. Melissa is very hospitable and is available to answer any questions you might have. Overall, it was an amazing experience and very relaxing! We’d definitely love to visit again!

Melissa’s place is exactly how she describes it and then some. Although we weren’t able to utilize the patio space as much as we wanted, it was still a beautiful place to just sit back and relax and enjoy the sounds of the ocean. The studio is a great place to unwind after an eventful day. It is so close to everything you would need. Beautiful beaches, great food and local attractions. Having air conditioning and a washer and dryer at our disposal was a huge help. The studio is well furnished with everything you could need. We really enjoyed our 25th anniversary trip here and are talking about coming back for our 30th. Overall, Melissa’s space is perfect. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay on the North Shore.

P.S.  The fact that there was a gated entrance with your own personal opener made us feel safe every night. Great touch!!!

Some of our favorite things about Melissa’s place: world class ocean views from the lawn, waking up to the sound of the ocean, the refreshing trade wind breeze, the kindness of our host, walking distance to some of the most iconic beaches in the world, the comfort of the bed, the cleanliness of the studio, the peaceful location, and the beach accessories available for guests to use - all made our stay one of the best Airbnb experiences yet. We will stay here every time we visit, if it’s available!!

Best place on the North Shore and a wonderful host! Melissa was so welcoming and friendly. We used to live in the North Shore, just 1 block away from this house, and you cannot be as t the view or area. It is safe, secure, family friendly, and you are surrounded by some of the best beaches on the North Shore. The place was super clean, bright and airy, decorated beautifully, and the bed is extremely confortable. It is also very quiet. We will definitely be back!

Had a wonderful time at Melissa’s place. Couldn’t ask for a better host and location. Woke up to rainbows in the patio overlooking the ocean nearly everyday. Had to pinch myself every morning to make sure it was real. Sunsets were just as fantastic. Couldn’t recommend this place more and will surely be back!
Can't recommend Melissa's airbnb highly enough - very comfortable and the best location on the North Shore!!!

This location is absolutely amazing! The view from the front grass area is beyond beautiful. Our kids loved snorkeling right off the rocks and we enjoyed many sunsets on the loungers. We will be back for sure! A fantastic experience all round!

We spent every afternoon on the lawn watching the sun go down over the water. The most incredible view made our stay a memorable one. 
Melissa and her sister were friendly and welcoming and supplied us with everything we needed for our stay and more. Thank you for sharing your magical piece of land with us. Mahalo x
Melissa's place is fantastic. so many extra touches like snorkeling equipment to use that make for extra fun and enjoyment. one of the very best for sure.

We had a great stay at Melissas place! Melissa met us and made sure we had everything we needed, gave us some history of the place. The location is great for convenience - A very short walk to two beaches (including Waimea Bay which was our favourite for swimming) and Foodland. Haleiwa town is about a 15-30 minute drive depending on time of day/traffic. The studio is lovely and view from the yard out to the ocean is fantastic. It does get very bright (no curtains) and traffic starts early in the morning, so better suited for early risers than those who love to sleep in on vacation. Would definitely stay again

melissa’s home was beautiful, clean, and welcoming. the backyard that overlooks waimea is just perfection... we enjoyed drinking our morning coffee while watching the ocean, so peaceful yet so close to all the busyness of pūpūkea and haleiwa. everything about staying in her home was amazing. it’s just an easy 5 minute walk to waimea bay. melissa was always quick to respond and more than accommodating. i highly recommend staying at her gorgeous beach home!

We loved staying at Missy’s gorgeous studio, it was the best location, spacious and had everything we needed! Missy’s family were lovely, we really enjoyed having a chat about the beautiful area and their heritage on the north shore. Highly recommend and will be back! Thanks so much x

It's a nice apartment, but you are living right next to the host,  and you feel like you are constantly being watched.  Also the family is nice, but you feel like you are encroaching on their family time when you are out on the grassed area.  It's definitely not as relaxing as staying in an apartment where you aren't on a family property.

A beautiful air conditioned studio in a perfect location! Walking distance to the beach, shark’s Cove (2 snorkels and 1 fin set provided by host), food trucks and grocery store. Gorgeous sunset view right from the backyard! A covered picnic table is in the back to enjoy meals at sunset or any time of day. Very close to Waimea Valley and Falls. Short drive to Old Town Haliewa and a mom and pop Macadamia Nut Farm/Factory. Dole Plantation is only a 20-25 minute drive away. Gated entrance helps you feel safe at night. You are given a gate remote for your car. Iron and ironing board in the studio. Washer/dryer in carport. Covered carport.  Lovely hosts, very accommodating. Surprised us with bananas, avocados and startup snacks for our Hawaiian adventure. Mahalo for an excellent AirBnb experience.

Melissa’s place is truly beautiful. It is a wonderful location and so comfortable. We loved the ability to just walk to the local beaches and food trucks. The sunsets were unbelievable . A must when visiting O’ahu .
The place was beautiful and is placed at the best location of the island! Melissa is the best host i have ever dealt with.
Amazing place right in the middle of the North Shore.  You will NOT be disappointed here!  We will be back!!!

Aloha
The Studio at Waimea Bay is perfectly located & an easy walk to 3 or 4 different beaches.  It is also an easy  evening stroll to Foodland and the Food Trucks & Foodland which are such a part of life on the North Shore.
It is an immaculately clean studio & very spacious & relaxing.  Laundry facilities are also available which I love!
Melissa is a wonderful host as are Marlene & Randall  who also live on the large property.
It is accurately photographed on the website & it really is as good as it looks.
It was our second visit & I hope there will be many more.
Place is amazing, great location, just as described and hosts were super friendly and accommodating. Would definitely recommend!
Absolut zu Empfehlen. Der perfekte Ort, die besten Gastgeber, es ist ein Traum. Wirklich, ich kann nichts anderes dazu sagen. Würde sofort wieder dahin gehen!!!! Einfach nur perfekt!
nice and friendly furnished apartment, very friendly host.
This is one of the best spots on the North Shore.  The studio was huge and we spent many nights and mornings just watching the ocean from the front patio. You will not be disappointed!

My son and I loved the place. Extremely friendly hosts. Excellent location. 
We went to other houses here in Oahu, but this one was special.
I hope to return as soon as possible. 
Big Thanks to Marlene !
Mahalo 
John & Enzo

That’s such a nice place. We enjoyed every morning having our breakfast in the garden, just next to the ocean, sometimes even with a magical view at a rainbow above the ocean. The loft apartment was perfect for us two and very spacious. Marlene (sister from Melissa) gave us a warm welcome and her passion to create a nice experience  for us was (with a lot tips and recommendations) made our stay unforgettable. Hope we will get there again some time.

The family that owns this Airbnb has lived in Hawaii for generations. There are paintings on the walls done by their father. They are watercolors of the local area. The yard, where we sat and had coffee in the morning, overlooks the ocean. We saw whales, rainbows, surfers and waves bouncing off the rocks in front of us. It was magnificent and peaceful.  We could walk to Waimea Beach.  Banzai pipeline is a short drive as is Haleiwa. There are lots of informal restaurants close by

The view from the backyard is unbeatable!  We had our coffee and avocado toast there every morning and would’ve had a drink there every afternoon if we had been home.  Due to a storm, we got to watch a dozen surfers riding some pretty big waves. The location is perfect – easy to rent bikes near Foodland, and ride up the bike path to Ted’s bakery for breakfast. Walking distance to the food trucks, Shark’s Cove, and Foodland.

Extremely clean and amazing location here. That front lawn overlooking the mighty Pacific ocean and big waves rolling into Waimea Bay is simply breathtaking. Honestly, within seconds we spotted a whale coming up to the surface! Melissa and her family are so accommodating as well and even invited us into a family gathering. Perfect amenities on site (laundry, beach gear, etc) and so close to the shops/food trucks too. Mahalo nui loa!!
Great!

Our stay at Melissa’s place was amazing! The location can’t be beat - the view of Waimea Bay is incredible - we loved watching the surfers and the sunset every evening. Close proximity to Foodland and plenty of dining options and beaches. The apartment itself is a great size, and is well appointed with everything you need. Melissa’s personal touches really made our stay special - hosts like Melissa are the reason why I love using Airbnb!

name: At Home in Authentic Porto
summary: Hi I'm David. I'm from Porto and I would love to share with you two things. 1st my flat, right in the center of Porto nearby to the art district, garden, supermarkets, main museum, subway station. From my place you will be able to visit all the city without taking any public transport. 2nd my own Porto's City Guide with the best tips, tipical restaurants (where and what to eat),  stores, places with free entrance, the best Porto's sunset view, unknown places, bars, discos and many more :)
description: Hi I'm David. I'm from Porto and I would love to share with you two things. 1st my flat, right in the center of Porto nearby to the art district, garden, supermarkets, main museum, subway station. From my place you will be able to visit all the city without taking any public transport. 2nd my own Porto's City Guide with the best tips, tipical restaurants (where and what to eat),  stores, places with free entrance, the best Porto's sunset view, unknown places, bars, discos and many more :)

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: David has been a great host to us. He was really Pleasant and helpfull all the time. The Appartement is located pretty central with Many nice locations nearby ( it could be loud During the night) non the less it has been a good place to start our trip through portugal. :)
The apartment fits the description. Large, comfortable, close to the center. David is extremely nice and always willing to help. Map!!! Very pleased! Recommended!

Un casa perfecta para dos personas con ganas de hacer una escapada a oporto. la casa es todo lo que se ve, esta en un lugar ideal para aparcar el coche y poder ir andando a ver todo el centro de Oporto. David ha sido muy amable y el mapa que nos dio con todo lo necesario marcado nos fue muy ùtil. Si queréis ver Oporto es sin duda la.mejor opcio
David was a great host. We had a smooth communication before and during my stay. I would highly recommend him and his place from where you can reach many places in walking distance. Thanks again!
Very friendly host with good recommendations for what to do and especially where to eat in Porto.

Good cheap room. Noisy though, and there aren't proper curtains that keep the sun out.

Was fine for me as I like to be up early.  If you intend to sleep in, be warned.
David was such a great host. He knows so much about Porto and gave us so many recommendations!
David foi ótimo em tudo.  O apartamento tem uma localização perfeita. Ficamos muito bem.

David es muy amable. El apartamento muy limpio, y muy bien situado cerca de la zona de marcha de Oporto.
Sin duda volveremos.

Our stay in Porto with David was pleasant. Unfortunately we couldn't meet David on arrival but his friend Arian was very helpful and gave us some great recommendations for sights and restaurants! The apartment was clean and well furnished but we had some issues with WiFi as we could only have two devices connected at a time. Otherwise the apartment is well located with close proximity to groceries, train stations and metro stops. It is also within walking distance of the major attractions of Porto. It's not brand new but especially considering the location, it is good for the price of the stay.
David is a very nice host, all communication with him was prompt and exact. The appartment is in a very good area in Porto with a lot of bars and restaurants. Very good value for money.
Merci à David pour ses conseils, sa gentillesse et sa sympathie .
Súper acolhedor e com otimo acesso a todos os pontos principais da cidade do porto

David was Very kind person.
We are really enjoyed at david's place. Room was bright and seems like local thing.

David was a very good host! he was kind, and open and full of advices! The house is located in a central position, confortable a pretty cool. Wifi was perfectly working and no any other problems with anything else. I recommend this!

Soggiorno piacevolissimo nell'appartamento di David. La posizione è centrale, tutte le comodità sono a portata di mano e la città si visita a piedi! La comunicazione con l'host molto efficace! Lo raccomando!

O apartamento é uma gracinha, limpeza excelente e tivemos uma ótima comunicação! Bem localizado às cheio de boas vibes ! 
Recomendo !obrigada! 


:D
we had a good time in davids place, its close to the center and david himaelf is very kind and helpfull.
Excellent!

David and his friend were great hosts, taking care that everything was good, and they were very kind to suggest many tips on what to do in Porto. The apartment was well-located, within walking distances of the city centre and many attractions. I hope this apartment will be available again when I decide to visit Porto!

Pretty basic place, 1 king bed not too big and a couch that can be transformed to small bed for two. Furnitures are old. Really good location and the host was really nice, one of the best I ever found.
Perfeito para passar uns dias na cidade!

David's flat is a great option for exploring Porto on a budget. The flat was extremely clean and comfortable for 2 people. Located right next to the "art" neighborhood of Porto, all the major sights are within walking distance, and David provided excellent tips for restaurants/bars, sightseeing and what's going on currently in the city.

David provided great communication and flexibility with checkin. The apartment was clean and we really enjoyed the location. The apartment itself was more basic than expected, and I'm afraid I found the bed uncomfortable.
A great place to stay and wonderful location!!

Notre séjour chez David a été très agréable. Nous avons réservé à la dernière minute et il nous a tout de suite répondu. Ses conseils pour visiter Porto nous ont été très utiles pour apprécier au mieux notre séjour.
Supers conseils pour visiter la ville de David et appartement en accord avec l'annonce.

Квартира в центре Порту за минимальные деньги. В Порту не нужно сидеть дома, а нужно много гулять. Эта квартирка уже достаточно старенькая, но уютная. Под окнами шумновато от  от дороги. 3 этаж. Есть балкончик. Особо не видовая. Хозяин квартиры очень отзывчивый. Спасибо!

David is a great host, communication with him was perfect, he provided full info for getting to his house beforehand so we found it easily. also he kindly waited for us even though we were late for check-in for an hour. he helped us to find free parking place for our car, that was really kind and important for us. 
the apartment is very well located, 10 min from pedestrian area. its old, but clean and tidy, with huge window, so it let a lot of natural light in. the flat is rather basic. the kitchen is equipped very well. 
we were surprised that the double bed for us and place for the third guest were not separated; in description it was said there was 1 bedroom in apartment, but actually its a living room with sofa and double bed in the corner. it wasn't really comfortable for us, but we didn't ask David additional questions before booking, so it might be our own fault.
good place in beautiful city

David was very nice and adapted to our arrival time. We had very good tips from him which helped us to enjoy the city. The apartment is perfect for a couple, just few minutes walking from downtown. It has the basics you need for a short visit to the city. We definitely recommend him!
Besides noisy bed and heavy noise from the street everything else was top notch.
The accommodation has a great location. David has a personal approach and is willing to help. Pleasant experience, I highly recommend
A wonderful place in the center where you hear the wings of rack. I highly recommend

The clean apartment is close to a metro station and has good amenities nearby. It's about a 15-20 minute walk from the centre of town. The main advantage of this flat is the host, David. He was flexible with us as we were a last minute booking and facilitated a late-ish check in. He also brings great interaction with his guests and gives plenty of tips and recommendations for the stay.
David is a nice guy.
David is a great host ! Last minute booking was received and he was there quickly :) offered help with local knowledge xxx
Great stay :)

David is a great host! Upon arriving he gave us a very thorough guide to Porto (with a particular emphasis on food - which we loved!) and showed us where to park our car for free the 3 nights we were there. The apartment was clean, bright and in a great location. Within walking distance to everything. It was perfect for the two of us on a short visit. Thanks again David!

First off, David is a gem. He was so extremely nice and a gracious host. Could not ask for better. He has a genuine interest in being nice and for his guests to feel at home, he's the best!! The place itself was tough for us because of the noise and the bed was not good. We would not stay here again but we would absolutely 100% stay in a different Airbnb offered by David , possibly with different accommodations. If was not a perfect place for us, but we give 5 stars for the hospitality of David.
Y
Nice small flat, near the shops and restaurants!
Logement conforme au description. Très bien situé.

My friends and I just stayed one night at David's place and for us it was really the perfect accommodation. Near to the city center, it is a great place if you want to take some rest before (and after) visiting the town.
The window is facing the street so, keeping it open, it can be a bit noisy.
David is a great Host! The communication was fast and easy (we booked the place at the very last minute), he came across our needs since the beginning and at the check in he gave us a lot of good info and suggestions about the city.
I look forward to go back in Porto!

David was really helpful and super-friendly!
The apartment is very clean and located in a cool neighbourhood!

This place is great. David was very quick in getting in touch with us. He was flexible with our check in and when he met us he offered lots of helpful advice. 
The apartment is basic but very clean and has everything you need. It's situated in a cracking place with ample bars/shops on adjacent street and only 5 min walk from other popular areas.
Porto is a top city and this definitely a good place to use as a base.
Cheers David!
Great cozy place near center. Parked my car and walk all my staying in Porto. David is a great host and guide.
Es war wunderbar. David hat sich die Zeit genommen, uns die besten Plätze in Porto zu zeigen.

The place is well located just two blocks from the action of the city center. It is somewhat run down but this is not the issue. The problem is the street is noisy. Even the bigger issue is that the bed is even noisier than the street believe it or not. Having said that if noice does not bother one too much the rest is quite good especially the host David who knows the city and shares this knowledge by asking including very hard to find secrets. Overall we were satisfied but tired.
David was a pleasure to meet. I contacted him last minute and he helped out in a tricky situation. The apartment is very central and in a good area. Enjoyed the experience a lot.

Our kind host David received us in his apartment, close to the centre of Porto. On a map he showed us a lot of interesting places in town and -practical !- the nearest ATM and supermarket. As a (very) basic spot to discover Porto: well chosen.
First of all, David is extremely nice and a gives great tips for things to do and were to eat. Unfortunately the place itself was less nice, and the bed was not good. We would not stay here again.
David was exceptionnaly helpfull and reactive. Trully help me out in a real sense of airbnb community. The flat is very well located and cosy and clean.
Cute, old apartment in nice neighbourhood! Little noisy, but okay if you bring earplugs :)

David's place was great! My husband, toddler and I stayed for 3 nights. The apartment is easy walking distance to all the major attractions. The apartment was nice and clean and even had a washing machine. David gave some great recommendations for eating and checking out Porto. We would definitely stay here again!
Great little space close to tapas, bars and fab evening spots! Great communication. David made everything very easy!

David's place by itself wasn't bad at all, although it all is quite dated. David himself was really nice and gave us great tips on where to go in Porto!
My main issue with the place was the shower, there was hardly any water pressure and the showerhead had to be held by hand. Also the bed is very noisy, it's an old spring matrass, an it's length is only just enough when 1.85m tall. There is very noticeable streetnoise, although for me that isn't a problem.
Still, we had a nice stay in Porto and got a really nice dinner thanks to David's recommendations. His knowledge and advice where to go in Porto is what was best about the stay!
Awesome spot to see everything. Very close to the main areas and it's a really cool retro style space. It was clean and had everything I needed.

David was a great host. He was kind, uncomplicated and very helpful. Check in was easy and uncomplicated. Although we changed our time of arrival, he was spontaneous and easy going. He had prepared a great bucket list to see the best of the city in only one day because we had not more time. The apartment was spartan but had everything necessary. The location was the best. We were able to reach the city centre by foot and see the amazing city by only walking. He proposed great spots to see and we were very happy to have him as host.
A really cute old school house. This house is a great jumping off point for exploring the city.
Super

I enjoyed staying at David's apartment. It was close to the main area of Porto and everything I needed or wanted to do was with in a n easy walking distance. The apartment had everything I needed and was comfortable for the time I spent in Porto.

Appartement très propre et très bien situé, beaucoup de choses à proximité, à 5 minutes à pied du centre-ville. 
David donne de très bon conseils sur les activités et la vie de la ville. 
Je recommande !

Duże, przestronne, czyste i jasne mieszkanie. W kuchni dostępne są wszystkie niezbędne sprzęty aby przygotować sobie posiłek. David polecił nam wiele fajnych miejsc w Porto i odpowiadał bardzo szybko na nasze wiadomości. 
Blisko do centrum miasta, nie ma potrzeby korzystania z komunikacji miejskiej. Niedaleko mieszkania można zaparkować samochód w bezpłatnej strefie. 
Polecamy!

O David foi muito prestável e a casa estava pronta para nos receber quando chegamos.
O Apartamento está muito bem localizado, perto do centro mas resguardado do bulício das "Galerias Paris".

Tuve un problema con el billete de avión y necesité un alojamiento urgente. David me ayudó enseguida y me esperó en el apartamento. Muito obrigada! El apartamento es pequeño y todo (muebles, instalaciones, etc) es muy antiguo pero bien cuidado y muy limpio. Muy cerca hay una tiendita donde venden comida, me fue muy bien al llegar tan tarde. Hay un autobús que lleva al aeropuerto (el 602) y se llega al centro en un paseo cuesta abajo. La cama es muy cómoda y el wifi muy bueno. Lo recomiendo para una estancia corta.

David est sympathique et de très bons conseils concernant les lieux à visiter.
Appartement bien situé, mais très bruyant, aucun système de chauffage (limite au mois de novembre), meubles anciens et vétustes : une des portes de l'armoire m'est tombée sur le pied le jour de notre départ.. bien dommage !

Logement bien placé dans cette ville magnifique. Idéal pour visiter Porto quelques jours seul bémol, la pression de la douche pour le shampoing... Brushing à 5euros dans le quartier ! Sommes ravie de notre séjour.
David's restaurant and site recommendations made my first stay in Porto a memorable experience and I'll definitely come back thanks to that alone!
Buen sitio muy cerca de todo lo esencial para visitar en Porto, sin duda lo recomendaría a todo el mundo.
Hemos estado muy agusto en el alojamiento de David, nos ha facilitado todas las ubicaciones con mapa incluido. Estaba limpio y muy cerca del centro.
El departamento es tal cual las fotos. Llegamos alrededor de las 21 y nos recibieron sin problemas. La limpieza era notable y en una buena ubicación ya que no estaba muy lejos del centro.

David was really nice and was showing us some places to eat on the map when we arrived.
Unfortunately The shower Didnt work that was ennoying for women with long hair. It was impossible to wash them...and then the whole flat was really damp and cold so we could not really stay long there. Vetter to visit Davids Palace in summer! :)
Otherwise Porto is beautiful to visit!
David was an excellent host ans gave us recommandations to visit Porto. We enjoyed a lot our stay.
El piso de David está genial para pasar unos días en Oporto. Además nos dio muchos consejos sobre donde ir a comer y qué cosas visitar. Gracias!!

We had a really great stay, David is a very friendly and helpful host!
The apartment is very close to the city center and perfect for a short trip to Porto. Thank you!
Buono e giusto
David fue un gran anfitrión. Estuvimos en Oporto cinco días y nos sentimos como en casa. Fue muy atento y nos ayudó en todo lo que necesitamos, además, nos recomendó muchos sitios. ¡Gracias por todo!
David is a nice guest and he gives a really good recommendations to discover the city
Great location, spacious flat and really friendly host, with a great knowledge of Porto.

L'appartamento di David si trova in una zona tranquilla a 4/5 km dal centro. David ci ha dato tutte le indicazioni necessarie per trascorrere al meglio questi 2 giorni a Porto. Persona disponibile e gentile. L'appartamento è consigliato a tutte quelle persone che amano viaggiare e non guardano all'apparenza.
David was really friendly and cooperative the flat was alright and really good located. We had a good stay.

Me and my dad stayed in Porto for one week. This is enough time to explore every part of the city(center) and other cities as well. The location of the apartment is perfect because it’s quite out of the tourist zone and authentic but if you walk for 5 min you’ll find yourself already in a crowded area. David was really caring and helpful. Totally recommend. It is very loud at night though because of the busy street.

The host: attentive and polite with loads of interesting information to share about Porto.

The apartment: very well located near the most interesting alternative bars, restaurants and shops. Walking distance to all major sites. Nearby free parking area (ask the host). The flat has everything you need to make your stay totally comfortable. 

We will definitely come back !
David ist echt nett und zeigt kurz über einen Stadtplan wo es sich lohnt hinzugehen. Die Wohnung ist okay.

David ist ein großartiger Gastgeber, der sich Zeit genommen hat, uns die Sehenswürdigkeiten und besten Restaurants der Stadt zu zeigen. Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr gut, denn man kann alles zu Fuß erreichen.
Die Wohnung ist zudem gut ausgestattet und wir hatten einen angenehmen Aufenthalt.
Wir empfehlen die Wohnung auf jeden Fall weiter!
Great apartment in a good location.
The home location was good and he was very kind :)
Lovely!
Excellent appartement, bonne localisation. David est un hôte parfait avec des super conseils pour des choses à faire à Porto.

The place was nice and easy to get to from the airport. Great location in walking distance from the inner city.
My advice: use the tips David gives, especially the sheep cheese sandwich and the viewpoint near the bridge. They alone will make your stay worthwile.
Clean and spacious apartment, with many amenities that make the stay very comfortable. Also, David took the time to share his tips of the city with us, which was very nice of him.
Bon emplacement très proche du centre et des restaurants sympas, la rue est malheureusement très bruyante dûe aux voitures qui y passent, ce qui perturbe le sommeil.

David, was a great host. 

Once he met us, he provided us with great advice about Porto, which were super valuable. David's apartment is located in the hear of Porto, near to many small bars, local restaurants and the mecca of lovely second hand shops. 

i definitely recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to make the most of Porto. 

Muito obrigada por tudo, David! :)

Decently located, only about a 15 min walk to town centre. The place is quite small and needs a bit of a pick-me-up (looks dirty but is mainly just old and lived in). Not a great value for money.  We did enjoy our walk into town centre and David was very kind to let us stay a few hours extra on our last day. He seemed nice and other travellers seemed to love him -but was out of town when we were there so he took a bit longer to respond and when we arrived, we had to wait over an hour in the street at 11pm  because his friend who was letting us in “had troubles with public transport.”

House is on a main street so it was noisy. There is an unavoidable moisture smell inside. Besides all that amedities are ok for a stay. You can stay in a better guest house in the neighborhood with a little bit of extra money which i believe worths it.

David’s place is nice. It’s walking distance located from major attractions of Porto and would be good if you plan to go out and walk back home. David also offered several great recommendations regarding local things to do , thank you!

But  few things could be worked upon. - bin in the bathroom, not next to bed, hair dryer, more accurate pictures, comfortable mattress and clean linens, and better pillows.
Close to cent

Great value and a short walk to the town centre. Many shops, cafes and businesses on the doorstep!
David is a very friendly and helpful host!

Our tip to other guests for a nice dinner, only a 20 minute walk away: Japanese restaurant Ikeda.
位置不太安全,不开车的话还可以｡

The place is from the 70s with the appropriate furniture to those times which I like. The window faces the street and it can be loud, I didn't mind that either, I like the city noise. location is central. would stay again.
Lo sconsiglio. Scarsissima pulizia
Nice place, super clean and comfortable, nice neighborhood, everything is in walking distance! We enjoyed our stay. David is a  very kind host, provided us with redtaurant tipps!
Boa localização! Foi uma noite quente e a única alternativa foi dormir com a janela aberta! O anfitrião foi bastante prestável, aceitando a nossa reserva à última hora
Si quieres el alojamiento para dormir y aseo, está perfecto.

David, même si nous ne l'avons pas vu, est une personne très agréable et disponible qui a su faire le nécessaire pour faire au plus vite malgré son absence. 
de plus, il nous a donné les bonnes adresses et ça c'était vraiment le petit plus.
un grand merci pour ta disponibilité! 
Sonia

David is a great host, easy communication, very helpful. The place in itself is fine, but there's a lot of noise from the street, so if you're sensible to that, this might not be the place. However the location is very fine.

L’appartement est simple mais fonctionnel. Très bien situé proche du centre ! Nous avons pu faire tous nos déplacements à pied.
David est très attentionné et très réactifs aux messages.

El alojamiento me resultó bastante decepcionante, cuando entre olía verdaderamente mal, la persiana estaba rota y el anfitrion no la arreglo en mi estancia lo que implicó dormir con luz toda la noche y por la mañana, el sillón está rajado, y la bañera está bastante sucia ... no vale lo que se paga por el apartamento.

I will hightly recommend david and his place :) 
He completly saved us from a bad start. Our previous airbnb host never answered (Miguel) and we were already in porto, but it took David less than an hour to prepare the house and send someone to present the flat and everything :) 
Not enough thanks ! This flat is full of charm and close to everything, right in the town center, near to the best streets and areas. We also discovered what we will call the best hamburger restaurant we've ever went: the real hamburgeria (go for it, its near the house if you cant walk anymore... so dont be afraid) and the best terasse "bacchus vini" where you should taste the tawny porto 10 ans d'âge... terrific
Well ... you can Guess we had a very good time:)
Jeanne & Carmine

Appartement très bien situé, très fonctionnel ! Le lit est confortable ! La salle de bain est bien aménagée a part quelques taches de vétusté dans la baignoire ! David a été très gentil et nous a conseillé plein d’adresses dans Porto ! Je recommande

I came with my fiancée and we really liked the place and the hospitality of David. If someone ask me about a good place to stay in Porto, without hesitation, I would really advise this one. The apartment is very well located and David has it very clean and tidy. We would like to come back.

Execelente apartamento e localização. David aceitou nossa reserva de última hora e foi mto simpático. Adoramos recomendarei com certeza! 
Vale a pena!

Great place to stay - we were in Porto for one night and David was very helpful in our last minute booking. He responded very quickly to all my messages, got us checked in, we dropped our bags and had an amazing night exploring Porto!
bem localizado, perto do Centro histórico, 15 minutos a pé, de táxi 5 minutos

생각보다 중심가에서 떨어져 있습니다
참고하세요
David super simpático! El piso al ladito del centro y confortable.

David est très sympa et il m'a accueilli super gentil. Bonne communication, j'ai réservé en dernière minute et il était disponible. Très bon logement, calme et à 10 minutes à pied du centre historique. Merci pour ta gentillesse, David.
Good experience. Great location to explore the city, 10 min from the city center. Recommend
Nette Wohnung, Einrichtung aus den 70ern. Recht kultig. Etwas laut durch den Verkehr auf der Straße.
David is a great communicator and even offered some local knowledge. Very walkable location in the midst of it all.
Excellent position of a flat. Clean and cozy
Flat was ok.  10 minutes from center.  However, place was noisy.
Nice and clean apartment in walking distance to the city.
bonito y centrico apartamento

name: Botafogo's Green Gem
summary: You're gonna love the apartment because of the view and because it's close to 2 malls and to the subway.
space: A varanda com o verde e sua atmosfera de aconchego tornam o apartamento único.
description: You're gonna love the apartment because of the view and because it's close to 2 malls and to the subway.
neighborhood_overview: Il quartiere offre una vita noturna e culturale richissima.
transit: 10 minuti a piedi dalla metro!
access: O prédio possui área de academia, salão de festas com sinuca e churrasqueira
interaction: Eu estou sempre disponivel para tirar quaisquer duvidas e para dar dicas e informacoes com todo o prazer!

reviews.comments:
Localizacao boa
Estadia excelente
Muito receptiva 
Adoramos a estadia e voltaremos em breve..
The host canceled this reservation 200 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

O apartamento é ótimo, bem aconchegante e espaçoso. Ficamos em 3 pessoas e foi mais do que suficiente. A localização é incrível, nas proximidades tem padaria, mercearia, bares, shopping, ônibus... A Iohanna não estava na cidade no momento, mas sua mãe nos recepcionou muito bem, foi super atenciosa e querida. Recomendo e com certeza em uma próxima ida ao Rio, adoraria me hospedar lá novamente. :)

O apartamento é muito bom. Situado em uma rua super tranquila e bem proximo (3 ruas) da estação de metrô.

Super fiel às fotos do app. A cozinha é bem equipada.


A recepção foi com a mãe da Iohanna, a Dona Neusa, suoer prestativa e atenciosa.
Amei a localização, apertamento limpo e organizado.
very nice place

O apartamento estava exatamente como nas fotos. Ar condicionado somente no quarto mas foi suficiente pra termos uma estadia agradável. O check in e check out foram tranquilos e sem problemas. Rua tranquila, com comércio, bares e restaurantes próximos. Ponto alto para a facilidade de locomoção para as principais atrações turísticas do (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos outras vezes.

Pontos altíssimos desse apartamento: a varanda espaçosa e deliciosa e a localização! Há tudo por perto, inclusive bloquinhos de carnaval, mercado, bar, panificadora, banco 24h. O chuveiro é uma delicia, os utensílios são suficientes e o local é seguro. A Iohanna foi super solícita, nos ajudou no que precisamos e sempre respondia às mensagens com rapidez! Com certeza recomendamos o apartamento para quem quer ficar no Rio, num ambiente aconchegante, muito bem localizado!

name: Kauai 2 Bedroom Family Getaway | 2 Pools
summary: Located on Kaweonui Point and adjacent to two golf courses, this luxury Kauai destination is surrounded by lush greens that will captivate your attention with their beauty and give you a tranquility that can only be found on this magical island. As soon as you step foot onto the Bali Hai Villas, you will feel as if stress is extinguished from existence and colors will take on a different tone.
space: Decorated in Tropical decor the unit will make you feel like a royal in paradise with your own niceties. Each bedroom comes with a private patio and a living room to relax in after surfing all day. Don't forget about the kitchen and washer and dryer, they will make you want to retire and never leave.  Please note the second bedroom may contain (1) queen or (2) doubles depending on availability.
description: Located on Kaweonui Point and adjacent to two golf courses, this luxury Kauai destination is surrounded by lush greens that will captivate your attention with their beauty and give you a tranquility that can only be found on this magical island.
