Outdoor Swimming Pool Outdoor Hot Tubs Outdoor Children's Pool Tennis Court Picnic/BBQ Area Volleyball Court Miniature Golf 18 Hole Golf Course Golf Driving Range We strive to make your vacation planning a
neighborhood_overview: Golf enthusiasts will admire the ambiance as they tee off from green to green. Families will dazzle in the alluring reefs so do not forget those waterproof cameras! Everyone will be captivated by the vivid greens and blues that are the islands vegetation and surrounding sea so book your trip today and revel in the magic that is the Bali Hai Villas.
notes: Wyndham Bali Hai Villas is not air conditioned. However, there are ceiling fans located in each unit. Guest registration is located in the Clubhouse and is available 24 hours per day.  Wireless Internet is free for up to 4 devices, ideal for emails and basic web browsing. For more streaming and surfing options on unlimited devices, Enhanced High-Speed Wireless Internet is available for $9.95 per day, $49.95 for 6-10 days, and $59.95 for 11-30 days. Handicap & Hearing Impaired units are available if available upon request. All requests cannot be guaranteed but we will do our best to accommodate all guests. Guest names will be book into the reservation 20 days prior to arrival depending on when your order has been received.
transit: From Lihue Airport: Turn right onto N. Kapule Hwy./HI-51 N, which becomes Kuhio Hwy./HI-56. Travel for approximately 28 miles, passing the towns of Kapaa, Anahola and Kilauea. Turn right onto Ka Haku Rd. This is the Princeville entrance. After passing the guard station and the Neptune water feature (approximately .25 mile), take the 4th right at Pepelani Loop. Follow Pepelani Loop to the Bali Hai Villas sign on the right. Turn right into Bali Hai Villas and follow the signs to the clubhouse.
access: Outdoor Swimming Pool Outdoor Hot Tubs Outdoor Children's Pool Tennis Court Picnic/BBQ Area Volleyball Court Miniature Golf 18 Hole Golf Course Golf Driving Range
interaction: We strive to make your vacation planning and stay a great experience and give you great customer service. Feel free to email ResortShare with any questions.
house_rules: The reservation will be booked into the guest’s name as it appears on Airbnb. If this name does not match your photo ID or if a guest by a different name will be checking in, you must provide the first and last name at the time of booking.      This property has an additional transient fee of $8.21 per night that will be collected at the resort. Subject to change based on resort requirements. Must be 21+ years of age at the time of check-in.     This is a Wyndham Timeshare resort all sale presentations are optional.

host.host_about:
Here at ResortShare we strive to create a seamless transaction for our guests, allowing them to enjoy a relaxing vacation at over 50 of the top destination resorts in the US.

We manage a premium selection of the best units at these resorts, most of our units include kitchens, laundry capability and separated living and sleeping quarters. You will have all the comforts of home, with the resort/hotel amenities you need while on vacation.

reviews.comments: very nice location and very scenic.. i would stay here again.. nice walk to grocery store.. few restaurants close by and a 10 min drive into Hanalei town!
Room is very clean and great price for value.
Great, clean place to stay and relax. Would recommend.
Great location and wonderful apartment.  It was extremely clean and felt luxurious!
Great spot, had a great weekend of skiing. Despite an initial issue with the reservation, there was easy communication and this was quickly resolved.

reviews.comments:
NATASHA IS A WONDERFUL WOMAN THAT LOOKS AFTER HER GUESTS WELFARE AND SHE HAS A VERY ACCOMMODATING FAMILY. THE PLACE IS VERY GOOD FOR COUPLES BECAUSE OF PRIVACY. 
VERY NEAT AS WELL WITH GOOD BREAKFAST AVAILABILITY AND OTHER AMENITIES LIKE MICROWAVE, REFRIGERATOR WITH SOME OTHER THINGS TO FEEL AT HOME. HOME AWAY FROM HOME THAT MY SIMPLE REMARK.

Natasha and her husband were kind enough to let me check in early, she had beverages and things to eat in the morning and the space looked exactly as listed. Very clean, quaint space with everything I needed. The neighborhood seemed to be very safe and pleasant but I would not recommend walking around alone at night. It's also important to know that the host lives upstairs.

It was amazing experience spending few days in Brooklyn 
Mrs Natasha was a great woman 
We appreciated her warm hospitality 
The only point we would like to mention 
Taking long time between buses and metro to reach Manhattan
Natasha is very nice. Her communication was great and she made us feel very welcomed. The studio was just as described and the neighborhood was safe. I will definitely be booking with her again.

We were a young couple visiting New York City. 

She made us feel welcomed right away! We ended up getting there around midnight (we were travelling by car from Canada). She was understanding. When we got to the appartment, there was already some food and beverages to our disposal (juice, milk, some eggs, bagel, cream cheese). She also let us park in her driveway for the whole 6 days we were there.

The appartment looked exactly like the pictures. The bathroom was beautiful and the bed was comfortable. We had cable, internet and a small kitchenette (no oven). We would've liked to have more kitchen ustensiles to cook, and more pots! But that was honestly the only negative thing we have to say. 

Natasha was always available to answer our questions and would always make sure we had everything we needed! She even received a package we had ordered online while we were out doing groceries!

The appartment is a little far from manhattan, but nothing undoable! It was either on express bus (6.50$
) or the bus (2.75$) and a metro ride (3$). Both would usually take about an hour (make sure you have spare change or just get a weekly pass for 31$).

We enjoyed the neighbourhood and would definetly rebook if ever we come back to NYC! Great place for a little price!

My friend and I felt right at home. The apartment was very cozy and felt like a hotel. Natasha was a wonderful host, and if i had any questions she was just a text away. She gave us directions on how to get to her location and responded  immediately. The neighborhood was very convenient (close to two bus stops). I will be returning to this location for future trips!

We loved our stay here, it was beyond amazing and Natasha was such an amazing host. She was always available through text! The place was really nice and cozy. Will definitely stay here again if I'm ever in New York.

She was in contact with me from the start. Gave directions and suggestions to the places I wanted to go to. A short bus ride to the train station and her street is very safe and quiet for night walking. She went out of her way to make us feel comfortable. I will look to stay here again on further trips to NYC

The place was neat and tidy. Natasha was communicative before and during our stay, and offered to extend our checkout an extra hour which was nice. The apartment was stocked up with everything that we needed. The location is walking distance to Canarsie subway station. Great stay.

Natasha sent me all the information, I needed to get in the place. She also left breakfast and coffee for me. The location was convenient using publlic transportation. About 12 min bus ride and 25 min subway ride to Union Square.
The stay was great I do wish it was closer to the train but you are a short Uber ridea or 30 min bus ride away

Natasha was a wonderful host. She went out of her way to check on us via text at least twice a day asking if we needed anything. She stocked the kitchen with breakfast foods and coffee, and recommend places to see during our stay in NY. Although the location is a bit far from many NY attractions, you can still make it work with a combination of bus, uber, and subway rides. The room is completely private with its own entrance on the side of the house which was was very nice. It was clean, warm, comfortable, and an overall great place to stay. I would definitely come back.

Natasha was a fantastic host. Since we were driving in from Atlanta she allowed us to check in early. She stocked the fridge with a few essentials, and left take out menus on the counter. She was available to help us with any questions we had, and gave us directions when we needed it. The space was very clear, and there was parking which is a plus. We had a great time staying here.
Patricia was an amazing host and always made herself available. The place was amazing and I appreciate all the little amenities she left for me and my guest!

Natasha was very kind and the place is very comfortable. It is nice to stay in a residential area like this while visiting New York and it was a bonus that Natasha leaves fresh fruit and other breakfast items. it was a great getaway weekend.

Natasha is definently a great host. She always texted from time to time to make sure my stay was pleasant and I still had my space going in and out as I pleased. Also the neighborhood had a lot of places to eat, was near public transportation and major places such as jfk airport. All in all I had a smooth stay!
Great stay, close to bus stops. Natasha was kind enough to let us check in very early and check out an hour late; she was a wonderful host. The space was perfect for my husband and I!

Natasha was very welcoming, and has checked in the appropriate amount of times to make sure everything was going well. Her place was neat, clean, and very comfortable. If I ever have to, I would definitely book again.

Natasha is such a wonderful Host , She presented us with a warm welcome and gracious hospitality. The listing is exactly as it was describe. The studio is private has its own entrance, well equipped kitchen, clean , comfortable bed, warm environment (Heater) , Very secure great location . Natasha studio is walking distance to public transit, nearby local shops and restaurants . Parking was extremely easy to find. Natasha communicated with us throughout the stay . We loved that Natasha left us snacks and items for breakfast too, such a nice gesture! We definitely enjoyed our stay at her private studio and Would recommend staying here.
Great place near the bus and subway station.  The neighborhood is quiet at night and Natasha was a great host

Natasha's place was perfect for my boyfriend and I to stay. We spent our days in the city and had easy access to the subway. We also spent some time in the apartment where there was a stove and microwave for meals we decided to cook ourselves. Natasha was gracious enough to leave us some milk and cereal. It was easy to access with our late arrival. I would recommend Natasha's and I would come stay here again if I visited NYC.
Good neighborhood. The apartment was comfortable and quiet
Natasha was one of the best host I had !she was really helpfully. Quick to respond through text. Place was very clean. Would definitely stay there again.
Great cozy stay! My friend and I enjoyed our time there immensely. Natasha is a super accommodating host.
Everything was lovely I have stayed here a few times and Natasha is a great host
Natasha was a pleasant lady. Place was nice and clean. Perfect for a short stay
Great place for couples. And people who are single.
Everything was good as usual
The host Natasha is very caring
The place is really well furnished and the room designs were really nice.

Natasha's place was very clean and organized. She was very responsive, and texted us throughout the day to ask how we were doing. Responded within 10 minutes and helped us with any issues we had! She left us bagels, cereal and milk which was very sweet of her. Would stay here again!
The host canceled this reservation 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great room for a couple. Small and cozy with all the amenities you would need for a short stay. Only complaint is the bed. Very uncomfortable, but manageable for a couple of nights.
Very quiet and nice. Great place!
Very pretty home. Great host. Will book again in the near future.

The apartment in Brooklyn was a great place to stay for me and my sister. It was very easy to check in and out. The apartment had som bagels, eggs, bananas etc. that we could use for free. All in all a very good experience! :)

My girlfriend and I had a great stay at Natashas place. Everything was clean, all necessary basics were available including vegetables and a filled fridge. In addition, Natasha was very nice and responsive. We will definitively come again.
Very good
As already last time: everything perfect! We will come again :)
Natasha was a great host - easy to reach and quick to respond. Her place was cozy and warm. No complaints! It was a great stay!

What a great little place for a weekend stay! Natasha was very nice and responsive. Her little studio was perfect, very comfortable and in a beautiful neighborhood. I would definitely recommend and stay there again.

Natasha was a great host, she was very communicative the whole stay. The house is located about a 30 minute walk to the nearest subway station but the Bus is even closer. I'd recommend this place to most anyone.
Smooth check in and out, Natasha was easily accessible by message. Her place is just as advertised in the pics. Clean and cozy with all the amenities you need. Great and comfortable stay :)
We enjoyed staying at Natasha's place while visiting New York. It is easy to come and go on public transport and Natasha and her husband are great friendly host.
It's right for the price

This was a cozy studio apartment ,, the neighborhood was quiet and the host let me check out a hour later which was awesome,,, the only little thing was it takes a little while for the shower water to get hott. Also the wifi service isn't that great but really didn't matter because we weren't really there. Other than that great experience!!!

Le petit logement de natasha est un peu éloigné du centre de manhattan (10 min de bus puis 35 min de métro) mais si vous voulez découvrir les gens qui font New York c'est parfait. Les gens du quartier sont agréables et disponibles pour vous aider.

Natasha is an amazing host and the place is extremely clean!! Very homey, cozy and I felt very safe. The only thing I wish I would have known was that the subway is 1.5 miles away in kind of an interesting, urban neighborhood. Other than that, extremely easy to get all over Brooklyn and Manhattan once you get the the subway!!

Natasha was a great host. Everything was close. The bus routes were easy. She was easy to contact and the apt was clean. Even had a few thing for us in the fridge. My first experience was pretty awesome.
Great place to stay. Not day to Coney Island.

No A/C and this time of the year is very humid but she does provide a fan that helps a little. Other than that she is very accommodating and her place is very clean. The location is quiet and very close to the pier. She has all amenities available, coffee, bagels, iron, etc. Loved my stay!

Natasha's place is a bed and shower in New York, it's what you need and nothing more. Don't expect anything lavisish. It's not a bad place it did its job. We were out all day so it was a place to shower and sleep. Also note no AC, but my friend in NYC told me that normal.

Apartment is the perfect size for 2 or 3. Everything was clean and cozy.  Shower is a good size. Location is about an hour from NYC, if taking public transportation. Bus stop is fairly close and Subway station is about a mile or so walk. Overall we had a great experience.
Its a decent location and neighborhood. It beat the hell out of a hotel. Perfect for two people staying for a week or weekend. Thank you Natasha!

Very nice service, 
Thank you Natasha

Very quiet neighbourhood, very easy check-in. The place was so clean, really nice! Natasha was very quick in responding whenever we had questions. Great location for a couple, bus stop is nearby, trainstation takes a little walk though. All in all, everything was fine!
Clean and well kept place with a nice and communicative host, would come back again.

It was prefect for the weekend stay. Just A place to sleep and shower. Very simple and basic. Have all the basic and necessary amenities. Natasha responded fast and made sure all was well during our stay.
Logement très correct, dans un quartier très calme. Hôte et voisinages très serviables. Seul bémol, un peu éloigné de Manhattan.

Although the size of the place might seem smaller than you expected, it’s ok for 2 people. Very comfy bed and sofa. Host left some snacks for us which was a life saver when we first got there. Only issue is that it’s a bit far from the subway.
It’s a good place, safe, peaceful. Me and my boyfriend had a memorable time here.
Natasha was a great host! Perfect space for a nice getaway weekend in Brooklyn.

Natasha is very responsive to your texts and communication. It was easy to access and no fuss. My boyfriend and I were here for two days just for a concert and Natasha’s place was a last minute find. The bed is so comfortable, new pillows are necessary but everything else was nice and cozy. Shower water gets hot and I loved that. Parking outside can be difficult but not impossible. It’s good for a short stay.

Headed here for a long weekend with my girlfriend to explore Brooklyn and the rest of the city. Natasha's place is convenient as it is right near the 17 and 103 bus. We also walked to the train on one occasion which was a little over a mile (not bad at all). This place was perfect for us, it was clean, had some amenities and was perfect for a couple looking for a place to sleep and shower. Additionally, parking was easy and convenient, would recommend. Thanks Natasha!
Natasha was a great host! Always available checked on me. I love my privacy and she gave me just that. I would definitely recommend her and her place. Thanks again!
Great place, very clean
We enjoyed our time here. Natasha was very responsive and accommodating. Definitely would recommend.
Perfect for traveling, very comfortable and clean.

The stay was great ! Natasha provided me with all the things I would need for my stay , food, hygiene supplies, and extra sheets. The L train is a distance but there are many buses close by that connect ! 

Natasha was very kind , she checked in me to make sure I was enjoying my stay. I will definitely be returning !
Cute little studio great for backpackers or anyone looking for a little getaway for a weekend
Natasha’s place is clean organized & central.
Very quiet neighborhood. Absolutely gorgeous space...had everything I needed. Would definitely recommend in the future!

Natasha came to the studio and spoke with me quickly after I requested something via txt. Very sweet lady. Heater is timed so did find myself a bit cold from time to time, but we were out of the house most of the day so it wasn’t too much of an issue. Perfect stay for a couple who wants a nice, cozy, and private studio to come back to after a day of exploring :) I would definitely recommend this location! Thank you Natasha!

Natasha is a very gracious host, who's place is located not far from the Canarsie L train. Her apartment is clean, neat and filled with tons of amenities. She goes above and beyond to accommodate you as best she can and responds quickly. 100% worth it

Natasha's place was a perfect getaway for my boyfriend and I. We never had an issue and enjoyed the privacy of the location and offerings. 

Pros - First, the entire space was clean and neat. Secondly, Natasha provides everything from plates, bowls, utensils, towels, and even toiletries, you will have nothing to worry about except for relaxing on the comfy bed. Thirdly, its absolutely secluded from the rest of the house. Natasha gave us the utmost privacy and made herself available, if we needed it. We never had to contact her, that's how seamless this stay was. Finally, keyless entry. We came and went as we please without worrying about how to check-in or coming and going. We loved it!

Cons - Parking hard to come by at night. We ended up parking one block over on our last night because parking was so scarce.

Overall, we highly recommend Natasha's place and we'll be sure to return and recommend to others.
Nice location, clean comfortable and quiet.

Our stay at Natasha’s was excellent! Relatively easy parking for New York, easy check-in system, and Natasha was always responsive and answered any of my questions. She also left cereal and bagels for us for breakfast, a very nice gesture. I would definitely recommend her to friends in the future looking for great value in Brooklyn!
Small and intimate. Just what ibwas looking for. Very quiet neighborhood. Love the separate entrance. I would definitely recommend to someone else
Very comfy and it makes you feel right at home. Clean and spacious. Would recommend and book again!
Perfect for a little get away, it’s cozy and easy check in. Loved it!

My stay at Natasha's place was great. Everything was clean and as shown in the pictures. Natasha was easy to communicate with and always got back in a timely manner. The cereal & bagels left was a nice touch that went a long way. Would definitely stay at Natasha's place again.
I will definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a clean comfortable relaxation !
The home is amazing. It was so cozy. Away from all the noise. The perfect getaway.
This is a great space, very clean and in an area easy to get around in.
Great and clean place. Natasha is a very good host and responds really quickly. The only downside is that it's a bit far from the metro station, but there is bus to the station from the main road.
A nice and cosy studio apartment with private entrance, shower and kitchen. The host was helpful and promptly answered to all my messages.
So welcoming and a really nice place!
Quiet,clean and nice touch on the toiletries.far exceeded my expectations,nice place to stay if your looking for somewhere spacious with privacy.natasha was a excellent host,would stay again.

This place is great! Super comfortable and a great place to come back to and relax. Natasha was an awesome host. She was quick to reply to all my questions. She even checked on me to make sure I had everything I needed. Would definitely stay here again.
Nice place and very welcoming.
I had a great stay!

The room was quiet, private, and well kept. We loved the intimacy and the tidiness, the kitchenette was convenient, and the bathroom was fully accommodated for our cleaning needs. The communication between us and her was great and prompt, and we were able to stop in without problems at our late arrival times.
Nice and cozy, Love the privacy and comfort.

Natasha’s Place is a steal for the price!! What great value!! You get a nice quiet block with access to your own lovely space that is clean and cozy. Check in was a breeze and Natasha respected my privacy. There’s a nice sized tv and there’s even snacks, and beverages left by the most warming host that I have encountered so far on AIRBNB!  Definitely BOOK!

The studio is really cute and nice. It's close to the train station and was super clean! The host was wonderful always checking in to see if everything was alright even when I had flight issues and had to miss the first night of the reservation. This is a great spot and I would stay here again.

This place is awesome and Natasha is a great host! She checked in and offered to help me with anything I needed and was very quick to respond. The apartment is in a residential neighborhood with free street parking and it’s surrounded by several bus stops. I had to go to Manhattan for a work conference and it was very easy (and cheap) to get there using public transportation. The apartment has WiFi and it’s a quiet neighborhood so I was able to get work done in the apartment while I was there. The kitchen was stocked with breakfast food and coffee. There was shampoo and conditioner in the bathroom. I got way more than I expected for this price. I highly recommend this place for work trips or vacations!

This place is reasonable and cozy. Breakfast foods on the arrival. The host kept in contact I didn’t need much help getting around. The neighborhood it self very friendly when I did walk around people were openly speaking and saying Goodmorning. I enjoyed my stay. I would book this place every time I visit that side of town if I could.

Natasha’s place was great! It was clean, close to public transportation, cute and cozy. It was perfect. Natasha was very responsive and attentive. We appreciated our stay. Nearby to the park as well for a lovely afternoon walk!

It was exactly how the ad described. Clean, welcoming atmosphere. Located in a family-friendly neighborhood. Close to the subway and very easy to get an Uber or Lyft ride. The extra added touches of breakfast food and toiletries made the stay that much more special. Definitely would book again.
Great little spot; easy check in, comfy bed, nice shower, responsive host!
Quiet and private
The only thing that bothered me was how warm it would get, but there was a fan so it helped. Thanks for letting us stay! Great place :)
Good stay

Great little space to relax after a long day. The apartment has a private door for easy access. Its very quiet and in a very nice neighborhood. 
Natasha made everything very comfortable.

I would recommend staying in Natasha's place. She was a kind and very responsive host. She left out little snacks and bottles of water in the fridge and even provided a fan since it was so warm outside. 

She knew the area well and was able to provide suggestions. We were able to park on the street within a few minute walk to the location without any problems.
It was a short and nice stay. I liked it a lot, thank you Natasha.

Small but cozy little place. Nearest subway is a 30 minute walk away in an okay neighborhood. We took an Uber back home from the subway at night, but that was also because we were just tired of walking for the day. Bed and sheets are pretty comfy. Shower is a little low pressure, but I've heard that's just New York in general. Natasha was an excellent host who provided quick responses to any questions I had and check in/out was simple! Made our trip to NYC much more affordable!
No a/c. Got pretty hot in the morning

This was an amazing location! The area was nice. Even got to meet the host Natasha. She was pleasant as well. The only thing I would suggest would be earlier check in time. Natasha was very accommodating! Quick to respond, and would check in with us through the app on how we were doing. Everything was accessible, metro and such. The apartment can get pretty hot but she supplied a fan which was very helpful. If you stay here and happen to get hungry late at night, use the UberEats app. If you forget soap or toothpaste, she supplies it. Really great stay, as we booked last minute. Thanks, Natasha!

Natasha's place was quaint and cozy. Perfect for what I needed. The private entrance allowed me to come and go as needed.  My events kept me out very late and I didn't have to worry about disturbing anyone else; which was a relief.  The apartment was very clean and comfortable.  I felt right at home there. I also appreciated the breakfast items and water that was available upon arrival.  Natasha is an amazing host.
My husband and I enjoyed our stay at Natasha’s place. Cute and private space and loved the breakfast goodies. We would stat here again!
It's a really nice, cute, clean and comfortable apartment to stay after visit arround. We spent such a nice time there and we really appreciate everything. Thanks Natasha :)
The place was cozy and as described and Natasha did communicate with any questions I had. My only gripe about the place is how far away it was from the City. Overall, I had a pleasant stay.
Ok

Natasha is a great host, waiting for us on the steps outside after we had messaged her from the bus, and she provided us with a range of foodstuffs in the fridge so we didn't have to worry about supper, breakfast or lunch for the first night and day.
Lindo lugar, comodo, seguro y con buenos servicios. Natasha muy buena anfitriona, atenta a toda necesidad

Natasha’s place is very inviting & a great place for one or two people to stay. The place was spotless & easy to find. She was also very responsive during our stay! It is a bit far from the city, however it’s very easy to get an Uber or take the train in.
Natasha’s place was great and really had everything you could ask for. I forgot my jacket and she was kind enough to hold it for me until I had a chance to pick it up. Would stay again!

My stay here was amazing! I loved everything about the stay. It was clean, very pretty and i loved the tv. My partner and I was able to watch tv and cuddle up at the end of the night in a nice clean apartment.
Very nice place to hang your head for a night or 2. Quiet neighborhood and easy to find
Great clean studio with great amenities in a nice area! Good communication, super pleasant stay.

Natasha's place is a lovely home away from home. A peaceful residential area with shops nearby. she even stocked up the fridge so that I was not in want of anything for breakfast. I highly recommend this place.

Natasha’s place was as described. A great spot with everything needed for a 3-day adventure in Brooklyn. The only notes I would make is that street parking was not the easiest to find (we looked at 10p, 11p, and 7p — perhaps at other times it may be easier), and the water pressure in the shower was not great. Otherwise, Natasha’s place was clean and cozy. The communication was very fast, making our stay just awesome. Thank you!!
House was very clean, good kitchen, bed was very comfortable.
Great host will book again
Very clean and cozy. Ask about parking prior to booking.
This was a great place to stay, a little hard to find the place but we managed. Just as pictured.
Clean and comfortable stay. Loved the bar table. Easy check in
Natasha place was very cozy and clean  I highly recommend

Great cozy spot and perfect location for me
Lovely space. Overall great for the location and price
Great place comfy
The place was cozy and clean. I would definitely stay there again. Nice & quiet area.

name: Spacious Comtemporary 3BR Apartment
summary: Newly furnished three bedroom apartment in the heart of Park Slope, has all the basic amenities to make your stay comfortable. Only 5 minutes from the F & R train and the whole block is surrounded by amazing restaurants, bar scenes, grocery stores and cultural activities.
space: Kitchen is fully equipped with a four burner stove and an oven, refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave.  There is a separate dining area right across the kitchen. Bedroom 1 has a queen size bed with its own personal wardrobe closet. Bedroom 2 has a queen size bed and bedroom 3 has two twin beds.  Both of these two bedroom are connected by a door in between. Control your own heat/AC with a thermostat in the hallway. Portable cribs are provided upon request.
description: Newly furnished three bedroom apartment in the heart of Park Slope, has all the basic amenities to make your stay comfortable. Only 5 minutes from the F & R train and the whole block is surrounded by amazing restaurants, bar scenes, grocery stores and cultural activities. Kitchen is fully equipped with a four burner stove and an oven, refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave.  There is a separate dining area right across the kitchen. Bedroom 1 has a queen size bed with its own personal wardrobe closet. Bedroom 2 has a queen size bed and bedroom 3 has two twin beds.  Both of these two bedroom are connected by a door in between. Control your own heat/AC with a thermostat in the hallway. Portable cribs are provided upon request. Located on the second floor.  The front door is on the side of the building, one flight of private stairways leads you to the apartment. Guests will have access to wifi and smart TV. I am available through text messages or over the phone.Please contact me at least
transit: The apartment is only a 5 minute walk from the 4th ave and 9th street subway station which is about a 15 minute ride to Manhattan, plus there are plenty of Uber and taxis in the area.
access: Located on the second floor.  The front door is on the side of the building, one flight of private stairways leads you to the apartment. Guests will have access to wifi and smart TV.
interaction: I am available through text messages or over the phone.Please contact me at least an hour before your arrival and i will be present to hand the over the keys
house_rules: Please be respectful and courteous to your neighbor and the office down stairs. No smoking.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: The place was beautifully furnished and made me feel at home. Could fit a big family easily , so my son and I were spoiled with space. Everything was clean and working. The smart tv was a big plus. Lots of restaurants and pubs within walking distance. Would definitely stay here again !

The apartment was large and the host was accessible.  But here were the problems.  Shortly after we arrived, we discovered the toilet wasn't flushing properly.  Called the host and left apartment to go sightseeing.  He texted that it was fixed.  It was not .  Had to leave back cover off toilet and reach in to tank to push down flapper every time we needed to flush toilet.  Then that evening, we discovered that the street traffic was unbearably loud and that there was a bus stop right below the bedroom window.  Every time the bus stopped, we heard the hydraulics of the bus, the door open, then the passengers getting out talking loudly.  It was virtually impossible to sleep.   Sounded like bus stop was in our bedroom.  In the middle of the night we moved to the most interior bedroom, which helped slightly with the street noise, but the twin beds were small, with four inch mattresses, and no box springs.  Not really appropriate for two adults.  the middle bedroom was not an option as there were only sheets, no comforter, on the bed.  And again the double bed had no box spring  The wifi was only usable in one room.  We think because it must have been shared with the medical office on first floor.   The host cannot be faulted of all of these problems, but I think future airbnb clients should know that you cannot sleep in this apartment.  This experience was really disappointing, particularly in light of how expensive this listing was.  We could have stayed in a four star hotel for what we paid for this rental
The apartment is in a pleasant area in Park Slope and has everything you'd need for a group of people. I didn't spend much time at the apartment, but didn't run into any issues!

It's a fun and interesting neighbourhood, plus the flat has three large bedrooms, but the space lacks the character and sense of home that I associate with my best airbnb experiences. It's very much a commercial venture rather than renting someone's home.

That said the hosts were very professional.
There were a few issues with the apartment upon arrival but Saif was very responsive and remedied them. Good area, apartment is as it appears in the photos.
Saif was a great host. The neighborhood is awesome. We would definitely stay here again.

The reason for my negative review was the fact that there was a tray of crab legs and lobster shells left in the oven. As a result the entire apartment stank of fish and was quite gross. I emailed Saif about the issue and he apologized, but did nothing else. Otherwise the apartment was as described and the location is great, but the rotting fish in the oven left a literal and figurative bad taste in my mouth.

Saif's place is spacious, comfortable and in an ideal location - good food near, close to subways, beds are comfy, good for small family or a group of friends. The front of the apt can be noisy from goings on along 5th Ave- but if you're a sound sleeper it should be done, other 2 bdrms are more peaceful. He was a responsive communicator, and the apt was as advertised. We'd certainly consider staying there again.
Saif was very professional and took care of my out of state staff well. This apartment was a great find for our business trip.
How was nice and spacious.  Only drawback was the toilet e I uld not stop running, but we worked around that.
Our host was very accommodating and quick to respond to all of our questions.

Saif was great, let us check in early and was super relaxed and helpful about getting us in to shower after a 16 hour drive. 

The apartment was exactly as shown, beds comfy and everything was clean.
No
Nice clean and affordable. we appreciated Saif's helpfulness.
Great place and location! Easy to work with.
Great place. Spacious and clean. No problems with anything.
Saif's apartment was so cozy, felt like I was home. Really close to great food and not that far at all from the subway station. Definitely recommend!
Great place to stay! The location was perfect for a work/family trip. Very convenient with the subway so close by, tons of cafes and restaurants, grocery, laundry and a play ground all within 5 min!

We had a few issues upon arrival and contacted the host.  Listed as "family friendly", we were traveling with an infant. The stairs to the second floor are quite steep and getting a stroller up and down them daily is difficult. There is no where to store a stroller at the bottom of the stairs. A cot was provided, but it was broken, usable for a few nights, but we could not fix it.  The apartment was lacking an information binder/folder that would have been helpful in things like, how to work the television, coffee pot and check-out procedures. This would be a great place for those that enjoy later nights out as it is central to restaurants and bars and the space is large for a group up to 6.
A great location, near to the subway with a 20 minute ride to Manhattan.
Great location, we were able to walk everywhere. Good host!

Great place to stay! Beds are comfortable and rooms are very spacious. Very convenient location as far as the subway being so close making it super easy to get to Manhattan.
Saif was super helpful and quick to answer to any of our questions.
Saif was so responsive and accommodating to our flight delayed schedule and the location was super convenient for getting everywhere we wanted in Brooklyn and Manhattan!

This was a great place to have a group meet- much better than multiple hotel rooms. There was limited space for clothes.
I would also bring an eye mask as it was bright in the am.
Saif is super responsive and a great host.
Good place, close to the subway (25 minutes to manhattan).

Host was very responsive and helpful. Apartment is located 7 minutes walking from trains and close to many bars, restaurants and grocery stores. The space is large, clean and has everything needed. The only downside is building location in front of commercial avenue that might be quite noisy.
Overall the experience was positive for the great value!

Saif was very responsive and helpful. Check in was easy. The space has a lot of rooms with beds which is great for a large group stay. The location is perfect, close to nice restaurants and shops as well as walkable distance to Prospect Park.

The location of the place was great. Near to the subway and local restaurants. The neighborhood is great to take a walk and enjoy it at itself. Saif was a great host and his assistant Miguel help us with finish details too. The apartment has a great space and the beds are so comfortable. Any doubt Saif was always there to answers them. The check in and the check out was so easy. We really enjoy our stay. Thanks a lot!!

Really great place - nice and spacious. We were a group of 6 friends and it was perfect for us to explore the city. There is a subway line very close and some lovely bars and restaurants nearby - we loved Haab the Mexican place at the top of the street.

Host was fantastic - great communication - would recommend!
The location and neighborhood were great.  Everything was in order when we arrived. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

The location is perfect. It's 2 blocks away from the subway which takes you where ever you want in 20-30 minutes. We bought the MTA subway unlimited 7 day passes and it was the best investment. The apartment provided us enough room and everyone had their own bed. We had 2 kids in the twin beds bedroom, my sister in law in one room and my husband and me in the other. The apartment was clean, great mattresses, good pillows, extra bedding, extra pillows and extra towels. There is a laundromat across the street which was perfect for us. We came home with all clean clothes in our luggage. There is a grocery store right around the corner, plus CVS, McDonalds and other really good Mom/Pop restaurants. We felt safe in the neighborhood. We were out the door at 6am and home by midnight/2am and never felt afraid. Highly recommend and we will be back! Owners had excellent communication, they were super nice and asked if we needed anything.

Ruim en licht appartement. Gunstig gelegen t.o.v. Metro en in een straat met veel goede restaurants.
Wij bevelen dit verblijf van harte aan!

This was a great place that looked exactly as advertised online. We were happy to find it had air conditioning as it was very hot when we stayed. The sheets were so soft and the sleeping options worked well for our business trip. The location was excellent - it was truly easy to get anywhere and lots of places so close by. Our host was easy to communicate with and made it easy for us from start to finish.

Saif has a great safe location, near good restaurants and the B,D line. There is the usual traffic noise associated with the city. One bathroom was shared among 5 folks and it worked out well. Free Wifi

This is a very basic accomodation--good for a group of up to 6 (and a couch for a 7th) and easy to get to on that side of Brooklyn but a bit too noisy in the early mornings. Nice kitchen and shower, and roomy, and with a bit more spiffing up and effort by the owner, it will be a very nice place to do the city.
This place is geat. Very comfortable and clean.
Lovely apartment, great for 6 people. Good air conditioning. Easy and convenient.
Great location, lots of cafes, restaurants, etc. Short walk for subway, lots of cabs & ubers near by. Place is great, nice clean bright rooms
Good location. It takes only 30 mins get into Manhattan. Supermarkets and restaurants are nearby. It's good for family to stay.

The appartement was everything that we expected. It was very well located with plenty of restaurants and shops. It was so close to the subways just 2 streets away. 

The only thing that we misses was the toilet papper but we could buy it just downstairs. 

In general the appartment was ok and comfortable for a family with 2 kids, but some of beds should be replaced as they were old.

Good place to stay. The check in process was easy and Saif was very responsive. Couple of things to note-it was very noisy in one of the rooms facing the avenue and they could have supplied extra toilet paper (only one roll was provided and we had to go out and buy more)
Great stay!

We had a great stay. Travelled as a family with a toddler, and it totally served our needs. It was so helpful and convenient to have a crib provided upon request. Nice spacious rooms, and convenient location.

Saif's place worked out well for our family, who was visiting for the weekend.  Great to have space for 6 people and appreciated the extra sink in one of the bedrooms. The space was accurately represented and the reviews were also accurate. It does get a little noisy from traffics, sirens, etc. at night and in the early morning, but I think that's typical for the city and something that folks should be prepared for it they are staying in the area. Location was great and easy to access food, transportation, etc.  Saif responded to the feedback re: having more toilet paper available which was greatly appreciated.  Would have been nice to have an iron and toaster and soap in the shower but not expected.  Also could have used a few more hand towels given the max number of guests that could stay in the apartment.

Overall we had a great visit and I would recommend this place to others.

This apartment is in a great location, and was a good size for my family. Very convenient to subways, and in a great neighborhood. There was more street noise than we were prepared for - the building does not have good sound insulation. Saif was very responsive to my texts. We had an issue with the twin beds and she had someone come out the next day who took care of it. Easiest check in and check out of any place we've stayed.

Saif's place was an absolute delight! Our family of 6 stayed there for about a week and really enjoyed our time. The space is even nicer than the pictures provided and location is clutch. The subway station is a quick walk away and there are various lines that you can take into the city. The neighborhood is amazing! A true blend of historical Brooklyn and modern day Brooklyn. The area really caters to people of all ages and interest with its' variety. Great restaurants and coffee shops and a quick walk to prospect park. I'd definitely recommend staying at Saif's place!

The location is excellent because it is few blocks away from the 4th Ave and 9th street subway.  There are many stores and restaurants nearby. The apartment is very spacious for all of us. The kitchen and the bathroom are clean. The WiFi and the entertainment are great. The noise level from the main street is a bit high if you are a light sleeper.
This is a great place for the price. It was roomy enough for three adults and two kids.

We had a great stay in Park Slope and the apartment proved central to all the local amenities. It’s a great location and within easy reach of the Metro. It was really freezing whilst we were there, so having a warm base to come home to made the stay bearable. There is some noise from the streets, which is to expected given the central location. Highly recommended and Saif is very quick to respond.
Everything is as listed.  Would stay again.

The apartment is spacious and very clean with lots of natural light.  The 3 bedrooms easily fit my 3 kid.  Saif even had a baby cot ready for the baby.  Communication with Saif was a breeze, and 'check in' was seamless and easy.  Will definitely stay at Saif's place when I'm back in the city.
Great location! Close to all amenities and trains; easily accessible to the city.

The apartment was pretty much as stated, 3 bedrooms one bath but the one bedroom had an extra sink and mirror which was a nice advantage.  The apartment is in an older building so although it is dated, it is clean.  It is within walking distance to some really great restaurants delis and shops.  The price was very reasonable for the space and location.  There was not sufficient dishware to accommodate more than 3 to 4 people.  Several window blinds were not operable which could compromise privacy and several lights were out including the one right outside the apartment so when dark it was a challenge to unlock the door plus a little unnerving having that particular light out when alone.  If you are not used to the city noises, you may find sleep is difficult at night especially when the garbage crew is cleaning up.  Saif was very responsive throughout the entire process and stay even texting me back within minutes of a very late text (apologies for that)  regarding password for internet (inaccurate one given as to case sensitivity) so I could get some work completed.  Given the location, price and timely communication , this apartment is a good deal especially for friends traveling together or a family.
great location.  Saif is very responsive and nice.  The Apartment is a bit small and awkward sizing but fine for sleeping.

The location is ideal. However the setup is better suited for post college kids on a budget. The blinds on the windows are either too short or broken/crooked. The freezer on the refrigerator can’t open unless you tilt it away from the wall because it is jammed against the light switch. Even though it can sleep 6 there are only enough dishes for 3-4 people; same for the silverware. One of the kitchen chairs was missing screws making it dangerous - again only seats for 4. The toilet was “repaired” twice while we were there - only to have it stop flushing yet again. We had to use McDonald’s, Dunkin Donuts and a local bar to go to the bathroom. On the second day the downstairs office bathroom was available to us. To their credit the host refunded half the stay. Still overall - as experienced users of airbnb this was well below our expectations.

Excellent communication, very flexible with check-in when our flights were cancelled & travel plans changed.  Excellent location, very close to the F train, making travel in & out of Manhattan simple.  Grocery store right below the apartment was also very convenient.
Saif was a great host. The apartment was clean, comfortable and spacious. The location was ideal, cant wait to stay there again!
Great location with a friendly and responsive host. I would stay there again.
Saif’s apartment was perfect for the weekend. It is close to restaurants & bars, prospect park & mass transit. The place was nice & clean. Saif was very responsive to messages.

I had booked this Airbnb for my extended family as they were coming in town for my wedding in Gowanus. The location was so convenient and near everything you need. I had many questions and requests leading up to our stay and Saif was quick to respond and was flexible with my needs. Check in/out was a breeze and the place was spotless clean! I would highly recommend.

Globalement un très bon séjour.
Beaucoup de place dans l'appartement. Nous étions 4, mais on aurait pu être 6 (attention, pas de couverts pour tout le monde !).
Quelques efforts à faire sur la propreté, notamment vers les radiateurs qui sont d'un autre âge. La salle de bains serait à rafraîchir, et un peu plus de lumière ne ferait pas de mal.
Proche de stations de métro, notamment la ligne R. Mais comme le métro est régulièrement ralenti, avec des lignes parfois reprogrammées, voire fermées pour maintenance, cela peut rendre les trajets vers Manhattan très longs.
Penser aux boules quies pour diminuer le bruit de l'avenue.
Le propriétaire a grandement facilité notre arrivée et surtout notre départ pour la gestion des valises la dernière journée. Un gros plus.
Kitchen not properly equiped

Appartement bien situé (Metro, commerces, restau à proximité, quartier dynamique). Hôte très réactif et disponible. Appartement propre, seul bémol la salle de bain mériterait un petit rafraîchissement, elle est un peu petite pour 6 personnes. Sinon bon rapport qualité / prix
Good value & great location

Saif was available and responsive to our questions about her home and the area. The apartment was perfect and located so close to everything. We had a wonderful stay and would chose to stay here again in the future. The beds were all very comfortable and the apartment was relaxing. We ended up eating out for all of our meals but found the kitchen to be well equipped. It was an easy trip into Manhattan.

Nice apartment in a nice neighborhood, very close to the subway and to Prospect park.
Saif is always ready to answer to your requests.
I would definitely recommend this place!

Aunque no conocimos a Saif siempre estuvo en contacto y respondió rápido. La casa es como se ve en fotos, los cuartos son amplios, el living menos pero está bien para 4 personas (en los cuartos entran 6). Es un poco ruidoso porque las ventanas dan a la calle, especialmente en uno de los dormitorios, y en el otro el aire acondicionado hace un ruido un poco molesto.
en la cocina faltan elementos para poder cocinar (ollas, fuentes, etc)
El barrio es precioso, tranquilo, pero también con todo lo necesario (supermercado, farmacia, restautant y tiendas) a la vuelta.
Está muy cerca del metro (unas 3-4 cuadras) y de muchas líneas que te llevan directo a casi todos los sitios de interés (incluso en fin de semana que no funcionan todas las líneas). Pero es alejado y hay unos 40 minutos a time square.
Saif nos permitió hacer un late check out porque el avión salía a la noche. fue muy amable y estamos muy agradecidos.
Fun and convenient neighborhood. The apartment is close to subway access. Good place to use as a base for your New York trip ! Check in and out was easy.

Had a wonderful experience staying at Saif's place in Park Slope. The apartment was very cozy and nicely decorated. There were plenty of extra pillows, towels and blankets for all of us. The location is also perfect - plenty of shops, delis and restaurants within walking distance. Saif was very accommodating and always quick to respond with any questions I had. I would definitely recommend staying here. We had a great time!

Excellent apartment, with huge bedroom accommodation in a wonderful location,  very clean and well equipped, with, crucially for the hot spells, a brilliant aircon system! Easily sleeps 6 people, including 2 couples, or a couple with kids. My wife and our 3 kids and I had a very comfortable stay for 9 nights. Saif was very responsive to any queries we had and check in and check out were a breeze. The location is the real selling point though, located on the corner of 5th Avenue, 7th Street Brooklyn, 5 minutes walk from the 9th St subway where a 20 minute ride on the F or R trains will have you in Manhattan. Locally, the choice of shops, bars, restaurants, pizzerias and diners will have you totally spoiled for choice. A brilliant experience all round.
awesome place & great host
Great location and enough space for 4 adults and three small children. Saif responded quickly to all questions.
Great place in the middle of Park Slope, walking distance to trains, grocery, tons of restaurants. Very convenient and a great home base for a family trip with two small children.
Very spacious, clean, and great location! Would stay here again!

This apartment is located in a great area — a few blocks from Prospect Park and Grand Army station.  There are restaurants, grocery stores, and coffee shops right outside your door.  Offering three spacious bedrooms (mattresses are a bit soft, but I was able to sleep fine on them and I like a hard mattress), it is a terrific value.  Saif answers messages quickly.  Highly recommend!
Todo excelente! Ubicación muy cómoda y segura! Atención bárbara y departamento recomendable para 6 personas. Relación precio calidad excelente! Gracias por todo Saif!
Je recommande. Quartier sympa
这套房子在布鲁克林区第五大道上,地理位置极佳,出门逛街很方便,房子有一点老旧,但是好在地理位置好,房里的东西齐全,没有洗衣机烘干机,但是房子对面有一家洗衣店｡美中不足的是空调声音有点大｡
Spacious apt and great location for activities in Brooklyn. Easy checkin and responsive host. We would definitely stay here again!

Four night stay with two young children (ages 3 and below).  Great space, happening neighborhood, playgrounds nearby, and easy access to transportation and Manhattan.  Space was clean and ample pillows, linens, and towels were provided.  Three bedrooms with a total of 4 beds, which slept great.  Host was very responsive and apartment also had nice touches (e.g., coffeemaker with coffee and tea provided).

Location is great with plenty of restaurants and markets nearby. Saif is amazingly quick at replying and made the check in / check out easy for us. We had an issue with towels and bedsheets, but I'm sure that can be easily resolved.
I'm writing this review on behalf of my colleagues who stayed at Saif's apartment. The location was great but generally the apartment is run down, not clean, and not as advertised.
very good location. nice accomodation

The airbnb was as described and in a truly amazing location; everything you could possibly need is in walking distance. The downside is the place does not block out noise well so if you're a light sleeper this will be a problem. Due to the thin walls we heard full conversations of anyone passing by outside and every car sounded like it was driving inside of the apartment. Again, only a problem if you're a light sleeper. Lasty, I was disappointed with the lack of upkeep regarding the white sheets and pillow cases which were stained, the old dirty pillows and the dirty shower curtain. It was so bad I went and purchased a shower mat and a new curtain so that we could shower. Unfortunately,  not the best experience but it worked for the 5 days we were there.
Nice location. Expect to hear loud street actions. But, the apartment is mostly ok.

Great value for our group of six. Saif responded promptly to my questions. The apartment was less than a 10 minute walk to the subway. We wanted a place to sleep and shower and spend our days seeing the city.  The apartment fit our needs.  There is a fresh market just a couple doors down and many restaurants nearby.
L’emplacement est parfait à proximité de tout : parc, commerces et transports. Tout New York et l’aéroport sont à moins de une heure en métro.

This spot is in an excellent part of Park Slope- walking distance to SO MUCH! Plus, the bodega catty-corner across the street has awesome $2 breakfast sandwiches. Saif was super quick to respond and our stay was mostly painless (minus the construction noise, but that is literally any part of brooklyn you stay in and has nothing to do with the specific airbnb). The rooms are a great size and we were extremely comfortable. Cannot wait to be back.
Overall, a good value for what you get.  Nothing fancy, but adequate.  Being situated on a busy street, It was a bit noisy, but unbearably so.

This was a perfectly located and comfortable place to stay. Close to anything and everything you could need! 5 of us stayed there very comfortably, and the owner was very accommodating. Sparsely furnished in the bedrooms, but the beds were comfortable and the linens fresh and clean. Cozy little sitting area as well. Street noise can be loud, so bring ear plugs, but we lived saying there and would absolutely do so again

El alojamiento es tal y como se describe. Perfecto para 5-6 personas. Muy bien comunicado, tan solo a 10 min andando del metro, donde se puede coger la línea F que te lleva al centro en 20 minutos máximo. 
El barrio es muy agradable, merece la pena dar un paseo por él y descubrir los locales y establecimientos de alrededor. 
Saif ha sido un anfitrión estupendo, respondiendo en el momento a todas nuestras posibles dudas y estando pendiente tanto de nuestra llegada como que nuestra estancia fuese lo más agradable posible
This is an amazing space! Great location close to the subway and restaurants and shops. Clean apartment and responsive host
Great space and Saif was quick to respond. The bed linens were clean and super comfortable and soft.  A bit noisy but that is to be expected for the location
Appartamento ampio e comodo a pochi minuti dalle line R e F che portano a Manhattan.
Lots of beds in a convenient location.

We had a really solid time here! The location is great (easy access to several lines, AND it's within 2 blocks of multiple tasty places), parking was never too tricky to find on the streets, communication was very quick. There were just a few things a bit off (no extra toilet paper so we had to get some, some lights didn't work in the kitchen, multiple faucets had super loose controls including the shower's, etc) but overall the place was good and was a solid value and we enjoyed our stay

Saif is an amazing host, responds very quickly if you have any questions. His apartment is clean and specious. Very big apartment for big groups. Subway stations are in short distance. 15-20 mins to Manhattan. Lots of markets and restaurants are just steps away. I
Perfect place to stay in Brooklyn !
Wonderful place!! we loved it so much we came back a second time in a short space of time, happy to give it a second thumbs up!

This place was perfect! I used to live in NYC but not in this neighbourhood, it was so well located, we made it to all 5 boroughs with ease in a car, super handy traffic wise.  The place was bigger than I expected, and accommodated us well, great food places everywhere and the train close by.  Also only 3 blocks from a venue called The Bellhouse which had great shows and close to a wholefoods which was handy for the vegan who was traveling with us.  I read some of the reviews that complained about noise and I just have to note we didnt experience that at all, of course there was some (its NYC) but nothing out of the ordinary or what I would even call "main street traffic", it was a nice neighbourhood, safe and calm.
Great location. A few blocks from F train to Manhattan.

name: APTO NA BARRA DA TIJUCA RIO 2
summary: ESSE APTO FICA Muito próximo a praia da reserva  , PREÇO IMPERDÍVEL .Meu espaço é perto de  Supermercados, Rio 2 Shopping,shopping metropolitano .. Você vai amar meu espaço pelas vistas, a localização, o ambiente, as pessoas e a área externa. OBS: Será cobrado o valor do KWH (R$ 0,85800), da energia elétrica que será verificado  no medidor (relógio de energia elétrica) , na entrada e na saída para calcular o valor. neighborhood_overview: Lugar maravilhoso ,o condominio e lindo .Passear dentro do condominio ja e um belo passeio ! Porem ,querendo outros lugares e próximos da praia e shopping.
transit: Em frente a estação BRT e vários transportes publicos .

interaction: Estarei a disposiçao para ajuda-los.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Mere é uma ótima anfitriã!  Muito cordial e bem atenta ao detalhes para nos receber. Tudo limpo e organizado. Um apartamento muito bem planejado e aconchegante. Para família e ideal! A area de lazer completo para as criancas e perfeita! Ficamos muito bem acomodados! Estou super satisfeita! Obg Mere!

Mere es un persona muy amable y confiable. Quiero destacar al personal de seguridad y administrativo del Complejo Río2 dónde se encuentra el departamento.  
Quien alquile éste departamento, se sentirá cómodo, confortable y fundamentalmente seguro. Mi familia disfrutó del gimnasio, pileta y todas las comodidades del Complejo. Considero fundamental tener un auto para trasladarse a las playas, pues está un poco lejano de las mismas. Cocina muy completa y cómoda, duchas realmente envidiables. Da gusto bañarse en ellas. 
Faltaría bidematic en los inodoros pues en Brasil, increíblemente, no se usa bidé. Para los argentinos nos es fundamental.
Lindo apartamento, un poco alejado, amplio para 5 o 6 personas. Un centro muy cercano bien provisto.

No es Barra da Tijuca, es Jacarepagua, de lo cual es más lejos y todo es más contramano! La playa está a más de 9 kgs y el centro de rio 21 km. El departamento es amplio, pero le falta comodidades, así tambien como te cobran la luz (y es cara) los aires son viejos y consumen muchísimo y solo hay un pequeño ventilador. Tener en cuenta que si van, tener auto propio y pedir autorización para todo porque si no te vas enterando sobre la marcha y quizás pierdas días de disfrute (ej: gimnasio, bioindentificacion para todas las puertas, dos juegos de llaves, todos los canales en la tele).
Adoramos a estadia, tudo certo, o condomínio com ótima infraestrutura, apto bem arrumado, perfeito para família. Mere nos recebeu muito bem,  atenciosa em tudo!

name: Standing 3 rooms flat in Copacabana
summary: Beautiful 160 m2 "bourgeois" apartment with 3 rooms (including a suite), 3 bathrooms, a large dining room, a living room and a large kitchen. Ideally located in the heart of Copacabana, 100 meters from the famous beach. This accommodation is perfect for couples, business travelers, families (with children), large groups and pets.
space: There is a very special atmosphere in this "classic" apartment, whose the facade of the building is a real work of art. Note the presence of the "French alliance" (Alliance Française) in the building.
description: Beautiful 160 m2 "bourgeois" apartment with 3 rooms (including a suite), 3 bathrooms, a large dining room, a living room and a large kitchen. Ideally located in the heart of Copacabana, 100 meters from the famous beach. This accommodation is perfect for couples, business travelers, families (with children), large groups and pets. There is a very special atmosphere in this "classic" apartment, whose the facade of the building is a real work of art. Note the presence of the "French alliance" (Alliance Française) in the building. Guests will be able to enjoy the whole apartment. We live 5 minutes walking from the flat. So that you can easily contact us and we are always available when needed. The neighborhood is very family, secured but also very close to all night activities ... You can eat, drink, have fun, shop at any time of the day and night. Bus stops and subway are closed to the flat. A taxi station is 50 m away and you have the possibility to take private transports too. My husban

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: El departamento es muy espacioso e iluminado, los cuartos muy amplios y confortables, al igual que todas las dependencias. Las fotos se corresponden con lo ofrecido. Si bien no tuvimos contacto personal con Sylvie, tanto ella como la señora de la limpieza, siempre estuvieron atentas a cualquier requerimiento nuestro. Persona muy recomendable. Espero volver otra vez.
Hermoso y amplio departamento y ubicacion. Anfitriones muy atentos y bien predispuestos. Recomendado!

O apartamento é realmente maravilhoso, amplo e próximo de tudo o que precisamos! Camas e chuveiros confortáveis! Sylvie sempre disposta a responder minhas dúvidas! Quem nos recebeu foi Thierry, muito gentil e disposto a nos ajudar em tudo que foi necessário! Voltaríamos com certeza a alugar este apartamento!!

Lugar aprazível, ótimo pra família com filhos, com boas instalações de cama, mesa e banho. Ideal para passeio tranquilo com a família, com supermercados, padarias e demais comércios próximos. a Sylvie é atenciosa e presente toda a vez solicitada.
lo recomiendo
Local super bem localizado. Anfitrião super atencioso, tudo saiu melhor do que eu esperava. Voltaria sem dúvidas. Recomendo.
Recomendo ótimo imóvel supera qualquer expectativa,parabéns...voltarei no verão.
Muy buena ubicación confiables el departamento hermoso, cómodo, y muy acogedor
Excelente apartamento. Localização maravilhosa. Valeu cada minuto.
Lugar espetacular! Ótima escolha!! Tudo perfeito! Ap arejado , camas confortáveis; equipamentos completa! Superou todas as espectativas!! Lugar tranquilo portaria 24 h ! Tudo perto!!

O apartamento é confortável, com tudo funcionando. Fica muito bem localizado, entre o metrô e a praia. Não conhecemos os proprietários, mas o contato foi rápido, simples, e tudo estava em ordem. Ficamos muito contentes, com esperanças de voltar.

Très joli et spacieux appartement dans un immeuble d'exception dans un excellent quartier près de tout (transport en commun, magasins, restaurants, plage, hôpital, bref près de TOUT). Il y a tout pour le comfort (wifi, télé, machine à laver et plusieurs appareils domestiques dans la cuisine - seule là lave-vaisselle manquait). Sylvie est une hôte excellente qui répond vite aux mails et qui cherche toujours une solution en cas de problème. Nous nous sommes sentis comme chez nous et nous revenons volontiers la prochaine fois que nous allons à Rio!
Amplo, limpo e arejado.
Localização maravilhosa. Espaço aconchegante e confortável! Voltaremos, com certeza!

Simplesmente PERFEITO, muito obrigado Gil e Sylvie pela hospitalidade e nos ter cedido o apartamento para a nossa estadia, Local maravilhoso com tuuuuuudo perto, apartamento perfeito sem nenhum ponto de reclamação... Super recomendado... Voltaremooooss.... =D

Tivemos uma boa estadia na casa da Sylvie. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, além de ser muito espaçoso. 
Conta com uma decoração antiga, bonita.
Fomos muito bem respeitados em nossa privacidade.
Atento somente para o fato de que um dos quartos estava sem ventilador, pois o mesmo estava quebrado.
A apartamento é um excelente custo-benefício para estadia em família.

Ótimos em respostas rápidas.
Muito atenciosos.
Local espaçoso.
Sofás e camas confortáveis.

El departamento de Sylvie es mucho más grande de lo que se ve en las fotos. Muy confortable para una familia de 7-8 personas. La ubicación es ideall. A pasos de la playa de Copacabana y con restaurantes, supermercados, locales comerciales de todo tipo en los alrededores. Sylvie y su asistente Priscila fueron muy atentas en todo momento. Volvería de todas maneras!
Lugar amplo e muito bem situado. Nos sentimos seguros e com nossa privacidade respeitada. Sempre que que preciso fomos rapidamente atendidos.

A localização do apartamento é muito boa, muito espaçoso e bem decorado. Camas confortáveis, cozinha bem equipada. Nosso único problema foi com o WiFi, que só funcionou bem primeiro dia, nos demais não abria nem carregava nada.
Excelente apartamento.Muy comodo y espacioso.

O apartamento nos atendeu parcialmente. De fato é bem grande e espaçoso e a localização é excelente, próximo ao metrô e a uma quadra da praia. O conforto do apartamento não atendeu às nossas expectativas.  Sugerimos comprar talheres  e panelas novos, pois os talheres são muito antigos e até enferrujados. Sugerimos também colocar os talheres em um recipiente próprio e não jogados na gaveta. As panelas estão velhas, sem o teflon. Sugerimos trocá-las. Os ar condicionados anunciados não funcionam. Isso é grave pois comprometeu a qualidade do nosso sono. A iluminação dos quartos não é adequada, feita somente por abajures. Sugerimos incluir lâmpadas no teto.
A really nice place to stay with family or friends. Really Wells situated at 100meters of Copacabana beach and restaurants. Clean and well organised, there everything you need for your stay.

A beautiful, stylish and most of all spacious apartment with an ancient flair, very central in Copacabana. Everything you need in walking distance. Checkin and ckeckout on time and without difficulties. Sylvie gets back to all messages in a minute. Great experience and always felt very safe here. Thank you !!!!
Ótima localização, apartamento bem espaçoso

Ótimo apartamento e ótima localização. 
Um lugar muito bom para ficar em família. 
Ótima hospitalidade e comunicação com a Sylvie
Everything was perfect, thank you!
Posso so dizer MUITO OBRIGADO PRA TUDO. Tudo perfeito. Sylvie è uma host (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voterei.

L’appartement est conforme à la description. Notre séjour s’est très bien passé avec Sylvie et son appartement. Nous avons oublié un téléphone dans l’appartement et Sylvie nous a très bien aidé pour le récupérer. Personne de confiance que nous pouvons que recommander! Merci pour ce séjour !
O apto é grande e super aconchegante!

name: Chic 2BR in The Village by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the colorful decor, fully-equipped kitchen, and en suite laundry facilities. Located in Montreal’s The Village, you’re seconds away from the pedestrian stretch of Ste-Catherine Street and its summer attractions.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the colorful decor, fully-equipped kitchen, and en suite laundry facilities. Located in Montreal’s The Village, you’re seconds away from the pedestrian stretch of Ste-Catherine Street and its summer attractions. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. The Village is a vibrant hub of culture and LGBTQ history. The Village's main artery, Ste-Catherine Street, becomes pedestrian-only during the summer months between St-Hubert Street and De Lorimer Avenue, where dozens of restaurant and bar patios spill out under the pink plastic bubble strings that canopy the stretch. Take
neighborhood_overview: The Village is a vibrant hub of culture and LGBTQ history. The Village's main artery, Ste-Catherine Street, becomes pedestrian-only during the summer months between St-Hubert Street and De Lorimer Avenue, where dozens of restaurant and bar patios spill out under the pink plastic bubble strings that canopy the stretch. Take a walk North on Amherst to check out the sophisticated French pastry shop De Farine Et D'Eau Fraiche, or enjoy island vibes and rum cocktails at hip Haitian restaurant Agrikol. Don't miss out on karaoke any day of the week at Village mainstay Club Date Piano Bar, a show at famed drag bar Cabaret Mado, or basking in Les Jardins Gamelin park space where there's always something going on to stimulate the senses. Montreal is a diversity-friendly city and a center of LGBT+/ LGBTQIA+ life in Canada. The Village is a lively neighborhood, with delicious eats, lovely boutiques, summer street fairs, and exciting nightlife. The Village is within walking distance to La Fontaine
notes: This Sonder does not have cable, but with our Chromecast enabled television you can easily stream your favorite content or music through a phone, tablet, or laptop. This Sonder is a 3rd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: You're right beside the Beaudry metro station, making it easy to travel around Montreal.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.comments: This apartment was great for a group of 3 of us. The apartment was very clean and was nicely set up for our arrival with towels toiletries provided. The apartment overlooks the main street which is full of nightlife and restaurants. With the windows open it could be a  bit noisy, but when they are closed it was very quiet so it was not an issue! Having the metro so close made traveling the city very easy. The biggest challenge was parking, if you plan to have a car your only decent overnight options require you to walk quite a bit. Check - in was very easy I would recommend this apartment for friends or couples looking to enjoy the Gay Village and downtown Montreal.
great place, very comfortable and clean, and looks just like the photos.
Great stay! Apartment was perfect.
Excellent appartement. Très propre, très commode, très central, à 1min de l'arret de métro. Parfait.
Great location and lovely suite. If you have a car, the best place to park is under the Grand Bibliothèque.

Lovely condo, looks exactly like the pictures. We had a great stay. The Sonder team are great communicators. Would definitely stay there again.

Keep in mind it is on St. Catherine in The Village, so there is some street noise. Also, the listing doesn't include parking so be sure to make alternate arrangements as the lot Sonder suggested was unattended and difficult to get a hold of.
Great location! Very spacious and cute decor. Bars and restaurants steps away and central to tourist attractions. Would definitely stay again.

My family of 5 (3 teenage daughters) stayed here for our August vacation this year (2017). Great apartment located in the middle of the gay village. Very clean and organized with lots of small restaurants around. The metro stop is on the same block and made getting to the rest of the city very easy.  Great windows and lots of light and views of St. Catherine Street which is pedestrian only in the summer.  Lots of fun. 
There are two long sets of stairs up to get to the apartment so pack lightly.  Also the air conditioner had a hard time keeping the front bedroom cool.
Nice, modern apartment in the heart of the Gay Village. Great amenities and perfect for 2-4 people as the rooms were separated and had everything you need.
The host canceled this reservation 127 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Good value. The building entrance is a little sketchy but you will be pleasantly surprised with the apartment itself! Sonder was very responsive and addressed all of the (relatively minor) issues we had.
Bien situé et propre! Toutefois, malgré que l’air climatisée était fixée à son minimum (62 degré Fahrenheit), il faisait très chaud... seul désagrément...
Super airbnb!

Had an amazing mid semester break here at sonders! The host was very responsive and helpful with the few issues we had. Other than that I recommend this place! Very close to the night life and local attractions. Food was very close by, including  a 24 hr convince store and liquor store! The sonders was very clean and up to date. The kitchen was fully loaded making cooking fun!
the great spot
Great apartment, very well located and spacious.
This place is very well located, super clean and comfortable. It surpassed our expectations and we could enjoy Montreal!
Great place,bright. Would stay again
Good location with prompt responses from the team!

great location in middle of gay village where there are few hotels. Beaudry subway station one block away but currently closed for renovations until June 2019 (other stops a reasonable 7-8 block walk).  3rd floor unit faces St Catherine St and may be a little noisy for light sleepers (esp on weekends) but not a problem for me.  very roomy kitchen and main area, but bedrooms a little small.
