Near Avenida Atlântica, where the New Year's Eve and Carnival party takes place Near Pedra do Arpoador and several tourist attractions Wi-Fi // TV // Air Cond. // Netflix // Silent // 24h Doorman Near Beach, Bars, Restaurants, Market, Subway and souvenirs shops We are hosts with almost 400 excellent reviews from various guests ... Near Avenida Atlântica, where the New Year's Eve and Carnival party takes place Near Pedra do Arpoador and several tourist attractions Wi-Fi // TV // Air Cond. // Netflix // Silent // 24h Doorman Near Beach, Bars, Restaurants, Market, Subway and souvenirs shops We are hosts with almost 400 excellent reviews from various guests ... We expect that our guests have an amazing experience in our home, with full access to the living room and kitchen. In addition, we also have available for you: - TV in the living roo
neighborhood_overview: Ipanema is one of the most charming neighbourhoods of the Marvellous City and the Visconde de Pirajá Street is a walkway. The apartment is located between two squares, General Osório where on Sundays has the Hippie Fair, and the Nossa Senhora da Paz with a beautiful garden, several places to seat by the shade of trees, playground and a pond with fish, ducks and turtles.  We are located two blocks away from Ipanema beach - Posto 9, Arpoador Stone, Rodrigo de Freitas lagoon and many other things that can be done by foot. Near nightclubs, shops, supermarkets, excellent restaurants, theater, cinema, drugstores and banks.  In Farme de Amoedo street you can find: - Nectar - Bakery Santa Marta - Delirium Tap House - Yosuki - Koni Store - Beach Juice - Galitos Grill - Route 66 - Cafeína - Balada Mix - Opium - Vezpa - To Nem Aí
notes: Rio de Janeiro is a wonderful city and we can help you with some places to visit, in the city or other cities. In case you need, we can also help you with a pick-up service from the airport.
transit: The location is very convenient to visit the neighborhood or other parts of the city. Tourist Attractions around: - Ipanema Beach - Arpoador Beach - Arpoador Rock - Copacabana Beach - Copacabana Fortress - Twin Brothers - Rodrigo de Freitas Lake - Christ the redeemer - Sugar Loaf - Botanic Garden - Lapa - AquaRIO - Tomorrow’s museum - Santa Teresa and Selaron stair - Hang Glide meeting point There is a bike rental station right in front of the building. So, why not take a night tour by Copacabana beach? Your selfies will be amazing :)
access: We expect that our guests have an amazing experience in our home, with full access to the living room and kitchen. In addition, we also have available for you: - TV in the living room with Apple TV and Netflix - Nespresso coffee machine with coffee capsules - Tea bags - Beach umbrella - Thermal bag for you to take to the beach - Washing machine
interaction: We are available to provide you tips about the city and the neighborhood, like places to see, to go or to eat.  We do love to interact with our guests, so feel free to send me a message or call me.  We know some good bars and restaurants around... Let's go together! Enjoy Rio de Janeiro like a Carioca.
house_rules: Regras da Casa -	Não traga visitantes para o apartamento -	Tranque a porta sempre que entrar ou sair do apartamento -	Para ir e voltar da praia, use somente o elevador de serviço e sempre lave os pés antes -	Não fume e não use drogas dentro do apartamento -	Respeite o horário de silêncio após as 10:00 da noite -	Se cozinhar alguma coisa, favor deixar tudo em ordem -	Desligue a luz, ventilador e ar condicionado quando sair -	Não leve o endereço do apartamento escrito com você. Em caso de assalto, isso evita que saibam onde você está hospedado -	Não sente molhado na cama / sofá e cuidado com protetor solar e cremes nos lençóis -	Mantenha o apartamento limpo e organizado -	Não jogar papel no vaso sanitário #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #   House Rules -	Do not bring visitors to the apartment -	Lock the door when you leave or enter the apartment  -	When going, or returning from beach, always use the service elevator, and wash your feet to remove

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, seja bem-vindo! 

O Airbnb tem sido uma excelente experiência de vida para todos nós. Iniciamos em Junho de 2016 alugando um quartinho na nossa casa, e hoje administramos outras propriedades de amigos e vizinhos.

Amamos praia, viajar, cinema, leitura, conhecer diferentes culturas , fazer novos amigos e compartilhar experiências. Adoramos uma boa culinária, um bom vinho, boa música e filmes... Nós gostamos de ter a nossa casa cheia de alegria e amigos, acolhendo pessoas agradáveis, com boas vibrações, interessantes e honestas!

Teremos muito prazer em tê-lo como nosso convidado!

-----------------------

Hello and Welcome! 

Airbnb has been a great experience in our lives. We started in June/2016, renting a small bedroom at our house, and now we take care of friends and neighbours properties.

We love to go to the beach, travel, reading, experience different cultures, make new friends, share experiences and values. We love good food, good wine, good music and movies...

We like to have our house filled with joy and friends, welcoming nice people with good vibes, interesting and honest!

We look forward to have you as our guest! 

Be my guest and live like a  carioca!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Excelente estadia!!!
O Vitor e o Carlos foram muito atenciosos com a gente, nos deixando à vontade e ajudando com tudo o que foi preciso. Além disso o espaço é muito limpo, confortável e bem localizado. Recomendo a todos!

Todo fue excelente!!! Vítor y Carlos son muy buenas personas!! Nos sentimos como si estuviéramos en casa de nuestros amigos. La habitación era como se mostraba en las fotos. Todo muy limpio y ordenado. Son excelentes anfitriones!!!
muy recomendables!!! Esperamos pronto volver a Río y hospedarnos con ustedes.
Un abrazo!!

Everything was excellent!! Vitor y Carlos are very nice people!! We felt as if we were at our friends house. The room was exactly as shown in pictures. Everything was clean and tidy. They are everywhere hosts!!! We recommend them! We hope to come back to Rio and stay again with you!! Big hugs!

Excelente localização, ótimos anfitriões e enorme custo benefícios. Acredito que essas três características marcam a minha ultima estadia no RJ. Muito obrigado por colaborar com essa experiencia.

Obrigado!

infelizmente serei obrigado a admitir uma coisa.....mto chata...mais enfim....vai lah....qria vir embora naaaaaoooo....."minha nova casa em Ipanema eh simplismente THE BEST..." mto bakaninha mesmo...fiquei super a vontade....energia (Website hidden by Airbnb) senti realmente à vontade....mto gentis, prestativos, simpáticos e amigáveis, meus novos "parentes"...hehehehe....vlw D++++ Vitor e Carlos.....ah a Marileide (nossa companheira do Amazonas) (Website hidden by Airbnb) tenho a agradecer....bjus...!!!

Vitor and Carlos are outstanding super hosts (at the moment I am a super host myself, so I know what this means) with a charming and comfortable apartment in one of the safest and liveliest neighborhoods in Rio de Janeiro. I wouldn't hesitate a second to stay with these guys again!

Vitor's a great host, he was friendly and happy to show me round the area when i arrived - was nice to stay with  locals! The place is clean, comfortable and as in the photos. And the location was really just perfect if youre looking to stay in Ipanema. It's a couple of blocks from the beach with plenty of shops, cafes and restaurants nearby.

We couldn't have asked for better hosts! Carlos and Vitor are your best choice to stay in Ipanema! Their apartment is wonderful and close to the beach !
They supported us with loads of information. 
If I'd come to Rio again, I'd definitely stay here again !

Um lugar único. Vitor nos recebeu muuuuito bem. Ap espaçoso, arrumado e muito limpo. Super comunicativo, atencioso e prestativo. Eu já estou recomendando o lugar para outros amigos e pretendo a voltar a me hospedar com eles sem sombra de dúvidas. Além da localização do apartamento em uma das principais ruas de Ipanema. Foi incrível. Obrigada, foi tão bom que fico até meio sem jeito de agradecer, haha.
Até a próxima.

La llegada muy buena. La habitación limpia. Disponibilidad para hablar. Tuve incidentes y tomó decisión sin hablar conmigo inicialmente después dialogamos pero el resultado fue interrumpir mis vacaciones y buscar otro lugar. Todo ha sido comentado con él. Acción dura sin dialogar antes y considerar todo falta grave

Carlos e Vitor foram super gentis na nossa chegada e nos deram várias dicas sobre segurança nos arredores, passeios etc. Infelizmente não tivemos muito tempo para conversar sobre outras coisas (os dias foram bem corridos). A casa sempre esteve organizada, os demais visitantes muito educados e o ambiente sempre esteve tranquilo, exceto quando quebrei a maçaneta da porta do banheiro (da próxima vez façam um teste de destreza com os hóspedes, esse povo que nem eu não é de confiança! hahahah) e tive que acordá-los às 3 da manhã de um dia de semana. Ainda assim, fui prontamente atendida e Carlos, muito hábil, consertou em dois segundos. (Eternamente envergonhada por esse episódio, aimi sori hahahaha). De forma geral, tudo correu muito bem. Vale ressaltar que o quarto é muito bem cuidado e corresponde exatamente à foto. Eles oferecem toalhas de qualidade e bem limpinhas, bem como sabonetes novos e cotonetes no banheiro. A cama é bem confortável e os lençóis de ótima qualidade. Enfim, a experiência foi muito agradável, com um toque de doçura muiiito especial:  a anfitriã canina. QUE COISA MAIS LINDINHA! Educadinha, brincalhona e não late quase nada. Uma verdadeira lady! Foi ótimo! =**
Vitor and Carlos was really welcoming! The room is exactly as the photo is: very clean,  nice neighborhood if you like Ipanema, 5min from the beach! I strongly recommend it!

Vitor e Carlos nos recebeu com muito prazer muito mais do que eu esperava eles são otimos educados gentins maravilha a visinhança maravilhosa, localização tudo perto na rua se encontra tudo. Amei e super indico, o quarto é perfeito tudo bem arrumadinho ! Já to com saudades e quero votar.

Vitor was always very prompt in his responses via email well before our trip had begun! He always was rather enthusiastic about us coming, very welcoming. He made it very easy to communicate once we landed, between him and my fiancée Izadora, we were added to the group chat on " (Hidden by Airbnb) "! Upon our arrival, Vítor was awaiting us at the door (very helpful since it was already night fall). From that moment, he broke it all down from which key opens what door, where we could park our rental car, and to where we could wash off sand from the beach before entering the building. All easy and in sequence. Once we got to the apartment, we were greeted by Carlos, the other guests, and their senior puppy (very cute)! We felt right at home! After brief intros, we were shown to our room (just as it appeared in the photos, if not better)! I personally was very touched by the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) champagne flutes with a miniature bottle of champagne for two that sat along with the rest of our little toiletries and snacks! 
The purpose of our stay was to experience New Years in Rio so it was a great gesture of hospitality! 
He gave us the run down on the rest of the place, told us to be at home. 
We were given wonderful recommendations on places we could visit that may appeal, whether it be for food or sights. It seemed like Vítor and Carlos had an answer to our every question! 
Again, our primary objective was New Years, and as we scrambled to figure out what to do prior to visiting the beach, we were invited to spend the hours leading up to midnight, to hang out with our hosts and another great couple staying also, sipping cocktails and champagne and eating delicious fingerfoods prepared by Carlos! With about 45 minutes left of the night, we all strolled down the street to appear at one end of the Copacabana beach strip. It felt like an episode of "Friends". We were all together for the fireworks, photos were taken and toasts were made! Eventually our group split into 3 groups and separated. It just felt like a very homey experience as well as something completely new! 
The location is everything! We were staying for 2 weeks; so when not driving, it was very helpful to be in the heart of so much. Taxis and buses cruising always, metro station 2 blocks away, a parking garage a few businesses down, Ipanema Beach Just 3 blocks in one direction, Copacabana Beach about a 15 minute walk in another direction. Grocery stores, clothing stores, abundance of food and bars, you name it! You simply cannot go wrong here even if you tried.
Muy lindo departamento.  Hermosa ubicación y muy buena atención.
Ótimos tanto como pessoas quanto anfitriões. Amamos a estadia, o local e o melhor de tudo a localização. Planejamos voltar e ter mais tempo! Recomendo a todos. E muito obrigado
Appart trfès sympa, Vitor et Crlos sont d'excellents hôtes. La localisation est superbe, près de la plage d'Ipanema.

Vitor's apartment is neat, clean and organized. He is INCREDIBLY attentive as a host, always helping us with directions and what to do in the city. He even has a (Hidden by Airbnb) group where everyone that is currently in the house is into. Really nice to get to know everyone. He is also very flexible with check-in and out; which was really helpful for us because our flight arrived really early. Also, the location is PERFECT! So close to the Ipanema beach and it's such a safe place. I felt safe all the time walking on the streets. I strongly recommend him.
Todo bien, el anfitrión muy amable. Habitación cómoda y limpia. Cerca de la playa

Achei um espaço interessante, com localização excelente, um lugar tranquilo e acolhedor. Tranquilo, apesar de ficar em uma rua movimentada. Acolhedor porque cada hóspede faz suas escolhas e, mesmo estando os três quartos ocupados, além daquele dos donos da casa, não parecia que a casa fosse assim habitada. Correu tudo muito bem. Limpeza ótima e aquela cordialidade que oferece o apoio necessário.

Foi ótimo esses 6 dias no Rio de Janeiro. Ótima localização do apartamento, tudo muito bem organizado e limpo. E o Vitor e o Carlos muito atenciosos com gente, nos deram várias dicas. Super indico a todos! Obrigada, foi demais! :)
Vitor and Carlos have a great setup in Ipanema and were super communicative and helpful. Fantastic value!
Ótima experiência! A localização é perfeita.

Muy buena ubicacion en el centro de ipanes...todos los servicios y la playa cerca. La habitacion muy comoda y con aire acondicionado q se agradece con esas temperaturas. Vitor y CArlos muy amables. Repetiria sin pensarlo

Excelente local, excelente recepeçao
Me senti em casa
Tudo perfeito
Recomendo e voltarei mais vezes
Más que recomendable. Excelente atención y hermoso lugar
Muy buena experiencia. Siempre estuvieron atentos y guiándonos por la mejor alternativa para conocer mejor Rio. Estamos agradecidos.

I stayed with Vitor for two weeks and it was fantastic! Everything was perfect and there are so many areas I can praise, but these are just a few: I was *really* made to feel welcome; Vitor and his partner are so lovely I really want to keep in touch as friends; everything was so clean and fresh; the communication before and during was excellent - particularly the (Hidden by Airbnb) group; the location is amazing - two blocks away from Ipanema beach!; it was so incredibly useful to be able to use the fridge & washing machine; it was very good value for money etc. If ever I get a chance to go back to Rio, I will *definitely* stay with Vitor :)
Muchas gracias por todo Vitor y Carlos! Son muy cálidos, respetuosos y hospitalarios. Su apto es muy lindo, cómodo y limpio. Felicitaciones! :)
Vitor was very helpful and always willing to help me to have the best stay in Rio

The apartment was clean and comfortable and Vitor was great with tips about local events.  Traffic noise was a minor detraction but to be expected at such a great central location.  Very happy to recommend
Muy bien ubicado, limpio, seguro, amplio y cómodo. Vítor muy servicial.

Vitor is a great host, very friendly and communication was great!. His house is really convenient, very clean and has an excellent location, close to everything (beach, metro, restaurants, bras, metro station). I definitely recommend Vitor's apartment!! Muito Obrigado!!! :D
Wonderful apartment near the beach. Cozy bedroom and his dog was so cute. Totally sure that next time in Rio, I'll stay there. Thank so much for everything. Derek and Miro
Super Lugar. Super Sympatico. Ademas me ayudo para un cambio de ticket para el tren del Corcovado.

Awesome place. The apartment is in the best neighborhood in Rio. Unit was Clean, safe and comfortable. 
I would love to stay at Victor's again!!
Definitely a super host!!
O espaço é muito bem localizado, próximo a praticamente tudo em Ipanema, foram muito hospitaleiros e receptivos, boa higiene no local, em resumo exatamente como esperava.
Muy bueno todo. El piso muy limpio y bien ubicado. Vitor fue muy flexible con el horario de llegada (gracias!)
très bon accueil et  très bien localisé

Víctor y carlos fueron excelentes, siempre atentos y muy dispuestos a ayudar en lo que necesitamos.
El cuarto y el apartamento son tal cual se ven en las fotos , nuestra estadía fue excelente . Gracias!!

From the first moment the contact with Vitor was very good. He was very responsive and tried to make sure  everything was well arranged before my arrival and helped me getting to his apartment. During my stay he provided some useful tips as well.
The apartment itself is located in the main street of Ipanema and is very close to the beach. The room was clean and had an air conditioner. I would definitely recommend staying at Vitor's apartment as he charges a fair price for a great Rio experience!

Vitor is a great host! He's answering very quickly to questions you might have, he's very attentive and a lovely person. In your room you will find an umbrella for the beach, candies, earplugs and sleeping mask. 
The location of the apartment is perfectly located in Ipanema, close to restaurants, metro station, beach, lagoon and shops. The wifi was also very good working and they have a washing machine in the apartment. The apartment was very clean and the kitchen is very well equipped. Only thing is that if you have the window opened, you can hear the noise from the street, but for that you can use the earplugs and I guess in summer time you anyway would keep the window closed and use the aircon. We would definitely stay here again!

I stayed 9 days in Rio at Vitor and Carlos apartment. I was staying with a friend of my that lived outside of Rio . Our stay was amazing . Both hosts were very helpful and friendly . Apartment very well located and extremely clean . I wouldn't hesitate to stay again when in Rio . Thanks for being so fabulous. I'm sure that Lalica misses me a little

You will love Vitor's place and location for the price.  2-3 blocks from famous Ipanema beach.. this is a gem that I wish we could keep secret.  Vitor is 5 star in communication with client concerns ( I ask about a issue.. he's there in 5 minutes or less).  I asked about a special guide who could share with me knowledge of yoga studios, massages, and overall Brazilian culture and he was able to suggest to me a local Airbnb host who could point me in those directions.  Airbnb is a marvel of travel opportunity.. discovery of real places, real people, and positive world peace experiences.  Go to Brazil and rent a place at Vitor's and save enough money so you can paraglide off a cliff (one of the many activities Rio has to offer).

O apartamento fica no melhor local da cidade, tem tudo perto e o Vitor é sempre muito solicito e disposto a auxiliar. A cama é confortável, tem lençóis de boa qualidade, estava tudo bem cheirosinho. O banheiro é muito limpo e os tapetes foram trocados diariamente em todo o período em que estivemos lá. O Vitor tem uma habilidade incrível de lidar com situações que demandam paciência. Teve uma paciência imensa comigo, desde o instante em que fiz a reserva. 
Fui recebida com muitos sorrisos, conversa amistosa, o que nos deixou muito a vontade como se estivéssemos na casa de um conhecido de longa data. Já no primeiro dia, nos recebeu com brigadeiros embrulhadinhos e decorados feito por ele, um mimo! Espero poder contar com a hospitalidade do Vitor muitas outras vezes!!
Recomendo com louvor!

Vitor foi extremamente atencioso e comunicativo durante toda minha estadia. O apartamento tem uma localização excelente, o quarto estava bem organizado e houve flexibilidade tanto no check-in quanto no (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza será uma opção nas minhas próximas idas ao Rio. :)
Minha segunda vez com os meninos! Adoro cada vez mais!!!
Muy buena ubicación a pocas cuadras de Ipanema. La zona cuenta con todos los servicios y muy bien comunicado.

Vitor e Carlos me receberam super bem, sempre disponíveis para tirar qualquer dúvida. O apartamento é muito confortável, o quarto também, tudo bem limpinho e organizado, a localização é ótima, próximo a restaurantes, cafés, mercado e transporte (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza retornarei em outra oportunidade.
O apartamento é top!!!
We had an excellent stay with Vitor and Carlos and give the best recommendations. They were very kind and helpful and made us feel at home.
Ce logement est conforme à sa description. Viktor est très accueillant et à l'écoute ; toujours prêt à rendre service.
Localização ótima. Apartamento limpo, bem arrumado. Os meninos são super atenciosos. Adorei ficar hospedado. Local muito confortável.
Great place. Great Host.

Vitor's place is the perfect home base for visiting Rio! This is truly a gem listing - the location is perfect (two blocks from Ipanema beach and in the middle of many great restaurants, shopping, and tourist activities) and the apartment is comfortable and surprisingly spacious. The room itself is also very comfortable and has a lot of great touches such as a phone charger, snacks, umbrella, and of course a selfie stick - Vitor thought of everything :)  

Vitor and Carlos were incredibly communicative and helpful throughout the process. They answered any questions I had throughout our stay and even let us stay quite late the day we were checked out so we could sneak in some more beach time before our flight. I highly recommend!

Vitor's place is a room in a shared apartment in a very centrally located building in Ipanema. It's very accessible and functional. It's not fancy and there are other roommates around, but Vitor is *extremely* responsive, reliable and accessible. He can answer any and all questions and he's very thorough!

Great location, clean place, host very helpful for suggestions. 
thank you

Todo lo que se ve en las fotos es verdad, los anfitriones son muy simpáticos y amables, dispuestos a ayudarte siempre. La ubicación excelente y el departamento precioso y hecho para recibir a los huéspedes. 100% recomendado.
We had a perfect stay in Ipanema. The apartment is very well located and close to public transit. Vitor helped a lot with a very smooth communication and was very welcoming.

My husband and I needed a place to stay for the day before our 9pm flight.  The room was perfect for us to relax a bit and shower.  I loved that the room had tons of small details like a piece of fruit, eye masks for sleeping, ear plugs just in case, a package of nuts, etc.  Vitor was very professional and let us check in early and was in constant communication for us to check out even when he was not home.

Vitor and Carlos were amazing hosts. The room and bathroom were clean and we really appreciated getting our rooms cleaned mid stay. The location was perfect, just a few blocks from Ipanema beach and around the vicinity you will find everything you need. I would stay with them again if I come back to Rio.
El departamento es muy central y ellos muy amables. Eso si la habitacion era muy ruidosa.

Anfitriões melhores, impossível.. Vitor e Carlos são ótimos, a limpeza do apartamento impecável, graças a Vanessa que é um amorzinho de pessoa tbm. Localização?? Melhor impossível. O partamente é ótimo, não tenho nada de negativo pra falar, voltei COM CERTEZA!
Ambos foram muito atenciosos e solícitos. Isso, certamente, faz a diferença na hora de contar com um serviço de hospedagem.
Super recomendo!!! Vítor & Carlos são mega simpáticos e ótimos anfitriões, o apartamento é ótimo, perto de tudo, fácil acesso. Vale a pena alugar!!
Muito bem localizado, os anfitriões muito discretos, quarto espaçoso e limpo!
Os anfitriões sao super simpáticos e atenciosos. A localização é muito boa.

Vitor e Carlos são muito simpáticos e nos ajudaram e nos sentir em casa. Deram dicas de onde passear, nos receberam em horário um pouco mais tarde que o previsto, com muito bom humor e atenção. Muito recomendado! Parabéns!

Carlos y Vitor son amables. Saben dar consejos para el viaje. La ubicacion es genial. La zona es segura. Si bien la habitacion da a la calle principal y es ruidosa, no impide descansar en la comoda cama. Ademas al llegar, Vitor y Carlos te regalan tapones para los oidos. La casa es tranquila y todos alli muy respetuosos. Lilica, su perrita, es simpatica, juguetona y respetuosa como sus duenos. Es muy recomendable pasar unos dias con estos anfitriones!
Lugar excelente, perto de tudo, tranquilo e super confortável. Recomendo.
Espaço excelente! Super recomendo! Extremamente atentos aos detalhes do início ao final da estadia.

Vitor and Carlos are great guests. They are both very nice and ready to give you tips about the neighborhood. Two minutes walk to the lovely Ipanema beach. Go to Rio and stay with the, you will NOT regret it!

I stayed two nights at Vitor and Carlos's lovely flat in Ipanema. The flat is really well located just back from the beach and in a great neighbourhood with loads of restaurants and bars. Starbucks is literally downstairs if caffeine is your thing! Communication was great and check in and out was a breeze. Thanks guys for making my stay so easy!

El departamento está increíble y muy seguro, en una de las mejores zonas de ipanema, a poca distancia del metro y de la playa, cerca de muchos bares y restaurantes así como de tiendas súper nice, Vitor y Carlos tienen una vibra increíble, muy atentos y expertos para darte tips para darla vuelta en la ciudad, muy dispuestos a ayudarte siempre, ame mi estancia con ellos, se los recomiendo mucho.
Vitor & Carlos are natural hosts. The room is very cozy and they are very caring with guests. And the location is literally 2 minutes from the beach. Excellent!

El departamento está en una excelente zona de Ipanema, muy cerca de la playa, se puede caminar a pie sin ningún problema!! Las Fotos son reales, el departamento muy lindo y limpio!!! Lo mejor es la hospitalidad de Vitor y Carlos, me ayudaron mucho durante mi estadía en su hogar, lo que hizo que me sintiera en casa!!! Recomendado este lugar!!!

Victor ve Carlos çok misafirperver ve yardımsever insanlar . Onlarla konaklamak rahat ve güvenli . Her zaman yardıma hazırlar .Evin konumu çok iyiydi . Konukların rahat edebilmesi için herşeyi düşünmüşler . Teşekkürler çocuklar .sizi tanımak zevkti ..

Exceptionally well appointed bedroom and the home itself!  Vitor and Carlos are one of the most amazing hosts I've ever met.  They are very welcoming, respectful of everyone's privacy, very professional in dealing with people!  I've had so much fun and enjoyed my stay in their home and fully enjoyed my trip this time Rio de Janeiro because of the Vitor and Carlos place. I was so lucky I chose their place among the many in Ipanema area. Their communication to their guest are warm and cordial, they have welcoming presence; add on amenities like welcome sweet treats, umbrella, phone charges, bath soap, shower stuff etc are available - a sign of very thoughtful and professional hosts! The location is just perfect:  two blocks from the beach, shops/stores, restaurants, bars all walking distance, two equidistant Metro! 24-hour security guard to let you in the building, and you have your own key to your room. Their place is super clean, a cleaner came in to clean up my room on the 4th day of my 7-night stay - that was well appreciated!  I will definitely stay in their place again if the situation arises and if I given a chance and will definitely recommend this to my family and friends. Thank you so much Vitor and Carlos!

Vitor & Carlos are the best hosts I have ever had the privilege of staying with. Their hospitality is of the highest quality and they go out of their way to make you feel as comfortable as possible. They provide great tips on what to do and see in and around the city, I even had dinner and drinks with them a few times and will gladly stay with them again when I return to Rio! Their apartment is ideally located in Ipanema, just steps away from the beach, restaurants, bars etc. What are you waiting for? Go ahead book these guys!
Staying with Vitor and Carlos was terrific. They were warm and welcoming and their apartment was cozy - it's also so well located. I'd highly recommend!
Lovely, simple room with an unbeatable location. Vitor was friendly, helpful and warm, and a seasoned airbnb hand -- everything ran very smoothly.
Super bem localizado e muito limpo e organizado. Anfitriões muito atenciosos.

Estamos muy agradecidas con mi compañera por la hospitalidad, los detalles, la seguridad y constante atención de Vitor y Carlos.
El lugar es maravilloso, ubicado a dos cuadras de Ipanema, MUY seguro.
Vitor nos facilitó una tarjeta para el transporte público y un internet móvil que nos ayudó muchísimo, cada vez que necesitamos algún dato ellos nos ayudaron.
Estamos felices y muy agradecidas, nos sentimos como en casa, y ¡queremos volver pronto!
Simplemente EXCELENTES!

Excellent!
Best Airbnb I’ve stayed at. Vítor and Carlos are very friendly and easy-going. Their place is in a beautiful spot in Rio. It’s near public transport, the beach, the lagoon, Copacabana, lots of bars and restaurants. 
On the top of that, they provide amenities that most Airbnb’s don’t - very handy.
I arrived in Rio early morning and could check in as soon as I got to their place. 
The photos are very accurate, you don’t have to worry. Highly recommend.

Vítor and Carlos are great hosts, the apartment is clean and bright, love the amenities, and not to mention the location, 2 blocks from the beach, restaurants, pharmacy and stores nearby. I’m definitely coming back soon.

El departamento es increíble, tal como se ve en la foto. La ubicación es inmejorable, a dos cuadras de la playa, del supermercado y del transporte público. Está ubicado en una zona ideal de bares, restaurantes y tiendas de ropa, en donde el ruido ambiente jamás nos molestó ya que toda actividad termina temprano. Nuestros huéspedes fueron amorosos, brindando recomendaciones y una atención muy cálida a toda hora. Recomendamos 100% este hospedaje! Volveremos pronto!
El departamento esta muy cerca de la playa y el metro. Tambien tiene farmacia y supermercado cerca. Ademas victor y carlos muy amables. Recomiendo el lugar.
Tanto Carlos cómo Vitor son excelentes. Amistosos, nos hicieron sentir muy cómodos. Su perrita es muy juguetona y bien educada.

Vitor y Carlos son unas personas increíbles. El departamento es precioso, la ubicación es inmejorable y cuenta con todo lo necesario para que te sientas cómodo, desde la cerradura electrónica hasta el filtro de agua y el café.  No tengo dudas que cuando vuelva a Río este alojamiento será mi primera opción.Muchas gracias chicos, hasta la próxima!

The bedroom is very cozy with lots of cute and practical amenities. Vitor and Carlos are very friendly and cleaned our room so we could arrive before check in time due to our early flight arrival - which was very appreciated!! Their little poodle is the cutest. Location is perfect although some noise from the traffic. But we didn't really mind since the beach was so close and there were restaurants, stores and supermarkets open until midnight. Thank you guys!!! :)

Buenísima ubicación a 2 cuadras de la playa y al lado de todo el comercio que se necesita, restaurantes, farmacia, supermercados, bancos, cafeterías y lo que puedas imaginar está dentro de la manzana... 
El departamento es cómodo, limpio y seguro! 
Los chicos son muy amables y están dispuestos a ayudar en lo que necesites! 
Un 7 para ellos!
Location is key: 2 blocks from Ipanema beach and 2 blocks to metro stations. Great amenities in terms of personal soap, towels etc and plenty of local tips. Check-in and out was very understanding.

Vitor y Carlos se comportaron excelente con nosotros, siempre predispuestos y atentos en los detalles para hacernos sentir bien. Son amables y serviciales, nos brindaron información de la ciudad, lugares que visitar, donde comer. Además nos prepararon un postre típico de Rio que estaba muy bueno (muchas gracias). Lilica, la perrita, se portó muy bien!!! En cuanto a la ubicación, es inmejorable!! Se encuentra en una avenida principal y a penas a dos cuadras de la playa. El departamento es impecable, tal cual se ve en las fotos, siempre ordenado y limpio. Sin duda volveríamos a hospedarnos allí para una próxima visita a Rio! Muchas gracias por todo Vitor y Carlos, ya saben cuando visiten Córdoba, nos contactan J. Hasta pronto, Flor y Jorge.

Ich habe die Zeit bei Vitor und Carlos wirklich genossen. Die Wohnung war super ausgestattet, wurde regelmäßig gereinigt, hatte eine super Lage und gab einem das Gefühl zuhause zu sein. Vitor und Carlos sind sehr zuvorkommend und hilfsbereit, geben gerne Tipps und sind sehr freundlich. Ich kann diese Unterkunft nur empfehlen und werde definitiv wiederkommen.

O apartamento é extremamente limpo, organizado e lindo com uma localização privilegiada no coração de Ipanema. Muitos bares e restaurantes próximos e menos de 5 minutos a pé da praia. Ficamos em um quarto de casal com uma tamanho maravilhoso e desde a recepção já adoramos; tinha frutinhas e snacks no quarto à nossa espera. Vítor e Carlos são super fofos e nos deram ótimas dicas de passeio. Super recomendamos e esperamos voltar em breve! ❤️

I had the pleasure of staying at Vittor and Carlos’s space. I chose this spot because they are superhosts and it was my first time in Rio. I didn’t want to be alone in the  big city. It was the right choice. Carlos doesn’t speak English so I mostly communicated with Vittor and he is lovely, caring and super helpful. The room is super comfortable and the apartment is in the heart of Ipanema which is an awesome area to have as a home base. The bedroom is located right on the street which I loved because I felt like I was part of the action. It was also kind of cool to interact with other guests, through Vittor our unofficial translator. I would definitely recommend this place especially if you are not familiar with Rio and because they are such nice people to stay with.

Vitor & Carlos's place was a great stay and are excellent hosts.  I have come to Rio many times and this is the place to stay.  The location and price cannot be beat.  You are in a safe neighborhood with close access to the beach, metro, grocery stores, and restaurants.  They will even give you tips on where & how to visit the landmarks of Rio.  In addition to being clean the apartment security system for entering and leaving is what impressed me the most.  Once again great times and hope to stay within a few months.

Vitor & Carlos are absolutely amazing! I got a lot of detailed suggestions for things to do and places to visit from them, depending on weather, timing, how much time I had, etc. They really know how to help guests have a great time during their stay. I would definitely recommend their place. Thank you again so much for your hospitality and help. I can't wait to go back to Rio!

Vitor y Carlos son amables y hospitalarios. El lugar es tal cual como se describe. Esta cerca a muchos lugares útiles como estación de metro, buses, supermercados y playa. Así que sin dudarlo y si necesitan quedarse por Ipanema este lugar es genial. :)

Apartamento com ótima estrutura, excelente localização , muito limpo e organizado. Os anfitriões estão sempre dispostos a tirar dúvidas , sugerir locais para passeios . Muito educados e atenciosos! Voltaremos com certeza!

Amazing experience! Their house is located right in the center of Ipanema just a few minutes away from the beaches, restaurants and supermarket! Vitor and Carlos are so kind and friendly along with their hungry and playful dog! I have become friends with them because they are just so nice to us! Thank you for everything and we hope to see you again in the future! Muito obrigado!!

What an amazing space! The location is very central in Ipanema. The room and the entire house was perfectly clean, with nice touches from the host such as eyeshade and ear plugs. The wifi was just perfect. Most of all, they are very friendly, genuine people and absolute pros at accomodation. Highly recommended.

I stayed 3 weeks with Vitor and Carlos, I got the time to know them and they were always very open for a talk. I really much enjoyed my time with them and I hope to be able to stay at their place again in the futur !

Recomiendo alojarse con Vitor y Carlos. Ellos son muy hospitalarios y muy amables. Están siempre dispuestos a evacuar cualquier duda. Respecto a su casa, inmejorable! Están en cada detalle. La ubicación es muy buena (sobre la avenida principal de Ipanema y a una cuadra de la playa). Todo impecable!
Sensacional, localizacao mto boa, apto mto limpo e fomos muito bem recepcionados. Recomendo fortemente
Me recepcionaram super bem, recomendo pra quem quiser passar uns dias no Rio, lugar agradável, anfitriões super atencioso.

Alles hat unserem Wunsch entsprochen. Wir hatten ein Doppelbettzimmer. Das einzige Problem war nur doch schon ziemlich laute Hauptstraße. Aber im Zimmer lagen auch die Ohrstöpseln. 

Alles in einem ein sehr guter Aufenthaltsort.

This place was terrible. They were extremely rude to my guests. We came in at two different times and it was a huge problem. They threw away all my belongings in the bathroom and it was a terribly unpleasant experience. Also there is a dog that they allow in the home that will continuously come into your room and bathroom. It says private room but no privacy at all.

A casa do Vitor e Carlos foi uma excelente escolha. Essa foi a segunda vez que ficamos lá e mais uma vez fomos muito bem recebidos.
O quarto estava limpo e organizado, tinha bastante espaço para malas e a cama era muito confortável. Ar condicionado excelente!
Banheiro e áreas comuns sempre limpos.

Para quem gosta de praia ficará feliz em saber que são só dois quarteirões até uma das melhores praias do RJ. Além disso, nos emprestaram guarda sol para curtir o dia. Também está muito perto dos pontos turísticos, podendo ir de bicicleta, Uber, ônibus, metrô, não faltam opções.

Adoramos ficar na casa deles porque sempre nos recebem muito bem, dão ótimas dicas e estão disponíveis para nos ajudar.

obrigado pela estadia, voltaremos!

Vítor & Carlos were very pleasant hosts. While we were in a shared apartment in one of the rooms available to stay, it didn’t feel crowded. Their place was clean and inviting. It is in the PERFECT location, in one of the hip areas in Rio, with a 3-5 minute walk to the beach. It was so convenient! Ipanema is the perfect mix of a residential and commercial neighborhood - stores around in case you want to buy a shirt, medicine or need to take out cash. There are several food options in the area as well, which was great for breakfast and late night açaí snack.  Our room was facing the Main Street, which we really liked. It can get noisy but the noise dies down and you’re able to sleep. I would recommend staying here if you’re looking for a great area and a clean space!
Excelentes anfitriones. Un departamento más que impecable y bien ubicado. Sin dudas, el próximo viaje a Río volveríamos allí.
Probably the best Airbnb in Brazil ;)

I stayed with Vitor & Carlos for 10 days and couldn’t stayed another month. They are great hosts. They went out of there way to assist me. The apartment is well equipped and I enjoyed the interaction with other guest. Nothing can beat the location of the apartment with the beach and everything you need right on your doorstep. Thanks Vitor & Carlos!
Inmejorable todo. Ubicación, calidad, limpieza, recomendaciones y mejor calidad humana. Host de primera calidad, de lo mejor que se puede encontrar en RJ. No hay dudas de que son recomendables 100%.

Fantastic hosts. Wonderful stay with Carlos and Vítor. Everything was so stress-free and pleasant. Particularly appreciated were the thoughtful touches - a parasol for use in the room, an umbrella, an array of Brazilian treats to taste, soap with a soap case, earplugs. Carlos and Victor were very friendly and helpful.

Really the best location at vitor & carlos! Very, very helpful & kind guys.. Bar, Restaurants everything around the corner. At check-in, more than welcomed of both, vitor immediately gave me every informations i needed to check the city! Doggy is super cute and does not bother anyone :) <3 ..Apartment very clean & you got everything you need, don't need to worry about anything! More than perfect stay *thumbsup

After reading all the great reviews about this place we weren't let down. Vitor and Carlos are great hosts - very welcoming and friendly. When we arrived they gave us a great breakdown of the area and how to get around and get to places etc.

The flat is in a great location, accessible to lots of things to do, bars and restaurants etc. The bed is really comfortable and the room more spacious than we thought. Lovely little touches like some sweets and a map and the coffee machine were great!
We would definitely return.

name: Kailua Cottage
summary: Charming attached cottage only 2.5 blocks from world famous Kailua beach. Totally private with own entrance, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and living area.  TV, WiFi and DVD player also available to make your stay comfortable.  Reserved parking for one car and access to your own private washer and dryer.  Super comfy and very clean. We have beach towels, an umbrella, cooler and a cart to make your trip to the beach enjoyable and even an outdoor shower to rinse off when you return.  Dog on property.
space: Spacious open floor plan with high ceilings accentuated by bright natural lighting and cool tropical breeze. Artistic touches can be found throughout the home. Toddlers and infants welcome, but unfortunately we don't have special accommodations for them.  (Crib, cabinet locks,  etc.)
description: Charming attached cottage only 2.5 blocks from world famous Kailua beach. Totally private with own entrance, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and living area.  TV, WiFi and DVD player also available to make your stay comfortable.  Reserved parking for one car and access to your own private washer and dryer.  Super comfy and very clean. We have beach towels, an umbrella, cooler and a cart to make your trip to the beach enjoyable and even an outdoor shower to rinse off when you return.  Dog on property. Spacious open floor plan with high ceilings accentuated by bright natural lighting and cool tropical breeze. Artistic touches can be found throughout the home. Toddlers and infants welcome, but unfortunately we don't have special accommodations for them.  (Crib, cabinet locks,  etc.) The cottage has a private entrance accessible on the right side of the house. Guests also have access to a small back yard with outdoor seating and a gas grill. Owner lives on premises and is available to help make
neighborhood_overview: Quiet residential neighborhood only 2.5 blocks away from the beach. Less than 10 minute drive to Kailua town. 5 minute drive to the Marine Core Base.  Walking distance to the beach (about an 8 minute walk)
notes: Price is based on: Daily Room Charg (Website hidden by Airbnb) $125 TA (Website hidden by Airbnb) $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) GET and Oahu Surcharg (Website hidden by Airbnb) $5.35 Total Daily Charg (Website hidden by Airbnb) $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Cleaning fee and Airbnb Fees per booking. *Please also note that prices are subject to change based on special daily rates.
transit: Kailua is easily accessed by car or bike.  There is also a bus stop at the end of the street (approx 8 min walk).
access: The cottage has a private entrance accessible on the right side of the house. Guests also have access to a small back yard with outdoor seating and a gas grill.
interaction: Owner lives on premises and is available to help make your stay comfortable and as easy as possible. More than happy to provide recommendations.
house_rules: Aloha and welcome to our home, we hope you enjoy your stay.  Here are a few guidelines to your stay: 1.) Please park far forward on the right hand side of the driveway.   2.)Once parked, please walk around the right side of the house to the main doors of the cottage.   3.) It is local custom to please remove shoes before entering the house.   4.) If sandy, please wash feet before entering the house and shake off sand before putting anything in the washer/dryer.    5.) Upon leaving the house please turn off all lights and electrical appliances including AC.   6.) When checking out please: -Take out garbage -Wash dirty dishes -Return the key to the lockbox.

host.host_about:
Aloha, 
I am a middle school teacher born and raised in Kailua.  I love reading and the outdoors.  In my spare time I enjoy hiking, fishing, taking my dog Liko on adventures, and of course traveling!

reviews.comments:
We just finished our 9 day stay at this wonderful cottage! It was the absolute perfect location. We loved Kailua and the downtown area that is only a 4 min drive. This cottage is also super close to one of Oahu's beautiful beaches! It was very clean and cozy, and it felt like home instantly. I would definitely stay here again. 

Laura was a wonderful host and knew she would see to any issues, luckily we didn't have any!

We loved that this place is only two blocks from Kalama Beach! Also very close to Kailua Beach and Lanikai Beach. Having a private bedroom as well as another sleeping space made this perfect for our needs. Fans in every room and air conditioners kept us very comfortable. Someone with an artistic flair must have originally built this place because there are beautiful, what looks to be, handmade ceramic tiles and accents throughout. Additional outside shower and washer and dryer for our use were wonderful. The neighborhood seemed to be fairly quiet and friendly. We would definitely stay here again.
Owners went over and above to make our vacation wonderful!!

Laura and Magic's home was perfect for us.  They supplied so many "extras" that we didn't have to worry about anything!  The artistic vibe was beautiful and the hosts were available any time we had questions.  The location was PERFECT!  This was our favorite spot we've ever stayed.  We will be back if they will have us.
Delightful. Spacious, light with gorgeous artistic ceramic tile accents. Short and easy walk to the beach. Private. Very accommodating host. Couldn't be better.

Laura's place is a perfect location in Kailua. A couple easily walkable blocks from the beach (look for instructions in the guide provided) and a quiet residential neighborhood, not far at all from restaurants. It was perfect for our stay with 3 of us, the bedroom closes up w/ sliding doors, and you can enclose the extra futon bed area with a curtain. All our interactions went smoothly. The decor is very cute and fresh feeling. We did not do any cooking, but it look like everything is there if you plan to cook. Thank you Laura for a memorable stay in Kailua!
The place was clean and bright and had everything we needed for our 4 night stay. The beach was close and beautiful and low key. I definitely recommend staying here!
Laura's place was exactly as described -- very practical and close to a great beach and amenities.

Laura's cottage was the perfect home-base for our vacation. It's clean, spacious, and well taken care of. We didn't get to meet Laura but she left us detailed instructions, recommendations, and was available by text for anything we needed. The cottage was a close walk to the beach. An ideal location!
Great place! Beautiful art inside. Great location. Bright and clean.

This little cottage was a dream. The place was immaculate. And it was stunning. Nothing prepared us for the beautiful telework on the inside done by a famous ceramic artist. If you love art, you will be blown away at the artwork that is both functional and beautiful. Countertops, floor, wall finishing and wall decoration. Museum quality. The artist is well known.

Our host, Laura was extremely accommodating regarding our special needs for extra pillows and other things. We would highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to stay in the area.

Great clean and spacious place for the 3 adults and one toddler we had. The only thing is the beach is about a half mile walk from the house--the blocks are long. But the place itself is great, she has umbrellas for our use, plenty of clean towels, and even a little outdoor shower which came in really handy. Thanks for the stay!

My friend and I loved Laura's cute place. The photos don't do it justice. It is so pretty and comfortable. The whole place is super clean. Loved the beautiful tiles and the open floor plan. I felt very at home there.

The area is residential and quiet which I really loved. 

It is a five minute walk to the most beautiful beach. Around 8 minute drive to town where there are an abundance of places to eat and shop. And of course the Mecca that is Whole Foods. It's about a 25 minute walk which we found easy to walk. 

Laura was very communicative but gave us our space. So you just kind of feel like you live in Hawaii
Great location - the beach is a 5 minute walk away and the main roads are easily accessible.  Laura was very helpful and accommodating.  I would absolutely return.

Laura' place is absolutely beautiful, we loved the artsy studio. It was very clean. There is a queen bed and a twin bed (perfect for our 18month son) and since it's open we can hear our son from our bed and when he wakes up he walks right to us. There are also sliding doors for privacy for the queen bed. There are 2 AC units 1 above the queen bed and the other in the living space; 3 ceiling fans, 1 above the queen bed, 1 living space and 1 in the bathroom. pots/pans/coffee maker/rice cooker/oil/salt&pepper/ dishwashing soap/shampoo/conditioner/bodywash/towels provided. We had breakfast at the studio and I would pack a light lunch/snacks/fruits for the beach.There's a grill outside which we used as well. Only 5-10min drive to Lanikai beach which is great for young kids. EVERYTHING was PERFECT. We would definitely come back and stay at Laura's place.

Owner's description is spot on. Loved our stay & tile artistry. Hey Runners !!! ...get a sweet 3.6 from the house to the Kailua pier & back on the beach. OMG best ahi poke bowl & HAUPIAPIE @ Island Grill! Eat up!

Immaculately clean ohana walking distance to beach, located in a quiet residential neighborhood.  Very private.  Ideal for a couple but  small for a family.  Tile work by a former resident artist is beautiful and amazing.  Host (Laura) is unobtrusive but available if needed.  Will return for a future visit!
A place that better than you expected! Laura is very kind and welcoming person.

Laura's place was fantastic!  The bed was super comfy and the A/C's were a nice extra benefit to the already well ventilated space (although the ceiling fans and floor fan were plenty).  The walk to the beach is minimal (5-10 minutes tops).  This area of Kailua Beach is awesome, especially during the week as there are usually less people than down by the beach park.  Laura greeted us with a smile and then gave us 100% privacy.  The few times we saw each other in passing, she was exceptionally nice and again, always smiling.  My fiancé and I felt completely at home and relaxed.  We will definitely be looking to stay here again when we return.  Thank you for sharing your space, Laura!

Laura's cottage was spotless, charming and comfortable. It was a perfect place for us. It had beautiful mosaic tile art throughout, and every convenience one could think of. 

The furniture was nice and very user friendly--a bistro table for four, a large couch,a futon chair, and plenty of storage. The kitchen was ready for us to use, with dishes, flatware, glasses and all we needed. Laura also has a small desk which was great for the lap top, and a power strip big enough for our multiple electronic devices. She also has a large fan which could be moved where needed. We felt very comfortable and at home, and Laura was readily available and very responsive to any questions. 

The beach was within easy walking distance. Laura had thought of everything needed for a day at the beach--a cart to take supplies in, beach towels, toys and other things. We will definitely want to stay at the cottage again.
Great place to stay and in a good location relative to the beach and downtown Kailua. It was quiet, clean, and all of the essentials were available.

We enjoyed our trip to Kailua. Laura's place was very clean, nicely located within Kailua very close to Kalama beach (short walk) which was a great spot for mellow swimming. All the photos of the cottage space are very true to life. It was great to have a place with a king sized bed and A/C - not a lot of options out there with both. Laura and her husband were very quick to reply to our couple of requests. All in all a very enjoyable stay!

This was a great place to stay. The cottage was bright, clean, and welcoming. Laura was very helpful and accessible for recommendations and questions, but also respected our privacy. And the art tiles throughout were a wonderful bonus. The beach was spectacular and within walking distance. Loved Kailua and it had charming shops and delicious restaurants. We would love to come back. Highest recommendation!

This is a wonderful setting for a vacation or business trip. First impression as you drive in isn't the best simply because the main house has seen many seasons, but the guest house space and amenities are very comfortable.

Stunning space, very private, everything you need from beach chairs and towels to an uplifting designer environment. This cottage was built by a  well-known potter, and is LOADED with his artwork. I'm so delighted to be able to return here! Uplifting environment that makes you feel special every time you walk in! Be sure to close the pocket doors - at least once, to view the amazing ceramic insets!

Laura’s place is beautiful and so well located, light and airy.  It’s like living in an art gallery with the artisan tiles that decorate the whole space.  It’s a really short walk to the beach and the neighborhood is quite.  It’s a short drive to town, where there is great shopping and eating.  It was important for us to be able to cook, so we chose her place because of the nice kitchen since I had to cook for my daughter and her friends for the one night that we celebrated our daughter’s birthday in advance.  

She and her husband are great hosts and went out of their way to make sure we had ample coffee, a really sharp knife to cut pineapple, and even printed an online confirmation slip we needed for a tour.  Having a washer and dryer also made the space more desirable for us.

We would highly recommend her space, and the attention we got from our hosts was excellent.

The cottage is clean, very private, brightly lit and everything looks pretty much like the pictures provided. It has size of a bigger one-bedroom apartment, located in a quiet street,  5 minutes walk to a nearest beach, 10 minutes walk to nicer Kalama Beach park and 10 minutes drive to very good Kailua and Lankai beaches. There is a big shopping plaza within less than 10 minutes drive, which has grocery stores (including WholeFoods), pharmacies and restaurants.  The hosts provided everything, including all possible kitchen appliances and dinnerware, stash of  clean towels of various sizes, shampoo, sunscreen, etc. Laura was very approachable, promptly responded to all our questions online.
We had a great stay here and loved walking to the beach in the morning. Thanks!
Great base for our explorations of Oahu

We stayed at this place for Christmas holidays in 2017. It is of perfect size for a couple and close to Kailua beach. It is not close enough for walk as you’d navigate through 2-3 layers of residential housings before getting to the beach. Very quiet at night and relaxing. You can have easy access to any part of the island from here if you rent a car, which you are supposed to do to get here in the first place.

The cottage is exactly what I expected based on the pictures.  It was light and airy, clean and comfortable, and filled with nice, little,  artistic details.  The book of information Laura put together for guests is very helpful.  It was perfect for my husband and seven year old to enjoy some quiet time to ourselves.
We've been guested in Laura's place second time during a year! It's absolutely brilliant.

We loved staying at Laura's place. The location was perfect for getting to the beach or downtown Kailua, the bed was comfortable, the apartment was spacious, clean, and filled with everything we needed including beach towels and even a cooler which was great for the beach! Would definitely come back and highly recommend! Laura also made check in and checkout a breeze. Mahalo!!

Laura’s house is very cute, looks exactly like the pictures. The check-in process was super easy. Really loved having access to a washer and dryer as we still had 6 more days of travel after leaving Laura’s. The town of Kailua is amazing and Laura provided tips of some of her favorite places. Just wish we had time to visit all of them.
Clean, close to the beach and well appointed.

Laura's place was clean, comfortable, and a good amount of space for a multiple day beach vacation. Plenty of closet and lounging space and a set-off bedroom. It also has a kitchenette with small oven and stove (unlike some places that just have hot plates) and a small gas grill which was helpful. However, the kitchen tools are pretty limited, as is the beach gear, so I suggest you ask if you plan to rely on specific items for either cooking or beach outings. Check-in was easy and there is off-street parking, which is nice. The proximity to the beach is excellent - about an 8 to 10-minute walk. And Kailua town and Lanikai beach are absolutely the best place to stay on Oahu if you like calm, uncrowded swimming beaches and a laid back beach town vibe.

Laura's place is spacious and clean. The bed is comfortable. The location is close to the beach, easy walking distance. The outside shower is useful although both inside and outside showers take a long time to get hot water. The kitchen is not fully equipped but it's not an issue if you plan to mostly eat out. Laura was quick to get a few kitchen items for me upon my request. She was good at communicating.

This place is really cool inside.  There is a lot of room and everything that a couple could need.  It's very quiet and cozy and the art/tile is really cool.  It's a two block walk to the beach so stock up on some food and hang out for a few days.

We loved all the little amenities, like the boogie board, the needle and thread, and the bug spray. I loved that it's a 5 minute walk to the beach. My daughter loved catching geckos in the yard and making her own leis out of fallen flowers around the neighborhood. Laura was very accommodating and made check-in and check-out a breeze.

Wonderful location and very private living quarters.  We really enjoyed the outdoor shower, the close walk to the very amazing beach and the quiet peace of the space.  The outdoor eating area was wonderful in the morning for coffee and birdsong.  I hope we can come back again!
Nice place to stay , 25mins away from town Centre (Waikiki ), you need a car . Within walking distance to beach . Quiet and  convenient .

Laura’s home is in a great location, just a few blocks from the beach. They had a great new beach umbrella and plenty of beach towels. 

Check in was easy, and best of all check out was later in the day so we could sleep in :-)

The home is mostly tile and very artistically done, but you need to be careful if you get your feet wet.

Kitchen is minimal, but practical.

Lovely place and close by to the beach. We do recommend.

We loved the quiet neighbourhood beach area. It was close to great food, grocery stores and an easy walk to a big beach. This side of the island was lush and green with dramatic views of the mountains yet it only was 30min to the airport! The house itself was spacious, clean, bright and very comfortable.
Great place to stay!

The place was fantastic. Laura was extremely nice and was quick to response. The place was beautiful, comfortable, light and cheery. We loved everything about it. Close to the beach and 5-10min from town.

Laura’s place was really great. The apartment was very spacious and bright. We loved the colorful tile accents. We also enjoyed the outdoor shower and the easy to access the washer and dryer. We were looking for something in a quiet neighborhood and it was perfect for that. It was away from the busy streets and beaches of Honolulu, but not too remote. We were able to explore the island very easily from there. Restaurants, grocery stores and other shops were a quick drive away. The beach is Kailua is beautiful and not so crowded.

We loved this place!! truly enjoyed every aspect of the house and amenities including BBQ grill, outdoor dining area,  icebox, folding chair, swim gears.. very close to local restaurants and shops. Want to go back again and stay there.

This space was as described and I came to appreciate it more as I saw our friends very cramped accommodations. You could reach the beach within a 4 minute walk if you did not want to hunt for parking at Kailua Beach State Park. I used the shaded outside patio space to read and work. Deluxe cable package provided access to 300+ channels and A/C worked great. Curtains and sliding doors enhanced privacy. Washer and dryer, wheeled cooler and umbrellas and guest book with tips for reaching closest beach were all appreciated and used. I'd recommend this for anyone who values privacy. We only bumped into Laura and her husband once.  Also appreciated the complimentary food items, including Kona coffee in the freezer, some spices and a few beverages left over from prior tenant.  Would definitely rent again if Laura would have us. Mahalo.

Laura’s place was very clean, especially the sheets, blankets, and towels. Everything was well organized. The abundance of beach towels was a big plus. The local guide was really helpful as well. We had full privacy and didn’t see Laura in person, but she was responsive through emails. I will recommend Laura’s property to other travelers.
The place was very clean and spacious for two people. The check in was easy and quick and get to the beach was fairly easy with a 10 minutes walk. Thank you Laura for having us.

This was our second stay at Laura’s place. It’s perfect for our needs. The kitchen and barbecue allow us to cook almost all of our meals.  Its very quiet, very private, and it’s only a very short walk to the beach. The TV, cable/DVR, and WiFi worked great.  We hope to stay here again.

Kailua Cottage looks exactly like it is depicted in the on-line photos.  It is nicely decorated with custom made tiles.  The space worked well for 3 people.  The futon was made into a twin bed and that space had a curtain that made it feel like another bedroom.  We loved the easy walk to a beautiful beach with an equally beautiful sunrise!

This space was as advertised. Close walk to beach. Maybe 5 minutes. Had everything you would need. Very easy coming and going. Private. The outdoor shower is a little exposed to neighbors so can’t truly replace the indoor shower but I loved the convenience of the location. The bed was comfortable and the place was clean. Definitely eat breakfast at over easy and skip Mokes. It’s a tourist trap with bad food. Also good local places for fried rice or Kim Chee fried rice were the times and big city diner.

Laura’s place is beautiful. It’s location is in the middle of everything (  kailua beach and stores) . Our 2 y/o daughter had a great time with our stay. It is spacious and clean. There are many choices with the cable channels.We have everything that we need especially in the kitchen that is fully equipped. Thank God the hurricane missed us and we were able to enjoy the beaches. Lanikai beach is the best. We would definitely stay there again with our next Oahu vacation. Mahalo!

Very neat and clean! Parasol and beach chairs host provided were really useful, enough kitchen tools and bbq was also good! Laura was very responsive. Worth staying and it will be better than some hotels at the same price. Walking distance to the beach but not the beach park
Laura's place was very ckean and quiet. It was close to the beach and town.

Kailua cottage is a great place from which to stage your activities while visiting Oahu.  The cottage is centrally located in Kailua providing quick access to local shopping areas and to other well know beaches on the windward side (Kalama, Kailua, Lanikai, Waimanalo, Bellows AFB).  The kitchen is fully equipped for the times when you want to eat in. It has a washer and dryer, and outside shower. The unit can be opened to take advantage of natural ventilation from tradewinds, but also has adequate A/C and fans if needed otherwise.  Not only is it a few minutes walk to Kalama beach, it also comes equipped with many of the beach-items you need during your visit (towels, chairs, umbrellas, cooler, boogy-boards, outside shower, etc.). The windward side of the island is beautiful, and from Kailua cottage you can easily get to the north shore or even the leeward parts of the island when you desire.

Laura's Kailua Cottage was perfect for my husband and I. The location is in a quiet neighborhood and within easy walking distance to the beach. We were also an easy mile walk from a grocery store and restaurants. The cottage was clean and comfortable with a nice backyard, gas grill, and a washer/dryer. Laura was there when we needed her for a question or a need, but provided us with our space. We would definitely stay again!

Our stay at Laura’s was one of our favorite air bnb experiences ever. The place was very clean and had everything we needed for our stay. We were able to spend a lot of time at the beach because of the  convenient location! We were very comfortable and appreciated the amount of space we had! This was a great place to stay while visiting Kailua and we would definitely stay again next time!
Very nice! Close to the beach, easy communications, worked out great!
Highly recommend this place! Everything you could possibly need is provided, and we would definitely stay again.

This is a fabulous AirBnB! It's bright and airy, has it's own patio area, is meticulously clean and is only a short walk to the beach. Laura provided everything we needed, including all the beach necessities like chairs, floats and a rolling cooler. We will definitely stay here again!

Laura’s place was perfect. If you needed anything, it’s there! The place is clean and well stocked. Having the laundry right there is amazing! The outdoor area is perfect to just relax after a beach day.

Laura was very friendly and responsive. Check in was super easy and the place was clean and exactly like the pictures. My only annoyance about the place was that the fridge was quite loud.

It was a quiet residential area, but an easy drive into town if you need anything. The walk to the beach was short, though you do have to cross a couple roads and there's no crosswalks. At certain times of day you had to wait a while to find a break in traffic to cross.

The booklet in the room with local tips was very helpful.

Overall a great stay.

Everything was great at Laura's place! The bedroom closes off completely and creates really a separate room which is great with 2 people when only one wants to sleep. We also loved having a real kitchen with stove and space to cook, private shady seating outdoors, and the big shower in the bathroom. We rented bikes from a local shop and were able to take bike paths from Laura's place to Kailua Beach Park and Lanikai Beach. Having bike paths the entire way was great! If we stay in Kailua again, we will definitely want to stay at Laura's.

Great location and quiet, private setting. Loads of extras like the BBQ, beach equipment and well-stocked kitchen equipment meant we had everything we needed for a great stay. Thanks Laura, we really enjoyed ourselves.
Nice and clean cottage close to wonderful beaches and cosy Kailua town. I can really recommend this place if you are visiting Kailua!

한국인 후기가 없어서 작성해요. 일단 깨끗한 타일바닥에 높은 천장이라 좋았고 밝은 등이 많이 달려있어서 생활하기 편해요(눈이침침하지 않습니다ㅋ) 그리고 무엇보다 모든 곳(침실, 거실, 심지어 화장실까지)에 팬이 설치되어 있어서 시원하고 꿉꿉하지 않아 좋았어요. 수납공간도 많습니다. 체크인부터 체크아웃까지 호스트랑 만날 일이 없이 개인적으로 집을 사용 할 수 있고(하지만 옆에 살고 있다고 해요ㅋ) 가장 좋았던 것은 무척 무척 청결해요.(작은 벌레가 있다고 하는데 앞에 정원이 있기 때문에 당연한 거 같고 큰 문제가 되지는 않습니다) 7살 딸과 함께 여행을 했는데 침실의 큰 침대는 우리부부가 사용하고 코너의 작은 침대는 딸이 사용했어요.(작고 아담해서 딸이 무척 만족스러워 했고, 작은 책상도 딸 차지였습니다) 뒷뜰에 작은 정원과 식탁도 게스트 개인적으로 사용 가능하고, 원한다면 BBQ도 할 수 있어요.(저는 사용 안했지만) 세탁 세제를 제외한 모든 것이 다 갖춰져있어요 (물놀이 용품, 파라솔, 수건과, 샤워용품, 전자렌지, 화력좋은 전기레인지, 타파통, 간단한 조미료, 젓가락을 제외한 도구들과 식기들...) 세탁기와 건조기도 있어요. 카라마 비치까지는 걸어서 가면 16분 정도 걸리던데 대부분의 한국 분들은 준비물이 많기 때문에ㅋ 차로 이동하시면 카일루아나 래니카이 비치 등 5분안에 갈 수 있을 거에요(카라마는 넓고 한적해서 좋은데 파도가 좀 있어서 카일루아나 래니카이가 아이랑 놀기엔 좋더라고요) 한줄평:호스트와 마주칠 일 없이 깨끗하게 지낼 수 있다. 별점 5개

We needed a convenient place to stay while visiting family in Kailua.  This place did not disappoint!  It was a short walk to our family's home and an easy 1 mile walk to Kailua.  The space was well-decorated with really cool ceramic touches on the floors and countertops.   It was pretty quiet  (a bit of street noise in the morning) and we were very comfortable.  Laura provided a cooler and all the gear we needed at the beach.  She responded very quickly to my inquiries.  Would definitely stay here again!

Laura was a very accommodating and responsive host.  When we asked for a couple of items that were missing or in poor condition, she delivered them right away.  As depicted in the photos, the rental is spacious and bright, with lovely ceramic designs embedded in floors and doors.  Many toiletries, and other supplies are provided.   Unfortunately there is a neighbour right beside the unit's bedroom window who starts coughing/hacking very loudly every morning about 6; nothing Laura can do about that, but it was very annoying and future renters may want to be aware (maybe bring earplugs?). 
The walk to the beach is a little long if you're carrying beach equipment; we preferred to drive to Kailua Beach Park instead as it had more shade available.

name: 1Great location, calm cozy room w/ backyard-garden
summary: This cozy room in a greatly located apartment will open the doors for you to live in Montreal and experience all it has to offer, while at the same time enjoying a living space you can call home! We can't wait to have you here!
space: Great apartment in downtown Montreal, we have a lovely park right in front of us, which makes it a very quiet area, which is awesome! Also a lovely back yard, with a deck and a garden. The room itself is large with lovely high ceilings, it has a closet and also a wardrobe, a desk and of course a comfy single bed!
description: This cozy room in a greatly located apartment will open the doors for you to live in Montreal and experience all it has to offer, while at the same time enjoying a living space you can call home! We can't wait to have you here! Great apartment in downtown Montreal, we have a lovely park right in front of us, which makes it a very quiet area, which is awesome! Also a lovely back yard, with a deck and a garden. The room itself is large with lovely high ceilings, it has a closet and also a wardrobe, a desk and of course a comfy single bed! You will have access to the kitchen, all the kitchenware and appliances, the back yard, the bathroom (of course) and the washing machine and the dryer. We will give you tips and little tricks to make your trip smooth and easy, I was once new to Montreal so I know somethings that might come in handy! «Centre-Sud» is a fast evolving neighborhood, whit a great diversity, which is pretty much what Montreal is about! There are great little cafés and shops ar
neighborhood_overview: «Centre-Sud» is a fast evolving neighborhood, whit a great diversity, which is pretty much what Montreal is about! There are great little cafés and shops around and fun interesting people all over! We are at walking distance from Parc Lafontaine and if the weather allows and you are good walker then we are at walking distance from a lot of great attractions!
notes: We have a cat.
transit: We are at a 10 minute walk from the Papineau subway station and the same distance from Frontenac. The bus #125 stops just across the street, the bus #45 is at a 5 minute walk and #24 is at a 10 minute walk. Also, we are close from UQAM university, the Grande Bibliothèque of Montreal, the parc of Mont-Royal, the Rue St-Denis and all it's fun and the plateau! There is a pharmacy two blocks away, a grocery shop a couple meters from the house, also right after the park there is the bridge Jacques-Cartier which takes you to the park Jean-Drapeau. The parc Lafontaine is also close to the apartment. There are cafés, baker’s shops, and plenty of restaurants for all tastes.
access: You will have access to the kitchen, all the kitchenware and appliances, the back yard, the bathroom (of course) and the washing machine and the dryer.
interaction: We will give you tips and little tricks to make your trip smooth and easy, I was once new to Montreal so I know somethings that might come in handy!

host.host_about:
Hi! My name is Ilam :)
I'm a student in communication, I also work at a café-resto, I love reading, painting, music, dancing (when no one sees me) cooking and eating, laughing, movies, talking and simply sharing life with others! 
I live with my boyfriend Fred who studies environmental science and is also a certified cabinet maker. We love sharing experiences and knowledge, we have hosted a great many people and have thus made our home a fun and harmonious  environment to be in!

reviews.comments: This was a great place to stay.  The location was in a nice neighborhood and transit was easily accessible.  Ila and Fred were exceptional hosts.  They are booth kind and accepting people who made me feel welcome from the moment I arrived.

La chambre est conforme à la photo.
Excellent quartier vue sur un magnifique parc avec wifi.
Proche du village gay 5-8 minutes a pied. Excellente localité.

Notre séjour chez Ilham et Fred s'est très bien passé ! Ils ont été très accueillant et à l'écoute de nos interrogations, la vie avec eux est très agréable ! 

L'appartement est très bien situé, il est à 20mn à pieds de l'UQAM ou 15mn de bus. Le parc Lafontaine est à 10mn à pieds, de même que le metro Papineau et plusieurs bus à moins de 2mn.   

Il y a de nombreux commerces à proximité et la chambre donne sur une rue très calme. Nous avons eu accès à tous les équipements de l'appartement et la chambre était entièrement équipée ce qui est très pratique pour une première arrivée à Montréal. 

Je recommande donc vivement cet endroit, vous y serez très bien!

Un logement tout simple, tellement de gentillesse de la part de Ila et Fred .
Situation idéale , départ de nombreuses visites.
Une première expérience de la collocation qui me laissera des souvenirs uniques.
Le séjour était très agréable et on est proche du centre ville.

name: Quarry Apartment
summary: Apartment in the city center, 1 minute away from the metro station. Here you'll be in walking distance from the essencial places to visit in Porto. The street of the apartment is calm and quiet and the place is totally equiped for a confortable stay.
space: O apartamento fica na antiga pedreira da Trindade, num edifício remodelado, ainda com acentos do passado do local. É um espaço amplo e equipado com o essencial para uma estadia confortável. É constituído por cozinha, sala, wc de serviço e pátio exterior no piso de baixo, e por um quarto com casa-de-banho completa no mezanino, que pode ser isolado do resto da casa com um blackout. Acomoda duas pessoas no piso de cima e mais duas no sofá-cama da sala.
description: Apartment in the city center, 1 minute away from the metro station. Here you'll be in walking distance from the essencial places to visit in Porto. The street of the apartment is calm and quiet and the place is totally equiped for a confortable stay. O apartamento fica na antiga pedreira da Trindade, num edifício remodelado, ainda com acentos do passado do local. É um espaço amplo e equipado com o essencial para uma estadia confortável. É constituído por cozinha, sala, wc de serviço e pátio exterior no piso de baixo, e por um quarto com casa-de-banho completa no mezanino, que pode ser isolado do resto da casa com um blackout. Acomoda duas pessoas no piso de cima e mais duas no sofá-cama da sala. Todo o apartamento. Por favor confirmem a vossa hora de chegada com antecedência, e irei receber-vos à entrada do edifício. O apartamento fica numa rua rica em comércio local, muito próximo de serviços, lojas e restaurantes. Apesar de ser muitíssimo central (fica a 2 minutos do edifício da câma
neighborhood_overview: O apartamento fica numa rua rica em comércio local, muito próximo de serviços, lojas e restaurantes. Apesar de ser muitíssimo central (fica a 2 minutos do edifício da câmara municipal) é uma rua muito calma e segura.
notes: Check-in - 15h às 21h Check-out - até às 11h Caso haja disponibilidade este horário é negociável.
transit: Metro da Trindade e paragens de autocarro a 2 minutos - mas andar a pé pode ser o mais agradável para visitar a cidade
access: Todo o apartamento.
interaction: Por favor confirmem a vossa hora de chegada com antecedência, e irei receber-vos à entrada do edifício.
house_rules: - A partir de 1 de Março de 2018 todos o alojamentos deverão pagar a Taxa Municipal Turística. Todo o hóspede com idade superior a 13 anos terá assim que pagar 2€ por noite de dormida, até um máximo de 14€ por pessoa (7 noites). Este pagamento é feito ao anfitrião, mas nas reservas efetuadas a partir de 1 de Abril a cobrança começou a ser feita pelo Airbnb.  - As of March 1, 2018 all accommodation must pay the Municipal Tourist Tax. All guests over the age of 13 will have to pay € 2 per night, up to a maximum of € 14 per person (7 nights). This payment is made to the host, but to reservations made from the 1st of April it is now made to Airbnb.  Fumar apenas no pátio Fazer refeições apenas nos espaços adequados Festas e barulho excessivo não são permitidos  Não pousar loiça ou copos em superfícies de madeira sem proteção  É proibido retirar objetos decorativos e livros do apartamento  Smoking is allowed only in the patio Eating only in the appropriate spaces Parties and excessive noise

host.host_about:
