Somos mãe e filha, Margarida e Filipa. Uma é médica, a outra tem uma oficina de cerâmica, desenho e gravura aberta ao público no centro do Porto (Oficina Gato Bravo - são benvindos!). Adoramos esta terceira atividade, é um óptimo desafio e oportunidade para conhecer pessoas interessantes, e proporcionar-lhes tudo para uma estadia perfeita na nossa cidade.

We are mother and daughter, Margarida and Filipa. One is a doctor, the other has a ceramics, drawing and printing workshop in the city center (Oficina Gato Bravo - you're welcome to visit!). We also love to work as hosts, it's a great challenge and an opportunity to meet interesting people, and give them everything for a perfect stay in our city.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The Quarry Apartment is simply stunning - being able to have breakfast outside in a private courtyard is definitely a wonderful bonus. To come home to a very comfortable bed and fantastic shower after a day of exploring is a true treat. Tastefully furnished, the love for design is apparent and to be found in every detail of the house. The pictures shown don't do justice to the reality of this place. At a two minute walk from Trindade Metrostation you’ll find that everything you need and look for in Porto is really within walking distance. Small cafés, design shops, markets with local products, you name it. Thank you Filipa for being such a warm-hearted host. We really appreciated the extra towels, Nespresso and cold wine & Coke in the fridge :-)
Adoramos a nossa estadia no apartamento Quarry! A disponibilidade da Filipa & Margarida, o conforto, a limpeza, decoração e localização!

The appartment was very good furnished and decorated but very dark and cold. We had the heating on day and night whith a outside temperatur about 22 degrees. I missed the daylight very much and the little patio looks nice but  it was also dark. Maybe at high summer it is a good and cool place to stay. The area was very quiet and nearby the old city.

Très bon accueil, le logement est bien situé, au calme, propre et agréable: très bien pour visiter Porto en toute tranquillité. 
Que du bon sur l'accueil et la communication tout au long du séjour également. 
Bref, je recommande.  
Le manque de lumière décrit précédemment ne m'a pas gêné, bien contrebalancé par la déco très sympa.

Filipa welcomed us at the apartment and gave us all the necessary information. We could easily reach her via phone during our stay.
Communication via email prior to our arrival was also uncomplicated.
We can highly recommend her as a host!

The apartment is a real gem: historic Porto building, fully renovated and still keeping it's old charm. All used materials are of high quality and very solid. The limited space is perfectly used with built-in cupboards, double-storey ensuite double-bed + bathroom area, even leaving space for a small private patio outside.

Location is tops: right in the heart of Porto, next to the Metro-interchange "Trinidade". A walk down to the river and the more touristy area Ribeira is no problem, when you are too tired for your way back up, the Metro or a taxi is easily arranged and not pricy.

Only slight downside in Porto in the center is the lack of free parking space, but again next to Filipas apartment there is parking available (expect up to 1 EUR/hour), Filipa can give you advise on the best option and how to get there.

Overall experience: great! We came as a family with 4 adults and a 3-year-old (3 generations) and everybody was happy with this choice!

Für einen Kurztrip nach Porto können wir die Unterkunft sehr empfehlen. Die Lage ist perfekt ! 100 Meter von der U-Bahn Station Trindade, von wo man in allen Richtungen fahren kann. In 10 Minuten im Zentrum. Direkt um die Ecke ein tolles Cafe wo man für wenig Geld phantastisch frühstücken kann !
Die Wohnung ist voll ausgestattet. Es fehlt im Prinzip nichts. Philippa war super zu erreichen und die Kommunikation einwandfrei.
Einziger Punkt der für uns nicht optimal war, dass es in der Wohnung recht dunkel und etwas klamm ist, da es sich um ein einen alten Steinbau handelt. Nichts desto trotz , Top renoviert und für einige Tage absolut geeignet ...
Würden gerne wiederkommen
Great place to stay in Porto, beautiful design and very well located. Comunication with host was perfect during our stay.

El apartamento es perfecto. Muy bien situado, cerca del centro de la ciudad. Es muy bonito por dentro, estaba súper limpio y con todos los detalles para estar cómodos. Filipa nos recibió a nuestra llegada y nos explicó todo perfectamente.
Si volvemos a Oporto, sin duda volveremos a su apartamento.

It was nice being so close to the metro station! The apartment is gorgeous and was everything we needed. It's true that it is very dark in there and there is not a lot of natural light, but since we spent most of our time outside it didn't bother us too much.
Dieses Haus ist ein Juwel, man kann nur gratulieren, wie wunderbar das alles gemacht wurde. Vielen lieben Dank!

La casa es igual que en las fotos. La anfitriona muy accesible y en contacto con nostras todo el tiempo a pesar de no estar en la ciudad. Esta situada muy cerca del centro, se puede ir a pie o en metro que esta en la puerta de la casa. La unica pega que le ponemos es la falta de iluminacion, sobre todo por la noche las lamparas tienen poca luz y no iluminan la casa lo suficiente. Recomendable
Ideal locaion. Great apartment
Super nice place! I can definitely recommend it! Had a really good time here!

The apartment is nicely decorated and very comfortable. Located in a quite place and within walking distance of all sights. Margarida & Filipa are great hosts, very easy to contact and they make sure that you feel welcome in their home.
Tudo óptimo, especialmente a nível de localização, interior da casa, limpeza, estava tudo bom.
This place is very nice and comfortable. The wifi was excellent and the kitchen was easy to cook in. Margarida was a sweet host and was easy to communicate with.

Un séjour très agréable dans un logement très joliment rénové, confortable, parfaitement situé à proximité immédiate des transports (métro, bus), calme pour une situation en ville. Proximité du Centre touristique et commerces.
Logement très bien aménagé, douillet avec une petite terrasse au calme sur une cour intérieure. Propreté impeccable.
Un accueil très agréable de nos hôtesses en amont du séjour et sur place.
Great place. Apartment looks amazing. Probably wouldn't stay there in winter, since it is quite chilly and a little humid, but good for hot summer nights. Perfect starting point to explore the city.

The appartment was located in the center of the city but on a street where there was not much trafic which was good. The design was very cool and the patio was perfect for breakfasts. Me and my girlfriend really enjoyed our stay in this nice appartment!

The apartment has a very good connection to the metro and is in the middle of the city. You can reach a lot of things by foot. It is very close to the nightspots, like bars.The connection was very friendly. I would recommend it anytime.

Nous avons eu un super séjour dans cet environnement unique et confortable. Prendre le café ou l'apéro dans la cour intérieur était tout simplement magique. L'appartement est vraiment magnifique, les enfants ont adoré les lumières sous la vitre du plancher où l'on voit les vestiges de la pierre. Filipa nous disait que la restauration de l'immeuble a été fait par un architecte et cela se voit dans tous les détails. Il y a même un rideau électrique qui descend pour plus d'intimité à la mezzanine si on vient entre amis. C'est un peu humide à cause des murs de pierres et un peu sombre mais il y a des lumières partout et l'ambiance est incroyable. Nous le recommandons vivement! L'emplacement est idéal. Merci à Filipa pour ce super séjour, nous n'avons manqué de rien.
Très bien placé
Muy cerca del centro, el apartamento muy xulo
Très bien placé et très bien aménagé, l'appartement est très agréable malgré le manque de luminosité , à recommander

Tout d'abord un très bon accueil de l'amie de filipa avec une arrivé tardive. Elle nous a montrer tout le fonctionnement de l'appartement qui est vraiment superbe. La cuisine est très bien équipé avec tout ce dont on a besoin. L'appartement présente également une jolie terrasse qui est très agréable pour manger dehors. La chambre présente un store qui est pratique pour ceux qui aime dormir dans le noir complet. Des prospectus et un guide de la ville sont également disponible pour permettre d'organiser ses journées. 
Je recommande cette appartement. Merci à silvia l'amie de filipa
Apartment was fantastic. Exactly as described in the profile and pics. Cute little nook in the back. Anytime I had a question Filipa was quick to respond.

Super appartement idéalement situé dans un quartier calme et proche de toute la vie portuense. Bien équipé, cosy et confortable avec une hôtesse à l'écoute ! Un joli puits de jour qui fait office de petite terrasse agréable. Un mini bémol, si vous êtes sensibles, (ce qui n'est pas notre cas) l'appartement construit dans la pierre est un peu humide avec des odeurs de salpêtre. Personnellement nous n'avons pas été gênés car nous sommes habitués aux maisons, disons, rurales. L'appartement est super fonctionnel on sent la patte d'un architecte d'intérieur dans le design du lieu !

Mieszkanie bardzo ladnie urządzone i super zlokalizowane!
Niestety przeszkadza trochę wilgoć, cienkie sciany i owady w toalecie

Le logement est très agréable, idéalement situé dans Porto, près d'une station de métro qui va directement à l'aéroport. Il est décoré avec goût et possède une jolie petite terrasse. Margarida & Filipa répondent très rapidement et sont très serviables.
Bon accueil, appartement tres sympathique conforme a la description sur internet tres bon séjour

Interessantes Apartment - vielleicht ein wenig dunkel. Günstig gelegen.
Für uns war alles okay.
Bel appartement et très bien situé. Facile d’accès. Il y a toutes les commodités pour un séjour pour deux personnes.
Great area and host, awesome city and it’s perfectly located!

We stayed for 4 nights in this lovely appartment. 

We did not have a problem with the missing daylight, we turned on the light and it is very cosy. 

We opened the windows during the day so there was a good ventilation and we did not smell the moisture. 

The appartment is very special designed. We had everything we needed and we felt very comfortable.

The location was perfect.

When we visit Porto again we will visit Margarida & Filipa for sure!
beautiful restoration of an old house, the place is really interesting and good situated!

Absolutely a wonderful place with everything you could need. Close to the Metro and a super market right around the corner. Plenty of place to choose for eating.... warning- stay away from Christina's(horrible service and food). There was a couple of issues with the tenants who have the apartment above. They will throw their water off their balcony on to you if on the patio.

I would stay here again and recommend this place to anyone and everyone.

A casa da Margarida e da Filipa é muito gira. Adoro o design. Tenho pena por não entrar tanta luz natural e por a casa ser um pouco escura. Mas de resto a localização é ótima. Fica perto de tudo o que necessitámos. A Filipa respondeu-nos sempre num espaço de 5 min o que é ótimo e esteve lá pronta para nos receber. Aconselho este espaço principalmente a casais. Muito giro, gostei muito. Obrigada por tudo.

Very cool apartment indeed, maybe even more spacious than you'd get from the pictures. Previous reviews are very right about the location, the limited daylight (also in the patio, but very cosy lamps inside to make up) and the (smell of) humidity/moisture in the apartment (during summer I'm sure it's fine as you can air by opening windows, during winter that might be a bit fresh). Kitchen is also spacious and well-equipped, just be sure to use the pot holder to move pans as their handles get very hot. All in all I'd recommend it.
Super address!

Although we were only for a few days in Porto, we could enjoy the stay. Specially due to the very good apartment. Centrally located, easy to reach from the metro. Very good quality, very clean and well maintained. Trust the pictures in airbnb, but reallity is better!
Above all, the good communication has prepared joy.
Absolutely recommendable!

En el baño de arriba habia hormigas que hacen la estancia un tanto incomoda...
El equipamiento de cuchillos y tenedores y ollas un poco antiguo/deteriorado, tampoco habia vasos. La temperatura de la planta de abajo es bastante fria. Y en general poca luz natural.
La ubicacion es muy buena y Filipa siempre ha estado muy disponible tanto para la llegada como para conversaciones anteriores.
A perfectly located flat with lots of character.
It was great. Love the space. Also great with a kid!  Did not mind it’s a bit darker, enough light and gives a nice ambience

Mooi en origineel appartement, tof terras, ideale ligging (verbinding metro met luchthaven kan niet beter en een op een kwartier van de leuke straatjes), alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig! Af en toe is de hoge vochtigheidsgraad niet zo aangenaam maar dat neem je er graag bij tijdens een verblijf in dit top appartement!

Je recommande ce logement, pour toutes les raisons imaginables : emplacement, accueil, aménagement et équipement de l’appartement, confort (bons matelas), enfin... l’appartement a tout pour rendre votre séjour PARFAIT!

Le logement a beaucoup de charme, il a été décoré avec beaucoup de goût et est parfaitement équipé. Il est taillé dans la pierre donc il est humide et on peut trouver quelques fourmis mais cela ne nous a pas dérangé. Filipa a été réactive à nos questions et à accepté de nous recevoir malgré l’heure d’arrivee tardive. Porto est une très belle ville qui se visite à pieds, le logement est à environ 20min (avec montées et descentes !) du quartier touristique de la Ribeira et se situe à la sortie du métro qui permet de rejoindre l'aéroport, ce qui est très pratique

Super appartement met alle voorzieningen. Misschien een beetje donker maar dan doe je toch gezellig de lampen aan. Als je last hebt van een beetje muffe lucht dan gedurende de dag ramen open en je ruikt niets.
Werkelijk een aanrader, super mooie douche en heel schoon.

Beautiful apartment. Very friendly hosts. All the features you would desire for your stay; full kitchen and washing machine. Bathrooms are a little small for a larger person. Location is a very short walk to all the sights in Porto, and conveniently near Trindade station and a few large grocery stores.
Super mooi en sfeervol appartement. Goed en compleet ingericht, ook prima badkamer en keuken. Oude centrum om de hoek!

Très bel endroit, rénové avec goût. La seule critique serait son manque de lumière. Mais il est idéalement situé, à 150m du métro qui va directement à l'aéroport. Bien situé aussi dans le centre, on peut sans problème visiter à pied.
Accueil adorable de Filipa qui parle français!!
it's in central, good

Margarida nous a très bien accueillis malgré notre retard (train en retard de 40 mn). L'appartement est conforme aux photos, avec effectivement une petite odeur d'humidité due aux murs en pierre. Mais il est très propre. Le coin nuit est très calme, on n'entend pas du tout la rue. Le lit est très confortable.
Nous n'avons pas pu profiter de la terrasse car il y avait des travaux à côté le premier jour, et les autres jours il pleuvait, mais c'est certainement un plus bien appréciable.
L'appartement est très bien situé, juste à côté du métro et près du centre et du Douro (15 mn à pied). Nous avons fait toutes nos visites à pied. Il y a un supermarché juste à côté.
Notre hôte nous a indiqué des lieux à voir et il y a un petit guide en français très pratique à disposition dans l'appartement.
Nous recommandons pour un petit séjour à Porto et une expérience dans un appartement de ce style.

We had a great time during our stay in porto. The apartment is really nice and absolutly great located. The Trindade Metro Station, a grocery and some good reastaurants as well are close by. Filipa was always reachable and replied quickly to my messages. We would definitley come back and i highly recommend this gorgeous little apartment!
Perfect location!

Le logement de Filipa est très bien situé, en plein coeur d'un quartier de Porto en plein expansion avec plusieurs cafés et restaurants nouveaux genres (avec très peu de touristes !) Nous avons particulièrement aimé l'architecture et le design unique du logement !  De plus, le logement offre une petite court intérieure des plus sympathiques qui permet de décompresser même en plein coeur de la ville !

Un très bon séjour, dans un quartier agréable (assez bobo). Près du quartier touristique, on a pu se déplacer presque uniquement qu'à pieds. L'appartement possède du charme, cependant il y a l'odeur un peu prononcée de l'humidité liée à la pierre néanmoins pas particulièrement dérangeante pour nous ! (A noter qu'un appareil pour atténuer cette humidité était mis à notre disposition)
A bit better than the pictures and a cosy apartment. Very good location!
Clean and stylish! We appreciate the washing machine since we had been traveling for a while.

L’appartamento è molto bello, arredato con gusto e in una posizione ottima. Filipa è stata disponibile e gentile. Purtroppo però la zona giorno della casa è sotto il livello della strada e l’appartamento risulta molto umido e con un forte odore di umidità. C’è un piccolo spazio all’aperto, anche questo molto umido e pieno di insetti e zanzare, che lo rendono poco fruibile. Se dovessi tornare a Porto non alloggerei nuovamente qui.
Obrigadas! Tudo é ótimo!
Buona posizione casa bella ma poco funzionale. Ottima accoglienza e disponibilità
El alojamiento es fantástico, mejor incluso que en las fotos... La anfitriona tuvo mucho gusto en su decoración y tuvo detalles con nosotros. Sin duda cuando volvamos a Porto repetiremos!!

The apartment is wonderful! It was clean and comfortable, and the location is great to explore Porto by foot.
Filipa was very kind and welcoming.
We would definitely stay there again!
Loft décoré avec goût, fonctionnel et bien situé. Une hôte disponible et accueillante. A recommander sans hésitation !
LOVED IT! Nice location and space. Filipa was great:)  Would definitely stay here again!!!

We absolutely loved are stay in Porto. Beautiful apartment with everything we needed. One tiny remark that we did have is that the Wi-Fi wasn’t great, but that didn’t bother us too much eather.
Would defenitely recommend!!
The loft is very stylish and well located, had an easy time walking back from bars or restaurants!

Das Appartement ist von der Lage bestens geeignet um die Stadt zu erkunden. Metro Station ist in unmittelbarer Nähe. Aber auch zu Fuß ist man in 10min in Riberia und dem Kneipenviertel von Porto. 
Das Appartement ist liebevoll saniert und hat seinen ganz eigenen Charme. Wir hatten eine schöne Zeit dort. Filipa war immer gut zu erreichen. Wenn ich wieder in Porto bin, dann bestimmt in diesem Appartement.

Really nice apartment close to the shopping areas and Trindade station, where you can catch all of the metro lines. Very quiet despite its location and 2 minutes from a supermarket.
Everything in the apartment works, and the shower is great. If you're unsteady on your feet then the spiral staircase means this is probably not for you.
Super bem localizado! Estilo muito giro! Decoração fantástica! limpeza impecável!  Recomendo!!
Excelente localização , muito aconchegante o espaço do apartamento ! Contribuiu para que nossa estadia em Porto fosse maravilhosa . O metro é muito perto !

Sehr schönes Apartment, zentrale Lage, alles gut zu Fuß zu erreichen, Bahnhof direkt um die Ecke. 
Leider um diese Jahreszeit etwas feucht und kalt in der Wohnung, aber sehr schön eingerichtet.

L'appartement est très bien situé, juste à quelques pas de la station de métro et à 5 min à pieds du centre ville. Il est parfait pour un couple qui souhaite passer quelques jours à Porto quand il fait chaud ! Je ne vous recommande pas de booker cet appartement quand il fait froid en revanche, car le chauffage n'est pas très performant et les problèmes d'humidité se font sentir. Mais il parait qu'il n'y a pas beaucoup d'appartements qui sont bien chauffés à Porto. Nous aurions souhaité profiter de la terrasse mais il faisait assez froid pour petit-déjeuner dehors. Il se pourrait qu'on reloge dans cet appartement quand on reviendra à Porto en été si les problèmes de tuyauterie de la douche sont réglés.

name: Turtle Bay Resort 1 Bedroom Condo
summary: This beautiful 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom condo was just renovated and recently placed back on the market.  Located on the grounds of the gorgeous Turtle Bay Hotel, you can enjoy many of the resort luxuries while also benefiting from the comfort of having your own home away from home.  The plush king-sized bed and newly remodeled bathroom will give you the feel of luxury and the brand new kitchen, appliances, and furniture afford you the comforts and flexibility of home.  Sleeps 4 adults comfortably.

reviews.comments: We had a great time staying on the North Shore. The host was warm, welcoming, and easy to work with.  He provided all of the basic amenities we could have asked for (e.g. toilet paper, body wash, towels, cleaning supplies, laundry detergent) in addition to beach toys. The condo stayed comfortably cool with air conditioners as well as overhead fans in both the living room and the bedroom.  There was a king-sized bed in the main  bedroom with a pull-out sofa in the living room, comfortably accomodating 3 adults.  We enjoyed having a washer and dryer in the condo as well. We have stayed at condos on other Hawaiian islands and this was by far the cleanest and most up-to-date. The location was perfect, in a gated community at the Turtle Bay Resort. We had easy and close access to all of the beautiful North Shore beaches...and food trucks. We loved our stay and would highly recommend Mike and his condo!
Thanks Mike, we had a great time. Highly recommend this place for any future travellers who want to stay up in turtle bay/north shore. It was perfect for our needs.
Pra quem quer a tranquilidade que o North Shore oferece, esse condomínio é o melhor lugar para ficar. Apartamento aconchegante, bem equipado, super limpo. O anfritrião é extremamente atencioso!
great place to stay close to beaches and away from crowds and the bustle of downtown

Mike was a great host!  He was prompt to reply to any questions we had and was generous to offer a nights refund to us when our flight got cancelled and we didn't make it in until the following night. 

Pros:
- Clean
- Spacious
- Since it's a condo unit it has all the basics and more! 
- Beautiful location on the golf course

Being a ground unit, you can hear the tenants upstairs - but it wasn't so bad that it would deter us from staying here again.  We would definitely recommend Mike's place to our family and friends.

The house was very clean and confortable! The condo is realy amazing and safe! 
Everything was just perfect!!

Thanks for everything Mike we had a great time! Mike was really great to work with and quick to respond. The location is perfect and gives quick access to all the north shore popular spots. We traveled with our 6 month old and Mike provided a pack n play which was HUGE. There was also beach gear available (umbrella, boogie board, snorkel gear) at the condo which was so nice and convenient. We would for sure stay here again!!

My husband and I had a  a lovely stay in Mikes beautiful Condo in Turtle Bay. It was a perfect quite location only 5-10 mins walk from Turtle Bay resort. We were happy to enjoy some of Turtle Bay resorts restaurants and bars without the price tag of staying there. 

We would highly recommend to anyone else looking to stay in the area. 

Mike also left us some recommendations for places to visit in the north shore area and places to eat which we used to plan our days - saved us hours of research and was greatly appreciated.

The bed is like sleeping on a cloud, best sleep ever. 
communication was fantastic, so many great tips and everything was covered. really loved our stay and will be back

Stayed here for 4 nights. Everything was very clean, remodeled and perfect for 3 adults.  I live in Waikiki, and it was the perfect staycation spot that we were looking for. Being a short drive to all of the must see spots on the North Shore was fantastic, and we loved being able to walk to Turtle Bay property for evening sunsets and cocktails. 

Mike was a great host, very responsive and got us everything we needed. I would recommend his place to anyone looking for a cozy, comfortable and clean place to stay.

Excellent location. Secured community at the Turtle Bay resort on the stunning north shore of Oahu. Mike was excellent with the communications and getting us all set up. He made excellent recommendations for food and activities in the area. Condo is recently updated with all the modern conveniences. We will be back again!
Great location for exploring the north shore, great space to stay. The condo was well stocked, and we used the beach towels and chairs so much! Would recommend Mike's place for sure!
Such a great condo. It was very clean and convenient to Turtle Bay Resort. It was a short walk to the resort for dinner or a drink. We will stay here again if we have the chance to visit Oahu again.
Very clean condo. Had a few questions when I got there and Mike responded immediately with the answers.
Super clean and super beautiful location.
The condo was great, perfect for all the activities around North Shore Oahu. Our highlight was snorkelling at Sharks cove. Will definitely come back in the future.

The condo was great! Convenient location to all the best surf spots and resort. Mike was a wonderful host. He was very reposnsive when I accidentally missed an email from him even though he was flying. We greatly appreciated our time on the North Shore and loved staying at Mike and Kate’s condo.

Our family of four loved staying here over Christmas, the kids could not get enough of the pool and we loved the golf course and mountain views from the patio, very relaxing. We found Turtle Bay very secure and in a great spot being so close to the north shore, and we thoroughly enjoyed the restaurants and beaches throughout the resort. The unit is very well stocked, comfortable, and everything worked perfectly - and I have to mention the king bed is very comfy, and so is the sofa bed. All in all - 5 stars!
The place is great and we would stay there again for sure!

We had a fantastic time at Mike’s condo on the North Shore. It was very clean with a king bed, nice bathroom and upgraded kitchen – the perfect size for two of us. Great location near the Turtle Bay Resort; it was walking distance to restaurants, trails, stables, the beach and the condo backs on to one of Turtle Bay’s two golf courses.  Mike was a wonderful host who responded to any questions very quickly and we truly felt as though he wanted us to have the best stay possible.  We would stay here again should our travels take us back to Oahu!

Thanks for being such a great host, Mike! We very much enjoyed our stay and will be back! The recommendations for restaurants and things to do near by were spot on, and the condo was very clean and comfortable for our stay. The washer and dryer was such a nice bonus too! Mahalo!

We had a wonderful time staying here during our first visit to Oahu and the North Shore. The place was immaculate, cozy, comfortable bed, close proximity to the pools, and a nice walk to the resort, beaches, and many beautiful hiking trails surrounding the property. We travelled with our 1 year old (Mike kindly supplied a pack-n-play which was so helpful!) and the unit was perfectly baby friendly and having laundry in-unit was helpful. Mike also supplied a list of things to do/places to eat at and we loved each and everyone we tried on the list and felt like they were quality handpicked local spots.

Thank you & we hope to be back one day!
Fantastic condo looking that opens directly onto the golf course! We had a great stay.

Ficamos oito noites na casa do Mike e foi maravilhoso. Tudo impecável. A casa possui todo o conforto necessário para uma excelente estadia, é totalmente equipada. Tivemos um problema com as chaves e o Mike resolveu imediatamente. Thank you for everything Mike. We had a great time in your home and We hope to return soon.
Great spot, highly recommended!

The condo was absolutely perfect! They provided us a list of places to eat and everything was just as they said- I must have gone back to that list everyday! North shore is a great get away, and this property made paradise possible for a few days!
Excellent facilities and Mike was very helpfully with everything
great place in a great location would defy stay there  again
Mike's place was very clean, we loved the large living room and bathroom . Mike was also a great communicator. The condo was well located on near turtle bay resort. The condo had everything you need.
Super awesome place and price. Look forward to booking it in the future.

The condo was an amazing place to stay at!!!perfect in every way, the condo was well stocked with all kitchen necessities, beach necessities, basic amenities (shampoo, body wash, toothpaste, towels, toilet paper, cleaning supplies, sun screen) just to name a few, washer & dryer was a super plus to have, very clean & welcoming. Back porch view right on the golf course which my husband loved he played the course every other day. Mike was a awesome host he provided us with excellent recommendations for places to eat and things to do. Mike definitely made it easy for a first time Airbnb user to feel comfortable. Definitely a place to recommend. Would love to stay at Mike’s place for our future vacations. Mahalo Mike for everything.
Everything was great.

Couldn’t be happier with our stay at Mike’s condo. As soon as we arrived the condo was sparkling clean, and felt warm and cozy. Perfect spot to relax with my kids after 5 busy days in Honolulu. Everything we needed was there, plus more. Floaties, beach chairs, boogie board, even an ice chest was there for us to enjoy, which we did! Pool was small but very nice and never crowded. Perfect for our little family of 3. The area is nice and quiet, with very friendly neighbors. We were able to do all our activities during the day then come home to relax. Tips on where to go we’re super helpful and helped us to pick all the right spots. Would definitely recommend this place to our family and friends.
The location couldn't have been any better. The unit is larger than it looks in the pictures. We had plenty of room and just truly enjoyed our stay.

Our family stayed here for 6 nights, and had a wonderful time! The local recommendations Mike gave us (beaches  and places to eat etc.) was so on point, we wouldn’t have had that much fun without it!!!

Amazing value for the North Shore. Came to this part of town for a wedding with some of our friends who are locals. Easy in and out access. A/C throughout. Updated kitchen etc. Would def stay here again.

Mike's place was very nice!  It was clean, delightfully updated, and felt light and airy.  We really appreciated the A/C units, ceiling fans, laundry soap and snorkeling gear.  The location is close to Laie on the East and Haleiwa on the West and many beaches in between.  It is just perfect for North Shore activities.

Mike was a great host.  He responded to questions very quickly and his local recommendation sheet was very useful.  We recommend Kahuku Farms for an awesome acai bowl with lilikoi butter. 

We would definitely stay here again and recommend to our friends!
This is a great place to stay! Plenty of beach goodies - floaties, cooler bag, chairs and beach toys for kids too. Modern chic space with air conditioning and a nice view of the golf course.

We usually stay at the hotel on the resort, but and thought to try something new. 

Mike is very responsive and provides great tips for your stay.  The condo is stocked with just about everything you will need, including a iron/ironing board and hair dryer. There are also a number of beach items like floaties, chairs, and umbrella. Super nice for your days at the beach.  

Close to all the best things on the North Shore, it’s a 10 minute walk to the beach. There is also free limited beach access parking at Turtle Bay - about 30. They fill up fast so get there early. Haleiwa, PCC, Sunset Beach, Waimea Falls, Ted’s Bakery, 2 Foodland locations and countless food trucks are all within a 20 minute drive.

Mike is very communicative about the space and is quick to answer messages. I was able to meet him and his family and they were very friendly and welcoming in person as well. It’s a nice and quiet “get away from it all” kind of space... and IF you happen to be looking to play at a resort hotel Turtle Bay Hilton shares the grounds. We were here to see family and enjoy the north shore... MISSION ACCOMPLISHED!! 
Mahalo Nui Loa (Thank You Very Much)

What a great location, with a beautiful Mauka and golf course view. The condo is close to everything you need for a relaxing North Shore vacation, and Mike's tips on local favorites were spot on. The condo was the perfect size for our family of three, and we would definitely come back!
Well appointed condo on the golf course, with a terrific location on the North Shore. My family and I had an absolutely wonderful stay, and hope to return soon! Thanks Mike

Mike’s place is in an ideal location.  We stayed here for a week and traveled the whole island. 
We had lunch and breakfast at Lei Leis and for great fish and hamburgers, try Seven Brothers at the Sugar Mill in Kahuku. It was delicious and good prices.
Kahuku fruit stand was a good place for fresh fruits.
The drive from Kahuku to the east along the north shore is simply gorgeous.
We agree with Mike, the North Shore is the best place to be.

Excellent proximity to Turtle Bay and resort facilities.  Wonderful walks along superb coastline and through golf course.  Place is comfortable and really worked for us over a family wedding weekend.   Comparably good value.
Very clean and comfortable place to stay. Always felt safe! Easy access to anything you want to do in a Oahu.
Muito conforto
Lots to do on the North Shore away from the crowds.

Mikes place is such a gem, right in the heart of the North Shore! The place is extremely spacious, cool and comfortable. Mike was also a pleasure and was so easy to get into contact with, as well as leaving the best tips for the North Shore with his guests. It was super nice to come back each day from a surf and have a homely place to relax in whilst having a cocktail or two on the Lanai. We will be back!!!
quite and clean

traffic is a bit congested during the afyer oons and evenings along the entire north shore

put together a good plan that avoids the traffic

overall the place was in a good location
buy supplies at the grocery store for cooking dinner a d having late night snacks
the north shore gets really quiet after 7pm, during the week

name: Napili Surf Beach Resort -Lokelani- #214 2nd Floor
summary: Aloha, We are open after a very extensive restoration project! We restored, replaced & rebuilt the entire plumbing infrastructure, the roof & gutter system, new photo voltaic system & solar water heaters, kitchen & bath cabinets, counters & showers. Interior & exterior paint & and few other items. All units are equipped with new kitchen appliances. Portable Air Conditioning are in all units in the living room area. We look forward to your visit to enjoy our new and updated look!
space: This 500 square foot Ocean View unit #214 on the second floor of the Lokelani wing provides you a view of the beautiful bay as well as the majestic island of Moloka'i on the horizon. This corner unit is equipped with two lanai's (patio's) allowing natural light to enhance your unit. The unit has a king-size bed and a twin sofa pull out, comfortable to to accommodate up to three persons. An ideal home away from home location!

Napili Surf Beach Resort consists of four
access: E Komo Mai no ka hale! "Come into our house!" Napili Surf Beach Resort consists of four two-story buildings, which house 53 privately owned condominiums. Each fully-equipped condominium offers the amenities and convenience of a resort, but with all of the comforts of your own home. The resort is nestled on one of Maui's most beautiful beaches, crescent shaped Napili Bay.  We are best known for our spectacular oceanfront setting, breathtaking views, and gracious island ho'okipa (hospitality).  The peaceful, laid-back, unpretentious setting makes for the perfect vacation destination!  Enjoy your stay here, And, if there is anything we can do to enhance your experience, please do not hesitate to ask us at any time. He mea Ho'okipa - "we are at your service!" name: Charming urban 1 Bedroom apartment
summary: Our cute and comfortable one bedroom apartment has an actual urban city feel.Located in the Trendy area of Sai Ying Pun, where markets stalls and mechanic shops blend with hipster bars and restaurants. Beat the Central/ Soho crowds and head just a ten-minute walk west to this perfect little oasis from which you can explore.
space: Lovely and quiet modern apartment. Enjoy the sunshine , greenery and bird songs coming from the trees outside the bedroom window . All within walking distance from Central Hong Kong.
description: Our cute and comfortable one bedroom apartment has an actual urban city feel.Located in the Trendy area of Sai Ying Pun, where markets stalls and mechanic shops blend with hipster bars and restaurants. Beat the Central/ Soho crowds and head just a ten-minute walk west to this perfect little oasis from which you can explore. Lovely and quiet modern apartment. Enjoy the sunshine , greenery and bird songs coming from the trees outside the bedroom window . All within walking distance from Central Hong Kong. Easily accessible, with a large amount of public transport available. If coming from the airport express, it's easy to take the MTR to Sai Ying Pun station which offers a flat and easy walk and literally across the street from the apartment block. A small walk up and your in your quiet, sunny open and bright retreat away from the hustle and Bustle of Hong Kong. We're away, so phone and email will be best, but we do have a domestic helper on-hand for local help. Sai Ying Pun is an amazin
neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun is an amazing part of Hong Kong Island. Vibrant yet quiet with interesting street art , hidden cafes, galleries, small boutiques , yoga studios and boutique gyms and excellent new restaurants, you'll struggle to get bored. Craving a sea breeze and open space, just a 5 min walk to the water front to Sun Yat Sen Memorial park , the perfect picnic spot or place to take a stroll along and take in the fresh sea breeze before you find where you can find yourself a relaxing little spot on the green grass under the statue of Mr. Sun Yat Sen himself.
transit: Easy to find, with a myriad of transport options. A perfect Hub from which to see all that Hong Kong has to offer! MTR- Sai Ying Pun, Shueng Wan, Central, Hong Kong are all within easy walking distance. Central and Sai Ying Pun Escalator Various buses and taxi's

summary: Loft espaçoso em frente a praia, e a 50 mts da Av. Olegário Maciel, famosa rua da Barra onde estão os restaurantes, farmácias, bancos e vida noturna.  Condomínio Barraleme, com portaria e segurança 24 hs. Decoração  descon-traída, ambiente claro, confortável com linda vista para a Pedra da Gávea e o mar. Está voltado para o sol nascente , com  Internet  Wi-fi , ar condicionado (SPLIT), local de trabalho e garagem. Meu espaço é bom para casais,  viajantes de negócios e casal com  duas crianças.
space: Meu espaço tem 60 m2, com espaços integrados , sala de estar e jantar, cozinha, quarto, closet e banheiro. O apartamento é muito bem equipado , proporcionando tudo o que você espera de uma estadia agradável e confortável.

house_rules: 1- Somente para hóspedes, não aceitamos visitantes ou encontros casuais; 2- Todos os hóspedes precisam cumprir o mesmo calendário da reserva principal, não serão aceitas reservas paralelas de hóspedes com data de chegada ou partida diferente dos demais para efeito de controle do Airbnb. 3 – Todos os hóspedes deverão enviar fotos de seus documentos de identidade e apresenta-los no check-in; 4-Desligar o aparelho de ar condicionado, TVs e luzes ao sair do imóvel; 5- Não portar ou utilizar materiais que possam trazer riscos; 6- Só é permitido fumar na varanda; 7- Quando voltar da praia, retirar a área na bica e chuveiro no térreo, atrás do prédio, para não entrar no imóvel com areia; 8- Esperamos que todos os hóspedes sigam as regras da boa convivência determinada pelo prédio, principalmente sobre os horários de silêncio de 22:00hs à 8:00 hs; 9- Não é permitido animais de estimação; 10- Temos vagas para estacionamento na garagem grátis, o carro deverá ser cadastrado na recepção; 11- Não é

Glad to welcome you as well. As I travel a lot, I, as hostess, try to offer everything that I would like to find as a guest.

reviews.comments: Muchas gracias Vera, el departamento está muy bien equipado y una decoración muy linda, es luminoso, bien ubicado y estuvimos muy cómodos
Apartamento lindo como nas fotos, muito bem localizado. A Vera atendeu todas as nossas necessidades, amei a estadia, pretendo voltar mais vezes!
ótimo Lugar, espaçoso, charmoso, muito bem localizado. a Anfitriã muito atenciosa. A estadia foi excelente!

Vera e seu marido são pessoas muito educadas. O serviço oferecido pelo condomínio é maravilhoso, principalmente as amenidades de lazer (piscina, serviço de praia, saunas, funcionários, etc.), porém tivemos azar pois exatamente na semana que ficamos hospedados o ar-condicionado estava com problema e não gelava como deveria. A geladeira também parou de funcionar. 2 outros pontos que poderiam ser revistos pelos anfitriões são: o apartamento fica em um andar alto e venta muito, a porta da sacada (mesmo com uma peça que ajuda a diminuir) faz muito barulho - atrapalha para dormir. Ficamos uma semana e achamos que ao menos uma limpeza a cada 3 dias seria saudável para uma estadia em apartamento de praia.
Es un departamento increible con todos los detalles y muy buen gusto. Excelente ubicacion. Nos encanto pasar las vacaciones en este lugar
Todo ha sido excelente :)

El departamento de Verá es un sueño!!! Todos los detalles cuidados, la decoración es fabulosa, el edificio tiene muchas amenities con una ubicación privilegiada y servicio de playa. Lo más lindo y disfrutable es el departamento que te hará sentir como en casa! Verá tiene un gran gusto para la decoración y recibe a Sus huéspedes de una manera extraordinaria. Gracias por todo Vera! Volveremos! Si tu destino es Barra no dudes en rentar el departamento de Verá en Barra Leme! Imperdible!
A Vera foi uma ótima anfitriã. O apto é maravilhoso, super aconchegante e com uma localização excelente. Adorei e espero voltar em breve.

El departamento es hermoso mucho mas grande que lo que parece en fotos, la vista es increible y la ubicacion tambien, cerca de la zona gastronómica y frente a la playa. Te dan sombrilla y reposeras. El dpto tiene de todo para poder cocinar, incluso una heladerita para la playa.
Definitivamente volveriamos. Gracias por todo!
Gracias Vera. El departamento es hermoso. No le falta nada. Es muy lindo y cómodo para permanecer y cocinar. Es muy bueno contar con sillas y sombrilla para la playa. Gracias y volveremos.

Nuestra estadia fue mas que excelente. El depto es efectivamente mas comodo de lo que parece en fotos, super limpio, frente a la playa donde encima podes pedir reposeras y sobrilla y a 4 cuadras de donde pasa todo en barra. Vera estuvo maravillosa con nuestros pedidos. Super flexible y siempre queriendo ayudar. 
Nuestro primer viaje de playa con nuestra hija de 1 año y 5 meses. Mejor no podria haberlo imaginado. Obrigado Vera!
Super recomendo! muito bem localizado, equipe do prédio muito bem preparada e receptiva, adoramos e já queremos voltar!
Excelente apartamento para uma pessoa ou casal. Muito bem localizado em predio de frente para Praia e próximo ao comércio da Olegário. A Vera foi muito solícita.
Apartamento incrível, super bem equipado, com decoração impecável, silencioso e próximo de tudo. A Vera é uma ótima anfitriã.

Vera is a great host. Hand on, making sure everything is perfect in the apartment. House is very clean, everything you need in the kitchen. Fantastic view.  Easy access to everything (beach, supermarkets, mall and restaurants). Highly recommend. You won’t regret booking her place. Hope to comeback again there.
Excelente apt ! Estiloso , vista incrível, bem localizado  , comunicação otima !  Tudo funcionando perfeitamente ...nota mil !!

El alojamiento de Vera es excelente pasamos unos dias excelentes en Rio, lo recomiendo y tambien a ella como anfitriona. El departamento es muy comodo y excelente ubicado. Quedamos muy felices con nuestra estadía

Com satisfação escrevo sobre o apartamento de Vera.
Do jeito anunciado e surpreendida com o zelo, capricho, carinho e detalhes.
Vera é uma artista , sua arte espalhada pela casa  torna o ambiente aconchegante, colorido e moderno.
Apartamento equipado e limpo. 
Mimos como água gelada, filtro de café, café, geleia, etc.., e material de limpeza !

Localização excelente e vista deslumbrante!

Com certeza voltaremos!

Super indicaremos aos amigos!


Muito obrigada pelos dias proporcionados e até breve.
 Att.

Família de Assis Carmo

O loft é muito bem localizado, super seguro, além de um charme.
A Vera é muito atenciosa, e estava sempre disponível para responder as perguntas... Só achei apertado pra 4 pessoas pois o sofá cama é um pouco pequeno, mero detalhe, conseguimos dormir bem, e a vista da sacada é linda, fora a decoração do local, super estilosa. volto com certeza.
Es un departamento chico pero muy bien equipado y mucho gusto. Esta en una zona que para mi gusto es la mejor zona de barra de Tijuca
Não vão se arrepender

O espaço da Vera é exatamente como as fotos! Charmoso, aconchegante, limpo e equipado. Vera nos orientou em todos os passos e ficou disponível para o que precisássemos. 
O apartamento está muito bem equipadinho e não tivemos dificuldade em fazer nossas refeições lá. O condomínio também é ótimo e a localização bem legal, pertinho da Olegário à pé. Tivemos ótimos dias e certamente iremos retornar em breve!

name: Ladder up to your own loft bed
summary: Featured in Brooklyn Magazine, March 2016. Look for "Lofty Living in Williamsburg". Just steps from the best of "The Burg". Grab a great cup of coffee at Freehold. Check out the brand new Apple store & Whole Foods The kitchen is made for cooking in. Unlike many NYC apartments, you will not feel cramped here. This loft boasts amazing high ceilings. It's truly a unique experience. Sleep in a private lofted bed that is completely separate from the main bedroom.
space: Whenever anyone new walks into my home, they are amazed. There is something so wonderful being in a place with such high ceilings and having so much open space to live in. It's a truly unique and wonderful experience while staying in NYC.
description: Featured in Brooklyn Magazine, March 2016. Look for "Lofty Living in Williamsburg". Just steps from the best of "The Burg". Grab a great cup of coffee at Freehold. Check out the brand new Apple store & Whole Foods The kitchen is made for cooking in. Unlike many NYC apartments, you will not feel cramped here. This loft boasts amazing high ceilings. It's truly a unique experience. Sleep in a private lofted bed that is completely separate from the main bedroom. Whenever anyone new walks into my home, they are amazed. There is something so wonderful being in a place with such high ceilings and having so much open space to live in. It's a truly unique and wonderful experience while staying in NYC. The whole first floor is yours to access. The upstairs is private and my bedroom. If you are not renting the whole place out, that means I have not set up the upstairs section for guests. If I am home to greet you, I will absolutely do my best to tell you about the neighborhood and walk you throug
neighborhood_overview: There is sooo much to offer in this neighborhood. South Williamsburg is bustling with things to do.  • Smorgasborg on Saturdays just a 5 minute walk up the street • North Brooklyn Farms (a little park and garden) is at the end of my block. It's an awesome place to chill out in, take in the waterfront views, buy some vegetables (they sell them in harvest seasons).  • Too many restaurants to name. Explore!!
notes: There is an exterior camera to monitor the outside of the home. Any attempt at disabling, redirecting or obscuring the cameras is prohibited and will result in full forfeiture of the security deposit and may, at the host’s discretion, result in the guest being evicted without refund of outstanding nights’ rents.
transit: There is a CitiBike station right outside the apartment which is very convenient. The L train and the JMZ trains are a 10-13 minute walk away.
access: The whole first floor is yours to access. The upstairs is private and my bedroom. If you are not renting the whole place out, that means I have not set up the upstairs section for guests.
interaction: If I am home to greet you, I will absolutely do my best to tell you about the neighborhood and walk you through the apartment myself. In the case that I am not there, I will communicate everything you'll need to know to make your stay as great as possible.
house_rules: No loud music or TV after 11:30pm.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a UX/UI designer working at a tech startup. I also love to take photographs, cook, play tennis and explore new places. :)

reviews.comments: Danika was a great host! Her loft is beautiful and she made sure I felt comfortable.

I had a wonderful time. The Loft is perfect and  have a very good localization in Williamsburg. And Danika is a special person, she receive me very well! Show me the places and was always very kind. Tank you for every thing! I hope come back.
Danika is very relaxed and friendly. The loft was perfectly located and I enjoyed my stay there
Danika's place was awesome! Very very spacious and comfortable! Great location, right near citibike and under the Williamsburg bridge. Danika is a very considerate host. Highly recommended!!!

Danika is a lovely person who is very accommodating and easy-going. Her loft is a big, creative space, which gives a real New York experience, and is conveniently located within walking distance of everything Williamsburg, Brooklyn, has to offer. Very highly recommended!

The loft is a very cool bohemian space. Safe and secure. Communication was prompt. Bed is cozy and comfortable. Slept great! Cool neighborhood. Get coffee at Devocion 3 blks away. I would definitely stay again!
Danika is a great host!

Danika is great host. Room is really cool. I like her space, book shelfs, sofa, kitchen, also ALEXA(Amazon echo). I had fun in Brooklyn. I always use CITI bike(Sharing Bike), because Bike Stand is close to there. And then, I love Williamsburg area. I wanna stay again. Thank you. Keep in touch.

Danika is an excellent host. She communicates quickly and clearly. Her accommodations are clean and stylish, safely located in a private community, but easily entered from Danika's instructions. And her apartment is gorgeous (and this is coming from a New Yorker of 20 years!) as well perfectly located in a fun and scenic residential neighborhood. Highly recommend!
Danika's place is so cool and spacious. She's an incredibly gracious and helpful host, and I would totally stay here again. I loved taking an afternoon nap in the hammock and watching hbo go.
This was a really cool space and Danika is a terrific host. She went out of her way to make me feel welcome. I definitely look forward to staying here again.

Danika is a lovely host. Her place is great, super stylish, big and comfortable. It was also really nice to spend time with Danika. Communication was super easy and she was extremely helpful and friendly. Highly recommend to stay with her!

Danika's humble abode was lovely. Her hospitality was amazing and it was the best introduction to Brooklyn that I could have ever got.

Highly recommend to others !!

My stay at Danika's place was great. She is an amazing host. Friendly, cool and welcoming. The location is excellent and the loft is just as pictured; spacious, comfortable and chic. Would definitely stay here again.

The apartment is easy to find and about 10min walk from the Marcy Station in Williamsburg. 
When I saw the apartment for the first time I was completely flashed. Everything about it looks as if someone spent a lot of time and thoughts about the furniture, lights, etc. and how to make it look urban/rustic/stylish. It is just awesome. You can not wish for more if you are looking for a loft in the area of New York City. It seems to be the perfect location, because you have several restaurants and bars around, which also have there very special individual types (urban/hipster etc.) Although I was not able to meet Danika in person, she was always available and tried to make me feel welcome and comfortable. She has been a great host.
Excellent Brooklyn location, and a fab loft to stay. The host is very responsive, and has some great features in the apt to chill and relax: Audio system and hammock! Cheers

name: Kaanapali Hillside 3 bedroom condo
summary: Welcome to my beautiful, bright and airy condo with ocean views located on prestigious Kaanapali Hillside. Fully equipped 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath, pool, tennis court, bbq, outdoor seating and herb garden. Walking distance to voted #1 beach in the world, Whalers Village, hotels and top restaurants. Golf, surfing, hiking.
space: Ocean views from every room.  Ideal location. Walking distance to beaches, shops, hotels and restaurants
description: Welcome to my beautiful, bright and airy condo with ocean views located on prestigious Kaanapali Hillside. Fully equipped 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath, pool, tennis court, bbq, outdoor seating and herb garden. Walking distance to voted #1 beach in the world, Whalers Village, hotels and top restaurants. Golf, surfing, hiking. Ocean views from every room.  Ideal location. Walking distance to beaches, shops, hotels and restaurants Prestigious neighborhood on hillside located across the street from #1 beach in the world.
neighborhood_overview: Prestigious neighborhood on hillside located across the street from #1 beach in the world.
house_rules: Respectful of the neighborhood

host.host_about: Aloha, my name is Leah.  I have lived in Hawaii between Maui and Kauai for the past 20 years.  My passions include traveling the world, summiting mountains, snowboarding, surfing, yoga, running marathons and competing in triathlons.  Hawaii is my home base, however I split time between Kauai, Maui and Bend, Oregon.  Please enjoy, relax and make yourself at home.

reviews.comments: Beautiful house, awesome location  and great communication with owner for  check in. All around an awesome time.
Beautiful house, awesome location  and great communication with owner for  check in. All around an awesome time.
The host canceled this reservation 66 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great place with beautiful views.
Fanatic location for small roads trips to other beaches, the beach which is walking distance from the house is beautiful but very touristy.  The house had all the beach accessories you need for all which was awesome, unfortunately the pool on site is not so great for toddlers.
Will definitely come back to Maui based on our experience

This is a great house for families. The place is full of things that you need for vacations. The kitchen and bath were very clean and the garden is amazing. Leah is always available and helpful. I recomend this place a lot
It is a great location with a reasonable price. Leah provided super helpful instruction for checking in and everything went smoothly.

Good experience in the great house 
Good location and everything in house is convenient
Leah's place is wonderful.  There were more than enough bed's and supplies to make the stay like you were at home. Lots of pots, pans, dishes, sheets, spices, and condiments for cooking.

We had a great stay in Maui.  The condo is roomy, clean and well equipped.  The grounds are beautiful and the location is close to the beach, shopping and restaurants, a bit far from the airport though... The  check in process went smooth just as described in our instructions.  The communication with Leah was excellent.
Overall we had a great experience.  We would rent this place again.

This condo was very comfortable and spacious - plenty of space to relax as a family which was really appreciated. The condo itself was farther from the beach than we had thought. About a 15 minute walk on a route that wasn't entirely pedestrian friendly. Would have been fine if it wasn't for the kiddos. However - was easy to hop in the car and at that point there were many gorgeous and different Beachs within minutes! Loved our stay and would definitely recommend!!!

Leah's place is great! The condo is very spacious and well equipped. The property is absolutely beautiful and central to the beach, shops and restaurants. 
We had a great stay and will definitely recommend.

The place was great, exactly as the pictures show. It was a quick 5-10 minute walk down the hill to the beach. Plenty of room for our group of 7. Leah was very easy to work with and always responded quickly to any questions we had.
Great space, quiet and fantastic location

Nous avons séjourné du 6 au 21 juillet chez Leah. Nous étions 7 voyageurs. Çe fut magnifique. La maison est située à environ 10 minutes à pied de la plage, dans un quartier très calme . Les lieux sont très bien entretenus et c'est  très propre. Tout est facilitant pour cuisiner, ou se divertir. Nous conseillons fortement cet endroit. Quant à Leah, c'est une personne qui désire que ses invités soient confortables et heureux. Nous garderons un excellent souvenir de notre séjour.

We loved our trip to Maui! This rental was great and met all of our needs. Great location for a quick trip to several of the nearby destinations (Lahaina, Napili Bay, east distance to the airport). We visited for a wedding at the Royal Lahaina Resort and so this location was perfect for us. We had a couple of really hot and humid nights and I did miss air conditioning on those two nights but the rest we were perfectly comfortable. Leah is great!! :)

The house is great value for a family traveling to Maui, has all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay and are able to cook meals easily. I'd recommend you have a car so you can get around the island, only the beach and one cafe are in walking distance. 

The home is part of a group of apartments, if seemed like the other apartments were older people, so are likely to complain to the office for the smallest offense e.g. Talking too loud on the verandah, taking a floaty for a child in the pool.

We were in Lahaina for a wedding at the Royal Lahaina and Leah's place was so close and convenient to meet with friends throughout our trip. Very close to shopping, attractions, dining and sight seeing, UBER was easy to get, parking was available for our vehicle rental with no problem. HIGHLY recommend, we already want to go back! Would stay at Leah's again.
Leah’s condo is lovely, well stocked and in an awesome location. It so close to everything.  If we had questions our calls were returned immediately. I would highly recommend this unit.

Ons verblijf in Kaanapali bij Leah was heel erg geslaagd. Een prima ruime condo waar wij met 6 volwassenen meer dan voldoende ruimte hadden. Gratis gebruik van de tennisbaan en het zwembad waar wij bijna dagelijks te vinden waren.
De locatie is ook echt top. Binnen 2 minuten ben je op het strand en leuke hotspots als Black Rock beach en Whalers Village zijn op 5 minuten rij-afstand.
Echt een aanrader voor wie een bezoek gaat brengen aan West-Maui.

Leah was extremely easy to talk to and work with. She's very quick to reply with any questions or problems. Checking in and out was a breeze. We had a very late flight home and she allowed my family and I a late check out. The home is just as pictured!

The location is about 30mins from OGG airport but close proximity to restaurants, night life, shopping, and the BEACH! We spent a lot of time on Front St which is roughly 5 miles away. The home does not have AC but going the first week in December wasn't too bad. With the ocean close by it provided a nice breeze thru the windows. 

We had little children with us and Leah's home is a two story house with an open wooden staircase so be very careful. Also there is a strict rule - quiet time is btw 10pm - 8am. The area is located in a very quiet and private residence so during quiet time, the littlest noise can be heard. Just something to also keep in mind if traveling with kids.
Unit was as advertised. Great view,parking OK. Nice walk down to the Roy am kahuna hotel, tougher coming back
It  was a great pleasure to stay there. Nice and clean. Very good location too. I highly recommend this place.

We had a great time in Maui and a lot was due to this amazing rental. Leah really works with you and is very quick in response to questions. She let us check in a little early. The quiet times are very strict. Be sure not to be out on the Lanai before  8:00 am. The master bedroom is very spacious and has a great balcony! Great location!! This condo is an amazing place to stay.
Great location, value, and host! I loved the easy walk down to a popular beach.

Leah was very quick and thoughtful with her responses, and it really made my family feel like we were supported in our adventure to Hawaii! My family and I stayed at her condo for 6 nights, and part of the reason why we enjoyed our time in Hawaii was because of the amenities there (all necessary bathroom products, one beach towel and one bath towel per guest, ample closet space with hangers, a washer/dryer, a fully-stocked kitchen, and beach gear)! Please be sure to follow the house/community rules as management and neighbors are very mindful of them!
Great time on Maui in a great condo. Thanks Leah!!

Great place! Leah was quick in responding with any questions or concerns, Clean spacious cozy condo. Walking distance to Kaanapali beach for snorkeling. Everything you need home is equipped with. Be mindful it’s an older community so rules about noise do apply. Whalers Village nearby overall a great place to stay. 

Thank you Leah!
walking distance to the beach and great view of the water and other islands!
The host canceled this reservation 141 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is an absolute wonderful deal for the price!  It’s location  is a short drive to many things, which we loved!  Leah was a great host who was very responsive before our stay and during! Many reviews talked about the strict rules and they weren’t kidding! We are rule followers who had a 7, 5 and 3 year old with us and thought the quiet rules would be perfect.  However, it was ridiculously overboard and we wouldn’t stay there again because of those rules.  We had to whisper at the pool and when one of my kids spoke in a regular voice, we were told we need to be quiet by a resident. Another day the manager rang our doorbell at 7:30am because he had complaints the day before and assumed it was us (though we were away the whole day).  It was hotter than usual when we were there, and just a reminder there is no a/c and it is a tropical island...we had more bugs than we were okay with (not sure the house gets sprayed for them).
Perfect location ! Close to the beach and short distance whalers village. Quick drive to front st! Loved it !
This condo was perfect for our family of 7!  Was completely furnished, including items for the beach!  We enjoyed having a ‘home’ for our vacation!

name: Beachside Blue - AC, close to beach and PCC
summary: Property Highlights  AC/Fans Wifi Large Yard Full Kitchen Fully furnished Close to North Shore & PCC Close to beaches Quiet and Private Safe and Convenient Comfortable and Relaxing Very Clean and Homely feeling
space: Description  Experience real Hawaii in this fully furnished and newly renovated property in Hauula. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. Nestled in the heart of the NorthEast Shore, you will feel like a local when you stay here. Enjoy all that there is to offer here without breaking the bank. You will enjoy convenience and comfort the rest of your vacation with all the available amenities in the home such as Air Conditioning and fans in all rooms including the living room and the kitchen; comfortable couch and bedding, washer/dryer, 48”TV in the living room, wifi, and ample parking. The kitchen is fully equipped with keurig, blender, coffee makers, rice cookers, hot water kettle, baking pans and all other the cooking pots and pans. The Master Bedroom has a 30” TV. You will feel home with the amenities included in the property: iron, ironing board, hairdryer, hair curlers, beach towels, beach chairs, cooler bags.  There’s even a handicap chair for the shower. Don’t bother buying body wash, sh
