It has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. Nestled in the heart of the NorthEast Shore, you will feel like a local when you stay here. Enjoy all that there is to offer here without breaking the bank. You will enjoy convenience and comfort the rest of your vacation with all the available amenities in the home such as Air Conditioning and fans in all rooms including the living room and the kitchen; comfortable couch and bedding, washer/dryer, 48”TV in the living room, wifi, and ample parking. The kitchen is fully equipped with keurig, blender, coffee makers, rice cookers, hot water kettle, baking pans and all other the cooking pots and pans. The Master Bedroom has a 30” TV. You will feel home w
neighborhood_overview: Location  Beach Proximity - about 10-minute walk to Hauula Beach Park Nearest Supermarket - 1 minute drive to Tamura's Supermarket and 5-minute drive to Foodland Laie Distance to Airport - 1 hour and 5-minute drive to Honolulu International Airport   Nearby Attractions  Polynesian Cultural Center - 5-minute drive Laie Point State Wayside - less than 10-minute drive Banzai Pipeline - less than 25-minute drive Waimea Bay Beach Park - less than 30-minute drive
transit: This unit is about an hour from the airport, so renting a car would be easiest for transportation. However, there is a bus system that circles the island and uber when available.
interaction: The caretaker is available when needed, so please reach out if you have anything that needs our attention.
house_rules: No smoking please. Turn off ac when leaving premises to conserve energy. Wash off sand before entering the home. Please remove shoes. Please do not cut on granite. -Please remember that this is somebody’s home, and not a hotel so please leave the home as you found it.  -Wash and dry dishes, clean stove -Remove all trash from property.  -Check for valuables such as chargers.

host.host_about: I feel lucky to help people find their perfect vacation home and make it my goal to make the entire process as smooth as possible.

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay. Tami the caretaker welcomed us with much Aloha! This house has plenty of room, huge yard, BBQ and AIR CONDTIONING!

A group of us stayed here while we were in town for a wedding just a few blocks away. This place is perfect for quick and easy getaways to the beaches just up and down the coast. There is also a mall just a block away with all the essentials. We didn't spend too much time at the home, but it was clean and comfortable with A/C. The kitchen was large and new. We definitely took advantage of the boogie boards, noodles, and beach chairs-- would definitely stay here again!

We booked 6 nights here...check-in went smoothly, we were welcomed by the land lady Tami. Place was neat and tidy, very homely, albeit very strict (e.g. No sleeping on the couch)!
However, on our first night we discovered bed bugs...I contacted Tami asking for fresh linen for the next morning. She showed up early the next day with her husband and asked us to pack up our stuff immediately and vacate the property so she could sort the bed bug issue as she "couldn't have that" as it may affect her Air BnB rating. At no point did she bother come in to check or ask any questions about the bed bugs which led us to believe that perhaps she already knew about the issue?...Very disappointed that we were basically left to seek alternative accommodation so suddenly. Needless to say, we found a beautiful, modern, bed-bug-free, apartment for a fraction of the price.
Excellent value! This service is very professional. I highly recommend it.

Beachside Blue is a clean, comfy place to stay on Oahu's North Shore.  We stayed there with my husband's elderly parents, and it was a perfect spot for us.  Lots of room to get around; and the two full bathrooms were a lifesaver.  Our two sons and their wives stayed a few nights with us, too, and we had room for all of us.  I've never stayed in a rental with more plentiful towels, blankets, and bedding than Beachside Blue!  This was soooo nice!!  Tami was a very responsive, friendly caretaker.

We were a group of six staying here and it was quite comfortable for everyone. The beds were comfy, the house was spacious and there was plenty of room to cook and relax. We loved the beautiful fenced yard, and that it's walkable to the beach. Highly recommended.
Tami is a great host. The House was fully stocked and Tami was very helpful and responsive. If you are looking for a place away from the loudness of the city then this place is perfect for you.
very nice host
The house and the host are fine. My Rental Advisor who handle it on behalf of the host were terrible to deal with.

Tami is definitely a super host! She thought of every detail possible to make our stay comfortable and worthwhile. House was stocked with anything you could possibly think of- Shampoos, conditioners, soap, first aid items, shaving cream, the list goes on.... AC for the whole house, a fully stocked kitchen, the fridge had a ice maker, she stocked the house with coolers, which we packed daily, air mattress and extra bedding, their was a washer and dryer and she even supplied the laundry detergent, towels for everyone and then some, snorkeling gear, boogie boards and even water walking shoes, etc.... We needed somewhere to stay last minute and she was very accommodating. She had us in the same day. It was home away from home. Tami you are amazing!!! Thank you.

name: Mier Serviced Apt 04
summary: Mier is located in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most fascinating districts and traditional prestigious residential area on No. 8 Hospital Road, Mid Levels. Just a 5-minute walk to access Sai Ying Pun MTR (exit C). The 24-storey serviced apartment building with 48 luxurious apartments provide 2 types of studio layout with size 470 sq.ft. Mier guests can indulge in a laidback lifestyle away from hustle and bustle of the city.
space: All of our apartment are studio layout. Apartment size is 470s.f. (gross) / (Website hidden by Airbnb)  我們的公寓是開放式設計｡建築面積為470平方英呎,實用面積為380平方英呎｡
description: Mier is located in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most fascinating districts and traditional prestigious residential area on No. 8 Hospital Road, Mid Levels. Just a 5-minute walk to access Sai Ying Pun MTR (exit C). The 24-storey serviced apartment building with 48 luxurious apartments provide 2 types of studio layout with size 470 sq.ft. Mier guests can indulge in a laidback lifestyle away from hustle and bustle of the city. All of our apartment are studio layout. Apartment size is 470s.f. (gross) / (Website hidden by Airbnb)  我們的公寓是開放式設計｡建築面積為470平方英呎,實用面積為380平方英呎｡ This is an individual apartment (no need to share with other guests) with bathroom, kitchen, one queen size bed, wardrobe, living room and dining table. We have greenly garden and self-service laundry facilities in G/F (HK$30 per laundry token). 這是一個獨立的公寓(無需與其他客人分享)｡公寓有獨立的洗手間,廚房,一張150cm*200cm的大床,衣櫃,小客廳及餐桌｡地下有小花園及自助式洗衣設備(需要購買洗衣幣) We have family size fridge, microwave, toaster, kettle, hot plate, pots and pan, glasses in kit
notes: 1.Towels, sleeper, toiletries set (Shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, toothbrush and tooth paste) will be provided upon arrival. 入住時我們提供沐浴露,洗髮露及護髮素一套,牙刷和牙膏,毛巾兩套及拖鞋｡ 2.Maid service will be provided on daily basis from Mondays to Fridays (except Sat, Sun and Public Holiday) 我們提供每日(星期一至星期五)房間清潔服務,星期六,星期日及公眾假期除外｡ 3.Towels change three times per week, linen change twice per week (except public holidays). Extra costs will be applied for additional towel/linen change or general cleaning service.  毛巾每星期更換三次,床單每星期更換兩次｡如需額外更換毛巾/床單或清潔服務,我們將收取附加費用｡ 4.Heater is available on requested (first come first serve). 如有需要,可以到前台借用暖爐(先到先得) 5.We have 24 hours self-service laundry facilities in G/F. You could but laundry token (HK$30 per token) from our 24 hours counter. Please prepare your won detergent. Or, weight laundry / dry clean service is available at extra cost.  地下洗衣房有自助式洗衣機及乾衣機｡請先到我們大堂24小時服務台購物洗衣幣(每個港幣三十元)｡請自備洗衣液｡如有需要,你也可使用我們的洗衣服務(額外收費)｡
transit: Our address is No.8 Hospital Road, Mid-levels, Hong Kong.  If you are in downtown, the nearest metro station to Sai Ying Pun MTR Station (Exit C - no need to cross the road). Please turn left (you will see Bonham Road Government Primary School) and then go straight. About 5-8 minutes, you will see a blue and white building (G/F is Wellcome Supermarket) next to a small park. Besides the small park, there are some stairs. Go down the stairs, you will find our entrance with a beautiful garden.  From airport, most of guests take Airport express line to Hong Kong Station (around HK$100) and change taxi to Mier (around HK$40-50), subject to traffic condition. 我們的地址是上環醫院道8號｡ 如果你從市區過來,最近的地鐵站為西營盤地鐵站｡請務必使用C出口(無需過馬路)｡請轉左(你會看見般含道官立小學),然後一直向前走｡大概5-8分鐘路程,你會看到一座藍白色的大廈(地下是頂好超市),旁邊是一個小公園｡公園旁邊有一條小階梯,走下去就是我們的入口｡我們大廈前面有一個小花園｡ 如果你從機場過來,大部分客人會乘坐機場快線到香港站(終點站,車費為大概港幣一百元)然後轉乘的士到Mier｡的士費用大概為港幣40-50元,視乎交通情況｡
access: This is an individual apartment (no need to share with other guests) with bathroom, kitchen, one queen size bed, wardrobe, living room and dining table. We have greenly garden and self-service laundry facilities in G/F (HK$30 per laundry token). 這是一個獨立的公寓(無需與其他客人分享)｡公寓有獨立的洗手間,廚房,一張150cm*200cm的大床,衣櫃,小客廳及餐桌｡地下有小花園及自助式洗衣設備(需要購買洗衣幣) We have family size fridge, microwave, toaster, kettle, hot plate, pots and pan, glasses in kitchen. seasoning is not provided.  廚房有雙層雪櫃,微波爐,多士爐,熱水壺,電磁爐,平底鍋及煲,餐具可供使用｡如有需要,你可自備調味品｡ Our housekeepers wash dishes provided by Mier during routine cleaning. Cleaning detergent is available on request during office hour (i.e. 8am-8pm, Mon-Sat) 進行房間清潔時,我們會清洗Mier提供的煮食用具｡如需要清潔用品,請在辦公時間聯絡我們｡
house_rules: 1)Security deposit of HK$500 (by credit card per-authorization / cash) is required. It will be released between 7-21 working days, depends on your bank (credit card per-authorization) / refund upon departure (cash deposit) , subject to no outstanding payment / missing or damaged inventories.   入住時我們需要收取港幣500元作為按金(可使用現金或visa/master/AE信用卡預授權)｡如客人退房時沒有未付的賬單/損壞或遺失物品,按金(如使用現金)將會馬上退回,而信用卡預授權將會在7-21個工作天內自動取消(視乎個別銀行的速度)｡ 2) We have one queen size bed in each apartment. Our standard package is for 2 guests only. Extra cost of HK$550 per night per additional guest will be applied if you have more than 2 guests stay in the apartment. We accept one child (under 6 years) only (per apartment) stay for free using the existing bed. 我們公寓裡面有一張150cm * 200cm的雙人床｡如果有多於兩位客人入住,我們將會收取每位額外客人每晚港幣550元的附加費｡每間公寓只接受一位六歲以下的兒童免費入住(無需加床)｡ 3) There are 48 apartments in Mier. All of them are in same size and same layout (except some apartments do not have sliding door besides the bed). Photos of different views / layout

address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
This was an easy stay, the apartment had all the essentials and was well kept.  Location was great close to Soho, Saiyingpun and Sheung Wan.   
Winnie was responsive and understanding, working around my schedule. 
Since we arrived late, it was a nice touch to get a care kit with some water and free snacks.
Friendly and accommodating host and building staff. Great location and great views from apartment.
It is a cozy house situated in a lovely area in Hong Kong. Really convenient. The host is nice but they could be more punctual. Overall, it was a great experience! We had a lovely time.

Overall it was a pleasant stay despite my misunderstanding of the sleeping arrangements. Winnie was incredibly responsive, friendly and accommodating. While not exactly cheap (but what is in Hong Kong), the unit was clean, modern and comfortable. Excellent water pressure (just remember to turn on the hot water heather). I would stay here again.
The services apartments are nice and we had a nice view from our room. Up a bit of a hill from Central but close enough to MTR. There was a bit of a hiccup at check in but was eventually resolved.
it is the perfect place to stay in HK and at the right cost
Good location, clean and handy to be able to cook simple meals.
Great place to stay in HK!
Thanks for the manager. She handled the check in and out with kindness. The building is on the hill that is little bit hard to comeback but the night view was amazing.
It was a nice stay.
great apartment, clean and quiet.
There was a small miscommunication about how the cooking facilities worked, but otherwise it was exactly what we were expecting
Meir Serviced Apartments was a great place to stay and good value for money.
This apartment is clean and excellent!
好 很好 非常好 超级无敌掌门好
Clean and cozy environment. Complimentary snacks and water made the stay even more enjoyable. Thank you very much.
nice cozy room, good for couples.

The host and home were amazing. Host was not only able to provide a very detailed package regarding check in and details of the location but the home was also described accurately as shown in the posting. Very clean and professional home and host. She was able to accommodate me greatly and also provided a welcome package of snacks during check in. Highly recommend.
Nice apartment with professional service.  Will come back and stay
Second time staying here. Always great
感覺不錯

房子非常棒,就在上环,步行去半山电梯很快,到置地广场那一片也很方便,基本上去去半山任何一个饭店､景点都很便捷｡在半山那边吃完晚饭后,刚好可以散步回来｡地理位置实在太好了,逛累了还能中途回来休息｡

房子也很棒,比照片中还要好,窗外的景色很好,令人心情舒畅｡周围很幽静｡
Loved the place, highly recommend

Really lovely place in a fantastic location. This neighborhood is both centrally located but also surprisingly quiet, which was nice. Good value given prices in HK, my room also had an incredible view. Highly recommend this place!
Good place with convenient location:)
Great plan, perfect location, amazing view, close to more than one subway station, lovely apartment, easy communication. Love it.

The Mier Apartments are in a wonderful location - an easy walk to so may cafes and shops and the Central-Mid Levels Escalators while still being relatively peaceful. Winnie was wonderful to deal with and all the staff at the Mier were so friendly. The apartment was fabulous - amazing views and sun and a really comfy bed! Will definitely stay again.
very nice place and location

Wonderful clean and modern place in a fantastic location. The nearby soho neighborhood was walkable and fun to explore. From the nearby metro station I was able to go anywhere in the city really quickly. Checking in was easy and very efficient, even for my late arrival.
Very nice and comfortable, would stay again.
房间坐落在半山区,周围安静,整洁,特别惬意｡离地铁站也只有几分钟的路程,交通便利｡房间床铺柔软舒服,设施齐全｡
This was a good place to stay. Very clean and well-equipped

Excellent!
Amazing - if you wanna cook, this is better than a hotel. 
The place is spacious, and the view is amazing.
It's quiet. 
Great location too. Try to ask for the higher floors. Love it. Great value for HK.
Good service,comfort and neatly place.
性价比很高的!就是位置在山上,爬山累哭服务态度超级好!很热情!虽然出了点意外但是很快做出了更换服务!
Location fantastica, vicina alla maggior parte dei ristoranti e metro vicina.Vista dalla finestra non sulla baia ma spettacolare per gli edifici adiacenti.
希望下次可以再来!
nice place to stay!

name: Quarto das Laranjeiras
summary: O "Quarto das Laranjeiras" fica na Foz Velha, a 100 mts do jardim do Passeio Alegre entre a foz do rio Douro e as praias no Atlântico. O centro da cidade está a 30 mnts em transportes públicos.
space: O acesso dos hóspedes ao quarto é directo do exterior através de um pátio ajardinado.
description: O "Quarto das Laranjeiras" fica na Foz Velha, a 100 mts do jardim do Passeio Alegre entre a foz do rio Douro e as praias no Atlântico. O centro da cidade está a 30 mnts em transportes públicos. O acesso dos hóspedes ao quarto é directo do exterior através de um pátio ajardinado. Durante a estadia a porta que liga o quarto à casa fica fechada pelos dois lados, do quarto pelos hóspedes e da casa por nós. Duas bicicletas poderão ser cedidas durante a estadia por 10€/dia (x2).
notes: Duas bicicletas poderão ser cedidas durante a estadia por 10€/dia (x2).
access: Durante a estadia a porta que liga o quarto à casa fica fechada pelos dois lados, do quarto pelos hóspedes e da casa por nós.

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments: Isabel and Carlos are really nice and communicative people and there place is lovely. The place is located in one of my favorite areas of Porto. Right near the beach and only minutes away from the main tourist area in the city. The room is like the pictures with a nice private bathroom, two persons bed fish tank and desk. The glass door to the garden is your private entrance to your room which is very useful. I'd loved also the tea and cookies Isabel left for me. Overall a really nice experience.

La experiencia ha sido positiva. Tanto Carlos como Isabel fueron muy amables en todo momento. La habitación cumple con las expectativas y es como aparece publicada. Está situada en la parte baja y es independiente del resto de la casa. Dispone de privacidad total. La entrada/salida es por el ventanal. El lugar y el conjunto de la casa es muy tranquilo y relajante. Lugar pefecto para un buen descanso.
Todo estaba muy limpio y  ordenado. La cama en su conjunto era muy cómoda,  el baño pequeño pero suficiente. Estuvimos un fin de semana y para esas dos noches, nos dejaron 6 toallas, champú, gel de ducha y gel de manos y de buena calidad. Disponen de secador de pelo.  Asimismo, nos dejaron en una bandejita, diferentes tipos de tés, unas pastas muy ricas, azucar y un kettel para calentar el agua. Si váis cuando hace frío, dispone de calefación.

Die Unterkunft ist wie beschrieben, es ist alles vorhanden was man brauch. Sogar ein Wasserkocher, Tee und Gebäck stehen bereit. carlos haben wir nicht kennengelernt aber Isabel hat uns sehr warmherzig empfangen. Es war toll.

Nettes, kleines Zimmer mit Bad.
Bequemes Bett und top Lage.
Carlos haben wir leider nicht kennengelernt, da wir sehr viel unterwegs waren, aber konnten seine sehr liebe Frau kennenlernen.
Fazit: Toller Aufenthalt in einer tollen Stadt
Carlos and Isabell were very warm, helpful and kind people. They made is feel very welcome and help whereever they could. We would come back any Time.

Great place! The room has everything you need, it is clear and cosy. The location is perfect - very good access both to the city center and to the beach. Lots of nice spots with good food, coffee and drinks. Hosts are very nice and helpful. We strongly recommend!

I've had a very good time in Porto, staying with Carlos and Isabel. Such nice people! The room was just right, very clean and very comfortable. And there was a dubble entrence whitch made me feel save. It is close to te river and close to the sea. Carlos and Isabel helped me find my way around and gave me a city map. Very little tourists, what I liked very much. I would stay with Isabel and Carlos again when I return to Porto!

The room is quiet with a pleasant aspect over an interior courtyard.  Close to restaurants and shops but secluded and peaceful. It is near the sea in the old town. Parking is nearby on the seafront.  The room is small but comfortable.
A gente adorou nossa estadia no Porto! Fomos muito bem recebidos e recomendamos para tudo mundo. Obrigada!!!

Isabel and Carlos are very interesting and polite people. It was really pleasant to communicate with them! The room is beautiful: cozy, clean and chill. It is 3 minutes from the ocean and also has a separate entrance, which is so conveniently. We have really enjoyed staying at this place - next our stop in Porto definitely will be in this apartment! Thank you again!
Acolhimento simpático e prestável!

Carlos and Isabel were excellent hosts. The room was very nice and clean.  They are very close to the beach and just a short bus trip away from the city centre.  They went out of their way to invite me to dinner which was such a treat.  If you are travelling to Porto I would highly recommend that you stay with Carlos and Isabel.

We really enjoyed our stay at Carlos & Isabel's Room. It is a small but charming Room which has everything you need during a short City trip. You walk ~100m to a busstation where you for example can easily get connected directly to the City Center in about 10-15 Minutes. 
Carlos & Isabel are very friendly and fantastic hosts. Just feel free to ask them whatever you want.
숙소에서 걸어서 바다까지 2분이면 갑니다. 조금 외진 곳에 있지만 500번 버스타면 다 20분 내로 도착합니다. 방은 작지만 안락하고 있을건 다 있습니다. 호스트 부부 분들도 매우 친절하십니다. 조용하고 차분한 곳이라 혼자서 여유롭게 지내기 좋습니다. 와이파이가 조금 느리고, 빨래할 곳이 없습니다. 미리 알아두고 가세요.

Just some little problems with the bathroom: water comes down from the wc and in the shower go down slowly, and didn't told before. Twice it was difficult to comunicate with host. But they are very relaxed person, the room is nice, clean and comfortable. Very close to the Foz of Douro. Bus is closed and with  a taxi is 6 euros to the centre

Great room with private entrance to inside garden. Beautiful neighbourhood close to the sea and nice bars and restaurants at the promenade. If I come back I would definitely stay at the friendly warm and welcoming place of Carlos and Isabel!

Isabel was very nice. She helped us in every need and made our stay very comfortable. The room is adorable and was perfect for our needs. The bathroom was tiny but that was no problem. It was clean and everything worked.
We can really recommend a stay there.
It's the best spot with the park and water near. And you can easily take a bus or Uber to the center. Really nice holiday vibes!

Nous avons été très bien reçu. Chambre propre et calme. Place de parking gratuite aux alentours. Il est nécessaire de prendre le bus ou le tramway pour rejoindre le coeur de porto.
Très bon séjour dans ce logement.
Prachtige locatie, binnen 1 minuut ben je bij de zee. De kamer is perfect, schoon en alles wat je nodig hebt. In de buurt een paar heerlijke eettentjes. Isabel was erg lief en makkelijk te bereiken.

Die Unterkunft liegt sehr nah am Meer und ist für 2 Personen für ein paar Tage völlig ausreichend. Das Bad war etwas klein aber alles nötige war vorhanden und sauber.
Isabel war sehr nett, hilfsbereit und am ersten Tag wurden wir herzlich von ihr empfangen.
Das Zimmer ist daher für einen kurzen Aufenthalt in Porto am Strand zu empfehlen!

Great place, very friendly and generous people. The room is lovely and very clean. The private bathroom and entrance are super practical. We can unconditionally recommend this accomodation. It is ideal, both for hanging out on Portos beaches and for visiting the city center after a lovely walk along the Douro.

The home of Carlos and Isabel is situated a mere 3 minute walk from the coast of the Atlantic ocean. A beautiful park is just across the street and the frequent 500 bus will take you all the way to the historical center of Porto in about 20 minutes. Nearby you will find cafe's with delicious pastry and coffee. Scenic beaches are also very close. The air, especially in the morning, is filled with the smell of the ocean that will surely empower you for the adventures of the day, of which Porto has plenty to offer.
The room itself was incredibly cozy and clean, smelling of fresh linen. Felt more like a 5 star hotel room than an affordable Airbnb location. The room has its own entrance with access to the street as well as a private shower and toilet room. You can bar the access from the rest of the house for extra privacy. There's also a fish tank to stare at to help you relax. Upon arrival we found cookies, tea and a small kettle to boil water with that our hosts kindly left for us.
All of our requests and wishes were met with utmost kindness and keen will to help. Our hosts made us feel welcome and showed true southern European hospitality.
We highly recommend Carlos's place to anyone looking to enjoy their vacation in Porto.

Nice room, very clean, in perfect place, near a quite place (public garden) and the beaches in one side and Porto center in the other side. Bus stop at 50 meters really easy! Isabel and Carlos were very kindness and reactive! We really recommended it!
Carlos and his family are truly great hosts. They've been very helpful, warm and welcoming. The room is very cosy, comfortable and clean. And has nice hidden bathroom. Best choice.

I spend two nights in the comfortable room at Carlos and Isabel. It's quiet and clean and the private bathroom and own entrance are very convenient as well as the flexible check-in/out. The beach and river are close and there are some wonderful restaurants in the area and few tourists. Three days of walking around, soaking up the sun and simply enjoying life. Thank you!

Our time in Isabel and Carlos house was wonderful. The room we were at was very clean, big and it had it's own little private bathroom where you can have really hot showers. The house is also very close to the beach and to a bus stop where you can take bus 500, which is very convenient. You can also take an uber from their house to the center of the city for about 5 to 6 euro. They were both amazing hosts and went beyond our expectations. Wonderful room and hosts.
Adorei! Para uma pessoa ou casal é bastante bom para ficar na Foz do Douro.

Rewelacyjny pokój ☺️ świetna lokalizacja przy cichym parku , 1 min od oceanu  blisko do sklepu, restauracje z miłą obsługą i pysznym jedzeniem. Zabytkowy tramwaj zabierze Cię w 15-20 min. wzdłuż rzeki do starego miasta. Gdzie możesz dobrze zjeść i napić się pysznego lokalnego wina. Na północ w stronę portu ciągnie się wspaniałą promenada z miłymi kawiarniami. Przy porcie zjesz zawsze świerza rybę  Gospodarze są na medal , bardzo mili i zawsze dobrze doradza gdzie można się udać w razie niepogody.

Porto is beautifull and ocean is magic. And Carlos&Isabel appartament (with the cleanest bed linen and towels, with aquarium and awakening with classical music) have become my real home for these 4 days. Сozy room, ideal cleanliness, quiet courtyard, narrow street, wonderful park near, good public transport connection, friendly, sympathetic and kind citizens and 2 minutes walk to Atlantic (Website hidden by Airbnb) makes my holidays.
Many thanks to Isabel and Carlos.

Simple and great at the same time. Nice location, if you like the sea. Our favorite double decker #500 stops just round the corner and brings directly to the station and the center.  Breakfast in the small coffee at the park is a must and two minutes away.
Hosts are warm and kind, we wish we stayed longer :)
Excelente alojamiento, anfitriones maravillosos.

Very nice room with view on a garden and the sound of the ocean. I felt very welcome by Isabel and enjoyed the location in the city. I highly recommend this Airbnb and will surely book it again for my next trip

Isabel e Carlos, muito obrigada pela Vossa simpatia, disponibilidade em ajudar e proporcionar-nos uma estadia em que nada ficou por considerar, inclusivê o extra do estacionamento para a mota, chaves extra e cuidado em que estivéssemos bem, confortáveis e apoiados a 100% por vós. Parabéns pelo espaço!

Ubicación perfecta, tanto para descansar como para desplazarse al centro.A 1 minuto del mar y un autobús te lleva al centro desde prácticamente la puerta de la casa.Facil de aparcar en la zona.Trato correcto.Para repetir.

Isabel & Carlos’s private room was perfect for my husband and I! Our stay in Porto was lovely! The city is simply amazing, and the private and independent bedroom+bath was exactly what we needed to explore the town. The location is Prime! Close to the beach and the river, trams and buses... but we actually just walked everywhere really! Very clean and comfortable, and very quiet at night. I really recommend the stay!
The room was clean, had everything I needed and very comfortable.  The hosts were reliable,  helpful and nice. The location was perfect! I would definitely stay again in this cosy and peaceful place

I found everything I needed at Carlos and Isabel’s place. The room is cosy and clean, with sweet mini bathroom (the bathroom was my favorite). The location of the apartment is ca 20-23 min from the city centre with a bus. It is a good location for people who want to live in a quieter and more relaxed distric than city centre. It is just 7 min walk from there to the first beach. I am 100 % satisfied with my stay and I am planning to go back to Porto and stay at the same place. Isabel and Carlos are fantastic people :)

The place was quiet and close to restaurants and transportation as well.

We went there by car and there was always a place to park near the appartment.

Carols's wife was very nice and helpfull.

The appartment was clean and had everything we needed.

Thank you Isabel and Carlos for your hospitality.

Great stay at Carlos’ place. There’s everything you need in the room, it’s close to the Douro estuary with a few restaurants and bars to go to, and really convenient to reach Porto city centre. Carlos and his wife were helpful with all the information to reach to room and giving tips to make your stay better.
I would recommend 100%!

Wat een geweldige plek om Porto vanuit hier te ontdekken! Een fijne kamer met voldoende facaliteiten (waterkoker, kopjes, bestek en borden voor 2 personen), een heerlijke douche en een prima bed. Rustige omgeving en vlakbij het drukkere grote centrum. Wij hebben 4 dagen alles op de fiets gedaan en bezocht: wat een feest! Ondanks het (Hollandse) weer hebben we genoten en zouden we zeer zeker weer boeken via Airbnb en deze kamer!!!! Carlos en Isabel bedankt voor jullie gastvrijheid, het regelen van 2 fietsen en jullie hulp! Groet, Miranda en MarieAnt

Carlos en Isabelle zijn erg lieve mensen, die mij heel goed ontvangen hebben. Alles was in orde en heel proper. Het verblijf is niet ver gelegen van de kust, ong 100m, vlakbij een bushalte. Dit verblijf is zeker een aanrader om Porto te bezoeken, een goede combinatie van kustwandelingen en een bezoek aan de stad.
Очень уютная комната с отдельным входом, отличное расположение, предусмотрительные и приятные в общении хозяева. Спасибо за советы по местам в городе!
Very much recommended!

I can absolutely recommend this place to everyone who wants to visit the city of Porto but also wish to be close to the ocean. It's actually five minute walk to the Mouth of the Douro River and it's amazing to be able to look at this view everyday. If you want to get to the City, the bus stop is less then 100m away from the house. As for the room, it's just like in the pictures - very cosy, comfy  and clean. You get everythng what's needed (towels, soap, shampoo, hair dryer, even a small electric kettle), there is enough space for two people and their things. It's got its own, separate exit to the garden, so you don't need to be worry that you might disturb someone. Isabel was very nice and sweet to us, she show us the place, gave us all directions we needed. What more can I say? We couldn't be happier that Isabel and Carlos decided to became a hosts in Airbnb and share their home with us.

Se trata de un pequeño escritorio que Carlos transforma en cuarto para dos. La cama está muy baja a sólo unos 25cms del piso y también la TV está en el piso. El baño es pequeño pero cómodo. Todo muy limpio. Se entra por una puerta ventana que da a un jardín y hay una silla para tomar el fresco. Pero no hay ventana. De modo que si cierras la puerta...... Esta bien ubicada cerca del bus 500 que va a la Rivera y al centro. Carlos muy amable nos permitió late Checkout. Buena relación precio calidad
Good value for money - 2in1-Porto sightseeing and beach rest

今までの中で最高のAIRBNB｡ｲｻﾍﾞﾙとｶﾙﾛｽは到着日そうそうの夜夕食に招待してくれました｡建物のﾙｰﾌﾄｯﾌﾟで大西洋へ沈む夕日を見ながらｶﾙﾛｽお手製の野菜ｽｰﾌﾟsopa de legumesと焼き魚peixe no forno(ﾎﾟﾙﾄｶﾞﾙの味)を頂くという思いもかけなかった体験が､私たちの旅のｽﾀｰﾄでした｡その後､白ﾜｲﾝを飲みながら興味深い会話が続き､最終的にﾊｰﾌﾞﾃｨで就寝｡彼らは常に私達に気を配ってくれました｡

2日間過ごした専用ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑ付きのお部屋は､建物のﾊﾟﾃｨｵから直接ｱｸｾｽが可能で(ｷｰ付き縦長窓)､まるでﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄｱﾊﾟｰﾄﾒﾝﾄの様でした｡ｵｰﾅｰの住居を通らずに道へ出られる様考えてありました｡室内全てが新しく､お掃除は言うことなし｡お茶が飲める様にｹﾄﾙとﾃｨｰｶｯﾌﾟが置いてあります｡

ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは私たちのﾌﾟﾗﾝ(ﾋﾞｰﾁ徒歩5分､Museu Serralves徒歩20分)にﾋﾟｯﾀﾘでした｡市内中心部からはﾊﾞｽ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 分｡ｿﾞｰﾝ2のAndante Card 24h (4,15€)を使えばなんの不自由もなく､逆に静かで素敵なﾖｰﾛｯﾊﾟ的ﾊﾞｶﾝｽを体験したい方には超ｵｽｽﾒです!
ｲｻﾍﾞﾙ､ｶﾙﾛｽ､ありがとう!

Una experiencia inmejorable con Isabel y Carlos. El primer día nos invitó a una cena casera en la azotea del edificio con una maravillosa vista. Una sopa de verdura y un plato de pescado asado que cocinó Carlos (el sabor portugués) hicieron que nuestro viaje fuera muy especial. Luego continuamos con una larga conversación muy interesante. Fueron muy detallistas con nosotros en todos los sentidos.

La habitación independiente con una entrada propia (la ventana vertical con llave) y un baño privado hacen que el cuarto se convienta en un apartamento privado. La entrada-ventana da a un pequeño patio del edificio que comunica directamente a la calle (sin necesidad de pasar por la residencia principal). La limpieza es impecable.

La ubicación fue perfecta para nuestro plan. Unos días de playas (5 min) y otro de visita a la Fundación Serralves (20 min). Una zona preciosa para pasear. Para ir al centro de la ciudad el autobús línea 500 recorre por la desenvocadura del río Duero en (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min (entre São Bento y la puerta de la casa). También existe otra opción que es el tranvía línea 1 (30 min), una atracción turística.

Nosotors ya tenemos una casa en Oporto. 
¡Muchas gracais, Isabel, Carlos!
Everything as described, very nice hosts, I recommend both for those who want to relax on the beach and explore the city.

The accommodation of Carlos and Isabel is beautiful!! You live together with some small fishes in a little room which contains all what you need for some days in Porto! 
Furthermore the house is located in silence but lovely quarter of Porto! 

Unfortunately we only met Isabel and his son, but they were really nice and courteous to us!

Thank you for the nice days we could spend at your room !!! 

Absolutely recommendable!!

This is an amazing place if you want to explore the city and also spend some time by the ocean. The place is very cosy and clean -  perfect for one person or a couple. It's located in a quiet area, however is just 10 minutes away from the city centre by bus.
Isabel and Carlos are lovely and very responsive. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone coming to Porto!

Locatie was top, vlakbij zee. Ook de stad is goed te bereiken met verschillende buslijnen of een uber. Carlos en Isabel waren ontzettend gastvrij en de communicatie verliep goed. Ze reageren snel. De kamer is lekker koel. Echt een aanrader!

Wer ein ruhiges, saubere und preisgünstiges Appartment sucht und nicht gerade Trubel und Party braucht ist hier richtig gut aufgehoben. Carlos und Isabel sind sehr gastfreundlich und wenn es irgendwo ein Problem gibt, wie z. B. das Schloss, das am Anfang nicht richtig funktionierte, wird es sofort gelöst. 
Die Lage ist außerhalb von Lissabon aber mit dem Bus, der direkt vor der Haustür abfährt, ist man innerhalt von 15 Minuten in der City.
Der Ortsteil liegt direkt an der Mündung des Douro, so dass das Meer und der Strand nicht weit sind, es gibt eine Strandpromenade und das eine oder andere einladende Strandlokal. Leider war mein Aufenthalt  zu kurz.

Probably the best accommodation in Porto ! 

If you prefer not to live right in the centre of town, Carlos & Isabel (approx. 15/20 minutes by bus) is the perfect place to stay. 

The accommodation is located between the centre and the beach. 
The centre and the beach can be reached by bus 500, which leaves from the bus stop in front of the house. (Approx.100m walk). 

Isabel and Carlos rent out a nice clean room, where you feel directly comfortable! 
The accommodation/ The room is clean and tidy and also offers a comfortable bed, a small but very nice private bathroom, a closet with enough space and a separate entrance door. 

With Isabel and Carlos you meet 2 warm, open and helpful people. They welcome you warmly and help you where they can. 
They give tips on where to eat and have breakfast in the immediate vicinity. 
So we found great little cafes and restaurants. 

We had a super nice stay with you and would return at any time. Thanks for the lovely days.

 Meron & Julia

És un bon allotjament. El llit molt còmode i la dutxa espectacular (amb vàris xorros), encara que el bany una mica petit, però amb secador, gel i xampú. Tens accés directe a la habitació sense haver de passar per la casa. Té un aqüari que et demanen que els hi donguis de menjar als peixos. A la entrada vem tenir un detall de alguns tés i galetes.  Ens van recomenar lloc per esmorzar i el bus que et porta al centre (15 minuts). Si haguèssim de tornar a Porto segurament buscariem més aprop del city center tot i que és un bon lloc.
Relació qualitat/preu correcta.
Absolutely lovely Airbnb. Carlos and Isabella are wonderful hosts and their room is one of the cutest I’ve ever seen. Includes an aquarium of little fishies! 6/5, would stay again in a heartbeat.

Isabel and Carlos’ petite Air BnB offers a wonderful respite from the city in its quiet location in the exclusive Foz district. Situated at the confluence of the Duoro River and the Atlantic Ocean, it is an amazing setting with cafes and restaurants located some 15 minutes by bus from the city center or 50 minutes on foot, which is a nice walk along the river.  The space is quite small but well designed and quite comfortable for a single traveler.  I especially enjoyed the desk, the fish tank, and the tiny but wonderful shower. Isabel and Carlos are world travelers and very interested in people.  I very much enjoyed their hospitable company.   I hope to be back in the future.

Un endroit agréable, calme. Isabel et Carlos sont disponibles pour donner les informations souhaitées. Pas tout près du centre de Porto mais très accessible par le bus. En plus très respirant le bord de mer après une journée dans la ville!

I had a short, but very nice stay at Carlos & Isabel's place. I arrived quite late at night, but Isabel stayed up to welcome me. The place is very cosy, quiet and in a beautiful location close to the sea. It is a fair walk to the city center, however a beautiful one (or you catch the bus:) ). All in all I had a very nice stay and I would recommend anyone to stay with Carlos & Isabel.
Very hispitable family, comfortable room and good location! Highly recommend walkers near ocean.

Carlos et Isabelle sont des hôtes charmants.
Tout a été génial pendant ma semaine.
Vous pouvez allez chez eux en toute confiance.
local perto das prais e fácil acesso à onibus para a região central, lugar confortavel e atendimento excelente.

Großartig. Ich habe selten solch nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeber getroffen wie Isabel und Carlos. Extrem hilfsbereit, jederzeit ansprechbar und bemüht, es dem Gast angenehm zu gestalten. Das Zimmer war sehr sauber, ruhig und schön gelegen in der Nähe der Mündung des Douro in den Atlantik. Das Bad ist klein, aber ausreichend und sehr sauber. 3 Minuten entfernt ist die Endstation der historischen Linie 1, die direkt nach Porto führt. Reichlich kleine Cafe´s, Restaurants und Bars in der näheren Umgebung. Für einen entspannten Aufenthalt absolut perfekt.

Isabel und Carlos sind wahnsinnig gastfreundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Lage ist sehr schön, nah am Meer aber mit einem längeren Spaziergang am Fluss entlang oder mit dem Bus kommt man auch schnell ins Stadtzentrum. Viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafés und Restaurants findet man in ein paar Minuten zu Fuß.

It was a very good room. Clean and hygienic toilets. Location is very close to the sea and it’s perfect for walks along the coast. Carlos is a very kind host and a helpful person.  Very good experiences.

Great place near the ocean. Cozy interior, super nice hosts and only 15 min into the city Centre by bus. 
Excellent location to explore the city and the costal areas. Good breakfast option 5min away. Supermarket 10min.
10/10 would stay there again.

Die Unterkunft ist in Bezug auf Lage und Preis unschlagbar. Für zwei Personen als Paar oder BF ist es absolut ausreichend. Es ist genau wie auf den Bildern zu sehen. Carlos und Isabel sind sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Am letzten Abend haben  wir noch gemeinsam einen Portwein getrunken und uns toll unterhalten. 

Seife, Föhn, Handtücher, Shampoo vorhanden. 

Immer wieder gerne!
A very cozy and proper place to stay, quite near to the wonderful  seaside. Carlos and his wife are very special SUPERhosts!!! FIVE STARS FOR EVERYTHING!

name: ONE BEDROOM DIAGONAL
summary: Amazing and unique 1 bedroom apartment in Barcelona in one of the best locations next to Enrique Granados and Passeig de Gracia. Large sunny windows, top quality furnishings, fully equipped to accommodate all of your vacation/business needs. License: HUTB-003159
space: This stylish apartment of 90 m2 has one bedroom and one bathroom.  Lots of light enters this sunny and quiet flat. Sunny, spacious living room with comfortable sofa bed.  One luxurious double bedroom One ensuite bathroom Closets in the bedroom A fully equipped modern kitchen with all the appliances (oven, stove, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, coffee machine etc) Heating and air conditioner Washing machine WIFI Linen and towels provided Baby cot/high chair upon request Doorman (week days) Flat is on 1st floor Building has lift/ elevator.
description: Amazing and unique 1 bedroom apartment in Barcelona in one of the best locations next to Enrique Granados and Passeig de Gracia. Large sunny windows, top quality furnishings, fully equipped to accommodate all of your vacation/business needs. License: HUTB-003159 This stylish apartment of 90 m2 has one bedroom and one bathroom.  Lots of light enters this sunny and quiet flat. Sunny, spacious living room with comfortable sofa bed.  One luxurious double bedroom One ensuite bathroom Closets in the bedroom A fully equipped modern kitchen with all the appliances (oven, stove, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, coffee machine etc) Heating and air conditioner Washing machine WIFI Linen and towels provided Baby cot/high chair upon request Doorman (week days) Flat is on 1st floor Building has lift/ elevator. Guests will be using the apartment exclusively Guests are provided with a 24-hour emergency number for any problems that may arise Guests are asked to call upon arrival to Barcelona Airport The
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on Diagonal Avenue, one of the main streets that divides the Gracia district and the Eixample. Since you are not right in the Ramblas area, this zone is much more tranquil and local. The Enrique Granados street that is right by the apartment is a lovely pedestrian street that goes from the Diagonal Avenue until the Gran Via in the city centre and has many notable restaurants, green spaces and children's parks. The Diagonal street itself is home to boutique shops and restaurants as well. There is a giant grocery store across the street from the apartment in the Corte Ingles and you also have easy access to all forms of public transport, bus, tram, metro, and taxi.
notes: Check-in: from 15 p.m. (flexible) Check-out: before 11 a.m. (flexible) Strict no party policy. 300€ refundable security damage deposit  Additional:  Barcelona city tax 2.50€ per person per night (max 7 nights) Late check-in fee of 30€ after 21h and 60€ after midnight. *Tourist License: HUTB-003159
transit: The apartment is located 10 min walk from the metro station Hospital Clinic (Blue Line, L5)
access: Guests will be using the apartment exclusively
interaction: Guests are provided with a 24-hour emergency number for any problems that may arise Guests are asked to call upon arrival to Barcelona Airport
house_rules: Check-in from 15 p.m. (flexible) Check-out before 11 a.m. (flexible) The apartment is a non-smoking apartment.  Parties in the apartment are not allowed. Additional charges:  Barcelona city tax 2.50 € per person per night (max 7 nights) Late check-in fee of 30€ after 21h and 60€ after midnight.

host.host_about:
Hi there! I am happy, easy going and welcoming. I feel lucky living in such a beautiful city as Barcelona!  I love traveling and meeting new people from all over the world. 
I really enjoy being a host and welcoming people into our apartments. 
I am happy to offer tips and recommendations about the local area and some of the wonderful things Barcelona has to offer so that you can make the most of your time in this great city.
You will feel at home once you step into my place!

reviews.comments: Piso maravilloso, céntrico y muy acogedor, le doy un 10!

Die Wohnung ist sehr schön, die Lage perfekt, Busstation in der Nähe, Metro 500m entfernt. Die Kommunikation mit Arina lief problemlos. Ich bin sehr zufrieden. Barcelona ist sehr schön, die Leute sind sehr höfflich und nett. Nur die Eintrittskarten für die Sehenswürdigkeiten sind überteuert.
Excelente ubicación en Barcelona cerca de los mejores barrios, restaurantes y tiendas. Tiene el problema del ruido al estar en la Avenida Diagonal.

Excelente departamento! En una de las zonas más lindas de Barcelona. Rodeado de tiendas, bares y restaurantes. El departamento es tal cual las fotos, cómodo y con todo lo necesarios. Nos recibieron muy amablemente! Todo perfecto. Lo recomiendo 100%
Fantastic location, smooth check in. Very professional with all the amenities you could need.

name: Elegant Flat in the Center
summary: A part of a famous Poet Orhan Veli Kanık's poem: I am listening to Istanbul, intent, my eyes closed.  The Grand Bazaar is serene and cool,  A hubbub at the hub of the market,  Mosque yards are brimful of pigeons,  At the docks while hammers bang and clang  I am listening to Istanbul, intent, my eyes closed.  In the heart of Istanbul, and a step back from Bosphorus, our flat is ideal for a guest looking for to visit magical corners to listen epic Istanbul.
space: One bedroom with a double bed and a coach which can be a bed for medium tall :) ladies or kids.All public transportation are in walking distance especially Tophane tram station is 3 minutes away from the building door which can take you all the Ottoman Magic in SultanAhmet and Grand (Website hidden by Airbnb) as your host always be ready to support you to have nice time in our beautiful city.
