Every amenities in the flat you can use and enjoy. Anytime you need assistance we are accessible. Please do not hesitate to contact us, you just
neighborhood_overview: Cihangir centre is a lively neighbourhood full of cafes, bistros, brasseries. Young and lovely people you can see around and mostly English speaking people.  Also Karakoy which is a both hipster area and has an amazing water and historic peninsula view, is also very close. Both directions are 5 min by foot.
transit: 3 min to tram which  passes Galata bridge in couple of min and takes you old peninsula. 3 min to bus stop which allows to travel all along Bosphorus.
access: Every amenities in the flat you can use and enjoy.
interaction: Anytime you need assistance we are accessible. Please do not hesitate to contact us, you just need to think about enjoying your holiday.
house_rules: Just treat as your home

host.host_about: I live in Cihangir and love to meet people and share our lively neighbourhood with them.

reviews.comments: The apartment is as shown in the pictures, it is very clean and in a nice location. The host is superb!

Pelin’s cosy apartment lies in a quiet street in a vivid part of Istanbul. It has all the amenities to make you feel at home. The bed was good. And the apartment was very clean. T1 to the airport is 5 min walk. Pelin is a wonderful host too.

Comfy and charming apartment with 20+ foot high ceilings. The flat is in a great neighborhood. There are hip cafes and restaurants, and little markets all around, and a terrific bakery right across the street sells some of the best simit and other small breads in town. It is also easy to walk to the center of Cihangir, Karikoy, or Taxsim. Pelin is an attentive and helpful host. Great stay in my favorite Istanbul neighborhood!

name: Appt Porto - cosy & charm
summary: Appartement neuf, résidence calme et sécurisée, logement de charme proche des transports en commun (8min a pied), proche d'une station de taxi (4min a pied) et situé en face d'un petit supermarché (Lidl).
space: Apartamento novo, residência tranquila e segura, charmoso alojamento perto de transportes públicos (8min a pé), perto de uma estação de táxi (4min a pé) e em frente a um pequeno supermercado (Lidl).
description: Appartement neuf, résidence calme et sécurisée, logement de charme proche des transports en commun (8min a pied), proche d'une station de taxi (4min a pied) et situé en face d'un petit supermarché (Lidl). Apartamento novo, residência tranquila e segura, charmoso alojamento perto de transportes públicos (8min a pé), perto de uma estação de táxi (4min a pé) e em frente a um pequeno supermercado (Lidl). Estou disponível para qualquer informação por mensagem. Quartier résidentiel avec supermarché, café, restaurant (1 min à pied) Le métro Polo Universitario est à 7-10 minutes à pieds. Nao pode fumar no quarto !
neighborhood_overview: Quartier résidentiel avec supermarché, café, restaurant (1 min à pied)
notes: Nao pode fumar no quarto !
transit: Le métro Polo Universitario est à 7-10 minutes à pieds.
interaction: Estou disponível para qualquer informação por mensagem.
house_rules: - Pas de fumée dans la chambre - No smoking in the room

host.host_about: 24 years old. Dentistry student. French but currently living in Portugal. Love travelling, music & football.

reviews.comments:
Un barrio tranquilo, algo alejado del centro pero con aparcamiento gratuito en la misma calle y muy cerca de un Lidl para poder comprar.
El apartamento es para 2 personas pero muy completo, la cocina es algo pequeña pero con todo lo necesario. El baño está muy bien ya que tiene una bañera muy grande y cómoda, y la habitación es grande y luminosa.
El centro está a una media hora andando y la vuelta es algo pesada porque es cuesta arriba, pero si andar no es un problema puedes llegar a cualquier sitio de Porto.
Es fácil llegar en coche y suele haber aparcamiento para dejar el coche cerca.
A Sarah foi uma ótima anfitriã. Cumpriu com todos os acordos firmados. Só tenho a agradecer a ela a disposição de um apartamento tão bem localizado e lindo. Parabéns.

A Sarah e o namorado quando me receberam foram simpáticos.
O local do apartamento é muito calmo, com comercio local e um supermercado.
O apartamento é óptimo têm muita luz e está localizado muito próximo (2 minutos) de um autocarro que vai directamente para a Av. dos Aliados (centro da Cidade), e que faz serviço nocturno. 
Tudo como eu esperava.... Superou as minhas expectativas!
Foi a 1ª vez que utilizei airbnb e fiquei muito surpreendida pela positiva. A Sarah e o facto do apartamento corresponder ao anunciado, fizeram-me quer continuar a utilizar este tipo de alojamento.
 Recomendo o apartamento da Sarah a todos os meus amigos.

Apartamento en zona universitaria muy tranquila. Aparcamiento sin problema. Supermercado a un minuto. Al centro se llega en 20min andando o en la línea de Bus 600. El apartamento genial, todo muy nuevo y limpio. Ninguna pega.
The apartment was very nice and comfortable.

Very cosy comfortable and very very clean place
Everything that is required is available and the host was just excellent.
Definite recommendation for any traveller!

Very cozy, well equipped, modern house. With a food store right in front.
We had a great time, and would certainly come back.

Amazing Airbnb .  Sarah made sure we had everything we needed and helped us with super advices and recommandations to discover the city and enjoy out stay to the max . I would highly recommand !! 
Thanks again for everythg Sarah and see you next time in Porto :)

A Sarah simplificou todo o processo desde o check-in ao check-out e o apartamento é  muito agradável.
Obrigado,
HM

El piso está muy bien,es una zona universitaria, justo enfrente tiene un Lidl(supermercado), aparcamiento en la calle siempre disponible,en coche queda a 10-15 min del centro de Oporto, la torre de los clérigos, ribeira...
Séjour très agréable chez Sarah, l'appartement était conforme à nos attentes et propre. Je recommande ce logement.
Sarah a été une super hotesse. Elle nous a attendu tard le soir à notre arrivée. L'appartement est très bien. Le quartier très tranquille. Super. Merci Sarah !
Appartamento molto carino e Sarah molto disponibile, ritorneremo sicuramente!!
Good host, the appartment is really nice.

Sarah's apartment is small and cozy, perfect for a couple. It gets lots of sunlight during the whole day, all the appliances are functional, the fridge is large enough and so is the bathroom. The door is armoured so there's a 100% assured safety (even though Porto doesn't have any crime, but maybe this can get that concern covered). There's a Lidl right across the street, which is great.

It's rather far from the center so it takes around 40 minutes on foot, but bus 600 takes you from the corner of the street right to the center in under 15 minutes. There are plenty other buses to get to most places in the city. However, if you prefer the metro, it's just a 10 minute walk from the apartment.

Alogether, Sarah's apartment was a great experience and definitely made our vacation perfect.

El piso está muy bien. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días estupendos en Oporto. Queda un poco alejado del Centro, pero la parada de bus queda muy cerca, y el bus 600 os deja en plena Av. dos Aliados. 
Recomendable.

endroit calme à 50m du bus N°600 pour aller sur la place centrale de porto  magasin LIDL ouvert jusqu' à 21h00  en bas de l'appartement  salle de bain avec baignoire grande chambre cuisine bien équipée

Un appartement très confortable et bien équipé, très bien placé sur la ligne de bus direct pour accéder au centre ville historique de Porto (600 terminus à Aliados et 304 terminus à Trindade où passent toutes les lignes de métro). Le quartier est très calme avec un accès aux commerces tout proche. Je recommande!

L'appartement était très bien : propre et bien placé. Le quartier est tranquille. 
Sarah est accueillante et disponible. Encore merci pour tout. Je recommande ce Airbnb !
Quiet neigbour but a bite far away from city center

La casa es tal y como sale en las fotos, piso muy nuevo en el que no falta de nada, lo único que echamos de menos fue una sabana en la cama ya que solo tiene edredón y en este tiempo se pasa bastante calor. Esta en una zona tranquila con aparcamiento en la misma calle y un Lidl justo enfrente. Andando se tarda 25 minutos al centro y hay una parada de bus (el 600) a 50 metros del piso.

Apartamento um pouco longe do centro, mas de fácil acesso com ônibus. Nos hospedamos por 2 semanas e tivemos uma ótima experiência. Ficamos muito satisfeitos. Recomendamos o café da esquina e o restaurante "Pombeiro". Pratos deliciosos :-)

Sarah was a great host, check in was well organised.

The apartment is quiet and secure and was great value. There is also a supermarket next door and plenty of parking around so it was super convinient.
Je recommande pour tous: bien situe, propre, moderne. Bus 600 pour le centre ville et LIDL à 2 pas. Parking gratis. Quartier calme.

Desta vez saiu me um apartamento que deve ser ocupado pelos próprios de vez em quando... não é mau... mas a janela do quarto não estava boa não dava para fechar por completo. A casa de banho só tinha umas luzes... tornava se escuro.. e deve ter animais de estimação pois notasse o cheiro... não foi o melhor onde fiquei mas não deve ser o pior....

Tres bon appartement pour sejourner a Porto, proche du centre et un quartier calme. 
Un appartement fonctionnel avec le necessaire pour sejourner.

El alojamiento está al lado de un lidel y del centro turístico está a una media hora larga. No hay problemas de aparcamiento gratuito debajo del apartamento. El único problemilla fue que la ropa de cama estaba húmeda cd llegamos y no hubo manera de secar y que el microondas estaba muy sucio. Por lo demás es adecuado.
Il s'agit d'un appartement vraiment top... Propreté équipements et emplacement .. tout est parfait pour un super séjour de découverte de Porto ... Allez y sans souci
Logement très propre, moderne, et en face du lidle, a 10 minutes du métro, très sympa!
Lugar residencial tal como aparece en las fotos con un Lidl al lado. Facil aparcar sin pagar y a minutos en coche del centro de Oporto.
Nice appartment, but not so close to the main city attraction.

Sarah's apartment is about 1.5 miles from the city center, and a 15 minute walk to the metro. Although slightly outside the main city, this was a great place to stay to explore Porto and the surrounding area. Parking was easy, and the grocery store right across the street was convenient.
Très belle appartement pour un petit séjour ! Supermarché en bas de l'appartement très pratique !  Je recommande !!
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

very nice place, much better than what it looks like in the photos 
perfect place
Great host, easy to communicate, 10 minutes walk from a Metro.

Appartement très bien situé avec un Lidl à côté et le métro pas loin. Possibilité de parking dans la rue ce qui est un plus.
Le logement est situé dans une résidence récente et très calme.
La communication avec Sarah est facile.
Apartamento novo, Instalacoes completas e garagem. Ideal para um casal.

Casa a media Hora caminando del centro. Bien comunicada.Buena zona. Piso nuevo Pero Limpieza Nula Tuvimos que limpiar el Baño para poder usarlo.  Mal olor en la cocina y suciedad. Pasamos frío en la noche.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Is a cozy flat in a quiet location with a supermarket on the other side of the building, walking distance to cafes and restaurants.

Die Wohnung ist gute 35 Minuten zu Fuß vom Zentrum entfernt. Die Bushaltestelle ist jedoch direkt um die Ecke. Für 1,95 kann man mit dem Bus ins Zentrum fahren. Der Lidl befindet sich direkt gegenüber. 

Die Wohnung war perfekt für 2 Personen. Jedoch waren Haare/Katzenhaare und Staub auf dem Boden.

This is our first booking through airbnb. this is our first booking through airbnb.We were a little worried, but everything was perfect!!)
We arrived too late and Sarah gave us the keys near her apartment. (it's about 5-10 minutes walk to the apartments).
Near the house is Lidl (market), bus stops, to the center 25 minutes on foot.

Sarah is a very friendly host with a very nice and quiet appartment. Everything was clean and very well equiped. 
Thx
Appartement très fonctionnel, avec tous le confort . Situé à 30min a pied du centre ville, Lidl en bas de l'immeuble ainsi que le bus. Dommage que l'on est du faire les poussières à notre arrivée.
Really good apartment. We"re happy we rented it.

Sarah fue una anfitriona 10, siempre que le pedías ayuda te contestaba rápido y correctamente. El alojamiento estaba bien decorado, a pesar de que la cama no era muy buena. Fuimos en coche, por lo que también decidimos escoger este alojamiento ya que habia mucha zona para poder aparcar sin problema. La parada de autobús está a 2 minutos del apartamento, tardando 20 minutos hasta el centro, o si se va andando unos 35 minutos. Oporto me encantó!!
TRES BON SEJOUR A PORTO APPARTEMENT TRES BIEN PLACE

Sarah est très accueillante ,disponible et arrangeante. L'appartement était tel qu'il étais décrit. Simple et efficace. Situé dans un quartier calme avec tous les commerces de proximité et à 20min  à pied du centre. Je recommande.

Apartamento muy completo. Para 1/2 es perfecto, te apañas muy bien.. Relación calidad-precio excelente.  Está a más de media hora andando del centro, bajar es más ameno pero subir cuesta. Un Lidl justo abajo, ideal para hacer la compra. Buenos productos y grandes precios. Recomendable.

Piso acogedor para una o dos personas. Limpio, en Zona tranquila y con los basicos para poder vivir. Cuenta con un Lidl justo debajo y a un par de minutos el autobus linea 600 que deja en el centro. Para llegar andando al centro hay unos 15 minutos, muy llevaderos si te gusta andar, todo bajada. La vuelta es recomendable pillar el bus desde Trindade, la cuesta de vuelta se puede hacer larga. Sarah es muy amable y cualquier duda te la responde casi de inmediato.

We stayed 2 nights in Sarah's apartment and everything was great! Good position, beautiful building and the apartment was very nice and equipped with everything we may need.  Good communication with Sarah.
Recommended!
Apartamento com todos os itens básicos e muito bem localizado. Bom chuveiro e cama. A Sarah sempre foi muito rápida para as respostas por email quando precisamos. Recomendo.

Πολύ καλό διαμέρισμα, καλή τοποθεσία,και η οικοδέσποινα πολύ συμπαθής αλλά αναξιόπιστη αφού καθυστέρησε για πάνω από 1 ώρα όταν φτάσαμε χωρίς να μπορούμε να τη βρούμε ώστε υποβληθήκαμε σε μεγάλη ταλαιπωρία ψάχνοντας με τις αποσκευές μας άλλο κατάλημα,τελικά εμφανίστηκε ζητώντας συγγνώμη γιατί την πήρε ο ύπνος. Προσοχή στις πετσέτες δεν ήταν καθαρές. Όλοι οι υπόλοιποι χώροι ήταν πεντακάθαροι και  νιώσαμε σαν στο σπίτι μας.

Super logement! Recommandé +++. Bien équipé (ascenceur, machine à laver avec sèche linge, cafetière expresso,lit confortable), bien situé (bus au bout de la rue, en 15mn au centre ville ; lidl juste en face). Sarah répond rapidement et en français, et s'adapte à l'horaire d'arrivée sans difficulté. Nous étions très en retard sur l'heure de rdv, Sarah nous a attendu autant que possible avant de nous laisser les clefs dans sa boîte aux lettres. Sarah reste en lien durant le sejour pour savoir si tout va bien. Que du positif!

Sarah's home is compact and offers everything you need for a business or leisure trip to Porto: a well-equipped kitchen, a fresh bathroom, a nice double bed, free Wifi and good communications to downtown. A very good choice at a reasonable price!

name: CHARMING APARTMENT in PLAÇA REIAL-HUTB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
summary: Lugares de interés: La Rambla, Ocaña, Mercat de la Boqueria, Barrio Gótico, Plaza Real, Puerto, Sant Felip Neri, Bar la Plata, Cañete, Catedral, Los Caracoles, Barceloneta.... Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a la luz, el barrio, el espacio acogedor, céntrico, Tranquilo, Limpio, Ordenado.... Mi alojamiento es bueno para viajeros de negocios, familias (con hijos), y grupos grandes.
description: Lugares de interés: La Rambla, Ocaña, Mercat de la Boqueria, Barrio Gótico, Plaza Real, Puerto, Sant Felip Neri, Bar la Plata, Cañete, Catedral, Los Caracoles, Barceloneta.... Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a la luz, el barrio, el espacio acogedor, céntrico, Tranquilo, Limpio, Ordenado.... Mi alojamiento es bueno para viajeros de negocios, familias (con hijos), y grupos grandes.
house_rules: To hold parties or private events in the apartment is strictly prohibited and it can result in immediate eviction at any time of the day or night. IMPORTANT NOTE: The city of Barcelona requires that a Tourist tax charged in cash upon arrival (2.48€/person/night, 7 nights maximum). Reservations for more than 7 nights the tax will not increase, children under 16 are not charged for city tax. Late check-in fee of 30€ applied to arrivals after 21:00 until 00:00 Late check-in fee of 50€ applied to arrivals after 00:00

host.host_about:
Somos 2 amigos que trabajamos en relación con el Turismo desde hace 10 años.
Nos encanta descubrir rincones desconocidos de nuestra ciudad.
Disfrutamos enseñando sitios secretos y lugares especiales a los visitantes.
Apasionados de viajar, lo consideramos una ciencia.
Melómanos por naturaleza.
Licencia turística de Barcelona

reviews.comments:
Accueil très chaleureux et personnalisé, avec un très bon français !
Appartement très spacieux pouvant accueillir 6 pers et fonctionnel. Idéalement situé en plein coeur du quartier gothic.
Très propre et bien équipé, avec une mise a disposition de la WIFI.
Adresse à conseiller et  à retenir ,
nous reviendrons avec plaisir !

We had a really amazing short stay in barcelona. The apartment is so cosy and located perfectly in the middle of el barrio gótic. 
The flat was super quiet, with a small balcony out the back. It had everything we needed, well equipped. 2 bathrooms and a comfortable lounge to gather. Everything was super clean. As it is in a big house with mostly locals living there, it is so important to respect the rules. They will appreciate you not being too loud. 
Once you step out of the house, you are in the heart of Barcelona with plenty small restaurants and bars within walking distance. Even la barceloneta (beach)  is only a 20 minute walk. Las ramblas is just around the corner. 
I would definitely recommend to stay there, brilliant for a relaxing getaway!

I would highly recommend this apartment to any other who would like to see Barcelona. We barely used the metro as everything is so close. Besides this great location, David an David offer a very neat apartment and a clear communication.
Excelente ubicacion. Amplio apartamente identico a las fotos.
Thank you for everything David! The apartment is very comfortable and modern close to everything which was very convenient for us! David was very helpfull and kind!
David nous a accueilli après 21h avec le sourire ! L'emplacement est top à quelques mètres de la place réal. L'appartement est propre spacieux et avec ascenseur. Super séjour !
Great location, very central (yet no problems with "night noice"), good communication before and during the trip, spacious, clean,  ... everything we needed to have a great citytrip!
Great Exprience! David was great kind and helpful, the appartment was all we ask for, clean, fully kitchen with all we need for the stay, the location was absoultly great!
Nice place very well located and really quiet! Clean and well equipped! Both Davids are very friendly! I recommend definitely this appartment!

Very good apartment in a very good location, next to Plaça Reial and the Rambla de Cataluña. Very confortable with all you need to cook, do the laundry and rest. The wireless internet worked fine. The apartment is as shown in the photos and my kids loved it. The zone is plenty of restaurants, supermarkets, bike rentals and a variety of shops but still the apartment is very quiet. I fully recommend the place for your stay.David is an excellent host, he was waiting for us and helped us letting us get into the apartment early and carrying our bags. My family and I felt very well welcomed by David and really enjoyed our stay. Thanks David for all.

We had a great stay at the flat! The location is perfect for exploring the center of Barcelona and Barrio Gotic.  You're right off busy Placa Reial, but you'd never know it as the flat faces into other buildings and courtyards and it's extremely quiet.  We were there on New Year's eve, and even then we didn't hear a peep from the streets or plaza.  The flat itself is super clean, spacious, and full of natural light.  David was a fantastic host:  he was easy to reach, very communicative, and extremely helpful.  He went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, and he swiftly answered our requests for more blankets and pillows.  Overall, the flat is pleasant and comfortable, the location is unbeatable, and the hosts are fantastic.  Everything was great, and I can't recommend it enough!

This is a lovely apartment right in the Gothic quarter, just off the Placa Reial. There was generous space for our family of two adults and a teen son and daughter.  The location is superb, it is well equipped, and communication and check in were good.  It is high on the third floor but there is a small elevator. We arrived in Barcelona on New Years day, and there were still beautiful decorations and lights around the city for the holidays.
Excelente ubicacion.  Piso amplio comodo y limpios.  Todo funciona muy bien.  Perfecto para ir con familia y hacer turismo
David is a nice person, the apartment's location is perfect to visit the city. The metro is 5mins walk and you can find supermarket, some popular restaurant here! Very comfortable experience!

Es ist faszinierend, wie eine Wohnung einseits so zentral gelegen und doch so ruhig und erholsam sein kann. Wir hatten einen wunderbaren Aufenthalt. 
Absolut empfehlenswert.
Et perfekt ophold. Virkelig sød og hjælpsom vært. Meget ren lejlighed. Tæt på alt. Helt sikkert et besøg værd!!!! Vi kommer helt sikkert igen til denne vært og lejlighed!!

David  and David are doing a great job, they realy try to communicate as fast as possible and they try to keep their promise to offer a calm and nice place to stay with children or as a group of couples. Altough the appartment is located in the middle of Bari Gotic and has an excellent access to the public transport, to the port and to the big rambla. So you are in the center of any kind of shops and restaurants. We, my family and me, spent a great time in Barcelona, thanks also to the place where we could stay. 
The Davids are nice and always ready to answer to your questions.
La situation est idéale et rien ne manque. Nous avons apprécié particulièrement les deux salles d'eau et de bain avec nos trois jeunes.

David and David have an amazing apartment in Barcelona! It is very centrally located to attractions and public transit and near all of the hustle and bustle of the city. Very clean and nicely decorated as well. Highly recommended! :)
Lovely,convenient,quiet. David gave us all information we needed about flat and city. It is a good place to stay and near by the center of the city.

We (family of 4 with two teenage daughters) had a very nice stay this property.  Notably, it was well located, an easy walk to the Metro, and in the middle of an interesting neighborhood. We felt the price was reasonable, and the accommodations were very satisfactory.  The apartment is clean, you don't hear noises from the neighbors at all, the beds are comfortable, and it has wifi! Do understand that this is an apartment in a building of full-time residences, in an old neighborhood of Barcelona.  I sincerely enjoyed that aspect of our experience, and would readily stay here again. Do expect a nice, comfortable place to stay that welcomes you back at the end of a long day exploring a great city!

In all, this is a great value. Instead of coffee delivered to your room, roll down to the shop on the corner in the morning for a cafe and pastry.  One of our two best meals was in a restaurant literally right across from the front door of our building ( I would suggest staying away from the restaurants in the Placa Reial.  Everytime you walk through, you are propositioned for a meal, and the best rated on Yelp was just okay. Instead, look out the front as mentioned above, or turn right when leaving the building and explore all the great little avenues with many restaurant options.  If you know what you are looking for, I would highly recommend this property and David&David!
This is the place to stay! You can walk everywhere and there are so many great restaurants!

Wij hebben met 4 vriendinnen verbleven in het appartement. Het ontvangst was zeer hartelijk. David is heel behulpzaam. Hij heeft ons direct een aantal voorstellen gedaan om nog iets te gaan eten. Ook tijdens het verblijf konden we hem steeds contacteren bij vragen. Het appartement is heel ruim, netjes, alles is voorhanden. Het is gelegen in het midden van het centrum, vlakbij de Plaza Reial. Hoewel het een drukke buurt is, merk je in het appartement niets van het lawaai van buiten.  Kortom, het was een super weekend !!

Great location, great size, plenty of space, very clean
A bit hard to find, but the hosts were very helpful in finding us in the Placa and showing us the way to the apartment, checking us is and showing us where everything was. We were especially grateful as we didn't arrive till about 10.30 pm!
Highly recommended for location and size
Good communication, hosts responded very quickly every time we contacted them
The apartment is very spacious & clean. its located in the center of the Gothic area but still very quiet.  D&D are great. we enjoyed very much!!!

Great place to stay : centrally located, quiet, clean.
Very smooth communication with David before and during our stay
Warm welcome from David who waited for us until late for the check-in. On our departure date David let us check-out later in the afternoon so we could let the luggage inside the apartment and continue our visit of Barcelona which was great!
Thanks again

David hosted my parents and relative. 
He was very nice and funny.
It was their first time with AirBnB and their loved it.

Many thanks David & David

Great apartment, perfect for exploring Barcelona and so close to many of the must do sights.
Was able to walk everywhere which was a real bonus.

Tout juste arrivé de Barcelone. Cet appartement est très très bien situé. Très propre,  bien équipe et de bonnes dimensions. 

Les hôtes très disponibles et répondent rapidement à nos questions.

We had a pleasant stay in David&David's apartment. It is centrally located in Barri Gothic next to Plaça Reial. The apartment offers plenty of space for a family, is clean and well equipped. It is very quiet, as there is no traffic in the surrounding streets. The only noise comes from the gulls early in the morning. The communication with David&David is very smooth and we were able to check out one hour later than originally planned.
Departamento comodo, amplio con todos las comodidades necesarias para una linda estadia en barcelona.
Wonderful apartment and location! Hosts are very lovely and it was a pleasure renting from them.

David and David were amazing hosts and this apartment was so wonderful.  It was well located around Las Ramblas and the beaches and helped make this vacation what it was supposed to be, which was nothing short of wonderful.  We will definitely be coming back to Barcelona.  Magical!  This space is well protected, comfortable, and spacious!  David did a great job helping us understand the best ways to enjoy Barcelona.  Barcelona happened to be our favorite stay in Europe.  It is a magical city and a must to experience Flamenco dancers and Sagrada Familia.  Don't forget to try the Tapas!!!
Extremely central location in Barcelona, yet a very quiet apartment since it faced the inner court. Great service, no issues.

The apartment was great.  The location was perfect, and the apartment was clean and quite.  Check in was quick and easy, and David responded to all our communication promptly.  We would love to stay at David and David's apartment again.
Excellent in every way !

Unser Urlaub war genau das, was wir erwartet hatten: Eine Wohnung in der Nähe der La Rambla, jedoch auch ruhig gelegen, von der wir alle Sehenswürdigkeiten Barcelonas und Umgebung erlaufen bzw. mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erkunden konnten. David&David haben uns mit Tipps für die Tickets der U-Bahn, Restaurants oder wo der beste Familienstrand ist, sehr gut und schnell unterstützt und auch das Taxi am Abreisetag organisiert. Es hat perfekt funktioniert. In der Wohnung war alles Notwendige da und wir waren dankbar für die Klimaanlagen (perfekte Abkühlung). Wir sagen nur "Danke" und kommen gern wieder.
Location location location wonderful, clean apartment.
Very comfortable and good located apartment
Great location, clean and spacious. Doesn't feel like you're in the city centre. David & David were so helpful with any questions or recommendations. Would love to come back & stay
Awesome location. Spacious place. Very quiet considering we were so close to Las Ramblas. Would stay there again and recommend to friends. David was very helpful in accommodating any way he could.

We thoroughly enjoyed our visit at the apartment. It was so enjoyable to be in a great neighborhood and come back to a comfortable clean apartment. We were just looking for the basics in a good location, and the apartment is just what we wanted and more. Clean, spacious, comfortable, plenty of windows, plus the balconies, which were a bonus to be able to sit outside for a few minutes at the end of the day. The bed linens were very nice as well. The neighborhood is awesome, tons of Tapas bars and bakeries, shops, etc. David was very helpful with restaurant recommendations and local tips at the check-in, and even ordered us our cab on our day of departure. Thanks, Davids!
Location is great. Apartment is big. Hosts are helpful and friendly.

There are some great attributes to this flat: great location, quiet at night, large spaces, and 2 washrooms! We loved that locals are in the building too. Keep in mind that you share a 3 storey courtyard with those same locals. David was an excellent communicator and very helpful!
The location was convenient and the host spoke very good English so communication was easy.  It was great that there was a lift and the kitchen was very well furnished.

What a fabulous apartment.  The position was excellent.  Right by my favourite Place Real, and so close to La Rambla without being caught up in noise. Everything in the flat was spotless, clean and new. Both Davids communicated really well. David who checked us in has excellent English which is just as well as my Spanish is non existent!  nothing but good things to say about my stay here.  Will be back! Thank you both for being such great hosts.
A superb location in the heart of the old town, with the advantage that, once you close the door to the apartment, the outside world just disappears; very quiet and peaceful. Thoroughly recommended±

A fantastic, spacious and traditional style apartment based within probably the best plaza and most central part of Barcelona you can find. The hosts were great communicators and very helpful upon arrival.
First time using Airbnb and it was perfect! David was very quick to reply to any messages. Apartment was very clean and light, great weekend stay!
Appartement spacieux et bien équipé. Situation idéale pour découvrir Barcelone. Hôtes agréables. Nous recommandons cette adresse.

Bästa tänkbara läget, precis bakom Plaça Real och alldeles intill La Ramla. Lägenheten var rymlig, ren och tyst. David som vi hade kontakt med var snabb på att svara och ytterst hjälpsam. Kommer vi tillbaka bor vi gärna här igen!

David tiene un piso maravilloso. Excelente ubicacion. Es como se muestra en las fotos y tiene dos baños muy comodos. Las habitaciones son lindas y el piso en general muy silencioso. David ademas es un gran anfrition, soluciona las inquietudes muy rapidamente.

Our first airbnb stay, and everything was wonderful. The location was perfect in the heart of Barcelona, and everything was either walkable or easily accessible via the metro. David gave great restaurant suggestions and was quick to respond to all inquiries.

David & David’s apartment was perfect for our group of five! The location is excellent for exploring the city but we did not hear any street noise at night. We were happy to have two bathrooms. The weather was a bit cold while we were in town but the apartment heat worked well. Would definitely stay again!
Perfect apartment for a visit in Barcelona. David’s help with some of our practical issues was met. Arrival and departure was made convenient for us.
David’s apartment is steps away from Plaza Real and Las Ramblas. It is a great location to explore Barcelona.

This is a very nice apartment in an ideal location. It's very close to Plaça Reial, the Ramblas and all the major attractions. On the other side you are in the middle of the old town with all the necessary convenience stores, markets etc. The flat comes with all amenities needed. It is spacious, well maintained, clean, safe and quiet. We were a party of four and used all three beedroms. With two bathrooms, a small balcony and living room we really enjoyed David & David's flat. We met one of the Davids very briefly. Communication was swift and good, check-in a breeze. Highly recommended.

David met us at the apartment early and let us drop our luggage while they finished cleaning.  He was very hospitable and gave us some tips on navigating the city over NYE.

Wonderful experience all around.

Great apartment in great location. David and David gave us some fabulous recommendations for bars and restaurants and responded promptly when we asked for further recommendations. The apartment was very quiet for such a central position. Highly recommended.
Appartement très spacieux, propre, calme et très bien placé. Accueil chaleureux.Top adresse pour un séjour à 4 ou à 6 à Barcelone! On reviendra!!!
Muy buen departamento y una ubicación inmejorable

Such an amazing place to stay, very clean and spacious. Lovely attentive  host who really wanted to help us have the best stay by giving us tips for places to eat, drink and visit. Excellent location! Would definitely love to stay again!

David & David’s place couldn’t have been in a better location. It was clean, comfortable and had everything you could need for your stay. The only unfortunate part was we were asked to leave cause we were apparently too loud. Sound must carry or they have sensitive neighbors as we had complaints the first two nights and were asked to leave on the third. On the first night we were casually watching television at a reasonable volume, which apparently prompted a complaint however we were never notified by David. If we had of been notified we certainly would have been extremely careful but weren’t given the opportunity. On night two we played music at what we considered a normal respectful volume, but clearly that wasn’t the case. Our group was comprised of Courteaus, young professionals and would have never played any sort of music (or surprisingly television for that matter) if we had of known how sensitive the neighbors were. I would definitely stay with a David again and encourage anyone else to do so as well, but keep this in mind.
Great location, great hosts and comfortable living space!
Great location, lots of space in the apartment, and hosts were extremely responsive and accommodating! We had a great trip!
Perfect place and a perfect host. The location is great. David was very responsive and shared good tips. Would love to visit again!

We were six people who stayed for 4 nights.  David was quick to respond to my messages about check-in, let us check in early which was great!  One of the bedrooms is quite large, the other two a bit small but fits your things.  
The living space was big enough for all of us to sit together.  The dining space (in the kitchen) was too small for six; that is clear from the photos.  The living room furniture is functional but a bit worn-out.
The location is great.  Right next to Plaza Real and the Ramblas.  Lots of places to eat, walkable to most sites.

Perfect location. Right off of the plaza Reial. In the heart of the Gothic center. Barcelona’s best restaurants are steps away from your front door. The apartment was spacious and light. We would stay here again.

Logement idéalement placé, au cœur de Barcelone ! les meilleurs restaurants se trouvent dans la même rue (Viana , Bodega Biarrtitz....) Nous avons pu profiter de Barcelone la nuit sans avoir le souci du retour car le logement est situé à proximité des nombreux bars, Plaza Real. Malgré notre arrivée tardive à plus de minuit notre hôte était présent dans l'appartement à notre arrivée !!  Merci
Lovely apartment. Great location. Fab trip.
Vanskelig å finne en mer sentral beliggende leilighet i Barcelona
FABULOUS location.  Great apartment.  Most helpful hosts.  Highly recommend based on our stay of one week!!
Muy bien
David was great and met us on the first day and showed us personally everything upon check in. Location is great and has everything you need. Would definitely recommended.

Excellent séjour chez David & David , accueil très chaleureux ! L'appartement est très calme, spacieux et fonctionnel ! L'emplacement est juste Ideal pour visiter Barcelone ! Je recommande pour un séjour en famille ou entre amis !!

David and David's place had an excellent location - it was right in the city center and close to everything.  They were very nice and accommodating.  Both check in and check out process were very easy.  We had a nice stay.

I would highly recommend David's apartment. It has a great location and it is in a bustling location with many activities nearby. You are a short walk to the Ramblas. Easy access to the beach and la Boqueria. 10 minute walk to Picasso museum.  David is very easy to reach if needed. The apartment is very quiet and insulated from the noise that comes from the nearby restaurants. Neighbors were quiet as well. Small details missing were toiletries/body soap/shampoo and coffee (this seems standard in some US locations but may not be standard in Barcelona). I would highly recommend this apartment if you are looking for a centralized location with restaurants/night life.

IT WAS PERFECT.
Flat Ideally located and close to a lot of places, and the most important "quiet".
David was very helpful.
Great apartment in an amazing location. The host was great and very accommodating. Highly recommend!

David&David are great hosts.  The apartment is in the perfect location in the Gothic area.  A good spot close to all the wonderful sights.  We walked everywhere.  The street noise was barely audible.  There is air-conditioning at either end of the place, but you have to leave your bedroom doors open to get air in the bedrooms.  There are 2 delicious restaurants right outside the front door of the building.  It is a good place for a home base while in Barcelona.
David was a great host! The apartment was clean and welcoming. Excellent location!

Excellent location. David was great to allow us to check in early. The beds were comfortable and the shower and Wi-fi worked great. The only con is that the AC is located in the hallway so the rooms were a bit warm for sleeping.

We were very pleased with this apartment in Barcelona. It was spotlessly clean, well furnished & decorated...we enjoyed it very much. The apt is in a great area in the Gothic quarter with wonder restaurants and a beautiful square just steps away. David & David we're very accomodating & helpful...even allowing my family who arrived early to check-in before the specified time. We also forgot something in the apartment and they graciously took the time to find it and offered to mail it to our home address overseas. I would highly recommend David & David's beautiful Barcelona apartment!

David & David’s Place is the perfect spot for a first time trip to Barcelona. It’s location is right in the action and walkable to lots of sights, bars and restaurants. Communication with the hosts was easy and quick. I would highly recommend staying here.
Perfect BCN location

David was an amazing host, super friendly, very helpful and quick responses. 
Very centrally located, but very quiet. 
Would definitely recommend, it was perfect for our family of five! .
Outstanding location, just steps from Las Ramblas, yet quiet and comfortable!  Perfect for our family of 6!  David was quick to respond when we had questions!  Thank you, Davids!
C’est super l’acceuil, l’endroit, la propreté et le service

Fantastic location! David met us right away when we arrived.  He went through the apartment with us and answered all our questions about the area.  It is a very nice aparment with plenty of room. 

I visited a different cafe every morning to bring back fresh baking and coffee!  The Gothic district is the place to be.

This location is amazing, and the apartment is comfortable to share with another family as it is air conditioned and has two full bathrooms! It's just steps from Placa Reial and La Rambla.  It's an easy walk to the Museu Picasso.  There is so much to do and see just outside, but none of it can be heard from inside the apartment which is great for sleeping in after a late night out of dancing!  It's surprisingly open and breezy too with nice natural light and a balcony off the living room and master bedroom. 

Recommend packing light and taking advantage of the washer inside the apartment.  There were steel hangers available to hang dry essentials, which were dry by morning. There are also several laundry mats just outside if wanting to use a dryer. We took one under-seat sized roller bag for each person in our party and a handbag or shoulder bag/backpack and still had more than what we needed, even including formal wear.  Best of all, it was so easy to get around (taxi, metro, small elevator, or carry up stairs, etc.). We left room to buy a souvenir bag to pack full for gifts and never had to wait for checked bags as all were carry on size, even for the smaller commuter flights between countries. 

Our hosts recommended restaurants and markets nearby.  We loved the Tapeo Bar and La Quinze Nits!  All were a terrific value!  We also recommend the free walking tour from Barcelona Excursions early in the trip for other fantastic insights to this location. Also worthy of mentioning, we were lucky to be able to see Flamenco at Palau de la Musica – so beautiful that we wanted to cry!

Thank you, David and David, for everything!!
Great location. Would recommend if you want to be close to Las Rambla. Many restaurants in walking distance.

Great place in the middle of center in Barcelona, near to everything!
Nice and spacy apartment, we was 5 people and it felt very cozy and spacy.

We really enjoyed our stay at David&David’s. It was perfect for our family of 6. We loved having 2 separate bathrooms and a kitchen with all the essentials. The place is very clean and well kept. We absolutely loved the location. It is close to so many great spots and at the same time super quiet at night.

Great location. Really convenient to attractions and restaurants in Barri Gothic, El Born, La Rambla, Barceloneta Beach, and the metro. David is very responsive. The apartment could use some updating. And the neighbors can be loud on Friday and Saturday night.
Unbelievably central location. Very communicative hosts. Very accommodating to all our needs. Great stay!

Best Host ever!  Thank you D&D for all the help with the past midnight check-in and all the wonderful tips on restaurants.  The apartment was in a FANTASTIC location near Plaça Reial and La Rambla.  Very clean and well appointed.
Beautiful space with everything you need. Perfect location. David was so helpful and responsive whenever we needed him.

Very clean spacious apartment in the best area. David was a great host with check in , great to have a lift as on the 3rd floor. Everything you needed was at the apartment thank you .
After traveling all the way from Australia it was so nice to relax in such a great place.
David was very accommodating and have great advice. He was very flexible and was able to accomplish any and all changes we wanted to make. Very good experience

David & David we’re excellent host. They truly want you to have a great experience. Which we did. David was very helpful with local referrals for bars and restaurants.  And very accommodating in meeting us at the apartment.  The location is superb. The apartment was perfect for our stay. Everything was honestly great.

The location of this apartment can't be beat.  It is surrounded by great restaurants and shops, and is within easy walking distance to many cultural sites and to public transportation.  In spite of the very lively atmosphere outside, the apartment itself was remarkably quiet at night.

David was an amazing host! We have never had such a helpful Airbnb host in all of our many stays through Airbnb. He was easy and quick to communicate with, very helpful with any questions we had, and went above and beyond to make sure we enjoyed our stay! We were beyond impressed with his hospitality and effort to make our stay in Barcelona the best it could be.

The flat was a generous size for our family of five that includes three young children. It was great to have two separate bathrooms, and all the beds were comfortable. We thought it was a great value for money. It was in the perfect spot to get to all of the attractions we wanted to visit (aquarium, zoo, etc), but also very close to Las Ramblas/touristy area, which I didn't find as charming.

The only thing that I wish I would have realized is that the flat is up 4 levels of stairs (this is likely listed in the description/mentioned in reviews and I probably missed it!). There is a lift, but it was out of order on the bottom level; and even the bottom level requires you to walk up one set of stairs. Something to consider if you are traveling with a pram or small children!
Excellent location, would definitely stay there again and recommend highly. David and David communicated very quickly.

Looking for a very nice, clean spacious 3 bedroom with very  good hosts located in the central part of town?  Look no further!

Can’t beat this location, apartment, and hosts.  Don’t hesitate to book.
Wonderful location, cool host, perfect gaff
Location,location,location. Everything is within 500 feet.

Perfect location!!!!!!!
David was super helpful and made check in and check out easy!

This place is great. The location is perfect. Right off a very lively square with good bars and restaurants, easy walk or Metro ride to everything. And yet - VERY quiet and light, because the windows open onto light shafts and are on a relatively high floor. An offseason visit was wonderful - reasonable crowds. David is an amazing host, extremely responsive and lots of great recommendations. Comfortable beds, plenty of heat and hot water, everything you need.
Great location, very centric. The host was very helpful during our stay. The apartment has all the ameneties necessary to make our stay comfortable.

Thoroughly enjoyed the apartment which suited our family very well. Spacious and very clean with nice linen and towels. Very quiet at night considering the location. We appreciated the assistance of David’s recommendations for parking of our rental car and meeting us to escort us to the apartment. David is very helpful and excellent to communicate with.

This apartment was extremely comfortable and provided all that we needed for our family of five. It was very well located down the beach end of La Rambla and very close to shops and transport. David was one of the most helpful and attentive hosts we’ve encountered on AirBnB. We had a great stay here and would not hesitate to recommend David’s apartment to other travellers.

David and David’s AirBnb was everything we could’ve hoped for. The location was amazing and the apartment was spacious. David also gave us amazing restaurant recommendations. If you want a local Airbnb close walking distance to most tourist attractions, I highly recommend this one.
Beautiful and spacious apartment that is only a short walk to great restaurants, cafes and markets. My family and I loved staying there, and David was very helpful with all of his recommendations!
A well located and well equipped apartment with an attentive host. The generous size of the apartment made for a great base from which to explore Barcelona. We would certainly stay here again.

David&David’s place exceeded our expectations. It was well located in the gothic quarter and was central to everywhere you wanted to go with many metro lines close by. Their home was clean and well equipped. 2 bathrooms was a bonus. The hosts also went above and beyond to help us book a taxi very last minute and were quick to reply to our messages! We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to all.
El alojamiento de David es fantástico, muy cómodo, limpio, muy bien equipado y su ubicación es genial. Sin duda volveríamos a alojarnos allí y lo recomendáremos a nuestros amigos. Gracias David!

Vous pouvez réserver les yeux fermés,l’appartement est grand et très bien équipé.
L’emplacement est top juste à côté de la place Real.
L’appartement est lumineux,il y a un ascenseur pour y accéder et nous n’avons entendu aucun bruits.
Merci David pour l’accueil.

name: Joli 3 et demi bien situé!
summary: Mon logement est proche de Nigelle. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour l'emplacement et la hauteur des plafonds. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Quarto amplo, arejado, vista livre e silencioso.
summary: Meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais e viajantes de negócios. Bicama, criado mudo, armário com cinco portas, puf, mesa, cadeira e cabideiro de parede. 13m², vista livre da rua lateral, arejado, claro, Wi-fi e ar condicionado. Banheiro compartilhado com uma pessoa (água quente), sala de estar/jantar, cozinha, área de serviço e máquina de lavar. É o quarto mais reservado e silencioso do apartamento.
space: Quarto com conforto praticidade e tamanho na medida, para a sua estadia de lazer ou trabalho, em apartamento com cara de casa da gente, situado no oitavo andar de prédio exclusivamente residencial. O quarto possui bicama, que é um conjunto formado por duas camas, uma sobre a outra, conforme aparece na foto. O Rio é uma cidade para se curtir na rua, batendo perna, visitando os points tradicionais e descobrindo outros, aproveitando cada momento intensamente. Depois da badalação, nada melhor do que se recolher em um lugar confortável, agradável e aconchegante. O prédio possui excelente localização, portaria 24 horas, em rua segura, com movimento noturno e que durante o dia oferece as maiores e melhores opções de transportes do bairro: distância de 300 m da estação Botafogo do Metrô, em frente ao ponto de ônibus e com fartura de táxi durante 24hs. Facilidade de deslocamento de Metrô para as melhores praias da Zona Sul (Copacabana e Flamengo 5 minutos), Ipanema e Arpoador (10 minutos) e Bar
description: Meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais e viajantes de negócios. Bicama, criado mudo, armário com cinco portas, puf, mesa, cadeira e cabideiro de parede. 13m², vista livre da rua lateral, arejado, claro, Wi-fi e ar condicionado. neighborhood_overview: Botafogo é o bairro do Rio onde mais tem crescido o número de hotéis, albergues e hostels, devido à sua privilegiada localização e às facilidades de transportes e de deslocamento. Forneço aos hóspedes material descritivo com dicas de locais próximos ao prédio, onde poderão fazer refeições, lanches, se abastecer com compras de todos gêneros de necessidade, incluindo restaurantes, bares, lanchonetes, padarias, supermercados, delicatessen, farmácias e tudo mais.
notes: Pacote mínimo de Natal com três noites, entre 23 até 26/12/2017. Pacote mínimo para Réveillon com três noites, entre 29/12 e 01/01/2018. Pacote mínimo para Carnaval com cinco noites, entre sexta-feira (01/03/19) da semana anterior e quarta feira de cinzas (01/06/19). Cobramos taxa de limpeza de R$70,00 por cada semana de hospedagem.
transit: Recomendo que, durante o dia, os hóspedes utilizem transportes coletivos (metrô e ônibus), bikes ou até mesmo façam passeios a pé, aproveitando as belezas ao ar livre que a cidade oferece. Para saídas noturnas, podemos indicar telefones de empresas de táxi confiáveis.
access: Sala de estar/jantar, cozinha e utensílios, área de serviços, lavadora de roupa e banheiro compartilhado (água quente).
interaction: Disponibilidade para auxiliar no que for preciso. Quero que aproveitem muito bem a permanência na cidade, que se divirtam e que sejam felizes no Rio.
house_rules: Uso do ar condicionado nos quartos somente à noite. Durante o dia, solicitamos que usem os ventiladores. Em respeito à maioria dos clientes e vizinhos, e também para preservar a segurança geral, NÃO aceitamos que os hóspedes: Fumem no interior do apartamento. Tragam animais de estimação. Convidem visitas não autorizadas. Consumam drogas no prédio. Por motivos de segurança e exigência do condomínio, solicito o envio de fotos ou cópias legíveis de documentos (RGI ou Passaporte) dos acompanhantes dos hóspedes, por e-mail ou mensagem telefônica, antes do check in. Agradeço a compreensão. Altíssima temporada: NATAL - ENTRE 23/12 E 25/12 MÍNIMO 2 NOITES RÉVEILLON - ENTRE 29/12 E 01/01 MINIMO 3 NOITES CARNAVAL - ENTRE 01/03 E 06/03 MÍNIMO 5 NOITES

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Tenho 64 anos, sou divorciado, tenho duas filhas, um filho, todos adultos, e uma neta adolescente.
Sou músico amador, das rodas de samba e de chorinho, pratico esportes, principalmente canoagem, natação e hidroginástica. Tenho dois caiaques oceânicos e é um grande prazer remar com amigos ou sozinho. 
Minhas atividades preferidas são fotografar e escrever.
Gosto de aprofundar conhecimentos sobre literatura, arte, história, meio-ambiente e música, principalmente tendo o Rio de Janeiro como tema. Possuo uma página de entretenimento no (Hidden by Airbnb) , voltada para essas atividades.
Faço parte de um coral, gosto de cantar, mas podem ficar tranquilos porque eu raramente canto em casa. haha 
Gosto de cinema, shows, bares e de frequentar festas com amigos.
Gosto de pessoas alegres, divertidas e de bem com a vida, da mesma forma como procuro me manter.
Sou carioca, conheço muito bem a cidade, e posso dar ótimas dicas para quem nos visita interessado em praias, vida noturna, diversão, Carnaval, Réveillon, roteiros culturais, passeios turísticos e passeios ecológicos.
Aqui praticamos a reciclagem, evitamos o desperdício e o descarte irresponsável, sem abrir mão do conforto e das comodidades modernas. Procuramos fazer a nossa parte.
Venham, porque o Rio de Janeiro é uma Cidade Maravilhosa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Meus pais ficaram na Casa do Cesar e amaram o lugar! O apartamento está sempre limpo, é super bem localizado ( Pertinho do metrô) e o Cesar foi um ótimo anfitrião. Desde antes do dia da reserva se  comunicou conosco e, Durante a estadia, foi uma ótima companhia!! Eles já estão até com planos de voltar!!!

Adorei a estadia. Foi tudo como planejado e melhor. A proximidade com o metro era sensacional, o quarto era super agradavel e me senti super bem no apartamento. O César nos ajudou muito e foi extremamente compreensível e maleável. Facilitou muito nossa vida. Provavelmente voltariamos a nos hospedar neste apartamento!
Cesar es un carioca muy buen anfitrion, que vive en un lugar muy comodo y limpio. Ayuda con lo que necesites. (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Cesar foi sempre muito atencioso durante toda a hospedagem , a descrição e a localização estão totalmente de acordo com o anunciado, agradecemos a atenção e recomendamos.

Atenciosamente.

Célio

Nuestra estadía fue excelente, el departamento hermoso, limpio y muy bien ubicado en un barrio seguro a dos cuadras del metro. Al llegar César no estaba en casa pero nos recibió su nieta, ambos muy agradables. Muy recomendable!!
Alojamiento muy central cerca de todo, fácil conectividad (metro y autobús), supermercados, farmacias cerca.
O anfitrião é atencioso e responde rapidamente. O quarto em que fiquei tinha tudo o que eu precisava.

name: 1 BD Luxury Apt in prime location w/ pool & tennis
summary: A 1 BD Luxury Apartment in the heart of Sydney (Surry Hills).  Equipped with all you need including full kitchen, balcony and onsite laundry.  Access to rooftop pool, tennis court and basement gym. On prestigious Crown St with shops, bars and restaurants. 5 minutes walk to Central Station. No pets.
space: Loft style with large enclosed balcony. Great location: 5 min walk to Central, 15 minutes walk to CBD Easy to catch transit/uber to beaches.  Large closet w/ hangers. Laundry and iron on site.
description: A 1 BD Luxury Apartment in the heart of Sydney (Surry Hills).  Equipped with all you need including full kitchen, balcony and onsite laundry.  Access to rooftop pool, tennis court and basement gym. On prestigious Crown St with shops, bars and restaurants. 5 minutes walk to Central Station. No pets. Loft style with large enclosed balcony. Great location: 5 min walk to Central, 15 minutes walk to CBD Easy to catch transit/uber to beaches.  Large closet w/ hangers. Laundry and iron on site. Steps away from Crown Street and 10 minute walk to Oxford St. $15 uber to Bondi Junction. $10 uber to Harbourfront. However, can catch public transit to anywhere from Central Station.  Grocery/alcohol store around the corner.
access: Steps away from Crown Street and 10 minute walk to Oxford St. $15 uber to Bondi Junction. $10 uber to Harbourfront. However, can catch public transit to anywhere from Central Station.  Grocery/alcohol store around the corner.
house_rules: Please be respectful of premises and neighbors. Don't make loud noise after midnight.  Check in: flexible. Check out: before noon.

host.host_about:
Young professional working in the insurance/advocacy field. I work to live and never the other way around!

I love to travel and meet new people. Favourite destination so far has been Argentina!  

I try to be very respectful as a guest. I will treat your  property the way I wish for mine to be treated.

reviews.comments: Great place to stay, everything worked smoothly with key pick-up and good communication. It's a quiet street so a good night's sleep, yet just a short walk to some great places for breakfast. Really convenient for getting everywhere with the train station just 5 mins away too.

Большая уютная квартира со всем необходимым для комфортной жизни. Расположена в 5 мин от вокзала, в спокойном районе.  До оперы пешком 40 мин, или на метро 3 остановки. Отличный интернет, чистота и порядок. Гибкое время заезда и выезда. Хозяин отзывчивый и доброжелательный, постоянно на связи,  общительный и надёжный.
Очень рекомендую на любой срок проживания.

Location is great and the pool and tennis court are a bonus.  The apartment was quiet and the host easy to communicate with.  I would happily recommend this apartment for anyone wanting to explore Sydney.
Andrei's place was a delight to stay in, between the tennis court and fussball perfect place for an active person to have plenty of fun, without even leaving the building.
Great location and fantastic rooftop garden/pool area. Very secure and accessible. Not far from all the main attractions and a ver comfortable apartment. Would defibitley recommend to couples.
Had an enjoyable stay at Andrei's place - comfortable, spacious and convenient location :)
Andrei’s place is a comfortable unit close to the sights of Sydney. I would definitely stay here again.

Great location in the coolest neighborhood of Sydney, next to great restaurants & bars, 25 min bus ride to Bondi beach. The apartment has everything you need to have a comfy stay. If you care about having the full amenities showed in the pictures, then ask Andrei to make sure the pool & the tennis court are fully functional before booking.
Great stay in a very central location. Nice apartment with everything you need. Andrei was very easy to communicate with.

name: Amazing apartment with sea view
summary: The apartment is a place for people to renew their energies for the beautiful and wonderful view of the sea. Ideal for those looking for a comfortable place, it is well located, opposite the Aterro do Flamengo with extensive green area which is one of the most pleasant areas of leisure in the city. The ocean view of Flamengo beach and the Sugar Loaf Montain is breathtaking.
space: Beautiful and well decorated apartment, air conditioning (split), Cable TV, Washing machine, Fridge (full size - not a fridge), Coffee maker, Blender, kitchen utensils (glasses, plates, cutlery, pans), and Internet (Wifi). The bathroom is equipped with electric shower. The double bed and sofa bed, the cabinets with several drawers will help in your comfort and organization.

Ideal for those looking for a comfortable place, it is well located, opposite the Aterro do Flamengo with extensive green area which is one of the most pleasant areas of leisure in the city. I live near the apartment, so access will be easy, for any need that may arise. Flamengo is a bohemian neighborhood of Rio. Full of bars, restaurants of all specialties, banks, parks, museums and cinemas. On weekends streets and squares come aliv
neighborhood_overview: Flamengo is a bohemian neighborhood of Rio. Full of bars, restaurants of all specialties, banks, parks, museums and cinemas. On weekends streets and squares come alive with live shows. The Flamengo beach is ideal for walking, and you can rent bicycles by the day or by the month at a very affordable price. In addition to nearby supermarkets, two fairs take place on Tuesdays, next to the apartment - one conventional and one organic.
notes: The building has two entrances; when one is open the other is closed. 24 hour concierge.
transit: For those who come by car, there are nearby parking lots in it. Several bus and subway lines pass to the front of the building. Allowing access to other areas of the city, including the downtown and port areas, and the famous Copacabana and Ipanema. The vans leading to Cristo de Corcovado depart from Largo do Machado, 10 minutes walking. Some distances: .Flamengo Beach: 400m .Metrô do Catete: (Website hidden by Airbnb) of the Republic: 550m .Ipanema Beach: 9,7 km .Copacabana Beach: 6,8 km .Sugar Loaf: 4.3 km .Lapa: 2,2 km .Sambódromo: 3.8 km
interaction: I live near the apartment, so access will be easy, for any need that may arise.
house_rules: In the building is not allowed the circulation of people in bathing suits, or shirtless in the common areas of the condominium.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Adoramos a estadia no apartamento da Luz! Bem localizado, limpo, organizado e com uma vista magnífica! A Luz e seu marido foram anfitriões perfeitos! Simpáticos, comunicativos e muito disponíveis! :)

Quando cheguei o apartamento estava impecavelmente limpo! A Luz foi muito receptiva e em poucos minutos eu já estava me sentido em casa. O lugar fica muito próximo ao metrô (uma quadra) e é perto tanto do centro quanto da zona sul. Tem uma vista maravilhosa e muitas coisas legais em volta (restaurantes, cinema, mercados, padarias e farmácias). Foi um prazer ficar lá e espero voltar. (:
Hospedagem foi incrível! A vista é deslumbrante!! A Luz foi muito atenciosa e nos deu todo o suporte necessário do início ao (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, voltaremos!!

O espaço é simplesmente inesquecível e mágico. O visual pela janela complementa o espaço que acomodou com muito conforto eu e minha esposa. A vizinhança é super tranquila. A Luz é muitíssimo atenciosa, prestativa e especial. Recomendo X 1000!!!!

I highly recommend staying here. The view is amazing and the air conditioner works great which was very important for me. The apartment is extremely clean and is in a good location. The owners are very nice people.

Appartement agréable et bien situé. La vue est exceptionnelle, la climatisation fonctionne très bien et le quartier est très sympa. Le lit bébé est utile pour les personnes qui voyagent avec un très jeune enfant.

name: Treehouse with Incredible Views
summary: Experience the simple life in this mini house located 1 block from the beach. Enjoy nature the Norfolk pine and Noni trees, Ocean and mountain view from amazing second story Loft. Air Condition, spacious design, kitchenette, Full size loft, two full beds, and a full restroom. Relax in the hammock as you plan your day in this rain forest area of Oahu. The beach and world class hikes also just out your doorstep.  Sleeps 4 comfortably! Detached bath is about twenty steps away.
space: This simple compact space is  unique 220 sq ft two story mini house great for travelers that want to see the real Hawaii. It is also located in a rain forest region. Ocean and mountain views, fan, full size refrigerator, Two full beds, one Futon & couch bed, comfortable clean and convenient. Small kitchen, newly installed cabinets, granite countertop, are modern and stylish. The full restroom is newly built with Hot shower, vanity, and full restroom. This detached restroom is located underneath the deck staircase of the main house. If you desire total peace and quiet in a unique jungle environment This spot is perfect. Free use of surfboards and world class hiking and snorkeling are a step away for outdoor types, and adventurers. Also, artists, and retreat attendees frequently stay here for Windward Retreat Center. It is an outdoor lover's paradise.
