neighborhood_overview: this is a quiet neighborhood. please respect the neighbors and keep noise levels down
notes: The full bath is located about 30 feet away from the bedroom, and it's under the deck of the main house. Also the stair case leading to the bedroom is steeper than normal gradient so it is only recommended for able bodied people.  You will need to come up and down the steep stairs in order to come to the restroom.
transit: Public busses pass traveling in both directions every 30 minutes. Bus stop is two blocks away from home. Get to nearby town Hauula, with grocert stores and restauranta, in 8 minutes.
access: Guests have access to the back yard grassy area of the property at this address. Please follow the fencline when coming and going from the property. This fencline is simply the south border of the property and will lead directly from your parking spot, to the Mini House. We have just added WIFI service! the code is Netgear005 and the password is Vastnest603
interaction: I am available at all times to assist you, just text me! (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The assistant manager is Linda, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: quiet hour is 830pm. no smoking inside the house. please don't speak loudly while outside, due to neighbors being sensitive to that kind of thint.

reviews.comments: Perfect little treehouse. Great neighborhood. Short walk to the beach.

Douglass was super helpful with instructions and information prior to arrival. 

We had a great time on the island and we're glad to have such a unique place to stay that fit our budget.

Staying at Douglas' tree house was a unique off the grid experience. Don't expect too much comfort, be ready to live with the minimum. Apart from some financial misunderstandings in the beginning, everything went great. Douglas was generous with local tips and shared his surfboards with us :)
Doug was a great host, providing us with all we needed and more for our stay. We loved the tree house. It was unique and quirky and in a beautiful, peaceful neighbourhood.
Doug was very nice and made us feel as home. We loved the tree house and peaceful neighborhood.

Douglas was a great host for our first AirBnB experience.  He was friendly, easy to communicate with, and knowledgeable about the area.  He offered to take us hiking, which we were unfortunately too busy with other things to take him up on.  Overall, a great little space, quiet, safe, and cozy.
The location is super remote, scenic and cool. From the neighbourhood there is an easy bus to Pipeline (for all the surfing fans). Definitely check it out if you're and outdoorsy person.

What a great little place. Had all the amenities we needed, though you are warned it's a little rugged and it definitely requires a more laid back type of personality to enjoy. But the location made it worthwhile. Its tucked in a sleepy suburb right next to the beach and was great for watching the sunrise. Found some really cool hikes nearby, especially Makaua falls trail right down the street that became one of the unexpected gems on our trip (really fun bouldering!). Doug was also really great at making himself accessible and easy to reach with questions.

This is the perfect place for a traveler who wants to live simply and simply live for a bit. Breathtaking hikes and beaches nearby as well as bus stops just around the corner for further exploring. Douglas was a great help with every question we had and took us on an incredible hike.
Great for those who plan on being out and on adventures all day. Good place for the price.

Great location--Has beautiful scenery with surrounding mountains, hikes and beaches. Also serves as a great access point to the rest of the island-- it's a short drive to the northern and eastern shores. 

Doug was very kind and accommodating. Let us rent paddle boards and strapped them on to the roof of our car for us. Also drew out a map of the area and gave us directions to awesome hiking and paddle boarding spots.

Shower is outdoors and bathroom is a short walk from the treehouse. 
Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a more adventurous/off the grid experience.
Nice location, but would be a bit of a tight fit for 4 people, particularly the living space.

Great place for anyone that is looking for a home base to adventure around the island and isn't too fussy about upscale amenities. The cabin was rustic and cozy, with everything we needed to cook for ourselves camping style. The bed was comfy, with lots of space. Showering outdoors was fun but quick due to cold water. Doug was a great host - lots of tips and he even took us out for a surf lesson. We'd definitely stay here again!
I had a wonderful stay in Douglas's tree house. Calm, independent, idyllic place.  I'll come back for sure.
Comfortable and peaceful. Not really a treehouse, but a 2-floor structure next to a tree.

Such an amazing location with tons of great beaches nearby! The cabin is super cozy and comfortable, and the outdoor shower definitely wakes you up in the morning! Make sure to bring or purchase bug spray though since there are quite a few mosquitos flying around the area. I would suggest to rent a car, although the bus service seems to be pretty great, because the treehouse is a 40 minute drive from the airport. It's also about a 40 minute drive to Waimea Bay which is an amazing beach and snorkelling spot that you must check out while staying at Doug's place. Doug has a little hand drawn map inside that tells you about some great hiking spots as well which is a bonus, and one of the cool hikes is basically in the back yard!

It's a nice place if you are willing to climb the stairs for the sleep at night and get down the stairs and walk to the neighbor house each time you want to go to a restroom. When taking the shower with warm water (no hot water) that is on the street when dark, make sure to bring your flashlight (no light in the shower). If traveling more than 2, make sure the second bed will have a box spring in advance, otherwise, it'll be almost impossible to sleep on it.

To summarize, it was a nice one-time experience.

Douglas was a great host! The mini-house is great for people traveling on a budget. The description is accurate. The house is in a really quiet neighborhood and is close to some great beaches. I'd definitely suggest this to anyone who is wanting to experience the more calm side of Oahu.

This off grid tree house (not really an actual tree-house) is a small and cozy place, out dated furniture, a little damp inside, outside showered with no hot water, toilet was outside the tree house, and a few bugs. It wasn't an issue for me because I've been camping before, it's something you expect. No a/c inside, has a fan upstairs in the bedroom, which during the day it was needed but not so much at night. Has an amazing view of the mountains as you sit outside on the patio chair, siting under a fruit tree while spending some company with the roaming chickens! I didn't spend lots of time at the tree house. Location is great, I've spent lots of my time at Kaaawa beach which is a 5 minute walk. The tree house is 2 blocks away from main highway and bus stops, and a 5 minute walk from a 7-11 which is a lifesaver for food, drinks, and snacks!!! (not many food spots nearby)... It's about 1 hour bus ride to Waimea Bay Beach and a little over 1 hour bus ride to Ala Moana Center. I stayed here mainly because I attended the Spartan Race Hawaii Weekend at Kualoa Ranch which was a little over 2 miles away..... Overall, this place was perfect for me due to its location, size of the tree house, and price for my stay. The host, Doug, usually answers you back promptly if you have any questions and he is a great source to ask for recommendations on what to do while your in Hawaii. My first time here was amazing and I can't wait to come back!

This house was not only terrible but the photos he posted were not realistic at all. The place was unsafe for anyone. The house itself was dirty it seemed as if someone was living there before we got to the house. Very disappointed. Plus the host was rude.

Douglas' treehouse is perfect for a couple Who likes Adventures, its all clean and you find everThing you Need. The WLAN does only work near the house like he said but it's aleight when you know before. All in all it was a Great stay

It's a shack not a tree house. But other than that the description is pretty accurate. Location is great. Not too far from great surfing spots. The locals were very friendly. overall, it was a best experience however, I do not recommend it to someone that does not enjoy being outdoors. This is not a hotel.

Outre le rapport qualité-prix qui était un peu élevé, tout était très bien dans cette petite cabane. Nous avons été bien reçus et nous avons pu bien profiter de notre séjour. L'arrêt de bus et la mer se trouve à 2min a pied.

Great little place! Exactly as described. If you are not ready to rough it then this is not the place for you. We enjoyed the hikes, beaches, fishing, and much much more around this area. Seemed well placed for enjoying the North Shore and Honolulu area.

Me and my girl loved the tree house cabin. Very simple but great for the price, and the location is the best on oahu. Doug was very helpful and accommodating and even gave us a later check out time. Over all we’d come back!
It’s great!

Great location and very accommodating with letting us check in early. Only thing I would have liked to see differently was that there was a crack in the ceiling allowing lizards and bugs in the room. Other than that, amazing host and location!
Great location to get out of the heavy tourist spots in Oahu.

Owner’s description gave me high expectation. It’s probably true for the main house but clearly doesn’t apply to the back house. (1. No great view in the back house 2. Room is not that clean - the window frame had dirt residuals from construction 3. No lit/encloses path between the back house and the bathroom, I had to walk through in dark) I’d not recommend the back house for such a price because with the same price you’d spend a night in a much better house.
Kaaava is a quiet, scenic community in a great location.
Everything was clean and as advertised. Douglas was quick to respond and very helpful. Loved beautiful scenery and a beach was only a short walk away.

name: Bonita habitacion centrica-Sagrada Familia
summary: Es mi piso te sentirás muy cómodo y tranquilo, la habitación es mediana con cama doble con todo lo que necesitas para pasar una buena estancia. Estoy solo a unas calles de la sagrada familia, es un barrio con mucha vida y muy cerca de otros sitios de interés.
space: La ubicación y la atención a los huéspedes
description: Es mi piso te sentirás muy cómodo y tranquilo, la habitación es mediana con cama doble con todo lo que necesitas para pasar una buena estancia. Estoy solo a unas calles de la sagrada familia, es un barrio con mucha vida y muy cerca de otros sitios de interés. La ubicación y la atención a los huéspedes Piso muy limpio  con todas las comodidades.  Ubicación excelente Estoy siempre encantada de ayudarles en lo que necesiten Es una zona con mucha  vida a solo unas calles de la magnífica iglesia de la Sagrada Familia y a 1 calle de el famoso por su arquitectura hospital de Sant Pau. En el barrio puedes encontrar parques, tiendas , restaurantes, supermercados y cafés así como también excelente coneccion  de transportes urbanos( metro, bus, vivos etc) Si, te puedes mover en todos los transportes públicos
neighborhood_overview: Es una zona con mucha  vida a solo unas calles de la magnífica iglesia de la Sagrada Familia y a 1 calle de el famoso por su arquitectura hospital de Sant Pau. En el barrio puedes encontrar parques, tiendas , restaurantes, supermercados y cafés así como también excelente coneccion  de transportes urbanos( metro, bus, vivos etc)
transit: Si, te puedes mover en todos los transportes públicos
access: Piso muy limpio  con todas las comodidades.  Ubicación excelente
interaction: Estoy siempre encantada de ayudarles en lo que necesiten
house_rules: Que sean respetuosos y cuidadosos. No se admiten fiestas en el piso  y solo se puede fumar en áreas como el balcón.

host.host_about: Hola me llamo Carol Ortega soy una chica divertida, agradable y simpática, aunque me paso la mayor parte del día trabajando, me gusta recibir a la gente y conocer gente del mundo, suelo ser muy jovial y me encanta compartir mi piso con la gente que viene para que disfrute su estancia. Aunque solo se hablar el castellano, me suelo entender fácilmente con la gente con las personas que vienen a pasar su estancia.

reviews.comments: I enjoyed my stay here very much. Carol is a great host and makes you feel welcomed right away. The location is in a good neighborhood with everything you need with in walking distance. The room is very spacious and clean as well as the bathroom and kitchen. I definitely would recommend this to other visitors to Barcelona!

The apartment was very clean and comfortable.
It is also well located, close to the subway, restaurants and the beach.

Carol was also very helpful, she explained everything about the area and told me the best places of the city.

I highly recommend this apartment.
Carlo a good person. She is so welcoming. Friendly and easy going.

Carol es muy amable, el lugar es como lo muestran las fotos.
Todo perfecto

Carol es una persona muy amable y muy simpática, solo la vi diez minutos a mi llegada. llegue con retraso y fue muy tolerante, y esta a disposición al teléfono. el piso esta bien ubicado a unos pocos min de la sagrada familia caminando. durante tu hospedaje Carol te brinda una salida de baño algo sin duda muy útil y una botella de agua mineral.
lamentablemente la habitación es extremadamente pequeña y sin luz natural, la única ventana da a la pared del ascensor por lo q no entra tampoco aire ni se ventila la habitación. la higiene del lugar deja bastante q desear. el acolchado tenia manchas y en las sabanas de mi cama he encontrado pelos!!! 
 la ducha es una misión imposible... un lugar extremadamente pequeño donde no es posible bañarse sin golpearse con las canillas. y también necesitaba mayor limpieza. no volvería!

I stayed at Carol's for 9 days. I had a very pleasant experience. The location is perfect. Bus stops and Metro are just around the corner. Sagrada Familia is just down the road. Lots of restaurants and shops nearby. I would stay with her again if I were to come back! Highly recommended.

One thing that bothered me was the noise of the elevator. My room was literally behind the elevator and it made noises when in use. Thank goodness I am a heavy sleeper so it didn't wake me up. Other than that, my overall experience was great.
Great location and Carol was accommodating with respect to time.
Carol muy atenta siempre y muy amable. El cuarto como descrito, muy limpio. Hace bastante calor pero todo muy bien!

Carol estuvo pendiente desde antes de mi llegada al aeropuerto de Barcelona hasta el último día. Te recibe con la mejor disposición y aprecio. El cuarto es exactamente como sale en la fotografía, también ahora cuenta con un abanico de techo y un espejo. Carol te brinda toallas al llegar y puedes utilizar la línea blanca. Muy amigable, te da los mejores datos para que tu estadía en Barcelona sea innolvidable!
Good stay! Enjoyed the view from balcony.

I really enjoyed my stay at Carol's cozy and nice apartment. I had everything I needed and the location was perfect - beautiful street in the center of Barcelona. A lot of cafes, restaurants and places of interest.
Alojamiento acogedor en un entorno inmejorable en el centro de Barcelona y con una gran anfitriona :)
Mucho calor
Very helpful and friendly
Carol is a great host, you're definitely going to enjoy your stay
Carol was a great host. She was very accommodating and hospitable. Her apartment was very clean and I would definitely stay again.
Muy atenta y dispuesta a apoyarte

Carol es una anfitriona increíble! El departamento es super cómodo y limpio! 
Definitivamente me volvería a quedar en el departamento de Carol ♥️

Evin konumu oldukça iyi Sagrada Familya Katedraline yürüme mesafesinde. Evin  yakınında çeşitli kafe-barlar mevcut. Ev sahibi Carol oldukça ilgiliydi. Oda biraz küçük ve penceresi yok bunları göz önünde bulundurursanız iyi oldur. Bir de geç saatlere kadar gürültü mevcut apartmanda. Bunun dışında fiyat-performans açısından tavsiye edilir
Really nice appartement, Carol was really nice

Very well located place! Carol was very kind with me during my stay and did everything she could to make my time there more comfortable. The room is simple but has what you need in terms of space and places to put things.
I had a very good and pleasant stay at Carol's place. Carol is a very nice and friendly host. He tenido una muy buena estancia en la casa de Carol. Carol es una cariñosa y buena anfitriona.
Sencilla habitación, en el centro de Barcelona
Appartement conforme à la description, très bien situé.
Genial, me atendió fenomenalmente y me dio todas las facilidades para una buena estancia.

Inmejorable apartamento, atención y localización. La relación calidad-precio es excelente. Carol mantiene impecable el piso y se esmera en ayudarte en todo lo que sea posible, fue muy amable aunque tuvimos que realizar check in muy tarde. Siempre está disponible para cualquier duda y es muy agradable. El cuarto es realmente cómodo y limpio, quizá algo pequeño para estancias más largas. Recomiendo.
100% recomendado. Muy linda habitación, céntrico y Carol es muy atenta.
La ubicación perfecta y la Carol es muy amable.
I really enjoyed it at Carols place, tidy, quiet, central, nice and comfortable. All you need for a short city trip.
Enjoyed our stay with Carol! The flexible check-in was really important since our flight was arriving quite late. Carol was also really accommodating when we changed the reservation last minute.

Un lugar con una ubicación perfecta, cerca al metro y a la Sagrada Familia.

Una casa cómoda, segura y limpia.
Nice place

un lugar muy céntrico, en el cual puede visitar la sagrda familia caminado, y el metro se encutra muy cerca, en la noche es una zona muy tranquila, caro siempre está al pendiente para apoyarte en lo que necesites.
Excelente trato, muy atenta en todo momento, me dio muchos tips para mi viaje
Nice place to stay, very near of the Sagrada Familia. Good choice if you are looking for a place to stay!

name: WONDERFUL APARTMENTE IN COPACABANA!
summary: COPACABANA, a few steps from the waterfront, 1 block from the beach. Excellent front apart., 2 bedrooms, suite and bathroom. It features a queen bed and 2 single beds (with auxiliary). Building with elevator, close to all the resources (markets, pharmacies, restaurants, bike Itaú, among other facilities) to the famous Copacabana Palace and the subway Cardeal Arco Verde. We provide  bedding; bath and face towel game per person; hair dryer, dishes, home appliances; Cable TV and internet with wifi.
space: It features a queen bed and 2 single beds (with auxiliary). Air conditioning in all bedrooms and in the living room. Building with elevator, close to all the resources (markets, pharmacies, restaurants, bike Itaú, among other facilities) to the famous Copacabana Palace and the subway Cardeal Arco Verde. We provide  bedding; bath and face towel game per person; hair dryer, dishes, home appliances; Cable TV and internet with wifi.
description: COPACABANA, a few steps from the waterfront, 1 block from the beach. Excellent front apart., 2 bedrooms, suite and bathroom. It features a queen bed and 2 single beds (with auxiliary). Building with elevator, close to all the resources (markets, pharmacies, restaurants, bike Itaú, among other facilities) to the famous Copacabana Palace and the subway Cardeal Arco Verde. We provide  bedding; bath and face towel game per person; hair dryer, dishes, home appliances; Cable TV and internet with wifi. It features a queen bed and 2 single beds (with auxiliary). Air conditioning in all bedrooms and in the living room. Building with elevator, close to all the resources (markets, pharmacies, restaurants, bike Itaú, among other facilities) to the famous Copacabana Palace and the subway Cardeal Arco Verde. We provide  bedding; bath and face towel game per person; hair dryer, dishes, home appliances; Cable TV and internet with wifi. building with 24 hours doormen. There are no residents in the apar
neighborhood_overview: Come and meet the wonderful city!! And enjoy staying in the most eclectic neighborhood of the city - COPACABANA!! In this apartment located in the street Duvivier, 60, a few steps from the beach, you will notice the great amount of restaurants, shops, supermarkets, etc., all very close, thus facilitating, the best experience in this bustling city!!
notes: Housekeeping is provided once per stay.
transit: The apartment is located near the metro station Cardeal Arco Verde. Coming from the airports, prefer the yellow cabs and demand races by the taximeter. Coming from Galeão - Approximate cost in flag 2 - R$75 + Fee per bag Coming from Santos Dumont - Approximate cost in flag 2 - R$35 + Fee per bag. Paid parking is quite plentiful in the area. Please inquire for rates.
access: building with 24 hours doormen.
interaction: There are no residents in the apartment.
house_rules: Ao sair do apartamento, os equipamentos elétricos devem ser desligados. All the electric equipments must be turn off when leaving the apartment.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
A top city like rio deserves a top apartment like this !
Everything was great...
Shops ,metro,restaurant,beach sorround you...
In the hearth of copacabana...
I d like to spend some words for thiago ,our host ,everytime helpfull and nice with us...
Next time in rio will be of course here again!

The owner was waiting for us when we arrived. He is very kind and speaks english very well. The house and furniture is new and very clean. Everything we needed was provided. The location is perfect, two minutes walk from copacabana beach and the metro. The secured entrance gives a comfortable feeling. We enjoyed our stay very much! I would definitely recommend this airbnb apartment!

Gostaria de agradecer a Débora e ao Thiago pela cordialidade no atendimento e gentileza. Adoramos nossa estada, foi tudo perfeito! O apartamento é excelente, muito bem mobiliado, com tudo que precisamos, limpo, aconchegante e super bem localizado! Certamente voltaremos numa próxima oportunidade e faremos propaganda! Abs.
O apartamento de Thiago é limpo, confortavel, bem organizado e equipado. A localização é otima, perto da praia e no meio de Copabana. Thiago foi muito amavel em tudo momento. Recomandamos!
Um otimo apartamento. A localização é incrível e segura. O apartamento está tudo novo, com ar, tv a cabo, internet, tudo nos conformes. Uma excelente opção de estadia em copacabana!
Otima localização, apartamento em boas condições, como consta nas fotos!

Recomendable para familia, la ofrecido coincide con lo que te encuentras al llegar, calle con varios lugares para comer y comprar comida, el apto. está a 200 m de las playas de Copacabana. Thiago es un excelente anfitrión y muy amable.
Super indico o apartamento do Thiago. Boa localização, apt. Confortável...

Foi a 1ª vez que locamos apartamento pelo airbnb. Um tipo de teste. Fomos em três adultos e uma criança. O apartamento era conforme o esperado. Algumas das comodidades sequer haviam sido previamente informadas. O prédio possui segurança muito rígida, o que favorece em termos de Rio de Janeiro. É próximo de ótimos e baratos restaurantes. Uma padaria, que fica cerca de 150 metros do prédio, é fantástica. Há supermercado e farmácia perto. Há duas cadeiras de praia e um guarda-sol. Tudo foi perfeito em relação ao Check in e ao check out. Em termos de custo x benefício foi ideal para nós, que tínhamos opção de pegar dois quartos de um hotel equivalente, porém pagando muito mais. Se voltarmos para Copacabana, ele é uma referência a ser considerada.
O apartamento do Thiago realmente é muito bom. Tudo novo, muito limpo e arrumado especialmente para atender os visitantes. Recomendo 100%

Gostamos muito do apartameno,  atendeu todas as nossas necessidades. 

Bem limpo em organizado,  Internet e televisão funcionando bem.

Próximo a tudo, praia, restaurantes l, padarias, etc...

Recomendo muito bem esse apto.
Otimo apartamento! Muito limpo, fresquinho e confortavel!

name: Cozzy Room close to the center in quiet flat  !!!
summary: Habitación doble, con balcón y baño compartido , salón amplio, cocina completa y balcón doble interno para fumar y colgar la ropa
space: Se trata de un apartamento con dos habitaciones, un baño con ducha, salón comedor y cocina independiente, balcón para fumar y colgar la ropa
description: Habitación doble, con balcón y baño compartido , salón amplio, cocina completa y balcón doble interno para fumar y colgar la ropa Se trata de un apartamento con dos habitaciones, un baño con ducha, salón comedor y cocina independiente, balcón para fumar y colgar la ropa Solo pueden dejar cosas dentro del apartamento, o en su habitacion no fuera ni en las escaleras, ni bicicletas dentro de la entrada del edificio Siempre estoy atento a los mensajes y vivo en el edificio El barrio es muy bonito, cerca de la estación de trenes y metro Clot Aragón, se puede ir o venir desde el aeropuerto con solo un viaje por 1€, El metro clot Aragón los lleva a todos lados, el tren R2 los trae desde el aeropuerto y los lleva, la línea roja y linea lila de metro Ya que hay que subir escaleras pueden traer mochilas para que nos os cueste la subida
neighborhood_overview: El barrio es muy bonito, cerca de la estación de trenes y metro Clot Aragón, se puede ir o venir desde el aeropuerto con solo un viaje por 1€,
notes: Ya que hay que subir escaleras pueden traer mochilas para que nos os cueste la subida

interaction: Siempre estoy atento a los mensajes y vivo en el edificio

reviews.comments:
Friendly people with sunny 
Tidy clean and useful house
great stay!

Hôte très sympathique. 
Tout près de la station de métro et nombreux commerces dans la rue. 
Manque un verrou à la porte et de quoi pendre des vêtements.
Die Unterkunft war sehr in Ordnung, wir hatten sogar einen kleinen Balkon. Mit der Metro ist man schnell überall.
Ivanca and Mathias are the best hosts ever! Seriously the best! :D
Esta muy bueno... la ubicación no es céntrica pero esta muy cerca de una linea de metro importante.

It was a really nice stay in Barcelona. We didn't spend a lot time in the Airbnb, but it felt like being home :) 
Beautiful sunrise view, nice balcony and people!
Excellent location, a great apartment for couples of if you are going on your own! I recommend it
Muy buen tipo Ivan !!!

The room we stayed in was NOT the one we booked.
After booking, the host changed the address. We stayed on the same building (Navas de Tolosa 232) but on a different house. 
None of the photos currently on this page (as of 23/06/2018) are from the place we stayed in. 
The room we booked was the one with the Jimi Hendrix painting and hydraulic mosaic floor. We did NOT stayed in this room. The host told us the room was not available.
If you book with this host make sure you are certain about the room you'll stay in.
Tout était parfait et Ivanka nous a dépanné en urgence dans un moment délicat lors de notre séjour à Barcelone. Mille merci pour tout !!! :-)
Nossa hospedagem foi maravilhosa,pessoas incríveis,nosso voo foi de madrugada e mesmo assim eles nos esperaram,muito gentis e prestativos. Agradeço muito.
Great, affordable place to stay. Good kitchen facilities and nice to share space with other travellers so good way to meet people

Ivanca is a really nice guy. The apartment is very central (very close to station and also easy to walk many places) and well equipped. One problem is that the picture on the page is not matching the room (with Jimmy poster). The other thing is the lack of cleanness/hygiene of the apartment. Note that you're going to be in the flat with other travelers - also possible to be with families with kids.

Avons passé une semaine chez Ivanca. Nous avons changé 3 fois de colocataires durant cette période. 
Car vous ne séjourner pas chez l’hôte mais avec d’autres voyageurs. Vous disposez d’une chambre les autres espaces sont partagés. Avec toutes les joies (ou non) que cela peut induire...
Les équipements sont basiques Mais pour quelques jours c’est suffisant.
La literie était correcte. 
Par contre Le ménage n’est pas fait dans les coins. 
Le quartier est sympa mais bruyant
Vous êtes à proximité de tout commerce et de petit resto très sympa et bien moins cher que dans le centre-ville (courrez à « l’olivera »!) 
Globalement nous avons passé un bon séjour.
Very friendly and helpful. A very nice place to stay!

The room and the shared spaces were as expected. Having an air conditioning was nice. Room was clean and cozy. Perfect for couples. Location was great as we barely used public transport. I highly recommend!
Great host!! Highly recommend this place .

Appartement calme et propre, bien situé dans Barcelone, il faut aimer marcher un peu. 
L’accueil a été excellente, l’hôte a même trouvé un emplacement gratuit pour notre voiture. Je recommande fortement.
top Location

Appartement à partager avec d'autres voyageurs, donc avec 6 ou 7 personnes la salle de bain est rapidement remplie d'eau, la douche et les toilettes ne sont pas très propres. Dommage car Ivanca est sympathique il nous a bien renseigné pour se rendre à l'appartement et le logement n'est pas trop mal situé.
Appartement très propre et propriétaire très attentionné

An amazing place with Ivanca - amazing host :)
The apartament is a walk distance for a lot of beautiful places! Great connections and great location :)

To my mind it’s better to rent all the flat when you travel with a big company, but maybe it’s not very good if you travel alone. The location is not bad, as it’s near the train station, it’s close to Sagrada and you need about 40 minutes to walk to the center.
Muy cómodo y excelentemente ubicado. Nos sentimos como en casa. Volveríamos sin dudarlo.

overall good value for the cost. Location is about 2 blocks away from 2 metro lines, and I was able to walk almost everywhere from the apartment (I'm an active person). Apartment is on the 5th floor and there is no elevator so be prepared to climb steps carefully as they are a bit slippery. overall great stay!

name: Fredo on the Plateau
summary: My appartment is close to Tri Express, Agave, La Distillerie n°2, Verre Bouteille, l'Oeufrier Mont Royal, Byblos, Le Lab, L'Entre-Pot, Le Bilboquet, Bily Kun, Les Torchés, Taverne Normand, Bleu Caramel, Bagel St-Viateur, l'Entrepôt, La Banquise, and many parks. You will appreciate my place for its beautiful garden, the district, the style of the buildings around... It's perfect for couples, solo travelers and business travelers.
space: The appartment is really well located, in the heart of the Plateau. In the summer, the backyard is really cozy and pleasant to relax. The kitchen has been renovated in july, 2015 and is full equipped. Washing machine and dryer at disposition. The bedroom is huge and have a single bed that can be converted into a double bed. A lot of storage is at your disposition.
description: My appartment is close to Tri Express, Agave, La Distillerie n°2, Verre Bouteille, l'Oeufrier Mont Royal, Byblos, Le Lab, L'Entre-Pot, Le Bilboquet, Bily Kun, Les Torchés, Taverne Normand, Bleu Caramel, Bagel St-Viateur, l'Entrepôt, La Banquise, and many parks. You will appreciate my place for its beautiful garden, the district, the style of the buildings around... It's perfect for couples, solo travelers and business travelers. The appartment is really well located, in the heart of the Plateau. In the summer, the backyard is really cozy and pleasant to relax. The kitchen has been renovated in july, 2015 and is full equipped. Washing machine and dryer at disposition. The bedroom is huge and have a single bed that can be converted into a double bed. A lot of storage is at your disposition. You can have access to the entire apartment, as long as personal space is respected ;-) Don't hesitate to ask me anything you need... useful informations like good restaurants, bars, shops, commoditie
neighborhood_overview: 2 minutes from Laurier street and 10 minutes from Mont-Royal avenue... wonderful neighborhood ambiance. A lot of nice shops and commodities. A lot of green spaces; very close to downtown.
notes: An old grumpy cat and a little cuty lady cat ;-)

host.host_about:
Je suis une étudiante uqamienne de 25 ans très enjouée mais plutôt calme. Les valeurs écologiques sont primordiales dans mon mode de vie! Je suis passionnée de musique et de bonne bouffe. J’ADORE les jeux de société (et je joue à certains jeux vidéos). J’ai pas mal voyagé, j’aime découvrir plein de choses et je suis très curieuse…
Je peux être très extravertie et sociable, mais j'apprécie également mes moments à moi, et je suis de nature indépendante.
Bon séjour!!

I'm a really cheerful - but quiet calm - 25 years old UQAM student. Ecological values ​​occupy a primary part of my lifestyle. I'm passionate about music and good food (yes, I'm a foodie!). I love playing board games (and some video games as well). I have traveled a lot and I'm very curious about nearly everything; I love exchanging new experiences and discovering some new things.
I can be very outgoing and talkative, but I also appreciate "me times", and I am pretty independent. 
Have a good stay!!

Me gustaría practicar mi español también!

reviews.comments: Frederique is friendly and easy to comminucate with. Her apartment is lovely...Nicely decorated and well located. Great coffee maker too! Parking was no problem and her space was located walking distance to many restaurants and attractions.
Very cozy place. Thank you :)
Fred is an wonderful host. Everything was perfect.

Logement très agréable (chambre et reste de l'appartement), très pratique pour un séjour long (je suis resté un mois en toute tranquillité) dans un quartier plein de restaurants et de commerces. Hôte très sympathique et accueillante.

Pictures do not perfectly capture Frédérique's place. I LOVED staying here. The house is warm and cozy. The decor is carefully picked and Frédérique has done a lot to create a Zen and private room for her guests.

I work remotely so it was important to have an quiet environment where I can work and have high speed connection. Her home provided both.

As a host I enjoyed meeting Frédérique. She is easy going, fun to talk to and is as involved as you want her to be. She was a host when I went to Montreal, and friend when I left Montreal.

I highly recommend staying at her place. It is perfect for solo adventures or a couple.

Je n'ai pas beaucoup vu Frédérique, mais elle a été très sympathique, disponible et accomodante chaque fois que j'ai eu besoin de renseignements. Merci :)

Concernant le logement, il est comme sur les photos : très agréable, propre, et parfaitement situé. La chambre est grande et la rue est calme, idéale pour travailler ou se reposer.

En résumé, un très bon séjour !
This is a beautiful home and I'm a great area. Frederique is a great host. Would come back again.
Frédérique's place was easily accessible by public transport and are is nice and quiet.
Amazing stay. Beautiful flat and perfect location. Couldn't have asked for more. Thank you
Frederique is very laid back, the house is nice and we had full access to the kitchen. It is easy to find parking on the street. Very good stay.

It were nice days in this home  even though the rain [ no balcony ]. Jazz and rain - it was Montreal!!! Comfortable bed, enough space, nice cats [ staying on the floor ] I expected more chance to talk with a host.  But we were happy with  Frédérique’s place.

Great character, perfect location for exploring the city. Host left room in kitchen and bath making for a very comfortable stay. Didn't see Frédérique much, but her communication was great and her cats were super friendly.
Comfortable and affordable space in a good location. Frederique was very accommodating and helpful when I asked questions. Plus, if you like cats, her two cats are very friendly and cute.

Frederique's apartment was adorable!  Very clean and stylish. she is a really nice and welcoming host. She answered all our questions and made our staying enjoyable! I would definitely recommend her apartment!

I found the accommodations great for walking/jogging location (near my favorite patisserie,  bagel bakeries,  parks, and circus performances),  and very comfortable, clean,  and cutely decorated.  Although I didn't get to meet Frédérique, she was very attentive and accessible via email, and answered any question I had very quickly.  Not sure when i will be back in Montreal, but when I do go, I shall try to stay there again.
Frédérique's place is lovely- very cute and cosy. Close to public transport, shops and cafes. Really nice neighbourhood and Frédérique is an excellent host!
Extended my stay because I enjoyed the place so much!

I am really lucky to have my first airbnb stay at Frédérique's home. Before my arrivals, she always responded promptly and she was very helpful. I went to Montreal for a conference and it was also my first time to be in Canada. Frédérique's home is very stylish and you can tell that she made a great effort to decorate the place.  The most important thing was that she is very generous to share the nice apartment with her guests. I could access the living room, balcony and the well-equipped kitchen. The oven, washing machine and dryer were new and they were functioning very well. There are also two lovely cats. After a whole day conference, it was really nice to relax with the cats and some nice homemade food and local wine. I also love the brunch place Frédérique showed me. The food was so delicious. I will definitely reserve Frédérique's place if I ever go to Montreal again and I will also recommend this place to my friends who are going to Montreal.

While we didn't get a chance to meet Frédérique, she was communicative throughout our stay and answered questions we had. The apartment is a short walk from the Métro, a grocery store, and several restaurants and cafés. Overall, a great stay.

name: New york Multi-unit building
description: Fordham university is a walking distance away, about six blocks. The botanical garden is 17 minutes by public bus and 25 minutes walking If you like to walk. The bronx zoo is about 20 minutes depending on traffic. The D train is right on the corner and the yankee stadium is 6 stops away and about 15 minutes in an uber. Columbus circle is 12 stops away! The subway is right on the corner. The D train and the B. There is also the 4 train 4 blocks away. And public bus number 12 is less than a block away.  The train will take you in about 15 minutes to the yankee stadium. You can also use an uber even though traffic makes it feel farther! Bronx zoo, botanical garden and fordham university very close!!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Easy going and hard worker!!

reviews.comments:
I was in New York for more than a week, and was supposed to stay at a friend's in the Upper East Side throughout the entire duration of my trip. However, due to unforeseen circumstances, I had to find a place for the weekend - Pablo's Airbnb was one of the few options available, affordable, and accessible to me.

Location: traveling from the Upper East in Manhattan to Fordham in the Bronx was quite the commute, but not entirely too bad. Both the D train and 6 train had stops just 2-3 blocks away.

Accommodations: the listing is in an apartment complex right off the main road, so it's quite busy outside and people can get a little loud (including the neighbor upstairs that likes to play music).

host.host_about:
I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Mark is very helpful n friendly! The location of the accommodation is perfect, close to Soho n central. Not to mention the tram station is just opposite the building n the mtr is nearby!
Really cozy and awesome apartment on a really convenient and authentic location. Easy check-in/check-out with no keys required -> really handy. And my favorite coffee shop now is just 2 mins away :)
Very nice service, welcoming environment, communicative owner.
本次和太太旅行對這個小公寓很滿意,環境舒適,交通便利,門口就有港鐵和叮叮車｡Mark的服務很周到｡唯一的遺憾就是電視無法觀看,可能是遙控器問題｡

I had a very good time at Mark’s studio . The flat is very well located in Hong Kong . Only two subway station to Central . There is also the tram line to discover the island . The area is quiet if you compare to busiest area in HK . It is also a good mix of Chinese culture (restaurants,shops) and trendy western venues ( good eateries,bars). Mark is a great host always answering any request or question I had . Overall a great experience in this city and a great stay .
Quemeneur Philippe
Enjoyed staying at Mark's place. Amazing host!
Very good!
Mark's studio is modern. It is very close to MTR, tram and bus stops. There are lots of nice restaurants and bars close by. He also is good at sending information

When you're not used to Hong Kong, this place is of course small for a relatively high price, but in HK this is not at all unusual. The quality of the place is very high - it is nicely designed, in a great location, well taken care of, and I found it quite comfortable. I loved the feeling of being in the middle of Hong Kong when you step out of the door and the fact that it is a modern apartment but in an older building means that it is comfortable, yet feels very local. The size is really small, but the way the space is used is very clever.

There are multiple units and not all of them seem to have windows. Mine did, with a nice view of opposite flats and Des Voeux Rd.

I would definitely recommend this place.

name: SM8 - Serenity Beach - 2 Bedroom, Dressing Room

You’ll love my place because it is newly refurbished, full of sun light and has fully equipped kitchen as well as dressing room. My place is good for singles, couples, families or for sharing. Due to local legal requirements in Barcelona and Catalonia, we are obliged to sign a rental contract with attached inventory for your stay of more then 32 days.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hello friend - I am a laid back individual who enjoys nature, intellectual stimulation, good music and good food. I wish to one day travel the world, but in the mean time, I am excited to welcome you into my home!

reviews.comments: Thank you so much, Clark - I thoroughly enjoyed my stay! Having made my reservation just a few hours before my arrival, and getting in to town earlier than expected - Clark went out of is way to make sure I had access to his property and made sure everything I needed was in place. Being that it was first time in the New York, Clark made it a point to check in occasionally. The apartment is as seen in the pictures, and is located in one of the best locations in town. I will definitely stay here again if in New York!

Excellent host with great recommendations of restaurants. The apartment is really tidy and clean. It makes me feel like home again.
The location is also great, lots of great restaurant nearby and near the central park!

Clark is an awesome host, considerate and gives great suggestions on restaurants and bars. Hell's Kitchen is a very special part of town, and the apartment is situated in a quiet street with good restaurants and good vibes. Room is lovely with Netflix and Amazon video, also great books. Absolutely above my expectation!

Clark was super-friendly and welcoming. It was really easy to find the address and gain access to the apartment; a seamless experience. The location is great (just a few blocks from time square) and the apartment is cozy and super-clean. I will definitely be staying at Clark's the next time I AirBnB in Manhattan. Great host! Great location! Great apartment!
Very nice apartment.

After a long day of walking and sightseeing, my husband and I were happy to kick off our shoes and relax in Clark's clean and spacious guest room. The bed was extremely comfortable, so we watched a movie on Netflix to warm up before dinner. The apartment is very close to Restaurant Row, so it didn't take us long to find some delicious Thai food. We watched Monday Night Football at a nearby sports bar, so if you are a football fanatic like my husband, have no fear of missing out on your game while on vacation!

The apartment is on the third floor, so if you have trouble climbing stairs this will be an issue for you. As far as we are concerned, our stay at Clark's was perfect. Unfortunately, we didn't cross paths with our host during our stay, but we still felt very welcomed and well taken care of.

Clark is a nice host,he is very careful and patience to solve my question,he's apartment is The transportation is convenient, the room facilities from soup to nuts, caused a lot of convenient for my trip to New York and joy, if Manhattan come again next time, I hope we can rent here
Clean, comfy spot in a central location. Clark was a great host, and even helped me with my bags!  Thanks for the great stay!

Awesome stay at Clark's place! Really clean, comfortable & well-located apartment. Room equipped with wi-fi, a big TV with Netflix, Hulu, etc. Bed was really comfortable as well. Clark was a great host and really flexible with my check-in time. I'd totally book this place again.

Clark's room was exactly how he described it, clean, quiet, spacious and very comfy. Clark was extremely lovely and helpful with tips on where to eat/drink and what to see. Perfect location! close to everything, no need to get cabs we walked everywhere as it was a great way to get to know the area. 
5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ would definitely stay here again :) 
Thanks Clark!

Clark's place was beautiful and clean, it could not have been in a better location! Check in was an absolute breeze. Could not have been any better, would definitely stay with Clark again in a heartbeat.

Excellent accueil de Clark . 
Ils nous attendait à notre arrivée pour nous expliquer les modalités de notre séjour.  
Chambre et appartements  propre , la chambres n'est pas très grande mais suffisement  pour le temps qu'on y reste quand on est à New-York !
Wi-Fi impeccable, tv avec Netflix. ...
Excellente  situation (13 min de time square) et le logement est situé dans une rue calme de Hell's Kitchen. 
Clark met à disposition 1 guide d'infos pour le séjour( restaurants ,bars, lieux touristiques et infos pratiques).
Nous recommanderons avec plaisir le service de Clark .
Very nice, quiets and cozy

Le logement de Clark est super bien situé , près de Time Square. Propre, hyper calme , un lit à tomber: super confortable ainsi que les oreillers !! On a dormi comme des bébés moi et mon amie. Clark est très gentil, discret, adorable! Très disponible, il a prévu des serviettes, savon sur le lit. Il a prévu également une liste des meilleurs restaurants, lieux à voir... !!
Je recommanderai le logement de Clark à mes amis sans hésitation !!Et je retournerai chez lui à New York  sans hésiter non plus. Nous avons passé une super semaine chez Clark.
The listing description is very accurate and Clark is a nice, communicative host. Would recommend this place to everyone looking to explore New York :)

Great location, we did everything pretty much walking. Place was very clean and cozy and Clark was very discrete, but also available at all times. He had a list of places and things to do and was very welcoming. Amazing experience for our first time with AirBnb!!

First of all, let me say that Clark was an excellent host. When he was at home, he made himself almost invisible unless we engaged him in conversation, and he was always helpful and amiable. The apartment was neat and extremely clean. The bedroom was spacious, but the single bathroom was tiny but super clean. All in all, a very good deal for Manhattan.

Clark's apartment is very well located, clean, and the room has a very good size for two guests. The building seems well kept too, it's clean and quiet. For me and my husband it was the perfect place to rest by the end of each of the 5 long days we had in NYC, walking a lot and enjoying this great city. 

Clark is a very polite host, very discreet and available too. 

It's been a great stay and we would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a central and quiet place to stay in Manhattan.

Clark was awesome, super friendly, helpful and allowed us to leave our belongings there a little longer while we explored the city as we only had a backpack. He communicated with us greeted us with a warm welcome. The space was very well kept, very clean and the bed was super comfy. It was off the beaten path from Union Square and the Theatre District, so it was nice to have a little bit more of a quite city. However the space and location were perfect for our visit. I would highly recommend this space and Clark as a host.

Petit appartement  confortable,propre et très bien situé. A Hells kitchen on mange bien et on se sent en sécurité. A 10-15 minutes de Time square à pied,  20-25 de Central park. C'est génial . Nous sommes des Québécois et nous avons stationné la voiture à Hoboken (NJ) et avons pris un ferry jusqu'à la 39 th street et avons marché jusqu'à l'appartement. Clark est un hôte gentil et très discret. Il peut vous renseigner sur Manhattan. Notre première expérience avec Air bnb est vraiment réussie. .
Great stay!

My friend and I booked Clark's place for a four-day trip, and it was a wonderful stay. The place is clean, warm and has everything we need. It's also very close to restaurants and Times Square is easily walkable. Overall, we had no problems!

Clark is perfect to communicate and gave us useful info to make our trip perfect.
Location of the appartment is excellent and close to the centre.
To be recommanded, without any doubt.
Clark把房间收拾的非常干净,虽然是共享卫生间,但根本没有遇到过,所以依然是非常私密的空间,非常推荐在纽约选择Clark的住宿｡

The room is headed to the back in a comparably quiet area between 10th and 11th Ave. So not too much noise for a good nights sleep. Especially 9th Avenue offers a wide variety of different restaurants for all budgets. Time Square is only a 10 minute walk away. Location is great to get everywhere. The room has a huge TV and a really comfortable bed as well as enough space in a small closet. Also there's room to leave the suitcase. Very small bathroom but sufficient for me. But two persons do not fit into the bathroom. Check in and out was very easy. Clark helped with all questions that might come up and has a lot of information for visitors in the room. I definately would stay there again.

Clark was a very friendly, hospitable and in all communication very reliable host; the apartment was very well-kept and fit with the description. The guest's room is oriented to the back of the building and very quiet, this plus the walking distance to Javits Center made it a very good choice for my business trip to New York. Will certainly try and stay here again on a future stay in NY. Thanks, Clark, for this time!

Very good location, very central, Times Squares no more than 5 minutes walking... Small apartment but very convenient and Clark was a great and helpful host.
Very good place to discover NY.
I would highly recommended Clark's place. Easy transport, very good location. The bed was very confortable. Thank you we would definitely stay again!!

L'appartement de Clark est très bien situé et calme. Clark est très discret et très prévenant. Il avait préparé les bons plans à faire à NY ainsi que de bonnes adresses pour aller au restaurant ou écouter de la musique. Super endroit à recommander.
Clark foi um ótimo anfitrião, nos ajudou em tudo, a casa dele é excelente, super recomendo!

The location is perfect and the bed is super comfortable. Clark is helpful and quick to respond to any questions you may have. I would definitely recommend to any tourist planning a visit to New York.
Clark, is a perfect host and you fell like at your own house , the location is perfect and, I will sure recommend Clark to all my friends, thank you Clark..Grazie
Nice room in quiet area off main road - super nice host too. Thanks

We (couple) stayed 6 nights at Clark's apartment and it was exactly how he described it here on airbnb. 
Its small, but you have everything you need (and also more e.g. iron, slippers, TV, chiller, ...). We also got 3 towels and 2 keys each. 
He was super friendly/cool as well as flexible for check-in and out (because we arrived 12 hours later as expected). 
The bathroom was clean, the water pressure ok and we had always warm/hot water. 

The location is really good if you want to explore Manhattan, because you're just 10min by foot away from the Times Square and just 5min from the Intrepid Air & Space museum (the Highline start point is also just 10min away). 

So bottom line - we would definitely stay again at Clark's apartment.

Maravilloso. Pasamos 9 noches en casa de Clark. Lugar limpio, pequeño y acogedor! La cama es muy cómoda, y teníamos todo lo que necesitábamos y mas dentro del departamento. Accesible a todo lo que queríamos ver, en todo momento nos sentimos en nuestro hogar! Clark siempre muy atento en lo que necesitáramos. No nos vimos mucho, ya que pasábamos todo el día afuera recorriendo, pero debo decir que sin dudas estoy esperando mis próximas vacaciones en  NYC para volver a hospedarnos con el!

Clark's place was perfect!  Excellent location with numerous great restaurants close by.  Easy access to the subway.  Apartment was very clean & cute.  He was very friendly & accommodating.  Shower had plenty of hot water & great water pressure.  It was a great quiet area for sleeping & the bed is incredibly comfortable!  We'd definitely stay again.

숙소는 깨끗하고 위치도 아주 좋습니다. 주변에 유명한 식당들이 많은 곳이라서 점심 저녁 걱정도 없었어요~ Clark는 조용하고 배려 깊은 호스트여서 아주 편하게 지낼 수 있었습니다. 한국에서 뉴욕 들어가는 비행기들이 보통 오전에 떨어져서 체크인 하기 전까지 짐 들고 어디 가 있어야 하나 걱정했는데 Clark이 먼저 물어봐주고 키를 락커에 맡겨 주어서 공항에서 바로 숙소로 가서 쉴수 있었습니다. 강추합니다~

L'appartement de Clark est très bien situé . Clark est très aimable et discret . 
Nous avons apprécié notre séjour.

L'appartement de Clark est conforme à la description. Très calme et bien situé dans le quartier des restaurants. Il est à 4 rues du métro et bus. Times square est proche (10 mn) et central park(20 mn). Clark est très discret et répond rapidement à toutes demandes. 
Dans l'appartement tout est prévu pour réussir son séjour avec plusieurs leaflets d'activité et un mémo avec les commerces et restaurants aux alentours. 
En arrivant, il y avait des fruits et quelques denrées dans le frigo.

Muy buen anfitrion. El departamento estaba muy limpio y ordenado. Clark fue muy respetuoso de nuestra privacidad y a la vez atento a nuestras necesidades. El departamento esta en un segundo piso por escalera pero Clark estaba antento para ayudarnos con las maletas. Nos dejo un vino de cortrsia. Volveria sin dudarlo

Me and my girlfriend had a great time at Clarke's apartment.  The description is completely correct and we would recommend anyone to go there.  The place was neat and Clarke is friendly and helpful.  Really perfect location as well,  just a few blocks from Times Square.

Clark is a very responsive and gracious host. He would respond within a couple minutes of messaging him and made the check in and check out process super easy. His place was in a very convenient location in Manhattan, being about a 10 minute walk from Times Square and  other attractions. He gave us some bagels and orange juice in the fridge which was really nice of him.

Would definitely recommend this place to others.

Elegí el departamento de Clark para alojarme con mi pareja en nuestro primer viaje a NY principalmente porque me daba confianza que fuera un superhost y porque los comentarios decían que era un lugar tranquilo para descansar después de los días agotadores de caminata. Él fue un excelente host pero la habitación es algo ruidosa. Hay un motor exterior que funciona las 24hs y yo soy particularmente sensible a los ruidos. También se escuchaban pisadas del departamento superior pero yo no estoy acostumbrada a vivir en edificio tampoco. El wifi por las mañanas no funcionaba muy bien, tardaba en conectar, pero fuera de eso, el departamento es cómodo, pequeño pero perfectamente equipado. Tenés toallas, shampoo y acondicionador, heladera, microondas y todos los utensilios de cocina necesarios, hasta hay varios pares de ojotas de diferentes tamaños para que te puedas duchar. El agua caliente funcionó perfecto y la habitación es muy espaciosa y cómoda.
Clark was great. Always communicating at the right time, with the information I needed. He was very accommodating and his place is perfectly located for new visitors.
Great stay! Clark is incredibly friendly and helpful! His apartment is charming and super clean!

This apartment was in a great location.  It was in a quiet neighborhood yet close to restaurants and other nightlife.  It was a good size for us and had a full kitchen, 1BR, 1 BA, and air conditioning in the BR.  You can tell Clark takes pride in his apartment as it was nice and clean.  He was a great host as well and easy to contact.  I would highly recommend staying here.

Clark's place was conveniently located in Hell's Kitchen and near Times Square but away from the madness and in great neighborhood feel. Clark was wonderful to leave a very detailed recommendation list of restaurants and sights to see. Also he was very quick to respond to any question or concern I had. He took the time to make sure we were comfortable and went out of his way to move the bedroom furniture away from AC unit while we were out.
I would recommend Clarks place to have a wonderful local experience in NYC. We will be back!
Responsive and responsible host, clean apartment, and great location.
Clarks place was fantastic for my stay in NYC! He was super easy to communicate with and the apartment was clean and very cute! Highly recommended!
We loved this apt! Convenient, quite and centrally located. Accurate information and Clark, our host, was very helpful and accommodating.
Clark's place is a fantastic base for exploring Manhattan. The apartment had everything we needed and we loved the aesthetic.
A little small but it's right next to everything you need in NYC. So it's well worth it.
Clark was awesome!! Definitely the best place we could have stayed, amazing location and Clark was an awesome host!!
Très bien situé, très propre
I recommend Clark's place. He is very good host, always available.
Cozy and tidy place 15min walk from Times Square. Well equipped and clean. Clark is a great host very kind and helpfull. Recommended!

Cool apartment, excellent location. Great place to base yourself if holidaying in NYC. Clark is helpful and friendly. Hells Kitchen is a welcoming neighborhood. Heap of great restaurants, short walk to time square & central park. We're sad to have left.

Had a great stay at Clark's NYC apartment. Surprised at how quiet it was inside, and how close it was to all the midtown nightlife. Clark made check in and check out very easy and was available quickly over message. Don't miss him if you Airbnb in NYC.
Clark est à l'écoute de nos besoin, toujours disponible en cas de besoin. Appartement propre avec tout le nécessaire, et lit très confortable après une gros journée new-yorkaise.

Clark is a wonderful host. Very thoughtful and helpful. He was available whenever we needed him through phone. He was kind enough to assist us when checking in with our bags. The location was nice though one needed to walk a bit to get the right kind of eating places But that's what is NY for. Walking around. The apartment was a bit smaller than we expected but was a well kept and adequately furnished. It was a quite locality which greatly helped. I would look up for his place next time when I visit NY.
The apartment was very comfortable and close to all the main sights with easy access to public transport. Clark was friendly and very accommodating.

The flat is very cosy and clean . The location is very central, 2 min walk distance from time square from where you can get subway to all main locations.
We do recommend this flat and will come back for our next trip to NYC
Great location. Clark was very thorough with all instructions making the transition a very simple one.

Realmente Clark y su novia nos atendieron de excelente manera. 
El departamento está muy bien equipado, y todo en perfecto estado y funcionamiento.
En nuestro caso eramos dos personas y estuvimos más que cómodos.
Nos dejaron toallas, jabón, Shampoos varios y hasta un secador de pelo.
Volvería sin pensarlo.
Solo para tener en cuenta, que en nuestro caso no fue inconveniente, el departamento se encuentra en un segundo piso por escalera. Se encuentra muy cerca del museo Naval y Aeroespacial de la armada y a 2 cuadras del inicio de la zona de restaurantes.

Gracias Clark por todo.

Saludos,

Matías.
Ευχαριστούμε πολύ Clark!!!

This apartment is very clean and tidy, extremely well located and Clark a polite host.  You need to be honest with yourself about whether you can carry, not drag, your bag up two flights of narrow stairs.  If you can, this accomodation is fantastic with an extra bonus being that there is fantastic espresso coffee around the corner at Fission Espresso.

Clark's apartment was so perfect for our stay in NYC. We were close to everything we could possible need, it was clean, safe and just fabulous. Check in was easy, communication was even better! I would highly recommend for anyone staying in NYC.  I will be back!

Good location, close to restaurant row, Times Square, Subways, Rockefeller center. Clark’s place has everything guests would need, and it’s located in a quiet building. Clark was good at responding to questions we had, and his girl friend was so kind— they loaned me extra coats and gloves when NYC got it’s first cold snap during Veteran’s day weekend! 
I would highly recommend his place for NYC visitors!

First timers in NY and we were glad we chose Clark's apartment for our 4 night stay. It's walking distance to Times Square, popular restaurants and bars. Although it's close in proximity to the nightlife and tourist attractions, Clark's apartment is nicely tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the city. We didn't have any problems with noise or concern for our safety especially when we would arrive late in the evening. Clark was a very accommodating host and attentive to all of our needs. Thank you so much for making our first stay in NY memorable =)
Awesome apartment in a convenient area. Super clean and a lot of cool details. Excellent communication with Clark, 100% recommended.
Perfect house and location .. we would definitely stay back again !

Clark's apartment was amazing!!  I would stay there again in a heartbeat.  He was a "hands off" host, which I prefer, but did message me to check in to make sure we got the keys okay and again making sure we had everything we needed, which I appreciate.  The location is perfect and close to everything in Hells Kitchen. The apartment is clean and is stocked with everything you need, too. Even a bar of soap!  I highly recommend Clark's apartment.
Awesome place to stay. Everything you'll need. Easy ten minute walk to Time's Square. Surprisingly really quiet too.

Great location very quiet 
Bathroom is tiny
Overall nice spot!
Great location and everything we were looking for in an apartment. Very comfortable bed

Perfect location. Just right for two people. Clark’s place is close to everything, especially the theater district and lots of great restaurants. He was very flexible and communicated well. Made our trip to NYC extra special.
Good location, 15 min. from subway. 5 min to good supermarket. Quiet neighbourhoud. Clark respinses quickly.

We really liked the apartment's location and equipment in it. The bed was very comfortable, but a little bit short for us (we size 1.80m & 1.90m).
We appreciated a lot as well Clark's responsiveness, very prompt replies and clear instructions.
Nevertheless we found that the apartment was noisy (people going down and up stairs) so we had to sleep with earplugs. But this depends on people, we live in the country and used to silence with no neighbors.
Clark’s place was comfortable and in a nice locality very close to near by bars and restaurants. We enjoyed the stay!!

We had a good stay at Clark's apartment, which is closely located to Time Square, Broadway and local transport. The apartment was nice a quiet in a very busy city which was excellent. The bed was comfy and it was great having the TV with Netflix/Hulu etc when we were chilling out in the morning/evening.

The issue we had while there was a small shower room leak from the apartment above. Also the gas was off for the entire building so we weren't able to cook our own food, this wasn't a big deal as you could order in and there were a lot of local places to eat - just maybe made it a little more expensive. Overall its the fact that the building is old and so these problems are more likely in an old apartment.

Clark was brilliant through the stay, we were always able to contact him day or night and he was attentive, tried to fix the leak as soon as it occurred and let us keep our bags at the property over the checkout time (as we had a late flight back to the UK). 

Overall good for the price.
Fantastic place! Great location. Clean! Clark was so quick with responses!
It’s really a nice place to stay well situated

The location was close to the Metro/Bus stops as well as other restaurants and groceries. The apartment was as advertised; with complete amenities/toiletries and a super comfortable bed. 

Clark was super helpful with check-in and with checking up to see if we needed any assistance. The apartment is on the 3rd floor with no elevator so if you have any heavy luggage, take note. 

Apart from that, everything was great. Would recommend!
Communication with Clark was so easy and quick. The apartment was so homey didn’t feel like I was in some hotel. The area wasn’t noisy. Would definitely recommend or stay again myself.
Clark is a wonderful host! He was super flexible for both check in and check out and made sure we had everything we needed.

This place was more than we could have asked for! It was spotless, spacious, and we'll stocked! We can't wait to come back again. The bed was super comfortable, the location was great, and the apartment was stop me
Clarks's place was warm, spacious, well stocked and close to transit options. The neighborhood and city guides were helpful. Recommend!

l’appartement de clark est super, très propre, très pratique, et très cocooning!
pas loin de times square, idéal pour visiter new york

Clark's place was perfect. A nice sized apartment for the area, and location wise, could not be better. Short walking distance from everything, but far enough away, that you return to a quite night of sleep. This apartment provided a quiet refuge, after I was done working at the Javits, during my stay.

Appartement tres bien placé pour Broadway, les restaurants , les piers 83 à 92 pour l'Armory show, le porte avion Intreprid et la circle line ( bateaux).
Une tête de taxi au bout de la rue.
Appartement très très calme. Aucune vue et pas de soleil car au deuxieme étage.

Clark's apartment was great. Clean and with a comfortable bed. There was all we needed and location was good, central but in a quiet street with not much noise. Clark was a good host and with flexible times for check in and check out. We are very happy with our stay there.
Staying in Clarks place was very nice! The place is super cozy and in a great location, close to everything. But the best part was Clarks thoughtfulness and hospitality... Would highly recommend!
Clark was super hospitable, from the moment we checked in, to when we checked out. Keeping in touch throughout our stay, and making sure we had everything we needed.

What I loved about this place was that it was in a quiet neighbourhood even though it was 2 blocks away from Times Square! I love how easy and convenient the location was. I ended up walking to Times Square and Central Park and took an uber everywhere else. I will stay at Hell's Kitchen next time!

L'appartement de Clark est très mignon,propre et pratique, il y a tout ce qu'il faut! La localisation est top et surtout très calme le soir. Le seul «défaut» est l'éloignement avec le métro(15minutes) mais sinon tout était parfait et rapport qualité/prix imbattable pour New-York!!

Appartement conforme à la description: très propre, très calme et possédant l'équipement nécessaire pour le séjour. Parfaitement situé dans la ville il permet de découvrir Manhattan dans d'excellentes conditions. De nombreux commerces à proximité. Le fait que Clark parle français nous a aidé. La disponibilité de Clark et son attention sont précieuse.
Clark . was most attentive, charming and willing to be helpful in every way.  He helped to make our return to NYC after an absence of over 30 years easy and agreeable
Superbe emplacement pratique et central
Located perfectly to the Broadway scene.  Clark was more than helpful he was an excellent host. Apartment was thoughtfully appointed

Logement pas très loin de tous les sites essentiels à voir. Avons fait NEW YORK à pied dans problème. ce logement possède une grande chambre avec un salon très pratique pour ceux qui ne peuvent pas dormir.

Clarks appartement is de perfecte plek om te verblijven in New York. De straat is rustig, maar toch zit je midden in Manhattan. Het is van alle gemakken voorzien, met onder andere een heerlijk bed. Clark is zeer gastvrij en helpt je met handige tips op weg naar een top verblijf in deze fijne stad. Een absolute aanrader!!!
Clark is an awesome host. He makes him self very available to assist you in any way. This apartment is also in a great location. I would definitely stay again :)!

Me and my wife chose to get an Airbnb to save a little money during our memorial day trip to NYC. Happily, we didn't only save money, but got a great value as well. The apartment was cozy and stylish and the Hells Kitchen neighborhood has plenty to offer, but a quiet more quiet than the heavily touristed areas nearby. These qualities made this Airbnb a perfect place to two people to recharge in the middle of many busy activities in the city.

I also want to add that our host, Clark was a pleasure to work with. He let us check in a little early so we didn't have to worry about storing our bags anywhere. He was friendly and accommodating, giving us some good local tips. Also, he was prompt in answering texts from before our arrival through after checking out.
excelente espacio para descansar. Clark fabuloso.
Second time staying here and another great experience:)!
great place - great host! Thanks Clark
This is such a great flat! The location is awesome and it is very clean!

Excellent, central location for exploring NYC especially for attending Broadway theatre and restaurants. In walking distance of Restaurant row, The Intrepid, and theatres. The apartment is small but functional. There are three narrow flights of stairs so not for those with mobility issues.
Great host and very good location. I recommend ;)
Had a great stay at Clark’s place. Apartment is sparkling clean, neat and comfortable and Clark is great with prompt communication.

Stop looking and stay here! Clark went out of his way to make my daughters and I very comfortable on our recent trip to the city.  His apartment has comfy beds, clean linens, and plenty of amenities to make our stay restful after a day packed of sight seeing. Things to note: Great location in a quiet neighborhood, short walk to restaurants, Times Square, theatre district, and subway stations. Also, Clark gave us excellent recommendations for restaurants and things to do. His apartment is on the second floor, so a little bit of climbing is required. We would definitely stay again!!

Great location!  Very convenient to get around.  The apartment is small but perfect for two and doable for three.  Has everything one needs and more.  Very comfortable home.  One of the cleanest AirBnB we have been to.  Still has the charm old NY building but has been stylishly updated.  Definitely enjoyed our stay.  Clark was a great host.  Responds very quickly and met us on check-in.

Perfect location, love the way this place has been furnished and decorated. The neighborhood is full of cool places. There’s also a CitiBike station around the corner. Clark is the perfect host: really eager to make your stay a pleasant experience.

Clark was the epitome of gracious, kind, and hospitable.

His place was in pristine condition and immaculately clean. The photos were well-representative of just how delightful and charming a space it actually is.

The location of the apartment couldn’t have been more ideal to accolade my trip itinerary. 

I would make a reservation to stay again in a heartbeat.

The communication and attention to my level of comfort was impeccable.

Clark has an eternal fan in me regarding his hosting skills and I’m immeasurably grateful to him for opening his home to me for my unforgettable vacation.
A great location and a fantastic hospitality from Clark!
This is a great apartment in a great area, close to all attractions and public transportation.

Safe, clean, quiet and very conveniently located. We went to most places on foot. Not too far from Michael Dell's $100M condo - you know it's great value staying around this region :-). Clark has been super responsive and easy on check-in & checkout. Provided many excellent tips too! Great experience!

Fantastic stay! Clark is a great host. He responds quickly and is efficient and thoughtful. Sends you info on random events happening nearby. It’s great! Room itself has aircon to make summer heat bearable. Didn’t use kitchen apart from cereals, but utensils stocked. Fridge and freezer there. 15 minute walk to times sq. Great 5 day stay. Thanks Clark. Would come here again easy!

Nous avons passé un super séjour à New York dans l'appartement de Clark. Clark est très attentionné. Nous avons apprécié son accueil, sa très bonne communication, sa gentillesse et ses bons conseils. L'appartement est super, bien équipé, propre et le lit est excellent. Il est conforme à la description.
L'appartement est au calme, il est bien placé proche des activités de Manhattan. 
Alfred
A great apartment and a great helpful host!
The apartment was great, and Clark made our stay a breeze. Highly recommended!
Very nice compact NYC apartment. Conveniently located to the river, The Intrepid, and with groceries and restaurants nearby. Quiet street with no extraneous noise.

Clark’s place was much larger then we expected considering this is NYC so this was a great surprise. 
Excellent location and Clark is easy to deal with.
Great location, perfect apartment with the most comfy bed ever! Clark is a great host, very helpful with loads of useful info provided. Would definately recommend.

Apartamento simples e bem localizado. Fica em um prédio antigo perto da times Square (~10min).
É um espaço pequeno, mas ok para NY.
Clark has a very nice place, very conveniently located if you would like to be on the west side.  We totally enjoyed our stay.  Thanks Clark

Nuestra estancia fue perfecta, Clark siempre tuvo muy buena predisposición a toda consulta o ayuda que solicitamos. Super recomendable el piso, limpio, buen ubicado, tranquilo, super equipado. En fin altamente recomendable!

Clark's place is in a great location for any business or leisure visitor looking for a quiet and well equipped apartment. The check-in was super easy, I was met outside the apartment and shown around before being handed the keys and left to enjoy my new home from home.

Grocery stores, restaurants and many of the sights are within easy walking distance but the apartment is still quiet and peaceful at night. I'd thoroughly recommend it.

Great apartment, excellent location, everything as is showed in pictures!
Clark is super kind, and very helpful!

What a perfect location! You can walk to all the main sites from this Midtown address, and there's good transport links to places beyond. Clark was really helpful, and couldn't have done more. This apartment may be small but it's way better than staying in a hotel.

Clark’s place is phenomenal! Located within walking distance to everything. We were at the Lyric Theater in ~10 minutes for Harry Potter & able to come back between adventures to rest. Lovely bnb exactly as pictured!

Clark's place was great for a quick trip to the city! My sister and I were in town to see a few Broadway shows, so the location was perfect - pretty much a 12-20 minute walk to anywhere we needed to be. There are a lot of great restaurants nearby, and we had an awesome meal our first night thanks to the list of suggestions Clark left in the apartment! We had a small hiccup at check-in, but it was resolved within a few minutes, and we were able to get our keys. The apartment was spacious, clean, and had everything we needed. Most importantly, we felt very safe there and walking in the area. The only things to be aware of - the two flights of stairs up to the apartment are a little slanted and feel a bit like a fun house, so keep that in mind if you have issues with stairs. There are also very hot pipes running in the apartment that don't have any warning stickers, so they could easily burn a child or someone that might accidentally touch them. Not really a negative, just something to keep in mind if you're traveling with little ones! Overall, Clark's place was perfect for our needs, and I would definitely stay there again.
Good spot close to Times Square.

The location of Clark's apartment cannot be beaten. Walking distance to some of the most well known New York sites. Clark is very quick to respond to queries and was kind enough to allow us to drop our baggage before the check in time.

This was our first stay in New York, and we spent a long time looking at options on airbnb. In the end, we went with this place for the price / location.

It’s about a 5 minutes walk from Times Square, and then you’re really in the middle of everything. 

The place is more or less what we expected, and I think the photos are accurate. It’s not super luxury (where in New York is for under $1000s), but for the price/value I don’t think we could have beaten it.

Clark was really nice the whole time and so helpful. I’d definitely stay again if we came back.

We spent a lovely 5 days in this apartment it is ideally located no more than 10-15 mins from all the major sites plus good local jazz bars on doorstep. the apartment is so clean and warm with lots of home from home comforts we would definitely stay again.
