Apartment was cute and wonderful. Would definitely stay their again.-
The apartment is small like almost all apartments in New York but it was comfortable and Clark was a good host.
Great place to stay at! Close to Times Square and Hell’s Kitchen. Answered texts fast and made sure someone was there to greet me.

Beautifully renovated apartment in a 2nd floor of a walk-up building. We stayed for 2 weeks and the house had everything we needed and was spotlessly clean. Communication with the host was easy.

Only aspect to mention is that the heating pipes are in all rooms and are very hot. Travelers with kids must be cautious

Clark's place was very nice and is in an excellent location. We were able to walk easily to Times Square, many restaurants, and multiple different subway lines. Clark was a great host and responds to messages very promptly. Overall, we had a great experience!

My stay was beyond amazing ! Clark’s place is the perfect place for your stay in NYC . It’s literally right near the heart of Time Square and all kinds of amazing places. This is will forever be my go-to home for when I take trips to NYC. The place looks exactly as described and is super cozy. Bathroom and Kitchen has all the condiments and appliances as needed. The second night of my stay I accidentally blew the fuse of my room and felt so bad for bothering them so late. Clark kindly sent someone right away to help me with no problems . Anything I needed he quickly responded right away and even has an extra person to contact in case you need something. You’re crazy if you don’t choose Clark’s home for your NYC stay. Perfect location, great assistance , clean place and you can’t beat the price. ! Again thank you . I look forward to staying again sometime in the near future.
Clark’s place is great. A perfect location for restaurant row and theatre land, both within easy walking distance.

Clark’s place is in a great location, walking distance from Broadway shows, Hell’s Kitchen and boat tours to the Statue of Liberty. The place itself is a good size and was clean with good cooking facilities.
Apartment near time square, its in perfect location to travel. The apartment was really nice to stay and Im so glad that he was so kind that answered any time i asked questions
Great spot in NYC!
Excellent host - Clark was terrific with very quick replies to questions and was very kind. The apartment is  cute, and everything was very clean and cozy. Would recommend!

Clark was an excellent communicator and made the booking/check-in experience seamless. The apartment was spacious for a single guest, very clean, in a nice central location, and delightfully warm in the New York winter. Would recommend!
Solid spot. very clean and close walk to times square. perfect for 1-2 people

name: Private Apartment between the ocean and mountains
summary: Newly renovated, open and airy, 900 sq foot, fully private apartment, adjoining our two story home. Open beam ceiling, kitchen, living & dining room open floor plan, and one private bedroom. A private garden lanai to BBQ or watch the skydivers. You will have your own private entrances to the apartment, and beach access at the end of our cul de sac. We are located in Mokuleia, off the beaten path, on the west end of the North Shore of Oʻahu, 15 minute drive to the North Shore and Waimea Bay.
space: Kitchen: Full Size Refrigerator Keurig coffee machine Traditional coffee maker Blender Microwave Filtered Water Dispenser Two Plate Burner on counter Toaster Toaster Oven Fully equipped with Dishes & cookware Granite Tile Counter Tops Bathroom: Newly tiled shower Fresh towels Shampoo & Soap Bedroom: New Queen Bed High quality linens Portable Air Conditioner Ceiling Fan Closet Dresser Luggage Stand Living Room: Two couches Recliner 48 “ Flat Screen TV with Cable Wifi Dining Room Table & Chairs Ceiling Fans 2 private entrances  Opens onto a private deck with seating, BBQ grill, and tropical garden Romantic Deck Private tropical garden and yard BBQ Grill Deck Furniture with umbrella Beach towels Beach chairs Ping Pong Table in covered garage Parking space reserved in front of the house Washing machine and dryer are shared and available to guests during their stay. Hawaii State Taxes have already been added to nightly price Applicable taxes include Hawaii G.E.T 9.25% and Hawaii Transient A
description: Newly renovated, open and airy, 900 sq foot, fully private apartment, adjoining our two story home. Open beam ceiling, kitchen, living & dining room open floor plan, and one private bedroom. A private garden lanai to BBQ or watch the skydivers. You will have your own private entrances to the apartment, and beach access at the end of our cul de sac. We are located in Mokuleia, off the beaten path, on the west end of the North Shore of Oʻahu, 15 minute drive to the North Shore and Waimea Bay. Kitchen: Full Size Refrigerator Keurig coffee machine Traditional coffee maker Blender Microwave Filtered Water Dispenser Two Plate Burner on counter Toaster Toaster Oven Fully equipped with Dishes & cookware Granite Tile Counter Tops Bathroom: Newly tiled shower Fresh towels Shampoo & Soap Bedroom: New Queen Bed High quality linens Portable Air Conditioner Ceiling Fan Closet Dresser Luggage Stand Living Room: Two couches Recliner 48 “ Flat Screen TV with Cable Wifi Dining Room Table & Chairs Ceilin
neighborhood_overview: We live at the entrance to a cul de sac in a  peaceful oceanside residential neighborhood with  private beach access 100 steps from our house, shared only with our neighbors.   Our neighbors are friendly and we all know one another. Our home is along the main road, at the entrance to the cul de sac. There is road noise from cars driving by, something to consider if you are sensitive to neighborhood noises.
notes: Mokuleia is on the more remote end of the North Shore and offers something for everyone:  hiking to Kaʻena Natural Area Reserve home to the native endangered Hawaiian Monk Seal which you can observe (from a distance!), Laysan Albatross, tide pools, rare native coastal plants, and a breathtaking view to the other side of the island at the end of the hike. Kealia Hike offers a switch back ascent, with breath taking views of the entire coastline. Picnic at a Sunday Polo Match during polo season (April 10-Sept 4). The Mokuleia Polo Field is footsteps from the studio. Dillingham Airfield,  1 minute down the road, offers adrenalin junkies skydiving with breath taking views of Mt. Kaʻala and the coast. Or just relax on any of the Mokuleia beaches nearby.
transit: We highly recommend a car as we are 10 minutes from Haleiwa Town the main hub where you will find a variety of restaurants, food trucks, boutiques, art galleries, and a grocery store.  Waialua a smaller community five minutes away, has a local coffee shop, pizzeria, small grocery store with lots of fresh produce, Saturday Farmers' Market at the Old Sugar Mill, and the Waialua Bandstand were you can enjoy a Sunday performance the first Sunday of each month by local and national performers. There is also a post office and gas station. The airport is 45 minutes away.
access: Your will have your own private studio that is attached but separate to our house, there are no shared ceilings/floors. You will have a private lanai, and yard. There is a shared walkway that leads to your own private entrances to the studio. You will have access to the studio through a lock box. We enjoy meeting our guests if the opportunity arises, and I am always available by text.
interaction: My husband and I are both born and raised on Oʻahu's north shore, and love to travel.  We have just sent our last child off to college! While my husband and I live on the property, we both work full time and respect your privacy. We are friendly and available to answer questions, and enjoy meeting new people. We love sharing suggestions for ways to enjoy Oʻahu and the North Shore, and aim to make your stay comfortable and provide the information you need to enjoy your time. We are proud to call this special place home and look forward to sharing it with others.
house_rules: By booking this property you agree to the following LEASE AGREEMENT : This Lease Agreement (the “Agreement") is made by and between Airbnb host (“Homeowner") and (“Guest") as of the date last set forth on the agreement made via Airbnb. The parties hereby agree as follows: 1. Property. The property address will be disclosed at time of booking. 2. Rental Party. The maximum number of guests is limited to 2 persons. Additional guests staying the night beyond the agreed upon number is not allowed.  3. Term of the Lease. The lease begins at 3:00 p.m. on (the “Check-in Date") and ends at 11:00 a.m. on (the “Check-out Date"). No refunds are issued for late check-in or early departure. 4. Rental Rate and Fees. As listed in the Airbnb reservation system and subject to change. Refer to the official reservation for details. 5. Security Deposit. The Security Deposit is required to protect Homeowner from loss or damage to the Property, including the house, its furniture and other contents located on

host.host_about:
My husband and I are both born and raised on Oʻahuʻs north shore, and love to travel.  We have just sent our last child off to college! While my husband and I live on the property, we both work full time and respect your privacy.

We are friendly and available to answer questions, we love sharing suggestions for ways to enjoy Oʻahu and the North Shore, and aim to make your stay comfortable and provide the information you need to enjoy your time. We are proud to call this special place home and look forward to sharing it with others.

reviews.comments: We had such a lovely stay at Kelly's place and could not have asked for cleaner, or more comfortable accommodation for our stay on the beautiful north shore. The generous space is completely private and fully equipped with everything you will need. The kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and lounge are all spacious and Kelly was excellent at giving directions and informations and made us feel very welcome with lovely finishing touches! The apartment is brand new. Everything is finished to a high standard and extremely tidy and comfortable. The outdoor deck was a lovely space to relax and eat dinner and the private beach at the end of the street is beyond perfect... This was our final air bnb stop after 3 months of travels and one of the best by far. Navigating the area is simple (we did rent a car in Honolulu) and this is the best spot to explore the island from. Stunning local beaches and eateries - you will just love this place.

The pictures actually do not do this place justice.  The studio was much larger, more modern, and cleaner than I anticipated.  The owners provided a fabulous folder with information, suggestions about things to do, and a fresh pineapple!  This studio was wonderful!
The neighborhood is beautiful and the house is perfect for a relaxing vacation. Kelly provided us with everything we needed to enjoy the nearby beach and town. Mahalo!

Kelly is an awesome host very thorough informative and available. Provides you with all the basics you bring the rest. Beach towels and snorkeling gear the whole shebang. The location is very private with a short drive to a ton of cute shops and beaches. Loved our stay will definitely be back.
The house was absolutely fantastic! Everything was there that we needed, House is literally footsteps from the beach, my girlfriend and I love everything about it. Hosts were very helpful and nice.

Kelly is absolutely amazing! The home was exactly as it was pictured! Kelly thought of everything you may have forgotten, like Q-tips! The bed is comfortable and the living room is huge! Kelly left a binder for us with local restaurants, attractions, and grocery stores, which was really helpful. We loved that there was a grill! We were able to go food shopping and cook our own meals! We will definitely be staying here again!

We had a great stay at Kelly's place. The house has everything one needs. The private beach is a huge plus but you definitely need a rental car to get arround. The only complaint we have is about the bed, it's rather small and uncomfortable which I guess is subjective. Thank you Kelly for making the last part of our trip great!

Kelly was a great host! The studio was beautiful and had everything we needed for our stay (cooler, beach chairs, snorkel gear etc). Having the beach at the end of the street was also a huge bonus! The studio was very spacious and very clean. There was always a timely response from Kelly and upon arrival great suggestions for things to do and restaurants to try, very helpful!

Thank you Kelly - we will definitely be back to the North Shore!

Perfect little place for a getaway! It is far away enough from the tourists over at Haleiwa, but only a 15 minute drive away! Beautifully furnished home that is right next to a beautiful beach! Also loved how Kelly provides beach necessities, such as chairs, towels, etc. Couldn't have asked for a better spot!

This place is perfect!

If you want to see the cool side of this Island, you're on the perfect location!

It's private, clean, well equiped,... 

We enjoyed it 100%!

Kelly's place is beautiful, spacious and very clean. It has everything one needs. We appreciated the books on local plants and birds/fish, the well equipped kitchen & BBQ and the beach towels, chairs and snorkeling equipment. You do need your own car to get there and if you want to explore the area or go to stores and restaurants. Kelly is the best host! she was very responsive, offered suggestions on local attractions etc. She made us feel very welcome.
Great place to stay! Perfect location and very quiet. Nice get away from Honolulu.

Kelly's place is just as pictured and very well designed and furnished. Lots of space to spread out, both inside and out. Nice to have a large frig and counterspace in the kitchen. Kelly was great to work with, very responsive as a host and very clear with information and directions. We had a great stay!

Absolutely enjoyed our stay here. The Airbnb is located at the corner of a quite nice family neighborhood and a block away from a small beach with soft sand and many sea turtles. Such a beautiful place to escape to the country from the city. We would definitely stay here again! 

ALOHA Kelly!

My husband and i had a FANTASTIC time at Kelly's studio in Mokuleia. The photos do not do it justice. It was spotless and had everything we needed. The location was exactly what we were looking for; secluded, almost private feeling beach, but not a far drive to Haleiwa, where we dined each evening. Prior to our arrival, Kelly was kind enough to suggest local hikes and activities, which we took advantage of and they did not dissapoint.  The dole pineapple and Maui onion chips  upon arrival were such a nice and unexpected treat. The AC in the bedroom was also a life saver. When we head back to Oahu (we are already looking at tickets) we hope to find Kelly's studio available:)

This place is incredible.  It was clean, close to the beach, and had so much space.    Checking in and out was super easy,  and we had no issues.  Kelly has chairs, towels, snorkels, everything you could need for successful relaxation on the beach.  

We would totally come stay again.

My husband and I loved staying at Kelly's place. It was so homey and comfortable. Very clean and spacious. The location is the best in the area in my opinion. It was close to the north west area of Oahu and Kaenea Point which is gorgeous and has a remote feel to it. Beautiful, rugged and uncrowded sandy beaches. And away from the busier places in that area. Kelly was a joy to work with! Thanks!
Kelly's place is the perfect place to relax.  It is quite and beautiful neighborhood with a short walk to an amazing beach.
Kelly's place is so comfortable and clean, and has all the amenities you need a for a week or weekend stay on the beach. A short bike ride to town, too. We'd stay there again, for sure!

What a gem this place is! Even nicer than it looks in the pictures. It was very spacious, clean and modern. Kelly was a joy to deal with. This place really made our trip to Hawaii. The little touches like the sun chairs, beach towels and snorkelling gear were a huge bonus. The beach at the end of the street was also amazing, a little piece of paradise. I'd really recommend anyone to stay here

Beautifully remodeled bungalow!
I was looking for something close to Dillingham airfield, and this was perfect!!!
Thanks Kelly!!
Beach access just steps away!

We stayed at Kelly's place on the first leg of our honeymoon. It was a very well appointed apartment on a cul-de-sac at the end of which is the beach. We found the beach gorgeous and very quiet. The surf was quite calm the days we were here, and we enjoyed going in the water. The street is residential, with no tourists around, creating exactly the ambiance my wife and I were looking for. There were lots of friendly dogs belonging to the neighbours greeting us as we walked to and from the beach, which my wife loved. Kelly was an extremely attentive hostess, and our stay was great. We would come back in a heartbeat!
AMAZING! Kelly and Sam are great hosts and think of everything you may have forgot!

Kellys place is awesome! My husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon, and we could not have been more pleased. Kelly was the perfect mix of informative and helpful, but also gave us plenty of privacy. The house was so clean, had everything we needed, and was super comfortable. The beach was perfect and was almost always empty during the day (we even saw turtles there!). There were great places to eat in town about ten minutes away, and was where we spent most of our time apart from the beach. If you're looking for an quiet and secluded place with fantastic beach access, this is for you!

We had a perfect stay, and would come back in a heartbeat!!! It was a great location -- so close to beautiful beaches and hikes and great food. A much less touristy part of the north shore. The house was perfect -- lovely deck, full kitchen, very nice bathroom, comfortable bedroom (which was nicely cooled by the portable AC). Kelly did so many little extras which just made our stay even better. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

A lovely location and literally has everything you need. From beach gear to a lovely welcome gift Kelly has thought of everything. To be able to walk to a beautiful beach at the end of the street is incredible. It truly is paradise. The north shore is amazing. ! Stay here!

This is a great place for a vacation. My wife and I stayed here and found everything we needed. Full use kitchen is a huge plus as is the use of the beach. Don't skip out staying here if you have the chance!

Merveilleux logement spacieux avec tous les équipements nécessaires et les petits à côté apprécies 
L'hôte est merveilleuse et d'une rare gentillesse
Un accès à la plage privée est fourni et l'endroit est paradisiaque

This place is wonderful. Large and comfortable. Check in was easy and everything we needed was provided for us. The private beach at the end of the street was great for beautiful Hawaiian sunsets. Highly recommend this place!

My wife and I stayed here as our second stop on a whirlwind 10th anniversary trip to Vegas and 3 Hawaiian islands.  The studio is beautiful, and has everything you could need to feel like a home away from home.  It's steps from a beautiful secluded beach, which we enjoyed with the snorkeling and beach gear that Kelly provides for the use of her guests.

The "studio" itself is really a large one-bedroom apartment with a separate entry and is completely private, and is larger than even the pictures make it seem.  We thoroughly enjoyed the private yard and lanai, and used both the grill and kitchen to prepare our breakfast and dinner regularly throughout our stay.  They even allow use of an on-site washer and dryer which was hugely helpful given we were mid-way through our vacation.

The location in the north shore is amazing, and just a short drive from Haleiwa which has some great stores and restaurants, and not far from Waimea Bay and some amazing beaches, and is a short, 40 minute drive from Honolulu.

Kelly offered great tips about local hikes and places to visit, and was very helpful when asked.  We briefly bumped into her husband and son as well who were very friendly and offered some great tips as well.

I can't recommend the studio or hosts enough.  If we ever find ourselves back on Oahu, I would book again without hesitation!

Stayed at Kelly's place for my honeymoon recently. It was super easy to check in and check out. We stayed at the North Shore to avoid the craziness of the city life. There were so many nice things to do within close distance like Waimea Falls, Waimea Beach, delicious places to eat, and great places to hike. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone staying at Oahu for a more laid back type of setting to get home and relax after a day exploring the island. :)

If you are looking to stay away from the city with beautiful views, this is your winner! 

Not only is Kelly's place immaculately clean, she is a kind and attentive host who will provide more than what is necessary to make your vacation a dream. 

Although there is only a portable AC unit in the bedroom, the location is worth every second. We weren't home during the day bc we were out enjoying the many things to do around the northern part of Oahu. By the time we got home, the many fans in the living area was sufficient enough to cool down my family and I. 

We absolutely fell in love with the neighborhood, and every area surrounding it. So if this place is available, don't pass it up! You will love it here.

Kelly was a caring and considerate host, going the extra lengths to make our stay at her place comfortable and stress free! Great welcome touches, including a very well crafted local info-guide and nicely equipped/stocked kitchen! Plus immediate and capable help when we needed it. Thank you Kelly!
The apartment was beautiful and the host was very helpful. Would love to spend more time here!
This apartment is phenomenal and Kelly is a wonderful host. The place was spacious and clean and the personal touches went above and beyond. Highly recommended.

The place was very clean, fully packed with all necessary appliances for a long stay and a home-made meals.  Very close to private beaches, where you will have access. Public beaches with lifeguards on duty are a bit farther, about 20 min drive North. 10 min drive to local restaurants, coffee shops and gift stores in the closest town Haleiwa. Overall, good experience.

Our stay at Kelly’s place was everything that I was hoping for our North Shore experience. 
Close to beautiful and remote beaches, a short drive to all the famous surf breaks and 
great places to explore and eat out. 
Kelly is the perfect host who went above and beyond what we were expecting.
We will be back next time we come to the North Shore Hawaii.

Kelly was a wonderful host! The studio apartment is beautiful with lots of windows to let in the natural light - I think it looks even better in person than the pictures! It was well equipped and we loved all the little extras - especially the drinks and snacks that were there when we arrived. My favorite part was the deck - after a long day of sightseeing it was the perfect place to sit outside and have a drink. If we make it back to Oahu we would definitely stay there again!

Kelly's private apartment was a perfect get away, a peaceful retreat. The location was great, as was the welcome basket with many local treats. It was a short drive to nearby towns, beaches, and great hikes. Kelly put together a very thoughtful information book for her guests, which I found very helpful in getting to know where to go, where to eat, and what there is to see and do. I highly recommend Kelly's place!

Tudo funcionou perfeitamente com a Kelly, desde as primeiras consultas mesmo antes da reserva. Respostas rápidas e claras! Comunicação perfeita! A qualquer instante, Kelly podia ser contactada por SMS e as respostas foram sempre rápidas! Pessoalmente, estive com ela apenas uma vez - há bastante privacidade na casa, apesar dela residir com a família no segundo andar. 

A casa é ainda melhor que nas fotos. Localização é ok, fica a cerca de 10-15 minutos de Haleiwa e das principais praias do North Shore. Como em qualquer local na área norte da ilha, é necessário um carro alugado! Há quase tudo que um casal ou uma família pequena precisa na casa, exceção de um forno convencional (fez um pouco de falta para a famosa pizza congelada, mas sem traumas...). O colchão do sofá-cama também não é, como esperado nesses casos, dos melhores. De resto, tudo muito bom! Equipamentos modernos, cafeteira, torradeira, mini fogão, geladeira e ar condicionado no quarto, além
de muitos utensílios na cozinha. Kelly também deixou cadeiras de praia, toalhas e equipamento para snorkel à disposição. Foram muito bem vindos!
Dicas foram ótimas (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, voltaria e me hospedaria de novo na casa da Kelly!! Recomendo!

We had such a great time on our honeymoon at the North Shore! It was so nice after a busy day to go back to a place that felt like home. Kelly has the best binder with so many suggestions of what to do on the island. Thank you guys!

This was our second two-week stay in Kelly's place. We enjoyed it just as much! The house is exactly as described. It is spacious, very clean and has everything you need in the house and for the beach (towels, chairs, cooler and snorkel gear). The kitchen is well equipped if you want to dine in. The neighborhood is quiet (although you do hear some traffic noise from the main road) and the private beach just a short walk away. Kelly was always very responsive and offered many tips on local attractions. We loved the treats she offered to welcome us and the fact that there was food, coffee and tea for a first breakfast! We are planning to go back.
Super close to the beach, perfect living area and has everything you need for an amazing stay. Thanks Kelly!

Kelly’s place was perfect for our trip to Oahu! It was clean and had all the amenities needed. Kelly was very quick to respond via text to all our questions and had a binder with great suggestions for activities. If you are looking for a quiet place off the beaten path, this is the one!

Kelly’s place was perfect for our week-long stay on Oahu. It is a phenomenal rental! The house is exactly as described and picture, except actually feels bigger than it seems in the pictures. It was super clean and comfortable. A highlight was how well stocked the studio was; Not just the kitchen but beach gear and a fantastic deck/yard. The location is AMAZING – walking distance to the beautiful private beach. We loved being based in quiet, small town 10-15 minutes from shopping and attractions. I think this studio would be great for any length of stay but it is really perfect for a longer duration stay since this rental has everything you need.

Thank you to you and your family for having such great place available to stay at, for people traveling to the North Shore area of Maui. We would, without a doubt, stay at your wonderful rental and will definitely recommend your rental to anybody that we know going to the North Shore and looking for a place to stay.
You were a SUPER HOST.
Thank you again.....

The house had a great layout, very open and bright. The private beach was an extra bonus, just a short walk from the bungalow.  Plenty of space for living comfortably and having our grandchildren over for a BBQ.
This space was amazing! It was quiet and friendly but very close to town! We wish we could have stayed for longer because it was so beautiful!
Gorgeous setting and great location. I hope to be back soon!

Kelly’s place was above and beyond. It was super well equipped, by that I mean not only the kitchen but the whole house. It had beach towels, snorkels, a cooler, shampoo/conditioner and soap, a barbecue, I could go on. It’s location was beautiful with an adorable town close by and beach access that was private for just a few houses. We went to this beach twice a day everyday and every night at sunset we watched turtles swim past and one night a turtle even came up on the sand to join us! Kelly’s place allowed us to have an amazing Hawaii north shore experience and I would recommend it to anyone. Kelly was a great host, she’s a local so was able to recommend places to eat and sites to see, she was able to let us check in early and responded quickly to every message.

This place was beautiful. We loved staying there.. Everything one would need if staying in, and close enough to town if wanted to get out. Private neighborhood beach that is perfect for swimming, snorkeling or just laying out. Kelly was very helpful with local spots and what to dos... Will definitely be using again when back in Oahu.

Kelly's hospitality was more than I expected.
She prepared many snacks, fruits, and drink. 
The place was literally by the sea, which is a private beach that you can enjoy your private time, and located in a calm area.
I really recommend to stay with your partner, friends or family.
You can really enjoy the local side of Hawaii!

Kelly’s place is a spacious retreat with great access to a private beach and minutes away from Haleiwa - great town with lots of shopping, food trucks & eateries. We had a lot of privacy but Kelly was always available in case we needed anything. Would definitely stay here again.
Kelly's place was absolutely perfect.  She had everything we needed for the beach and the house was clean and perfect.  We would definitely stay there again.

When we booked this place we were quite excited about staying here and when we arrived it was just as good as the excellent pictures.  Even better with the personal touches and facilities and quality furnishings.  Kelly was great to deal with if we had any questions, but everything was very easy to sort ourselves. Such a lovely area to stay, easy to get around, some beautiful beaches minutes away.  We loved Waimea Bay, Sharks cove for snorkeling and enjoyed a local beach that Kelly describes in her guide book.  Would highly recommend and would definitely be back if we're ever in Hawaii again.

Kelly's place was perfect for our stay on Oahu.  The location was great since I was visiting friends and family in Mililani and Kapolei!  So close to the beach and all the comforts of home right there.  I would definetly stay here again!

Thank you, for sharing your wonderful home with us. We felt like we were at home. I loved the location away from the city. The neighborhood is quiet and felt safe. Defenetly we will return and recommend this home to others. thanks again we enjoyed it.
Clean, comfy, quiet.  Just perfect. We enjoyed our stay a lot and can totally recommend the hideaway.

Kelly’s place was wonderful: perfectly clean, cozy, and in a great location. We enjoyed our time at North Shore and are already planning on coming back! The neighborhood was quiet and quaint, with beach access a two minute walk. The tv broke during our stay, and although it wasn’t able to be fixed during our stay, Kelly and her husband were totally accommodating and tried their best (plus we didn’t come to Hawaii to watch tv so it wasn’t a big deal for us!).
We really enjoyed our stay, you will have everything you’ll need, close to everything (10 minutes drive from Haleiwa), private beach. Kelly was great!!

This place is magical! A private, large suite with everything you need and just across from a basically private beach! It’s right between the mountains and beach and everywhere you turn is a stunning view. Kelly is so welcoming and makes it all a seemless process. Definitely have a rental car to easily get into town and explore the North shore!

We really enjoyed our stay at Kelly's! She was very communicative and very accommodating. She even went the extra mile to help me have a floral arrangement set up for my wife when we arrived! 
The apartment space is very comfortable and relaxing. I went out onto the private deck/yard area every morning to just wake up and enjoy the peace and quiet. 
Kelly even offered some things no one wants to (or can) pack for a trip.. beach towels, beach chairs and a small drink cooler. She also had basic snorkeling equipment available for our use but we had elected to bring our own.
The space was amazing. Took about 2 minutes to walk to the beach. Friendly neighborhood. Host was very kind and accessible. Would definitely stay here again. 10/10

This wonderful place on the north shore was better than I expected. Kelly was right there to help us feel welcome. The apartment was large and so cute and inviting. There were many cute geckos running around in the yard and a huge toad was right there. The beach was very close as was stated and it was beautiful. You will need a car unless you bring lots of food with you. The stores or eating places are quite a way to get to. The place is well stocked with necessities and very clean. Kelly always got back with me if I had a question in a timely manner. The AC made for good sleeping at night. We made breakfast each morning and only had to bring the food. I would definitely recommend this nice place.

Both the location and the guest house itself are special. You are almost at the end of the North Shore, as far from the city (Honolulu) as possible, but only a 10 minute drive to the charming town of Haleiwa where there are tourist shops, a couple of banks, Matsamoto’s Shaved Ice and a good supermarket. And when you want or need to go into the city, it’s no more than an hour drive on the freeway to anywhere in Honolulu. But the feeling there is similar to being on an outer Island. You are next to rustic, pristine beaches that stretch for miles and near world famous surfing beaches. You will see green mountains behind you, hang gliders coming in for landings nearby and rainbow filled skies. The guest house itself is thoughtfully designed, tastefully furnished and very comfortable. Kelly thought of just about everything a traveler would want. She is also an excellent communicator so any issue that might come up is taken care of quickly. If you would like to experience Oahu from a different but very fresh perspective, you cannot go wrong selecting Kelly’s guest house. We really enjoyed our stay and hope we will have another opportunity to be there again.
We had great time at Kelly’s. Her place is spacious and very clean! Kelly was also very easy and pleasant to communicate with, I really recommend staying at her place.
Very nice place in a quiet neighborhood. The house had everything included and it was a short walk to the beach.
Proximity to the beach is great. Not much traffic out this way either, which is a great bonus.

Highest marks in all categories-- responsiveness, hospitality, cleanliness, spaciousness... The living space is quite large (especially after a few days in a very small condo in Waikiki). Kelly provided items such as a coffee grinder at our request, and gave local recommendations. The local beach access is nice for taking a little walk and taking a dip in the ocean. I recommend the local Kealia hike (moderately strenuous) and Ka'ena Point Nature Reserve. And observing the skydivers from the airfield or the beach, and the stars at night. Of course, we also drove to other attractions on Oahu-- try to gauge the traffic, which can be heavy.  The only negatives for us were that the mattress was somewhat on the soft side for us, but that's a matter of personal preference and my wife and I do have back issues... Also, though it was mostly very quiet, local fellas drove by on the main road with booming music on a few nights; one should always travel with earplugs. All in all, a super stay with great hosts. Aloha!
My boyfriend and I stayed for 4 nights and very much enjoyed Kelly’s place. It was in a great location for hiking and surfing but also close to town for dinner and açaí bowls.

name: Apartment located near Guell park
summary: Apartment near Guell park and the Carmelo bunkers. Very close to the subway.
description: Apartment near Guell park and the Carmelo bunkers. Very close to the subway.

reviews.comments:
Manuela was great
Guided is to our detonations
Very cute dogs
Humble and great place to stay
Saludos
Mejor de lo que me esparaba. Manuela ha echo que este viaje sea una experienia unica. Muy bien comunicado y super maja. Sinceramente ha sido mi segunda casa. Lo recomiendo 100%.
Por muy humilde que pueda ser su casa, Manuela es puro amor y cariño....y por supuestisimo volvería a su casa! Gracias por todo Manuela de todo corazón!

Una familia encantadora, muchas gracias por todo.
La casa está muy bien, todo muy limpio, un barrio muy céntrico y cerca del metro.
Si tengo que volver repetiría 
Un beso muy grande

Manuela and her husband were really nice, though they don't know English, so it was hard for us to communicate. The room was smaller than it seems on the pictures, but for this price is ok. The bathroom was nice and clean. You can use part of the kitchen but there is no place to sit and no table when you want to eat. Manuela sings a lot, which was nice and we liked it. Thank you for hosting us!

The room is not very big and the location is not very close to downtown area . But Manuela is a very nice lady! She has many things we need in daily life and every morning she offers us some yoghurt . She also takes the trash out in our room everyday.

Soggiorno più che soddisfacente!
Se volete spendere una cifra ottimale e avere un luogo da soggiornare trnaquillo ed equilibrato vi consoglio a provare Prezzo è qualità  5 stelle

Accueil chaleureux. Manuella est une personne très sympathique et discrète. Je regrette de n'avoir pas eu plus de temps pour discuter avec elle. 

Logement très propre.
Manuela y su madirdo han sido unos anfritiones muy buenos.

Manuela y su marido son muy buenas personas y nos ayudaron en todo lo posible. La casa está muy bien, es limpia y acogedora. Cerca del metro y se puede ir andando a muchos sitios. Sus perros son muy tranquilos. Hemos estado encantadas con ellos.
Han sido muy amables , en general todo ha ido muy bien.

Manuela y su Marido es muy gentil
El Metro carmel es a cerca de todo E
Muchos gracias
El propietario es muy cálido, la habitación grande, literas, hay dos perros encantadores, la puerta no se puede bloquear
El propietario es muy cálido, la habitación grande, literas, hay dos perros encantadores, la puerta no se puede bloquear

Manuela est très sympathique et accueillante. L'appartement est situé à 3min à pied d'une station de métro, en revanche il se trouve à 30min minimum du centre de barcelone (arc de triumf, placa de cataluna..). Dans l'ensemble nous avez passé un agréable séjour mais le logement et très humide et les draps sont pleins d'acariens (pour les personnes allergiques..).

This room decent, but had a few problems. The shower is hard to work and the doors fell off when we tried to use them. Water puddles would randomly appear on the floor, and it happened multiple times. We had use of the fridge. Host was nice, but there was a dog that followed us and growled. Otherwise they were very accommodating of our arrival time, and the room was comfortable.

Los anfitriones muy majos y perros muy tranquilos, sobre todo Manuela que es con la persona que más trato se (Website hidden by Airbnb) estancia fue buena, ya que te dejan libertad de horario(tanto de entrada como de salida)lo cual ayuda mucho a la hora de realizar un viaje yel piso está bien situado.

La casa está cerca de dos puntos turísticos, para el resto de la ciudad era necesario tomar el metro, ya que la casa está en un cerro, bajar está bien para quien es buen caminador. La pieza es un poco pequeña pero camas limpias y cómodas. Manuela fue atenta y nos llevamos bien con sus perritos.

El alojamiento con Manuela es lo que promete. Una habitación con una litera que es más que perfecta para llegar a descansar. El sitio es muy limpio. Nos recibieron muy bien, Manuela, su esposo, y sus dos pequeños perritos. Manuela nos permitió utilizar sus utensilios de cocina e incluso guardar cosas en el refrigerador. Quedamos satisfechos de estar ahí.
Para llegar a la casa hay que hacer una caminata de unos cinco minutos desde la estación de metro más próxima. El barrio es propiamente residencial y cerca hay tiendas de alimentación y bares, en donde puedes comprar comida y comer a buen precio en un ambiente propio de una zona residencial de Barcelona.
Aunque no está precisamente en la zona más turística y comercial de la ciudad, está muy cerca del metro y en poco más de media hora estás en la rambla.
Una gran ventaja es que sí está muy cerca del Parque Güell y de los bunkers del carmel desde donde tienes una tremenda vista panorámica de la ciudad. 
Por el precio, ubicación, y trato lo recomiendo mucho.
It is not easy to get there. long away from the metro.

Nuestra estancia en la casa de Manuela ha sido perfecta. Un sitio sitio accesible (a menos de 5 minutos del metro), agradable y en un barrio tranquilo. Los anfitriones son muy amables y atentos. Y no nos podemos olvidar de mencionar a los perracos, destacando el paverísimo Ronny y el corderete.

Gracias por recibirme tan tarde en mi check-in! El vuelo fue un fiasco.
 Los perritos no muerden, solo ladran y se hacen pipi en el piso, hahahaa, pero ya que te les acercas se dejan querer. 
El cuarto esta super sencillo pero lo vale si vas apretad@ economicamente. Esta super cerca del metro El Carmel, y como a unos 12 minutos caminando del Parque Guell. 
Otro detalle es que si hay algo de ruidos y se escuchan clarito entonces lleven tapones para los oidos por si tienen el sueño ligero.  
A parte de eso todo bien y bonito! = )

La atención de los anfitriones fue excelente sin embargo nuestro mayor problema fue que el internet era lentísimo y en ocasiones ni si quiera se podía usar. Otro problema es que una de las dos camas tiene los resortes vencidos (lo cual hacía incómodo el estar acostado).  
El edificio en general tenía un olor no agradable muy fuerte, a pesar de que el departamento en general estaba limpio, el olor dentro lo hacía incómodo. 
El apartamento está un poco lejos del centro de la ciudad sin embargo tiene una estación del metro a un par de minutos caminando (el único problema es que está empinado). 
En general es un lugar barato para pasar unos cuantos días si sólo se planea llegar a dormir y bañarse.

The room was nice and cosy. There were two friendly dogs in the flat which was also fun. The location provlbably isn't perfect as it's a bit far from the city centre, but all in all it was a good accommodation and I recommend it to other guests.
Buen lugar. Cumple lo que promete. Son acogedores hasta el último momento.
Bien comunicado, muy amables.

+ Close to the city centre.
+ Shops are close to Manuela's place.
+ Manuela and his husband are nice and kind people.
+ This accommodation was the cheapest what we found in Barcelona for 2 days.
+ Doggies are cute

- Only cold water during our staying. We couldn't take normal, hot shower just "ice" cold, refreshing one.
- Our room wasn't comfortable, definitely not laptop friendly and sometimes the Wifi didn't work (actually we couldn't book our flight tickets at night back to London)
- Manuela likes to singing in the mornings so we woke up at around 7-8 am every morning and our room was next to the kitchen so we heard the morning juice preparation too.
Muy agradables y los perros una monada!! Gracias a los dos por vuestro tiempo y espacio. Un saludo y esperamos volver!

Manuela es muy amable y servicial. El piso esta muy limpio y habitable. Puedes usar la cocina la nevera y esta todo impecable. Las mascotas no molestan. Son muy simpaticas. Ya se donde será mi próxima estancia en Barcelona. Gracias por todo Manu.
O valor é justo, não fica próximo do Centro, mas o metrô leva para todos os lugares. O banheiro não é privado .
Estuvimos con Manuela y su marido 3 noches. Son muy amables, nos explicaron todo y todo es como en las fotos. No teniamis problemas. Recomiendo.

Bien que les hôtes sont tres gentils et qu il n y a rien a redire sur la propreté des lieux, nous deconseillons le logement.. il est loin de tout et très petit (il ne faut pas etre claustrophobe). En plus de cela, les hotes font du bruit à partir de 7 h du matin et nous n avions pas acces au salon ni a la cuisine. 
Pour finir, les hôtes ont des chiens qui ne sont pas amitieux et qui grognent
Convenient location, friendly hostess, beautiful singing)) Very clean and comfortable.
Super gelegene Unterkunft, keinerlei Komplilationen. Gastgeber super nett und hilfsbereit.
Manuela's house is close of public transport and it's a good place for this price!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Tanto Manuela como si esposo
La casa está muy limpia y es como en las fotos. Por las mañanas hay mucho ruido. La casa está situada cerca del metro pero está todo lleno de cuestas. Manuela y su marido son amables.
Molto disponibile e simpatica ed un ottima accoglienza

A good budget option, a little out of the way of the main city/touristy area, but at a great price, and had everything we needed.
Very close to a metro stop going into the main area.
Per dormire senza pretese e spendendo poco va bene..

Расположение очень близко от великолепной смотровой площадки и парка Гуэль. Близко от метро. 
Комната уютная, чистая, небольшая (как и многие в Барселоне). Есть возможность приготовления легкого завтрака или перекуса (но кушать удобнее будет в кафе, так как маленькая площадь комнаты не очень удобна для принятия пищи).
Хозяева очень приятные, дружелюбные люди. Наличие в доме забавной собаки делала жизнь у Мануэлы веселее и насыщенней. )

Amazing experience. From the beginning, there was an open communication with the host which makes you feel very comfortable. Also, the neighborhood is very quiet at night.
My only surprise with my stay was the slope of the neighborhood. It was my first visit in Barcelona and I was acknowledged of the inclination. No problem for us, but I just want to let you know.
Thank you very much
房子交通还是很方便的,不过需要爬坡 步行有些累｡最重要的是 联系人只说西班牙语,造成交流障碍,向当地人求助才找到房子｡
Cerca de una parada de metro y del parque GÜell, no vimos a Manuela pero nos  atendió su marido, muy amable, tiene dos perros muy majos, repetiría.

Wir waren begeistert.
Zu zweit lässt es sich bei Manuela und ihrem Ehemann gut leben. 
Das Check-In verlief reibungslos. Man bekommt Schlüssel für die Wohnung und das Haus und kann direkt loslegen, Barcelona zu erkunden. Manuela und Ihr Ehemann sind sehr freundlich und helfen, wenn es Probleme gibt. Auch das Check-Out lief reibungslos.

Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber. Jeden Tag wird gewischt. Das Zimmer, in dem man wohnt, ist ausreichend groß für 2 Personen, sauber und bietet Stauraum für das Gepäck. Die beiden Hunde, die wie in den Rezensionen beschrieben, in der Wohnung wohnen, sind sehr brav und machen keinen Dreck. Auch das Bad ist sehr sauber. Wasser war warm. Nachts, nach 24:00 ist es ruhig. Generell das Viertel ist ruhig und erschien sehr sicher. 

Von der Wohnung ist es nicht weit bis zur nächsten Metro-Station "El Carmelo" (ca. 4 Min zu Fuß). So kommt man problemlos an jeden Ort in Barcelona und nachts schnell nach Hause. 

Manuela und ihr Ehemann sind sehr sympathisch und sehr gute Gastgeber. Unproblematisch, flexibel und sehr hilfsbereit. Gerne wieder!

Kedvesek, segítőkészek voltak a kommunikációs problémák ellenére is. A kutyák nagyon kedvesek, nem zavarják az embert. Házigazdákkal sokat nem találkoztunk, mi csak tulajdonképpen fürdeni és aludni jártunk oda. A szoba és az ágy kényelmes volt. A belváros metróval könnyen elérhető. A környék kissé zajos, de kibírható. Összességében meg voltunk elégedve mindennel.

Ich war zusammen mit meinem Freund für 2 Nächte in Barcelona. Zum Strand brauchte man 45 min., zur La Rambla ebenfalls. Die Verkehrsanbindung an sich ist aber akzeptabel. Das Badezimmer war extrem klein, in der Dusche konnte man sich so gut wie gar nicht bewegen. Auch das Zimmer war extrem klein und man musste sich abwechseln, wenn man an den Schrank wollte. Und der Schrank bestand aus nur einem kleinen Fach. WLAN war im Zimmer kaum vorhanden, eher auf dem Flur. Die Kommunikation vor der Reise war gut, vor Ort leider nicht. Manuela haben wir nie kennen gelernt. Man könnte meinen, dass sie dort nicht wohnt. Nur ein Mann war anwesend, welcher auch den Check in machte. Generell war die Unterkunft trotz 2 kleiner Hunde sehr sauber.
Właściciele mili i mają cudowne psy. Wszystko zgodnie z opisem
El alojamiento es muy pequeño pero limpio, y son gente agradable.
Great deal for a great price!!!

Manuela and her husbands are very nice, very helpful, the apartment is very clean, you can find everything you need. The little dogs are super cute! the neighborhood is amazing, you can have a bit of different taste of Barcelona, with metro and bus super close, you can reach in every part of the city without any problems. Parc Guell is 10-15 minutes away by walk, the slope gives a great view over the city!
Manuela has a lovely home. It's very affordable, in a pretty good neighborhood with great views, and very close to public transport.

Nos hemos sentido muy a gusto en lo de Manuela. Ella y Marcelino son muy atentos. El lugar es pequeño pero está muy bien y muy limpio. La ubicación es muy particular, está en una zona muy pintoresca, nos ha encantado recorrer el barrio. Creo que se saca provecho de una zona no tan turística que en general uno no visita porque no figura entre los puntos típicos de Barcelona, nos hemos enamorado de las cortaditas, subidas y bajadas. Lo que si hay que tener en cuenta que no es para personas de movilidad reducida.

La casa de Manuela es muy cómoda y su ubicación excelente. Muy cerca de parque Güell y del metro q te deja en el centro o en la playa. Manuela es amable y te hace sentir como en casa. Tiene mascotas muy agradables y mimosas. La recomiendo!
Great and quick stay! We stayed just one night with Manuela. She is very kind and communicative. Very close to Metro makes it easy to get to city center to explore. Great city views in El Carmel!
Tiene dos gatos y un perro, por lo demás muy amables
Cerca del metro
Dobry kontakt z właścicielką, dobra lokalizacja blisko metro. Polecam

It was a very nice stay. Manuela and her daughter are great hosts with two lovely cats and a sweet dog. The room is very cosy and comfortable. The flat is very close to subway so it makes travelling around very easy. Definetely would stay again.
manuela est gentille , la maison est propre et nous étions alaise , libres et tranquilles. merci

Manuela was Super Kind. Everything was like described and she has some super lovely pets! 
Also the Apartment was very clean and situated at a nice Location! I can fully recommend a stay there!

Manuela não deveria estar no airbnb. Desde o princípio fez-nos sentir como visitas indesejadas em sua casa: se íamos a cozinha, ia atrás para conferir o que estávamos fazendo; se brincávamos com os animais, nos dirigia olhares de reprovação e os afastava de nós; se dormíamos até mais tarde, censurava-nos com comentários sobre o nosso turismo. Nunca em minhas viagens me senti tão mal em um lugar. Manuela acordava 7h da manhã e começava a limpar a casa cantando em alto e bom som, mas não teve problemas em gritar conosco quando rimos brincando com os animais às 23h. Não há chave no quarto, e Manuela entra neste assim que deixamos a casa para passear (e envia mensagens reclamando que fechamos a janela do quarto). Não temos acesso algum a sala, se demoramos no banheiro ouvimos batidas/gritos e nos restringimos a guardar as coisas na geladeira. Usamos 1 prato e o deixamos no quarto para lavar depois que chegássemos e Manuela, entrando no quarto na sua bisbilhotagem diária, mandou mensagem reclamando sobre isso. Na última noite, mandou uma mensagem mal educada nos AVISANDO que deveríamos sair do quarto antes do meio dia. Péssima estádia, péssima pessoa e péssimo host. Não recomendo de maneira nenhuma.

name: AMAZING BOSPHORUS VIEW ECONOMIC ORTAKOY BESIKTAS
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın: Ortaköy, Bebek, Beşiktaş, Yıldız Teknik Üniversitesi, Malta Köşkü. Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: semt, dış mekan, Bosphorus view. Location, , rahat yatak. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar ve kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar için uygundur.

name: Private cabin
summary: Large motoryacht moored on a very safe quiet marina.  The room has 1 bed with 1 bunk removed, plenty of wardrobe space. An extra bed can be added on request.
space: Comfortable living area, Spacious  sundeck with Sun all day from early morning to late evening. Galley kitchen with separate fridge and freezer. There is lots of secure storage. A relaxed enviroment. Beside parc del forum. 5 min to the Beach. The cabin is compact but very comfortable for a good nights sleep. Can be arranged with 1 or 2 bunks. Great value for a private room on a boat like this.
description: Large motoryacht moored on a very safe quiet marina.  The room has 1 bed with 1 bunk removed, plenty of wardrobe space. An extra bed can be added on request. Comfortable living area, Spacious  sundeck with Sun all day from early morning to late evening. Galley kitchen with separate fridge and freezer. There is lots of secure storage. A relaxed enviroment. Beside parc del forum. 5 min to the Beach. The cabin is compact but very comfortable for a good nights sleep. Can be arranged with 1 or 2 bunks. Great value for a private room on a boat like this. Own cabin. Living area, Kitchen, Sundeck. I will be there to receive guests and can advise on local transport and places of interest. In a very quiet safe marina.  5 min walk to beautiful quiet beaches. 5 min to Tram and metro.  Major shopping center 5 min walk. 5 min to Tram, Metro, Bus. A beach walk to Barcelona center. Ideal for a Solo traveler. Smoking outside on deck. Very relaxing and safe. The cabin is simple and clean  with fresh lin
neighborhood_overview: In a very quiet safe marina.  5 min walk to beautiful quiet beaches. 5 min to Tram and metro.  Major shopping center 5 min walk.
notes: Ideal for a Solo traveler. Smoking outside on deck. Very relaxing and safe. The cabin is simple and clean  with fresh linen and towels.
transit: 5 min to Tram, Metro, Bus. A beach walk to Barcelona center.
access: Own cabin. Living area, Kitchen, Sundeck.
interaction: I will be there to receive guests and can advise on local transport and places of interest.
house_rules: Only pre booked and paid guests can stay aboard the boat.  Late booking for extra guests by arrangement. Please note the Toilet on board is not for solid waste. For environmental and hygiene Reason's we ask the guest to use the marina toilets available 24/7. This is very normal for a boat in a marina.

reviews.comments: Thanks for hosting. It was interesting experience to stay on yacht and nice chat with you Henry. Good luck with the boat mate:)
It was my best AirBNB experience ever. The yacht is great. Owner is a great host. If you're so lucky as I was, he will show you the night city. Excellent! Thanks a lot!
Great host and a nice location
Henry is a really nice guy. Room is very small.
Henry was really friendly was all super smooth and we had a few beers out on the deck which I arrived. Places like this are why I use airbnb. Cheers Henry
Henry was a great host! Super chill and easy going. Highly recommend staying on his boat!!
Vi hadde et fint opphold i Barcelona da båten har en god beliggenhet i forhold til metro og strand og Henry er hyggelig vert. Litt minus er at båten er lytt og renhold.

Our stay on the boat with Henry was very unusual and interesting. We got the biggest cabin, it was clean and comfortable, and we slept really well. We also had a little aperitif in the evening and chat. Henry is an open-minded man who is always ready to help, to give some useful tips about the city, he even let us leave our suit cases for a couple of hours so we could enjoy our last hours in Barcelona. Experience is positive, we'll be happy to be back on the boat again. Thank you!
Really nice and friendly guy! We went eating to a really good and cheap burger place. He showed the places around the harbour. Boat was big and nice.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice boat at the harbor with a good good atmosphere. Henry is helpful and  a nice host.
It's great place to stay when you on your trip. Nice calm yacht port with good atmosphere and the metro close by. Henry is good host and nice person. Thank you.
Great experience. The boat can get a little hot at night in the summer but wasn't an issue for me. Hosts were very friendly and short distance to the metro to get to other places!
Es un barco compartit en el nostre cas per 9 persones mes.
Great spot, cool novelty to stay on a boat. Wifi a bit hairy but great in every other regard.

The place is very cool and cosy, Henry is also very nice. 
But because of the bedrooms i don't recomended it for couples.

Henry is the best host i have met, he is attentive and very cool.
The boat and atmosphere is so peacefull
See You soon
Thanks again

Very relaxing stay on the boat. Thank you, Henry.
Tim
Proper Airbnb adventure. Henry is fantastic
Muy bien El Barco de Henry es acojedor y limpio,me ha gustado mucho

Staying here was a fantastic experience and what I consider air bnb to be all about! I would definitely recommend staying here, especially to those out there looking for something a little different.

Henry is a great host and was full of great advice and tips on arrival. The location is excellent in a brand new waterfront development and whilst not central, is well served by Barcelona's excellent transport network and is only a 20mins max journey to central Barcelona.

The boat is fantastic! The cabin was small but actually bigger than I was expecting and I never felt short of space. The seating area on deck is an amazing place to relax.

Thanks again!
el bote es un desastre todo sucio no tiene agua caliente, el baño es un desastre los colchones super mugrientos y el anfitrión olía a alcohol
Interesting small boat. Who been new experience it's for you )
The Host is very kind and open. Had a great conversation, laughs, a good breakfast, and its on a boat! Slept like a baby. Thumbs up, great hospitality

name: Room at Copacabana beach! 3 min to beach
summary: 3 min away from Copacabana beach, it fits up to 2 people with space. The room is private (you can lock it), it has a bed and we can put an extra matress. The kicthen is big and well equiped, and the wi-fi works well. It's a safe place at the heart of Rio's most famous neighborhood, near tourist spots, nightclubs, markets, police, subway and bus stops. The street and is quiet, perfect for relaxing on business or holliday trips.
space: The apartment is relaxing and wide open. Great windows and good ventilation, as it is at the 10th floor. It isn't sufocated by buildings, so you can see the sky and the mountain. The kitchen is great! Large and well equiped, so you can cook by yourself (it's way cheaper than eating outside). You also have a large table at the living room, perfect for meal or working. Your room has a lock on the door, and you can ask for an extra matress (extra charges for an extra guest).
description: 3 min away from Copacabana beach, it fits up to 2 people with space. The room is private (you can lock it), it has a bed and we can put an extra matress. You can use the kitchen to wash and dry your clothes or cook. The bathroom is shared. The ap
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana. Do I need to say more? It's just big and full of people. You can easily go to beach, a bar, eat or go to nightclubs. You can go by bus easily to almost anywere, like Lapa, Ipanema... And go by bike too! Things are very close.
notes: Just take care to don't brake anything, and please save energy (things are becoming expensive over here).
transit: We are close to 2 subway stations (Siqueira Campos or Cardeal Arcoverde stations, less than 5 min far), plenty of bus lines and public bike points.
access: You can use the kitchen to wash and dry your clothes or cook. The bathroom is shared.
interaction: The apartment has two more bedrooms: one is for Airbnb guest and another is for my cousin, Michael, who usually only appears at night and at lunchtime. My family and I live in Copacabana too, kinda close, so in any need, let us know.
house_rules: - Silêncio após 00h - Não consumir álcool/drogas em casa

reviews.comments: Maravilhoso! Nota 1000, localização excelente. Voltarei sempre
Quem me recebeu foi a mãe do Lereno, Francisca. Gostei muito, a localização é ótima, próximo a praia, restaurantes, metrô.

O prédio é bem localizado, numa rua bem tranquila e segura. Muito comércio bom por perto, o quarto é ideal e tem espaço para colocar nossas coisas, estive super à vontade na casa, fui super bem recebido. Lugar agradável, pra quem quer uma acomodação que ofereça um custo/benefício bacana.
Excelente.
Lereno, é bem atencioso.. Super indico !! Me senti super a vontade. Perto de tudo e bastante seguro.

Lereno é um cara normal super simpático! Ele me auxílio no momento que passei mal por ter comido
algo que estava estragado na praia! Gente boa demais! Super recomendo

Excelente localidade, ótimo para quem vai conhecer Copacabana, e excelente para quem vai à trabalhar ou concurso ao centro do Rio, por ficar muito próximo ao metrô.
Lerenzo, um Anfitrião muito receptivo, educado, atencioso. Pai do Lerenzo, uma pessoa fantástica, sensacional, feliz com a vida. A Mãe do Lerenzo, uma pessoa que transmite paz ao conversar. Família sensacional e muito receptiva nesses 35 dias que passei com eles.  Recomendo.

O Lereno não me recebeu pessoalmente, mas me avisou antecipadamente que sua mãe estaria me aguardando. Cheguei um pouco tarde (23h) e carinhosamente ela me mostrou o funcionamento da casa, da cozinha, reservou um espaço no refrigerador, me deixou super a vontade. Recebi uma cópia da chave e entrava e saída do apartamento, e pouco permanecia no apartamento em função de minhas atividades no Rio. Saía para conhecer a noite carioca e voltava de madrugada, sem problemas nenhum (claro que mantive o respeito e cheguava de forma bem discreta e silenciosa). Dormi até tarde e a sensação que tinha é que parecia que estava sozinho. O apartamento fica no coração de Copa, mega silencioso, fresco, bem próximo a tudo o que se eu precisei: praia, restaurantes, farmácias, ponto de ônibus e metrô. Foi uma experiência fantástica e super recomendo o apartamento do Lereno e sua família. Todas as vezes que for ao RJ, e  tiver disponibilidade, com certeza ficarei hospedado nesta casa maravilhosa, onde a energia e o conforto são evidentes. Obrigado ao pai e mãe do Lereno que me deixaram tão a vontade, que às vezes parecia eu estar em casa!
코파카바나 해변과 멀지 않고 쇼핑몰까지 가는 셔틀버스 정류장도 가깝고 지하철이나 버스도 잘 되어있어서 아주 좋았습니다.

A minha hospedagem no apartamento do Lereno foi muito agradável, local próximo a tudo que precisei, limpeza ótima, local seguro do jeitinho que mostram as fotos, quarto bem arejado, e a família acolhedora que me deixou bem a vontade. Lereno me auxiliou com tudo que foi necessário. Muito bom. Super recomendo.

Precisam dar um pouquinho mais de comodidade para os clientes só isso. De resto ok.
I highly recommend anyone to stay here. Lereno, the host is very hospitable and helpful. I truly enjoyed my stay there and I look forward to going back on my next visit to Rio. Great location!

neighborhood_overview: Located in the artistic Gracia Neighbourhood, you will have Gracia or Fontana metro stations at only 4 minuts walking from the apartment. This trendy and bohemian neighbourhood is full of cozy cafes, bars, restaurants both local and of all parts of the world, and grocery shops.  There are not so many tourists in Gracia also so you will feel like you've discovered something a bit new and diverse.
notes: Monthly rental only.
transit: Gracia metro & train station is just 4 minuts walking from the apartment and connects you by train or metro to all the major sights and interesting points Barcelona has to offer! It takes you to Plaça Catalunya in 6 minuts and to Sagrada Familia in just 10 minuts.
access: You can make use of the full apartment with no restrictions. We will also provide you with all the information you need to know from nearby the apartment so you can feel as a local!
interaction: 24 hours assistance for anything you might need.

Please ask us any doubt you might have!
Thanks!

summary: My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers.
description: My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Great time! First of all, if you choose this place you choose a new home. This apartment is super clean and gives you everything you need for feeling comfortable. The location is close to the waterfront of Williamsburg with the view over the skyline of Manhattan, if you take a walk there in the morning it's the perfect start of a day! Now to the most important part in my opinion, the roommates. Everyone in this apartment was really nice and became a new good friend of mine, especially Arturo! He takes care to choose people who fit together for a living together and there you can see his good knowledge of human nature ;) 
New York City is amazing but to stay at Arturos made it the best time ever! Thanks for having me and all these unforgettable memories!

---

Bel appartement avec tout le confort nécessaire pour une famille avec enfants et très bien situé à Santo tirso. Je le conseille à une prochaine famille.
Best stay I've had at an Airbnb. Such nice people, very accommodating and beyond helpful. I enjoyed a very nice meal with them. Thanks

Staying with Natalia is staying with a family, Natalia and Manuel in their sixties and Natalia's mom of 91 years who still is with amazingly good health. It is a big apartment and spacious with a big balcony with a good view. The bedroom is comfortable and there is a private bathroom on the corridor. Though they don't speak the best English we managed to communicate a lot with the help of (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate. If we come again to Santo Tirso we will be in contact with them for sure.
Magnus and Gudny Maria

A nossa estadia na casa da Natália foi fantástica ! A casa é muito acolhedora, super limpa, muito bonita e fica situada numa zona bastante central perto de transportes, supermercados, cafés etc. Os quartos são fantásticos e muito confortáveis, tal como o resto da casa. Mas o melhor mesmo foi a forma como a Natália e o seu marido nos receberam. Sempre muito prestaveis, muito simpáticos e amorosos. Sentimos nos como se estivéssemos em casa. Recomendo a 100% e espero voltar a vê-los. Boa sorte e até à próxima :)

J’ai été choyée et me suis sentie vraiment la bienvenue!
Natália et son mari (et leur chien!) sont charmants et très accueillants. 
J’ai eu la sensation d’être en famille au Portugal.
Lovely place and lovely people. Will definitily come again!

Very nice, beautiful and cozy room basically in the centre of Santo Tirso, we really felt like we are living in a portugese family which is really outstanding experience! 
They are really welcoming and great people! 

Also it is really easy to contact with the host and get a fast reply.  I really recommend this place to stay at.
Many thanks!

J'ai effectué un séjour très agréable chez Natalia et son époux.
Ils sont d'une rare gentillesse et très dévoués. Ils vous mettent rapidement à l'aise et se montrent particulièrement hospitaliers et très attentifs à votre bien-être.
J'ai tout aimé : leur bel appartement, avec sa grande terrasse verdoyante, la belle chambre spacieuse et confortable que j'avais, la bonne literie et la belle salle de bains individuelle.
Merci aussi pour le très bon petit-déjeuner avec le miel naturel recueilli par Miguel et les bonnes confitures faites maison par Natalia.
Je reviendrai certainement chez eux, dès que j'en aurai l'occasion et je recommande chaudement ce logement, dans lequel on est si bien !
Não tenho palavras para agradecer toda a hospitalidade e toda a atenção que recebi. Sem dúvida que se voltar a Santo Tirso vou procurar pernoitar aqui outra vez.
Estadia muito agradável

Amazing apartment in a very non-touristy (but still friendly), quaint town. Super clean/nice bathroom and the room has an amazing view and comfortable bed. Hosts are very fun/thoughtful (cute dog too) and you'll really feel very welcome and at home.  Thank you for everything!

We really enjoyed our stay at Natalias appartment. Great hospitality and the room was very clean and tidy. The location is great for visiting Porto, Braga, Guimaraes and other cities in the north of Portugal.
Natália e Manoel são pessoas incríveis. Sua casa é muito bonita, perfumada e confortável. Fomos recebidos com muito carinho. Sentimo-nos (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos.
Natalia is a great host. Her location is 25 minute walk to the train to Porto so it works out well. Would definitely recommend!

We also enjoyed the company of their dog Tuxa.  There are restaurants and  coffee shops with in walking distance. We highly recommend their home and will definitively stay there again when we visit northern Portugal in the future.

neighborhood_overview: Se você quer descobrir o coração do Rio de Janeiro e a alma dos cariocas não vai encontrar isso nas praias de Copacabana, Ipanema ou Leblon. Para o verdadeiro sabor da vida noturna e do espírito dos cariocas, há apenas um bairro perfeito para isso: A LAPA. Localizado no centro histórico da cidade do Rio de Janeiro, este local é sinônimo de boemia e alegria. Quase todas as antigas mansões e sobrados, com seu charme arquetetônico inigualável, alguns construídos na década de 1770, foram transformados em bares da moda, casas noturnas super-animadas, nascedouros de novas tendências e artistas e locais frequentados pelos amantes dos vários estilos de samba. Muito frequentada pelos moradores da Zona Sul do Rio e da Barra, o local tem número cada vez maior de visitantes estrangeiros também por conta de seus vários atrativos e pelo fato de ser considerado hoje o local mais seguro do Rio para se transitar à noite, com equipe da Guarda Municipal dedicada à região. A LAPA é o berço do Circo Voador
transit: Tudo é perto. A principais movimentações podem ser feitas a pé. Os principais pontos turísticos da Cidade - fora da Lapa, claro - podem ser acessados facilmente via táxi, ônibus ou metrô e ficam entre 5 minutos a 25 minutos de distância. Tudo simples, fácil e sem complicação.
access: O apartamento estará 100% à disposição dos hóspedes. NÃO HÁ COMPARTILHAMENTO DE ESPAÇO COM OUTROS HÓSPEDES. O apartamento será todo seu!
interaction: Estou sempre à disposição para auxiliar na solução de problemas comuns dos visitantes à Cidade Maravilhosa. Além disso, no prédio existe staff à disposição 24 horas por dia.

name: Estúdio 428 near the beach
summary: The Studio 428 is located in the main residential and commercial area, in the city center and within a 5 minutes walk from the beach. It is an exquisite apartment, located on the ground floor of a building with a unique architecture, wide, with an area of 70m2 and a 30m2 terrace and garden. It has an independent and direct entrance through the 18 street. It has a capacity for 2 adults and two children (sofa bed) and also has a baby crib. Free cable TV and Wi-Fi internet.
space: The Studio 428, is a unique and distinctive space, with a clean interior decoration and a contemporary design, thought and designed for people with taste and refinement. It has a very comfortable, minimalist environment where art, music and books in various languages live together in an open way, in order to provide guests with moments of great beauty, well-being and leisure. It has an entrance hall with a sofa and reading area; a living room furnished with a sofa bed and a large dining area with a fully equipped kitchenette; a bedroom with a work area and a large closet for storage; a bathroom with a shower, a terrace with outdoor furniture and a small garden. Free cable TV and Wi-Fi internet.

neighborhood_overview: The location of the Studio 428 is central in this city that can be visited on foot. It is located near the beach and the salt water pool at 400 m. This is a municipal swimming pool which is open to the public and does not require a reservation. The city of Espinho has some emblematic places that we recommend and which you can visit on foot: the Centro Multimeios of Espinho contains a planetarium, cinema hall and exhibition halls; the Municipal Museum FACE (Forum of Art and Culture of Espinho); the music academy; the Municipal Library; the Town Council; playground; the city park. It has several restaurants of grilled and fresh fish throughout the city where you can experience the typical flavors of Portuguese food.
notes: The cleaning are not included.
transit: It is located within an 8 minutes walk from the train station, where you can catch one of the frequent trains that will take you to Porto in 25 minutes or to Aveiro in 40 minutes. The access to the seafront walkways is a permanent invitation to the experience of walking outdoors and by the sea, taking you, if you´d like, to Porto always by the beach, on foot or by bicycle. The Sá Carneiro International Airport is located at 25 km from the Studio. In the city of Porto, neighboring city, there are some emblematic places that we advise to visit such as: the Ribeira area and its Port wine cellars; The Clérigos Tower; the gardens of the Crystal Palace; the Cathedral of Porto; the House of Music; the Coliseum of Porto; the D. Luís I bridge; the Serralves Museum, among others.
access: All the house.
interaction: The person responsible for this establishment is Inês Lacerda, and will be happy to welcome you, as she is always available to clarify any information or suggestion you need.
house_rules: Solicitamos que não se faça barulho entre as 23 h e as 9h

reviews.comments: La atención por parte de Ines y su madre es extraordinaria
Excelente estadia, um estúdio com óptimas condições Super confortável. Óptimo para 4 a 6 pessoas. Aconselho para quem pensar uns dias a espinho.

El apartamento muy bonito y muy limpio.  Muchos detalles a la llegada: agua, fruta...Ines muy agradable. la única pega que pondría es el ruido que entra desde la calle, al estar en un bajo y la puerta ser de cristal no está muy bien aislado del ruido exterior. La cerradura también costaba un poco manejarla,Pero todo lo demás perfecto.

A Inês foi impecável desde o check in à hora de saída, inclusive foi muito prestável e atenciosa em nos deixar sair mais tarde que o previsto.

No mais pequeno pormenor tentou sempre agradar à nossa família, explicando todos os detalhes e particularidades da casa. Simplesmente de uma humildade que salta à vista.

Prestou-se a dar-nos todas as informações necessárias, a ajudar-nos em tudo o que foi preciso e recomendamos a 100% outros hóspedes ficarem na instalação.

A locaçização é óptima no centro e tranquila, muito perto da praia e tem estacionamento mesmo em frente.

Boa sorte Inês! Quando voltarmos a Espinho, se houver vaga, já sabemos onde ficar ;)
Un apartamento fantástico con todos los detalles que se puedan imaginar. Decorado con gran gusto y muy cómodo. 100% recomendable

name: PALM TREE HOUSE steps to beach
summary: Surrounded by tropical trees and cool island breezes, our bungalow is perfectly situated for your getaway. Walking distance to beautiful, white sandy beaches, near world famous surf breaks, and just minutes to restaurants and shopping in Haleiwa Town. Nearest beach is known for watching Honu (Hawaiian turtle).
space: Waialua is a wonderful beach town! So close to everything, our bungalow is perfect to enjoy all of what North shore has to offer: World famous surf breaks, beautiful white sandy beaches, shopping, restaurants, boutiques and farmers markets. Our Bungalow is a few houses to the beach and Aweoweo Beach Park is perfect for kids. The bungalow is raised and the entire living space is on the second floor with a relaxing outdoor, covered deck with views of Mount Ka'ala.  Bungalow Amenities: -King bed -Queen bed -Two bathrooms -Full kitchen (oven/stove, microwave, full fridge) -Coffee maker -52" flatscreen TV with cable -Wifi -Outdoor hot shower -Washer/dryer -Hair dryer -Beach towels -Secured onsite parking

Walking distance to beautiful, white sandy beaches, near world famous surf breaks, and just minutes to restaurants and shopping in Haleiwa Town. Nearest beach is known for watching Honu (Hawaiian turtle). Waialua is a wonderful beach town! So close to everything, our bungalow is perfect to enjoy all of what North shore has to offer: World famous surf breaks, beautiful white sandy beaches, shopping, restaurants, boutiques and farmers markets. Our Bungalow is a few houses to the beach and Aweoweo Beach Park is perfect for kids. The bungalow is raised and the entire living space is on the second floor with a relaxing outdoor, covered deck with views of Mount Ka'ala.
