transit: Getting a car is highly recommended. There is a very convenient bus route, but renting a car would be best.
access: Our bungalow is completely private. You have access to the entire bungalow and beautiful tropical outdoor space. Secured, onsite parking.
house_rules: NO SMOKING ANYWHERE ON PROPERTY.  NO DRUGS. NO PARTIES.  Wash off ALL SAND in outdoor shower before entering home. Remove slippers/shoes before entering home. Make sure the garage door is completely shut whenever leaving the property.  Please be respectful of our neighbors by keeping the noise to a minimum after 10pm.

host.host_about: We are a family from Kailua who love travel, food and culture.

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed staying here. The location was great, I walked around the block to the beach every day. The space was perfect for our stay, very comfortable and had all the needed amenities. Nina was a very nice host, communicated well, and responded right away when we requested to make a change. Highly recommend staying here. We hope to go back.

Nina''s place was really very nice. The location is in a friendly neighbourhood and the houses are very close together. I can well understand why it would not be suitable for parties or large get-togethers.  The house has a big, comfortable porch, surrounded by palm trees where we sat most of the time during our stay.

The kitchen and bathrooms had all the necessities required, as well as enough beach towels, bath towels, and the laundry facilities had a modern washer and dryer. The garage was great too, as we had rented a fairly big jeep and there was plenty of room and was really spacious. 

We never had the chance to meet Nina in person, but our written communication was excellent. Her response was quick and reliable. 

If I had to give a constructive criticism, it would be 2 small issues.  One, because we always returned back to the house at night, we had to always turn on our flashlight in order to lead us safely up the path to the stairs where the main entrance was located. Perhaps one more motion detector light would be nice. Secondly, we were too incompetent to use the television, meaning not user-friendly.  Although Nina left instructions, we weren't able to watch it, which DID NOT matter to us and didn't warrant a call.

I would recommend Nina''s place for a nice quiet, stay in the North Shore area.

We had such a great stay at Nina's place. She was very communicative and helpful from before our stay and throughout. Check in and checkout were also easy and seamless. 

It was perfectly spacious for two couples, and we had all the tools we needed to make our own meals. You will want to eat out too--so many great places to eat on the island! The house is such a short walk to the beach, we caught plenty of sunrises and sunsets with little effort. We also got to see lots of marine life, including huge turtles, without having to pay for resort snorkeling!

You won't regret staying here if you want a relaxing experience away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki but close to some great beaches. I'd you rent a car, you can always drive to the other beaches and party's if the island, but retreat to north shore when you're ready to kick back. We'd stay here again without hesitation!

I had a great time staying at Nina's place on the North shore of Oahu. There is plenty of stuff to do on the North shore, like surfing, kayaking, snorkeling, or just hanging at the beach. If you want to spend the day at the beach, it's about a 5 minute walk from Nina's beach house to Aweoweo beach park.  If you'd like to do some shopping, there's a strip of shops and restaurants about 10 minutes away from Nina's place by car with boutiques, surf shops, and cafes, as well as many other types of shops.  And there is also a great farmers market that is close by that you have to check out if you stay here.  All-in-all I really enjoyed my time here.

The Palm Tree House was clean (spotless), convenient to beach and provided a private, relaxing atmosphere. Nina was 100% responsive and the entire experience was perfect. Extremely comfortable for two couples - the lanai, kitchen, living room, and bedrooms were all very large. Highly recommended.

Nina was the perfect host. Very prompt responses to general questions prior to our trip. Check in was a doddle with the lock box. The house is very spacious with a private garage, two very large bedrooms, a fantastic kitchen (we cooked breakfast and dinner every day), twonawesome showers and most importantly it was clean and had all the mod cons. As a base for exploring the island (especially the North shore) it was a dream. Highly highly recommended! Thank you Nina

This house was perfect for vacationing with our friends. There were 4 of us at the house and it was big enough for us to stretch out and enjoy our time, yet have our own space as well. The beach chairs and towels were a nice touch, as we spent much of our time there. There isn't an air conditioning unit, but given the time of year that we visited (March/April), it wasn't an issue at all. The fans kept the whole house nice and cool (especially the east bedroom!) and it was pleasant. Thanks for such a comfortable house!

We loved our stay! The house is in the perfect location, a 2 minute walk to a beautiful beach and a 6 minute drive to Haleiwa that has shops, restaurants & grocery stores. 
The home was airy and spacious, with 2 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms with 2 showers, it was amazing! Nina was a wonderful host and was so easy to get in touch with, and left coffee & chocolates for our arrival, so nice. The house is also well equipped with all of the little things you might want, like beach towels, shampoo & conditioner, salt and pepper, dish soap, toilet paper and even board games. It feels like being at home.
The deck is the perfect spacious spot to hang out, and all of the furniture is clean & comfy. The entire house was clean and welcoming. There are great ceiling fans in every room and there are windows with screens you can open so you always have a great breeze through the house. The kitchen is well stocked with all of the necessities, and is a bright happy space to have breakfast. 
The outdoor shower was really nice, it is huge and airy and perfect when coming back from the beach to get the sand off. The entire yard is really big too, and there is a big picnic table if you want to eat outdoors. The neighbourhood is really friendly & quiet (the evenings are super quiet, you can even hear the ocean from the front deck!) and super safe. 
I highly recommend this house - It was the perfect spot for our getaway and we truly felt at home at Nina's.

This was a great place for my colleague and I to stay while visiting Oahu for work at Schofield Barracks.  Convenient location away from the bad traffic on other parts of the island and a short walk to the beach.  Very nice, comfortable house and Nina was very responsive to our questions and gave good suggestions about local amenities.

Nina's apartment is clean, spacious and comfortable, in a friendly North Shore neighborhood.  We enjoyed a relaxing, fun stay for 18 days coming and going from nearby Haleiwa and the North Shore beaches.

Palm Tree House is on beautiful grounds about 1.5 blocks from the beach.  We could not see or hear the ocean from this home but we did hear beautiful birds each morning.  The bedrooms are clean and comfortable.  The bathrooms are both located in the hall and do not join to any bedrooms.  This made it quite awkward for sharing space with the couple we traveled with.  One shower is its own room.  You have to change your clothes directly in the shower.  The toilet is in a room separate from this shower.  We were able to work it out, but it was rather uncomfortable.
We loved the lanai and the beautiful, well manicured grounds. The air around Palm Tree House smells like flowers.  Nina was very helpful.  We had a difficult time cooling the place down when we first arrived, but she patiently explained the ceiling fans (there is no a/c).  When there were cross-breezes it was quite comfortable.  
We appreciated being able to use the body boards and beach chairs.  We found the best waves near Laie (North Shore)  The waves at the beach near Palm Tree House were very gentle and relaxing. We were told that the waves were in "hibernation" during our trip in early June (I'm not sure if this is a common thing or not.)
Our favorite places on North Shore were Haleiwa (kayaking, shaved ice, food trucks, cute shops, Ted's Pies at the grocery store), Polynesian Cultural Center (the best experience/show of the entire trip),  and Hukilau Beach (awesome waves!).  
Overall, Palm Tree House is a great place for relaxing at the end of an exciting day.  Thank you Nina!
Nice place a little warm in July

The house is very clean, well equipped and in a great location.   My wife and I stayed there with our 2 teenage boys for two week during our move back to Hawaii.  There is a small, quiet beach one block away for quick ocean access.  Haleiwa is a very short drive, offering larger puclic parks/beaches as well as a wide variety of dining and shopping.  The location provides a getaway from the extremely busy/touristy area of Waikiki as well as close proximity to the beautiful north shore.  Nina was a very gracious host, eager to make our stay as wonderful as possible.   I highly recommend Nina's place.
The house was very nice. We were in the countryside, but very close to North Shore, and only about 35 min away from Waikiki. Loved being there, great location for the price. Will def stay again.
Perfect place for our North Shore visit! Very clean, kitchen was well stocked. Loved the short distance to the beach! Overall a great experience.
Great location and lovely place!
The location was great and the home was spacious, clean and had all of the amenities we needed. We will definitely consider Nina’s house again.

A beautiful, quiet oasis on the north shore. The home was a comfortable fit for two couples.  Our favourite place to hang out every morning and evening was the lanai. You’re surrounded by lush trees and it felt very private. Nina provided lots of information about the area and responded quickly to messages. It  is close to shops, restaurants, a great farmers market and a 2 minute walk to the beach. The nearby beach is a great place to enjoy a beautiful sunset and tends to be quieter and more of a local crowd. Loved the local feel to the area. If you are looking to explore Oahu’s north shore, this is a great home base.

House was clean, exceeded expectations. Very bright and cheery! Porch is great for having coffee and listening to the birds! Check out Konos and Island Vintage Coffee for breakfast/lunch. Quiet part of the island, nice drive to lots of great North Shore beaches!
Great place and great host!

Nothing less than AMAZING! Great location, clean, everything you need. Close to a charming beach. So quiet and perfect for a relaxing holiday. You definitely need a car but the garage is perfect for this. Nina was so easy to reach out to and responded quickly to our every need. I personally hope I’ll be able to come back sooner than later :)
Great place, great service, great location. Five out of five stars.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Nina’s home. Check-in was super easy, the house was spotless, and was well stocked with everything you might need. The beach is 2 minutes away, where we spotted turtles in the water every time we went. We loved having the covered lanai to sit and drink coffe while listening to the birds in the morning. We would recommend Surf N Salsa food truck in Haleiwa, Impossibles Pizza in Pupukea, or stopping by Costco and making dinner to bring to the beach. Also, the walking/biking path through Waialua that eventually connects with Haleiwa is just down the street, a great way to get a quick 10km+ round trip walk in, if you’re inclined! We wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again!

Nina’s place in Waimea was the perfect beach get away. It was quiet and just steps away from a beautiful beach a short drive to surfing beaches and great snorkelling at Shark’s Cove.  You can take a short drive into Haleiwa, home of the oldest surf shop in Oahu and yummy food, drink and trendy shops. I’d definitely stay again!

1 block from the best beach on Oahu to see sea turtles (with no one else around)! The home is beautiful - well decorated with a clean beachy style, comfy beds, nice new appliances, & a great outdoor space with upstairs patio outdoor deck & an outdoor shower with warm water for when you get home from the beach. Nina is a great host - a personalized hand-written note & chocolate covered macadamian nuts were waiting for us when we arrived.

Such a beautiful home. We loved everything from the beautiful balcony entrance to the beautiful furniture that gave a great Hawaii vibe. We did have a few issues with the fridge. It kept going warm every once in a while. Showers are long but narrow and not very movable shower heads. Other than that, the house was amazing.
Excellent place on the North Shore. Stylish, clean place with great outdoor seating area. Close to the beach, close drive to Haleiwa. Excellent space, thank you Nina!

We were in town for our son’s regional soccer championship tournament in Honolulu.  We stayed at Nina’s place for two weeks and didn’t want to leave!  We loved escaping back to the North Shore after fighting traffic and crowds on soccer days.  Other days we hiked Manoa Falls, Koko Crater Railway and Ka’ena point, went paddle boarding and jumping off the bridge in Haleiwa and snorkeling at Sharks Cove and our nearby beach.  We also spent a day at Waikiki beach and Pearl Harbor.  We stopped twice at the Dole plantation for delicious dole whip and explored the shops and farmer’s market in Wailua, be sure to check out the laid back coffee and chocolate tour at the local roasting company. Most days we walked around the block to the beach to watch the sunset and watch the turtles feed along the shore.
The World Cup started during our trip and we were able to record all the games we wanted on the DVR and watch them during breakfast, that made us very happy!
Thank you Nina for such a welcoming and wonderful stay, it is a trip we will never forget!

This house is lovely and Nina is truly a fantastic host.   The house is in a great location as the bus line goes right by the house, a bike path is also nearby, so it was easy to get around without a car.  The only drawback, and this is of no fault of the host and I doubt she could do anything about it, but the neighbor's dogs (across the street) bark incessantly at times which was a bit maddening.  But I had to spend a lot of time working remotely each day and most guests probably won't spend that much time in the house so hopefully it won't be an issue.   This is a great place and I would certainly recommend it to anyone wanting to stay in a Waialua.

Wonderful apartment, close to the beach (3 minute walk) and conveniently (5 minute drive) located to Haleiwa with its restaurants, food trucks and shops. It is located in a real residential neighborhood, which is safe and perfect for relaxing. Spacious enough for 4 adults with one couch possibly convertible as a bed for a small child. Outside seating area and outside shower are great!
Nina is a great host, the location was perfect, and my family really enjoyed our stay in the north shore.

This place was such a wonderful  place to get away. It was private and peaceful tropical paradise. The owner was helpful and quickly responded to questions. She made great suggestions before our stay. She left us little treats in the kitchen which was such a considerate touch. The location was great, it was a 3 minute walk to the beach. The north Shore is beautiful. I would definitely like to stay again.

We have had a lovely time exploring - and we may have even visited all the beaches on the North Shore. Loved walking down Crosier every morning - great people and dogs. The bird song has been heaven and we so enjoyed eating breakfast on the Lana’i every morning - it felt like our own little tree house. 
Your house is airy and well ventilated and we made good use of the well equipped kitchen. Loved your Hawaiian surf decor. 
Thank you for a wonderful stay.

This was my first time using AirBNB and wasn’t sure what to expect but Nina made things easy with great communications on checkin/checkout procedures, a very clean and comfortable home, and an overall great experience.

Nina’s place is absolutely wonderful! I’ve been to Oahu 4 times and this was the best Airbnb we stayed at. It’s really close to the beach, but hidden enough so that the house doesn’t have that humid feel from the ocean. Spacious, beautifully decorated and well equipped, this truly felt like our own place. The house had everything we might need, including personal and lovely details to welcome us. Waialua is a great place, the beach is beautiful and perfect for swimming and sunbathing. A short ride and you’re in Haleiwa and have all possible options for food and shopping. To top all of that, the communication was so efficient that it felt Nina thought of literally anything we could need/think and made helself available for any issues. Can’t recommend this enough!  We will try to be back! :)

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Nina's place! We were glad to have such a lovely home base to explore the north shore. Nina was very quick to respond to messages and helped make our stay easy and comfortable.
Absolutley a perfect and beautiful home. It feels like your own house. Great area, close to the beach. If we ever get back to Hawaii we will for sure stay here again.

Fabulous venue here for our stay on north shore. Fantastic beach just minutes away with a stunning beach walk. Loved this area close to town and fantastic local shops -  we loved the food trucks and island coffee shop. Nina was so helpful and even fixed a sink blockage on a bank holiday for us. Thank you - we will definitely recommend to others.

name: COPACABANA BEACH- REVEILLON -WI FI FREE -Cable TV
summary: My space is in Copacabana Beach, 2 large bedrooms with WI FI AND TV A CABO IN THE ROOM AND IN THE ROOM, SUPER QUADRA of the beach - 100m, 8 min walk from the Metro, Taxis, Bus lines, Banks, Supermarkets. You will love my space for being IN THE QUADRA of the most famous beach in the world - Copacabana. My space is good for couples, business travelers and families (with and without children), groups that come to lectures and events. We make a contract for your safety!
space: Certamente você tem Copacabana como opção por ser um dos lugares TOP de turismo do Mundo!! Em nosso espaço, você ficará confortavelmente instalado, com estrutura sensacional, na quadra principal de Copacabana - in Copacabana heart, ente Rua Siqueira Campos e Rua Figueiredo Magalhães
description: My space is in Copacabana Beach, 2 large bedrooms with WI FI AND TV A CABO IN THE ROOM AND IN THE ROOM, SUPER QUADRA of the beach - 100m, 8 min walk from the Metro, Taxis, Bus lines, Banks, Supermarkets. You will love my space for being IN THE QUADRA of the most famous beach in the world - Copacabana. My space is good for couples, business travelers and families (with and without children), groups that come to lectures and events. We make a contract for your safety! METRÔ, BUS LINE, TAXIS
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana é o coração do Rio de Janeiro, estamos NA quadra da praia, 100M DE distância e apenas 8 min a pé do metrô!! Dezenas de opções de restaurantes, comércio farto, bancos, farmácias e várias outras facilidades no mesmo quarteirão!
transit: METRÔ, BUS LINE, TAXIS
access: Poderão acessar todo o imóvel, são 2 quartos que podem ou não ser interligados através de porta de correr com tranca. Ideal para 2 casais ou casais com filhos, que necessitam de quartos conjugados
interaction: Posso lhe ajudar com troca de informações de lugares para visitar e curtir no Rio - tenho um roteiro montado para lhe enviar por email, se for de seu interesse!
house_rules: - Visitas NÃO SÃO permitidas, fornecemos roupa de cama e banho, 1 vaga em GARAGEM COBERTA incluída, no mesmo prédio -Wi Fi e Tv a cabo -Infelizmente não temos como acomodar seu bichinho de estimação -Qualquer alteração na configuração e ocupação do imóvel - troca de hóspedes, hóspedes extras, entre outros, deverá ser previamente comunicada ao proprietário-sob pena de cancelamento da reserva

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Amante de viagens e passeios. Gosto de conhecer lugares pelo mundo junto da minha família

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Carolina a été extrêmement sympathique avec nous, de notre arrivée, jusqu'à notre départ. L'appartement est très propre, exactement comme sur la photo, proche de la plage, du métro et dans un quartier rempli de commerces et de restaurants. Marché animé le dimanche. Idéal pour séjourner à Rio, en famille. A noter que l'appartement est en rez-de-chaussée, et donc un peu sombre, ce qui ne nous a pas dérangé car il donne sur une petite cour très calme. Un plus, la place de parking qui est indispensable dans ce quartier si l'on a une voiture !

A Carolina e seu esposo foram bem hospitaleiros e prestativos, a localização do apartamento é excelente, a uma quadra da praia, próximo a vários restaurantes, barzinhos, supermercados, uns 10 min a pé do metro, o apartamento é super aconchegante, e apesar de não ter ar-condicionado, os ventiladores de teto são muito bons, além do apartamento não pegar sol, o ar não fez falta . Pelo custo beneficio, superou as minhas expectativas. Voltarei com certeza.

A Carolina foi super atenciosa, sempre nos orientando com dicas de passeios. O apartamento é espaçoso e confortável, tudo muito limpo e organizado. A localização é excelente, fica bem próximo ao calçadão de Copacabana e também de bares e restaurantes.
A estadia foi excelente. Obrigada Carolina pelo carinho.

It is a great apartment. Just a perfect location in Copacabana and very close to the beach! Carolina and her husband are really nice and help wherever they can. It was a really nice stay for my friend and I. Also the people and doorman in the house are very friendly. Can only recommend to go there!

Carolina mantuvo una comunicación continua desde el primer mensaje, el departamento es tal cual las fotos, lo mejor fue entre otros la ubicación y la seguridad ya que cuenta con dos porteros uno en el hall de ingreso y otro que maneja el estacionamiento, los cuales fueron cordiales y atentos  seguramente volveremos a elegir el departamento de Carolina en el futuro para otra estadía en Rio de janeiro

Se for colocar todos os pontos positivos da hospedagem eu não teria espaço e tempo para faze-lo. Então vou colocar os pontos mais importantes que fizeram da nossa estadia ser prazerosa, confortável e muito agradável.
1- Localização (fica próximo do coração de copacabana, praia, metro, avenidas principais , restaurantes (24 horas),mercados.
2- Apartamento muito agradável,limpo, grande (maior que nas fotos de apresentação), com tv a cabo, ar condicionado, wifi e até o pessoal da portaria muito receptivo.
3- Carolina e família, são pessoas super bacanas, nos receberam como se fossemos da família e sempre preocupados em nos deixar super bem. Super atenciosa, foi bem flexível com meus horários e com certeza não poderia ser melhor anfitriã.

Esses pontos garantiram uma estadia muito boa, voltaremos nos hospedar la com toda certeza e já estamos recomendando a família e amigos próximos.

Perto da estação de metrô, perto do ponto de ônibus, perto da praia. Há vários restaurantes, bares, padarias, nas proximidades. O apartamento é bastante cômodo, possui tudo que podemos imaginar. 
Carolina é muito simpática e atenciosa, sempre respondeu, prontamente, as mensagens de (Hidden by Airbnb) . Nos deixou extremamente a vontade no apartamento e, no dia da chegada, fez questão de nos receber e explicar tudo sobre o apartamento, o (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficaria hospedada novamente.
Obs.: Carolina instalou ar condicionado no quarto de casal!!!
Bom minha estadia foi curta, mais adorei a proximidade da praia, obrigado  por tudo.
O apartamento é muito aconchegante e completo, os anfitriões são muito atenciosos e simpáticos, estamos próximos à tudo.
Carol nos recebeu muito bem. Muita preocupada com nosso conforto, foi receptiva e educada. Adorei o ap. Localização excelente e confortavel. Me senti em casa. Obrigada
Confortable apartamento, céntrico! Muy recomendable! Carolina muy amable!

Esta foi minha primeira experiência com o Airbnb e estou até agora encantada com a estadia maravilhosa. O espaço da Carolina é incrível, ainda melhor do que nas fotos. O apartamento é amplo, confortável, limpo, extremamente bem equipado e, principalmente, localizado. Está à uma quadra de Copacabana, tem mercados, bares, padarias, tudo à disposição e muito perto. Utilizamos a vaga de garagem gratuitamente e a equipe do edifício foi sempre muito solícita e atenciosa. Carolina e seu marido nos receberam com muito carinho, deixaram água gelada e gelo já à disposição, balinhas, toalhas e todo o tipo de conforto possível. Nos sentimos em casa nestes dias, pudemos até assistir o jogo do nosso time na libertadores graças à Tv à cabo. Só posso recomendar fortemente este apartamento e agradecer à Carolina pela excelente hospedagem.

O apartamento é exatamente como demonstrado nas fotos do anuncio. Espaçoso, confortável e com ótimo custo benefício! Excelente para casais com ou sem filhos. A localização é ótima! Próximo a vários supermercados, restaurantes, bares, farmácias, lojas e, claro, das praias. Para quem gosta de uma caminhada tranquila na orla, é possível ir à pé também para outras praias fora de Copacabana, como Leme, Arpoador e Ipanema. Não gastamos mais do que 5 minutos de caminhada para chegar à estação do metrô (Siqueira Campos)! A proprietária é muita simpática, educada e sempre solícita!

Adoramos o apartamento por ser bem próximo a praia de Copacabana, com várias opções de restaurante, farmácia, subway, 24 horas, tudo perto. O apartamento é perfeito em tamanho, privacidade, limpeza, cozinha perfeita pra uma estadia inclusive em família devido ao grande espaço em todos os ambientes. Só temos ótimas recomendações ao que pretendem se hospedar. A Carolina, nossa anfitriã, é um amor e esteve em contato conosco sempre.

estive hospedado por 30 dias no apartamento de Carolina, o apartamento é bem localizado, bem mobiliado, próximo a bares, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias, etc... Carolina e seu esposo me receberam muito bem, tivemos ótima comunicação e o tempo de resposta foi bem rápido, o preço foi justo, gostei muito de ficar hospedado lá e recomendo a quem quiser se hospedar no coração de Copacabana. Obrigado Carolina.

O local da Carolina é perfeito! A uma quadra do calçadão e tudo muito perto! A Carolina ótima anfitriã, deixou tudo preparado para nos receber.
O apto é impecável, bem espaço e de fácil acesso no prédio. Bem no primeiro andar, torna mais fácil ir e vir ainda mais com um bebê. 
Haviam toalhas novas, limpas, roupa de cama e utensílios de cozinha úteis para estadia. 
Muito obrigado Carolina por tudo.

Foi uma semana muito agradável, a Carolina é uma anfitriã discreta, carismática e muito atenciosa.
O apartamento é amplo, limpinho, aconchegante e funcional, tem ótima localização é próximo a um variado comércio, a bares, restaurantes e a belíssima praia de Copacabana!
O único contratempo foi que depois da chuva na sexta-feira, ficamos sem internet, mas nada que desmereça ou mude nosso conceito em relação a excelente estadia que tivemos.
Gratidão. :)
Excelente estadia. O apartamento é exatamente como descrito e a Carolina foi bastante acessível para dúvidas e dicas.

Anfitriões atentos e com ótimas dicas de passeios!
Localização perfeita, apartamento nota 10 em espaço, utensílios de cozinha, limpeza, tudo perfeito!

O apartamento da Carolina é excelente, bastante espaçoso, limpo, em uma localização de Copacabana perfeita, a uma rua da Av. Atlântica e próximo a diversos restaurantes, supermercados, lojas. 
A garagem e os funcionários do prédio são um diferencial, sempre solícitos e dispostos a ajudar.
A Carolina e o marido dela também são super simpáticos, te deixam bem a vontade para curtir a estadia.
Excelente o lugar , perto de tudo , a casa tinha tudo de util muito bom , recomendo a todos !!!

Boa localização. 
A estadia foi muito confortável.

O apartamento é exatamente conforme descrição. Confortável e espaçoso. A internet é ótima e a localização perfeita, pertinho de supermercado, padaria e transporte público. A Carolina é super atenciosa e organizada desde o momento da reserva, a comunicação foi perfeita. Enfim, super recomendo o apartamento, pois me senti em casa :)
Ótima localização!

Anfitriã super solícita, apartamento muito bem localizado e muito maior do que aparenta nas fotos,limpeza impecável, todos utensílios de limpeza e cozinha, não nos faltou absolutamente nada! Muito obrigado Carol pela cordialidade de sempre! Obs :Cuidem bem do apartamento pois iremos voltar diversas vezes rs.
Dica : Tem um restaurante na rua que se chama Faenza, promoção no peixe urbano com buffet liberado(inclusive japonês) por 35 reais,vale muito a pena!

Apartamento enorme, muito limpo, organizado, aconchegante, muito bem localizado, praticamente dentro da praia! Fomos em 4, mas o apartamento comporta 7 pessoas tranquilamente Carol obrigado pela estadia e por esclarecer todas às dúvidas o mais rápido possível!
Ótima localização, limpeza impecável, funcionários do condomínio muito educados e atenciosos, decoração de muito bom gosto e ótima anfitriã! Recomendamos e esperamos voltar em breve.

O apartamento da Carol é muito bem localizado, pertinho da praia, padarias, bares e restaurantes. Ela é muito simpática e disposta a esclarecer todas as duvidas. Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo pessoal do prédio, o apartamento estava limpinho, e é muito aconchegante. Foi uma estadia incrível! Você não vai se arrepender ao se hospedar!
O apartamento fica numa rua residencial a um quarteirão  do movimento de copacabana, uma quadra da praia.

El apto. de Carolina es muy cómodo, práctico y la ubicación es inmejorable. A 1 cuadra de la playa, y en un barrio lleno de variados comercios. No tuvimos ningún problema de seguridad. Hay líneas de ómnibus para todos lados, y son muy rápidos. Los cariocas nos trataron muy bien ! Muy recomendable !

Minha estadia foi ótima! A localização é privilegiada. Tem tudo o que se precisa próximo! A rua é  muito tranquila, pertinho da praia. Não tenho nada de ruim pra falar. A anfitriã é muito solicita, responde prontamente os contatos. Recomendo muito e sempre que precisar vou procurar por esta hospedagem. Obrigado!

O apartamento atende em tudo e um pouco mais do que é oferecido. O espaço é muito bom e a localização, com certeza, é o que mais chama a atenção. A Carolina me atendeu sempre com muita rapidez e educação. Quando voltar ao Rio esse apartamento será minha primeira opção. Muito obrigado.
Localização muito boa, aconchegante e a  hospitalidade da anfitriã e dos porteiros foi diferencial para este comentário.
O espaço é ótimo, localização impecável e o custo-benefício é maravilhoso.

O espaço da Carol é excelente, ótima localização, a uma quadra da praia em ponto estratégico e área comercial que facilita o acesso a compras, alimentação e lazer, a limpo e organizado. A anfitriã é de uma atenção, compreensão e flexibilidade ímpar. Excelente experiência a um ótimo custo beneficio.

O espaço é super bem localizado perto de tudo, praia, metrô, ônibus, táxi, etc. Aconchegante, espaçoso, ideal para famílias. Bastante seguro, porteiros educados e atenciosos. Perto de supermercado, feira, bares, etc. Fiel a descrição aqui do site. Coladinho com a praia. Carolina nos passou várias dicas, responde rápido as nossas dúvidas. Nunca havia utilizado o App, e nossa primeira experiência com a Carolina e seu espaço  foi excelente. Minha família adorou!
Apartamento em excelente localização. Próximo à praia e em uma rua muito tranquila. Carolina foi uma ótima anfitriã, sempre disposta a ajudar. Recomendo!
Excelente localização. Apartamento conforme descrição e fotografias.
Apartamento condiz com toda a  descrição. Bem localizado, ótimo espaço e seguro com portaria 24 horas.
Ótima anfitriã
Muy lindo apartamento, muy cómoda la ubicación para acercarse a cualquier lado. Pleno centro de Copacabana, a una cuadra y media de la playa. Excelente !
Excelente localização, limpeza, internet e atenção recebida.
Excellent!
Muy buen alojamiento, Carolina es sumamente amable, ubicación inmejorable, totalmente recomendable para 4 personas

el departamento de Carolina es simplemente perfecto !
viaje con mis dos hijas y pasamos días maravillosos!
la ubicación es ideal ! media cuadra hacia adentro y media cuadra hacia rl lado de copacabana, lleno de restaurants y con un hotel casi al lado, lo que hace que caminar sea super seguro, incluso por la noche!
tb queda a media cuadra de la calle nuestra señora, donde encontramos supermercados, cajero automático, casa de cambio, farmacia y (Website hidden by Airbnb) verdad recomiendo la ubicación es superior !!!
el personal del edificio es de otro planeta! servicial, extremadamente amable, siempre preocupado de nosotros , hay seguridad las 24 horas
Carolina siempre atenta a todas nuestras inquietudes, con respuestas claras y consejos sobre Rio, rutas (arrende auto) y excursiones.
realmente recomiendo 100% a Carolina !!
Excelente y recomendable lugar. Muy cómodo

name: 2-Bedroom Elevator Apt with Swimming Pool
summary: My place is right off SoHo, within 10 min walk from Lan Kwai Fong, yet very quiet as it is a high-rise facing a quiet street. Most residents are expats. reception staff are very friendly and helpful.   Gym Wine and Cigar Room Study Room Dance Room Lounge (available for rent to host parties) Pool Table Kids Area Parking
space: There is a full-sized bed in one of the bedrooms. There are space and bedings for you to make a Tatami in the second bedroom if you want. There is also a comfy couch (6ft/1.8m long), a round dinner table coupled with two chairs in the living room.
description: My place is right off SoHo, within 10 min walk from Lan Kwai Fong, yet very quiet as it is a high-rise facing a quiet street. Most residents are expats. reception staff are very friendly and helpful.   Gym Wine and Cigar Room Study Room Dance Room Lounge (available for rent to host parties) Pool Table Kids Area Parking There is a full-sized bed in one of the bedrooms. There are space and bedings for you to make a Tatami in the second bedroom if you want. There is also a comfy couch (6ft/1.8m long), a round dinner table coupled with two chairs in the living room. Entire Room Quiet and close to subway. Walking distance to all the bars and restaurants in SoHo and clubs in Lan Kwai Fong.  Also walking distance to the chill coffee shops and boutiques in Sheung Wan. The art center PMQ is right in the hood too.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and close to subway.
transit: Walking distance to all the bars and restaurants in SoHo and clubs in Lan Kwai Fong.  Also walking distance to the chill coffee shops and boutiques in Sheung Wan. The art center PMQ is right in the hood too.
access: Entire Room

host.host_about:
Hi I love traveling and am very laid back. You'll find my apartment a great place in Hong Kong as I keep it clean and neat and it's in a great building at a great location. 

I got nice speakers at home if you like music too and great tips for bar hopping in Hong Kong.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great flat and building in a superb location! Soho and LKF's bars and restaurants are literally few steps away. I was Michelle's second guest so my checkin wasn't smooth but I'm sure this won't be an issue in the future. I highly recommend staying here to enjoy lovely HK.

Had a really pleasant stay at Michelles place. It was a big appartment for Hong Kong standards. The place was a 10min walk to LKF and Sheung Wan and Central station. The place was clean and had a nice little balcony to chill on. The instructions for the place and how to get there/inside were also clear. For any questions Michelle usually responded within 10 minutes, which was really useful.
New and good quality apartment. Close to central. Cafe downstairs. Good for couple.

Michelle was a great host. Although we never actually met she was easily contactable via (Hidden by Airbnb) or email and provided us with great instructions on how to check in. The flat was great and better than what we expected. It is in a great location right in the middle of the hustle and bustle of HK. Would definitely want to stay again in the future.

Michelle’s is in a great location. Can get to MTR in just over 5 minutes. Can use the gym in the build for small charge per day. Michelle is very quick to respond if there are any questions or problems. Close to bars and restaurants but not noisy at all.

Extremely convenient location within walking distance to MTR and LKF. This is still my favourite building to stay in in Hong Kong and would highly recommend.

Michelle is a great host that is extremely easy to communicate with. 

Overall would recommend staying here!

Perfect location, if you are thinking of staying in Central Area. Walkable from Hong Kong Station, where you get off from Airport Express, Central Station, and Sheung Wan Station; Sheung Wan station is the closest, if you are willing to climb up stairs. Perfect location and a host that is willing to help you out. Just a great place for a short vacation in HK.

Michelle was great and provided prompt responses when I needed to contact her for questions and problems.   Her check in  instructions was very clear and flexible.  The unit is in a great location, can easily get to MTR, close to bars and restaurants within minutes.

name: Spacious private 2BR with Backyard Williamsburg
summary: Located in Williamsburg, cosy, eclectic 2 rooms basement with spacious living space, private entrance, kitchen & full bathroom, boasts to a large back yard and are convenient to the L, J/M, and G lines, providing easy access to the wide array of entertainments, nightlife and cultural offerings that make this neighborhood wonderful! With lots of space and a sunny shared backyard on a quiet block, this flat is great for families and can also host larger groups.
space: This charming and spacious basement apartment features two small windows and is equipped with an air ventilation system. Two bedrooms with queen size beds, open living area with a large dining table & sofa bed, full kitchen & bathroom. Access to the shared backyard.
description: Located in Williamsburg, cosy, eclectic 2 rooms basement with spacious living space, private entrance, kitchen & full bathroom, boasts to a large back yard and are convenient to the L, J/M, and G lines, providing easy access to the wide array of entertainments, nightlife and cultural offerings that make this neighborhood wonderful! With lots of space and a sunny shared backyard on a quiet block, this flat is great for families and can also host larger groups. This charming and spacious basement apartment features two small windows and is equipped with an air ventilation system. Two bedrooms with queen size beds, open living area with a large dining table & sofa bed, full kitchen & bathroom. Access to the shared backyard. To enter the apartment there is a walk-down staircase. To access the shared backyard, there are walk- up staircase. We'll be available in person or phone to assist you with all your inquires throughout your stay. The apartment is convenient to the L, J/M, and G lines (
notes: As an extra perk we offer bicycles to use.
transit: The apartment is convenient to the L, J/M, and G lines (about 8 -10 min walk), providing easy access to the wide array of entertainments, nightlife and cultural offerings that make this neighbourhood wonderful.
access: To enter the apartment there is a walk-down staircase. To access the shared backyard, there are walk- up staircase.
interaction: We'll be available in person or phone to assist you with all your inquires throughout your stay.

reviews.comments:
It is in a really great location and Lawrence makes you feel super welcome and comfortable.
The place is really clean and tidy. A great place to stay for either a few days or an extended time in New York.

Lawrence is a great host. He was there when we needed him, and quick to reply. The place is great. Close to transportation to the city. Everything was great when we arrive, free parking around the corner between Thursday's- Sunday's. I recommend this place to anyone coming to New York

Lawrence was a great host!  He checked up with us to make all was well; he 
even left us a bottle of wine to enjoy!    The apartment was very clean and the linens were fresh and fluffy! We will be back!
Lawrence was a great host. He was available when needed and answered any questions or requests. The place was clean and very comfy. Will definitely book again.
Lawrence is a fantastic host and place is everything advertised

The appartment is big enough to accomodate 4 people. We had 2 rooms with 2 double beds. Large living room with lots of room to have breakfast all together at the same table. A kitchen fully furnished, bathroom with towels and everything you should expect from a hotel. The place is nicely decorated, clean, and there are many lights in different places, so you can create a cozy atmosphere and feel like being home. Lawrence is also a very kind and caring person. He's very helpful so you don't have to worry about details during your stay in NYC. The neighborhood is calm, you won't be scared about coming home late at night. There are restaurants, coffe shops and groceries all around. You can easily get there by feet, and also transportation is not far. Visit the original Williamsburg. It's a 15 minutes walk but it's worth all the shopping, restaurants and coffe shops you need. You can also visit the artists area that is very close. Beautiful graffitis decorate the buildings walls, music gear shops, live bars, vintage clothing, tattoo studios, and hand crafted items shops

My daughter stayed at Lawrence place , she was so happy , she keep telling me how cool and convenient is the neighborhood, and how sweet and helpful was Lawrence .
The appartement is great. 
I will definitely recommend.
Thank you

Lawrence's apartment is a perfect base from which to explore Brooklyn or further afield in NYC. He's a great host too, very friendly and welcoming on arrival with lots of great local tips and advice. Highly recommended.

Lawrence was a fantastic host. Very attentive to any request. I don't think I waited more than a few minutes for any reply and he would go out of his way to improve me and my family's comfort.
The place is spotless. There is certainly limited light since it is on the lower ground floor but due to the location, comfort and value, I would recommend this spot.

Our stay at Lawrence's was really good, he was very helpful and went out of his way to accommodate us.  The basement flat is in a good location for getting the Manhattan and the rest of Brooklyn.  The kitchen is well equipped and it is very cosy. There was five of us which is probably the maximum for staying comfortably but you could make 6 work I'm sure.

Nous avons passé une semaine à 5 en famille chez Lawrence. Tout a été parfait. Le logement correspond à la description et avons été très bien reçus. Lawrence est un hôte très sympa et très serviable pour tous renseignements et aide nécessaire. Tout le voyage était super.
Lawrence was amazing and made sure my friends and family were super comfortable!! The place was very nice and made us feel like we were right at home. The location was great too! 5 stars for sure!

Positives:  Roomy, clean, quiet, convenient, host is responsive (attempted to fix WIFI even though traveling overseas)
Negatives: slow WIFI  (unable to access from bedroom), single ply toilet paper, occasional noise from people walking upstairs, no windows (basement unit), uneven floor (undulations)

Lawrence est très accueillant, agréable et prends soin de ses hôtes. Tout était très propre et très fonctionnel. Tout est facile et à disposition dans cet appartement. 
Le quartier n'est cependant pas animé il faut prendre le métro qui est à 10 min à pied. (Assez facile de rejoindre manhattan avec la ligne L) Ou marcher environ 25 min pour rejoindre Bedford avenue pour y trouver tous les restaurants, bars et quelques boutiques. 
Merci à Lawrence pour son accueil et ses bonnes intentions.

Our stay was perfect. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Lawrence is a fantastic host; he was very attentive and helpful. The apartment is close to a number of subway lines. You'll find plenty of restaurants, bodegas, and full service laundromat nearby.

We had a great time staying at Lawrence's place. It's in a great location in Brooklyn. There's a lot to do in the neighborhood, and there's easy access to public transportation. 

The place was very clean, with a lot of space! Like others have mentioned, there aren't many windows as it's a basement apartment but that was totally fine with us, since NY gets very hot in the summer and the place was nice and cool. Of course the A/C helps as well! The back patio/garden area is very charming.

Lawrence was a great communicator when it came to logistics, and also recommended a bunch of good places to eat nearby. 

Overall, it was a seamless experience for us and I highly recommend it!

Affordable, comfortable, spacious, well-equipped 2 bedroom basement suite. Cool, quiet residence that was nice to come home to after the bustle of Manhattan, especially during the summer heat. Host was available and very helpful.
We had a great stay!

It was a pleasure to stay at this apartment. The location is in Williamsburg and very close to main roads and local stations, allowing access to direct route to major parts of NYC. There are many good eateries and locations close by for wandering and exploring. The apartment is very modern with a lovely design, it is spacious and is very nice for relaxing and has all facilities that one would needed while staying in New York. I would highly recommend staying here!
Lawrence is a great airbnb host, gracious hospitality combined with a friendly attitude, perfect combination!

Staying at Lawrence's place was like visiting a cousin from New York ! He was very helpful and kind to us. The appartment was comfortable enough for a family, the kitchen very well equipped and the little garden really cute !
Perfect place to come to visit New York : subway close, neighborhood peaceful with lots of restaurants and shops all around. We recommend it !
This place was amazing! Lawrence was very nice and caring. Great location if you're planning on taking the train into Manhattan. Can't wait to stay there again!

Lawrence was a really great host, the communication was very good and he always had time for our questions. He helped us plan our trip and gave us really good recommendations. We even could make use of his bicycle. His Airbnb was clean, everything was nicely set up. There was nothing that we've missed. The garden was wonderful, we even enjoyed  drinking our good-morning-coffee there. We highly recommend Lawrence and his Airbnb!

Lovely apartment. We were a family of 5 adults and were very comfortable. It had everything that we needed. Beds and sofa bed very comfortable. Quiet location but walking distance to train, restaraunts, bars etc Very clean and comfortable. Nice back garden. Well equipped. There were some food and drink necessities available which was a nice surprise. The apartment was bigger than what I had imagined. Great Wi-Fi and TV. Lawrence is a very responsive host and is helpful in every way. I highly recommend this accommodation and host.
5 Star all the way..would recommend Lawrence and his place to anyone! You wont be disappointed

Lawrence was a great host and went out of his way to ensure our stay was as perfect as possible! His suggestions on places to visit and travelling around both Brooklyn and NYC were really helpful! The apartment was perfect for us and allowed us to travel in and out of manhattan without any issues, two very local subway stations to choose from! This apartment is a perfect base to explore Brooklyn and NYC, I would highly recommend the apartment and Lawrence as a host! Will definitely go back!
Very nice stay! Lawrence was very flexible with everything. The place was clean and also surprisingly large and had more than enough space for me and four friends.

Great apartment. Spacious and well equipped. Really close to both the L, M and J trains to Manhattan. Some nice bars and restaurants around the immediate area too. Lawrence was really helpful and easy to keep in touch with during our stay.

Even though the reviews we read on Lawrence's apartment were very strong, our stay was even better than we thought. The apartment was clean, tidy, comfortable with everything we needed, and in a great location. Close to transport links and easy walking distance to bars, restaurants and cafes. 
Lawrence and Angela were super super helpful. They didn't impose on us at all, but gave plenty of advice and tips on local sights and restaurants. You really couldn't ask for better hosts. A lovely couple. 
We 100% recommend this apartment. A great experience

This place offers bang for the buck. True, it's a basement apartment with a funky layout, but the space is perfect for a family or a couple of friends. The location couldn't be better, right in Williamsburg--walkable to anything you could want. Lawrence is an AWESOME host. I had told him in passing that it was my friend's birthday we were celebrating, but he had put a bottle of sparkling wine waiting in the refrigerator for us when we arrived. He was very helpful but not overbearing or pushy, giving us the right amount of space while making himself available. You CANNOT GO WRONG trying out this place!

Lawrence’s place is perfect. The best location, in the middle of Williamsburg, so close to Manhattan by train or subway. The apartment was clean and totally equipped. Lawrence was always ready to help us with the best tips. We spent ten lovely and unforgettable days there.

The place is great. Me and four friends stayed there 3 nights. The apartment was easily big enough for 6.

The location is great - close to all the main bars in Williamsburg and very easy to get to Manhattan (8 minute walk to the Met station)

Lawrence was a great host and kept in touch during our stay and was flexible. A great host. Thanks for having us

Would highly recommend this apartment

Lawrence was very prompt, accommodating and provided a lot of great recommendations for things in the area. The space had plenty of room, and was super convenient location to multiple subway lines and restaurants.

This was a good choice and I recommend it. It's really, really clean, and so even though it's a basement it doesn't feel creepy. The location is great. It was very quiet but still close to so much. We had tons of options within a 4-5 block radius. Also, Lawrence was more than happy to offer us suggestions. The check-in was very easy and smooth and Lawrence was immediately responsive to all our requests. He had also stocked the kitchen with bottled water and beer for us, which I thought was so nice! He was very concerned that we have a good stay. The only couple of things I might say that I wish were different were that one, we couldn't control the heat ourselves and it made climate control a little challenging sometimes (we had to text or call Lawrence to change it for us), and two, the internet was kind of spotty (probably normal for a basement apartment). But neither of things were major issues and I would definitely stay there again. Thank you Lawrence for being such a lovely host!

Superbe appartement comme sur les photos chambres très spacieuse et Lawrence est au top avec ses hôtes pleins de bon conseil très arrangeant il ne manque rien même jusqu au parapluie !!! Bise Lawrence nous conseillons +++

Lawrence was an amazing host. Really fast communication and always on hand to offer recommendations.

The flat is lovely. 2 huge beds and a very comfortable sofa bed with memory foam mattress. It was an excellent base for us, very easy to get into Manhattan to do all the touristy things.

Would highly recommend staying here. Perfect for small groups or families

Me and my family spend seven days in Lawrence apartment. The kids loved it and so did we. Good space for for us and nice kitchen. Williamsburg fun place to explore and 20 mins to Manhattan.
Great week and Lawrence is a very good host. Would love to come back.

This apartment is a lovely space that's close by to a number of restaurants and delis. There are 3 subway stations within walking distance, making it easy to explore both Brooklyn and Manhattan. Some hot water pipes run through the ceiling of the apartment which can make it quite warm, but otherwise it's a comfortable place to stay.

Lawrence es un anfitrión de lujo! Reservamos el lugar un mes antes y unos días antes de viajar ya estuvimos en contacto con el y nos dio recomendaciones de lugares para comer o salir por la noche. Sus especificaciones para llegar al departamento fueron excelentes y siempre estuvo atento a lo que necesitábamos antes y durante nuestra estadía. El lugar es tal cual como lo ven en las fotos, habitaciones amplias y super cómodo para estar en grupo y compartir. En ubicación super bien, caminando eran como a 8min del metro que llevaba al centro de todo, o bien en taxi o uber también era cerca sobretodo si se manejan en grupo no es caro. Muchísimas gracias a nuestro super anfitrión Lawrence! Recomendado 100%  ❤

Great place due to
- close to communication
- close to nightlife
- very clean
- better than the pictures
- and very important, caring host that checked in often enough to ensure everything was alright. Gave also great tips on where to eat/drink etc.

Would stay there again.

If there is any doubt in your mind in booking this Airbnb, Cast it out now. Lawrence’s place spectacular. He was a wonderful host. There is absolutely nothing that can be said about this place and Lawrence. If you do not book, you surely will miss out. Much better than staying at a hotel.

Lawrence was a great host during our recent trip to NYC. The apartment was in a great location and was extremely clean.  He made suggestions to local places, checked-in frequently, and responded to any questions we had in a timely manner. My one (Website hidden by Airbnb) of the mornings the upstairs tenant was being extremely loud from 4a-8a, which kept us up. Other than that, the warmth in the apartment was relieved by opening the front and back windows. He accommodated our check-in and check-out times, which made our stay and weekend that much more enjoyable. Would highly recommend staying with Lawrence. We will surely be back!
Very comfortable and spacious apartment. Extremely suitable for families.

Lawrence was beyond helpful. He replied to every message at the speed of lightning and showed the utmost care for that our stay was perfect. For example, we were in need of an iron and he did not even offer but insisted he would bring one the very same evening. He also wrote us an extensive list of local attractions, which was super helpful. The area itself is really cool and the apartment is close to several subways. I recommend Lawrence and his place one hundred percent.
Excellent host! Great with recommendations. Perfect space that’s central in Brooklyn.

This was a lovely space, very clean and comfortable. Lawrence was very helpful and even went out of his way to let us know there were umbrellas available when the weather turned to rain. We will be back!!

We loved staying at Lawrence’s place. Spacious (it even has a backyard!), well-appointed with modern decor, and very conveniently located to one of the hippest neighborhoods in the city. Lawrence was very prompt to respond to any questions we had. I would highly recommend staying here during your visits to NYC/Brooklyn.

L appartement de Lawrence est bien situé facile d accès à Manhattan par le métro. Il est cosy, fonctionnel et très propre.Lawrence est très attentionné envers ses hôtes et réactif dans ses réponses. Nous le recommandons
Perfect location
Lawrence was a great host. The apartment was clean and in a good location. Easy access to transportation, dining, and nightlife. We really enjoyed our stay.
The place was excellent close to many restaurants and metro stations, we were there for 5 days and it was great.

From the beginning we felt very welcome at Lawrence place. He was a great host with a lot of good tips. The appartment was very clean and comfortable with a lovely shared garden, comfy beds and all equipment you need. We loved the peaceful neighboorhood in Williamsburg. A welcome contrast and break with busy Manhattan. We look forward to stay with Lawrence in the near future! Thanks again for the great week, Lawrence!

Wonderful little place in a great neighborhood. Lawrence was an amazing host and all around kind person. My family of four was quite comfortable and we had everything we needed and more. Thanks again Lawrence!
Lawrence is a great host and accommodated us very well.

Lawrence a été présent dés la réservation. Par la suite il a toujours été prompt à répondre aux interrogations. L’accueil au logement a été parfait. Le logement est beau propre, fonctionnel. Les lits sont confortables et il est appréciable d’avoir la Wifi. A 8 minutes de marche se trouve le métro et 15 minutes plus tard vous accédez à toutes les activités que vous offrent cette ville. 
Le séjour a été parfait et je conseille ce logement. Si je dois revenir aucun doute que je ferai le nécessaire pour retourner chez lawrence
Lawrence was a wonderful and helpful host
Lawrence's house was exactly as described and convenient distance to any stations vicinity. We already miss a life in Brooklyn..

Lawrence is a great host - very fast in responding and checking, if everything is ok. He also stored our luggage on our last day, which was very helpful. The places is very spacious, but with no windows, so staying for 2 nights was just about the right amount of time. Also it's quite a walk towards the subway, but in a quiet neighbourhood.

Nous n'avons jamais été reçu à ace autant d'attentions. Lawrence et sa famille sont adorables. Discrets mais toujours disponibles. Cet appartement a un petit jardin partagé ou le petit déjeuner du matin est un luxe au cœur de Brooklyn.
Ou bien pour la bière du soir, bien fraîche. 

Nous avons eu un pb personnel, et lawrence nous a aidé avec beaucoup d'humanité. Merci à lui.

L'appartement est idéalement placé pour profiter des quartiers de brooklyn, street art, petits commerces et d'une ambiance très hipster.

Une liste de petits resto est proposée, nous en avons faits deux, Top !!
C'est un hôte de bon goût.

Du williamsburg authentique. 
Je recommande vivement. Et c'est peu dire.
Lawrence is very gracious and attentive to all inquiries and requests.
Perfect host. Very cool and flexible. Location near all facilities. Clean basement. Great stay!

Lawrence’s place is very well located, close to a range of bars and restaurants. He was an attentive host and had some great recommendations for things to do while in New York. For a basement apartment, the place felt surprisingly airy and access to the garden was a plus.
Host is responsive and hospitable. Great location! Cool space.

Lawrence is a genuine, friendly and very hospitable host. He enabled us to check in early and provided some fabulous information and tips about the surrounding area and NY. The apartment is in a great location and is clean - our only issue was the noise from the upstairs apartments that occurred every night during sleeping hours. If not for the ongoing noise issues (which Lawrence endeavoured to address for us) that didn’t suit our family (inc toddler), this would have been the perfect apartment. If you don’t mind noise/use to it or sleep heavy, then you’ll love this place.

This Williamsburg apartment really fit our needs and Lawrence is a great host! He provided amenities such as water, coffees, towels, dishware, and an extra set of keys. He also gave great recommendations! 

The apartment is in a great location and surrounded by many restaurants, delis, and convenience stores. It was about a 10 min walk to the G and L trains. It is a basement apartment so those with a lot of luggage or sensitive to stairs should take note. It’s only a few steps but is tight in typical Brooklyn fashion. The apartment itself is spacious, with 2 bedrooms, a large living/dining area with a bed in it, a bathroom, kitchen, and patio space. We didn’t use the patio space much because it seemed shared. The kitchen is also a bit separate from the rest of the place in the back of the apartment which made the space feel large. We loved the open floor open of the living/dining room. 

One thing to note was that due to the lack of windows (basement apartment), there was very little air flow and at times the apartment felt stuffy. Lawrence provides an AC unit and you can keep one of the doors unlocked to let in air, but the AC wasn’t sufficient during our stay. Thankfully we weren’t home for long periods, but with 6 of us in the space it got warm.

Overall, we really enjoyed our stay in this Williamsburg apartment! Lawrence, thank you so much for being a great host!

Lawrence was great,
Helped with the check in and with storing our languages after we checked out.
he also had great tips about the area.
Absolutely wonderful first Airbnb experience!

We had a wonderful stay with Lawrence. The apartment was clean, quiet, and large—perfect for a small group. We didn’t use the backyard but we did love being so close to so much in Brooklyn. We loved how the main space was laid out, surprising for a basement unit! We would definitely stay there again!
Lots of room.

Lawrence’s apartment was perfect in every way for our family stay - it was incredibly clean, spacious and comfortable with everything we could possibly need for our short stay. Lawrence himself was the perfect host - friendly and attentive without being at all intrusive. The apartment is ideally situated for easy access to Manhattan using the Subway, and there is a huge array of really cool places to eat and hang out locally. I just wish we’d had a little longer to explore Brooklyn itself and check out a few more of Lawrence’s wonderful recommendations!
I had a very nice stay
amazing stay, great location.

This place has the three C's: clean, comfortable, and close to everything great in Brooklyn. You're only steps away from great Williamsburg bars and restaurants, and the G, M, and L lines will deliver you to the rest of what NYC has to offer.

Lawrence was a perfect and attentive host. From the pain free check-in and check-out process, great restaurant tips, to the complimentary bottle of wine - you could not ask for more. Since the place wasn't booked on our last day, he even extended our check-out, no questions asked. That's what I call hospitality. 

If you need multiple, comfortable beds, spotless facilities, and want to see the best of Brooklyn, you won't find better accommodations. I can't recommend this place enough.

Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable à New York chez Lawrence. 
Le logement est idéalement placé, proche de plusieurs stations de métro et de commerces. De plus, l’équipement proposé est complet et le logement très propre. 
Lawrence est aussi très serviable et n’hésitera pas à répondre à la moindre de vos questions et à vous conseiller pour votre visite de New York. 
Je recommande ce logement.
This place was perfect for a weekend away with friends! Check-in was super simple and the location was outstanding. I would definitely stay here again.

We, a group of two couple, stayed in the basement for a week.
apartment: was cleaned, no windows (basement), spacy
location: close to several subways, coffee-shops  and more
communication/hosting: lawrence is a nice guy and had always a helping hand and recommendations

the basement is not perfectly heated (sometimes too hot, too cold and really dry air), and there are no windows. for one/two nights a really good place to stay!

Lawrence was very helpful and was available for anything we needed help with. He gave us suggestions for good restaurants in the area as well. The apartment was very spacious, especially for New York and was only a short walk away from some cool spots in Williamsburg. The apartment gets a bit warm but there is AC in one of the bedrooms and in the living room. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a sweet basement apartment in the area.
Clean, cozy, very centric.

This is a very special Airbnb. It gave us an opportunity to spread out in a comfortable and large apartment for a family reunion. I loved the detail that Lawrence put into decorating the space. The beds were so nice. I also appreciated the places for hanging and storing clothes. Lawrence was so helpful before and during our stay.

The space is better than what the pictures show. It can get very warm because of the space being close to the boiler but I ultimately had no problem with it. Lawrence is easy to communicate with and responsive which makes him a great host. We had an issue with the sink and he came in no time to fix it. So if you stay here you do not have to worry about an unhelpful host.

Très bel appartement à proximité de plusieurs stations de métro pour rejoindre Manhattan. Propreté irréprochable, ce qui est très important pour nous ! Lawrence est disponible et à l'écoute, il donne de très bons conseils. Prévoir d'avoir un plus chaud que la normal à l'intérieur (en hiver en tout cas). Bien équipé et fonctionnel, bien placé... on recommande !

reviews.comments: 床的大小合适?噪音是否大?无线网络如何?
Incredible value and awesome location
Excellent location, near Waikiki Beach. Check-in and Check-out process was fast and simple. The home was really clean. Would definitely stay here again. Mahalo for hosting us!
A great location and place to stay
Not recommend
Great location

name: Glorias:Sagrada Familia 15minutes, Beach 20minutes
summary: -  70 m2       -  3 bedrooms      - 1 Double Room , king size bed      - 2 individual room      - 2 Sofa bed      - Powerful  AA      - 2 lifts      - Big comercial center in front flat

The tv it´s a led´s scren 32" Panasonic with internet conected. The flat have three bedroms the bigest has a big bed 2 x 1,60 with a thick  mattress  for a comfortable rest and a big closet 2,36x1,50 full space for all your clothes. The other bedrooms have a single bed 1,90x0,90.  The kitchen it´s full equipeted fridge it´s new the oven it´s electrical ant cook table it´s induction , the washing machine it´s a Panasonic 7 kg and 1200 rpm A++. You have all the things you need to do your meals and cook.

Behind the flat its the local market with fresh products. Rogent street has lot of bars and restaurants.

house_rules: No party`s Respect neighbors Don´t fix washingmachine after 22:00

host.host_about: I like to serve guests and make them feel as if they were at home , during your stay I'll be watching over you so you can make the most of your visit, I would inform you  everything that you need as well as recommendations of the sites visited.

reviews.comments: The apartment is really nice and perfect for 6 adults. It is decorated with fully furnished kitchen, air conditioner and large screened TV which connected with internet. The shopping mall 'Glories' is too close and 'Agbar tower' soothing our minds by exploring multiple colours in the evening. We found better communication from this place and Metro, Tram and Bus are in walking distance. Going to Sea beach needs only few minutes. I strongly recommend  this apartment as five star.

El piso es grande, luminoso y está decorado con muy buen gusto!! Muy bien comunicado, y a una calle del centro comercial, lo que facilita mucho la vida. Da realmente sensación de casa, cosa que se agradece cuando estás fuera. 
Además Marcos, el anfitrión, muy atento y pendiente de que todo fuera bien y que estuviéramos agusto.

Si se da la ocasión, repetiré sin dudarlo!

Die Wohnung ist gut gelegen, in der Nahe von einem sehr schönen Einkaufzentrum und öfflentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. 
Zum Strand läuft man ca. 15 Min auf einer sehr schönen Promenade. 
Die Wohnung an sich wurde komplett renoviert, sieht sehr schön aus und ist gut ausgestattet. 
Der Eigentümer ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit, hat uns immer Tipps gegeben und war immer erreichbar

It was a nice flat in BCN! Marcos is a great host who gave us a lot of information about BCN..Besides, the flat was tidy and cozy. There was a big shopping mall just in the opposite of Macros's apartment! I strongly recommend it!

Ha sido una agradable estancia.Un piso amplio, moderno y cómodo.
Los anfitriones muy amables

Excelente ubicación, muy bien equipado. Incluye todo lo que menciona el anuncio: TV, internet, nevera, lavadora, ollas, microondas, etc.

Marcos nos dejó una botella de bienvenida y algunas galletas para desayunar. Excelente atención. 100% recomendado.

Hello everyone!
Our 7 day stay in the apartment was great. Upon arrival we found the apartment clean and very well maintained flat, host Marcos showed us around and showed the nearest center. The apartment was TV channels, radio, internet WIFI and pads games so do not get bored in the evenings it! Rooms clean, neat and when we said that there is no kettle, the next day we received it with a hair dryer. I would recommend to anyone to book accommodation at this price because nothing and nothing cheaper and you will not find better. Apartment in the center :-)
Marcos greet you and see you!

It was a nice flat with nice beds , smart tv , heaters and perfectly fits for 6 people.The flat is very near to the metro Glories and Clot , very near to beach and also Sagrada familia.There is a shopping mall Glories by 2 min walk near the apartment...Marcos was very helpful.. He even came with me to show the shopping mall and helped us buying things..Thanks a lot Marcos..

Moreover the flat looks the same as shown in the pictures, it is very clean..

I bet your stay will be awesome in this apartment...

Hope to visit BCN again and will stay in the same apartment..

For our first time in Barcelona we couldn't find any better! We were 4 and we stayed for 7 days (for celebrate the new year), and it was perfect for all of us! 
The apartment looks as shown in the pictures; it's very clean, tidy and it has everything you need: in the living room there are TV, radio, internet WIFI, game console. The kitchen is fully equipped! The bathroom is very clean and tidy (as the entire apartment, like I said!).
The apartment is also very close a big mall and very near the Metro (but you can find other public transport like tram and bus). It was very easy to reach the city centre! Marcos is a perfect host: he was really kind and helpful from the first time and he shown us how to visit the town with all the public transport. Also we found coffee and biscuits for our breakfast :-)
I'm sure I'll come back to visit again Barcelona and I have no doubt on which apartment I'll choose! I'll recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to join a perfect stay in Barcelona at a great price!

We spent a great time in Barcelona, thanks to Marcos!

We really enjoyed our stay at Marcos’. The flat is clean and comfortable and Marcos is the perfect host. There is everything you may need, including a new fridge, washing machine and television, and we really felt like at home! 
It is very close to public transports (metro, tram, rail and busses) and to a big shopping centre.  You can get there directly by train from the airport and it is a short walk away from Clot Underground and Railway station. Also, just around the corner there is a park and in less than five minutes you can walk to the Clot market where you can buy all sorts of Spanish food and have a taste of living in a traditional “barrio” of Barcelona.
The famous Torre Agbar and the New Encants flee market are just five minutes away. It is possible to go jogging or take walk straight to the beach which is around 15 minutes’ away.
Check-in and check-out is very straight forward and communication with Marcos was very good. We receive the best welcome ever and Marcos and his wife even left a bottle of Cava in the fridge for us.
Marcos was always available to provide us with useful tips and information on what to do in Barcelona and when we left he even gave us a lift in his car and gave us a tour of the coastline from the Olympic Village to the Forum area. He must be one of the friendliest hosts in Airbnb!
I can definitely recommend this flat to anyone who is visiting Barcelona and I will certainly go back myself next time!
Travelled in BCN for business. Everything was smooth and as expected. Marcos was helpful and effective without much fuss. Thank you!

Realmente fue un placer alojarnos en la casa de Marcos, el es un excelente anfitrión muy accesible y te allana el camino.
El departamento es tal cual lo ves en las fotos, todo nuevo, confortable y práctico.
Todos los electrodomésticos funcionan perfecto, los colchones y la ropa de la casa impecables.
La ubicación fue muy cómoda para nosotros de un lado de la avenida un barrio tradicional con mercado y todo, y del otro un barrio súper moderno de diseño, todo excelentemente conectado.
gracias por todo Marcos y esperamos volver!

La casa era tal y como se ve en las fotos, acogedora, práctica y muy bien equipada y situada! El anfitrión muy serio, responde rápido y es cumplidor. Muy buena experiencia en la casa, recomendable 100%

We only stayed in barcelona for 2 days and I'm pretty sure that I chose the best spot in town! The apartment was clean/comfortable/modern and had everything we could wish for. The location was more than perfect. It's very close to a big mall and if you just need some basic stuff you will find a convenience store  right next to the entrance hall. It's also very close to the subway and train (direct connection with the Barcelona airport=cheap and fast). Marcos gave us a warm welcome and was very accommodating. He even helped us to find a good tapas bar and also made the reservation for us. He told us that we could always call or text him if we had any questions. So with all this said... we couldn't ask for a better first experience with airbnb. Thanks for everything Marcos and keep up the good work!. If we ever come back to Barcelona...we will definitely rent your apartment again!

Хозяин квартиры очень доброжелательный и внимательный человек. Накануне моего приезда направил в мой адрес подробные карты метро и автобусов Барселоны, а также подробнейшим образом описанный маршрут движения от станции метро до квартиры. Несмотря на достаточно поздний мой приезд, он дождался меня в квартире, передал ключи и коротко рассказал где что находится и как все работает. В квартире есть все необходимое для проживания. К порядку и чистоте нет никаких претензий. Имеется также полный набор бытовой химии для поддержания чистоты. Квартира находится примерно на равном удалении от 2-х станций метро Clot и Glories, до обеих станций пешком минут 7-10. Также рядом находится большой торговый центр. Marcos, большое спасибо, все было замечательно.
El apartamento ha estado genial, todo muy limpio y en buenas condiciones. Marcos y su mujer han sido maravillosos, muy amables y serviciales. Repetiremos sin duda!

It was our first experience with airbnb service. We were 5 girls and we stayed for 10 days. We are very pleased with the apartment and  we are delighted with the Marcos’ hospitality, kindness and care. Нe provided us with all the  information before our trip - how to get to the apartment, metro and buses schemes, and even links to app guides. Marcos, you’re really a perfect host!
The apartment is located very good, near the subway station and train station, from which trains go to the airport. There is a large shopping center in front of the house. Near the apartment there is a small park and grocery market. We were walking distance to the Sagrada Familia. One of the symbols of Barcelona - Agbar Tower – can be observed from the apartment. The apartment is very cozy, clean, modern, comfortable and spacious for five people. It’s equipped with everything you need; comfortable furniture, new dishes, linens, towels, household chemicals. A small negative thing - during our stay it was a little cold, but Marcos prudently showed where to get warm blankets. Marcos gave advice and tips what to visit and tried to help us in every way. On my sister’s birthday he offered to call to the restaurant and to ask them to do something like a birthday cake with candles, it was so cute! We were very happy with the choice. I strongly recommend this apartment!  Marcos, dear, thanks for everything!

Marcos and his wife met us promptly and allowed us to leave our bags while we enjoyed the city. He went above and beyond to send us information on sights to see in the city. The apartment was clean and spacious, very comfortable for our stay in Barcelona. Marcos gave us a tour of the neighborhood and even walked us to the Tour Bus Stop. His wife did a wonderful job of preparing the apartment, plenty of amenities, including fresh flowers and breakfast items. We ate dinner at the same restaurant both evenings just up the street called the Gent Del Barri...great reasonably priced food. The weather was sunny and warm so we spent time on the double decker tour bus seeing all the sights. We had a  wonderful 2 day visit in Barcelona.

First of all, we would like note the pre-service from Marcos. He wrote to Valery often sufficiently and explained us some details concerning Barcelona famous places, landscape, shops and restaurants. All this information became very useful when we arrived to Barcelona. It allows us to economize time, money and energy.
Further, we received detail plan of way to address. It gives us possibility to find our habitation so easy. Marcos met us near the address and navigated to flat, which is really as on the photo airbnb.ru. All the declared terms satisfies exactly. Flat is such, truly. :-)
Pleasant bonus waited us in the kitchen: there were milk, juice and cookies as meeting food. Also in the locker we found coffee, tea and sugar. We did not know deficiency with dishes, towels and so on. Our life was comfortable and nice.
Especially important for us there was location our house. Crossing road you can arrive to Glories Centre - the place of shopping, Carefour - supermarket for your needs, - and then - metro station Glories. Sparkling Tower Agbar impressed our daughters from the window at the dark evenings...
We kindly recommend this apartment and its masters Marcos and his wife Fina.

we stayed in Barcelona for 5 nights and this is absolutely the best apartment we could ever met. First of all, in the pre-trip period , Marcos provided lots of useful information  for our reference, he also provided lots of help to us and replied us immediately every time during our stay. The house is clean with a well furnished kitchen, u can wash clothes there and cook. Marcos also bought food for us upon our arrival. He is a super nice guys.
