I think I would visit this place again if I come to Barcelona next time.

Marcos was a fantastic host. We were a little slower getting to the apartment from the airport than expected but he had no problems waiting for us and was there on arrival. He sent multiple helpful documents before my stay via Dropbox including metro maps, things to do etc. Very useful. He also gave me his number and said to contact him if we needed at any time for advice or help.

The apartment was fantastic. Clean, modern, airy, good sized rooms and beds. We had 4 staying and each had a separate bed. The shower was powerful and the kitchen filled with everything you could need. He even left us some nice biscuits and juice, and had water chilled on arrival.

Was about a 25min bus ride to Ramblas area. Familia was 30min walk. Beach was a 30min walk. Nice quiet area and out of the tourist areas so great to come back to after a day out and about. 

Excellent stay, I highly recommend it!

Согласен с предыдущими отзывами - очень хорошая квартира и приветливый хозяин. Останавливались на 8 дней, нас было 6 человек. Все комфортно разместились. В квартире 3 отдельных спальни, в каждой можно организовать по 2 спальных места + просторная гостиная с телевизором, игровой приставкой и большим стеклянным столом, )) как на фото. Вся бытовая техника в отличном состоянии и исправна. Много разной посуды и столовых приборов. 
Маркос помогал решать любые вопросы и вообще оставил впечатление хорошего человека. Спасибо ему. Надеюсь ещё увидимся.

Marcos is a great host and the apartment was just what we needed, located near metro station and a 15 min walk from the beach. Across the street there is a shopping mall where you can get almost everything you need. Marcos provided us the (Hidden by Airbnb) map with all the best sightseeing points in Barcelona, so there was nothing much more to wish for.
Higly recomend.

Realy nice flat. A lot of space for big family. Close to big shop center and grocery store. Near bus station make road to historic center easy. 
Marcos was amazing host.

The apartment is really nice. The neighborhood is quiet, yet it's quite close to 2 metro stations, and a railway station. Marcos was very kind and was helpful all the time. I will recommend him and the flat to everyone who plans to visit Barcelona!
If I have the chance to go there again I will certainly be looking forward to stay at that apartment again.
The flat was very clean and nice. Marcos was very helpful and gave us many tips as we arrived. I really recommend this flat!
Nice flat and nice host!

La experiencia en casa de Marcos ha sido muy positiva, buscábamos sobre todo un lugar tranquilo para descansar y fue perfecto. El apartamento nos ofrecía todas las comodidades que se especifican en la Web, el trato con Marcos fue cercano, nos recomendó varios sitios para comer y estuvo atento todo el fin de semana a cualquier problema que pudiera surgir. La localización es perfecta para visitar Barcelona, a 5 minutos de tranvía/cercanías/metro a un paseo de la Sagrada familia y cerca de una Zona comercial. Recomendable 100% en Calidad/precio y nuestra primera opción para volver en 2015

Marcos' flat is perfect. It is very well situated in the center of Barcelona and the beach is not too far either. The flat was very clean and the kitchen fully equipped. Marcos was very helpful during our stay at the flat, he sent us maps and gave us advice where to go and what to visit. Right next to the flat is a huge shopping center with restaurants, lots of shops (very good shopping opportunity!!) and a huge supermarket. All in all, I can recommend this flat to anyone visiting Barcelona! We will definitely come back!
Todo excelente, buena ubicacion, confortable y cerca del metro.

This was the best flat we've stayed in so far during our two weeks in Europe! Great location, fantastic host! Metro and shopping were so convenient. Marcos went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable and enjoyed our in Barcelona.

Apartment is really comfortable and all photos completely correspond to reality.
Marcos met us personally in front of the undeground entrance and led us to the apartment. It was very pleasure and saved our time.
Just in fronrt of apartment there is a big shopping center with supermarket CARREFOUR where we bought everyday all needed food. Price and choice is quite reasonable.
It is verry easy to reache undeground station by foot just walking 8-10 minutes.
Marcos and his wife were verry hospitable giving us detailed instructions and presented us tasty ground coffee and cake.
Assuming we can say that quality-price ratio is verry good.

The flat is conveniently located between Clot & Glories metro stations ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) ), it is in a walking distance from La Sagrada Familia (a must visit in Barcelona) and very close to Agbar Tower, which is seen from anywhere and helps navigate to the apartment if you ever get lost :)

Additionally, Glories shopping center is real close and could serve for any need during your stay. We used it mainly for buying groceries at the Carrefour supermarket, but you could find there whatever you need.

Marcos and his lovely wife took care of everything - We are a family of two parents and three teenagers. The flat is well equipped - three bedrooms and extra sofa-beds in the living room, dining table and bathroom with constant hot water. Nothing was missing, really, and it goes down to the level of towels, trash bag and even napkins and a Wii console for the kids.

But on top of all the above, Marcos is truly an exceptional host. He went out of his way several times for us. It started with a lot of information about BCN by email prior to our arrival, continued by waiting for us at the Clot metro station when we arrived from the airport and accompanying us to purchase a local SIM card and showing us around. All was great including the tasty coffee and cupcakes! 

Thank you, Marcos !!!

Jesteśmy bardzo zadowoleni z czystego i funkcjonalnego mieszkania. Dobrze wyposażone mieszkanie i bliskość centrum handlowego (w nim Carrefour) pozwoliły nam na przygotowania posiłków. Mieszkanie ma bardzo dobrą lokalizację, blisko do metra. Gospodarz był bardzo miły i pomocny, czekał na nas na dworcu autobusowym, udzielił nam niezbędnych informacji dotyczących przemieszczania się po Barcelonie oraz ciekawych miejsc do zwiedzania. Bardzo miło wspominamy pobyt w Barcelonie i szczerze polecamy Marcosa jako gospodarza.

We are very satisfied with clean and very functional apartment. Apartment was well equipped (air conditioner, wii, full equipped kitchen, towels, iron and many more). The flat is located near metro station and very close to shopping center. Marcos is a nice and helpfull host, he  was waiting for our arrival on a bus station and show us how to get to the flat. He also gave us many information and advices about Barcelona and public transport in the city. We can recommend this flat and Marcos as a host to anyone visiting Barcelona!
El anfitrión fue muy amable y muy completo en sus explicaciones. El piso cumplió nuestras expectativas.

We have a quick but very good stay in Barcelona. Marcos and his wife were perfect in all, and the flat in already in a good position.

Very good!

I stayed in the flat for a week with four friends at the end of July. It was perfect for all our needs and had excellent amenities such as air conditioning, wii, sofa beds, and a well equipped kitchen. Marcos was extremely helpful and sent me plenty of information about the city and the flat itself, as well a recommending a variety of activities for us to do (the Razzmatazz nightclub is well worth a visit). The location of the flat was superb being a 15 minute walk from one of the best beaches, very close to both the El Clot and Glories metro stations, and importantly it is only  a stones throw away from the Carrefour Supermarket. All in all I would thoroughly recommend this flat for people looking to explore Barcelona at a reasonable price.

Samen met drie vrienden hebben we 14 nachten in dit appartement geslapen. Bij aankomst bij het appartement heeft Marcos ons van allerlei informatie gegeven over Barcelona; over de bezienswaardigheden, restaurants, metro, e.d. Dit was prettig en gaf een goede eerste indruk. Halverwege ons verblijf heeft Marcos nog eens gevraagd of alles naar wens was, het was perfect voor ons!
Het appartement zag er, net als op de foto's, netjes en verzorgd uit. Alles wat nodig is, is aanwezig (Bijvoorbeeld handdoeken, schoon beddengoed, ed.)! In de woonkamer hangt een airco, dit vonden wij heel prettig. Hartje zomer wordt het toch best warm in Spanje. 
Qua locatie ligt dit appartement heel centraal, voor ons ideaal. Wij hebben vrijwel alles gelopen, en binnen een half uur stonden we op het strand/ op de Rambla of elders waar we heen wilden. Het is een centraal punt, en met de toren Agbar recht ervoor ook een goed te vinden en herkenbaar punt! Het was alles bij elkaar een super leuke en prettige accommodatie om een vakantie door te brengen! Echt een aanrader!

This is all the best you can expect from a Airbnb Host. Marcos was always reactive, provided a lot of information, before and even during our stay. He was ver gentle and kind with me and my family. The house is very clean. The equipment was even above my expectations (wii game, kitchen furniture etc...). Very near Tram, Metro and "Las Glories" commercial stores. You can go by walk to Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes.  I Highly recommend Marcos as a Host and i Thank him very much for his time and kindness. Go your eyes closed.

Marcos and his wife have been very friendly and helpful. They picked us up at the metro where we arrived later than planned because we received our daughter's buggy only after a delay at the airport, sorry for that!! 

We went to their spacious and tidy apartment, which was perfect for our stay, there is a Wii for the kids, a big kitchen and beds in which we slept very well, in fact I cannot remember a better bed in any hotel I went to. The living room has nice air conditioning. There is currently construction work going on in the street below at daytime, but the windows block the noise as well as that of the traffic very well. 

There is a bakery some 5 minutes away where they have very good whole grain bread and even bread buns like we know and love in Germany, so we had nice breakfasts. A few steps outside the main entrance there is a small supermarket and then there is the big shopping mall over the street. About 80 meters down the road you can find an internet shop which we used to print out our tickets for the flight back. Other than that we heavily used the WLAN in the apartment which worked without any problems all of the time. The neighborhood is not the most glamorous one, but each one of the neighbors we met was nice.

You can walk to Sagrada Familia in about 20 minutes and there are two metro stations nearby at about 8 minutes, so you can easily go everywhere in the city by public transport. (We heartily recommend the Barcelona Card.)

We have been very satisfied with our first Airbnb experience, thank you Marcos & wife!

Για μένα ήταν το καλύτερο σπίτι που θα μπορούσα να βρω αν σκεφτείς ότι ταξιδεύω μόνη με τρία παιδιά. Το σπίτι ήταν ακριβώς όπως τις φωτογραφίες και πάρα πολύ καθαρό. Η περιοχή αρκετά ασφαλής για τα δεδομένα της Βαρκελώνης και το διαμέρισμα 5-7 λεπτά από το μετρό. Ακριβώς απέναντι από το διαμέρισμα βρίσκεται το εμπορικό GLORIES που μπορείς να βρεις ότι θες από το carrefour, εστιατόρια, fast food, φαρμακείο, parking. Ο Mάρκος ήταν πολύ εξυπηρετικός και με βοήθησε πολύ με τα παιδιά μου στο αεροδρόμιο γιατί μόνη μου θα δυσκολευόμουν αρκετά καθώς το αεροδρόμιο είναι μεγάλο και έχει πάντα πολύ κόσμο. Ο αυτοκινητόδρομος έχει αρκετή φασαρία αλλά με τα διπλά τζάμια απομονώνεται  αρκετά.

This was our first Airbnb booking. The experience has been excellent.Beautiful, well situated apartment. Our host, Marcos, was lovely in welcoming us and provided very useful information. The location was also very convenient for all the sights. We'd highly recommend Marcos and her apartment for a wonderful stay in Barcelona.

Marcos is an amazing host, very lively and always ready to help. The house is no doubt wonderful, very convinient location, Glories metro is hardly 5 minutes walk and Clot is around 10 minutes, the big Carrafour supermarket is just infront of the house. 
House is very clean and nice. Initially i thought that it will be bit noisy since its next to a road(as per the (Hidden by Airbnb) maps). But Marcos put double glass in windows which make house completely sound proof, we never heard any vehicle noice.
Marcos picked us from airport and gave plenty of information about the city. I will highly recommend this house.

Thanks a lot Marcos, we enjoyed our stay with you very much. Clean appartment, everything we needed was present so no complaints. Also thanks for waiting because we were not on time. I would certainly recommend this appartement!

El departamento es excelente muy completo, con todas la comodidades, la ubicación muy buena, céntrica con todos los medios de transportes que se necesitan, frente al shopping.  Marcos nos recibió muy correctamente y nos esperó dado que el vuelo se atrasó y llegamos tarde. Lo recomiendo

Absolutely amazing week in Barcelona!  This was our first airbnb experience and Marcos definitely set high expectations for future hosts!  He met us the first day and spent two hours reviewing the area and the tourist attractions. He even brought us some basic groceries since the market was closed on Sunday! He was easily accessible during the week to answer any questions.  The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed (kitchen supplies, laundry detergent, huge fridge, iron). The apartment is very close to a large shopping mall and a 10 min walk to public transport. I would definitely recommend this place to family and friends!!

We had a fantastic time in Barcelona and loved Marcos' flat. He was very friendly - even met us at the train station to walk us to the apartment. The unit was very clean, exactly as advertised, and well equipped. Marcos was easy to work with and very quick to respond to our questions. We highly recommend!

Super contento por la amabilidad y disponibilidad mostrada en todo momento
por el anfitrión Marcos, les recomiendo el apartamento, comodo, limpio y muy cerca a todo lo que necesitas para pasarla bien en Barcelona. El apartamento es tal y cual como en las fotografias!

Marcos was nice enough to meet us at the R2 train station (direct route from the BCN airport) which is a few minutes away walk. The apartment was good as per the description. It had everything you need for a comfortable stay. Bus and tram stations in front of the apt. building. Carefour and shopping center across the street. Very convenient. The host provided directions to all the major attractions and other interesting things to do.
Overall I am satisfied.

It was a very nice stay at Marcos apartment. First of all it was super welcome and everything else was just fine. The place, photos, neighborhood was just as mentioned in description. We even had some games on Wii :)

We had a wonderful trip to Barcelona thanks to Marcos and his lovely apartment. Marcos provided us with loads of information before our visit and made sure we were arrived and settled in. Fina (Marcos' Wife) was even kind enough to pick us up from the Train Station. The apartment was exactly as described, very spacious with all the amenities you could need for your trip. The location was very handy for being a tourist. There are 2 metro stations nearby and the Glories Shopping center was convenient for groceries and a quick coffee. We mostly used the metro as we had a 6 year old with us but the beach and town are a 25 minute walk from the apartment on tree-lined streets. If you want to see all of Barcelona with the comforts of home then I would recommend Marcos' flat.

marcos was an excellent host!  he communicated with us during the planning phase of our trip very well.  he provided a lot of information to make our trip enjoyable, comfortable, and safe.  he is very thorough and professional.  his home was well-equipped and clean.  the wifi signal was strong and reliable.  the shower had good pressure and was warm.  he provided us with coffee, milk, and muffins for breakfast.  marcos even offered to pick us up from the train station.  the location was conveniently accross the street from a shopping center with a starbucks!  we give the place our highest recommendation and on our return trip to barcelona will highly consider staying here again.

Marcosˊs department is very cozy located in a nice and quiet area. Space is perfect for 4. Traffic is convenient, can take a railway directly from airport and easy to go to most tourist sites.  And there is a market around, easy to get food and fruits. 

Marcos is a super nice guy. One member in our group lost his bag in railway the day we left Barcelona and we urgently request another night to stay. Marcos has been waiting long till late in midnight for my friend whose phone is out of power. He also recommended some good restaurants for us. It is a very nice stay in Marcoˊs apartment in Barcelona. I will definitely book it again when I back to Barcelona.

We spent a wonderful time in Barcelona! Marcos provided us with lots of helpful information, including direction to his apartment. His apartment is well-equipped and exactly as described. The location is convenient to get the shopping center  across the road. There are public transports like bus, metro and tram just several minutes walk. I would recommend this apartment!

E' stata una bella vacanza, la casa si trova in una zona tranquilla con la metro a pochi metri. Marcos e' una persona molto ospitale e ci ha dato tanti consigli su locali e ristoranti.  La casa era pulita e dotata di tutti i comfort. Consiglio a tutti se volete visitare Barcellona  di prenotare questo  appartamento.

The host is the kindest I have met in all my life! He bought something for our breakfast! Marcos said ours important information about transport, city life, disco, market, restaurant.

The flat is very nice, confortable, and there is a lot of light in every room.
In front of the flat there is a supermarket to buy everything.

The neighborhood is fool of beautiful public space, modern architecture, wonderful buindings.
Underground is near the flat and you can spend only 5 minutes by walk to use it.

I love Barcelona! I'll come back for a more long holiday than three days!

Bye bye

Flat is at a great location viewing Agbar tower, and close to the Encants Vells (a flea market which is the biggest of its kind in Barcelona) and the Meseu del Disseny (desing museum). Opposite the appartment is a large shopping centre housing a Carrefour supermarket, and a selection of restauraunts and shops. The appartment can be reached via train from Barcelona airport to Clot trainstation in about half an hour, from there it is just 7 minute walk. Glories metrostation an tram stops are all in walking distance.

Marcos is an excellent host, he waited for us at the trainstation to take us to the appartment, even brought us some groceries as we arrived on a sunday, and was kind to answer all our questions and provided useful information for us to enjoy the great city of Barcelona!

Olá! Escrevo para testemunhar a ótima atenção dispensada a mim pelo anfitrião Marcos. Informações solicitadas foram prestadas com exatidão e celeridade. O horário de chegada foi impecável. O apartamento é ótimo (split, wifi, roupas de cama e toalhas). Deixou-nos itens essenciais para prepararmos as refeições e até mesmo para o café da manhã do dia seguinte. Welton

Marcos met us at train station and walked with us to the apartment. The apartment faces the main street and very close to a shopping center which is very convenient to us. Then he explained everything of the apartment which helped us a lot. We had very good time in Barcelona.

El piso queda en frente al centro comercial Las Glorias, pese a estar ubicado en una gran avenida no se escucha ningún ruido. Muy amplio y cómodo. No sólo que hay una gran televisión en el salón, sino que además tiene conectada una Wii, que fue el deleite de mis hijas por las noches. Muy limpio, excelente y Marcos, un anfitrión insuperable! Nos esperó en la estación del bus y nos dio un pequeño 'city tour' camino a casa. Una experiencia fantástica. Lo recomendamos muchísimo.

We zijn prima ontvangen. Er was een welkomstpakket koffie/thee/cakejes. Alles werd netjes uitgelegd. metro en omgeving.
Top locatie. Dichtbij winkels, bus, metro.
Buurt netjes. 
Appartement helemaal goed.

Pasamos 5 hermosos días en la Barcelona junto con mi esposa y nuestra hija. Fuimos afortunados al alojarnos en el departamento de Marcos, una unidad confortable, impecable por donde se la mire y que cuenta con todos los elementos y equipamiento que el viajero puede necesitar aunque su estadía sea prolongada. Es amplio, tal como se ve en las fotos y muy luminosos. Está ubicado en una zona moderna de la ciudad, vecino a un importante centro comercial, con fácil acceso a todo tipo de transportes. Quien desee recorrer los alrededores encontrará numerosos parques, mercados, ferias, centros culturales y corredores turísticos. Según hacia donde camine en poco tiempo llegará a la playa o a la Sagrada Familia y a paso encontrará puntos de interés.
Marcos ha sido un gran anfitrión, nos recibió personalmente, nos contó acerca de lo que podríamos encontrar en esa fantástica ciudad, nos entregó folletos y mapas y, por si esto fuera poco se ocupó de proveer la heladera y la alacena con bebidas y alimentos para facilitar nuestros desayunos. Además estuvo siempre atento a lo que pudiéramos necesitar, aunque creo que no le dimos mucho trabajo en ese sentido. 
Que decir de Barcelona. Un lugar que merece conocerse. Los catalanes muestran con orgullo un valioso patrimonio cultural, que preservan mientras hacen crecer a diario una nueva ciudad, como si continuaran caminos marcados por los grandes arquitectos y diseñadores que por allí pasaron.

Marcos fue un anfitrión perfecto. ¡Tuvo el detalle de dejarnos hasta desayuno! Muy simpático y a la vez claro y directo, la persona ideal con la que hacer un trato. 

Fuimos 5 personas y no nos faltó de nada. La casa limpísima, muy cómoda y bien comunicada.

Marcos was very helpful and welcoming to our family when we stayed in his apartment in Barcelona.  He went out of his way to make sure we had all the information about the city, transport, and the sights and restaurants. He made us feel at home and had everything you needed to feel comfortable.  Any questions we had, he was able to answer within minutes of us sending a message on Airbnb. The area was great, especially since it was in close proximity to the shopping center where you could easily get groceries and other necessities. It was also easy to get around due to the fact that the metro, tram and buses were all within walking distance. One day we even walked down to the beach. The apartment easily fit 5 of us and we all had our own space and place to rest and relax. We would definitely stay here again on our next trip to Barcelona!

Marcos - замечательный, коммуникабельный и отзывчивый. До приезда выслал на почту все схемы и карты Барселоны. Квартира находиться в расположении удобной транспортной схемы, напротив дома большой торговый цент, фотографии соответствуют действительности. Все прошло превосходно! Спасибо за все!!!

Marcos is simply the perfect host!He is hospitable, positive, calm, always smiling, very careful driver and ready to help his guests in every respect 24/7!As per our request he met us at the airport on arrival and drove us back to the airport on departure with his own perfectly clean car for a reasonable and lower than taxi price although both times it was around midnight.We were with two kids and a lot of luggage so this was very helpful and made us feel calm.He also agreed for a late check-out at 20:00 hrs as our flight was at 23:00 hrs which gave us another day in beautiful Barcelona.Prior to our arrival Marcos e-mailed a lot of useful various information about cultural landmarks, restaurants, shopping, sightseeing, maps, prices etc. and gave us helpful advices. Generaly, he provided piece of mind and the feeling that someone will help us in any need we may have during our stay.His apartment is exactly as described in his profile.In addition there were plenty of extra towels, bed linnen, blankets and different size pillows,table covers,soap,shampoo,airfresheners...etc.Marcos had supplied milk, coffee, tea and croissants for our midnight arrival.We requested and he provided without extra charge beach towels and a portable parasole to use in aquaparks or on the beach.The apartment is very conveniently located - a shopping mall across the street, a park and a fruit&vegetable market behind the block, two underground stations in just 2-3 minutes walking and lots of small shops, restaurants, cafes and bakeries very close around.There is also a public paid parking next to the mall where we kept our (Website hidden by Airbnb) Agbar and Glories shopping mall are recognizable points for all taxi drivers or locals you may ask to help with directions. The apartment is spacious, clean and well (Website hidden by Airbnb) has everything a guest may need plus a Wii console which our kids enjoyed a lot while we were drinking slowly our morning coffee or evening wine!This very good accommodation gave us opportunity to enjoy Barcelona itself and its numerous attractions during our 9 days stay.We all thank you, Marcos, with all our hearts for your freindly attitude and wish you a busy summer season! Clearly, we highly recommend Marcos's apartment to those who look for a perfect host with a conveniently located 3 bedrooms spacious apartment and a very good value for money!

Marcos était très gentil et accueillant. Il répondait rapidement à nos questions et nous a donné beaucoup d'informations utiles. 
Son appartement correspond exactement à la description: spacieux, propre, bien équipé et insonorisé. Il est situé dans un quartier sécuritaire, bien éclairé, près des transports publics (métro, tram et train) avec un centre commercial (grand supermarché, boutiques, restaurants...) juste en face. 
C'est définivement une adresse à recommender pour un super séjour à Barcelone.

Marcos was kind helpful landlord who was always available for advices or further information. 
The apartment was clean and very well equipped ( especially the kitchen)

Additionally than "just" a very nice, super clean,comfortable and charming  place to stay, my family where extremely happy with Marcos as host. He always showed his cooperative and cool attitude for them to feel comfortable in his place . As its was their first time in Barcelona he did not save any effort in having provide them with the best advises and recommendations. I would strongly recommend you to chose Marcos' flat if you want to have an excellent stay in lovely Barcelona!

Marcos war immer sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit und das Appartement ist sehr gut ausgestattet und sauber. In  der Nähe ist eine Tramhaltestelle sowie ein Einkaufszentrum und Restaurants. Wir sind alle sehr zufrieden und haben nichts was wir bemängeln könnten! :)

Nous avons passé une excellente semaine à Barcelone. Marcos est un hôte très accueillant et sympathique, prêt à vous aider à découvrir cette ville magnifique. Il a toujours répondu rapidement à nos messages avant la réservation et pendant la durée du séjour. Petit bonus, il fournit une multitude de bons plans pour visiter les lieux touristiques de la ville.
L'appartement est très spacieux, bien équipé et situé dans un quartier calme (15 minutes de la Rambla en vélo) mais à proximité d'un grand centre commercial ainsi que des transports en commun. Bref, je recommande 10/10!

El anfitrión nos hizo sentir muy cómodos, ya que nos entregó las llaves del departamento, firmamos la documentación de la estadía y luego nos dejó toda la libertad para manejarnos con el departamento. Además tuvo la atención de brindarnos todos los elementos para el primer desayuno. La descripción del anuncio era correcta, era tal y como se muestra en las fotografías. El barrio era muy tranquilo y bien ubicado.

This place is incredible we stayed here for 4 nights and wish we stayed longer. Apartment is beautiful, clean and functional. Wi Fi was very fast. Location is very good too,  across the road from large shopping centre, 2 train stops only 5 min walk each (3-4 stops to city centre). Beds were comfortable, air conditioning is a life saver abd also who enjoys cooking on holidays kitchen is very equipped and functional. Marcos was very helpful and professional, kept contact all the time prior to arrival then came to meet us at train station and checked us in. He explained everything very well (surrounding areas, where to eat, what to do.) Highly recommended place to stay, we are looking forwardto visit Barcelona again and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

Accueillis très gentil, maison comme sur les photos très propre, avec cuisine bien équipé.  
L'hôte répond très vite aux mails ce qui est vraiment positif. 
 
Lors de notre arrivé ils nous ont bien expliqué les fonctionnalités de l'appartement quelques conseils pour le métro, des endroits à visités et faire attention à ces affaires. Il a était vraiment attentionné en nous laissant dans la cuisine du lait, des madeleines, des biscuits, ainsi que des céréales, ça nous a fait vraiment plaisir. 

Pendant mon séjour j'ai eu un petit soucis au pied, je l'ai contacter il s'est déplacer à l'appartement sans hésitation pour m'emmener à l'hôpital, j'en suis vraiment reconnaissante ! Il a du tout traduire pour moi et m'a accompagner toute l'après midi.

Le séjour s'est très bien passer sinon, rien a dire, et le fait qu'il y a le centre commercial Glories juste en face c'est vraiment un point fort, très pratique et surtout les transport qui sont pas loin du tout ( tramway , metro ).

Voilà que du positif, nous avons été vraiment satisfait si c'était à refaire on reprendrait le même appartement !

Marcos was a truly wonderful host! We chose his apartment as his reviews were brilliant and when we got there we were never dissapointed. Before we arrived Marcos was in regular contact to ensure everything went smoothly and sent us information about Barcelona so we could plan our stay. The apartment itself was in pristine condition, it was like we just landed at a top hotel! Marcos was waiting outside the apartment when we arrived and told us everything we need to know about Barcelona. He was always on the end of the phone in case we needed anything and to be honest we were absolutely amazed by his friendly, professional and caring approach. He even had the kitchen stocked with some basics such as milk, tea, bread and washing up liquid which meant we could arrive stress free!

The location and apartment is perfect! Located near Glories stop (very central), near amenities and only a short walk from the beach! It has everything you need!

There are a lot of apartments available but I would highly recommend you do not need to look any further. I searched many properties to ensure we had a good stay in Barcelona and we couldn't have been happier! Book this apartment and you will have a wonderful stay!

Marcos waren wirklich sehr nett, sie haben uns einige brauchbare Informationen über Metro/Sehenswürdigkeiten/Strand/Bars usw für die ersten Tage in Barcelona geschickt. Die Wohnung war sauber, die Küche war mit alle notwendigen Sachen fürs Kochen ausgestattet, super gute Einkaufsmöglichkeiten gleich vor der Tür. Allerdings zwei Sachen haben uns ziemlich gestört: Alle Fenster gehen auf die Hauptstraße raus und wenn man sie offen lässt wird es ziemlich laut. Balkon ist super schmal und man kann sich leider nicht raussetzen. Ansonsten war alles TOP! Barcelona ist echt schön!
Excelente ubicacion del apartamento, y Marcos fue muy amable con nosotros.

Marcos fue un gran anfitrión. Nos facilitó todo tipo de información sobre Barcelona y nos recogió en la parada de tren. El piso es muy cómodo, aunque tampoco pasamos mucho tiempo en él por el trabajo. Muy bien conectado con los medios de transporte

Marcos' flat is very nice and clean and Marcos himself is a very nice, kind and professional host. His warm hospitality is appreciated. He always followed up the time I would arrive in Barcelona and tried to pick me up at the train station but unfortunately I missed to see him there. Then he came to see at the  me at his flat to give  me the keys and to provide very clear and detailed explanation on how to use almost everything in there. He also walked along with me to show how to get to take the train to the airport. 
Unfortunately, I had to move out of his flat 1 day prior to my plan because there was an unexpected cut of water supply as the authority was fixing the water pipe at the public garden. Marcos came to see me at his flat and sent me off to the hotel via taxi to ensure I arrived there safely. His care to the guest is quite exceptional and very impressive.

C'est un bel apartment bien localisé,  prés de tous les services; centre d'achat, train ,  métro et à distance de marche des sites touristiques importants.   Marcos est un excellent hôte qui a dû composer avec doigté à une panne général de l'alimentation d'eau (immeuble seulement).  Nous avons été pleinement satisfait de notre séjour   à Barcelone,  Marcos à contribuer à cette réussite   Merci beaucoup.

This is a perfect apartment and Marcos is a perfect landlord. We've got a very pleasant experience here in Barcelona. The apartment is big and super clean and contains almost everything you need. The location is very good, you just need to take a few minutes to get to the metro (line 1 and line 2), and just across the street (30 seconds walk) is a big shopping area  with a big Carrefour. Marcos is extremely nice and enthusiastic. He will receive at the train station and prepare the breakfast cakes for the next day. Moreover, He helped us a lot about our tourist and printing our tickets and so on. I will definitely suggest to everyone who wants to visit Barcelona this place.

Wir hatten wunderbare Tage in der Wohnung von Marcos. Er hat uns bei der Ankunft spät abends von der U-Bahn abgeholt und uns zur Wohnung gebracht. Weil wir Samstag abend angekommen sind, hatte er sogar schon für ein Frühstück gesorgt. Wir hatten damit nicht gerechnet und haben uns sehr umsorgt und willkommen gefühlt. Die Wohnung hat alles was man braucht. Es gibt sogar extra Badetücher für den Strand, zusätzliche Kissen und Decken und für die Kinder eine Wii. Marcos war jederzeit für uns erreichbar und hat uns alles wichtige erklärt. Die Straße vor der Wohnung ist laut, im Schlafzimmer gibt es aber doppelte Fenster und so stört die Straße nicht beim Schlafen. Nochmals vielen Dank.

Accueil et suivi de Marcos impeccable, personne accueillante.
Hôte toujours disponible sur (Hidden by Airbnb) , très pratique.

Appartement large, convient pour plusieurs personnes a voir avec l'hôte la capacité totale. Confort et services inclus parfait. Cuisine entièrement équipée

Proche d'un centre commercial "les Glories", proche de plage en bus 92 ou en tram L4.

Point négatif: le séjour et la chambre double donnent sur une grande avenue assez bruyante. Double vitrage mal insonorisé.
Appartement moderne et très fonctionnel, près de la place Glories où il y a tous les transports en commun, et du quartier Clot, plein de charme, à découvrir !

Excelente elección. Nos espero Fina, la mujer de Marcos en la estación de tren y caminamos al departamento. Nos dejaron algunas cosas para comer y beber. Es ideal para una familia con chicos. Muy confortable. Todo lo necesario para una estadía placentera. El supermercado enfrente es un lujo. Muy buena ubicación.
Great place and host! Marcos's attention to detail is unprecedented

Je suis partie passer le week-end dernier à Barcelone avec mes parents et mon frère. Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Fina, la femme de Marcos qui est venue nous chercher à la station de métro le jour de notre arrivée. Logement très propre, bien insonorisé, idéal lorsque l'on part à plusieurs et idéalement situé pour visiter Barcelone. Marcos et sa femme sont très sympathiques et se rendent disponibles en cas de besoin. 
Nous avons fortement apprécié notre week-end à Barcelone et nous remercions vivement Marcos et Fina !! :)
Appartement bien équipé, d'une propreté remarquable et bien situé (300m du métro ou tram). Marcos est accueillant et disponible. En résumé, une bonne adresse sur Barcelone.

Absolutely best Airbnb experience I've had so far.

The apartment is conveniently located, with the metro just a few minutes by foot, and walking to the Sagrada Familia is reasonably close.

The apartment turned out exactly as described and as depicted in the photos. The kitchen was well equipped, including induction stoves, a large oven and a huge modern fridge. WiFi worked without a hitch and was very fast. It was nice to have a full HD smart TV with a Wii as well.

The location and apartment aside, Marcos is absolutely the best host I have ever met. Right after my booking was confirmed, he sent me various useful documents to help me find my way around Barcelona. On top of that, Marcos made the effort to communicate with me during the days leading up to my arrival, ensuring that I knew what transportation to take. During the stay, Marcos would call me immediately after I ask him about things such as how to operate the water heater.

In short, if Airbnb decides to give awards to outstanding hosts, Marcos would easily make the top 5 in the world. Take my word for it, you will not regret your stay at Marcos' apartment.

Because of some problem of our flights and we were late arriving Barcelona and what impressed me a lot is Marcos and his wife were waiting us for 5 hours more at the flat and they had prepared some foods for us. The flat is quite nice and clean and big. Good wifi condition and wii TV game is provided as well. Area around the flat is peaceful and safety and it is convenient to go to other places of the city. Specially recommending it for a family or 4 people for living.

Marcos is very friendly host and he provided a lot of the tourist information for us. The house is nice with almost everything we need include high speed network, washing machine, big oven etc (even with video games) and it is quite near to metro station (about 5 mins walk). It is one of my best Airbnb experience!
Situación excelente, con muchas facilidades para acceder al metro. Cercano a la sagrada familia y muy buen trato del propietario. Confort y buena calidad. Me encantaría volver.

Comfortable, spacious clean flat. Nice and central and very close to both the subway and amenities. Very well equipped. Marcos was a very hospitable host making the stay there hassle free.  He met us late at night on our arrival to make sure we arrived safely and made us feel very welcome. A great base from which to visit Barcelona - you can walk from the flat to la Sagrada Familia.

Un grand merci à Marcos et sa femme qui nous ont très bien accueilli .Marcos est personnellement venu nous chercher , ce que j'ai beaucoup apprécié. L'appartement est très bien situé et surtout très propre. On s'y sent vite à l'aise. Le centre commercial très proche permet de faire quelques courses rapidement . Tout était parfait, seul tout petit bémol, pour les couches tôt , on entend un peu les voitures sur la rue et les voisins . Nous avons passé un séjour inoubliable à Barcelone.

Appartement tout à fait identique au descriptif. Spacieux, idéal en famille. 
Très bien situé, station de métro juste à côté qui permet de nous rendre partout très facilement. Très pratique quand on vient de l'aéroport!
Centre commercial juste en face, parfait pour faire des courses!
Marcos est un hôte très attentioné. Il n'a pas pu être là à notre arrivée mais il a tout arrangé pour qu'une amie nous accueille.
Super rapide pour répondre aux messages et facilite vraiment l'organisation  du voyage en envoyant plein d'infos.
Je recommande!!!

Great accommodation. Flat was nice and clean, exactly as presented online. Unfortunately, we didn't meet with Marcos, but had a contact with him during our stay. 
His friend welcomed and showed us around the flat. Recommend this place!

Marcos' flat is amazing! It is very spacious and is situated in a very good neighborhood, right in front of the Shopping Mall with many nice restaurants. Marcos was very helpful during our stay ad helped us with locations and public transport. I highly recommend to book this listing.

Local de fácil acesso, metro muito próximo. Shopping e mercado bem na frente, basta atravessar a rua. O apartamento é condizente com o anúncio e cumpriu a finalidade, sendo ideal para 4 pessoas, podendo atender até 6 pessoas. O anfitrião foi sempre atencioso para sanar nossas dúvidas e atender aos pedidos. Recomendo o lugar.

일단, 집의 위치가 매우 좋았습니다. 지하철역에서 가까왔고, 시내에서도 가까와서 이동이 편리하였습니다. 또한 바로 앞에 까르푸라는 대형마트가 있어서 식품 등을 구입하기에 매우 편리하였습니다. 
집 주인은 친절하였고 처음 집으로 들어가는데 어려움이 없었습니다. 메세지와 전화로 주기적으로 불편함이 없느지 확인하여 주었습니다.
집 안은 비교적 깔끔하였고, 3명이 지내는 데 별 불편은 없었습니다. 매우 만족합니다.

Great location, great host. Marcos was available for us all the time. Apartment as described, everything availabe from kitchen to bathroom. We had a great F1 weekend and major part of was the location as well Marcos the host.

We had a great time in Barcelona! Marcos's friend took care of meeting us in front of the apartment and checking us in. Well-stocked, comfortable, and spacious apartment. Reliable WiFi and good washing machine. Only 2 floors upstairs but there is a roomy elevator if needed. Location is nice - close to the quaint Mercado de Clot and a park that has a lot of locals in the evenings. Also conveniently close to La Sagrada Familia, metro stops, and the R2 train that takes 30 minutes and about 4 euro to the airport. Only issues were there was a lot of construction going on in front while we were there (May 2016) and one of the neighbors had a fussy baby. Great sound insulation from the street but not as much from the neighbors. You might want earplugs.

The experience with this host and flat was great! The location was great, clean and as described! We were greeted warmly and received great information about local attractions. This flat is minutes walking away from the metro stop which allows for easy navigation. The host was very responsive to any questions. I would highly recommend this host and flat to anyone traveling in this area.

We stayed at Marcos' place for Primavera sound festival and it was a handy location for getting to the Forum venue - the trams were on all night so very convenient. We were a group of 5 so used a sofa bed in the lounge, which worked well as it had its own door. The flat is really well equipped which was great for a six night stay - there are even beach towels! It was really good value for the convenience of the location - 20 minute walk to the sagrada familia and to the main park in the centre - and 3 bedrooms. Marcos was really helpful and communicative before and during out stay. Thank you!

A great stay. Marcos was an excellent host and was helpful and informative straight after making my Booking a few months ago. He was flexible and able to support an earlier check-in on our arrival say. Clean and sturdy apartment. Great location and local amenities. It was a good place to stay for a relaxing break in Barcelona with friends.
Todo la descripcion era corrects apartamento super comodo en un lugar excelente

Fantastic apartment for me and a group of friends having their grad trip in Barcelona. Nearly everything is in walking distance, if not, then a metro station is literally 5 minutes away.

Inside the apartment, we didn't have any issues with warm water for showers or internet speed. Marcos provides towels and other bathroom necessities (even beach towels). The only thing that would've been convenient is if there were a coffee table at the couch area.

In all, you should definitely chose this apartment. Thanks Marcos.

We enjoyed our stay at Marco's, the flat is nice and cozy, clean and well equipped. The location is great, closely located to all public transportation and even hop-on/off bus which is a block away. Idle for visiting Barcelona and feeling like a local. Marco's is the kind of host that would go the extra mile for you; answers any questions, gives recommendations, directions, and whatnot. Check-in/out was smooth. Very recommended if visiting Barcelona.

Um apartamento muito bem localizado e de ótimo tamanho. Próximo a 2 estações de metro e de um centro comercial com lojas e um Carrefour.
Marcos e sua esposa, extremamente atenciosos com informações e dicas! Sempre prontos a ajudar.

Marcos did everything he could to enable a greate stay for us. Almost a month ahead of our trip, he set up a Dropbox folder with key information about the city, and and answered every question we had. Beyond that, the city of Barcelona did the rest... Few places have such combination of history, architecture, beaches, food, etc.

Super nice flat. Around 10 minutes from the beach. 10 minutes from a big market away. Really good place.
Just a little bit hot inside when the air condition isnt on. But thats normal in barcelona during the summer. (:
Accurate description, clean tidy and convenient location to all major destinations of interest.
Parfait pour l accueil

A nossa estadia foi ótima! O Marcos foi sempre muito atencioso, sempre respondendo nossas dúvidas muito rapidamente! Apartamento bem equipado, completo! Limpeza excelente! Localização razoável.... Próximo a estações de metrô, porém um pouco distante da praia e da Sagrada Família (mais próximo da Sagrada Família do que da praia) 
Recomendamos muito este local!!!!

Marcos house was amazing just as described in the pictures and the post! Location was very central and just 5 mins away from the metro station so travelling wasnt a hassle.. Marcos is a perfect host, extremely flexible and patient as he went an extra mile to facilitate our late checkin when our flight got delayed.. He was in constant touch to make sure we reached safely and was so caring that he even kept milk and cookies for us since we reached very late at night (around midnight). Hands down, I am staying at his place whenever I am in barcelona next and would recommend you the same as well! Thankyou so much Marcos for all the hospitality and warmth!

me and my friends had a wonderful time Marcos was a wonderful host before we arrived and until we had to check out we didn't meet Marcos face to face but we met his wife when we arrived nice kind lady gave us a tour of the place and if we needed anything we could just give them a call

Excelente departamento, muy amplio y comodos sofa cama. Fuimos una familia con 3 niños y estuvimos muy comodos. Las fotos son reales. Queda cerca de dos lineas de metro que te llevan al aeropuerto y a varios puntos de interés de la ciudad. Marco fue muy amable con nosotros. Recomiendo este alojamiento al 100%

Esperienza davvero positiva! Marcos è stato molto gentile sia prima che durante il nostro soggiorno: sempre disponibile in caso di problemi e per accordarci sugli orari di check-in e check-out. Inoltre ci ha dato diversi consigli su come muoversi in città, su luoghi da visitare, locali, ristoranti etc. L'appartamento è come descritto nell'annuncio, pulito e dotato di tutti i comfort. Situato in una zona tranquilla di fronte al supermercato Carrefour, a 5 minuti a piedi dalle fermate di Glories e Clot da dove è possibile raggiungere comodamente ogni zona della città (metro, tram, treno). Molto comodo anche l'arrivo dall'aeroporto (30 minuti in treno dal terminal 2 alla fermata Clot). Insomma appartamento consigliatissimo per visitare Barcellona!
Ottimo alloggio vicino al centro. Molto pratico consigliato!

We were met with the host at the apartment, which was as described. Great space with easy convenience - about 20 min walk to Sagrada Familia and 10 min to the beach. Enjoyed the wii in the apartment, and the beach towels for time at the beach. Would recommend!

Estuvimos en el apartamento de Marcos y nos sentimos en casa.... es agradable, tranquilo, seguro, limpio, en una zona perfecta para vivir en Barcelona.  Esperamos ue cuando volvamos, Marcos, su apartamento, y Nuria, nos reciban de nuevo.

Our stay at Marcos' flat was very pleasant. The description and the pictures were accurate. Everything went smoothly from our arrival to our departure. All appliances were working properly. It was also easy to familiarize yourself with the area. I will definitely recommend staying in Marcos' flat.

Fantastic apartment, a very central location near to the beaches as well as a short walk to Sagrada Familia and easy links to the rest of the city via the metro. Marcos and his wife were so accommodating and met us at the station when we arrived to show us to the apartment. Marcos even went out of his way to come and help us when we were having trouble with the keys to the door (there was nothing wrong with door, just us not knowing how to use it!! Thank you Marcos!) We had an amazing time exploring Barcelona and would thoroughly recommend staying here to anyone else who is looking for a central, convenient place to stay with lovely, accommodating hosts. Thanks again!

fabulous location, close to Metro links and train station, as well as the tram which runs in this area.  It is a little out of the central part of the city, but we prefer this, as we prefer to be living amongst locals than tourists.  Marcos arranged for someone to meet us at the nearest train station, and walk us to the apartment, and was always on hand by mobile phone to ask questions.  We walked into the centre of the city several times .. it took about 45 minutes.  We walked to Port Forum in the north, which took about the same time.  At Port Forum there is a huge Decathlon store, but also a lovely restaurant on the marina front called Port Nautic where we had a fabulous Menu del Dia. Transport is cheap (one euro per trip per person) so we jumped on and off the Metro and tram regularly to get about.  Opposite the flat is a shopping centre, with supermarket which is very handy. My children loved the crepe / gelateria shop on the ground floor, and the lady there was very friendly.    We found a friendly bar in Pueblo Nou, just 10 minutes walk from the flat, which also served food.  The name is Brisas sin Prisa.  It is on the main Rambla, which is a lovely walk, particularly on an evening.  There is a really funny waiter there called Osam and he made us feel very welcome.  Barcelona is a wonderful city, very walkable, with lots to see and do, for all ages.  Our boys (12 and 13) loved the young feel of the city, and particularly enjoyed visiting Camp Nou to watch the Barca / Grenada match.  We stayed 5 nights and we really felt this was the right length of time.
La casa era comoda, si se ajustaba a las fotos la casa
Un placer habernos hospedado ahi, lo disfrutamos mucho, Marcos muy amable y muy buen anfitrion en todo momento. Altamente recomendado

Marcos es un otimo anfitrión. Nos ha ayudado con todo lo que necesitabamos y siempre muy pronto.
Hemos tenido un problemo e el nos ha ayudado a solucionarlo mismo en dia de fiesta con derecho a un recorrido por Barcelona. El piso es muy amplio y guay. Recomiendo a todos.

Marcos is a great host. Helped us with all i needed and always available to help us quickly.
We had a little problem and he solve really quickly even it was holiday, Also showed us some really nice places around barcelona.
the apartment is great and spacious.
Highly recommended.

Marcos é um otimo anfitriao. Nos ajudou com tudo que precisavamos e sempre muito rapido. 
Tivemos um pequeno problema e ele nos ajudou a resolve-lo rapidamente, mesmo em um dia de feriado, e ainda nos levou para conhecer alguns lugares de Barcelona.
O apartamento é otimo e bem amplo.
Extremamente recomendado.

This place is awesome. We felt like millionaires in the huge apartment. It is larger than most apartments in Barcelona and is bigger in person than how it looks in the pictures. The living room was great for relaxing and watching TV or playing the Nintendo Wii they provide. The home heater is great. Did I mention they are literally right across the street from a mall!!! Yes. Just cross the street and you have a big mall with a Carrefour (similar to Walmart Supercenter), restaurants, etc... There are also mini-markets downstairs open till 1 and 2 AM. Metro station is just 2 blocks away and service runs every 2 minutes. Not kidding. We were able to visit family and get to all the tourist destinations in minutes. Stayed there for quite a few days and I really wouldn't stay anywhere else. You will not regret it! We loved it!

5 of us from Scotland stayed in Marcos's apartment for a long weekend in February and we couldn't have asked for more. Incredible value for money, very close to the Metro, and a lovely, comfortable apartment.

Great spacious flats in a very good location with two metro stations just 5 minutes walk away. Marcos and his wife were amazing hosts and looked after us very well. The flat itself was very clean with all amenities you could need as guests. Will certainly be in touch when I go to Barcelona again.

El apartamento de Marcos es genial para una estancia en Barcelona. Nosotros fuimos dos adultos y un niño de 4 años. El apartamento es súper cómodo, las fotos publicadas son un reflejo perfecto de la realidad. Frente hay un nuevo paseo comercial con muchos locales comerciales y hasta un Carrefour muy grande. Hay estacionamiento a unos 100mts para los que tengan auto, la estación de subte que a 150/200 mts que los deja en 4 estaciones en Plaza Cataluña en pleno centro. También a unos 100 mts está el tranvía que los acerca también en 4 estaciones al zoo y la playa es perfecto. 
Estuvimos en febrero con tiempo algo fresco sobre todo por la noche pero el apartamento está perfectamente calefaccionado, con radiadores en todos los ambientes. 
Un lugar ideal para recorrer Barcelona y los alrededores y estar muy bien conectado.

Es un departamento cómodo, limpio y equipado. Marcos muy amable, nos recibió al horario que llegamos (00hs) y no tuvimos problema con nada.
Lo recomiendo!!

L'appartement est très bien situé, la station de métro, le tramway et l'autobus juste à côté, nous ont permis de nous déplacer très facilement. Avant notre arrivée, Marcos nous a partagé plusieurs documents qui ont été très pratique. Je recommande.

This is a great apartment with lots of space and easy to access via public Transit. It is a bit outside of the city center, but it is a quick few stops in. The kitchen is big with lots of room. The master bedroom is great with a comfy bed, and the living room has two great futons for extra sleeping. The two small bedrooms are fairly compact, but they definitely work...especially for kids.

Marcos is really easy to work with and he made the check-in and check-out process very simple! We had a great stay and we would stay with him again!

Милая квартира , через дорогу торговый центр и рядом маленькие магазины )все что необходимо реально найти вблизи . Метро находится в минутах 10-15 ходьбы . 

Eine nette saubere Wohnung :) sieht genau so wie auf den Bildern aus :) u-Bahn ist in 10-15 mi erreichbar:) 
Weiter empfehlen

Appartement très fonctionnel et très bien situé pour circuler partout dans Barcelone en tram, bus et métro. 
Nous avons été très bien accueillis et les 3 chambres nous ont toutes tout à fait convenu. Tout le nécessaire est prévu, les lits et la literie sont très confortables. 
Merci pour ce séjour.

A lovely, bright and clean apartment. Easy to get around and close to amenities and transport links. We are a family of four and had plenty of space and slept soundly in the very comfortable beds. Hopefully we will be back!
Marcos e Nuria sono proprietari cortesi e precisi. Abbiamo passato un piacevole soggiorno in questo appartamento,  vicino alla metro e al mercato coperto del Clot.
The apartment was exactly as described, very spacious and clean. Nuria met us at the apartment to hand over keys and was very welcoming. We would definitely stay here again

The apartment was great! Very clean and comfortable. It was located very close to a couple train stations which was very convenient. We prefer to walk to the different spots in the city, but with Barcelona being so large, it was nice to be able to take the metro back and only have to travel a few minutes from the station.

Real Super Host!!! Very clean, big, cosy flat. Just opposite the Mall. Great non--full-of-tourists district. You live with the lives of the Spanish. Marcos is always in touch, very helpful and full of advice. We are very grateful to him and glad we have chosen his apartment.

Well furnished apartment, close to rail links and Plaça de les Glòries. Area is currently being modernised with a new Shopping Center but is also close to local Ramblas with genuine "Spanish" atmosphere and about 20 mins from the beach

Great place to stay while in Barcelona! The home is furnished well and the pictures display everything you should expect. Marcos was great to communicate with ahead of arrival and they were very accommodating with letting us check in early since our flight came in early. This really helped us with not having to store our luggage elsewhere! It is really close to public transportation, so it is easy to get around to the "main" part of the city- Las Ramblas. Also easy to get to other sites like Sagrada Familia. A nice mall is across the street and there are some restaurants and bars close to the house to grab something if needed.

The flat has a one of the best location to visit Barcelona, near to metro station, central  and a direct connection to airport.
A good wifi internet connection, beds with good mattresses, well-equipped kitchen.  

Marcos was very flexible regarding check-in, check-out time.

Ce logement est parfait et très agréable, nous y étions en famille avec 3 enfants. L'amie de Marcos qui nous a accueilli est très sympa et a répondu à nos questions en français, le top quand on arrive un peu perdus !!  Appart un peu excentré du centre ville mais très bien desservi (accès direct de l'aéroport, métro à proximité....) Le centre commercial est vraiment un plus pour qq courses de dernières minutes en fin de journée.
Juste si je devais refaire, je réserverais le bus touristique rouge car arrêt tout proche de Glories contrairement au bleu (Official BUS turistic).
Marcos est très disponible et nous aide à préparer notre voyage parfaitement avec tous les documents qu'il fournit d'avance.
Très bons souvenirs de Barcelone !
A very nice host ,the home is clean and comfort for family travel.
Nice apartment, clean and well equipped. The host was accommodating. The location is good, not too far from the center or the beach, and with a commercial center just across the street.
El apartamento resultó comodo y bien equipado, lo que nos permitió una estadía placentera. La ubicación muy buena.  La recepción fue muy cordial y nos asistió hasta nuestra partida

The appartment is conveniently located: 5 minuntes to the metro station Glories, 20 minutes to Sagrada Familia and around 30 minutes to the beach by foot. We often took a taxi to the beach and we payed around 5 Euro. The appartment is large and cosy and the kitchen well equiped. Wifi worked very good and we even had towels for the beach. We were able to check-in late (around 10 pm) and we were welcomed very warm and received all the necessary information.  Very good price / performance ratio. We had a great time in the appartment :) Thank you!
Nice place very good situated. The Houston was very helpful with any matters..
Fue una estancia muy agradable, muy queridos y atentos! Una excelente ubicación!

Marcos' place is well located near a park, lovely local restaurants, a shopping centre, metros and a train station. We where 5 people, and we had a lovely stay. The communication with Marcos was quick and easy, he inspired confidence right from when we made the enquiry. He sent us an information pack with detailed information about the area and how to get there from the airport. The flat has air-conditioning and wifi. Well recommended!

En una palabra- FANTÁSTICO, hay todo en el piso y la comunicación fue muy bien. Thank you so much! Quiero visitar otro vez en el futuro, 10/10 recommend
I really recommend this place, great location too
Appartement fonctionnel bien situé. Proche des plages et du centre ville. Accueil très sympathique et efficace !
Logement à proximité de tout les transports publics, centre commerciale pratique pour faire ces courses. Accueil agréable et appartement propre et équipée !
Très bon séjour, la climatisation fait vraiment la différence, la communication est facile(l'accueil est fait en français).

A great flat - spacious, super clean and very comfortable also with air conditioning. The flat was  in a very convenient location to the metro and quick to get in to sight see attractions. We would definitely recommend for a family holiday.

The flat is in a good location, near the metro and just across the street from a shopping centre. We walked to the Segrada Familia in about 30 minutes. The design museum is very nearby and has a great cafe. Marcos sent lots of useful information beforehand, and the flat is well equipped. Marcos & Nuria were very friendly & helpful.

Buena ubicación. Si bien no está céntrico, tienes muy cerca paradas de metro, tren y autobús. Con un Centro Comercial cruzando la calle no hay problema para comprar en un supermercado o ir de restaurantes (amplia oferta de tipo de restauración). El apartamento es tal cual las fotografías. No hay sorpresas. Un primer piso con dos ascensores. 

En cuanto al trato por parte de los anfitriones fue perfecto. Se preocuparon desde el primer momento en que nos sintiéramos cómodos y nos aconsejaron correctamente. Un diez para la comunicación y el trato recibido.
Super séjour, appartement très propre, très bien placé, légèrement bruyant mais pour quelques jours on s'accommode, quant à la climatisation un régal!!!
we loved this place.Marcos is vefy helpful .we loved being so close to thee metro and shopping center.

Marcos' and Nurias apartment is in a great location and is an ideal base for exploring Barcelona. 
I cant add much to all the other reviews but can only fully recommend their apartment and would not hesitate to stay there again. 5*

La ubicación es excelente. Tiene justo delante un centro comercial y está muy bien comunicado con toda la ciudad. En cuanto al piso es tal y como se ve en las fotos, acogedor, amplio y muy cuidado y limpio. Muy recomendable.
Fantastic place to stay and good value for money. I would highly reccomend it to everyone. The location is a couple of mins walk from the metro which makes all of Barcelona accessible for all.
The host was always available, friendly and caring. The apartment is well equipped.

Great location, just across the Glories shopping center with many shops and restaurants.  You can see the Glories Tower (Agbar Tower) from the apartment windows, which is very nice especially when it's lit up at night. The apartment has three bedrooms, and a nice sized living room with a sitting dining area.  The main bed is very comfortable, as are the sofas, and the apartment was very clean. The Glories metro station is 3 minutes away,and many bus lines and trams are just outside the building, or across the shopping center one street away. I definitely recommend staying here, and would book again.

Marcos byl skvělý hostitel, mohli jsme se ubytovat dřív než bylo domluveno, kontaktoval nás i během pobytu, zda něco nepotřebujeme. Před příjezdem poslal spoustu potřebných materiálů. Lokalita bytu byla skvělá blízko nákupního střediska, tramvaje, autobusu, metra i centra. Jediné mínus, byt byl na rušné ulice, ale ložnice měla dvojité okna, tak se dalo spát:)
Excelente piso, Nuria y Marcos muy atentos en todo, muy bien comunicado un un barrio lindo y con el mall enfrénte lo cual es otro plus MUY RECOMENDABLE

The place is situated overlooking Gran Via (a busy street) directly across the entrance for Glories mall, which contains a supermarket, restaurants, and retails stores. Since there were 4 of us, we used taxi services to commute in and out of the city center. While the street was very busy, there weren't very many free taxis driving by the place so we needed to use a taxi app to hail one for most rides. If you're planning on using public transportation, the bus and metro stops were close by. The apartment itself was comfortable. The AC was nice to have as it got a little warm while we were there. The full kitchen and washing machine was also useful to us. The main complaint about the room's was the lack of real windows in the smaller rooms. They don't actually let in sunlight. Besides that, we had a nice stay in Barcelona. Thank you Marcos!

Marcos is a great host, very helpful and always available. He sent us detailed informations for everything (about the area, how to get there from the airport, restaurants, what to see, what to do). He was also very flexible regarding check-in, check-out time.
The apartment is very spacious, well equipped and exactly as described. Very comfortable beds and sofas and the apartment was very clean with hot water all the time. Wifi worked very good. The location is great, just across the Glories shopping center and accessible to all public transportations in a few minutes.
Fantastic place to stay and good value for money. Definitely recommend staying here and would book again.

Excelentes anfitriones, y muy lindo apto, con todo lo que se necesita para pasarla cómodamente bien.
El trato espectacular, y tiene un Shopping enfrente que facilita muchísimo si quieres hacer cualquier tipo de compras. La ubicación es genial., cercana perfectamente caminable hacia mucho puntos de interés como ramblas, paseo marítimo, barrio gótico, sagrada familia, y cercano a una de las paradas de los bus turísticos.

We loved our stay in Marcos's flat! It was very spacious, with a great bathroom and kitchen. We were greeted at the door of the flat and welcomed graciously. The location was good, with just a 25 minute walk to Sagrada Familia and 30 minute walk to the Gothic Quarter. Marcos also provided a dropbox full of useful documents such as maps and tips for getting around the city. Highly recommend this flat!
Tuvimos un problema con el gas. Pero el anfitrion fue atento para solucionarlo.

El puso tal cual con las especificaciones indicadas por el propietario. Esta ubicado cerca de estaciones de metro y tren. Justo al frente esta un Centro Comercial donde pueden ubicar lo que necesiten. Solo tuvimos un inconveniente con la calefaccion, sin embargo Marcos estuvo muy pendiente y presto para ayudarnos a resolverlo. Gracias por todo Marcos.

La estancia en el apartamento fue inmejorable. De lejos el mejor apartamento en Barcelona de los que he estado. Las fotos son de lo más fiables y el apartamento está tan bien como lo parece.

Marcos fue de lo más atento con nosotros, tanto antes del viaje como durante la estancia. Totalmente recomendable.
Perfect for 3 to 4 people. But som noice from traffic.

A casa e ótima, muito espaçosa e do lado do metro. Não é muito perto do centro, mas de metro e fácil o acesso. Tem um shopping ótimo na frente e um mercado imenso. Marcos foi muito cordial e atencioso.
Close to public transport and shopping centre. A lovely apartment.
El piso está muy bien equipado, es amplio y cómodo y las ventanas de los dormitorios son fantásticas. Una gran experiencia. Realmente ha sido como estar en casa.
It was so convenient place. There is a Mall just cross the road. I like the place.
Moc příjemné ubytování v moderní části města. Super

Centrally located without being surrounded by a tourist district.  Close to the Metro, across the street from a shopping center with a fine supermarket.  Paid parking available a few minutes walk away.  Apartment is well equipped and hosts are helpful and responsive.  Bonus:  20 minute walk to Gaudi's Sagrada Familia.

숙소가 크고 좋습니다. 방 세개에 싱글 침대 각각 한개, 큰 더블침대 한개가 있습니다. 길을 건너면 바로 앞에 아그바 타워와 글로리에스 쇼핑몰, 까르푸가 있어서 매일 쇼핑을 할 수 있습니다. (1분거리) 사그리다 파밀리아 성당과는 꽤 가까워 걸어다닐 수 있습니다.

한큭인들응 위햇 적슙니닼 좍운바앙 두괘는 냄쉬카 마닛 놥뉘닷 아뫄도 촹문울 열쑤업퀘 되엇 잇워서 뇀쇄가 뭐무루는거 같숩니톼 그래쒀 쉬투와 베굇닙을 빨아숴 썼뉸데 솸일만웨 다쉬 냄쉐가 났쑵니돠 그뢔도 큰봥은 깨꿋화고 섬유유연좨 뇀쇄가 놥니돠 거쉴 튀뷔로 위이 궤임을 활쑤있쑵니돠, 좌철역이랑 궐어서 뽜른걸윰으로 쉽뿐 이솽 소요 뒈지뫈 돠닐뫈 홥이당

Apartamento comodo, limpio. Muy gentiles sus dueños. Bien ubicado para moverse en la maravillosa Barcelona.
Experiencia muy positiva.
Appartement très propre, très fonctionnel et bien situé

Marcos’s apartment was great and was in a great location. He even left some cakes for us when we arrived which was a lovely touch. The apartment was directly opposite a group of restaurants and even a supermarket. Was a 40 minute walk to the beach but public transport was very accessible anyway. Even offered a later check out to help with our flight timing. Can’t think of anything to fault with the apartment! Thanks so much!

Excelente departamento. Nos recibió Nuria super atenta y Marcos excelente. Contesta rápidamente a cualquier inquietud, da sugerencias excelentes. El departamento excelente. La limpieza es perfecta. Bien equipado. Nos encantó. Lo recomendamos !
Apartamento compacto e simples. Localização boa, mas muito barulhenta devido a obras no entorno. Nuria foi excelente no tratamento e na recepção, dando as explicações necessárias.
Dpto.  muy comodo, limpio y bien ubicado. Recomendable

Muy comodo apartamento, muy bien ubicado  frente a un centro comercial con todo, buena comunicacion con el resto de la ciudad. Marcos es un anfitrion muu atento a las necesidades. Pasamos unos cuantos dias en familia,  y todo excelente. Sin duda repetiria asique lo recomiendo

Un piso impecable, cómodo para 4 a 6 personas, muy acogedor. Su ubicación es excelente.
Las orientaciones de Marcos y  de Nuria son de gran ayuda para moverse en  Barcelona.
Muchas gracias por todo
Very close to two metro stations as well as shopping and restaurants.  Cozy space that was perfect for our family of four.

It was very nice having Carrefour grocery and  all the shopping and restaurant options right across the street.  
The kitchen is well appointed with everything you need to make meals at home. Also a good size dining table to eat your meals. 
The beds and pillows are very comfortable.  However in the warm summer months, the AC located only in the living area does not cool the bedrooms.  Marcos quickly brought us a fan to help circulate the air as soon as we requested it.  
There is an ample supply of towels/linens which is appreciated and something we did not find to be provided in the other BnB’s in which we stayed in Spain.  Typically one bath towel and  maybe 1 hand towel per person no matter how long your stay. 
If there are more than 2 in your group you will want to alternate showers at night and morning as hot water only lasts for 2 showers in the morning, then you need to wait 15-20 min. Good water pressure though. 
Nice location but felt we were a 15 min cab ride from just about everything we wanted to do, due to traffic and construction in front of our building.   We found it easier to find a cab if we walked through the Glories mall to the far side by Gino’s.  Which by the way makes a great pizza!!
good location, near mall.
A very lovely place with many shops, cafes and spaces for children just across the road :) We enjoyed our stay at Marcos's place!

Appartement fonctionnel et très bien placé pour visiter Barcelone et accéder aux plages et transports. Très bon accueil  en français comme en anglais. Marcos a été très réactif et de bons conseils pour préparer ce voyage.

Lägenheten låg nära två tunnelbanestationer och gick snabbt och  smidigt att ta sig till centrum. Lägenheten ligger även nära ett shoppingcenter med många affärer och uteserveringar.
Lägenheten var ren och fräsch med alla bekvämligheter.
Conforme à nos attentes, vigilant et à l’écoute. Merci pour votre bienveillance.

Marcos is a very nice person, give a lot of advice ,answer very fast
Amazing place to stay, close to monuments, supermarket, metro
apartment was in very good condition 
I really enjoy there. I recommend

The place is way way below average given the amount of money we paid to stay there on our trip to Barcelona.

The AC leaked in the night when we used it and that spread to my suitcase and hand bag and we spent long hours after that to dry them out.

Not great for a 4 people stay since the other rooms are too small and claustrophobic.

The apartment complex was stinking of dog shot and poo and didn't give a great vibe given it is a community housing kind of set up.

The traffic on the main road right outside will ensure you don't get a good night's sleep on your vacationand and was quite  a put off.

Stayed with Air BnBs across many countries across the globe but the first time I've had a way below par experience.
Great place with an amazing view.
Highly recommended.

Ha estado muy bien nuestra estancia. Buenos anfitriones: Marcos y Fina muy atentos. Las fotos reflejan perfectamente cómo es el piso. Enfrente un práctico centro comercial. Metro y cercanías a 5 minutos andando. La Sagrada Familia a menos de 20 minutos andando. Todo genial. Muy recomendable.

Great apartment, exactly as described (the AC does work very well!) - I slept on the sofa bed which was very comfortable and everyone else slept well too. It's located on a busy street, but noise isn't really an issue with thick windows and shutters, but don't expect a quiet coffee on the balcony in the morning. Great location for public transport, and having the shopping centre, with a big Carrefour supermarket opposite is perfect if you want to cook some of your own meals.  Highly recommended!

We were very happy in Marcos apartment, we found the main bed and the settees very comfortable for sleeping.   We kept the door open between the lounge and main bedroom to get the benefit from the AC.  The road outside is noisy but the double glazing in the front bedroom is very efficient.  Having the Carrefour opposite meant we were able to make use of the kitchen for our needs.    Glories Metro is  5-7 mins walk, we bought the 10 journeys ticket for our 5 day stay, which was just over 30 euros for the 3 of us.     We walked to the beach in 25 mins, the best route is through Glories Shopping Centre, walk out with  McDonalds on your right, walk along Avinguda Diagonal for 2/3 mins to Rambla del Poblenou , which has many restaurants  all the way down to the beach.  We enjoyed a very good English breakfast near the start of Poblenou at Palo Verde on the left.  We also rented bikes along this road from Pedal Bike Rental which is near the first roundabout, there is a  Mercadona here also.   We used the Metro every day and found it very easy to use.  In the evenings we did hear the neighbours dogs barking, but we never heard them over night, this is to be expected from a residential apartment, but this is the choice we made as we do not like staying in hotels.

Marcos apartment is very spacious and really conveniently located with a  shopping mall and large carrefour right across the street. Marco was also very prompt with responding to questions and was incredibly helpful when one of our party in Barcelona met with some difficulties and needed to enter the apartment early. Also loved the treats Marco put out for us!

The apartment is very well located with very convenient access to the subway and the tram. It is very neat and clean and the kitchen is very well equipped.
Marcos and Nuria are also very professional, kind and resolutive, always willing to help, and making feel the guests like at home.

Definitely I would come back again and I recomend anyone to rent this appartment.

The apartment itself was a lot bigger than I initially thought. It’s in a good location, there are 2 metro stops a 5 min walk in either direction and both are on the same line which takes you to the centre of everything. Also it is situated bang over the road from a shopping mall with plenty of restaurants and shops that are open until late. The beach is a 20-30 minute walk away, and the Sagrada Família about the same.

I’d highly recommend this place to anyone as it has everything you need, along with the location and easy transport links.
Fantastic location and communication. Would recommend to others
The stay at Marcos’s apartment was excellent. Good and fast communication, well maintained facilities and close to metro and train station. It is all you need for a couple of days in Barcelona!
Accueil très chaleureux et prêt à tout pour nous aider !
Todo genial. De acuerdo a la descripción o incluso mejor. Marcos y su mujer, muy atentos y amables. No hay ninguna sorpresa desagradable, ni problemas ocultos. Una buena elección.
The position of this flat is quite convenient! Had a great time. And the facility is absolutely complete. We cooked several times there. Highly recommend!
非常棒
Muy buen apartamento, bien ubicado, con un centro comercial increíble justo en frente, la sagrada familia súper cerca y la Agbar tower a dos pasos del apartamento.

Je recommande vraiment cet appartement.Tres bien situé et garni. L’emplacement idéal pour tout et je n’ai pas grand chose à rajouter. Marcos est une très gentille personne, ponctuelle, serviable et toujours à l’écoute. Il sait mettre en bonne conditions les voyages, tout est préparé à l’avance. Je mets la note de  sur 10.



I really recommend this (Website hidden by Airbnb) well located and furnished. The perfect location for everything and I do not have much to add. Marcos is a very nice person, punctual, helpful and always attentive. He knows how to put in good conditions the trips, everything is prepared in advance. I put the note of  on 10.

Communication with the welcoming hosts was easy before and during the trip. They provided us with clear instruction regarding our stay and helpful tips for local travel. The apartment is conveniently located right across from a mall and large grocery shop. Small cafés and local shops were just a walk away. All the kitchen necessities were there, along with a wonderful surprise of  muffins, orange juice and milk. The rooms were very clean and spacious. Just a small FYI,  the neighbors can be bit noisy and there is currently construction right outside, but everything else was perfect.
Overall, very welcoming hosts, great amentities, good location and wonderful stay! Highly recommend.

The location is fantastic and convenient. 15-mintues walk to Sagrada Familia; restaurants, coffee shops and shoping center around. The flat is tidy, comfort and bigger as we tought. Marcos  is very friendly and helpful, he sent a lot of usefull information about Barcelona . We had  a great time there.

My friends and I had an amazing stay at Marcos’ place. The location was super great, the metro is 5 mins away from the apartment, the mall is right across the street and the tram and busses are super close as well. Marcos was super hospitable and had everything you’d ever need in the apartment. He is very quick at responding and very responsible. Marcos includes a huge variety of locations where you can sightsee and eat. We are very happy with our stay and would very highly recommend it.

El departamento de Marcos, es tal cual se ve en las fotos.
