La comunicación con Marcos fue siempre fluida, estuvo en todos los detalles, incluso nos hizo entrar antes del horario establecido al departamento. Muy accesible el transporte al Centro (10'). Enfrente hay un shopping con un supermercado. Sin duda, recomendaríamos este lugar para tener una agradable estadía en Barcelona.
Everything about the flag was great. Good location, reasonable price and very clean. Marcos was very friendly and flexible about checkout and he was really helpful. All in all, it was perfect!
The host is very kind and the flat is big and comfortable. The neighborhood is full of things to do and very good connected to the main attractions of the city.
Todo impecable. Totalmente recomendable. Sin duda volvería.
Great location, great appartement, even better treatment and reception. I wouldn't recommend anywhere else to stay in Barcelona. It was a really nice experience.

Marcos is very welcoming, he met us at the metro station, and spent time with us to visit the apartment and give details about what/where we could find around (shops, restaurants, etc...). The flat itself is very clean, well equipped and very well located (right in front of a shopping center) and 5 mins away from the nearest metro station. We had a really pleasant stay there. Thanks Marcos!

name: Bright,cozy,quiet,walking distance metro,park ...
summary: This cozy, charming and bright apartment is located on the second floor of a duplex in a quiet Montreal neighborhood.
space: The apartment, with a balcony overlooking a quiet yard, is equipped with a fully furnished kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms and living room. Unlimited Wi-Fi is available, a TV with HDMI cable to connect a computer, Chromecast as well as a Bluetooth radio. Also available, a private access to a washer, dryer and steamer. The Verdun metro (located at a 10 minutes walking distance and 2 minutes by bus from the apartment) is a 15 minute ride away from downtown. By car, downtown is a 20 minute  drive.
description: This cozy, charming and bright apartment is located on the second floor of a duplex in a quiet Montreal neighborhood. The apartment, with a balcony overlooking a quiet yard, is equipped with a fully furnished kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms and living room. Unlimited Wi-Fi is available, a TV with HDMI cable to connect a computer, Chromecast as well as a Bluetooth radio. Also available, a private access to a washer, dryer and steamer. The Verdun metro (located at a 10 minutes walking distance and 2 minutes by bus from the apartment) is a 15 minute ride away from downtown. By car, downtown is a 20 minute  drive. Within a short walking distance, you will find markets, pharmacies, banks, restaurants, coffee shops and other services such as the Verdun metro station, bus stops and a bicycle Bixi station. If you like the outdoors, a beautiful riverside park is accessible under five minutes by foot from the apartment with an over 6-kilometre bike path, canoe, kayak and surf courses and rental se
neighborhood_overview: Within a short walking distance, you will find markets, pharmacies, banks, restaurants, coffee shops and other services such as the Verdun metro station, bus stops and a bicycle Bixi station. If you like the outdoors, a beautiful riverside park is accessible under five minutes by foot from the apartment with an over 6-kilometre bike path, canoe, kayak and surf courses and rental services during the summer season.

reviews.comments: Perfect place very quiet clean and new with state of the art appliances.  Lucia and Emma are so friendly and warm and I wouldn't definitely repeat my experience .
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lucia and Emma are great hosts, friendly and easy to communicate with. The house was spotless and you can see that it has been recently renovated. it is located in a charming area close to downtown, but quiet enough for a restful night. Oh and the bed is very comfortable. We recommend Emma and Lucia's home.
We felt very welcome and that the door was open if we needed to ask questions. Exceptional hosts! Thank you for the band aid! ;)

Lucia and Emma were great host. The apartment was beautiful. Lots of extra touches--clothes steamer, French coffee, full kitchen supplied with pots and pans, oil, butter, and more. I look forward to my next visit.  Thank you!!! My home away from home.

Place
Wonderful apartment, spacious, clean, fully equipped, comfortable, decorated with taste, bright, quiet, ... And for such a small price. Best value at that price point
Location
Outside center of Montreal, yet close to everything. 5-10min walk to green line subway station, 1min walk to line 107 bus stop, 10min subway to old Montreal, nice walk along the river just next to the apartment, market on street corner, bakery 5min walk away... Perfect for a romantic stay
Hosts
Nice, available yet discrete, helpful.

Thanks Lucia and Emma, this was truly an amazing stay (and thank you for the extra coffee :))

I would 100% recommend this place

Communicating before arriving in Montreal was very easy and accommodating. I travel to Montreal for school and so coordinating times and keys always gets a little tricky but Lucia and Emma helped for a smooth transition into school life. I grew up in NDG and just love seeing the transformation of Verdun- such a fun place to hang out!
this place was very clean and cosy :) thank you so much !

This was a fantastic experience. Lucia and Emma responded quickly to all of my questions and the place was warm, welcoming and very clean! I would absolutely stay here again. Thank you for your hospitality!
Our visit was perfect. Lucia and Emma responded to our questions very quickly and the apartment was very, very clean and well equipped. Highly recommend staying here.
A great place to say, was very cozy. Had everything you might need for a weekend. Good location close to a metro. Neighbourhood is very quite.  Stay here in the winter and the place was very warm.

L'appartement est très agréable.
Lucia And Emma sont accueillantes et prévenantes
Tout était parfait. Nous reviendrons!

This apartment is the best experience. It is so clean, excellent beds (and I am very picky), linens, etc. Bathroom remodel was updated in very modern appeal. Kitchen was very well stocked. Had very nice special little touches that shows the detail and care the owners put into it. From the bottled water, to the great coffee, the organic teas, and teapot. Just a wonderful, comfortable, warm feeling to the place. Updated bathroom, kitchen, washer dryer, wi-fi, mixed with a taste of refinished hardwood floors, and EXCELLENT firm beds. I highly recommend this to be your 1st choice. Thank You Lucia & Emma for making us feel at home.
The space was equipped with everything you need for a great stay in Ottawa. Its location allowed us to explore the sights and experience multiple parts of Ottawa.
We stayed there 2 nights and we had a wonderful time. Everything was clean and perfect. We felt like home and we enjoyed having a kitchen. We would definitly stay here again!!
Great place with all the necessary kits. Quiet & clean apartment. Easy communication with Lucia & Emma. Thank you for your place.

The apartment was very clean and cozy. It's well connected (we didn't mind walking 10 min from the metro station). The area is quite and there are shops nearby. There is everything needed in the apartment. All in all it was a great stay and it probably would be even more valuable for 2 couples.
Très bel appartement, moderne et propre.
la proximité du fleuve et du métro en fait un endroit idéal pour séjourner à Montréal
The apartment is just perfect, cozy and modern. The hosts were very good with their instructions on arrival and met us before we left. Perfect place while in Montreal.
Très bel appartement! Conforme aux photos, il était très propre et cosy :)
I had a great experience, Lucia and Emma were available and friendly. the apt. was lovely and very clean. would stay again!

This was such a great place to stay at! 15 minutes walking distance to the subway station and 3 minutes walking distance to the nearest market. It was clean and modern as well! Love this place and I highly recommend it!
Nice home with great amenitie, comfortable and cozy!

Lucia & Emma's place is absolutely lovely! And I cannot believe what a good deal it is! Everything has been recently updated and was designed very tastefully. The kitchen is fully furnished if you want to cook there (although during our stay the oven wasn't working, but the stovetop was), coffee is provided, there's a washer and dryer in the unit (with detergents provided!), the living room was lovely although the tv didn't have a DVD player. The bedrooms were wonderful - comfy beds and full size mirrors and hanging racks in both. Even a clothes steamer. The bathroom was lovely too - best shower we've had all trip! Amazing water pressure and soft towels. Basically, lots of attention to details made this stay just perfect! And the host was very kind and easy to work with. Communication was easy, although not excessive, and she made sure we had everything we needed. Isn't the ideal location in the city if you want to walk to attractions, but you could tell that by a map. We knew that going in, but it was such a good deal and cozy stay it was worth it for sure!

Highly recommend. A great place if you're looking for quiet and private. Perfect amount of space. Very clean, with the convenient necessities (laundry, coffee, shampoo etc). Lucia and Emma are easy to communicate with and very welcoming. Stay here!

The Verdun neighbourhood is full of character and Lucia & Emma's upper storey apartment is classic Montreal, very cosy and convenient. There's plenty of free on-street parking and it's only a short 15 minute walk to the Subway. Highly recommended.
Very clean & comfortable place! Close to transit, in a nice quiet neighborhood.
Good

The appartment is really nice and clean  located in a quiet area. Within a 10 min distance walk,  you arrive the metro station which is not far away from Montreal old city. Thank You Lucia and Emma for your Great hospitality. We would recommend it anytime :)
Clean, comfortable, near public transport, cafés, restaurants and a park. Lucia and Emma are lovely and very helpful. Highly recommended!

I thoroughly enjoyed my week-long stay at Lucia and Emma's place.  Their flat is incredibly clean, spacious and well organized and has all the necessary kitchen, bathroom, laundry, and bathroom amenities.  It is also very well-situated, within easy walking distance of the St. Lawrence River and with very easy public transit access by bus or metro to downtown and points north, south, and east.  An incredible value!  Lucia and Emma are very welcoming, communicative, and accommodating hosts. Will certainly stay with Lucia and Emma the next time I visit Montreal.
Great location, easy to access downtown and local markets, yet distant enough to be in a neighbourhood.
great place to stay and I will stay in Emma's place if I go to Montreal again and the Host is very responsive and easy to communicate.
Fantastic place to stay on a budget. It is sort of far from the main attractions, but Uber's available in Montreal. Everything was very clean.  Communication was always very pleasant and quick.

Très bel appartement, situé à 10 min à pied d'un métro.
Rapidement dans le centre.

Logement TRÈS propre, spacieux, lumineux, très bien équipé en électroménager, excellente literie, très calme, tout commerces à proximité, transports en commun(bus, métro..) !!!!.... 
On peut même observer des écureuils joueurs !!!!....
Absolutely amazing hosts, so friendly and helpful with telling us olaces to visit. The apartment was great and was only a 15-20 min commute to downtown through public transit

Lucia and Emma are the best hosts ever. Friendly and very welcoming. Always available if you need any assistance. The apartment is so comfortable and clean. You feel at home during your stay. My home away from home.  Thank you Lucia and Emma. I can't wait till my next visit to Montreal.

Great hosts.  The apartment was very clean and perfect as a guest house.  About a mile walk to the metro and a short Uber drive to the busy area of Wellington Rue.  I highly recommend Lucia and Emma's place.

Lucia and Emma's place was perfect for my stay. The apartment is pretty and light filled. All the touches are there to make for a lovely stay- comfortable, quiet bedrooms, kitchen equipped for a brewed coffee or cooking up a storm, clean sleek bathroom. There's a great grocer on the corner and coffee and bagels a block away. Buses run two minutes away and the metro is a flat walk, 15 minutes. Great value in a good neighbourhood.
Emma and Lucia were really helpful hosts. The location oft the Appartement is perfect for bikes Tours in and around Montreal. Karen

We enjoyed the space and decor etc. in the apartment, and used the veranda for a evening meal which was great.  Verdun metro station is close by and worth a visit in itself.  A walk down to the St Lawrence is a really good option as well.
Excellent location.  Nice and open space with all the required amenities.  Close to stores and restaurants and not too far from the metro.  We really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it.

Lovely, clean and comfortable 2nd floor townhouse flat.  Need to be able to climb the winding external stairs (very common in this neighborhood).  Enjoyed the full kitchen for morning coffee and DIY breakfast before heading out for the day.  Great location - just "outside the city" enough to enjoy quiet evenings, but a few steps from the bus stop to the metro for ease of access anywhere else.  Bank for ATM just down the street, along with lots of restaurants, and a fresh fruit vendor on the corner.  Get yourself a transport pass and enjoy Montreal!
Great experience with Lucia and Emma. Their place was as shown in the pictures. It was very clean and quiet. Good communication and they live right down stairs. Would definitely stay here again.
Quartier calme bon accueil excellent rapport qualité prix

Lucia et Emma sont gentilles, toujours disponibles à vous aider.
La localisation de leur appartement est dans un quartier tranquile, très agréable et près du métro. Il y a encore une ligne d'autobus qui va au centre-ville.
Si vous vous voulez tranquilité, c'est un place idéal.
Logement parfait et à recommander...nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Quartier très agréable tout près des transports en commun

It's a lovely apartment which is located in a quiet neighborhood. You have access to public transport very easily. Restaurants and food stores are very close by, too. The apartment is well equipped and has nice furniture. Lucia and Emma have been very helpful, thank you very much.
This is absolutely the best place on Airbnb we've stayed!
Appartement propre et très bien équipé. Lit et oreillers très confortables. Petite épicerie de quartier très sympa au coin de la rue. Nous recommandons cet endroit.

Logement situé dans un quartier résidentiel. Une épicerie/primeur/boulangerie se trouve à une 100aine de mêtres, ce qui est très pratique. Quelques fast food à proximité. Un petit balcon permet de profiter de l'extérieur. L'appartement est bien équipé et propre. Le bruit des travaux dans la rue d'à côté nous ont obligés à nous lever tôt ! L'avantage est que nous avons profité à fond de nos 3 journées à Montréal. Nous recommandons ce logement.

Großartiges Appartment, mit super Küche, genialem Balkon. WLAN 1a. Ruhige Lage, super Einkaufsmöglichkeiten um die Ecke. Montreal ist gut mit dem Auto zu erreichen. Netter Spielplatz 2 Minuten zu Fuß und von dort auch Spazier- und Radweg am Fluß entlang. Wir würden dort immer wieder absteigen.

This apartment was quiet and convenient to the Metro station. We enjoyed the fluffy towels and pristine bed linen. We need to return to Montreal to finish exploring after having down day because of sickness. Just remember that it is up outside stairs to the apartment which wasn't a problem for us but might have bothered some folk.
So warmly and cozy place! We love it like our own place!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, le descriptif de l'appartement est tout à fait conforme. Lucia et Emma nous on très bien accueillie. Les écureuils étaient au rendez-vous.
L'appartement est spacieux, propre et autonome.
Merci Lucia et Emma

The place was as advertised. Very clean, plenty of space. It was a little difficult to find parking a couple times, but part of that was due to road construction in the area. We would stay there again!

très bon séjour ,appartement agréable , le quartier est calme et bien desservi (bus métro),  proche du St Laurent les rives sont une belle promenade.
 nous avons apprécié les prestations (draps ,linge de maison quelques produits à disposition) Le beau temps nous a permis de souper dehors en profitant de la terrasse.....à l'année prochaine peut être
Nous prenons l'habitude de loger chez Emma et Lisa quand nous venons à Montréal et nous apprécions autant son emplacement près du fleuve que la luminosité et le confort de l'appartement!

Accurate description of apartment provided by hosts.  The apartment is very clean and nice . All basic kitchen utensils and cutlery are available. The washing machine and drier was also a plus.  Lucia and Emma were warm and inviting. Very helpful as needed.  The location is okay. Not too far from metro station, and a short train ride to downtown. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone!
Lucia and Emma were super nice hosts, always on contact and very kind. Their house is really pretty and has everything you need. I totally recommend it, and would love to stay there again.

Quartier très tranquille, uine bonne literie ! 
Un appartement douillet. Nous avons apprécié notre séjour d’une semaine et vous le recommandons !
Great space! Really easy to check-in and check-out, nicely decorated, clean, and in a great part of Montreal.

Lucia and Emma's place is very conveniently located, about 15 minutes from both the airport and downtown Montreal. The home itself is fully equipped (kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms) and is fresh, clean, and cozy! There was always a parking space or two available on the street nearby. Emma even came up to shovel snow off the balcony for us. Overall a wonderful stay. Thank you girls!

It's a beautiful place, the neighborhood is nice. There's a little gourmet market only a few meters from house that is amazing to have a high quality of supplies for dinner and something to drink. The transportation is good and easy to get in daily hours. We can really recommend the place to enjoy Montreal.

깨끗하고 쓸모있게 관리되는 숙소임. 
그릇이나 요리에 필요한 도구도 기본적으로 충분히 갖춰져 있고 세탁실또한 잘 관리되어 지내는 동안 충분히 편리했고 침구도 깨끗하고 숙소 상태에 비해 가격도 비싸지 않았음. 다음번에 이지역으로 여행을 온다면 숙소로 충분히 고려해 볼만해요. 또한 호스트들도 충분히 친절했으며 폭설이 오는 날씨에도 빠르게 출입구와 계단의 눈을 치워주어서 편안하게 생활했어요. 다음번에 또 간다면 이용하고 싶은 숙소입니다.

Excellent place to stay. Emma was very accommodating and helpful when our flight was cancelled and we were stuck for an extra night. A little far from downtown but a fairly short walk to the subway! Would happily stay here again.
This is your cozy oasis away from home, a must recommend.
Great place to stay. Very clean and quiet place

Nous avons séjourné mon fils et moi dans l'appartement mis à notre disposition.par Emma, nous avons été enchanté de découvrir la clarté de ce lieu ainsi que le confort et la disponibilité d'Emma quand à nos interrogations. Une literie très confortable, un lieu très agréable et calme. Le marché Tondreau à 2 pas est d'une grande fraîcheur et abordable, ... Un grand merci à Emma, nous reviendrons lors de notre prochain séjour avec grand plaisir. Je recommande bien évidemment.
Nice  place ..spacious and super clean ..will come again for sure ...
Pleasant stay the second time around. The place was a bit dusty for my liking.

Venu pour un sejour de deux semaines.

Appartement très confortable, chaleureux, lumineux et douillet.
Bonne connexion internet, cuisine équipée, salle de bain spacieuse et chambres bien meublées. Proche du métro et des commerces.

Emma est une hôte d'exception ! Très accueillante et disponible. L'appartement était très propre à l'arrivée.

Très conseillé !

This is the second time I stayed at Emma's place, and it was again a wonderful experience.  Emma is a very warm and generous host, is very responsive, and communicates very well.  The flat is very spacious (2 bedrooms) and well-organized, very clean, and very much as advertised ("bright, cozy, quiet").  The location, with easy access to public transit (both bus and metro) to get downtown or around southwest Montreal and also being a short walk from the St. Lawrence River and its walk/bike pathway, can't be beat.  Given all of these positives, it is also a great value.  I will always stay here when visiting Montreal if Emma's flat is available.

Spacious, clean, cozy apartment. Enjoyed it very much. Good base to see the city from, either by car (there is parking in front) or subway (walking distance from station). Quiet residential neighbourhood. The only thing worth noting if someone has accessibility needs is that there is a bit a steep staircase to reach the apartment. It worked out well for us and would stay here again.
Great place! Clean and very welcoming!

Ce logement est bien aménagé et équipé, très clair et agréable à vivre. La terrasse est particulièrement sympathique. Le lit est confortable ainsi que le canapé.
Les bords du Saint Laurent sont très proches et apaisants, le métro Verdun est à 15 mn à pied mais un bus le rejoint. Une épicerie pleine de produits tentants est au coin de la rue.
Emma a su répondre aux petits problèmes rencontrés avec rapidité et efficacité. Il est très facile de la joindre et d'échanger avec elle.

L’appartement est lumineux spacieux, très propre situé dans un quartier très calme et à proximité de toutes commodités (bus, métro, commerces, station service...)
La petite terrasse est vraiment un plus en été, très agréable. 
Emma est vraiment très gentille, disponible et arrangeante car elle nous a permis de laisser nos valises en attendant notre vol . Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Emma , elle mérite amplement son titre de « super host » ! Merci beaucoup pour tout et à bientôt sur Montréal.
Bien accueilli logement très bien situé lumineux propre : impeccable

Our stay in Emma’s apartment was nice. Spacious, cosy! I fell in love with her coach:). It would have been 200% top experience if the housemaid had cleaned the appartement properly before we arrived. My mother-in-law is very sensitive to cleanliness .We contacted Emma and she reacted quickly and fixed this issue the day after . Emma is easy to contact, even if she lives in the apartment downstairs she is very discrete. She is easygoing and have good advices on what to do in Montreal. Anyway for the rest we really enjoy our stay and felt comfortable. I recommend this place. Perfect for couples or small families.

This apartment is spacious, bright, modern and clean.  The fans were very helpful to keep us cool at night.  Laundry was also a convenient addition, and there is even a steamer for any formal wear.  The kitchen is well stocked with everything you'd need to make a few meals, and there is a little produce market on the corner.  A nice walk to Verdun Metro station although wouldn't do this alone at night.  The neighbors were very friendly.  Loved the iconic outdoor spiral staircase, although I imagine this is tough in winter.  Will be recommending this place to friends.  Its quite a bargain for exploring the neighborhoods of Montreal.

Emma is a great host! Her apparment is nice, cosy, clean and located in a nice neighbourhood. There is a great small grocery store at the next corner and a very nice breakfast place two blocks away. There are also a lot playgrounds 10 min away (walking distance) right next to the water, what we really appreciated. We traveled with our two kids (4 and 2) and even they got up very early (jetlag) there where no complaints. Thanks for that and sorry again! We enjoyed our stay very much!
Emma és molt bona emfitriona. El pis està en una zona de la ciutat molt tranquila. Està ben comunicat amb bus i metro molt aprop. Té un carrer comercial molt a prop amb botigues i restaurants.
Appartement confortable et bien situé. Métro et commerce alimentation à proximité. Hôte agréable et discrète. Lieu tout à d'air adapté pour famille avec enfant(s). Nous recommandons cette adresse
The apartment is very nice but the only problem is that it was not in the center of Montreal.

L'appartement d'Emma nous a semblé très bien situé pour pouvoir à la fois bénéficier d'un quartier typique ,sans touristes ,contenant des commerces facilement accessibles à pied (le marché Tondreau au coin de la rue ainsi que plusieurs commerces ou petits restaurants sur Wellington Street),le centre ville à 30 minutes de marche et de métro ainsi que le bord du Saint Laurent et les rapides de Lachine.
La rue est calme , l'appartement ensoleillé , bien aérable et , pour cette saison , le chauffage y est efficace .
Merci à Emma pour son sympathique accueil.
Appartement très bien situé proche du métro et des commerces avec tout ce qu'il fait pour passer un super séjour!

I stayed for a month is this comforting and quiet space. Everything a traveller needs in a lovely neighbourhood within a 10-minute walk of the Metro. The fast internet connection was a nice plus. Emma's communications were quick and warm.  Shovelling the snow off of the outside staircase and salting the steps was greatly appreciated. My next trip to Montreal I hope the space is available.
Logement agréable, conforme à la description. Nous avons aussi apprécié le spectacle des écureuils dans la rue tous les matins.  Merci à Emma !

Emma est une hôte disponible et discrète! Son logement est propre, fonctionnel et super bien équipé! Nous y avons logé sans difficulté avec un enfant! Les lits sont douillets!!! Nous y retournerons sans faute! :)
Place was really nice, clean, and with many amenities! A local family owned grocery store just down the street made getting last minute groceries really easy!
agréable
Great apartment with modern amenities.   Hot shower and quiet.
Adorei o apartamento, bem localizado. Tem a opção de ir andando para o metrô (12min) ou pegar um ônibus. Muito bonito e organizado. Recomendo!

Le quartier et la maison sont très bien! Tout s' est bien déroulé. Je le recommande. Les commerces et le métro sont à coté.
Emma est une hôte très à l' écoute et très disponible.
Appartement très bien situé pour visiter Montréal ! Propre et correspond parfaitement à la description

name: Most enviable location in the West Village
summary: Stay in the West Village's most sought after tree-lined street. Doors up from Carrie's Sex & the City apartment and across the road from the city's chicest restaurants like Extra Virgin and Sant Ambroeus. Also near the Spotted Pig and Little Owl. A classic brownstone building. A walk up on the 4th floor (three flights up). Generous living space. Please note that the bathroom has not been updated for a while and not suited to people seeking modern features. This is old school New York!
space: This is a classic old school, New York West Village Brownstone. It is the BEST location in the city. It has "character," which makes is uber cool and bohemian, but also means: - You need to walk up three flights of stairs - There is no TV - The shower takes 7 to 10 minutes to heat up (but it does) - The kitchen is simple (no dishwasher) If you are patient with the above, you will love the space. It is situated on one of the most sought after corners in the West Village. Yet, very quiet. There is A/C in the bedroom, a FREE laundry in the building and a wardrobe in the bedroom.
description: Stay in the West Village's most sought after tree-lined street. Doors up from Carrie's Sex & the City apartment and across the road from the city's chicest restaurants like Extra Virgin and Sant Ambroeus. Also near the Spotted Pig and Little Owl. A classic brownstone building. A walk up on the 4th floor (three flights up). Generous living space. Please note that the bathroom has not been updated for a while and not suited to people seeking modern features. This is old school New York! This is a classic old school, New York West Village Brownstone. It is the BEST location in the city. It has "character," which makes is uber cool and bohemian, but also means: - You need to walk up three flights of stairs - There is no TV - The shower takes 7 to 10 minutes to heat up (but it does) - The kitchen is simple (no dishwasher) If you are patient with the above, you will love the space. It is situated on one of the most sought after corners in the West Village. Yet, very quiet. There is A/C in th
neighborhood_overview: This is the most sought after neighborhood in the city. Neighbors include Sarah Jessica Parker, Matthew Broderick, Helena Christensen etc.  The best restaurants: Extra Virgin, Waverly Inn, Cafe Cluny, Spotted Pig, Saint Ambrouse, L'Artusi, the list goes on and on. And yet quiet - there are strict rules in the West Village that keep the noise down at night. Tree lined streets. Close to the Hudson River path - great path for a jog or stroll.
transit: Close to the 1 train (Christopher Street) and West 4th Street Station (BDFM and ACE lines.
access: As of now I plan to sleep in the living room (in a small bed behind the sofa), however a small nook may be constructed in the living room, where I will sleep (but this is still not confirmed). You are welcome to use the living area freely.
interaction: I'm pretty busy - I work full time and am about to start studying, plus I go out fairly often. I'll say hello if we cross paths.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Originally from Melbourne, I moved to New York six years ago for a job in banking. Since then I have lived in Paris (learning French and writing), briefly returned to Melbourne to live, and finally, I came back to my favorite city of them all: New York. Currently I work at JP Morgan and this fall I will start an MFA in Creative Writing at Columbia University. I love traveling, being social and meeting new people.  In terms of my West Village apartment, I'm pretty laid back, clean/tidy and respectful of others. I like to be social sometimes, and sometimes switch off and read/write. As long as we're cognizant of each other's mood and needs for space and quiet time, I don't mind a bit of noise/activity in the apartment (preferably not when I have work the next morning). I'm not strict at all, and I like it when people around me are enjoying themselves.

reviews.comments: Margaret, my host we was very accomodating and we moved around her apartment giving each other respect for the space we shared. She was very open and honest in her expectations and it was a pleasure staying in her apartment.

Margaret embodies everything you could ask for as an AirBnb host. She promptly replied to any and all messages and gave forewarning about the quirks of her apartment. There were no surprises at all once I arrived; everything was exactly as she described. 

The location is great; the apartment is on a quiet street with plenty of restaurants and shops nearby. Subway stations are a few short blocks away.

Margaret's apartment is clean and furnished well enough to be comfortable while still experiencing classic New York. I absolutely love how the apartment was decorated. Simple, yet cozy.

This apartment is definitely one of the most enviable locations in the West Village.
Margaret and her place are great. The place is beautiful and well placed and Margaret and all the way around amazing. I would totally stay there again.
Most pleasant stay in perfect location. Cute room. All as described! Thanks

Great location! The area is beautiful and cosy, it really has charm. Lots of nice bars, cafés and little shops, and It's easy to get around to the other parts of the city, both by foot and with public transport. The room is nice and clean. I would highly recommend everyone to stay at Margarets place!
Margaret's place is in a great location - close to shops, restaurants and several subway lines.  It's clean and quiet, and Margaret is a friendly and responsive host.  I would stay here again.
Muy buena ubicación; bello departamento antiguo con baño y alcoba espaciosos.
The place is located in a very nice and quiet location. Margaret is a great host and you should totally bring her some top-quality Swiss or Belgian chocolate.

Had a great stay at Margaret's place - the best location in Manhattan! If you want to get a feel for living like a local, and enjoy great bars and restaurants then this is the place for you. Thanks again, Aaryn & El

We had a really good time at Margaret’s apartment. It is super cute and the neighborhood is just amazing. Also we appreciated the flexible check-in a lot! Margaret is a super relaxed host and gives you all the space you need.
We really enjoyed our trip! Thank you for everything Margaret.
Kind regards
Laura and Milan
We had a fantastic stay at Margaret's place. The apartment is cosy and perfectly located in West village. Ideal to explore NYC. We highly recommend it and hope we could come back.

You can't get better accommodation in Manhattan if you're looking for a nice, local and private space.

Margaret's apartment is super super clean, exactly as described and located in the best neighborhood of NYC - the West Village. There are tons of cafes, restaurants and pubs around, subway lines are 5 to 10 minutes away and the place is very quiet and private. The bedroom is nice with A/C and large closet, the bed is comfortable and linens are new and clean. Margaret is very nice. She gave us some local tips and even a printed handout with best local coffee places. She works and studies so we had the apartment for ourselves majority of time. No problems at all.

Booking this place is the best thing you can do to directly improve your NYC experience. And bring chocolate ;)

Margaret was a really responsive host and her apartment was located in the most ideal neighborhood. Her place was clean and well kept, and West Village is filled with adorable restaurants, bars, and stylish shops every corner you turn. I'd definitely recommend Margaret's place to anyone who's looking for a quiet place to crash that is close to everything you'll need/want to see in NYC. Thank you Margaret!

We really enjoyed staying at Margarets place. The apartment is very cute and the room is perfectly tidy, clean and with a great view. The location in the West Village is perfect, restaurants, shops and the subway just a stone’s throw away from the apartment. And of course it’s a great starting point to discover the city on foot.
Great private room in the best location possible! It was like making yourself right at home in the West Village. Margaret was a perfect host. Great AirBnB experience!

Super localisation , appartement fidèle à la description . Margaret est tres sympa et discrète ... mais efficace si besoin . Communication claire et réponse rapide .  Flexibilité pour le Check  out vraiment apprécié et qui nous a permis de bien profité du dernier jour. On n’a peu vu Margaret pendant le séjour mais elle était toujours dispo par message si besoin. Le quartier est super sympa avec plein de restau et boutiques autour ainsi que des bouches de métro . On recommande vivement . Merci Margaret 
Amazing location. Room as per pictures and description no surprise ! Margaret is a nice host, discret and responsive . Her communication is kind, smooth and efficient . We did appreciate her flexibility with late check out which allowed us to enjoy our last day until last minutes . We did not see Margaret a lot during our stay but she was always available over message when needed. The location  is great with a lot of good spots around including Magnolia bakery (2min) and high line and Chelsea Market (7min by walk) would definitely be back to this place !!! We do recommend . Thanks Margaret
Amazing place , clean, great location

name: Confortável Flat com serviços e em frente a praia
summary: O meu Flat é próximo dos melhores restaurantes da Barra da Tijuca e ao lado do maravilhoso hotel Windsor. Situado em frente a praia, próximo da barraca do Pepe e da rua mais movimentada Olegário Maciel. Estamos com certeza na melhor localização da Barra.
description: O meu Flat é próximo dos melhores restaurantes da Barra da Tijuca e ao lado do maravilhoso hotel Windsor. Situado em frente a praia, próximo da barraca do Pepe e da rua mais movimentada Olegário Maciel. Estamos com certeza na melhor localização da Barra.
house_rules: Silêncio após as 22:00 Hs. Horários de check-in e check-out flexíveis a combinar com o anfitrião.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Excelente departamento. Excelente ubicación. Excelente el trato recibido por parte de Mauricio y su esposa Adriana. Hermosa canasta de frutas nos esperaba a nuestra llegada, tambien latas de gaseosa y agua mineral para refrescarnos despues del viaje. Adriana y Mauricio nos recibieron con toda su amabilidad para explicarnos todo lo necesario para nuestra estadía. Adriana habla perfectamente ingles lo que facilitó completamente la comunicación. El departamenteo se encuentra en el mejor lugar de Barra, justo enfrente de la playa y a 5 minutos de auto de los shoppings. Caminando se dispone de amplia variedad de oferta gastronómica y del supermercado para comprar lo necesario para la estadía. El apartamento está completamente equipado para 4 personas y lo hemos disfrutado muchísimo. Solo nos quedan palabras de agradecimiento y seguramente volveremos.
Todo perfecto, siempre es un gusto alojarnos en el apartamento de Mauricio. Muchas gracias

name: Little Slice of Paradise Mauna Lani
summary: Mauna Lani Resort on the Big Island of Hawaii! Activities and Amenities Abound in The Mauna Lani Resort! - Beach, Pool, Spa, Golf, Tennis, Shopping, and Restaurants ... to name a few! "The Fairways at Mauna Lani", is a private gated community of luxury homes on the Kohala Coast located inside the world-renowned Mauna Lani Resort. The Mauna Lani Resort, also home to The Fairmont Orchid and The Mauna Lani Bay Hotels is located 25 minutes north of the Kailua-Kona Airport.
space: The home features two bedrooms and three bathrooms, approximately 1700 square feet of living space, in addition to two Lanai.  Perfect for a small family on vacation or a couple.  The Fairways sports lava rock waterfalls, an outdoor jacuzzi/spa, and a free form pool with an attached kid pool.  The jacuzzi/spa, pool, and air conditioned exercise room are a short walk, providing the perfect blend of convenience and privacy.  Enjoy drinks at the Fairmont's Ocean Bar, while watching the sea turtles come ashore on the white sand beach. The Fairmont Orchid has a fantastic beach, extremely kid friendly and offers many water sports activities for rent/purchase. Two golf courses are available at the Mauna Lani Resort; The South Course, with its signature "over-the-water" 15th green, and The North Course, both designed by Francis H. I'i Brown.  Several additional world-class courses are located 10 to 15 minutes from the home.  At the Waikoloa Resort, you can choose The Beach Course designed by R

neighborhood_overview: "The Fairways at Mauna Lani", is a private gated community of luxury homes on the Kohala Coast located inside the world-renowned Mauna Lani Resort.  The Mauna Lani Resort, also home to The Fairmont Orchid and The Mauna Lani Bay Hotels is located 25 minutes north of the Kailua-Kona Airport.
notes: November, December, January, and February have elevated pricing, The whales are in the channel some of this time and its a wonderful time of year for a visit.
transit: A short walk south from the Fairways, leads to the The Shops at Mauna Lani, a unique shopping center featuring art galleries, gift stores, and a well appointed Foodland gourmet grocery store. While at The Shops at Mauna Lani, you may enjoy weekly hula performances, live Hawaiian music, ukulele instruction and lei making classes.  Two fabulous gourmet restaurants are located at the Shops at Mauna Lani; Ruth Chris Steak House and The Tommy Bahama Restaurant and Bar. Have dinner or cocktails while watching the sunset at the Tommy Bahama Restaurant and Bar.
access: All but the garage is open for guests to use.
house_rules: All guest must follow all house rules.

host.host_about: IT Support person that loves the Big Island of Hawaii.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 283 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We had a lovely stay at William’s place! The house was clean and very well equipped. The location is great...close to the pool and it felt very private. I’d highly recommend staying here!

name: Southside 1 Bedroom in a 2 Bedroom Flat
summary: 1 Bedroom available in a 2 Bedroom and 2 Bathroom Modern Flat located on the stunning Southside of Hong Kong Island. The views are gorgeous from the balcony.  Gated and secure. Get away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Local hiking nearby. 5 min from Stanley and 15 min from Repulse Bay. Central can be accessed via shuttle bus or taxi in 30 min. Good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, student Live In Helper on site

Get away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Local hiking nearby. 5 min from Stanley and 15 min from Repulse Bay. Central can be accessed via shuttle bus or taxi in 30 min. Good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, student Live In Helper on site 1 private bedroom with 1 private bathroom in our flat. We are currently living here but we have a spare bedroom. Available for any questions. We are friendly and hospitable people. Serene and peaceful neighborhood with stunning surrounds. Easy access to hiking all over Hong Kong Island. Beautiful Tai Tam Country Park only 2 minutes ride away. Complex Shuttle Bus available for extra cost. Goes into central a few scheduled times per day. neighborhood_overview: Serene and peaceful neighborhood with stunning surrounds. Easy access to hiking all over Hong Kong Island. Beautiful Tai Tam Country Park only 2 minutes ride away.
notes: This is our own home so please use care when staying at our place. Our lovely live in helper will remain during your stay and can help with laundry, groceries, cooking, cleaning at an additional cost. She is a brilliant cook.
transit: Complex Shuttle Bus available for extra cost. Goes into central a few scheduled times per day. An additional shuttle runs about 20 minutes to nearby MTR station. Public Transport wishing 7 min walk and taxis available easily. Only 25 to 30 min ride to central Hong Kong. 5 min from Stanley Market and 15 minutes from Repulse Bay.
interaction: Available for any questions. We are friendly and hospitable people.
house_rules: - Live In Helper will remain in Live In Quarters of Flat which is separate from living area. Must maintain quiet living in this residential area.

house_rules: Additional guests, not contracted for, may not stay on the property. All visitors must be announced in advance. There are to be no visitors during Quiet Time (12:00 midnight - 7:00AM). The property is a NON-Smoking Property, and there is to be NO SMOKING anywhere on the property.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
As a traveler myself, I strive to be a great host. A great host can be the difference between a good trip and a great trip. 

I am a former restaurant owner and an active real estate professional and I strive to be the perfect host.  All my guests deserve it.

reviews.comments: Wayne was a wonderful host... I surely felt wecomed, & although my space was limited he made a way out of no way epecially being his very 1st guess to try out the City Room Couch. Oh & not to mention, he is a great cook! I would recommend. Wayne's house & certainly, I would stay again!
wayne es mmuy buena gente

Wayne was very accommodating, despite his several attempts to call me while my cellphone was off. And then again, when I came back around 1am, and didn't have the keys, Wayne was there to open the door.
All I needed was a bed, access to a bathroom, and internet access, and Wayne's place was spot-on! New York summers can be hot, but thanks to the A/C next to the bed, I was able to cool down and sleep well.

I reallz had a good time at Wayne´s appartment and Wayne was a great helpful host. The location is really good to and I liked the neighbourhood and its restaurants.
Next time I would definitelz staz here again. 
Thx Wayne!
Wayne was a great host! Comfortable bed in a very nice apartment right in the mix of lovely Harlem. Just stay here. You won't be disappointed.

ENGLISH:
The City Room - Semi private Couch is the perfect place if you are traveling by yourself and you don't want to spend a lot of money in a hostel o something similar. When you are in NYC, you want to be near of the center, but it's very important to have a nice and relaxed place to spend your nights. This place is in the center and is relaxed too. 
Wayne was very nice with me and he helped me every time when i needed. 
Everybody in the building was nice and polite with me, and the neighborhood are safe too.
You will enjoy here. The city is fantastic, but is good have a place to feel like home.

Español:
La habitación "City Room - semi private couch" es estupenda si viajas solo y no quieres gastar mucho dinero en un hostal o algo similar. Cuando estás en NYC quieres estar cerca del centro, pero es muy importante disponer de un lugar tranquilo y agradable donde pasar la noche. Esta habitación está en el centro y además en una zona tranquila. 
Wayne fue muy agradable conmigo y me ayudó en todo lo que necesité.
Todo el mundo en el edificio fue muy simpático y educado, y el vecindario es seguro.
Vas a disfrutar la estadía. La ciudad es genial, pero está bien tener un lugar donde poder sentirte como en casa.
Wayne has been one of the nicest people I've ever met, I felt like home. Beautiful places I taught in Harlem. Never forget the roommate experience with Wayne. I recommend it to everyone.

Mon séjour à NY était super ! Je suis ravie. 
De plus, Wayne est un hôte génial. Il est hospitalier, chaleureux, disponible pour répondre aux questions, discret pour ceux qui préfèrent rester dans leur coin, amical avec ceux qui préfèrent discuter et partager leurs expériences. N'hésitez pas à lui poser des questions ou à lui demander des tuyaux.  La maison est propre, ainsi que la salle de bains, avec une cuisine spacieuse et équipée. 
J'espère que vous aurez la chance de croiser d'autres locataires chez lui qui soient aussi sympathiques que ceux que j'ai rencontrés moi-même. 
Le quartier peut donner une première impression de dangerosité mais en réalité, il n'y en a pas. Il est juste moins animé que le centre ville et moins éclairé. Les gens sont sympathiques et respectueux. 
La ligne de métro est à 5 minutes de marche et vous êtes à Times Square en 20 minutes.  
Amusez-vous bien !
great host.... professional and friendly
Wayne was perfect,  and room was like on pictures, and i have fun in NY :)
I had a great stay at Wayne's place. The place exactly looks like in the photo and Wayne was really welcoming!Hope to come again.

one word : A-MA-ZING!!!! mWayne is a really nice person, warm and respectfull. You have a bed in living room but you feel like in your own bedroom. There is a little cat (Scooby!!) so you have to be friendly cat,but he sleeps a lot so he will not disturb you!

It's a clean place, very easy to go to Times Square (15 minutes with subway).
The neighboorhood is very good, restaurants, starbucks, on th 125th street there is saturday a big market and lots of cheap shops!!
There is a permanent police at 2 minutes of the place so you are in a very sae place, even at night!

Wayne have prepared a party and invited me and some student freinds lots of girls and they went at 1am/1:30am and arrived at home safely. If you don't feel subway you can always take a cab.

Thanks Wayne for your great communication, your energy and your party!!!

Wayne was an awesome host! It was my first trip to New York & first trip using Airbnb. It was very easy for me to find my way to his place from the airport. AWESOME directions!!!
Wayne is so welcoming I felt like part of his family. He offered advice, directions and also offered for his guess to hang out and party with him. AWESOMENESS!!! I was there for a very short time but I plan on hanging out with Wayne the next time I’m in NYC

Wayne is a super host - has a lovely house and has a real calling to what he is doing now. He takes an interest in his guest and makes sure that you get more than what you expect. Had a lovely time in NY because of Wayne.

I was positively surprised by Wanye's professional manner in managing the checking in process and provide detailed information on directions and check-in process. That was tremendously helpful for someone on a busy one-day pully packed schedule. 

I also enjoyed my chat with Wayne after arrival. As a host, he is really friendly and personable. The townhouse was kept clean and organized. Though the couch is semi-private, I pretty much had privacy except for when two other guests came in late at night. But Wayne made an efforts of noting for them to keep the voice down. I really apreciate that. 

Last but not least,  the "couch" is more like a twin bed, and quite comfortable. Really happy with my stay, especially at a very reasonable price.

It was great had been into Waynes house for some days in my first trip to New York City. Wayne's apartment is well located. just four really short blocks to metro. So you are close to every place in New York.
As I have allergy, I was affraid in share a space with Scooby, but as the house is very clean, I had no problem at all.
Harlem is a safe place with great places to go in the evening to listen to music and see people.
When I return to NYC, I hope I can be in Wayne's house again.

My father-in-law is senior citizen and needed a place to stay while visiting family in NY. The first night after dropping him off at Wayne's we were hoping that he would not feel afraid or alone being a senior citizen. The next day, my father-in-law had all good things to say. He slept comfortable and well, and said that Wayne treated him very well and even made him coffee in the morning! :)  It was great to hear this and it completely took our cares away for the duration of his stay there. We observed other people that were staying there and they'd gather in the kitchen eating and talking like they're right at home. That was great!  Wayne has a very nice and spacious place.  We found him to be a wonderful host!  One that will go out of his way to ensure your stay at his place is a good one!  We'd like to extend our utmost appreciation and gratitude to Wayne for his absolute politeness and kindness to my father-in-law. My father-in-law says: Thank you and God bless you!

I really enjoyed my stay! Wayne´s apt. is centrally located and it is very easy to get around. Wayne is a very good host and making the stay at his place very enjoyable. I can highly recommend his place. I stayed on the semi private couch - it is actually a real bed and most of the time I had the place to myself.
This little spot was perfect. Close to transportation, quiet, and comfortable. If you are traveling alone I see no reason to pay more than this bargain!

J'ai passé une excellente semaine en compagnie de Wayne qui est un hôte trés attentionné et disponible. La maison est bien entretenue et moi qui suis trés à cheval sur la proprété de la salle de bains et les toilettes ai été trés satisfaite. Pour les femmes seule qui hésite a réservé chez Wayne ne craignez rien. Wayne est trés cordial. Harlem est un quartier trés vivant, la maison est à côté du métro et d'un supermarché pour y faire ses courses. 
PS : Wayne est pro Iphone et moi blackerry donc on a bien débattu sur le sujet :)

Wayne has been an excellent host. He is friendly and easy to talk with. The place is as describe. Clean, warm and nice. Occasionally Wayne does cook and I must say a very good one. Thank you for your hospitality will definitely recommend this place to others.

This was my third visit to Manhattan in four months as I can't get enough of the place:-) I had previously stayed in UES, LES and UWS. This time I wanted to explore Harlem and, hence, I chose to stay there. Wayne's place was simply perfect for me. It is located conveniently and has everything a traveler might need. Wayne is a very welcoming and helpful host. Thank you for my home in Harlem:-)
Great stay at Wayne`s. Exactly as shown in pictures...close to the subway, and safe neighborhood. Good price and perfect for a short stay in NY. Would stay there again for sure.
Wayne is very hospitable and helpful. The location is very good as well, within 10 mins to the subway station. I recommend this room for future stay.

Wayne is super cool. The space is just like it looks in the pics. Its in a good part of harlem, vary close to the subway and nite life. I would stay there next time I'm in NYC.  
PS.
Wayne like strong coffee ;-)

What can I say, everybody else already said it. Like I had once, right now you're probably contemplating if you will do this yes or no. In doubt, just go for it. Especially in a city as New York, it's good to arrive at a place where you're welcomed. After my stay for 10 days, I felt like I was leaving home. A lot had to do with Wayne. He is this natural born host. During my stay he threw a house party for all the people in the house and I could also invite a friend. The stay in the house is basically highly relaxing experience. I would defenitely book Wayne's again in my next NY trip. By the way the pictures are a 1 on 1 representation of reality and above that the house is clean constantly.

Wayne est un hôte très sympathique et convivial. Sa maison est bien entretenue et très bien située dans une rue calme d' Harlem à proximité d'une ligne de métro menant très rapidement au coeur de Manhattan.
La chambre où j'ai dormi (semi-private room) présente l'inconvénient de n'être isolée de la cuisine et d'une pièce commune que par un paravent, ce qui ne permet pas toujours d'avoir un sommeil paisible. Par contre, elle est d'un prix attractif et s'avère calme lorsque les autres hôtes ne fréquentent pas trop les espaces communs. 
Globalement, le bilan est donc positif et je conseille cette adresse, en privilégiant les chambres privées pour ceux qui prisent la tranquillité nocturne..

I do recommend Wayne's place to stay. Thank you Wayne,Malcolm,and Scobbie! 
Harlem was such a full of spirit, his semi private couch was comfortable, relaxed. It's not just a room. You could enjoy the whole floor on your own with living room and kitchen. It's a home sweet home. I do enjoyed conversation,talks,Wayne's wine,food,talk,and talk ^^ 
Hope to be there again in a near future.

Came here to New York (or the States in general) for the 1st time and was warmly welcomed at Wayne's place.
Wayne is such a nice, funny and great host, there's absolutely nothing to complain about. When I was there, other guests stayed at his apartment as well and we would have conversations in the evenings and a few drinks to keep them going. I really liked the feeling of staying with other people and share my experiences with them I had made during the day or just talk about live here in the USA. But everyone would respect your need for privacy without any question if you needed it.
The room was super clean and the bed really comfortable! There's nothing to worry about the neighborhood as I wasn't troubled there for a second. I would definitely go there again, even just to hang out with Wayne once more.

stayed at wayne's home in 129th street, harlem for 3 weeks. 
wayne is a fantastic host& the neighborhood is great. 
if i come back to new york this is where i will stay.

Five stars without reservation. Wayne is a top-grade host and a high caliber person. He treats everyonelike family, very thoughtful and accomodating. I consider him my new friend. The apartment is nicer than it looks in the pictures, very clean and modern. I stayed in the City Room - Semi Private Couch (bed) and it was as pictured and better than it looks. Comforatable, safe, friendly, relaxing, there aren't enough adjectives. Just stay here. Wayne, I look forward to seeing you and all my new friends again soon! Say hi to everyone for me. Thanks, Sean

Very comfortable, occasionally a bit noisy but never too bad... Wayne and his staff are the best, and it was fun meeting some of the other travelers over a BBQ one evening with recorded and live acoustic music!  If you are ok with the hostel experience (as I am), the semi-private couch is for you.

What a wonderful host...moss def coming back , again and again!! I never felt like an outsider and the place is always clean and homely. But a special word to the woman behind the scenes , miss Kay!!! Thank you soo much for making my experience in NY a good one

This was my first experience within an AirBnB host and I have to say that it was perfect.
Wayne is a very friendly man with a really nice big house.
You will feel like home.

I had a great stay at Wayne's. He's a great host indeed. Hospitality always come first in his place. One of my NYC highlight is a house party at Wayne's. He gathered all his guests once and I've got to meet people from different backgrounds and regions around the world. Great $$$ and great experience. Definitely will recommend you and your friends to stay here.
I many like living at Wayne, I am very satisfied with my stay at his home and with its good mood

Wayne is one of the most friendly hosts from my perspective, his room was cozy and clean, he offered everything u need and respect your privacy which do make me feel like home, I do strongly recommend Wayne's place to stay in, it will be the memorable experience during the time your trip in New York.

Wayne was a wonderful host.I felt really comfortable with him and his friends who I met in his house during my stay; he also had a fantastic Easter party. The place is really clean, secure and only a short walk distance from the subway system. I definitely recommend his place to anybody who want to stay in NY.

Wayne was a super nice host! I felt really comfortable there. The bed and the appartment were clean. For someone who is alone, it is a very nice place to stay. The subway is just 5 minutes away and a supermarket across the street. And the area is also safe!
I would stay there definitely again!

I had a very comfortable stay in the semi-private room in Harlem. Wayne was friendly and helpful, access to public transportation was close enough, and the place was clean and comfortable. I am very satisfied and recommend this place if you're ok with a little noise from other guests doing kitchen prep for meals...not bad at all :) thanks Wayne!
Wayne is such an amazing host, i recommend every single person who drops in NY to stay at Wayne's Place... Looking forward to stay there again!

I went to New York on holidays, and found this airbnb on really short notice, so I was glad it worked out that quickly and that easily. 
Wayne is a super accomodating host, although I didn't see him much as he he also super busy. However, his team helped me out, whenever I had a question. 
The area of this room is a beautiful, family-friendly area in Harlem, about 4 blocks from the next subway, which was very handy. Safety concerns were completely out of place, even at night I never saw any sketchy people around. 
The semi-private room is a bed in the general living room that is hidden behind screens in the corner. I didn't find it too loud at all to sleep there, if anything, it was the nearby staircase into the living room that made some noise. I didn't mind that, though, as it was always only early evening and morning, when there was some noise (and obviously I didn't come to NYC to sleep in till noon). 
The house itself is a gorgious brick house with lots of floors and rooms, the kitchen is huge (and you can use that, too) and it even has a backyard. 
All in all I found it a pleasant stay at Wayne's place, the price is very reasonable for New York standards (don't forget you're in Manhattan!). I can absolutely recommend it!
Very pleasant time, nice area.  I appreciated the Sunday breakfast that Wayne made.

Værelset levede fint op til mine forventninger, behagelig seng, fint med opbevaringsplads gode bad og toiletforhold, samt adgang til køkken - og ikke mindst baghave med græs. Wayne er sjov og meget lattermild og vi kom rigtigt godt ud af det sammen. Lørdag morgen lavede han morgenmad til os der boede der, så jeg mødte et fransk par og et canadisk par, samt Waynes veninde. Vi havde en rigtig hyggelig morgenmad, med gode snakke. Stedet ligger 5 min fra indkøb og subway. Restauranten Red Rooster som er omtalt i Lonely Planet ligger lige om hjørnet. Det var spændende at bo i Harlem og helt uden problemer. Det er ikke sidste gang jeg har boet hos Wayne.

Wayne is such a wonderful host, I had a great time in Harlem. I'm a Jazz pianist so Wayne introduced me to the owner of a Jazz bar up the road from his place. He also has parties to introduce the people staying in different rooms and apartments to each other while he makes some reel American soul food delicacies! 

It's a nice area, the view of Manhattan as you walk up the street to 125th street station is awesome

When I go back to New I'm definitely staying at Waynes again!
I had a really great time by Wayne in Harlem. Good kitchen, good bathroom and overall is Waynes place the place I surely will come back to when come back to New York.

Althought i had to check in very late, wayne had already arranged for everything, the apartment is well kept, and as described, the neighbourhood is very safe, a few mins walk to the subway and the shops on the 125 st. Wayne was very helpful, informative and quick to respond to any questions I had. i would definitely stay there whenever i'm in NY and i would recommend it for anyone

Wayne was a great host. He was available whenever I needed anything and made me feel welcome.  I arrived very late at night and he was available nonetheless to let me in and show me around.  He also provided some valuable advice on getting around New York and things to do and see that are outside the usual tourist destinations.  Highly recommended.

Better than home!! Wayne is a genuinely great and caring person. I felt like family. I loved my staying here. On Sunday morning Wayne invited everyone who was staying with him for a delicious home-cooked breakfast!!

Wayne made me feel welcome, he met me at Midnight because I missed a connecting flight, on this tree lined street and every Brownstone had a nice little Garden. The apartment was decorated with the true flavor of the Harlem Reniassance. My sheets and the place were immaculate. He was fully booked with guests from Brazil,Germany, Canada and me from California.  Im sure that sometimes scheduling issues arise but Im confident that Wayne will bend over backwards to make sure his guests are satisfied. I highly recommend staying at Wayne s place, look the price is great He makes you welcome into his homes and private lives, and he always had a cheerful approach any situation. The Bathrooms were immaculate and everyone had a nice comfortable stay in NYC. He can tell you how to negotiate the City. And has a cheeful approach to every situation. So if you want stress free NYC living, with someone who can handle any situation positive or negative. then like the movie Wayne World, forParty, then Waynes Place for a nice NYC and Harlem Stay. He right in the hub Harlem activity. Lenox Street, The Apollo, The Schomberg, The Cotton Club and easy access to the Subway System to The JFK airport, Times Square, where ever you need to go. And you know what everyone has a kind word to say about Wayne, me to, I highly recommend him to anyone wanting to stay in NYC.
I really appreciate the warm hospitality that Mr. Wayne showed me, my stay became more than just an accommodation. Thank you very much and more power to him.
Excellent, it's all that I was looking for, the room was as the publication shows, very clean and comfortable. Wayne was a great host. Good place, good energy and very nice people. Thank you.

Wayne is a sweet guy and he was greeting me with a nice cold beer and he even invited me to his BBQ party. This room actually is a shared room with a separator in his living room. I switched to another private room as soon as I arrived. It could be much more fun if I had chosen to stay there. The location is great, near a subway station and within 3-5 mins walking distance to busses, grocery stores, and restaurants though the neighborhood is not as good as I expected.

Wayne was a great host! Everything was clean and comfortable. Subway station and grocery store around the corner. I will definitely come back.
Thanks for the great time in NYC.
Be with Wayne was a good experience, he has good things to share with you and the location is a great place too. The place is total safe, and the metro is 4 blocks away from the house.
I had a great time staying at Wayne's apartment. The place matched the description in the ad. Everything was perfect!

Wayne is a great person and a perfect host.
Welcoming and friendly, patient with a great sense of humor. 
The room is clean and organized very well. Comfortable approach to the living-room, kitchen and the backyard. The apt. has a perfect location - near the subway, bus station, restaurants and bars.
Wayne - thanks you so much for everything!

韦恩先生的房屋非常的干净整洁,同时韦恩先生给住客提供各种各样的设备与用品,可以借用厨房自己做饭,居住起来非常便利｡虽然房间是位于楼梯下面的半开放空间,不过有屏风可供遮挡,且平时一般都比较安静｡如果对隐私有所考量的话,欢迎选租韦恩先生的其他房间,各种类型都有,总有一款适合你!
居住在此地交通非常的方便,距离125街地铁站仅仅需要10分钟的路程,可乘坐ABCD线畅游曼哈顿｡
韦恩先生是一个非常热情的房东,他每个星期六都会招待住客吃早餐｡席间可以与来自世界各地的住客们交流,增长见识,结交新的朋友｡而且韦恩先生的厨艺非常棒!
房屋所处的哈林区其实并不像传说中的那么不安全,在居住的这段时间内我觉得这是一个非常安全､非常有活力的社区,居民也非常友善,有问必答,所以完全不用对安全有过多的担忧｡
价格方面非常合理,如果选择来纽约旅游的话,我认为这是一个非常理想的选择｡

Had a great time at waynes house ,he is a very nice person that is very attentive to the needs of the guest.
He lets you get on with your schedule which is great ,we had some good conversation and the house has a laid back feel . 
Close to transport,bars and other amenities.
Wayne is a wonderful guy with amazing hospitality. the area was pretty quiet so I didn't have any hard time to sleep. Definitely I would love to stay there again if I have a chance.

My stay at Wayne's place was very nice, and he was an excellent host. The apartment is in a very vibrant area of Harlem, and close to the subway station. The apartment itself is clean and maintained. Wayne does an excellent job of making travelers feel welcome and fostering an environment where other travelers can connect and spend time together. When I come to New York again, I would stay with Wayne.

I have a great time staying at Wayne's apartment.  He is a very good host and very welcoming.  I have been to NY many times before, but this is my first time in Harlem and also my first using airbnb.   I feel completely safe in this neighborhood.  The apartment is close to the subway (125 and Lennox) and M60 bus stop that goes to LGA.   I will not hesitate to stay at his apartment again next time when I come to NY.

The apartment is located in a very nice place, just 15 min walking from Central Park. There is a subway station near to the place, so it's possible to get to anywhere of the city quickly. Wayne is very nice and I definitely will recommend his place if you want to visit New York.

I had a great time in NYC. The room was in a great location even for a paranoid traveller. Easily accessible from La Guardia airport and close to subway stations. Wayne was a great host and very hospitable.

Wayne is a friendly and accommodating host, allowing me to check it after my 5am flight. He provided clear instruction which helps me arrive from JFK efficiently through the notoriously complex subway. The neighborhood is definitely safe even at night, but it is definitely not the usual touristy area. The unit is near 2 metro stations, ~5 stops away from Time Square, which made my trip extremely convenient; I was able to come back for naps in the middle of the day from Manhattan without wasting much time. The house is very clean and bright. While the bed is next to a big window facing the street, it is very quite at night for good rest. Wayne has also provided bikes and breakfast on Saturday morning for all guests; although I was too tired to join, I have no doubt that everything is 5-star excellent.
I had a wonderful time. I felt at home. Perfect location for exploring NY.
This guy is the best interlocutor. Great family, great talks and great value for modest price. Thanks Wayne for having me. Hope to see you again.

I had a great time staying at Wayne's apartment. The apartment /room and all shared spaces was extremely clean. The apartment is close to the subway, great restaurants, cafe's, a laundry mat and dry-cleaners. Wayne is very welcoming, and a great, knowledgable host. I am a native NY'er and was amazed exploring Harlem using Wayne's guide. I felt completely safe in this neighborhood. I will not hesitate to stay at his apartment again the next time I visit to NY.

I am not sure of where to start. I have been hosted in different spaces, and have never received so much welcome. Wayne Johnson and his family are amazing people. I have considered this apartment my home. I stayed here for almost 2 weeks and all I had was a warm home. Thank you Wayne and Jenn for your hospitality and love.

Wayne was an amazing and knowledgable host. His place is the epitome of a home away from home. He treats you like family and will always make sure you are having a good time. Thanks for everything Wayne!

First night when I arrived his place, I was a quite late. But he was waiting for me patiently. He provided me a very comprehensive orientation about his place and neighborhood area, including restaurants and other stores. His location was particularly convenient access to my clients and business meetings in NYC.  His neighborhood was quiet and decent in the community of Harlem. I was a bit surprised to see so many restaurants near the area, even Japanese restaurants. (I am consulting for Japanese restaurant business.) Overall, I had a very positive experience at his place, and this was my first time stay using Airbnb. I will most likely return his place for my next trip to NYC in the middle of this July. Thank you so much, Wayne!

I've had a very good time at Wayne's Place. He is a very nice guy and a great host. The place is located in Harlem so you have access to restaurants, bars and groceries. The trainstation is very close. If you are staying with Wayne, you should participate at the Saturday breakfast with all guests.

Wayne est un hôte absolument charmant. C'est le genre de personne à qui il suffit de parler une fois pour avoir l'impression de le connaître depuis 20 ans...
Il a été très accueillant et surtout très disponible pour m'orienter dans tous les aspects de mon séjour. 
Il organise un petit breakfast le samedi où tous les voyageurs Airbnb sont très amicalement conviés, excellente idée pour nous réunir ...
La "Semi Private Room" est très simple, largement suffisante pour un voyageur seul...
L'appartement en revanche est très vaste, très propre, la cuisine est grande avec un petit jardin agréable.
Le quartier est calme, situé à 15 mn de Central Park et 5 mn du sub.
Je vous recommande vivement Wayne...

跟描述一样,确实是半独立的房型,不过好在这个房间非常大,如果对隐私有要求屏风可以挡住一些,而且说实在的基本也没人过来,等于你自己拥有整个房间,对不对｡床略小,但是够睡了｡洗澡要上楼,但是请注意这个房间里面也有一个厕所,我是住了三天最后一天才发现这个事情让我很不开心｡｡｡
functional bed and everything, nice host who was very kind to provided a sunday breakfast to all the guests he has.
Just book it!

This was my first visit to New York, my first experience of using Airbnb and I was travelling alone, so was a bit apprehensive. Wayne was a wonderful host: welcoming, patient, knowledgeable and totally committed to making sure all his guests had what they needed.  The apartment was clean and well cared for, my bed was comfortable and even though I was in the semi-private room, genuine efforts were made to respect my privacy. 
I really enjoyed the community breakfast that Wayne puts on every Saturday morning and the chance to meet and exchange tips with other guests. 
The apartment is really well located, close to shops, restaurants and a subway stop on the 2/3 line which gets you to Time Square in 20 minutes.  I look forward to staying at Wayne's place on my next visit to New York and almost feel like I'd be staying with friends!

The experience was ideal. Wayne is the consummate host.
This was my first time using AirBnB as well as visiting NYC and I could not be more pleased. I would highly recommend Wayne. 5- stars!

Exactly what I needed. Great spot and just a few minutes by subway to get to Columbus Circle. Went to the river and Central Park for some nice running. There are some great places to eat in the area as well. Wayne was good to reach and helped me to get along the city.

Le logement est situé à deux rue du métro c'est donc pratique si on veut se déplacer, le quartier est sympa (magasins, bar, restaurant...).
L'appartement est grand, propre, et comprend tout ce dont on à besoin pour être installé confortablement (éléctroménager, salon, salle de bain équipée, cuisine équipée).
Wayne est sympathique et facile de conversation, il m'a laissé un délai supplémentaire pour quitter l'appartement le jour de mon depart, afin de profiter de la journée.

I had a great time at Wayne's!  This was my first experience with air bnb And I really did not know how the process went.  Wayne was very helpful in showing me how everything worked.  Check-in was seamless because he walked me through everything.  The living quarters were very clean and the location was awesome.  Harlem is a very energetic city and a cool place to hang out.  But if you want to see other parts of NY, the subway is a short, four blocks away.  I had no problems making It to mid-town Manhattan for my event.  Any time I am in NY, I will stay at Wayne's.  You should do the same!

Wayne was an incredible host! I have spent a lot of time in the area prior to my visit and can say that everything he has written accurately represents the neighborhood and everything it has to offer. Good food, easily accessible and a quick trip into midtown or other New York hotspots. The apartment itself was beautiful and offered a lot of opportunities to live like you would at home. Plenty of kitchen space and appliances with which to cook. The room was exactly what I was expecting. Overall it was a great experience and Wayne was there to completely enhance it by being friendly and available.

I really enjoyed my stay at Wayne's appartment. It's conviniently located within 5 minutes of the subway in Harlem. I felt very safe, although you'll find some sketchy characters in the neighbourhood. There's lots of police presence, so not a thing to worry about. I felt very welcome, and Wayne is a great host! Definetely a great place to stay.

Great place to stay in Harlem. Wayne is a great host always available for any help/assistance. Stayed for 5days with no complaints whatsoever. There are a no. of great places to eat in walking distance like Jacobs, Red rooster and Slyvias. Train station is a 10min walk away. 
Highly recommended.

Thank you Wayne for all the hospitality shown during the stay!
Saturday breakfast invitation was very nice and greatly appreciated, Wayne. I met very nice people from Italy and Brazil through the breakfast time.

Wayne was an exceptional host. I was out for most hours of the day and still met and conversed with the other tenants. It was warm and welcoming and I will be returning. I reccomend with place strongly.
I had a great time staying with Wayne, in terms of hospitality. He has a great personality. However, I would not recommend the semi private room.
Wayne is a very good host for you.
I've stayed at weyne's semi private room for 2 days. I liked. I suggest as an economic option. I had a TV, a well equipped kitchen and a comfortable bed.Thank you
Very comfortable stay, and a super kind host. Thanks Wayne
Es war alles da was benötigt wurde. Wayne ist sehr nett und fürsorglich.
Muy bien comunicación con Wayne, es una persona muy agradable y con buena disposición.
Pobyt byl velice příjemný, Wayne rád pomůže a poradí.
韦恩先生的房间十分干净整洁,有卧室､客厅､还有后院的小花园,环境十分舒适｡韦恩先生也非常好客,也很注意保护住客的隐私,这次入住是一次非常好的体验!
I enjoyed my stay here immensely. We had a bit of a wrinkle in scheduling and it was handled proactively, honestly and to my satisfaction by Wayne. I unequivocally recommend.

ﾊｰﾚﾑの教会とｱﾎﾟﾛｼｱﾀｰへ通うため､近いここを選びました｡9月に21泊しました｡
125ｽﾄﾘｰﾄに近く､地下鉄･列車･ﾊﾞｽのどの駅へも便利なので最高でした｡特に列車の駅からは郊外へも行けたので､とても良いﾛｹｰｼｮﾝです｡
ﾊｰﾚﾑの街には安いｽｰﾊﾟｰﾏｰｹｯﾄや商店が多く､気軽なﾚｽﾄﾗﾝもたくさんあります｡一人で暮らしても全く平気でした｡
ｱﾊﾟｰﾄには洗濯機が無いけど､すぐ近くにｺｲﾝﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰがありました｡
ﾎｽﾄのWhaynは地下の部屋に住んでいて､頼もしかったです｡彼はとても紳士で良い人でした｡
毎週土曜日のPower Breakfast は他の部屋のｹﾞｽﾄが集まるので､国際的で楽しかった｡ 私は予定が合わず､一度しか参加できなかったのが残念でした｡次回行くときは必ず土曜日の午前は空けておきます!
