So great host, It's a super great option if you go for vacation alone or with your couple or friends.
Wayne it's such a great person.
Good access from NY Subway line (2 or 3) to his place and easy to get in the place through his front door.

Wayne was a great host.  He accommodated my late arrival and departure.  He even provided breakfast which I was unfortunately unable to attend.  He was easy to talk to and provided everything I needed.  The room was semi-private, but I pretty much had the basement and a half bath to myself.  There was a closet for all my clothes.  It is in a beautiful brownstone in the heart of Harlem with a close proximity to Red Rooster, Harlem Social, and Slyvia's.  A great, clean, cheap spot to stay if you are visiting Columbia, City College, or the national gem that is Harlem.
This place is amazing Harlem is amazing this is the best place to stay in New York City so stylish so affordable and Wayne is an amazing host super fun to hang out with

I live in NYC and had one week of overlap between the end and beginning of a sublease agreement. Wayne and his place exceeded expectations - he is kind, funny, calm and an absolute hosting pro! He's been doing this for years. The other guests in the house were also very nice - anywhere form Germany to Australia. Wayne cooked brunch for all his guests on the Saturday I stayed there. I stayed in the semi-private room, which actually had more privacy than I anticipated. The area in Harlem is vibin, too - cool restaurants and bars to choose from; an easy commute downtown as well! Could not recommend any higher.
Wayne is a terrific host with a beautiful home in the heart of a great NY neighborhood.

Das war meine erste Airbnb Erfahrung überhaupt, und ich war deshalb zu Beginn ein wenig nervös, ob alles gut klappen würde. Vom JFK bin ich mit der Bahn angereist und weil ich aufgrund einer Verspätung meinen Anschlussflieger verpasst habe, bin ich erst um 3 Uhr Nachts bei Wayne abgenommen. Ich hatte ihm das aber von London aus geschrieben und er hat mir auch sofort geantwortet, das er den Schlüssel in einer Schlüsselbox für mich hinterlegt, und hat mir zu dieser den Code gegeben. Fand ich super. In der Nacht ist er dann sogar aufgestanden, als ich angekommen bin, und hat mir mein Bett gezeigt. Ich habe dann den Schlüssel für das Haus bekommen und konnte mich auf meine Entdeckungstour von New York begeben. Das war vom Haus aus auch sehr gut zu erledigen, da 2 Subway Stationen in der unmittelbaren Nähe sind mit denen man in nur wenigen Minuten direkt am Times Square sein kann, was ein immenser Vorteil ist. Das Internet bei ihm ist sehr schnell, was mir geholfen hat Mithilfe des Internets meine Tripps gut zu planen. Ich habe mich im Haus von Wayne sehr wohl gefühlt. Man kommt sich vor, als ob man bei einem guten alten Freund übernachtet. Er ist hilfsbereit wenn man Hilfe braucht, aber sonst sehr diskret. Ab und an mal, habe ich andere Gäste in der grossen Küche gesehen, die man auch benutzen kann, und wir haben uns gegenseitig über New York ausgetauscht, was man am besten wie besichtigt, aber da das Haus sehr groß ist, ist man sich sonst kaum über den Weg gelaufen. Es ist alles sehr sauber, was für mich mit am wichtigsten war. Das Bett was ich hatte, war in keinem abgetrennten separaten Zimmer, sondern in der hinteren Ecke des Wohnzimmers, das sollte man vor der Buchung wissen. Aber das hat mich persönlich nicht besonders gestört, weil ich eh den ganzen Tag unterwegs war. Dafür war mein Aufenthalt dort auch unheimlich günstig. Für wen das aber nichts ist, der kann bei Wayne aber auch ein normales Zimmer buchen, da er noch einige anbietet. Für den Zeitraum, für den ich gebucht hatte, waren die anderen Zimmer aber schon vermietet, so das mir nur dieses angeboten wurde. Was wie gesagt für mich voll in Ordnung ging, da ich immer sehr spät abends erst zurück gekommen bin von meinen Trips und morgens immer früh raus, da ich meine Zeit gut nutzen wollte. In der Nähe gibt es einen Supermarkt wo ihr alles einkaufen könnt was ihr braucht, falls ihr Zuhause frühstücken oder essen wollt. Die Sachen könnt ihr im Kühlschrank aufbewahren und auch wenn ihr mal Zuhause Verschnaufen wollt könnt ihr das im Wohnzimmer von Wayne bei guter Musik tun, alles kein Problem. Ich kann die Unterkunft nur wärmstens empfehlen. Wayne ist ein sehr guter Gastgeber, der einen sofort das Gefühl gibt, willkommen zu sein. Wir hatten uns auch einige male unterhalten und er ist ein wirklich netter, intelligenter und sozialer Mensch mit den Herzen an richtig Fleck. Wenn ihr ein Zimmer...

Wayne was an outstanding host.  I needed a place as I waited for an apartment to open up while going to school.  He was attentive to all of my needs as a guest constantly asking if I needed anything.  One of the things that stood out for me was the amazing art that decorated his walls.  It's eclectic and clean.  The location was great!  I'd recommend anyone who wants to  soak up the sites of Harlem to stay at your place.  Trains are within walking distance and restaurant row is right around the corner.  Plenty of Soul Food eateries, music and bars.  Thanks, Wayne
Great value for the price. The house was clean and comfortable as well as being close to the train and plenty of stores.
The semi-private suite is a great value for the location.
This semi private room was cute and cozy, the house was lovely and the location was very convenient.
carino.
Great spot with a wonderful host.

Had a good time at Wayne's place and he has given some great tips. Check out the gospel service nearby. 
The house is decorated with very nice paintings and is very colourful. The location is ok and you have got several metro lines nearby.
Terrific experience, Wayne's hospitality makes the stay feel like home away from home in the heart of a great neighborhood.
还可以

I had quite comfortable time at Wayne’s home.

Wayne and his family is such nice and welcoming host with big smile.

Apartment is in Harlem area and train stations are 5-7 min walk on 125th street. If you stretch a bit yourself then you can reach central park by foot 15min. 

I would definitely recommend someone to choose this.

I had a nice experience staying at Wayne's. Unfortunately I only got to meet himself for one day, but there was another person there supervising the appartment that was very welcoming as well.
The appartment is conveniently located in Harlem, in short walking distance to several Metro stops. The neighborhood is lively, but can get a little noisy at night.
The room and the kitchen/bathroom was very clean and tidy.
You will be sharing the appartment with other guests and the stairs/floors make quite some noise. If you are a light sleeper, that might not be optimal for you.
Nice place to stay especially the other rooms.
Awesome location! Wonderful and considerate host. Accommodated my needs and very flexible. Would definitely come back, however would not recommend semi-private room for long term stay.

name: Lenox Av. Apartment
summary: My place is steps away from Apollo Theater, Corner Social, Sylvia's Restaurant, Red Rooster. You’ll love my place because of the most convenient  location on the main Lenox Av, close to the express trains 2,3 that will take you to Times sq in 15 min. There is a variety of really great restaurants on Lenox Av. 2 min away is a really great coffee shop, or Starbucks, market to buy groceries, Deli shops are open 24 hrs. My apartment is very warm in the winter.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Katerina was an awesome host! The first second we arrived she showed us some amazing places and made recommendations for our next days! It was very fun to stay with her and we are looking forward to see her again sometime, hopefully in NY! :)

Estuvimos sólo un día completo (dos noches) en casa de Katerina y la verdad nos sentimos muy cómodos. Apenas llegamos Keterina nos dio las llaves y tuvimos total libertad para entrar y salir de la casa. El lugar está ubicado en Harlem, a dos cuadras del metro y cerca de varios bares y resturantes. Si bien estuvimos sólo un día completo (dos noches), fue ideal para conocer New York, moverse por el downtown y regresar a la noche a cenar y seguir paseando por Harlem o ir a algun bar antes de volver a la casa
Katerina was so warm and welcoming, and her space is beautiful, bright, clean and private. I had a lovely stay! Thanks Katerina!
Katerina was great! Communication, check-in and check-out were very smooth. The bed was comfortable, hot shower, privacy, two blocks for 2 & 3 express trains.

We had a very nice stay at Katerina's place.
She arranged everything for our arrival since she was out of town, and we had all the details we needed to get to her place.
She was available despite the distance.
The room is very cozy, colorful and the beds are comfortable.
We will definitely come back next time and we will recommend her place to our friends and family.
This was a nice apartment. About 30 minutes by train to Times Square. Didn't get to meet the host, but the place was nice, ready and clean.

The location was great (only two blocks from the subway) which allowed us to get into downtown really easily to see all the sights and the tourist attractions. The location was also great for experiencing some authentic American culture in Harlem.

This place is adorable and there is a train station and bus stop almost at every corner. Katerine is very helpful and guides you through all the tourists areas you want to visit. It is only a few stops for the train to take you to Central Park, Uptown, Empire State Building, and more....

Katerina was a great host even though she was not present. The appartment is cozy  and have good surroundings. It is close to nice cafes, restaurants, shopping opportunties and it is easy to get transport to other parts of New York.
Everything really clean and as advertised, 2 blocks away from the subway and Katerina really accesible for check in and out.

Katerina is a great host that is willing to help out with any questions and gave us suggestions of things to do around the neighbour hood and city. She was friendly and would ask us how our day went and other conversations. 

Living situation was very home feeling with all the necessities. It was located a couple blocks away from express transit making it easy to get to time square (15 mins).

Thanks for the great hospitality.

Katherine is a wonderful person!
It was amazing our experience in your apartment.
His apartment is very clean and functional, plus the location is good and close to everything.
I hope someday you'll come back.

Katerina was exceptionally responsive, we did not have the pleasure to meet her in person during our stay but she quickly coordinated a clever way to get access to her space from abroad. The neighborhood is vibrant, and close to #2 and #3 trains to Downtown/Brooklyn. Katerina's space was clean and cozy. The space is truly in the heart of Harlem it's about an $30.00 Uber ride from LGA. I would love to stay here again on my next visit to NYC.
Thanks for a great stay Katerina! Quick and easy communication and Katerina arranged easy access when she wasn't in town. Location was central to restaurants and subways. Would recommend.

Katerina was an excellent hostess, although we did not know her, her availability and veracity of the offered is 100%, based on the value of a hotel, this is a gift to stay and with subway one block where you can go everywhere In NY, 100% recommended

Chilenos no duden en tomar este alojamiento y no gasten de más!!!!!!!

Katerina estuvo siempre atenta a nuestras consultas y respondió todo muy rápidamente. Aunque no la conocimos en persona, tuvimos todas las instrucciones y todo lo necesario en el departamento para una estadía confortable. El departamento está muy bien ubicado a pocas cuadras ddl metro, el barrio es muy interesante. Lo recomendamos totalmente

Katerina was just the kindest, warmest host one could ask for. She accommodated us in every way. Her flat although older, was clean, well maintained and equipped with everything you need to complete your stay. 
Located in Harlem on Malcom X Boulevard you are accompanied by great dining such as Red Rooster, Social Corner et al to name a couple. The ever famous Apollo theater just a hop, skip and a jump away for incredible entertainment. There's a Whole Foods market for any food or refreshments you may want. 
The subway station is just 2 minutes away and now your time to experience all that NYC has to offer is at your fingertips. I highly recommend Katerina and if I m ever in NY again I would stay in a heartbeat. Thanks Katerina .
Really nice apartment, Katerina answered any question I had even while she was away.

This was my first time airbnbing it.  My sixteen year old and I were made so fantastically comfortable.  Katerina was as kind as they come and her place was Spotless.  and that is no exaggeration! The location was in a convenient anda safe spot.  We at no point ever felt vulnerable in the neighborhood.  The accommodations were very (Website hidden by Airbnb) son and I each a had an uber comfortable twin bed with an attached kitchen.  While Katerina was there, we really didn't see her.  She was working for her job very hard, but when we did she was wonderful.  I cannot recommend staying here enough!

Katerina is a warm and kind host. She helped me with my bags, answered all my questions and was concerned about my comfort. Her place is super clean, quiet and very comfortable. I recommend this house to everyone.

Amazing host, very flexible with our check-in. Communicating with Katerina was always easy and fast. Her place is cozy and nice if you are in NYC for a couple of days and you need a place to crash at nights, her neighborhood it's secure and the subway is 3 blocks away and there are a supermarket and everything you need really close.

Katerina is very friendly and always responds quickly and comes to help us even she’s quite busy during our stay. The room is very clean and convenient, beds are so comfortable. It’s located close to the subway station, easy to get to downtown and restaurants and shops are just around street corners. Definitely recommend.

Katerina is a great host - thoughtful and respectful of our privacy. Her apartment was bigger than we expected and super clean. It's close to lots of great places and the subway. I would definitely stay with her again!
Apartment well situated near a Whole Food and metro station. Katerina  is a very nice host. We spent a very good week.
Great place to stay!

Prompt communication, clean and comfortable space, overall a great experience. The location is also convenient for taking the metro. There are several flights of narrow stairs to get to the apartment, which was fine for my friend and I since we are young and not disabled, but might be challenging for older people or those with physical limitations.

Katerina was really great and respectful of our privacy. 
The flat is near a Subway entrance going to downtown, so everything was perfect!

We really enjoyed staying at Katerina's place. She's an excellent and hospitable host, and the space was large and surprisingly private for being a room in an apartment. Katerina was extremely responsive and met us at the door when we arrived. Overall a great experience!
房間和主人都超棒,離地鐵站很近,交通方便,紐約的好住處,推薦!
Katerina was a great host! She arranged everything for our arrival and was very flexible with us when we left. Appartment is perfectly located. Easy to go everywhere in Manhattan.

name: King Bdrm w/private bath/ocean view
summary: Beautiful Ocean and Diamond Head view from your bedroom window!  This room offers a comfortable king bed, private ensuite bathroom and free street parking.  Close drive to outdoor activities and trendy restaurants, 15mins from Waikiki, 10 mins to beaches, 20mins from airport, 7mins from Kahala Mall and grocery stores. The room is located on the lower floor of a residential house. Being so high up on a hill you feel like you are living on top of the world with ocean views from every window!
space: This private non-smoking room is located in the lower floor of a 2 storey house, entrance is through our front door and down one flight of stairs in the living room.  The Living room, deck, and kitchen will be shared with myself, husband and young son. We also have a house cat, please do not let her out of the house. 1) Memory Foam King size Bed  2) Flat screen TV comes with over 200 channels 3) Free Wifi 4) Mini Refrigerator with small freezer compartment 5) Private ensuite bathroom with full size tub 6) Own quiet Air Conditioner 7) Ocean, Diamond Head and Wakiki Views from your room window 8) Beach towels 9) Shampoo/Conditioner and body wash  10) Hair dryer 11) Iron and ironing board 12) Laundry detergent 13) Desk in hallway outside room Only things you need to share are the: 1) Kitchen - You are welcome to prepare light meals in our kitchen 2) shared Laundry- is available if needed between 8am-7pm.
description: Beautiful Ocean and Diamond Head view from your bedroom window!  This room offers a comfortable king bed, private ensuite bathroom and free street parking.  Close drive to outdoor activities and trendy restaurants, 15mins from Waikiki, 10 mins to beaches, 20mins from airport, 7mins from Kahala Mall and grocery stores. The room is located on the lower floor of a residential house. Being so high up on a hill you feel like you are living on top of the world with ocean views from every window! This private non-smoking room is located in the lower floor of a 2 storey house, entrance is through our front door and down one flight of stairs in the living room.  The Living room, deck, and kitchen will be shared with myself, husband and young son. We also have a house cat, please do not let her out of the house. 1) Memory Foam King size Bed  2) Flat screen TV comes with over 200 channels 3) Free Wifi 4) Mini Refrigerator with small freezer compartment 5) Private ensuite bathroom with full size t
neighborhood_overview: Maualani Heights / Kaimuki area has majestic ocean views and breezy trade winds, a very quiet and safe neighbourhood. We have a list of our favourite neighbourhood restaurants we can share!  This area offers a great variety of local restaurants and supermarkets, very close to all amenities, beaches, Waikiki, downtown and shopping. It is approximately 20mins by car on HWY1 or a $15-25 Uber/ Lyft fare to Airport. There is also a bus Route 14 a couple minutes walk from our house that will take you to Kahala mall, Kahala Beach park, Waikiki, The Honolulu Zoo and Aquarium.  The bus is slow, and not very frequent, we highly recommend renting a car to the make best use of your time. There is free street parking in front of our house on the opposite side of the street.
notes: No smoking in or around the premises  Kindly take shoes off when entering the house One cat living in the common areas  Your private room is on the lower floor of our 2 storey house. One flight of stairs needed to go down to your room. Entrance to use is the front door of the house. We have the “August Smart Lock” system for our front door for easy access, please have your "August Home App" set up prior to arrival so the electronic keys can be issued to your smart phone.  This system only requires Bluetooth from your smartphone to operate, wifi is not needed after initial setup.
transit: CAR: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! We have free street parking on the opposite side of the street to our house.  Easiest way to get around is renting a car as you can see the island at your own leisure. PUBLIC BUS: The Bus stop is 2 minutes walk down hill from our house with route #14 taking you to Kahala mall (Whole Foods, Times Supermarket, Longs Drugs, restaurants etc.) Waikiki, Honolulu Zoo, Aquarium, numerous restaurants and Supermarkets, are along that route.  The bus comes every 45min-1hr and may take 30mins or more to Waikiki. TOUR BUSES: are available for pickup and drop off in Waikiki if you want to explore highlights of the island.  The ones we recommend are “Aloha Bus, Waikiki Trolley, Honolulu Hop on Hop off  Trolley, Jalpak Trolley”. If you go to their website you can purchase day passes in advance. WALKING: NOT RECOMMENDED! We are located 3/4 up a large hill so walking up or down the hill is very strenuous.
access: Our kitchen is free for you to use if you would like to prepare light meals. You are more than welcome to sit and eat in the kitchen, the balcony on the top floor or sit in the back yard and enjoy the fruit trees.
interaction: We will be home if you need anything, as my husband works from his home office and I am in and out of the house or you can email or text us and I will respond.
house_rules: - Please be respectful of house furnishings and profanities used in shared common areas. - Turn off all lights, fan and air conditioner, close and lock windows, when leaving your room for the day. - Take off outdoor shoes while you are in the house - No smoking, no drugs, no loud music in or near the house. - Laundry is available between 8-7pm, after using washer, please leave door open. - Please do not eat or leave open food in your room as this leads to unwanted insects.  You may eat in our kitchen or lanai. - checkin time is between 2pm-11pm - checkout time is before 11am

host.host_about: We are Canadians who moved to our dream destination of Hawaii and look forward to hosting and meeting new friends in our new home.

reviews.comments: Mimi and his husband are great hosts. They are really kind and responsive to our questions. Their house is so new and clean, and the view there is amazing that we can see diamond head and beaches from the balcony and our room! We are so exited to be their first guests. The room is cozy, clean and the bed is comfy. We enjoy our stay here ver much!

This is a suite in a house on a hillside overlooking Diamond Head and Waikiki.  The view from the house lanai is tremendous.  The host was very accommodating.  The furnishings were comfortable, with air conditioning controlled in the room, a ceiling fan and light with remote controls, a television with a million channels (it's Hawaii, we never used it). The bedroom and the private bath and shower are nicely appointed.  The room hallway provides access to a small refrigerator, and to the washer and dryer.

One caution is that the house is on a hillside and the bedroom is one flight down.  Access to the house is on a short but steep slanted path to the steps.  So, if you have mobility issues, this may not be for you.

優しくて､親切で最高でした｡
また来たいです｡

It's a great scenic place, over looking ocean and Diamond head. It's clean, King bed, Bedroom with private bath, space enough for a couple. street parking. 
It's awesome place to relax on your vacation with awesome views. But don't expect it to be right next to the beach as its high up there for a reason i.e . Ocean View. Nice clean place. we would definitely go back to this place and also recommend our friends.
Mimi and her family were very comforting. Great location and very close to activities on the island.

너무 깨끗하고 좋았어요
주인부부도 친절하고 
뷰도 너무 좋았습니다
와이키키 시내에 숙소에서 
내상을 입고 이곳에 와서 
힐링하고 가네요
다음에 오게 되면 
다시 올 생각입니다

We had a great stay here!!
The place are same like photos,everything was clean,great view,great room. I just wanna say PERFECT for us staying in Hawaii.
That's the one I wanted to stay.
Especially family is awsome.
We have just checked out today but already miss you..
I am going to go back Hawaii to stay at your house again!!

素晴らしい滞在でした｡
写真の様に､眺めも良く､お部屋も綺麗でした｡
何より人の温かさに触れたｽﾃｲでした｡
ﾚﾝﾀｶｰされる方にはｵｽｽﾒです!
ｶｲﾑｷの周りにも美味しいﾚｽﾄﾗﾝやｶﾌｪがあるので大好きな街になるはずです!

This is a beautiful home with an incredible view of Diamond Head and Honolulu.  The rental is for a single bedroom with a newly remodeled private bath downstairs.  The family lives upstairs.  We had a wonderful stay and hope to do it again soon.

Le logement de Mimi était splendide. La salle de bain comme la chambre étaient très propres et la vue du logement était spectaculaire.

Les hôtes étaient très sympathiques et leur petit garçon était adorable.

This is by far one of the nicest places we have ever stayed in while visiting Oahu. The residence resides in a wonderful  and quite neighborhood perfect for getting away from the everyday hustle while providing breath taking views of Diamond Head and Waikiki. Truly a perfect location to rest yet close enough to get to any major attraction without causing any inconvenience. Mimi and her family are wonderful! If you had to pick one place to stay on the island - this should be it!

MiMi's place was lovely. She and her husband were both super friendly and welcoming. The view from their porch is gorgeous- you can see Le'ahi (Diamond Head), the ocean, and the city skyline. Everything in the guest room is new and nice and super clean, and the bed is large and soft and comfortable. The bedroom and bathroom feel very private, and we appreciated the mini fridge and being able to do a load of laundry during our stay. They provided thoughtful extras like chilled bottled water and beach towels. It's easy to stay cool with the ceiling fan and AC (we were there in January and we're fine using just the ceiling fan). We would definitely stay here again!

MiMI's house is 5 Star with the most spectacular view over Dimond Head, Waikiki and the Pacific Ocean.From the moment we arrived MiMi and her husband Norm and of course their beautiful son made us feel so welcome. Our accommodation was new, modern and really peaceful with every thing we needed. The bedroom is very private with a beautiful ensuite bathroom. There is cable TV, a fridge and the use of the laundry with both washing machine and dryer. We loved the very whizzy smart front door locking system operated from our mobile phones . ( A home away from home ) We can highly recommend MiMi's Airbnb to any one looking for a fantastic stay in Honolulu and can't for a return stay. Thanks a million MiMi and Norm.........Pete & Di, Sydney Australia.
Mimi and her family are very hospitable. They live in the upstairs portion of the house, and your bedroom is located downstairs. Thank you for the beautiful stay!
Such AMAIZING place.I am giving 10 put of 10 for everything in this place.
The location was ideal for us

We had great time here. MiMi and her family are so kind and friendly, The view from on the balcony is  amazing,  the house is so clean, beautiful and bright. The location is also convenient for people who has a car. I wanna stay here again if I have an opportunity.

とても親切でﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰな家族でした｡小さいお子さんも人懐っこくて､ちょっとしたﾎｰﾑｽﾃｲをしているような気持ちになれました!家もとても綺麗でﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰからは夕日や夜景もきれいでした｡車がある人にはｵｽｽﾒです!

The location near the Kahala Mall was ideal for us as we were visiting family in the area.  It is not near the more touristy areas, but we weren't looking for that. In addition, it is close to many good restaurants. It was outstandingly clean and the hosts were more than helpful with any questions we had.
Best stay ever in Honolulu. Highly recommended to anyone. The host are awesome and the view is stunning!!

MiMi and her family are definitely some of the best hosts I've had the pleasure of knowing. They made me feel right at home and provided travel guidance throughout my stay. Great location, easy to get around and perfect distance from Waikiki. Their balcony also offers an amazing view. Room is lovely and clean as pictured. Would definitely recommend and hope to stay here again! Thanks Mimi, Norm and Kayden!

Arriving at MiMi's beautiful house up the hill with georgous view of Waikiki and Diamond Head is the ultimative airbnb dream and we felt comfortable at once. The house is nicely decorated and the guest room at the lower level with own bathroom is just great! The bed is very soft and the sheets so nice, making you sleep like in heaven. The private bathroom is big and everything was spotless! Washing machine and tumbler worked perfectly. There is a fridge for the guests, beach towels are provided and we could even borrow a beach umbrella. TV and WiFi worked very well. 
We had a great time with the whole family eating out and even spend a beautiful day at North Shore together. We would love to return!

Mimi's place is beyond our expectation. Their home is very clean, beautiful, and convenient with only 15 minutes drive to waikiki (btw, it is easy to find a free parking at waikiki. On the west side, you can park at Ala Moana park. On the east side, you can find parking at Honolulu zoo.) 

Upon arrival, Mimi and her family gave us a warm welcome. They shared tips about where to eat and gave us suggestions about where to find beautiful places to take photos. They also offered us beach towels, beach chair and umbrella. 

The room is bright, comfortable, and quiet. With private access to the bathroom, it is as convenient as a hotel room. They also provide a fridge for us and have some bottle water  for us. 

Mimi and her husband are very helpful and kind hearted. After the first day snorkeling, my husband got serious sunburn everywhere on his body. We were worried because we booked another snorkeling tour early morning in the next day but we didn't have long sleeve clothes. We almost canceled the tour because we did not want worsen the sunburn. At this time, Mimi's husband kindly lent us his clothes and they fit very well on my husband. Thanks to them, we could make it to the tour on the next day. 

Absolutely recommend this place!! They are very kind family and I believe you will have great time during your stay.
Great location with spectacular view. Room is modern and clean. Host is friendly and resourceful. Will definitely come back!

Die Begrüssung von Mimi und ihrer Familie war sehr herzlich. Wir haben uns sofort willkommen und wohlgefühlt. Unser Zimmer war sehr sauber und schön eingerichtet. Wir erhielten gute hilfreiche Tipps (Essen,Aktivitäten). Auf unserer rund drei wöchigen Reise in Hawaii, war dies eine unserer lieblings Unterkünfte. Sollten wir ein weiteres Mal nach Oahu kommen, hoffen wir wieder einen Platz bei Mimi zu erhalten. Vielen Dank!

MiMi's room looks exactly like the pictures and is *VERY* clean and quiet! The house is beautiful and modern and recently remodeled. Secluded in a good way--quiet at night and peaceful but a 10 minute drive to the beach or Diamond Head and 20 min to downtown! It was nicer than a hotel room and in a better location!! Make sure you have a car because the hill they live on is steep and you will need it to get around. The hosts are also very accommodating and welcoming and have a list of great places to eat and visit while you are on the island if you are new to the area. All in all I highly recommend this place!!
Beautiful clean house with great view on Dimond Head and Waikiki beach, Mimi is a great host providing insiders tips and suggestions for daily activities.

Mimi's place had a beautiful view of Diamond Head and the surrounding city. It was up on the hill and out of the way enough to feel private and away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Mimi and Norm were wonderful hosts that were fun to talk to and very helpful. They provided great amenities and advice of places to stay. They have a list of places to eat that was very helpful. Thanks for helping to make the start of our trip comfortable and we had fun getting to know you a little bit.

What else can be said that hasn't been said already?   We lucked out when we reserved this place!  They are both the most gracious hosts.  Their home is clean, updated, and nice.  The view of downtown Honolulu, Diamond Head, and the ocean is perfect.  Our room was great with an updated, modern bathroom.  There is AC in the room if you prefer.   We were quite comfortable here and would certainly stay here again.
Mimi went above and beyond to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. I would highly recommend staying here!

Very friendly family. Both the bedroom and upstairs deck offer great views of Diamond Head and Honolulu's skyline. The bedroom and attached bathroom offer a modernized accommodation. The bed is very comfortable. A separate small fridge is also available.

Great communication before and during our trip.  Norm and Mimi had great tips on where to eat and activities to do.  The room was great it had everything we needed during our stay we only needed to bring carryon luggage with us.  The air conditioning and fan was fantastic and the room was very clean.  The view was amazing!!!!  Rental car and GPS is a must if staying here.  This was exactly what we expected and couldn't ask for kinder hosts!

The view from the balcony was absolutley mindblowing. It is a really quiet area up there. Norm welcomes us very kind and friendly. The room was clean and the bed very comftorble. 
Highly recommend to have a vehicle because the last bus departs at 8.30pm. 
We enjoyed our stay there.

Nice, clean house, with a great view. The bedroom with bathroom is located downstairs of the house, while Mimi and family stay upstairs. You can share the nice balcony they have overlooking waikiki beach, diamond head, and city. Mimi & Husband were great hosts and recommended great places to eat. I prefer to rent a car, it is in the hills, but only a 10-15 minute drive to Wakiki beach, and shopping. My fiance and I enjoyed our stay.

Upon our arrival, we were greeted by the whole family and their son Kayden even gave me a hug! They each grabbed a luggage of ours to bring inside - wow, if that's not the Aloha spirit then I don't know what is! We felt as if we were part of the family from the start. The house looked exactly as pictured. The room was clean and modern and the bed was amazingly comfortable. We also borrowed their umbrella and beach chairs which came in very handy on our beach days. The location was pretty central to everything. We didn't have to worry about getting stuck in the Waikiki traffic or paying for  parking. We would highly recommend you stay here. We will certainly be back!

Lugar fantástico, a vista para o "Diamond park" é simplesmente inacreditável. Uma dica, fique pelo menos uma semana, é se puder tome um café da manha de domingo com eles. O Norm faz um waffles de bluebarry muito bom..
Lovely comfortable room in lovely family home.  Quiet and relaxing yet a short drive to all the beauties of Honolulu and the island.  A perfect place to stay with lovely hosts.  Highly recommend.

Mimi and Norm are great hosts.  They are warm, welcoming and enjoyable to be around.  The house itself was very clean, spacious and beautiful.  The location is hard to beat as it is central to Honolulu and the rest of Oahu and very easy to get around.  Parking is included with the house, as well as a brand new kitchen, washer and dryer and comfy king bed.  I would recommend Mimi and Norm to anybody looking for an Airbnb in Honolulu. Had an amazing time!

It was the best lodging on Oahu trip.
Our couple chose this place because Waikiki seemed too complicated.
It is recommended that you choose here if you want a quiet view.
I would like to use a communal kitchen and recommend it if it is not inconvenient.
Young couples are landlords, so there is no inconvenience to communicate with each other like (Hidden by Airbnb) translator.
It is also good to get a recommendation of a nearby beach or a good restaurant.
It was family-centered and it was impressive to have breakfast.
I would like to visit again if I come back to Oahu.
The single room is small, 2 is suitable for use.
Beach towels are also available. A large towel is also available.
The cleanliness is perfect. The air conditioner is cool.
We had various conversations with the owner here. We were a Korean couple.
Mimi and her family are really great. It was a pleasure staying with them. The room is pretty as per the description and Mimi makes you feel at home !

It's very nice stay in HNL.
They give us a lot information about HNL(good restaurants &good place )
Also free use beach chair and (Website hidden by Airbnb) so sweet .
Very nice view from Mimi's house . I saw rainbow twice .

Location, Location, Location!  Not only was the private room very clean and well kept, the location to Diamondhead was perfect.  Close to shops, restaurants, things to do.  Mimi and Norm were exceptional hosts and very helpful when trying to figure out our next meal in town.  I loved visiting here and if we return to Hawaii, we'll book here again if they're still hosting!

MiMi's accommodations were all and more of what is described in her advertisement.  The views from the lanai are outstanding.  We had full access to their kitchen.  The bedroom and bath are immaculate, modern and comfortable.  A king sized bed and air conditioning are added pluses.  I can't do without these amenities.  And, the entire Chan clan are the most amazing of loving people; warm, intelligent and ever so helpful.  Norm, husband and father, is high tech savvy and helped me with my computer/ tablet/ iPhone needs.  MiMi is well versed in the tech department, too.  Plenty of street parking in a quiet neighborhood and lovely home occupied by beautiful, loving people.
Mimi and Norm were so amazing! They were very welcoming and we loved their son so much! The view and room were perfect! Would definitely stay here again!

Fantastic view in a quiet neighborhood. Parking was never an issue for me. The view from the bedroom looks out on Diamond Head and Waikiki, which was beyond my expectations. The interior design of the house makes me want to redecorate my own place. Overall, my experience was very good.

Wir haben die letzten Tage unseres Hawaii Urlaubs bei MiMi, Norm und ihrem Sohn verbracht und es hätte schöner nicht sein können. 
Bereits der Empfang war sehr herzlich und wir haben uns direkt wie zu Hause gefühlt. Die Familie ist sehr sympathisch.

Das Zimmer mit angeschlossenem Bad ist toll eingerichtet. Besonders bequem ist das Bett. Alles war sehr sauber und von der Ausstattung her hat man alles was man benötigt.

Vom Haus aus hat man einen atemberaubenden Ausblick über ganz Honolulu samt Diamond Head. Von der Dachterasse aus kann man wunderschöne Sonnenuntergänge beobachten. 

Die Unterkunft ist absolut empfehlenswert und wir hoffen irgendwann wiederzukommen.
很热情的一家人,给了我们很多实用信息｡还教我们怎么在waikiki停车省钱~停在商场的停车场,任意买件东西可以免费2小时停车!房间很整洁并且配有需要的毛巾,洗浴用品,还贴心的准备了沙滩毛巾｡阳台望出去的景色非常美~和介绍的一模一样｡主人还邀请我们共进了一次早餐,非常美味｡很好的一次体验~
虽然房子离市中心有点距离,但是开车出门完全没有影响,而且家里看出去的风景太美太美了!

Mimi is no doubt one of the best host. Her place is super clean, organized and has everything you want. Mimi’s family is very nice and willing to help! They also have a very cute cat! Overall, a great choice to stay for our Hawaii trip!

MiMi's place is a beautiful space with superb city view. The bathroom and bedroom were pristine and they were very thorough with checking us in and giving us guidance. Their whole family is very sweet and we received such warm hospitality. We highly recommend single or two traveler. You are going to live with the family so just common courtesy with sharing the space.

101% suggest this place for your coming up trip!
Location, hospitality and great host!!

BEST AIRBNB in every way! We're very grateful to have met MiMi's warmhearted family (including her cat meowwww) and to have stayed at her lovely house with the breathtaking view! Communication was smooth. Location was close to everywhere and easy to find. Parking was convenient, and there's always a spot in front of the house (loved driving in the neighborhood too!) Cleanliness was more than just 5 stars on top of high quality designer building material, decor, and even the toiletries! Bath and beach towels along with eco friendly tote bag were provided (separate fridge and water too!) The view was magnificent, and we tried to appreciate it as much as we could before leaving. Thank you again and we will be back :)
非常好的一次体验,下次旅行还会选择mimi家
房东很不错 他们的孩子和猫猫都很可爱 环境也非常舒适整洁

Great communication and check-in process. The accommodation was exactly as described and was super clean! The location is in a quiet residential area but great for traveling to all areas of the island and gets you away from the bustle of Waikiki. Would highly recommend when coming to Honolulu!!

Mimi's place was just great! I arrived in the middle of the night and Mimi and Norm stayed up to welcome me! The location is perfect, the view overlooking the ocean, Diamond Head and Waikiki breathtaking ... 
They both are very lovely, open, interested and interesting, helpful and easy going. And their little son is very cute, funny and easy to get in touch. I spent 3 wonderful days up there. And Honolulu's places of interest are easy to reach ... A car is a must!
The house and the room all very clean and as shown on the pictures.
Mahalo and Aloha dear lovely family!!!

We fully endorse all the other very positive reviews of Mimi's property. She and her husband, Norm, are excellent hosts.  Their house is spectacularly located and is pristine. We were able to fit cooking and laundry around their schedule with no problems. They were really helpful guides to where to go and what to do during our first visit to Hawaii.  Thank you both for your warm welcome. We really appreciate it

Mimi and Norm are the best hosts we have ever had. Their home is amazing and the view is breathtaking. They know the area and know the best places to eat.   When we come back to Honolulu, we would never stay anywhere else.

Though arrived late at night, we were greeted by MiMi and Norm very friendly. Norm even helped us to carry the heavy luggage down to the room. Mimi and Norm are so warmhearted and offered us some useful tips for our visit. MiMi's home is Nordic style, brand new, super clean and "smart".  From the lanai, you can enjoy the million dollar view of sunrise over Diamand Head. Location is close to the various restaurants, shopping center and Wakiki. Their son Kayden is a super cute boy and shared his toy with us. We would definitely come back!

极力推荐的一家airbnb,也是我住过最好的一家,我在很多国家包括美国其他城市都住过airbnb哦!首先是房东Mimi,Norm还有非常可爱和好客的Kayden,他们待人十分真诚,主动帮我们搬行李,也会邀请我们共进早餐,还带了本地非常有名的小吃给我们分享!家里还有只很乖但也很傲娇的黑喵哦!其次就是房间设施了,非常现代化的装修风格,所有东西都很干净,有独立卫生间､冰箱､电视机,房东还准备了很全的当地餐厅､游览使用指南-小册子!然后就是位置了,使用导航基本上很准确就能找到这家,门口停车很方便,是一个很安静的社区,房东会提醒你不要太喧哗,特别是晚上｡所以早上也可以睡到自然醒啦!个人的一些感受:中国人住民宿比较方便,可以用厨房烧热水､可以跟房东拉家常,得到点本地建议哈!总之真心推荐!
It was nice airbnb. Very clean, everything was nice. I really like my stay

전망이 기가 막힙니다 따로 다이아몬드헤드와 탄탈루스야경 보러 안갔습니다 호스트부부와 아이는 매우매우 친절합니다 참 감사했습니다 다만 와이키키시내와는 차로 15분 정도 소요되며 자주 시내를 방문하실 분은 불편할 것 입니다 처음에 너무 산꼭대기끝에 위치해서 큰일났다 싶었는데 곧 적응하더라구요 와이키키에선 이렇게 전망이 좋고 높이 위치한 집이 고급이라고 한국 택시기사님께 들었습니다^^ 그리고 주택가이며 아이를 키우는 집이기에 굉장히 조용하고 8시이후에는 발걸음도 조용조용 내딛고 방에서 음식을 먹을 수 없습니다 이 점이 조금 불편하실 수도 있겠지만은 저는 조용하게 휴식을 취할 수 있어서 좋았습니다 모든 걸 배려해주고 알려주시고 도와주신 미미와  신랑분에게 참으로 감사합니다 한국도 놀러오세요^^

ﾍﾞﾗﾝﾀﾞからの景色は本当に素晴らしく､絶景でした｡
ｵｽｽﾒのご飯屋を教えてくれたり､朝食を作ってくれたり､とても親切でした｡
またﾊﾜｲに行ったら利用したいと思える場所でした｡

What a find! Mimi, Norm & Kayden are indeed super hosts! They have the perfect accommodations for a visit to Honolulu. The space is meticulously clean, comfortable and addressed all of our needs. Their hospitality efforts and details go above and beyond in accommodating our stay. The location was perfect; it is located up on a hill, but everywhere was accessible with ease. It turns out many of the restaurants we wanted to try were just at the bottom of the hill from them! I would not hesitate to stay again while in Hawaii. Many thanks, y'all!

Mimi's family is very friendly and kind!!
We spend a week at her room with super diamond head view! My family enjoyed playing with cutie her son and cat as well.
Room is clean and stylish. highly recommend at calm area in Hawaii.

This was our first time using airbnb and we were perfectly satisfied! Mimi and family were so sweet and helpful. Instructions were very clear and we had everything we needed for a clean, comfortable stay. Even help with the luggage in and out. 
And as you can tell from the pictures the view is absolutely breathtaking! Great location for the south side of Oahu.  10 mins to some nice beaches, 20 mins to Honolulu, 10 mins to Diamond Head and 10 mins to one of our favorite discoveries - Leonard's bakery! 
Definitely recommend :)

Mimi & Norm’s home is simply the BEST!! We spent a week there and everything was just perfect: their beautiful modern house is in a great location, out of busy Waikiki, up the hill which offers the best view ever on Honolulu and the surroundings (breathtaking from the deck!)! The room is sparkling clean, beautifully decorated, very comfy and filled with everything you need. Mimi, Norm and their adorable son are genuinely a lovely family: very friendly, respectful, generous and provide the best local tips and addresses :D We had a fabulous first time in Hawaii thanks to them and can’t recommend their place enough! Thank you guys so much again for everything! P & J X
素敵なﾌｧﾐﾘｰと素敵な空間を過ごせるのは間違いないです｡ﾚﾝﾀｶｰは必須ｱｲﾃﾑですね!ﾗﾅｲからの眺めは絶景です!

Absolutely amazing location, with a deck looking over the Waikiki beach and the diamond head mountain where you can sit and enjoy sun set. Mimi and Norm were amazing hosts. Very friendly and helpful and they made sure we were comfortable and happy. We would really love to spend more time there again one day.

Mimi and Norm are very friendly and kind.

A breakfast they cooked was so delicious.
The view from lanai was so beautiful.

We are satisfied with Mimi and Norm's house and their hospitality.
We strongly recommend to stay at their house!

Our stay at Mimi’s was hands down the best Airbnb experience we’ve ever had. 
It wasn’t just the perfectly spacious, modern, and clean room. It wasn’t even the breathtaking view overlooking the ocean and all of Waikiki, or the fact that we had our own personal mini fridge to store our fresh fruits. What stood out immediately was her genuine warmth and hospitality. As soon as we parked our car, she and her husband walked out in the rain to offer us an umbrella and help carry our luggage inside. One day, they even drove out of their way to drop off a bag we accidentally left at their home. By the end of our visit, we felt like we were leaving family. If you’re looking for a home away from home when visiting Oahu, seriously look no further. We had such a joyful and memorable time getting to know y'all! Thank you for everything!!

MiMi and her husband, Norm are amazing hosts. Their son Kayden is shy at first but quickly warms up and is extremely cute. This stay was perfect and they have been helpful is every way. Anyone that chooses to stay at MiMi’s will have a great time there.
Everything was very fine! We would highly recommend this accommodation!

Very nice and clean accomodation with great views over Honolulu and Diamond Head! The accomodation is exactly looking as on the pictures!
The hosts are very friendly and we had some nice chats! They had a lot of good recommendations for breakfast and dinner! RECOMMENDED!!
Thank you for an amazing stay. Spectacular views and beautiful home made our nights in Honolulu memorable. Excellent communication and room amenities. Will be back!

Mimi, Norm and Kayden are the best host. They were so welcoming, helpful and just wonderful all around. We loved every moment we were there. They were so easy to talk to and they also have great suggestions. They told us about many great food places to try. We also took their suggestion on hiking trails. I would definitely stay with them again. And their view is just breath taking. If you're staying in Hawaii, I would recommend staying with Mimi and Norm. 

PS, they have a cute cat name Priscilla (she loves chin scratches). :)

Mimi and her family were excellent hosts! They’re all so kind and their home is beautiful with breathtaking views! Communication from the very beginning was seamless. I mentioned to them that I was there during my birthday and they got me a cupcake and sang Happy Birthday to me. They didn’t have to do that, but it truly made my day, especially because I was traveling solo on this trip. The space is so cute and immaculately clean, which is so important to me when staying with hosts. They are quiet too so I never felt like there was any noise, but whenever I crossed paths with them, they’re very easy to talk to and have conversations with. Parking was not a problem at all and it’s quick to get to the highways, Diamond Head, and Waikiki. You’re close but not where it’s crowded with tourists. I enjoyed my stay with them and will definitely recommend their place to others and would stay again! Oh and I didn’t use the air conditioner either; I just used the fan and the room was nice and cool. They also offered for me to use the beach umbrella, chair, and bag which all came in handy because I lucked out with a couple of days of nice, sunny weather! Thank you Mimi, Norm, and Kayden! I appreciate your kindness and warm hospitality! Mahalo.

Would definitely stay here again! Very helpful with tips about Hawaii and ideas of things to do around Oahu. 
Highly recommend this friendly family and their beautiful home.
房主非常热情,我的手机开房间锁有问题,房主耐心地解决｡房主的家非常干净,整洁,风景非常漂亮｡我们还在晚上在房主的阳台上拍了檀香山的夜景｡
Would highly recommend a stay at Mimi and Norm's beautiful home. The place is spotless and has the best views over Honolulu. Great host's and you won't be disappointed.

Mimi and Norm’s place is great! A short drive from the airport with a great view from their lanai! They provided us with a list of places they recommend as well as tips throughout our stay! I would highly recommend staying here!

If there is one Airbnb you should stay while in Honolulu it's got to be this place. Impeccable bedroom and bathroom, with great scenic views out the window. Mimi and Norm are great hosts who are friendly and generous with advice and tips.

MiMiさん家族はとても素晴らしいﾎｽﾄです｡
英語が苦手な私達とｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝを取って頂き､困ったことなどｱﾄﾞﾊﾞｲｽをしてくれます｡
ﾗﾅｲからの景色は昼間も夜もとても綺麗でした｡
車でMiMiさんの家まで行く場合は道がとてもややこしいのでｶｰﾅﾋﾞか (Hidden by Airbnb) Mapの地図をﾀﾞｳﾝﾛｰﾄﾞしてﾅﾋﾞ代わりに使う事をおすすめします｡

If you read this, you should definitely book here, the stay was perfect!! Super super nice hosts, awesome location and view, clean, room has everything needed. Just perfect!
(you will need a car)

미미의 집 위치가 정말 좋았어요! 대중교통 보다는 차로 접근하는것이 편리합니다.  구글 네비게이션으로 쉽게 찾아 갈 수 있고, 집 테라스에서 다이아몬드 헤드 및 와이키키 시내를 볼 수 있습니다. 저녁마다 테라스에 앉아 맥주를 마시면서 야경보는 재미가 좋습니다. 
미미씨의 집에는 한국어로 숙박시 지켜야 하는 규칙이 적혀있고, 근처 맛집 리스트가 있습니다. 추천맛집은 지역주민들이 많이 이용하는곳이라 색다른 경험을 할 수 있었습니다.  집은 아주 깔끔하고 침구류가 아주 훌륭했어요~
가족분들 모두 친절하게 대해 주셔서 머무는 동안 내집처럼 편안하게 쉴 수 있었어요.  다음에 또 하와이에 가게된다면 머물고 싶어요

We had a great time staying at Mimi and Norm’s house on our last few days of our trip. Their beautiful home is situated on top of the hill with an amazing view overlooking Diamond Head. Very clean and tidy with great amenities. Great local tips for shopping and dining! Would definitely come back next time :)

Die Unterkunft von Mimi ist perfekt. Sie, ihr Mann und ihr Sohn sind liebenswerte Menschen, die uns sehr gastfreundlich empfangen und uns wertvolle Tipps gegeben haben. Das Zimmer ist sehr sauber und toll eingerichtet. Mimi ist ein absoluter Super Host!

Sin duda, si volviese a Honolulu volvería a hospedarme otra vez aquí. Vistas increíbles de la ciudad en un barrio súper tranquilo. 
Mimi y Norm (y también su hijo) nos trataron como dos más de la familia y no dudaron en hacernos recomendaciones de lugares que visitar. 
Habitación limpísima y muy acogedora con todos los servicios que podrías encontrarte en un hotel.

Mimi's home is spotlessly clean, modern, comfortable and the perfect place to return to after exploring the island. A car is necessary to get to this location but you will not be disappointed. The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful, away from hustle and bustle which is a blessing! Only a 5min drive down the hill takes you to Kahala Mall, Whole Foods and local restaurants. Diamond Head is only 10 min away, and Waikiki/Ala Moana are easily accessible as well. Excellent spot!!

mimiさんのお家はとても清潔で洗練されてて､暖かく居心地の良いお部屋でした｡
ｱｸｼﾃﾞﾝﾄで到着が12時前になってしまったんですが､ご夫婦で迎えてくださいました｡
息子さんも可愛くて､持ってきたお土産をすごく喜んでくれました｡
ﾗﾅｲからの景色はため息が出るほど素晴らしく､必ずまたこの景色を見るためにもどってきたいとおもいます｡
本当にありがとうございました!

Amazing stay! I’m impressed by the cleanliness and how modern the room looked. Everything worked well and the view from their lanai was spectacular! You could see the fireworks from there. A car is definitely needed to get here as it’s located on top of a steep hill/mountain. (Because you travel with your car, parking in Waikiki can be difficult. But the hosts are very informative in this area) 
My stay was perfect, thank you!

Mimi and her family were so great to us. Lovely room great tips and it was great to be able to do some washing. Fabulous location high on the hill looking out over Waikiki. Definitely need a car but great parking on the street. We loved the location as it was very central with the car. We had a wonderful time. It was so nice staying with a family.

Tolle und ruhige Lage in einem Wohngebiet am Hang. Die Ausstattung lässt keine Wünsche offen. Es ist wirklich an alles gedacht und Mimi steht mit Rat und  Tat sowie mit Tipps zur Seite. Ohne Mietwagen allerdings nicht zu empfehlen.

Wonderful stay! Yes, it takes a few extra minutes to go up/down the hills but one gets used to it. Stunning views from the room and lanai, and luxurious unit with all the amenities (including chairs, flippers, umbrella etc.). It was helpful to have Norm walk us through the briefing that's written down too. As has been mentioned, the family (Mimi, Norm, son Kayden, Priscilla the cat) is amazing: helping with luggage!, accessible (Norm works at home), personable (wonderful conversations, and they treated us to a bfast!), yet provide privacy....we really enjoyed them all! Highly recommended.

My stay at Mimi's place was definitely an unforgettable experience because the communication was prompt, and she and her husband assisted me greatly right from the moment my car arrived in front of the house, offering to help with the luggage and explained everything about the house, amenities, etc. clearly; they were also eager to chat with us and gave us some great local tips regarding points of interests and restaurants, so the hospitality was top-notch. The place itself was impeccable, the bed was so comfortable, and the view was so gorgeous, even better than the pictures, especially during sunrise. But since the place is located above hill, renting a car is a must for a hassle free experience. The place is also located in a quiet residential neighborhood so if you wanna get a good night sleep, this is the place to be. I will definitely consider staying here again when I go back to Oahu in the future.

Das Zimmer in Mimi's Haus war perfekt für unseren Aufenthalt in Honolulu! Super sauber und schön eingerichtet.. Mimi und ihre Familie war extrem hilfreich und gab uns jede Menge Tipps. Das Auto kann direkt vor dem Haus an der Strasse geparkt werden. Mit dem Auto sind es ca. 15min nach Waikiki Beach.. Hoffentlich bis bald :)

Mimi, her husband, and son are very kind, sweet and helpful. They are a beautiful family. Their place is very clean, quiet and  comfortable. The view from their lanai is especially so nice. Their hospitality made our trip great. We would like to come back here. Highly recommended.
Welcoming, easy going hospitality, and a lovely space and facilities.

The room was very neat with its own refrigerator outside the room and nicely furnished.
Lovely family with a fun kid and cute cat!
The view from the balcony is amazing and great place for breakfast or evening snack.

We would recommend anyone to stay at MiMi’s place!

We felt welcomed once we arrived. Mimi and her husband greeted us and were nice enough to help us with our bags. House is very clean and and beautiful just like the pictures. Our stay was short but will be memorable. Thank you Mimi and family for your hospatality!
호스트가 젊고 친절함. 도착이후 스마트폰 앱으로 현관문을 열고 잠글수 있어 편리했음. 발코니에서 다이아몬드헤드와 와이키키쪽 멋진 전경을 볼 수 있음. 실내 인테리어가 깔끔하고 모던함.
Very comfortable stay, nice view and close to restaurants/beaches/DT Honolulu.   Hosts are very friendly with great hospitality.   My wife and I enjoyed our stay.

Amazing stay with Mimi, Norm and their wonderful kid! The house is wonderful, super clean and really spacious.. on top of this the sight from the patio on Diamond Head & Honolulu is breath-taking!
The location is strategic, just 10/15 minutes ride from Waikiki and the entrance of the highways. Extremely recommended!
We fell in love not only with the place, but with the whole family! Without any doubt even more than a 5-stars stay!

This Airbnb is 5 star all around. Friendly hosts, local guide (we did almost everything recommended), EXTREMELY clean room and bathroom, no hassle parking, free laundry, beach towel, and can’t forget the million dollar view. We loved our stay here and hope to come back again some day!

Mimi und Norm sind unfassbar freundliche Gastgeber, die uns jederzeit mit wertvollen Tipps für Restaurants, Stränden etc. zur Verfügung standen. Wir haben uns dort wir zu Hause gefühlt. Der Ausblick auf den Diamond Head ist atemberaubend. Das Bett ist sehr bequem und die Umgebung sehr ruhig, weshalb wir jede Nacht durchgeschlafen haben. Die Unterkunft ist sehr sauber. Es gibt nichts zu kritisieren. Ich würde jederzeit wieder buchen.
MiMi is an excellent host. Very quick to respond to any question I had. The room was very clean and comfortable. Very nice view from the lanai! Highly recommended.
Great hosts!  Very knowledgeable regarding local information - amazing views from deck of Honolulul, Diamond Head, sunset!

The best stay we had with AirBnB hosts so far. Mimi and Norm are amazing hosts: open, friendly, polite and easygoing. Communication and check-in were fast and easy. The room and private bathroom were even better that we’d expected: very clean and had all amenities. The view from the lanai is beautiful. The location is great: quite neighborhood but easy access to Kahala shopping mall with Whole Foods Market and other shops, and a motorway. We enjoyed our stay very much! Thank you!

Norm and Mimi were great host that offered helpful suggestions on things to do around the island. Their pictures accurately reflect how well the house and room are kept. We would definitely stay here again!

We loved our stay at Mimi’s place so much! We stayed at 4 different Airbnb’s throughout our vacation in Hawaii and Mimi’s place was our favourite by far! The place was sparkling clean and everything was so comfortable. Mimi and Norman also provided us with amazing recommendations and were so helpful and hospitable. The house is perfectly located as well. It is about 10mins drive from Waikiki and very easy to get around with a car. The house also has an amazing view of diamond head! We would definitely recommend staying at Mimi’s place and can’t wait to visit again!

なんといってもﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが素晴らしいです｡部屋も清潔で､自炊すること以外はそのｽﾍﾟｰｽで完結できます｡
またｱﾒﾆﾃｨも揃っていて､初めて民泊をする方にもお勧めできます｡

移動は日中はﾊﾞｽが1時間に一本｡ﾚﾝﾀｶｰなどがお勧めです｡

家族が一緒に住んでいるので､またお仕事もご自宅でされているようなので､当たり前ですが､それなりの気遣いは求められます｡

Mimi & Norm are incredible hosts, they made our stay very enjoyable! They were able to provide us with beach chairs/towels and with a list of recommended places to eat for breakfast, lunch & dinner. (Extremely helpful since this was our first time in Oahu). Very informative & communicated well. We are already planning our next trip back to island.

Upon our first arrival at Mimi's, we already felt like we were coming home. Driving into the neighborhood up Wilhelmina Rise was an attraction itself. That steep climb showcased the amazing topography of Oahu, yet didn't feel like just a touristy thing to do. From there, we found other delightful spots that the locals frequented. In fact, those who stop in every day asked us how we knew about "Coffee Talk" because tourists do not typically find it. Mimi and Norm never led us astray with any of their suggestions for meals or places to experience! Another amazing feature of Mimi's Airbnb was the lanai with a view so spectacular that people back home asked, "Where on earth are you that you captured those sunset pictures?" When we climbed to the top of Diamondhead, we stood in awe of "our" neighborhood across the city. We have already told friends and family that this is just the place to stay when they travel to Oahu. Now that we've met Mimi and her delightful family, these new friends (including Purrcilla, the cat) beckon us back to another Aloha!

My first Airbnb host that exceeded my expectations. Felt very safe and welcomed. The bedroom and bathroom are sparkling clean and stylish. The host was kind enough to let us use the kitchen and everything needed for cooking. The host even has a list of recommended restaurants that they actually tried, which helped us a lot.

As for the location, the view is outstanding as the house is up on a hill. The road to the house gets narrower and steeper w/ many curves, so be mindful when driving at night.

Lovely home with a private bath/bedroom downstairs in Mimi and Norm's home. We loved the view from the deck, the super updated room, and clean bed and bath. Mimi and Norm were very helpful and thorough with their guide to the island. We appreciated all of their tips, felt like staying with old friends!

This is totally worth it, Mimi and her family is super sweet. The room and bathroom are very very clean and tidy. Also they gave some really good attraction and food recommendation. Made my first trip to Hawaii extra wonderful because they are always smiling and positive! 
The view is awesome, you can see the whole diamond head from the balcony. Don’t hesitate to book this place if you are traveling to Honolulu. It is close to Waikiki, and also the airport! I will definitely come back!!!!!!!!!
Really nice place!!

The descriptions and photos are completely accurate and in fact do not do justice to the phenomenal view. Their home in the hills gets you far away from the bustle of the city but offers easy access to all the sites you want to visit as well as shopping and restaurants. Mimi and Norm are terrific hosts. You can expect helpful hints and if you like, engaging conversations. Your space is YOUR SPACE, with total privacy. I would highly recommend Mimi and Norm’s and would certainly return.

Mimi and Norm provided us with bottled water the night we arrived, comfortable and clean sheets, two pillows per head, great food and site seeing recommendations, delicious homemade walnut pesto, and quick communication! Our stay with them was so great, we would definitely come again.
a good location, a  fantastic view, close to most famous attractions, what needed is a car.

Mimi and Norm are very kind and helpful. They provide us with various kinds of information about Hawaii. Their house is very clean and quiet, the  large bed is very confortable,besides, the view from the lanai is incrediblly beautiful. We could spend pleasant  days thanks to therir hospitality and excellent location.
We would like to stay here again and highly recommend to stay.

Mimi’s place was such a sweet, unique and comfortable home to come back to every day. Every part of the process was sweet and easy and we would easily stay the whole week if we could! Thank you for adding so much to our trip! Their Air conditioning and bed is amazing!

Mimi's place was much better than a 5 star hotel. The room was spacious, spotlessly clean, and the view from the balcony was breathtaking. I also enjoyed driving up and down the hills that led to her house!! Best of all, all the members of the family are very welcoming, and I got a lot of help from them as well. Thank you so much!!

Fantastic, we really enjoyed our stay at Mimi and her kind family. It was every evening like coming home. Bedroom and bathroom are very nice and clean. The view on Honolulu couldn’t be better. We can fully suggest to stay there, if you are at Oahu.
Mimi und Norm sind tolle Gastgeber und Reiseführer!! Das Haus ist super schön und stilvoll eingerichtet.

This is my first Airbnb experience, and I feel it could be one of my best ones. Mimi and her husband were very helpful in providing local tips. The room is extremely clean and fashioned. The view toward city and diamond head is amazing. Overall a very satisfied stay. Definitely recommended.
She cancelled our reservation at last minute while we were in plane. She was very unprofessional and disappointing. After getting all the information she canceled reservation. Won’t recommend her..
MiMi’s place is great! The view from lanai is absolutely amazing. Hosts are friendly and good communicate before check in. House is modern and in great location. Would definitely stay here again.

Norm and Mimi are awesome! There place was beautiful and so comfortable! They were very helpful in helping us do cool stuff in Honolulu and gave great food suggestions. The bed was super comfortable. My wife and I will definitely stay here again, we love it!
This is a pleasant, clean space with an outstanding view of Waikiki, diamond head and the ocean. Mimi and family were very friendly and available to answer any questions and provide suggestions.

Great hosts, fantastic location, clean, and quiet - Mimi and Norm's place is the perfect sanctuary away from the touristy Waikiki. The bedroom and bathroom are spacious and super clean. They have wonderful suggestions of what to do and where to eat all over Oahu. Lastly, their lanai offer amazing views of Diamond Head, Waikiki, and the ocean. We will definitely come back the next time we're on the island.
L’endroit est magnifique et la vue est a couper le souffle. Un endroit exceptionnel!

the family is very welcoming,
clean house, safe area, amazing view

MiMi and Norm were awesome hosts who made us feel welcome and had great suggestions for places to visit. The king-sized bed was comfortable and the fridge useful. We appreciated being able to bring breakfast food which we ate at their dining room table while gazing at the beautiful view from their windows. Norm offered to help with luggage and MiMi patiently helped us with questions we had. We highly recommend their airbnb!
Mimis apartment was just great, we had a wonderfull time there. The view is just awesome and Mimi is a great host. I totally recommand the place, we will definately come back.

name: Share a flat in a lovely penthouse with terrace
summary: Lugares de interés: Montjuic, Plaza España, Paralel, Sants, Barrio de Sants, Parking Viajeros,  Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a La tranquilidad y la comodidad de vivir en un barrio que tiene de todo lo necesario para pasar unos dias de relax, alejados del turismo sin estar lejos del centro. Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, familias (con hijos), y grupos grandes.
space: I live with my partner and my dog Oira :) We work all day (Oira works with me also) so you can enjoy the flat alone during the day
description: Lugares de interés: Montjuic, Plaza España, Paralel, Sants, Barrio de Sants, Parking Viajeros,  Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a La tranquilidad y la comodidad de vivir en un barrio que tiene de todo lo necesario para pasar unos dias de relax, alejados del turismo sin estar lejos del centro. Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, familias (con hijos), y grupos grandes. I live with my partner and my dog Oira :) We work all day (Oira works with me also) so you can enjoy the flat alone during the day Swimming pool & Bbq Residential area, very nice, with supermarkets and shops, close to parks and center Metro & buse pretty close We live in a 5 floor without lift
neighborhood_overview: Residential area, very nice, with supermarkets and shops, close to parks and center
notes: We live in a 5 floor without lift
transit: Metro & buse pretty close
access: Swimming pool & Bbq

host.host_about: Free like wind

reviews.comments:
La plus belle des expériences, une si belle rencontre, un si bel endroit. Un paradis dans Barcelone
Merci Mireilla

A really great place to stay. Mireia is an open, friendly and generous person, she is easy to be with and really helped me with advices where to go and what to see! Adorable pets also! <3 Hope to see you soon in Barcelona or Berlin, Mireia! Thanks for everything!

Aunque mi estancia ha sido muy corta, he tenido la posibilidad de conocer a Mireia y Víctor. Ambos son encantadores y muy atentos. La casa es tal cual se ve en las fotos pero más amplia y más chula. Cuando tenga que volver a Barcelona intentare reservar aquí otra vez.

Mireia is amazing host! She gave me some useful tips to enjoy Barcelona, and they are perfectly satisfied! 
She is very friendly and always contact me :) 

Room is very cozy and clean. Apartment is bright, there is a beautiful terrace I enjoyed that.
if you are looking to have a good time in barcelona, thats the place. metro,bus near by,10-15 min walk from camp nou.
Se duerme bien, la perrita es un amor, la terraza está genial, ellos son muy agradables, muy recomendable.
Mireia was very kind, and offered some great local tips. The apartment is great if you don't want to stay in the tourist area.

Muy lindo alojamiento. Mireia y su novio son una pareja agradable y muy simpatica. El departamento es muy bonito y comodo, en un bonito barrio, con muchos supermercados cerca y con una estacion de metro justo al lado.
Great value for a good location and very friendly hosts. Thank you!
Excelente piso, de muy buen tamaño y súper cómodo. La anfitriona muy atenta y muy amigable. Definitivamente volvería a quedarme ahí.
Mireia and Juan are super lovely hosts. The apartment is very cute.

I had an awesome stay at Mireia's apartment! The flat is super nice and clean, good sized room, comfortable bed, great shower. Mireia and her boyfriend are so sweet - they were very welcoming and accomodating and they offered me tips for the city. Staying at their place felt like home - I highly recommend it to anyone visiting Barcelona :)

L'appartement de Juan et Mireia est placé à 5 min d'un arrêt de métro, c'est pratique!
Mireia est très réactive aux mails.
L'appartement est agréable, Mireia est à l'écoute et disposée à vous donner des bon plans.
Leur chienne est très gentille et discrète.
Une bonne adresse!
I only stayed one night in the appartment before going back home. Mireia is a very caring host, always answering super fast. Her dog is lovely, too. A nice place to stay in Barcelona.

Stylish and comfortable apartment with great views of Barcelona. The terrace is very lovely. Hosts are very friendly and welcoming and the dog was fun and lovable. They welcomed my kitty too and she absolutely loved the apartment. Thoroughly enjoyed my experience. Mireia recommended some good sightseeing for me. The apartment is  well located and close to the Sants station and very easy to get to the airport. Highly recommend.
The room is decent and has a balcony! The apartment is located in a very nice neighborhood and close to public transportation. Mireia is an easy going and very friendly host.
Mireia's place was just wonderful, I was enjoying a lot my stay at Barcelona for the first time and was happy finding such a wonderful place as Mireia has. High recommanded!

El lugar de Mireia fue tal como indica la descripción. Disfruté mucho del balcón y del ambiente tranquilo que tiene el barrio. La ubicación es muy buena, tiene varios supermercados alrededor y muchos lugares para comer. Es fácil ubicarse y hacer uso del metro y del bus.

Amazing apartment with a great terrace, and a balcony from the bedroom. Mireia and Juanka were great hosts, the place was squeaky clean and everything was ready for us at check in. Highly recommended!!

I’m still amazed by how helpful Mireia has been.

When I told her that I was looking for a flat, she immediately started hitting all of her friends up to find me one. She gave me like seven contacts and I am probably gonna find one all thanks to her.

Insane hospitality came along, she really is a gem of a host.

It’s kinda weird to end by that but the view from the terrasse is something that I’ve never seen before. This gigantic swimming pool surrounded by the enormous pressure of the city. Like an oasis in the middle of the desert. Wonderful.
Nice room in an apartment with a terrace. Very beautiful stairs (although 5 floors of them). Nice company and good hospitality

Anfitriones muy amables, agradables y puntuales. El lugar es tal cual su descripción y muy limpio, bien ubicado con parking al lado. 
Fuimos muy bien recibidos con nuestros animales de compañía. 
La perrita que se encuentra en casa es muy dócil y cariñosa
Muy agradable nuestra estancia en este lugar.
Mireia's place is in a great location and was perfect for my partner and I for a few days in Barcelona. Lovely hosts and very cute dog!

name: Modern House + Granny Flat sleeps 10+
summary: Our modern Surry Hills home is split in two with a granny flat out the back, a spacious house + couches for more people. It is recently renovated with a picturesque courtyard and modern kitchen. With 3 bathrooms and a spacious living room will make you feel at home instantly.  We are 2min walk to the supermarket, 10min from Allianz Stadium, SCG and seconds away from some of Sydney’s best restaurants and cafes. Location, ambiance and your own private courtyard will put a smile on your face.
space: It's an amazing place beyond what you can normally expect in this neighbourhood.
description: Our modern Surry Hills home is split in two with a granny flat out the back, a spacious house + couches for more people. It is recently renovated with a picturesque courtyard and modern kitchen. With 3 bathrooms and a spacious living room will make you feel at home instantly.  We are 2min walk to the supermarket, 10min from Allianz Stadium, SCG and seconds away from some of Sydney’s best restaurants and cafes. Location, ambiance and your own private courtyard will put a smile on your face. It's an amazing place beyond what you can normally expect in this neighbourhood. Guests have full access to 59" flat screen TV. Garden access with BBQ. Located close to tonnes of restaurants, shops, supermarket, public transport. 5 min walk to Central Station. 10 minute walk from central station or a quick 20minute taxi ride from Sydney airport.
neighborhood_overview: Located close to tonnes of restaurants, shops, supermarket, public transport. 5 min walk to Central Station.
transit: 10 minute walk from central station or a quick 20minute taxi ride from Sydney airport.
access: Guests have full access to 59" flat screen TV. Garden access with BBQ.

reviews.comments: Charlie is an excellent host, great place in an excellent location. Perfect if you want to spend a few night in the city.

name: Quarto Ipanema - Praça General Osório
summary: O quarto é perto de Praia de Copacabana e Ipanema (Arpoador), Supermercados, Hortifruit, Metrô, Praça General Osório, Galeria River, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas e Igreja Nossa Senhora da Paz..
description: O quarto é perto de Praia de Copacabana e Ipanema (Arpoador), Supermercados, Hortifruit, Metrô, Praça General Osório, Galeria River, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas e Igreja Nossa Senhora da Paz..

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Igor foi um boa host. O apartamento foi espaçosos, confortáveis, e impecáveis com um ótimo chuveiro. Localização perfeita: a 1 quadra do metrô, a 2 quadras da Praia de Ipanema, a 3 quadras da Praia de Copacabana.

Uma estadia no coração de Ipanema, com excelente localização. Igor bastante comunicativo e disposto a ajudar! Ótimo quarto, um chuveiro excelente. Sem contar a simpatia da família maravilhosa que nos recebeu super bem! Retornaremos em breve!
Excelente ubicacion, a dos cuadras de la playa de ipanema. Igor y su familia son muy agradables y nos hicieron sentir muy comodas.

Our stay with Igor and his family was fantastic! They are so lovely and made us feel right at home. We were meant to stay one week and ended up staying three! Great location, close to both Ipanema and Copacobana, food, transport and more!! We wish we could stay longer!
The host canceled this reservation 110 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: COMFORTABLE & COZY! MAUI BY DAY...RELAX AT NIGHT!!
summary: A charming studio apartment located in the Island Sands ocean front condominium complex!!! You will find everything you need to enhance your stay in our direct ocean front location with unique West Maui mountain views.   Our Premier condo offers a central Maui location for exploring Maui beaches, sights and beauty!  Then relax in a comfortable condo where you can Cuddle & Cozy up after soaking up glorious Maui sun filled activities.
space: WHAT MAKES THIS COMFORTABLE & COZY FOR 2?? (Website hidden by Airbnb)  LIVING SPACE that provides more room than comparable one bedroom units with warm, rich teak wood furnishings!  SLEEP COMFORT featuring a Murphy style bed with a full size TempurPedic mattress! Our BATHROOM  has a warm, clean feel that features a walk in shower, roomy closet and our unique Sea Shell Wall!  Our GOURMET KITCHEN features a Delonghi Espresso machine, electric stove/oven, a roomy refrigerator, Bosch dishwasher, granite counter tops with a  copper sink, microwave, comfortable seating, full dining ware, and a plenty of storage space!  We have a complete LAUNDRY system in the apartment with a washer and clothes dryer! PLUS, WE RELISH THE OPPORTUNITY TO BE YOUR HOST!

Our Premier condo offers a central Maui location for exploring Maui beaches, sights and beauty!
