neighborhood_overview: ***Walking distance to the harbor where you can catch sea excursions like snorkeling, fishing, dinner cruises & whale watching ***Conveniently located to all points of interest on Maui ***Short stroll to Great ocean views ***Beach access for Watching whales during their season
notes: CONDO ACCESS…We utilize a keyless entry system, Press the Schlage button & then enter your 4 digit code which is the last 4 digits of the phone number you provided. YOU MUST LEAVE THE INSIDE SCHLAGE DEADBOLT HANDLE IN THE HORIZONTAL POSITION, OTHERWISE, THE KEYLESS LOCK WILL REMAIN OPEN.
transit: We have One assigned parking stall and highly recommend renting a vehicle for all stays of one week or less.
access: Complete access in our studio apartment.  Access to Pool & Barbecues.  One assigned parking stall.
interaction: Ralph & Nancy are permanent Maui residents living in Kihei!  We live just 20 minutes drive from our condo which enhances communication.
house_rules: 1) All bookings will include a Special Offer request which is for: A) payment of required Hawaii General Excise & Transient Accommodations taxes (14.25% of the total rate + cleaning fee).  These taxes are not included in our Nightly Rate and must be accepted by guests' to confirm booking. B) $35 Island Sands Resort fee.   2) We only rent to Non Smokers..Smoking is not allowed in the condo or on the patio/lanai.  3) Check-in: 4 PM Hawaii Standard Time; Check-out: 10 AM.

host.host_about: Ralph & his wife Nancy are former residents of Maalaea Village and are permanent Maui residents living in Kihei!  We live just 20 minutes drive from our condo which enhances communication and we welcome the chance to serve as your host!  We are active in the Maui community and support various community organizations.   We are active adults and enjoy the many outdoor activities that Maui offers...we relish the opportunity to be your host!

reviews.comments: A perfect spot for a trip to Maui. Centrally located to everything. The condo is gorgeous & has absolutely everything you need! We highly recommend.
Thank you Ralph & Nancy  for a nice and cozy place to stay in Maui . We had a wonderful time and the accommodations were perfect. I would recommend to everyone to stay at your place.
Great AirBNB experience! Beautiful condo centrally located. Hosts were awesome and handled all the details as stated and then even went above and beyond! Excellent!!!
Nancy and Ralph's place was wonderful.  It was very clean and quiet and the bed was very comfortable.

Nancy and Ralph made our wedding and honeymoon stay great. We arrived at the apartment to have a wedding balloon, wine, and pineapple champagne waiting for us. Everything was very clean, organized and clear. All items needed for a comfortable stay are provided by the host. Communication was clear and immediate which made us very comfortable staying there. Thank you both gain for the amazing stay and location.

The location is perfect, away from the crowds yet a 4 minute walk from the beach, beach walk with access to Kealia Pond boardwalk, the Maui Canoe club, etc!! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the condo itself, being the best equipped we have stayed, from cooking needs, layout and attractiveness, bed comfort, to beach equipment and binoculars!  Ralph and Nancy are attentive to all needs, and welcoming with local wine, chocolates, coffee, and easy communication.  We highly recommend.

Highly recommended, you will not be disappointed! Ralph and Nancy’s place is conveniently and centrally located in a quiet part of the island. Walking distance from Maalaea Harbour which is great if you book any sea tours/excursions leaving from the harbour. Beautiful immaculate condo, cozy, very clean and well equipped. Quiet building and location. Easy and quick check-in, clear communication with the host who is quick to reply. Detailed instructions sent by email before our arrival were very helpful. Short drive to Kihei, Lahaina and Kahului Airport. Affordable and worth every penny. We will definitely return to Maui one day and hope to be able to stay here again.

Ralph's place is clean, modern, comfortable, and in a great location. The thoughtful touches of chilled wine, chocolates, and cold bottled water were appreciated after a long day of travel. The bed was very comfy and the bath/beach towels were soft and fluffy. Parking was easy and the neighbourhood felt very safe. The local restaurants are yummy, and I enjoyed being away from the busy area of Kihei; lounging poolside when I wanted some peace. I'll be back for sure!

Ralph's place was a wonderful and central location for us to stay for our honeymoon. We didn't have to deal with a bunch of tourists on the beach nearby and it was a pretty private street the complex was on. The amenities were great and we especially enjoyed the espresso machine in the condo along with the washer and dryer that allowed us to pack a little lighter for our trip. Relaxing on the patio in the evenings was also very enjoyable. We would definitely stay here again!

Great stay! Condo is exactly as the pictures appear. If you are a coffee drinker, you will seriously enjoy the espresso machine! My coffee at home is less satisfying after using that machine haha! For a pull out bed, very comfortable! However if you are tall like my husband, your feet may slightly hang off the edge. Very quaint and clean little condo, had a homey feeling right away! The beach that is a short walk away was one of my favorite beaches during our whole trip, and we got to walk it every morning! Would definetly recommend for a couple getaway!

This condo is amazing and the hosts are equally amazing! It definitely exceeded our expectations and is so much nicer in person. The A/C unit keeps the room very cool after a day out in the sun. There is a washer and dryer in the room which is such a bonus! Everything is sparkling clean and works perfectly. The bed is very comfortable and easy to unfold. These are hands down the best hosts you will ever have on AirBNB as they truly care about you having a great stay! No detail is forgotten and they truly go above and beyond.

I really enjoyed my stay in Maalaea.  Was a little unsure about how effective simply opening the windows would be at night, but the winds on this part of the island are always strong so I never had to bother with the AC (but it is there if you need it).  Beyond that, the unit had everything I could want.  Plenty of dishes and utensils, excellent internet and guidebooks, and even beach chairs.  Would be a pleasure to return some day.

If you're on the fence between this place and some other one, let me tell you - stay with Ralph!! We had a fantastic week in Maui with Ma'alaea as our home base. Restaurants and shops and aquarium are walkable, and most of the spots on the island you want to be at are no more than 20 minutes away by car. We found the location so convenient and flexible, and were able to do everything we wanted. 

The space is even nicer than it looks in the photos, immaculately kept and with everything you could want. It even has tons of goodies for cooking - salts and spices and even olive oil! The box of beach goodies - chairs, boogie boards, a cooler - were super handy and we used them a ton, saved us money too. 

If you're worried about not having a beach view, don't be. The mountain view is gorgeous, and you can walk to the beach in minutes. 

Mahalo, Ralph! We'd stay here again <3

This is a very great place to stay while visiting Maui. Wake up and make yourselves a cup of coffee from the espresso machine to get the day started. Comes with all the house essentials you can think of. If booking lots of boat activities like snorkeling tours, sunset dinners and guided fishing trips departing from Maalaea harbor. Look no further than this condo because it is a very short walk to the harbor which will cut back travel time and save you money on parking!! I highly recommend dropping by beach bums also located at the harbor for drinks and some delicious BBQ!!! Nice central location on the island makes for easy travel and good time. Loved our stay at this condo! Very unique shower and ac unit to keep you cool! If we make it back to Maui we would look to book this condo again!!

Loved staying at this cute little studio condo. It is perfect for a couple's getaway! The place is fully stocked with everything you will need. Cooking supplies, boogie boards, beach chairs, and travel books with great tips for outdoor activities. Maalaea is a great place to stay on the island because it is close to many things and very beautiful! 
Mahalo, Ralph!

The place was true to the pictures! Very nice and clean.  It was a great place to stay and location was perfect being in the middle of everything.  Ralph was quick to respond prior to going and if we had questions on what adventures to do while in Maui. The espresso machine was neat and already had coffee at the place which was very good!  Would highly recommend and great value!

Wonderful apartment in excellent location. Many extras including beautiful views, excellent coffee machine, beach equipment, long sandy beach close by, comfortable furniture indoor and out. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this apartments and would return.
Great place for a getaway in Maui. Strongly recommend to all travelers.

This is a small but charming place. It is well appointed, all stylish and new surfaces, interesting touches. The Murphy bed was very comfortable. There was wine and chocolate waiting for us and an espresso machine! Ralph was extremely accommodating and easy to reach. Check in was a breeze. This location is very central so you can get everywhere on the island equally well (except of course Hana).  The only downside of this little harbor town is that the area is extremely windy all the time- the windiest part of the island, and one hears it all night.
Such a beautiful suite. Nice private beach behind property. Great location and apartment. Would definitely recommend

El lugar esta muy bien ubicado estas en medio de toda la isla entonces todo te queda relativamente cerca. Ralph es muy amable y siempre esta atento a cualquier cosa que necesites así como tambien te deja cosas muy utiles para tu viaje. Recomiendo mucho este lugar.

name: Nice and sunny condo/Outremont
summary: J'aime ce quartier car il réunit à la fois la vie ville\village.  C'est un quartier résidentiel  entrecoupé par des rues très animées et  très diversifiées.  Il y a beaucoup d'arbres, de nombreux parcs avec aires de jeux pour les enfants.
space: Hi, I am renting my apartment. Special price for weekly rental. Magnificent apartment located in Montreal, Outremont. Outremont is one of the most "green" neighborhoods of Montreal. You will find there many parks, gardens, trees. It is great for kids as well as adults ! 3rd floor of a triplex. Newly renovated. Furnished with taste. Very sunny, fully equiped. A large open space combining kitchen and living room with fireplace. 2 confortable bedrooms.  the second bedroom has no door, only curtains and opens up on the living room.  there are 2 beds  A nice bathroom (with washing machine and dryer) Great terrasse at the back and a small balcony in front. Telephone (local calls), Cable tv, internet wifi. head, electricity included The neiborhood is is calm and lively at the same time. You will be close to Mount Royal, Bernard Street and its restaurants and shops. You will also be close to Little Italy and the Jean Talon famous market. You will be able to get downtow very quickly thanks to t

Bibliothèques, piscine municipale exterieure...
notes: Pour l location de 2  mois et + les frais d'entretien sont de 100$ par mois pour que la femme de ménage puisse passer 1 fois par mois
transit: L'appartement est situé à 30mn en voiture (taxi) de l'aéroport de Montreal Dorval Trudeau.  Près de la station de métro Outrmont. bus, station de taxis stationnement dans la rue.  pistes cyclabe, vélolib.
access: Tout le logement est à la disposition du locataire
interaction: Il y aura une personne ressource joiniable par tél.

reviews.comments:
We enjoy our stay in Nicole' s apartment I outermost.  Very nice neighborhood.  Convenient for us, as close to where our son with family lives.  Apartment is nice, well equipped, a bit funky but comfortable.  Our hostess was most gracious and accommodating.  A couple of drawbacks for some people. We had hoped to  have  a queen size bed, which did not happen. And if you have trouble walking up 32 steps, it may not be for you.  All in all, a nice place to stay. 
Eva & Jean Paul
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
L'accueil fut parfait avec un membre de la famille de Nicole qui habite juste à coté.

L'appartement proposé est très beau, décoré et agencé avec soin, originalité et qualité. On apprécie qu'il ait une grande terrasse jouxtant la cuisine. Le quartier d'Outremont offre de belles rues propices aux ballades, et l'appartement étant proche d'une station de métro, il est très bien situé. Il est également très confortable, et spatieux même à 4 personnes. Merci beaucoup à Nicole!

name: P'ville Studio-NOT a shared space
summary: Our Studio has ceramic tiled floors and a large porcelain tiled shower. All the ceiling areas have been filled with insulation and faced with 2-ply bamboo. Our studio is located at Sandpiper Village I. The Sandpiper grounds boast beautiful mature landscaping and a recently renovated pool complex with a large tile-bottomed pool plus a good size jacuzzi and two Webber gas grills. My studio is less than a minute walk to the pool. HI TAX ID: TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) HI TAX ID: GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

Our rates are also structured with discounts based on length-of-stay beginning with seven nights or more. Along with fresh paint throughout, all electrical outlets and switches have been replaced and additional outlets added.  Our studio is located at Sandpiper Village I within the Princeville Resort. The Sandpiper grounds boast beautiful mature landscaping and a pool complex with a large tile-bottomed pool plus a good size jacuzzi and two Webber gas grills. My studio is less than a minute walk to the pool. A cook top and oven are not available within the studio, however there are Webber gas barbecue grills available for guests to use on a complimentary basis at the large pool complex, located less than a minute's walk

It was a lot of work but the end result was extremely satisfying.  We bought Puamana in August of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , and after a more modest renovation, placed it on line as a 3 bedroom 2 bath townhouse vacation rental. Regan and I  keep busy managing both properties, when we're all not dancing, playing softball, Pickleball, or at the beach.  One of the advantages of living here on Kauai and offering vacat

host.host_about:
My wife, Rachel, and I first visited Kauai in the early eighties and just got hooked. We bought our first vacation rental property in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) at Sandpiper Village in Princeville and spent about 5-1/2 months renovating it.  We dreamed that one day we might be able to make Kauai our permanent home, and we were fortunate to actually make this happen in January of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) We bought our second vacation rental property at Puamana in August of last year (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , as our second vacation rental property. and after a renovation period, placed it on line as a 3 bedroom 2 bath townhouse vacation rental.
My wife still works as a flight attendant and I am retired (for all the guys out there, I'll be writing a book soon about how to make that happen).  However, I keep busy managing both properties, when we're not dancing, playing softball/tennis, or at the beach.  One of the advantages of living here on Kauai and offering vacation properties for rent is that any issues with units that may arise are addressed immediately and decisively through direct communication between the guests and me, the owner. There is no go-between management company in the loop to delay any action that may be required.  It's a win-win for everyone.
Mahalo for visiting AirBNB and if you have any questions, call me at home (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or cell (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 
Karl & Rachel Forer

reviews.comments: Friendly and helpful hosts. Good location.  Room was clean, comfortable and well equipped.

Nice small apartment. You *do* need a car to get around this island but then this location is a good one to explore the rest of Kauai. Nice to have a 'phone in the room with free local calls and 800 numbers. Don't plan on cooking too much as you only have a microwave and toaster but there's a nice big fridge to store food. We were short a key but Karl replaced it promptly. Altogether a good experience.

It was our first experience with AirBnb at all and we had a blast. The studio was perfect for the two of us, located between Princeville and all the beautiful beaches just few minutes away. Karl & Rachel have been great hosts, although we never met them in person they've always been available via mail for us, helping us and giving useful advices. we will definitely come back!!

The studio was located in an o.k. area of Princeville, quick access to the local market and a short ride to Hannalei. I was surprised that the pool wasn't heated.The room hadn't been cleaned, or maintained for some time. Karl, the owner, made good our complaints, and the whole of our stay was a comfortable one.

I have not had a chance to see Karl and Rachel personally but they were very considered and accommodating. The studio is simple but clean, bright and large with huge balcony. Location is beautiful. Right next to the building there is a supreme golf course. Views of the course are amazing. I would stay in this studio next time I am in Hawaii.

A wonderful one bedroom and bath with convenient kitchen supplies and a full-size refrigerator made my stay very comfortable.  The grounds were clean and the other tennents very friendly.  Location was perfect as it was near a walking path and shopping mall with a great grocery store.

We had a perfect time in this studio apt.  I wished for a kitchen when we first arrived, but soon found that eating out or take-out was so easy in Princeville, it didn't matter.  Thanks Karl and Rachel.
Judy and Ed

This is a mature section of  a growing condo community.  The room is spacious, the lanai overlooks a busy street.  I enjoyed the pool, walk-in shower, separate wash area and the lovely Hawaiian breezes!

We had a great stay here.  The Studio has everything you really need to enjoy your stay.  We will definately book here again.  The area is Beautiful and the location is primo and the rate cannot be beat!
Great place to stay in Kauai! Very clean and comfortable! Just what we needed! :) recommend it!

This place is great and perfect for two! I give four stars only because it does not have a full kitchen--if that doesn't bother you then consider the best choice in Princeville for the money. A kitchen in Hawaii would be nice simply because it costs a lot to dine out every meal and the food is not spectacular unless you visit one of the the islands finer dining establishments ($$$). The place does have a refrigerator, microwave and toaster so you can easily whip up a breakfast/lunch from stuff you get at the nearby super market. Good location, it's close to the infamous and BEAUTIFUL Hanalei Bay and town, many different beaches, the St. Regis hotel, right next to the golf course, and there is a good shopping center pretty close by that has it all--grocery store, mexican food, thai food, ice cream, shave ice, shopping etc. This was our first stay at this place and first time using Airbnb and it was super easy--easier than a hotel and much cheaper. Karl and Rachel respond very quickly to your questions/emails/texts. When we go again we will be staying here. Also note, plan on renting a car--well worth the money and a must have to explore the island and Princeville is about a 30-45 min drive from the airport (there are plenty of places to rent a car at Lihue airport).

This is a great little apartment in a prime location--on the North shore, only minutes from Hanalei, which is my favorite beach. Karl was very helpful, whenever I needed him, day or night. I never interacted with Rachel, but I am sure she is, too. There were things in the apartment to use, too, such as boogie boards and beach mats. The mini-kitchenette was helpful, as I could make my own breakfast and lunches to go there--and coffee, as well. There were dishes and utensils, too--and towels of all sizes, so you don't need to bring your own. I will definitely come back as soon as I can--and stay here again. This is a very good price for what you get and where.

Immaculate condo and grounds. The pool area was nice (although jacuzzi jets were out of order and the grills were tempermental...low gas i think?). There were beach mats, boogie boards and a beach umbrella available for us, which was great but would have loved an extra set of towels. The neighbors kitties were really friendly and cute, we enjoyed giving them attention :)   Location was great and super convenient. Pretty much perfect for our needs. Had a fantastic time in Princeville and rest of Kauai!

Nice choice for an inexpensive weekend on the North Shore! There is a full size  fridge/freezer, and there's a microwave and plates/silverware (that is the extent of the kitchenette). Just fine for breakfast or reheating leftovers. You can stock up on groceries at the nearby Foodland. The downsides: the WIFI was frequently down, and parking was difficult when I was there. Bring coffee (there's a coffee maker, filters, but no coffee).
Everything was perfect, as described in the ad. I would recommend the place for sure to my friends if they wanna gonna to Kauai! Thanks Karl and Rachel.
Nice Studio within Princeville resort.  My wife and I had a great time and enjoyed the place.

We had a great time in Princeville. The studio is great and the pool with the barbecue is so cool !
You really need to rent a car if you want to explore the island which is really beautiful!!!
We highly recommend this place!

El studio se encuentra en una zona de apartamentos muy bonita y cuidada.
En las fotos parece más nuevo de lo que es, pero para dormir es suficiente.

It was great to have a place on the North Shore, so that we could get up and in place at the various beaches, trails etc. before the parking became too competitive! The unit was comfortable and the grounds looked well maintained. (We intended to try the BBQ by the pool, but we were so busy during our three night stay that we didn't get around to it!) The package of info mailed ahead of time to us made the check-in, parking etc simple.
Thanks!
AMAZING place! Very neat, very comfortable. Loved the space and especially the balcony. We had a lot of fun. Nice view, nice location, perfect everything.
perfect apartement! everthing worked very well! very tidy and clean. great location to see na pali coast and hanalei.

Great price, good location for access to Hanalei, but the bed was horrible. The boxspring constantly made noise and was sagging below the frame. It kept us up at night and we could feel the metal springs even when we laid a comforter on top! The lack of sleep and sore neck in the morning wasn't worth the price.

Had a very nice stay in this studio with no major complaints. It was clean and had all the basic things we needed. I debated between 4 and 5 stars as there were some minor things that could have been better, however the main things here are location and price - and for that this deserve a 5 star experience. We wanted an inexpensive option, we wanted this location, so this worked great. There may be nicer or more recently remodeled places for a bit more money, but the full sized fridge with freezer was a major selling point for this one, as was a full sized (not 4-cup) coffee maker - giving this an advantage over many we looked at. It also had some beach stuff to borrow which was very nice. The pool in the complex is fairly nice, and the BBQs seemed to work OK once you got them to light. Overall a great option if you want to be in Princeville and want an inexpensive option.

Affordable, clean, charming studio in larger complex in Princeville. TV, fridge, very basic kitchen supplies (no stove). Large parking lot for your rental. Pool access included.

Fairly thin walls let a lot of noise in, but you're on vacation and you shouldn't be sleeping in anyway...

Very close to a grocery store and easy access to Hanalei and the Kalalau Trail. Queen's Bath is ridiculously close, but don't fall in the ocean...

Karl & Rachel's studio was a perfect fit for us. Right in Princeville, near Hanalei bay and Anini beach. There isn't a stove but there are key items like coffee maker, full size fridge and micro wave. Loved the huge shower as well. Guest parking for the studio is limited so if you’re out late you might have to park a little further away but it’s only a two minute walk. Definitely a great value and luckily for us when we realized we left the paper work back in Boston Karl remembered the code off the top of his head over the phone. All in all we had a wonderful stay.

We stayed for one week in Karl & Rachel's studio. We had a great vacation in this beautiful and quiet island.
The studio was nice, very quiet and well placed in a nice neighborhood. We had everything we needed.
Hope to come back one day!
I had a great time! The apartment was very nice, clean, in a beautiful neighborhood in my favorite location on Kauai!! I would definitely stay again!!!!
The reservation was canceled 90 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Such a lovely place to we have your base while exploring beautiful Kaua'i. Would love to come back.

A very nice apartment to stay while exploring Kauai. Just be informed that you have to travel around the whole east/south coast to visit the west shore of Kauai. Even "tools" for the beach were provided. But can't cook there, just microwave and fridge as mentioned in the description. It was nice and clean. A great stay and superb communication with lot's of detailed information to plan our trip! Thank you for everything!

Karl and Rachel were fantastic, and the studio apartment was exactly what my husband and I were looking for.  The room was clean and comfortable, and the location was perfect for enjoying the North and East Shores of Kauai.  The studio is in an apartment complex and you share the space with locals, a much more "real" experience than you can find at a hotel.  If you are looking for a small space to sleep, enjoy coffee on the Lanai, and plan to spend the rest of your day out enjoying Kauai, this is an excellent choice.

Old unit, studio, crowded (TV IS ON TOP OF DIRTY FRIDGE) with minimal amenities. Hawaii is hot & (Website hidden by Airbnb) prepared to sweat. On second floor, must climb step stairs. Only microwave for cooking; on north end of island, so lots of travel to other parts.

We stayed at Karl and Rachel's Princeville condo and would recommend it to others.  It's a very good value for the North Shore and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.

Our hosts were well organized, mailing us all the information we need for our stay as soon as we made our booking.  The location of the condo is terrific, in the center of Princeville, in a well kept complex. The unit was small as advertised but did not feel at all cramped for two people, it had a good size bathroom and nice size lanai for al fresco dining.  The unit was thoughtfully outfitted with everything needed to prepare your own food (except a cooktop, but they have grills in the complex).

The parking situation can be a little tricky if you get back very late (or perhaps we were there at a busy time), though thankfully we never had to test the auxiliary parking option, located 300 yards from the complex.

I believe some others have commented on the place not being perfectly clean - we felt it was quite clean.  The furniture is slightly worn (but still fully functional and useful), which might give that impression.  But all the surfaces were very clean and we didn't notice any bug issues at all.
great location and affordable! karl was also very organized and responsive.

Amazing apartment in an amazing condo! The place was very clean, beautiful and very well located. Only a few minutes by car to Hanaley Bay. The condo is amazing - it is on the new movie "The Descendants". Kauai is our favorite Hawaian island, the condo is part of this amazing experience. We recommend it!
Easy check in and check out. Convenient and safe location. No kitchen, just microwave. Thank you for a smooth and joyful stay in Kauai :)

We had an awesome stay at Karl & Rachel's Princeville studio. We were first time visitors and booked the space based on all the positive reviews, and we were not led astray! The studio is cute, very open and breezy. There is no a/c but we didn't need it, even in the summer heat! We didn't use the pool or the grill, but it's nice to know that that's an option. The parking was convenient as well. In regards to location, the studio is a short drive to Hanalei which is a quaint laid back town with lots of food options. There was also a Foodland close by that had very fresh ahi poke. While the drive from Princeville to the West was almost 2 hours long, it didn't deter us from checking everything out across the island. The studio could use a few upgrades but is fine without. We would definitely stay here again!

Well, the studio was perfect size for 1 or 2. It is up on the 2nd floor and shares the landing with a larger unit. Unfortunately, they were really loud and had a crying baby. We heard that baby all the time, especially when the front door or windows were open. We chose to visit in October and the cool winds disappeared. There is no AC which normally is fine but with no winds it was really really hot and humid in the studio. We slept with the ceiling fan on and a box fan positioned at the sliding door to the porch. So if you are visiting in winter, the temperature will probably be fine. For us it was really hot and unfortunately quite loud. The price was great and Karl was very nice over the phone and email. On the porch were small beach chairs and a cooler which we used. There were 2 pool/beach towels, so you don't have to pack them. All in all, the condo is in a complex where lots of people live with lots of kids. If looking for an inexpensive unit, this is it. However, we weren't thrilled with the noise and temperature.

This is a nice, inexpensive unit for staying in the Princeville area. While it just has a basic kitchenette with microwave, toaster & coffeemaker, plus the large refrigerator it is well supplied with dishes and supplies needed to make quick meals & sandwiches. We did use the BBQ in the pool area which was a nice addition. We found it clean & fairly quiet except for a little early morning commute traffic. It easily accommodated 2 of us with luggage and golf equipment and there is room to put things away.
It is upstairs. The wi-fi mostly worked and there is a good selection of cable channels if you want to watch some TV. Karl was quickly responsive when we had a couple of questions. The only negative we found was the bed was not comfortable. It sags pretty badly in the middle. Other than that we enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it.

The place is lovely and the location is good.  5 minutes to Sealodge, which you can hike to the secret beach.  15 minutes to Hanalei bay, and the restaurants/bars around there, and 30 minutes to Ke'e beach.  30 minutes to Kappa town.  Parking is difficult in Sandpiper complex, but Karl gave great suggestions and direction.

A great studio apartment in Princeville!  Karl & Rachel were super friendly and supplied us with a ton of information before our stay.  The studio was clean & well kept.  Hanalei Bay is only a 15min drive away.  Convenient to Foodland, gas, and other shopping.  Also very close to Queen's Bath hike.  Pool & Jacuzzi were great after a day at the beach. Would definitely stay there again.

Nice place with a large balcony. Quiet neighborhood with a pool, a hot tub, and a BBQ place nearby.
Apartment is well equipped but doesn't have a full kitchen (as described). So bring meat and fish for a BBQ dinner and coffee for breakfast.
Great place for excursions to the Napali coast and surfing on the north coast.

Stayed here for five nights and had a great time. The condo is well furnished and had everything we needed. Cooked in several nights using the grill located in the pool area which was easy to use.  Enjoyed walking around the neighborhood and seeing albatross nesting in some of the yards nearby.  Our hosts did a great job communicating with us and provided all the information we needed for a hassle free stay. Mahalo!

We spent 10 days here and it was a great base for exploring the island. The room was lovely and clean, plenty big enough for the two of us, comfy bed, a very welcome ceiling fan, and all the amenities we needed, from an enormous fridge-freezer to bottle openers and coffee filters. We didn't feel anything was missing for the whole 10 days were there. It was really nice to have a little private balcony to have breakfast on, and the barbecues in the pool area were great too. We were a bit concerned about "invading" the pool area, not being residents, but the few people we met there made us feel welcome. Although we didn't meet the hosts, Karl was very quick to respond to any questions we had.

It's in a good location - little Princeville centre is walkable (we really recommend Tiki Iniki!) and the larger Hanalei is really nice and just a short drive away (we loved it there). Most of the rest of the island is easy to explore from here too, except Waimea canyon which takes around 2.5 hours to get to (but was so spectacular that we went there twice!)

The only thing I would make people aware of is this condo is not a place for parties - there's a strict 9pm noise curfew which the neighbours do enforce, especially because the way the condo is laid out you can sometimes hear people talking very clearly. (However the curfew suited us down to the ground as we were jetlagged with a 10 hour time difference and were in bed by 10pm most days!) 

In general the room had everything we needed, and it's a lovely, family-friendly neighbourhood with very friendly and helpful residents. We really enjoyed our stay.
The reservation was canceled 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Karl and Rachel's place was perfect for our stay in Kauai. The location in Princeville was a fantastic base to explore the island, and an easy drive from our favourite town of Hanalei. We found the airflow in the apartment adequate enough that the lack of aircon was not an issue. The pool and BBQ facilities were also great. Thanks again!

My boyfriend and I spent 3 nights at Karl and Rachel's apartment and it was really nice. The apartment was really comfortable and clean and we really enjoyed the pool area. Around Princeville there are wonderful beaches for swimming, surfing and snorkeling and especially in Hanalei (next town) there are nice restaurants, cafés and there is always something going on. We really enjoyed our stay and would totally come back again...

die beiden stellen eine saubere kleine wohnung, bestehend aus 1 großem raum, 1 bad und einer großen terrasse zur verfügung.. alles gepflegt und ordentlich sauber.. einen schönen blick von der terrasse u genügend platz in der wohnung.. wir haben uns zu hause gefühlt und können die wohnung absolut weiter empfehlen, wer gern unter sich bleibt und gut schlafen möchte.. danke schön

Everything was as described and as we expected it. Great location to explore the northern part of Kauai. Karl answered always very fast and the written information were easy to understand. Good value for money.
Karl's place was very clean and tidy. He left a lot of helpful information. Everything was well organised. Thanks Karl!
A very nice and clean appartment in a very nice (but calm) neighbourhood. The appartment has everything which is required for an enjoayble stay.

Karl and Rachel's studio was everything we needed for our visit to the north coast, great location, all the necessities, and a very professional host! We had no issues, and Karl left information and answers to anything we may have asked or needed. The space is very private, and after a few emails with all the info, we were on our own to enjoy and explore. The complex the studio is in is great, we took advantage of the pool and bbq area for cooking. The kitchenette is small but effective, and the lanai is great for outdoor meals! We would definitely stay again, hopefully soon!

Great rental for a couple! The place has all the amenities as a hotel, but private. Karl is easy to work with and responds immediately if needed. Easy access to the complex. All the neighbors are friendly. Perfect getaway for 2 with a smaller budget. We highly recommend this studio!

Enjoyed our stay. The room is as described - basically a motel room with large refrigerator and microwave. Bathroom sink doubles as kitchen sink. It is in a golf community. It is safe and we saw several people jogging and walking dogs. For us the weather was cool and rainy so did not make use of the pool or outdoor grill. The walls are thin but the neighbors were courteous and we had no problem falling asleep and getting a good night's rest.

The studio was what we expected. Eveything we needed was there even though some of the stuff would need to be refresh soon.. Check in and check out were really easy and the pool on the site is really enjoyable. Worth the price!

The place had everything we needed! Clean, great location and easy check in. We never actually met Karl and Rachel, but they were wonderful hosts none the less. Quick to respond to any questions we had and very accommodating. Love the community pool and BBQ area. We met some wonderful people out there and were able to cook up some killer meals. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to others!

Karl is very well organized : he sent us in advance all the necessary information and the rules to make easy our arrival.  
Quiet studio in a very pleasant neighborhood, spacious, clean and very well located to visit the North coast.
A place to stay without hesitation.

Great and easy stay. The apartment had everything we needed. Very convenient location that was an easy drive from Hanalei.  Only small thing to note is that the walls are very thin, so if you are a light sleeper, this may not be ideal for you. Didn't bother me though.
Great location in a nice quire apartment complex. The room was clean and exactly as described. A great value.
Spacious and comfortable studio. Complex walls are thin and gets a little noisy nothing earplugs don't fix. Safe parking nice pool and BBQ. Nice modern shower with shampoo conditioner and shower gel.
We had a great stay at Karl & Rachel's room! Very clean and convenient studio in a big holiday resort. Great place to discover the north shore of the island!
The studio picture was very much like the studio looked. I love the area and felt very safe staying here as a single girl. I would defiantly love to come back!
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Clean and cute little studio unit at a decent price.  That's what we were looking for.  The pool in this complex was especially nice.  Karl was very helpful and kind.
Everything was conformed as the description.  The apartment was fine.  We enjoyed de pool and the jacuzzi.

The apartment was great! Clean and spacious and with an outside terrace. The bed is big and comfortable. It's great that the apartment has a coffee maker / fridge / iron etc.! I would definitely recommend this place :)

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here! The room was very clean and accommodating. Everything it looks like in the pictures and had everything we needed. Loved the huge lanai! It was warm in the room but the fans helped a lot. Mahalo for a great stay on your property! We will be back :)

This was a terrific place from which to enjoy all that Kauai has to offer. The studio is just as described, the pool/hot tub were beautiful, and everyone we encountered was very neighbourly. The only small caveat, and as others have noted, is that the units aren't well sound-proofed, and we could definitely hear the next-door tenants coming and going (which isn't to suggest they were loud by any means). Beyond that, I'd be quick to recommend this place to anyone.

Die Unterkunft ist in einer schönen Siedlung und vollkommen perfekt für unseren Urlaub gewesen. Das Zimmer war schön groß, die Dusche ebenfalls und es war alles sehr sauber. Mein Mann und ich haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Gegend um Princeville hat uns am besten gefallen auf Kauai, wunderschöne Sandstände und alles schnell erreichbar.
Vielen Dank.

Location! Location! Location!  This was such an awesome location to be in if you want to stay on the North Side of the island (best side IMO).  My wife and I stayed here for our honeymoon and thoroughly enjoyed it.  The studio is as described.  The only thing that I do want to point out is that there is no AC in the room.  However, Karl left multiple fans and we felt fine the entire time.  Everything else was great!

The instructions the host gave were very clear and helpful. Princeville is in a good location to access the northern coast of Kauai. The room is as described - functional and basic. Unfortunately, the bed is a bit squishy and the refrigerator is somewhat loud. On the upside, the room remained cool and the fan was quiet.

Karl hatte alles perfekt organisiert. Das Condo war nett und zweckmäßig eingerichtet,wir haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt. Außerdem liegt das Condo in einer landschaftlich sehr schönen Umgebung, Top Strände sind sehr nah. Eine klare Empfehlung.
Amazing stay. Amazing hosts who really thought of just about everything to make our vacation frictionless. Can't beat the location!!

Excellent place to visit the North shore of Kauai. Note that this appartement is like in a small resort and you can only cook your food on shared BBQ. Great pool and really close to nice activities of Kauai.
Place was as described. Perfect for our budget. Thanks again!

This place was just enough. I think that's the best way to describe it. We knew we'd be out most of the time and wanted to spend the money on food and activities so this was great. It's pretty small - like 300 sf. It has a small dining table with 2 chairs in side and a table with 4 chairs on the patio - which is pretty big. The bathroom has a dispenser with shampoo/condition/body wash (which I thought was great). There is also a blow dryer (also nice). The only real problem was parking - there aren't really enough spots. 5 of the 8 nights, we parked on grass or some other non-spot. I don't think anyone will tow you as long as you're in the lot and not in someone's way. Also there's no air conditioning - maybe that's listed but I didn't realize and that was the one thing I complained about to my husband. At night, there's a nice breeze. There are plates and cutlery as well as wine glasses. The owners are SUPER nice. I said the internet wasn't working and my husband had to do work and Karl came over early the next morning to fix it. Overall, it's cheap so you can do other stuff :)

Karl and Rachel were incredibly helpful in making sure we had all the information we needed before even reaching the apartment. The apartment itself was perfect for our needs and very comfortable. The location was great for us as we ran all around the north shore. We had an absolutely terrific experience!

Everything as described.  The apartment was clean and had everything we needed to enjoy the island.  It was nice having access to the pool as well... Would stay again.  Location convenient for our hike of the Na'pali coast
Had a really great stay here. The condo was very clean and had everything we needed. The pool and hot tub were very nice. This is a great base for exploring the north shore.

This is a fantastic spot to stay at North Shore! The studio is comfy and clean, it has everything exactly as described. My only complain is the mattress was a bit to soft for me and my husband, apart from that, everything was perfect. And we would come to stay at Karl's studio again for sure.
The listing was very accurate for this place. My husband and I both really enjoyed our stay here. It was very clean, cozy and quiet. Karl was very quick to respond to any messages we sent.

A few things to note: Princeville is basically this giant secluded community of resorts & vacation homes on the northshore of Kauai. You should stay at this airbnb if you want to save money. It's really the bare minimum - small and dark. There is no AC and the unit is pretty outdated. Unfortunately, we encountered a couple cockroaches during our stay. Its understandable due to tropical weather, but it was still rather unpleasant. 

We tried to minimize our time spent at the unit. The Princeville location isn't ideal if you want to explore the island. We did a lot of driving. I absolutely loved Kauai but won't be staying here next time.
Beau petit studio douillet et propre. Les photos correspondent à la réalité et Karl est très facilement joignable. Nous avons aimé notre séjour à Princeville.
the place was just as described...a great place at a fair price....thanks  drew d

Karl was highly responsive and flexible. His instructions are thorough. Everything was very smooth. The complex and unit do show a little bit more wear and tear than I could tell from the pictures but I would definitely stay here again given the solid value.

We had a great time staying at Rachel and Karl's place! 
The apartment was just as described and is located in a very nice neighbourhood just a short drive to Hanalei or the Napali coast. 
We can definitely recommend staying here and would do so again ourselves anytime! Thank you Rachel and Karl!!

We had a pleasant stay in Karl's studio. The place is as described, communication with Karl is perfect and all is just fine.
This studio is not your normal Airbnb experience, no other contact than written with the host and seems to be used 100% for rental.
The location is convenient to explore the north coast by car, but Princeville is very weird and unattractive (to me, at least). Next time, I'd rather stay in Kilauea or Hanalei. So despite the fact that the studio itself is good enough (old though), I would not visit again but mainly because of princeville. And if I would choose to stay in Princeville, I would save up a bit longer and get an oceanview.
Great value for centrally located accommodations in Princeville.  The apartment was as described and everything went very smoothly

We chose this studio because of the reviews, price & photos. We booked & paid for the studio  7 months in advance.  As we arrived to Kauai I was not feeling well, Karl was kind enough to let us check in a few hrs early. 

The studio was basic as was listed. And we knew this, we don't need fancy. The pool & bbq area was nice as well, however prior to our trip there was a review where customer states there were bugs or roaches in the studio. I asked Karl about this,he stated "that there are always bugs anywhere you go". Unfortunately there were roaches, both nights we were there. Which was a big disappointment. Another disappointment was the  room fan that was in there studio, it was old and dirty and only had one speed the lowest.  There is a ceiling fan but did not cool the room as we would have liked. We slept  with front &  back doors open the first night the next day we bought a box fan which helped tremendously with the ceiling fan to circulate the air.
We did not contact owner (our decision) since policy is strict and we wanted to enjoy our time in Kauai. 

We chose to leave for another place to stay where there we had the best time.

Lovely studio, big enough for 2 and in such a great location! A couple of downsides to the place was the lack of a proper kitchen sink to wash plates and kitchen utensils and having to drive to Kapaa to do laundry. Besides those everything else was fine! Loved the fact that the location was so close to Hanalei Bay. Will definitely consider staying there again. 

Thanks Karl and Rachel!

Great value for Hawaii! A little noisy because there is no air conditioning so people keep their windows open. The chickens might wake you up earlier than you would like, but that occurs most places on the island.
Great place to stay!!!

The Apartment is very Nice with a big balcony in a beautiful area called Sandpiper Village , close To a Golfclub area. Very calm , Nice neighbours, with a Big Pool, everything very clean. We can recommend It!!!

We booked an additional 3 days to our trip to Kauai as it allowed us to use our air miles to book a free flight back home to the great state of Texas, so we booked here to extend our stay.  We had no expectations, and were mostly pleased with the accommodations. 
Pros: Cable flat screen TV, full-size fridge, & a nice sized private lanai.
Cons: Small in size, bathroom sink serves for brushing teeth and rinsing dishes, only supplied one towel each for 3 nights.
Dave & Theresa Blanks

This airbnb is a really good basis for all what you need if you want to explore the island. We didn't stay during the day, but we also had enough kitchen equipment to prepare our breakfast.(toaster/microwave/coffee machine, fridge and freezer). We didn't use the pool or the barbecue.
The area is really nice and we also found every night a parking spot. It's really safe. We found 2 beach chair, cooler box and snorkeling equipment on the airbnb. Also we enjoyed to sit outside.
The bed is good enough to sleep in it. A big shower is provided. Also a Tv. It was nice and clean and we didn't see any bugs!
I highly recommend this place because this nice safe area and amazing price!

Great condo! Spacious and well equipped. The biggest issue I had was locating the condo in the dark after a very long day. The hosts DID provide a map but very hard to decifer unless you were familiar.  Once I found it, there was no problem...EXCEPT for finding parking every night.
Very well located, we had a great expérience!

The place was very cozy and clean. There is everything you need and the check in was very easy and the information sheet which you get is very helpful. We had some trouble with the parking lot because after 10pm everything was completely packed, if you are there before you shouldn't have any problems. There are several great places around just explore. A Foodland is just minutes away, so some restaurants.

Great location to set out and explore Kauai these hosts were very attentive and everything was straightforward and easy making for a
Stress free trip.
This was a great studio apartment to access Kauai's north shore. Location was ideal, space was clean and tidy, and the amenities (e.g. pool, hot tub, beach equipment) were enjoyable.

Studio in a good location in princeville near the golf course if you wanna running safely in the early morning like me! There is a lot of room in the studio. The best is very comfy and the lanai is Sunny!
Everything was clean.
The only negative point is the that the fridge is very noisy at Night.

Everything was as advertised. Karl sent a lot of useful info so checking in was easy.  Absolutely loved to community pool and we walked to other spots like Hideaway Beach, Princeville shopping center. and the Queens pool.  Parking was often full if you came back later in the day so be careful to read and follow the instructions.

Was a great place.  Great location.  Karl was very helpful - provided lots of information on the area, parking and check-in.  Clean, private and perfect for two!  Loved sitting on the lanai.  Definitely recommend!

What a great condo! There's a beautiful lanai, a kitchenette with all the essentials, huge fridge (can be a bit noisy at night), closet with lots of hangers, clothing rack, nice dining area, lots of space for your stuff, tv with cable, good Wifi and lots of power outlets. The shower is big which I loved. Plus a queen bed made in heaven, I've slept so well! The location is great, supermarket nearby, close to beautiful Haleiwa and all the beautiful beaches. I always found a parking space in the back lot (even when getting home after dark). Contacting Karl was easy and he always replied quickly, mahalo :) I would definitely stay here again, loved it! Thank you for having me :)

Karl & Rachel's place is everything you see in the photos and read on the description. Very well located to do everything that is to do in Kauai (if you have a car). Bed is really comfortable and the complex is safe and well mantained. 
Good value for your money.
A clean and cosy appartement which provides everything you need!

The place was extremely clean when we arrived. There was a large bed, plenty of pillows, and towels. I loved the self check in and check out process, it saved a lot of time and stress. Karl’s directions for the entire process were clear and concise. He also provided us with a map of the apartment complex and Kaua’i itself. There were also a lot of homey touches, like a microwave, toaster oven, full sized fridge, a coffee maker, and dishes, which really made the trip much smoother. There was also a small balcony with a table/chairs. The grills down at the pool at the complex were also a huge perk! I would highly suggest this place for any couple. It was a great price, location, and amenities!

Absolutely loved our week long stay at Karl & Rachel’s place, it is a great central location close to the shops and beaches.
It is a neat and tidy place with great amenities.
Communication with Karl was very quick and easy and he was an absolute pleasure to deal with.

We will be back to explore more of the North Shore again soon!!
Nice location in Princeville,  close to the start of Kalalau trail and plenty of nice beaches. The apartment was clean with all needed amenities.

The community is beautiful. The pool area is nice. I just wasn’t expecting the room to absorb so much heat inside. Once it’s nighttime if you have both fans it cools down a bit. Other than the heat it was next to some cute little stores and there is a hike in the community itself to some tide pools that I totally recommend.
The stay at Karl abd Rachels apartment was really cool. Unfortunately the hurricane was coming so it only rained these days, but therefore the cozy flat was nice to spent time in.
The studio is well located in a chic neighborhood. Great place to stay, we really enjoyed the pool and the spa.
Eine gute Unterkunft, um die Insel zu erkunden. Sehr hellhörig und dadurch laut

Karl&Rachel's Place is a quiet and peaceful, getaway from it all place that is great to "come home to" after a day of running around the island. The hosts make it so easy to check in/out and have provided little amenities to make it just right. It's location is perfect for trips to the many beaches and attractions. We would definitely be willing to stay here again.

The studio is clean. The host sent us very detail information about the place, neighborhood and rules. We like the location,  quiet and beautiful neighborhood. Can access to local food store/restaurants/bus stop within 20 minute walk.

Karl was a great communicator and was relatively quick in responses. We arrived a few hours before check in and they were graciously able to accommodate for us to check in sooner, which we greatly appreciate. I would say the place looks more outdated in person than the pictures appears as there is more wear and tear on some furnishings. However, if you are going to the island to explore you won't spend much time in the studio anyways so that shouldn't be a huge issue. Location is solid since its in a nice complex area and it is next to restaurants and a super market. Also it was convenient that parking was provided.

Dishes are old and dirty, hosts are not very clear with the apartment the parking situation is ridiculous, you are connected to another apartment which the sound is not properly blocked out, not to mention we found hair and sand in the bed when we first arrived
Beautiful location, comfortable room and easy check in. Not ideal for cooking but you can prepare small meals in a electric oven. Would stay again. Lots of beautiful beaches around.

Karl and Rachel excellently communicated every relavent detail about this space. The location was great, and the grounds were beautiful.

The unit is quite loud during the day, and some of the photos must be old as there is some wear and tear in the unit.

Overall, we had a great stay.

This condo was a great place to stay if you’re looking for a great town and an amazing adventure! Princeville was so much fun and had so much to offer! The drive from the airport is absolutely beautiful and there are a couple of great beaches to go to! There are also tons of amazing hikes to go on around the small island! We totally recommend coming here and staying for quite a while!

Stayed here for 4 night in Feb 2019. The pictures represent the place pretty well. It was a bit older than I expected. The place was clean. The bed was comfortable, but there isn't a lot of extra room.  There is a coffee maker, a microwave and a toaster oven. There are a few plates and some utensils. Washing them was a bit difficult, because you need to use the bathroom sink. They provided shampoo, conditioner and soap, but I'm not sure of the quality. They had some extra items which were a nice touch. Beach chairs, snorkel gear, & beach towels. 
The location was excellent, on the north shore in Princeville.  It's in a huge complex of residences. There is a shopping area with restaurants & a nice grocery store within a 5 minute drive.  We enjoyed our stay.

name: The Manhattan Club in the heart of midtown!!!!
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
house_rules: - Must be at least 24 years of age to check in as responsible party. Valet Parking is $35 per day and not optional. Driver's License and Credit Card Authorization are required at check in.

host.host_about:
HI My name is JW! I am a fun loving father and husband. We love to travel and see the world as we make memories! I also love helping others travel! Our family is we made up  of our son, our dog Scruffy and Our huge Mainecoon cat Caesar. We love to explore and see new place and revisit our favorite places like NYC, San Fran, Tahoe and the beaches of south Fla!
If you have questions, just ask! I am an open book!

name: Quiet and Private Up In Hawi
summary: You’ll love my place because of the light, the comfy bed, covered parking and the coziness. The ohana is good for couples, business travelers, and for a quiet get-a-way.
space: You have a carport and private entrance to the ohana.  We are available if you need anything, and it's easy for you to come and go without interacting with us, as you like.
description: You’ll love my place because of the light, the comfy bed, covered parking and the coziness. The ohana is good for couples, business travelers, and for a quiet get-a-way. You have a carport and private entrance to the ohana.  We are available if you need anything, and it's easy for you to come and go without interacting with us, as you like. We are on 2.6 acres, and you are welcome to walk around the property, pick oranges, tangerines, bananas, and enjoy the blue sky and passing clouds.  The back and mauka (mountain) side of the property is open pasture. I'm happy to offer information about hiking and snorkeling opportunities, and directions to other parts of the island. We are in a quiet neighborhood, no current roosters or dogs.  Nice!
neighborhood_overview: We are in a quiet neighborhood, no current roosters or dogs.  Nice!
access: We are on 2.6 acres, and you are welcome to walk around the property, pick oranges, tangerines, bananas, and enjoy the blue sky and passing clouds.  The back and mauka (mountain) side of the property is open pasture.
interaction: I'm happy to offer information about hiking and snorkeling opportunities, and directions to other parts of the island.

host.host_about:
We have lived in this house on the hill for 15 years and couldn't be happier.
I swim and snorkle in the ocean a few times a week and am still amazed!
We love providing a place to stay for others to discover and enjoy Hawaii.

reviews.comments:
Very nice, quiet, private apartment. Good kitchen and lovely grounds.  Quiet area just outside of town, easy to get to.  Hawaiian style shower and lanai with covered parking, (nice when it is raining).   The hosts are friendly and knowledgable.  Really enjoyed our stay and would stay again.  
Mahalo nui loa.

A warm welcome with plenty of privacy. It was a beautiful place to wake up and a great home base for exploring the north end of the island. Homey space on a quiet road that gave a good sense of what it would be like to live on this part of the Big Island.

I needed a quiet place to stay near the seminar that I was attending in Kapa'au. Orange's studio in-law apartment met all of my needs perfectly. The space is connected by a breezeway to the main house and was much more spacious and secluded than I expected. After Orange's warm greeting at checkin, I didn't see anyone during my three night stay. I enjoyed the outdoor shower with its festive string lighting, which is fully enclosed and private and just off of the lanai. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. 

Plenty of takeout and sit-down dining options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner in Hawi Town, which is only a 3-minute drive away. Groceries at the Takata Store are a 5-minute drive away. 

Mahalo, Orange. I would not hesitate to stay here again should I ever need to return to North Kohala.
Loved it! The hosts were great and the place is really nice, clean and spacious. It has a porch overlooking a beautiful garden. I'll stay there again next time I'm in the area!!
Orange is a great host, and the place has fresh improvements and is quite tidy.

This is a spacious studio with a nice kitchenette. It's located on a quiet hill above Hawi with a view of the ocean.  You can borrow beach towels and Orange has lots of good information on where to  use them. Very gracious host.

Orange and Larry have put together a cozy, comfortable, well-appointed apartment that was all that was advertised and much more.  We so enjoyed our stay there and the proximity to one of our favorite Big Island towns, Hawi, and do plan to return someday.
One of the best rentals I have stayed at

Orange is an amazing host! The accommodations were superb. It was very quiet and the view from the lanai was amazing.

We loved staying here. It was nice and secluded and provided tons of privacy. It is a little isolated so be prepared to drive for most activities. 

The outdoor shower may have well been apart of the unit, it’s under the lanai.

Overall we had a great time! Thank you Orange and Larry for being amazing hosts!
Nice place and good view.
We had a very pleasurable experience staying at Orange's place.  Cute and cozy location, and everything was very clean.  Kitchen was well equipped for cooking your own meals.

Orange and Larry were terrific hosts.  Super friendly and very knowledgable about the area.   There place was better than described. We loved the cool outdoor shower and lush tropical surrounds.   Snorkel gear and beach chairs were very welcome touches.  Thank you!

We had such a wonderful stay with Orange and Larry. Such great hosts in every way. The space itself was lovely - beautiful surroundings, clean and comfortable, private, cozy, quiet, and with everything you could possibly want or need (from cookware to snorkel gear). The private porch was a beautiful spot to eat breakfast or relax at the end of the day. And it was a quick, easy drive into the town of Hawi. Beyond that, Orange and Larry were fantastic hosts! They welcomed us in as a very last minute booking and made sure we felt right at home. If we needed anything, they were available to us, and they were such delightful people to chat with. If we’re ever back in Hawi, we’d definitely stay here again.

Hawi is a place a lot of mainland travelers don't get to in Hawai'i.  We're really glad we went, and we couldn't have asked for a better place.  Relaxing on the lanai, having a G&T, and looking down there lawn was a pleasure.  The room was sparkling clean with a great kitchen.  

Our hosts were ready to help us out with our travel needs from finding packing material for some artwork to sawing the end off of a piece of wood!  Hugs were had all around when we left.

If you are looking for a comfortable stay in less-traveled corner of the Big Island, this is a place for you.
This is a great little spot in the countryside that feels a lot more off the beaten path than it is. The attention to detail, cleanliness and quietude were all top notch. Mahalo Orange and Larry!

A lovely space just a short drive up hill from Hawi town. The space is clean and has a lot of information about Hawaii (read the blue book). We also especially liked the outdoor shower and deck area.

Hawi is a very relaxed little town. Would highly recommend the sushi restaurant (sushi rock), the local Mexican was also good and cheap.

Orange and Larry were great hosts, they welcomed us when we arrived and showed us around. They were also very responsive with any issues or questions.

Would definitely recommend it for a visit when exploring Hawaii’s big island.
Cute ohana up above Hawi with a nice deck to relax, comfy bed, and WiFi. Easy to get to and convenient to all of north Mohala.
Comfortable home with all the amenities you’d need. Would definitely come back.

We stayed here for ten days and enjoyed every morning, filled with nothing but birds songs (not the roosters!). Kitchen has everything to cook, wifi is fast, and bed is very comfy. No mosquitos in the house. Mahalo, Orange and Larry for our warm welcome and great stay in Hawi!
Lovely little place in the cute little town of Hawi! It was the perfect spot to come home to after a day of exploring! Orange was a very kind and helpful host. The place is exactly as pictured
Orange & Larry are great hosts. The place is fantastic & the scenery is lovely. We’re already planning a return trip.

Orange and Larry are exceptional hosts. Larry tells great stories! The guest suite was very comfortable. The “outside shower” is two steps out the main door on the lenai and completely enclosed and private. You even get to park your car under a carport and walk straight into your living space without wet if it’s raining.

name: College Style of Downtown Mtl
summary: My place is close to Concordia University, Café Myriade, and Centre Bell. Crescent street. You’ll love my place because of the people, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids)...
space: The location is best in the city for groups and family coming to have fun in Montreal, famous Crescent street is less than 5 minutes away. Enough pubs, restaurants and clubs to keep you busy for weeks. Our place comes fully equipped, towels, dinnerware, very comfortable beds and linens, access to a pool, gym, and sauna in the building and high speed WiFi internet. Anything your group needs we have !!
description: My place is close to Concordia University, Café Myriade, and Centre Bell. Crescent street. You’ll love my place because of the people, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids)... The location is best in the city for groups and family coming to have fun in Montreal, famous Crescent street is less than 5 minutes away. Enough pubs, restaurants and clubs to keep you busy for weeks. Our place comes fully equipped, towels, dinnerware, very comfortable beds and linens, access to a pool, gym, and sauna in the building and high speed WiFi internet. Anything your group needs we have !! Whatever the occasion, enjoy complete privacy with full access to the apartment. - Anything 4 guests needs we have! - Gym, Pool, Sauna from 8AM to 10pm! - Laundry room access 24/7 We can often accommodate early, partial check in (Drop off bags, use the pool, etc while cleaners finish - ASK US)... We are always available to h
neighborhood_overview: Ville-Marie is the name of a borough (arrondissement) in the centre of the city of Montreal, Quebec. The borough is named after Fort Ville-Marie, the French settlement that would later become Montreal (now Old Montreal), which was located within the present-day borough.  This location is a popular attraction for both tourists and locals alike. North of De Maisonneuve Boulevard, one can find many luxury boutiques and art galleries in a Victorian architectural setting. To the south of de Maisonneuve the concentration of nightclubs, bars and restaurants makes this Montreal's most well-known nightlife strips.
notes: - The parking spots can be arranged in the same building with $30/night. (Please note that the Garage Entrance has a max height clearance of 182 cm /  6’ feet.) Note that the clearance for the garage is 6 feet. This is fine for SUV but not one with ski rack on top. - The storage your luggage before check-in or after checkout  can be arranged in the same building (the other unit) with only $1/hour for each piece. - Extra cleaning for the duration of your stay can be arranged with $39 for each time (the apartment will be clean as clean as check-in day)
transit: - Guy-Concordia metro station located within 1 minutes walking from my apartment  Multiple buses and Metro stations on each corner. Night buses on the corner. - The Montreal Museum of Fine Art located within 2 minutes walking  - Concordia university located within 1 minute walking - McGill university located within 10 minutes walking  - Bell Centre located within 15 minutes walking  - The Old Montreal located within 40 minutes walking  - The Places des Art located within 15 minutes walking  - Mount Royal park located within 15 minutes walking  - The Crescent street (night life of Montreal) located in 3 minutes walking  - Hundreds restaurants, bars, cafes, clubs located in a few apartments walking
access: Whatever the occasion, enjoy complete privacy with full access to the apartment. - Anything 4 guests needs we have! - Gym, Pool, Sauna from 8AM to 10pm! - Laundry room access 24/7 We can often accommodate early, partial check in (Drop off bags, use the pool, etc while cleaners finish - ASK US)...
interaction: We are always available to help with ideas, directions, or any other question you might have - free of charge! Let us know if you have any special requests. You will have our personal cell phone number.
house_rules: Terms & Conditions 1. UNDECLARED GUEST  Any undeclared, additional guests will cost $50/person for each night 2. SMOKING  No smoking. Smoking = $500 fine. E-cigarettes ONLY. Smoking in the building sets off the alarm that fines us 500$ so you will be charged the same. This includes halls and stairways. Smoke outside only. 3. PARTY No parties allowed in the apartments. There will be a fine of $500 otherwise. 4. NOISE COMPLAIN If you make the noise after 10:00 PM you will be charge $200 5. LATE CHECKOUT  The checkout time is before 11:00 AM so if you don't checkout without my confirmation you will be charged an additional $50/hour 6. KEEP WINDOWS CLOSED Windows to be closed immediately when raining to avoid damage to paint and furniture.  Close windows and lock the door when you leave. Also do not open the windows for more than 10 minutes in Winter, as the low temperature can cause the pipes to burst. You will be charged for any damages if you fail to comply. 7. DON'T REMOVE MAKEUP WITH

reviews.comments: Clean, spacious and centrally located downtown. Check in was super easy. Thanks!
Great time at Edi's place !
Great location and host

Edi was very sweet and welcoming, he got back to us quickly whenever we had questions. 

As for the apartment, it was warm, cosy and clean. We were provided everything we needed. The bed, couch were comfortable, kitchenware and bathrooms were clean.

Overall, this was my fist Airbnb stay and My experience at Edi's were pleasant and we enjoyed our stay. :)
Nice place to leave. Convenient, clean, and comfortable.
L'appart est très propre et l'emplacement est super. Je recommends.
Cozy & clean, and a great location! Hosts were very kind and easy to communicate with. If you are looking to stay downtown, I highly recommend.

L'appartement est ok, mais la propreté n'est pas vraiment bonne. Il y avait des cheveux dans la salle de bain et tout le nettoyage semblait être fait vite fait. Mais il est bien situé, en plein centre ville et merci pour les chocolats

Great deal for what you're paying: In the heart of downtown and near a metro station. The sheets & towels were clean and the WiFi was great, but the carpets hadn't been vacuumed in a while and the bathroom was questionable? 
Monica was very quick to respond and made our arrival very easy.
L'appartement est vraiment bien, il est bien situé ! Rapport qualité prix excellent!
Great little spot
Everything was great. Thanks!
Place was fantastic and exactly as advertised. Monica was great at responding to any questions or issues.
It's a nice place for stay few days and also is so close to many places in downtown and the apartment is so clean! We really like the place.

Our stay at Monica's and Edi's place was very nice. The apartment is located between two major streets which was great for shopping and good places to eat. Public transit also close by. The apartment itself is a good size, perfect for three people, clean and bed was very comfortable. We planned on cooking some of our meals but realized the oven was not working so only stove top meals would work. The other appliances are very outdated but for the most part, functional. Bathroom is also outdated and we were only given two bath towels even though there were 3 guests. Check in and check out was easy and Monica responded immediately to any questions that I had. Overall we had a great time and would recommend this apartment.

Excellent rapport qualité prix, logement extrêmement bien situé !
Explications claires et communication facile avec Monica.
Merci pour ce chouette séjour!
Monica and Edi's place was exactly as described, communication was very good between us whenever I needed help. Would recommend there place 100% and would come back again whenever In Montreal!

The place is located in the super convenient area. Monica and Edi are very helpful and quick to response the messages. 
There are dusts on the floor and tables but not that big problem.
Nice place not too noisy.

Appartement bien situé dans Montréal, au pieds du métro et au cœur d'un quartier animé.
Petits bémols, nous avons eu des odeurs de cigarette alors que nous ne fumons pas en rentrant après nos excursions.
Les prises électriques sont mal fixées et certains fils apparent. Sinon, de bonnes prestations dans la résidence.
The location is perfect! Near subways and malls. Walking distance to McGill University. Strongly recommend!
appartement calme (bien que le quartier soit très animé) et bien situé (métro et bus tout près), agréable distribution des (Website hidden by Airbnb) petites attentions accueillantes!
Nice and cozy apartment in great location!

Great place. Good for 2 people. The person who was supposed to pick us up as recommended by Monica couldn't do so at the last minute anyway Uber to monica's place is about 35 cad. The apartment is fully equipped. You have everything u need there. Recommend to wash before using the kitchen utensils. U can request for a laundry card to do n your laundry but will have to top up minimum of 10 dollars that will entitle you to about 2 to 3 washes. Monica responds fast.
It was a wonderful place to stay in Montreal!
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, em uma região com muitos restaurantes e bares, e com o metrô próximo. Além disso, o apartamento é limpo e confortável, ideal para um casal. Recomendo.

Monica & Edi are great hosts, fast response and good communication. Very clean and quiet place in a lively part of the city.  Easy checkin and checkout procedures. It would be great if extra bedding is provided ahead of time but I should ask in advance too. Other than that it was a lovely stay.  Recommended.
Everything's as promised, and more! Amazing view of downtown!! Can't go wrong here!
Booked this room at the very last minute and everything was so simple, clean in a great location. Don't expect a classy looking room, but it's perfect if you just want to sleep.

Great location, close to public transit. There is a wide variety of excellent food options right around the apartment , as well as a pharmacy and quick shops for other needs. Monica and Edi were thoughtful and extremely conscientious hosts who responded very quickly to any question or concern we might have.
Monica and Edi are great host! Would definitely recommend staying with them. Also they do put two Ferrero Rocher on your towels! Monica responds very fast and is very accommendating.

Location and communication were superb!!!! They were super accommodating, prompt and kind. Apartment was a bit dirty, and kitchen not very useable ie. no paper towels, limited pots, utensils etc. Pillows were old. Laundry facilities were nice to have but the card will cost you $10 then you load it afterwards. Overall an affordable play to stay with great hosts just a bit dirty, outdated and basic.

Monica's place is small but perfect with everything you need (kitchen, fridge, AC, bed, & sofa). The location is great! It is secure, right in downtown close to the metro, cafes, Tim Hortons etc. Museums are walking distance as well as bars. It also includes a great view of the city. Monica was very accommodating & always quick to respond if we had any questions or issues. Had a great time in Montreal! Merci!!

The place was abit smaller than expected but none the less a great place! Especially enjoyed the view and the pool. Its also in a great location if you travel by metro and couldnt ask for better communication!

This apartment was great for my friends and I having a weekend in the city. It's a good location within walking distance of plenty of restaurants, cafes, and things  to do during the day. The apartment was small as expected, but we weren't in it much so it served its purpose. We paid to park in the garage which was very tight; it has a 6ft clearance and it was more than tricky to drive through. The apartment smelled like cigarettes when we first arrived and the bathroom smelled like spilled milk which was disquieting to say the least. After turning on the AC unit the cigarette smell eventually went away, but the bathroom couldn't be aired out very much.
Overall a decent stay for the price.
Very accommodating for last-minute stay

Great small apartment for sleeping close to restaurants and the city center. They have several apartments in the same building so the one in the listing may not be the same one you get; although they’re pretty similar.
