Great location! Close to shops, restaurants and cafes. Easy to walk around. Apartment had two closets for storage. Parking lot can be very narrow at turns and in spaces, you have to be careful getting in and out. The hosts were very easy to reach and always responded quickly!
Great, well located. Bed might be a bit tight for 2, but otherwise fine.

The best thing about this place is the location. Close to the museums, downtown, shopping, and not far from Atwater Market. Very clean and great value for someone who needs a place to crash while visiting Montreal.

Tiene una excelente ubicación hacia todo lo que debes conocer en Montreal. La calidad del alojamiento es muy buena y Edi está siempre atento a lo que puedas necesitar. Sin duda lo utilizaré cuando vuelva a esa bella ciudad. 
Gracias Edi!
Great location, clean, good response time, easy check in and out. Excellent place to stay.
Fiquei encantada com a hospedagem de Jessica. Apartamento aconchegante e estiloso. Limpo, organizado e acessível. Recomendo.

name: COMFORTABLE AND IN THE CENTER.
summary: It is a popular neighborhood in the center of Barcelona, just a few minutes away from all the tourist attractions of Barcelona, the beach, museums, Rambla Catalunya, bars, the Olympic Port and others. The room only has a inside little Window but its brighly and fresh confortable room
description: It is a popular neighborhood in the center of Barcelona, just a few minutes away from all the tourist attractions of Barcelona, the beach, museums, Rambla Catalunya, bars, the Olympic Port and others. The room only has a inside little Window but its brighly and fresh confortable room It is a popular neighborhood in the center of Barcelona, just a few minutes away from all the tourist attractions of Barcelona, the beach, museums, Rambla Catalunya, bars, the Olympic Port and others. The room only has a inside little Window but its a brighly fresh confortable room
neighborhood_overview: It is a popular neighborhood in the center of Barcelona, just a few minutes away from all the tourist attractions of Barcelona, the beach, museums, Rambla Catalunya, bars, the Olympic Port and others. The room only has a inside little Window but its a brighly fresh confortable room

reviews.comments: Juan took time to explain everything and was very pleasant. It's a very good location in the centre, just a few minutes walk from the metro and there are lots of nice tapas restaurants on the same street.
The room was super clean but without window. Location is very close to La Rambla which is central street.  Near metro and also this m.neighborhood has a lot of bars

Un cuarto pequeño pero amigable, ideal para estancias cortas (yo me quede solo una noche).

Situado sobre una calle repleta de bares donde tomar cerveza y pinchos, asique gran ubicación sin dudas (cerca del puerto y conexion casi directa al aeropuerto con el aerobus).

Juan was an awesome host. While being helpful wasn't intruding at all, so I did feel very comfortable. Room is perfect for single occupant ash short stay. A little downside is that there's no window in the room, so you don't know whether is a day or night time. Apart of that, everything is perfect, location is great, I could walk to the most places.  Would recommend !

Juan est une personne accueillante.
Appartement tres propre,
The place was bright and clean. Juan Pablo is the perfect host and was very helpful. He waited until quite late to welcome me but was cheerful and friendly. I would certainly stay there again.
Квартира уютная, светлая, чистая! Хуан очень отзывчивый и приветливый) дом рядом с метро, расположение очень хорошее! Все довольно близко!

A lovely host with a lovely home. Clean, tidy and really nicely situated. 
I felt comfortable and safe in Juan's home. Thank you for having me for the night!
I stayed one night within Juan Pablo's flat and I recommend it. the flat is heel located in a dynamic street with many bars. Juan Pablo was very nice. good quality price ratio

Juan's place is very clean. The place is central, 20-30 minutes walking to famous sites like rambles street, Passage de Gracia etc. If you don't want walk, the subway is just 2 minutes walking.:-) 

Juan is around a lot to offer advises and helps. And it is a lively street, lined up with restaurants on the street downstairs....that being said if you can sleep with noise, you will like the convenience here.

The room doesn't have a window, so no natural light, but if you just want to come back for sleep after a day's hard walking on streets, it will do for you perfectly.
Pablo was a nice guy! Everything was good, but the room was very small.
Very clean flat. Very nice host!
Buenísimo
Very clean and close to public transportation.
Very nice place and wonderful host
Juan is a super-friendly host and he keeps the apartment very clean. Adding the fact that the apartment is warm and is very well situated and you have your perfect option for the stay in Barcelona.
Pablo is a friendly person, room was as described, clean, comfortable, no problems. Godd location, close to the metro station.

Primero pablo es muy majo y amable. Puede hablar ingles y español. Por eso no tengo problema para comunicar. 
Su habitacion es muy limpio. Y cerca de su habitacion hay muchos barres o restaurantes! Estupendo! 
Todo es perfecto! 
방도 깨끗하고 주인분도 친절하시구 영어도 가능하시니 대화하는데 문제없으실 것같습니다! 주변에 맛있는 타파집도 많고, 주변에 지하철역도 있어서 괜찮은거 같아요!!

Everything was exactly like in the description, Juan was very helpful and communicative. The apartment was very clean and well situated in the center of Barcelona, with groceries etc. just round the corner. 
Great price for this standard.
In the evening it was quite noisy because of the bars outside in the street but if you plan to stay out until midnight it won't be a problem at all, after it was calm and quiet.

Au top !
L'appart est central (à 15min à pied de l'hypercentre), dans un quartier sympathique pas trop touristique.
Juan est aux très avenant sans être envahissant et la petite chambre est comfortable.

Communication with the host is very important to me, We arrived early  around 10am since it was earlier than the check in time he let us leave our bags there, very nice. Juan Pablos's place is not too far from the airport about 20 to 30 minutes by bus(46) he was very friendly and made me feel like home, the bed was extremely comfortable. His place was better than what I expected, I'm looking forward for the next trip to magic Barcelona overall great place I highly recommended.

Juan Pablo's place is great! Great value. Place was clean, neat and cozy. He is in the Blai neighborhood which is great and has many places for pinchos. He is a really nice guy and was very accommodating for my check in/out. Would recommend to others.
Juan Pablo is a great host and the place was amazing! I only can recommend to stay there! Hope to be there again sometime.
Juan Pablo es un tío super atento. La casa muy limpia, las sábanas planchadas, todo bien.
The location is perfect! You have a direct connection to from the iaport to the flat!
Great location, excellent VFM and a welcoming host!
Great place to stay!
Juan Pablo muy simpático y atento. Para un día genial. La habitación es muy pequeña y sin ventana. Pero todo muy limpio y cuidado. La próxima a la habitación con balcón. Gracias Juan Pablo

Квартира расположена в отличном районе, удобно добираться от / до аэропорта и в пешей доступности метро, достопримечательности и шопинг-центры! 
Квартира очень чистая и тихая! Хуан очень гостеприимен, открыт и приятен в общении!
Perfect place for a weekend trip. The room was clean and cozy, and Juan was great. Very helpful, patient, and welcoming. Absolutely recommend!
Très propre et très bien situé.
Owner was very kindly friendly and nice, the room nice and clean, the position is very close to centre, Metro Bus, Shopping center and restaurant.

Excellent place for a few days holiday in Barcelona! Juan Pablo is a great host - very flexible and responsive. The apartment is very clean and the bed is comfortable. The location if perfect, there are a lot of places walking distance and metro station just around the corner. :)

Juan Pablo has a great personality and is helpful with siggestions. The apartment is very clean. Besides the bedroom itself, you have access to 2 bathroom, a well-equipped kitchen, and a small patio. It is located super close to public transport - both metro (Poble Sec stop) and bus (46 takes you straight to/from the airport). I would highly recommend Juan Pablo's place to a friend.
Exactly what we wanted! Juan was very helpful and communicative. Juan, gracias por todo!

Bel appartement avec patio près du parc Montjuïc. Juan Pablo est très accueillant et garde le lieu très propre. La petite chambre n'a pas de fenêtre mais les 2 autres plus grandes ont un balcon. L'endroit peut être un peu bruyant le weekend dû aux restaurants mais comme partout à Barcelone. Je recommande!

Host was nice and place was clean. The neighborhood is interesting (lots of restaurants and monjuic park) to visit but loud at night. The room has no windows so it's not too loud. It also has a lock only from the outside but not from the inside.  Be careful of the balcony, you can get locked out. Check-in was great. I was early and I got to sit in the living room until the room was ready.

Juan is such a nice host! My late flight delayed and he was so patient and responsive while waiting for my check-in. I appreciate his kindness. The room is sufficient and clean, and the bathroom is clean and organized as well. The location is in a great neighborhood with lotta nice tapas places to try. Convenient to buy grocery. For sure recommend travelers to stay here!
Very close to the metro line 3 .

Poble sec역 인근에 위치한 Juan의 집은 생활하기에 무척 편했습니다. 제가 담배를 많이 즐기는 관계로 바깥 테라스에서 담배를 자주 피웠구요. 손수 커피를 타주기도 합니다. 집주인 Juan은 제가 Lamblas 인근 지역에 새 집을 구하는 것도 많이 도와주었구요. Zara Home에서 새 집에 필요한 많은 물품들을 직접 저랑 같이 가서 골라줄만큼 상당히 친절했습니다. 그리고 고딕지역에 위치한 저의 새 집까지 짐을 옮겨주기도 했구요. 제 생각엔 이런 사람은 세상에도 없을 듯 합니다. 그래서 Juan이랑 저는 친구하기로 했답니다. 바르셀로나에 유학온지 며칠 안되어서 벌써 자리를 잡아가는 듯 합니다. 혹시라도 바르셀로나에 여행오시는 한국분들이 계신다면 Juan의 집을 추천하고자 합니다. ^^ 앞으로도 바르셀로나에서 생활하면서 제 친구 Juan의 많은 도움이 기대되기도 하구요. 
그럼 바르셀로나에 오시는 모든 한국분들 좋은 시간되세요.^^

Pablo kept the place very clean and quiet for me and the other guests (I think there's 2 other rooms). The location was great. I stayed a week. I was stressed traveling solo in a big city but once I figured out the door and how to navigate the city, I was good. It's a couple minute walk to the Metro bus which for 5 Euros takes you to the airport (a 40 minute ride). The neighborhood, Poble Sec, is safe, has some bars and restaurants to hang out at and is great for a tourist. The Poble Sec metro is at the end of the street, the Parallel metro is a five minute walk, the D20 bus that takes you to beach is right there. At the most, everything is a 20 minute walk or a Metro bus or train ride and transportation is 24/7 here. Ideal for a tourist.
Perfect location next to all the fun pintxos restaurants, very clean and the AC was lovely in warm Barcelona! I totally recommend.
Clean room with comfy bed, close enough to the action without being too close to the city - so you could have the best of you worlds.

Great place! Easy to take urban and bus
Comfortable!
Juan Pablo非常热情  因为我迷路了没有按照约定时间到达 他也一直在等我  周围交通很方便

Juan Pablo est une personne très gentil est très serviable, la chambre est propre mais malheureuses elle ne répond pas au norme de première nécessité
de confort, surtout pour des séjour de plus qu'une semaine : espace, armoire,  lumière et aération.

No recomiendo este alojamiento. Fue un fraude. Está presentado en el anuncio como una habitación en una vivienda privada y en realidad es una PENSIÓN. Dice que hay que compartir sólo la ducha porque hay dos baños y en realidad hay que compartir los dos baños con todos inquilinos.  A la entrada del edificio, el olor demuestra que hay problema en las cloacas. Toda la edificación es antigua y está reparada a las apuradas, con elementos muy económicos y muy elementales.
Excelente anfitrión, muy buena persona y es muy atento, la habitación tiene todo lo necesario y la ubicación es perfecta ya que tiene una estación de metro muy cerca, 100% recomendado

Staying in Juan Pablo's appartement was great. The room is located in a very good area of Barcelona and it is also very close to the city center. The whole appartement was very clean and it has an air condition, which can be very useful in Barcelona in the summer. 
For me it was a perfect choice, as I was outside most of the time and used the room mainly for sleeping. 

What you should keep in mind, when you are booking is, that the room has no window. So if you spend much time there, it is maybe not the best choice. But who wouldn't want to spend most of the time outside in a city like Barcelona... :)

Thank you for everything Juan Pablo!
Juan Pablo was great. He's apartment was very clean all the time. Highly recommend this place.
Central, calm, hood value for money, good communicatin. Highly recommended!

Juan Pablo is a very nice guy and was ready for me when I arrived. Blai Street, where the apartment is located, is awesome and has lots of great pintxos. It was the most local-feeling rambla I came across. You can walk up the hill nearby for a great view of the city and the barrio Gothic is very close. The walk from the bus from the airport to the apartment was about 10-15 minutes. The lock on my bedroom door was broken when I arrived, which Juan Pablo fixed that night. It broke again the following day. Wasn't a big deal and I wasn't even expecting a lock on my room, buy fyi.

Juan is very kind, and made me feel quite comfortable. The area is very busy, full of bars, good for who is looking for that kind of vibe. The room I stayed was very little and has no windows, but was really clean. The property has a central air conditioning, and fans in the private rooms. The apartment is quite close to the metro station too.

The apartment is located in a very lively area, the street is full of restaurants where you can get tapas, and especially the atmosphere at night is lovely! The single room does not have a window but I personally could stand it since it wasn't too hot. The toilet is shared but everyone had different schedules so it wasn't much a problem either. However the insulation of the room is not great and I had a bad cough those days and very likely the people next door did not sleep well! Btw, Juan is a very nice and friendly host.
Very good service... Recomendes

Very small room with a bed, a small wardrobe with drawers only (there is a fan, but no windows). The room is very clean, as well as the apartment. Juan Pablo is a very nice host. Sometimes there is too noisy, depending on the other guests of the apartment. Great position, very nice the street full of pubs, and 1 minute to the Metro. Suggested for having fun and for saving money.

Super Lage! Sehr sauber! 
Juan Pablo ein sehr sympathischer netter und umgänglicher Kerl!
Juan Pablo was a great host and everything was like in the picture. He was kind enough to let me leave my bags for a bit after my check in. 5 stars!!
Easy to get to from the airport, walk out the door to shops and food. I would recommend Juan Pablo's!

Everything was fine, Juan takes a good care of his apartment and his guests
The apartment was always clean the only thing that annoyed me was the internet, it's really slow
The place is in a great location. Room was clean. Juan Pablo was very welcoming. Be aware that there are many bedrooms in the flat and the wifi is very slow.

Staying with Juan was an absolute pleasure his home was immaculate, the service he provided was second to none outside the front door is a closed street with many restaurants and several small grocery stores the location was fantastic close walking to the sea shore or walking to the center of town I highly recommend staying with Juan!
Good host!!!
Everything was perfect!, Host, Location, Home, Price...

Juan Pablo is a very kind person and tries everytime that you feel you good in his place. It's very clean.
The room is nice and comfortable  for only few days in which you are most time outside. For longer stays like mine would be better to choose a room with window.

Great location and great host! As I arrived Juan kindly offered me dinner that he had made and allowed me to settle into the place. He assured that if I needed anything or had any questions that all I needed to do was ask. His place was very clean and cozy. It’s located right off of a street that is pretty centrally located and lined with grocery shops and restaurants as well. The bus straight to the airport is only a 10 minute walk from his place and it only costs €2,50. Overall I highly recommend this Airbnb!

Naprawdę polecam.
Bardzo miły gospodarz, gościnny, komunikatywny, blisko centrum, i blisko komunikacji. Naprawdę polecam, ulica na uboczu.

Juan was great! 
Very helpful and accommodating. 
Super clean and comfortable. 
I had a great stay at his place.
Juan is very nice host. His apartment is very clean and well situated.

Traveling alone can be scary, but I felt completely safe staying in Juan Pablo's home and neighborhood. Juan was very kind and welcoming. He offered me some food the day I arrived, and when it was raining he gave me an umbrella that I was able to use. He was very direct with the house rules and always communicating with me if anything occurred. The house was kept cleaned at all times. The room was just as cozy as I expected. The location was wonderful since it was close to the metro, shops, and restaurants. I had a wonderful one week stay here and I highly recommend it to anyone else. I couldn't have asked for a better experience!

great!
juan pablo was welcoming with a warm smile, clean place and super responsive and friendly service! thank you so much!
Great host and the apartment was in a perfect location. I highly recommend.

Juan Pablo es muy amable y atento, su apartamento esta muy limpio, la habitacion es comoda y el edificio esta ubicado en un area muy centrica de todo, muchos restaurantes y lugares de interes. Si regreso a Barcelona vuelvo a hospedarme con Juan Pablo. lo recomiendo 100%
Everthing was quite ok. Well situated and fast to the metro - right at the bottom of Montjuc Park.
Was a nice place. All was clean and juan was very kind. Near to good tapas bars, nightlife, metro etc. recommend juan and his place
Great location. Appartement was squeeky clean. Juan Pablo was a great host. Would definitely recommend!
Juan Pablo ha sido muy atento y amable. También le gusta dar conversación. Muy recomendable si quieres descansar tranquilamente.

Juan was a lovely host, always there when you need him. The room was so nice and clean - only thing to mention about the apartment it’s still on the process of doing some work done so I got woken up by the workers hammering. Other than that I’ve had good stay.

Staying with Juan Pablo was great! The room is small, but very nice and his flat is in a great location! It is close to the metro station which is nice. Juan Pablo was a great host and his cooking was amazing. I would definitely recommend staying at his place.
Pablo was really friendly. The room is small and without a window but that's exactly what was advertised so was perfect for my stay. Thank you.

Juan Pablo is one of the most amazing hosts I’ve ever met. He is friendly, cheerful, really flexible (I arrived before check in and left before check out and he had no problem with it), he even surprised me with breakfast.
His apartman is sparking clean, I’ve never seen a man clean so much :D
It is a really good location, if you don’t mind walking a bit then many things are within walking distance, lots of shops and restaurants. Metro and buses just a few minutes away.
Travelling solo, I couldn’t have chosen any better place.
Great guy, nice stay. Very clean:)

My stay with Juan Pablo was great. The communication before and during my stay was super fast in responding and easy. The apartment is easily accessible with Metro station Poble Sec. The location of the apartment is quite good, it took me 15 minutes by walking to the city center. Everything was very clean and well organized. I was totally satisfied with my stay at Juan Pablo's apartment. All in all I can totally recommend the place. I would do Airbnb with Juan Pablo again. Gracias Juan Pablo!
Great place in a nice location. Juan Pablo is a great host.

Great location with some fantastic cafes and bars. Juan was a great host, really friendly and incredibly clean. I would definitely recommend. 
Thank you Juan Pablo. :)

Juan Pablo is an amazing host! He is super attentive, friendly and easygoing. He made my stay positive and comfortable. The room is as described and shown on the pictures. It was clean just like the whole apartment. Juan really knows how to keep his place clean :) 
I am lucky to have had such a nice host! 
The apartment is situated next to the metro station and close to Plaza de España which is really convenient. 
I definitely recommend this place. 

A propósito, Juan muchísimas gracias por ser paciente explicándome cómo encontrar la entrada :) Y por la música buenísima ;) La próxima vez en Barcelona me quedaré sólo en tu casa :) ¡Muchas gracias!

Juan Pablo’s place was very clean and comfortable! It was perfectly located and walking distance to all the landmarks in the city! He made sure I was comfortable the whole time! Definitely recommended! :)
Everything was perfect! Juan Pablo is really kind and helpful! True value for money bnb! Hope to come back soon!
You can experence a cozy and clean little room for overnights.
Juan is a very nice person. The area is good. There are a lot of bars, but the sea is far.
It was a really nice staying. Very well located place near by the metro and the city center. Juan is a great host and very kind and gentle. Everything was in perfect conditions.
Very good and responsive host
Juan's place is a good stay, if you are looking for a clean and simple place in the center of town. I can recommend him as a good host.
je recommend ce logement a tous les voyageurs

Great place if you're looking for something super basic. It's close to a bus stop that takes you directly to the beach and about a 20 minute walk to the touristy areas. I also like many of the food options available. I guess the only downfall was not having a window, but it's totally worth it if you're out and about most of the time. JP was super responsive and lent me an extra towel when mine got soaked in a thunderstorm.

Pablo has an amazing place in a real central location. The apartment is just off the main road and I thought I had would experience issues with noise but once in the apartment everything is peaceful and quiet and I had a great sleep on both nights. 

The main road is littered with restaurants, shops, bars and everything in between. One direction takes you to the beach front and the other deeper into the city centre.

I will definitely return to this apartment in the near future, Pablo was great!
muy recomendado!!
Place has a great location, close to the metro and lots of shops close by.
Great guest and great location.

Pablo is a really nice guy with a big heart! He is very welcoming and you feel welcome as soon as you step into his apartment.
Pablo puts great effort into making sure that you feel welcome, that everything is clean and tidy and that the isn't too much noise.
The area can seem a bit shady at times, but the apartment is close to a big street and easy to get to from most of the rest of the city with no trouble.
Great place, in walking distance to the most important sites and really easy to get to from the airport (one stop and ten minutes walk from the airport bus). It also seems like the public transportation is good in the area, but I didn't use it so I don't know too much about that.
excellent location, great amenities, super friendly host ... thanks for having me. Would definitely stay here again the next time I come to Barcelona.
Muy recomendable! host super buena onda y amable la ubicacion es perfecta ! la habitacion muy limpia con lo necesario .

Am strongly recommend JP place to stay on your visit of the beautiful city of Barcelona: its very safe, JP is extremely helpful host, location is great with the proximity to the most Highlights of Barcelona.
I will stay again

I recommend this apartments. The main reason is place, it's in the centre of a city. It's easy to find this place and walk around the city. There're a bus stop and a metro station near this place. The host is very hospitable.

I stayed a week in the single room at Juan's and loved it. The bed was the most comfortable ever !! Juan is very nice and always available if needed. He does everything to keep the house clean and helps you with whatever you need.
Also the location is perfect. You stay in a real local neigbourhood in a beautiful old building. Just outside there is one restaurant next to each other where you can sit outside.
Also there are many local cafes everywhere with cheap breakfast deals.
To the Ramblas you walk maybe 15-20 minutes and Placa España is 15 min walk- from there you can catch the airport bus.
I highly recommend Juan's place and would lovectobstay there again on my next visit.
Great place to stay! Very friendly service.
Todo excelente, Juan Pablo es una gran persona y el piso esta muy bien. ¡100% recomendado!

Juan Pablo's place was clean and well looked after, and it added to my lovely experience in Barcelona. Juan Pablo was very kind and more than willing to offer help with exploring the city and finding great local spots. 10/10 would recommend!

His response was great. Guided nicely to arrive at his place. The place was very neat and clean. Juan is very responsive and co-operative. Liked his attitude about positive thinking of his guests. The place was very close to central station and placa Espanya. Was really a good stay
El piso es exactamente como anunciado y es extramente limpio. Juan ha sido un anfitrón excelente.
The room is clean and located central. That is positive. Negative aspect is that you have to be very quiet, and the room has no window and because of that no fresh air.

My stay with Juan Pablo was very good! He was flexible with me coming in and out at early/late hours. At one point there was a lock change at the fron entrance of his building and, within the hour, Juan had already went and cut new keys for his guests. The only thing I’d mention to future guests is to prepare not to make any excessive noise. In Juan’s building, you need to be extremely quiet to not bother the neighbors or any other guests. I would stay with Juan Pablo again.
The room is a bit small but super clean. Not only the room also bathroom. The Metro station just right in the corner. Restaurant, super market are just nearby. Had a really nice stay at Juan's place.

JP is a great communicator is and his apartment is located on one of the absolute best streets in Barcelona. The room is pretty basic and as you would expect but you should not be doing anything except sleeping there. The shower and bathroom are very nice and clean. I had a great time in Barcelona and JP’s location had much to do with it. Thanks again! Can’t wait to return.
I loved staying at Juan’s place! He was rly friendly and made my trip to Barcelona even better. The location was great! My first time at Juan but sure not the last one!

name: Country Oasis Pa'ala Kai
summary: The property is quintessential North Shore country living, gated property with quiet sunsets and quiet mornings. Little to no street light pollution makes the night sky stand out. Trade winds cool the property and close proximity to the beach and Haleiwa town, make this an Ideal getaway with convince close at hand. The property has 7 mango trees, 6 large coconut palms, a large banana patch, small citrus orchard, small (but deep) tilapia pond and a small farm animal pen. 30 Day lease option.
space: The gated property is 1.5 acres. New, clean and modern, excellent views and cross breezes and fans make the space very comfortable in both the winter and summer months.
description: The property is quintessential North Shore country living, gated property with quiet sunsets and quiet mornings. Little to no street light pollution makes the night sky stand out. Trade winds cool the property and close proximity to the beach and Haleiwa town, make this an Ideal getaway with convince close at hand. The property has 7 mango trees, 6 large coconut palms, a large banana patch, small citrus orchard, small (but deep) tilapia pond and a small farm animal pen. 30 Day lease option. The gated property is 1.5 acres. New, clean and modern, excellent views and cross breezes and fans make the space very comfortable in both the winter and summer months. Guests will be given two gate clickers to access the property Guests sharing our property are welcome to solicit advise on outdoor activities and the local restaurant scene. Our two large friendly dogs love adults and will greet you when you arrive and depart, feel free to pet and play but please don't feed, they're a bit spoiled. Ol
neighborhood_overview: Older small farm neighborhood: several small farms on the mountain side of the street with small planed family communities on the right of the street. There may be friends and family of the owners on the property as well but it is very private, quiet and safe.
notes: Onsite laundry Gas Appliances Solar hot water Wifi (host not not responsible for connectivity issues)
transit: Bus stop within walking distance, healthy & active walking distance to Haleiwa. Quick access to local beaches.
access: Guests will be given two gate clickers to access the property
interaction: Guests sharing our property are welcome to solicit advise on outdoor activities and the local restaurant scene. Our two large friendly dogs love adults and will greet you when you arrive and depart, feel free to pet and play but please don't feed, they're a bit spoiled.
house_rules: - Respect everyone's personal space. Absolutely no parties, only people who are listed in the reservation are allowed on the property…No exceptions! Only two cars allowed on the property at any time, there is an additional charge of $50 per day for the second car if there are only two people on the booking. No Smoking of any kind on any part of the property (inside included). 6 people maximum occupancy, 2 people is the base rate, each additional is $50 per night. Absolutely no pets are allowed, our Dogs love people but not other pets.

host.host_about: Active in the local community, Quiet / Clean. Both very active in outdoor hawaii sports: Kite Surfing, Surfing, MTB riding, Spear Fishing & Hunting.

reviews.comments:
Jeremy and his wife we're incredibly caring hosts, they gave us our space in their beautifully converted apartment that Jeremy himself built. It was of the most aesthetically pleasing apartments I've seen on the North Shore. 

We came to work and had a little trouble with the WIFI so Jeremy kindly installed a router for us.

He brought 2 huge branches of Bannanas which kept us going for days, along with Coconuts which all grow on the property. 

If you're a couple coming to Hawaii or just after a very quiet environment this would be a great place for you.

We loved our stay here. Our hosts were excellent and their dogs were so friendly. the accommodations could not have been better. We had a beautiful space and a beautiful view. The location was perfect for North Shore beaches and adventures and was a quick drive to Honolulu. We would highly recommend this stay and look forward to staying here again.
Very nice house, perfectly set up for two sets of people.   Each Bathroom adjoined with cooresponding Bedroom. 5 minutes from Haleiwa, decent view of Mt. Ka'ala.  WiFi could be better.

Owners are very attentive to questions and needs. Great place, very quiet and secure at night. Excellent location in the north shore, 5 min drive time to Haleiwa,  20 min. walking, there are great restaurants, coffee shops, art galleries, supermarket  and plenty of fun surfing shops.

The host was very responsive and communications with them was good. They responded promptly and addressed all queries quickly. 

The place was great! It was clean and orderly, everything we needed was there. The beds were comfy, the bathroom was clean and spacious, and the expansive garden and great view was relaxing. 

You'll need a car though to get around, since it's the countryside and establishments are a bit far in between. 

Altogether, I would highly recommend this place for a relaxing stay.

Jeremy was a great host and met me when I arrived. I loved how quiet and well appointed their place was. Although there are two other units, I rarely saw the other tenants. Dogs are friendly and nothing to be afraid of. The internet connection is sporadic and does require you to reset the router periodically. This is only issue if you plan to work remotely and have AT&T. The cell connection for AT&T is very weak in that area. The home was perfect however. I thought that having no A/C would be an issue, but the home stayed cool during my whole stay. I enjoyed my stay there and if given a chance I would return in a heartbeat.
Spacious, very new and clean, great comfortable beds, huge bathrooms and kitchen, fast WIFI, pretty view, sweet family dogs.

A very clear and modern house. Clearly new and well thought out for  comfort. The neighborhood is quiet and genuine.  The host lives on the property with his family and is very discreet.  When we came in, we had many things missing from the kitchen, once we told him he provided them within two hours. 
The kids enjoyed feeding the black pigs (in a well kept and clean enclosure in a corner of the property).
It was one of the best accomodations that we had in Hawaii. Jeremey and his dogs were so friendly and nice. I would love to visit back one day :)

Stay couldn't have been any better.  The accommodations were clean, comfortable, and modern.  The property itself was picturesque and quiet.  Hosts were very friendly and responsive to any questions or requests during our stay.  You should definitely check this place out if you're looking for a place near Haleiwa

Beautiful quaint countryside getaway. Perfect for couples, families, and friends. Jeremy was polite and easy to contact. His 2 dogs are very welcoming, friendly, and well behaved. You'll fall in love with them. Really enjoyed breakfast outside on the balcony with a great scenic view of the mountain, its a perfect way to start your day. There is also a tasty bakery walking distance from the property with great pastries. Nice area that's less than 5mins from the heart of Haleiwa Town and it's beautiful beaches and shops. A lot of hikes nearby as well. I'd recommend staying here.
If you want to stay north shore you cannot go wrong staying here!!! Great location and great house! I will be back!!!
Loved the tropical sounds. Very relaxing place. Perfect for couples. Very clean and spacious. Will be back!
Peaceful and quiet on the North Shore, this was an excellent place for my family to soak up the many beaches in the area!
If you are looking for a peaceful spot to escape the madness of life. This is it. I will definitely come back again.

Excellent accommodation! We absolutely loved our stay. The location is fantastic, only a short 5 minute drive in to Haleiwa (the coolest town on Oahu) and an easy 50 minute drive to Honolulu/Waikiki. Super clean, super fast wifi, easy check in/out, very secure location (behind locked gate), peaceful and excellent communication from the host. The house had everything we needed. If you are looking to get out of the hustle and bustle of Waikiki, then this is the ultimate North Shore location, we would definitely stay again.

What we really liked was a good equipped kitchen, washer didn't work and laundry room was locked. But then we didn't need to do laundry. There is a bakery and convenience store (3rd world style - don't shop here) close by. Better to shop in bigger supermarkets prior. The roosters and birds woke us up early in the morning, communicating with each other, but then it is in the country side. The house and living situation is great, especially with a secure gate and dogs watching.
Very relaxing country home.  The host was friendly, very responsive via text/phone, and the house was even nicer than the pictures!
Home was as advertised and we enjoyed our stay.
Sehr sauberes Appartment. Wunderschöne grosse Zimmer mit toller Ausstattung. Wir hatten einen super schönen Aufenthalt

This place is in an absolutely PERFECT location! I don't want to tell everyone about it because I'd like to keep it a secret for myself! 

This home is so charming, exactly as advertised and the host and his wife are extraordinary folks. 

The homes boasts beautiful views, location to the nearest town is convenient, and I found this to be total relaxation. 

Home is perfect for families, romantic getaways, honeymoons, or just the old fashion vacation! 

The only con, and slightly funny to me is there are resident chickens/roosters near the property. Because most of the homes are not a/c in Hawaii, the windows, doors are left open and the rooster awake very early. 

Enjoy this paradise, we sure did. We can't wait to come back!

This is a fantastic place! It's three beautiful bedrooms that can easily take a large group of people. It's 5 minutes from Haleiwa, 10 minutes from cool places like Dole Plantation, coffee farms, macadamia farms. Near all the north shore beaches. 

The place is fully self-service so it was really great for us since we came pretty late. It's quiet with a view of the mountains on the patio. Highly recommend!

Beautiful views with fruit trees and nature all around. Roosters wake you up at 3:30 am so be prepared! Some ants and bugs inside, mosquitos outside at night. There is a couch and bar stools but no tables or chairs. Bring your own toothpaste, shampoo, toiletries. Unplug and replug the router if wifi does not work. Dogs are friendly and protect the property. Jeremy is nice and very responsive. Quick drive to Haleiwa, get Konos for breakfast!
Great view and location.  Close to everything on the north shore. Only about a 10 minute drive to the beach. Will be staying here again!

This was my first time using Airbnb and it was an awesome experience. This house is in the perfect location to enjoy the North Shore and leave the craziness of the city. It has great views, the house is spacious and clean, and the hosts are very friendly. I definitely recommend this place!

Beautiful property and laid out very well... the compound has the ability to house many, however you feel as though you are the only guest. I wanted the North Shore feel and got it here. The unit I was in was the perfect size for my sister and I (and later my boyfriend). I would recommend this property and these hosts highly.
This place is amazing! The hosts are wonderful. The place is so spacious, quiet but close to everything in the north shore. We'll be back for sure.
This was an amazing Hawaiian experience! The owners were outstanding. When I travel back to Hawaii I wouldn't go anywhere else. I will recommend to anyone traveling to Oahu!

The apartment is very high standard and has everything for comfortable holidays. Kitchen is big and has all tools, so cooking your own dinner is easy. The house is a bit too far to walk to restaurants or beaches. The showers work, you just need figure out how, or ask the hosts ;)

We had a fantastic stay! A perfect location for the North Shore beaches, restaurants and shops. And, the drive to Honolulu wasn't terrible the few times we went. 

The space is modern with ceiling fans throughout that made the heat bearable. The wi-fi was super helpful for my daughter taking online summer classes. 

Being in the country, there were tiny ants to contend with (mostly in the bathrooms) but with available bug spray, we didn't mind. 

Jeremy was a great host who is always available when you need him.

A perfect place away from the hustle of tourist friendly Haleiwa. 5minutes drive from town, picturesque and quiet. Perfect. 
The place was very clean, quiet, and the owners, super friendly. We really appreciate the help they gave when our daughter fell ill.
Will hopefully return at some stage and would definitely stay here again. Thank you.

I had a wonderful experience with this rental, it comes exactly as advertised and described.  A couple of things I had to get used to was having no A/C, but that’s just me because I’m spoiled with my a/c running 24/7.  Also some people may not like is the crowing of the rooster at 4 or 5am.  I personally loved it because I grew up in that town and it made me feel at home again.  It may not have the same affect for the City slickers :)  But if you’re looking for a nice country side experience, this place is perfect for you!  Our unit was clean and inviting!  I will certainly rent here again when the time comes for another family reunion in my home town!

Loved it here! Communication was great, the bed was huge and so comfortable. Theres no air-conditioning but the fans make it more comfortable. Its a beautiful light filled space with a massive kitchen with everything you need and could easily accommodate a family. Would definitely stay again

A great place to stay in the quiet country side of the north shore. Haleiwa is very close with plenty of restaurants and activities. Sunsets are amazing on the north shore as is the snorkeling. Our host was there to answer all of our questions and the dogs were very sweet. I would stay here again.
Great value and a fantastic location close to Hale'iwa and North Shore beaches. Would stay here again for sure.

so wish I was able to add photos to this review.
Paradise found at North Shore Country Living.

So many good things to say about this place. It's beautiful, relaxing, spacious, and great amenities. 

Location:
The place was in a residential area, quiet and serene with a gorgeous backyard view of the mountains. Has a great country feel to it, with roosters crowing in the early dawn. The place is gated, which is a huge plus. Parking spots are provided. The location is in North Shore super close to Haleiwa and all the beautiful beaches. I would suggest renting a vehicle to get to all your destinations. 

Host:
The owner/host lives on site which, to me, was super convenient because he was able to answer questions immediately or provide us with things that were missing. He was very accommodating. The dogs are also super friendly. My baby wasn't even afraid of them. 

Place:
Our place was clean and inviting. The only downfall I would say was that there was no AC, but the ceiling fans made up for it. It's all hardwood flooring. Each room had closets. The host even provided us with a foam cooler, beach towels, and a beach umbrella for use. We made our own breakfast daily and ate it on the balcony while staring into the beautiful view. The furniture was comfy. The decoration was modern and matched very well with the furniture. The showers do work but difficult to figure out and once you get it, it's fairly simple. There are fruit trees on site that the host allowed us to pick at freely. The mangoes were delicious! 

All in all, we enjoyed our stay very much and would recommend to everyone.

We loved this place. It was very comfortable and very pretty. We loved the sounds of the birds and the beautiful view from the porch.  Two full baths were very convenient.  The location was private, quiet and off the beaten path. But easy to get there from main roads. Everything was new and very clean. Owner responded quickly to questions. The dogs were good company. We highly recommend this place.
Very roomy & great location! Host was helpful when requested.

We loved this slice of paradise! The studio was much larger than we expected it to be and very private and clean, and the bed was extremely comfortable. Also, while it was close to the quaint town of Haleiwa, we felt like we were in the country, with views of the mountains and marshlands.  Plus the tropical birds sung to us each morning! My husband was concerned that there was no air conditioning, but it was totally unnecessary as their was plenty of ventilation and ceiling fans. (I think I was even a little chilly one night.)  The hosts were super accommodating as well.  Definitely recommend!
Excellent place to stay. Very well equipped, incredibly comfortable bed, super clean and close to north shore happenings. Easy check in. Highly recommend.
Amazing value for the price. 5 out of 5 stars.

Beautiful apartment,  very spacious!  Loved all the closet space!  Close to the beach but without the traffic. It was really fun to eat out on the deck! Nice,  peaceful place, definitely got my money's worth. *Note* Don't leave any food out or you'll have ants (can't help that,  eh? )

This place is wonderful. The area is gorgeous, the kitchen is huge and the beds are very comfortable. It's down the street from a great bakery too!
We hope to stay there again!

Pretty much as advertised.  Alittle bit in the country but also residential.  We enjoyed our stay there.  My boys loved the dogs. Quick drive to town and great beaches and restaurants.  There is also a great bakery within walking distance to get coffee and bakery items.  Also a morning Ham and cheese croissant..can’t miss.
Awesome value. Clean, open rooms. Convenient location. Tranquil setting.
Lovely location, great quiet space - inside and out. Easy access to restaurants and shops. Enjoyed our stay!

Nice relaxing place, although since it is secluded, you will see bugs, ants, geckos & even cockroaches. Keep it clean, don’t leave food outside & wash the dishes. If you want a full on experience living like a local, I recommend this place for you. It’s very peaceful and quiet but close to nice beaches and places to eat.
This place was amazing! Super close to all the North Shore beaches. The place was spacious and clean. Shower had great pressure and hot water. Super comfy bed and great views of the mountains.
Location is amazing and the host is easy to work with. Highly recommended.

The pictures don’t do this place justice! The second my wife and I walked in the room - we felt at home! It’s a few mins out of town (which was idea for us) - so a car is recommended,  it chances are if you made it up to the north shore - you probably have a car anyhow. The instructions were clear, the accomodation was spotless and modern. Couldn’t recommend North Shore Country Living highly enough!
Great home for the week. It was close to pretty much anything you would want to do but was in a location that you could come home and relax at as well!

Our stay at North Shore Country was very relaxing.  Upon arrival we were greeting by the dog, Adira, who stayed by us for most of our stay.  The accommodations were roomy, clean, leaning toward the sparse side.   Be forewarned that roosters are nearby and take their 5am wake up call very seriously.   We did need to drive to everywhere because North Shore Country is about 5 minutes from town.  Walking can be done, but it was on a very busy road. The view from the deck was beautiful and I’ll miss having my morning coffee there.  I didn’t have any contact with the owner which I would have liked to have.

Their places are very beautiful.  I wasn’t expecting to have to keep all food in refrigerator because of ants.  Didn’t find the host very friendly even after we got there.  I think we ran into them one evening leaving.  My daughter ask if they were the owners and he joked sometime she lets me stay but she didn’t say a word.  When I opened a couple drawers in kitchen I found roaches.   I’m sure it’s hard but to many ants.

The house was so much better in person than the photos , we were 2 couples and having the private bedroom with ensuite was just perfect .. the house was sparkling clean , strong wifi , to die for sunset and landscape .. if you’re looking for a peaceful getaway during your Hawaiian trip , stay here !
Perfect place if you are planning to explore Northshore. Very country living style. I wish we have more time to stay. We definitely recommend this place!
The rooms are nice with a large common area.  2nd time staying with them, both times were just what we needed.Inexpensive is always nice.

Spacious unit with a gorgeous view, and down the street from Paalaa Kai Bakery... bless. I was a little worried because my traveling companions are used to having A/C, but the fans keep the space plenty cool and comfortable. Previous reviewers mentioned insects and chickens - we didn't see a single mosquito or roach, and the ants really aren't a problem if you don't leave food out. Light sleepers might want to be prepared for the chorus of chickens in the AM - but then you just have more time to enjoy the North Shore!

Great place in the North Shore located near many restaurants and at least 2 grocery stores.  There were a few insects but nothing overwhelming for us. Check in was a breeze and the place was spotless. The host also has beach towels and umbrellas for guest use located in the apartment. All in all a great quiet stay and I recommend this place.
Such a great home to stay in on the North shore beautiful property and home away home. Everything was clean and tidy when we arrived

A lovely property that is far enough away from the bustle of gorgeous Haleiwa to feel like you're on your own private farm while only being a few minutes drive in to everything you need. You'll need a car to take advantage of the close driving proximity to great beaches and food trucks. We enjoyed stargazing from the backyard, and the well equipped apartment with everything you need. The doggies are friendly without being needy, we enjoyed their chilled out company when they visited.

I couldn’t recommend this place enough. After a nightmarish first night at a place in Waikiki we booked our stay last minute and were so incredibly happy that this place was available. It sits on a huge properly, overlooks a big grassy field and is serene and peaceful. Just 15 minutes from the 7 mile miracle it’s the perfect place to stay if you like to surf, it’s kitted out with all the amentitines you could want, has large living spaces,  two friendly dogs and feels safe and secure. I will definitely be returning :)

The perfect location for those wanting to stay on the North Shore! So many great things to do in town, the beaches, hikes, and Dole plantation are all close by! It’s also about 2 minutes outside of downtown in a quiet neighborhood. The only downfall is the lack of AC, but most nights there is enough of a breeze that it’s fairly bearable. Highly recommended.

Wow, amazing place for the price. I don't understand why people book hotels when places like this exist. The value for what you get is amazing. Nice owners, introduced himself and respected our privacy so that was great. This place feels safe, don't have to worry about leaving stuff in the place with the doors unlocked. I loved the dog adira, it kept coming over and saying hi the whole time. The other dog was really shy. Really has an amazing view out of the porch. I would look this place up first among any other options when ever back in Oahu. Also I loved the chickens/ roosters they are very good at making sure you get up on time in the morning. This helped to maximize our time and do more activities as they never miss their 5am wake up calls, even when there was a tropical storm hitting they still did the job.

Things that could be done better: A.C. I know the listing says no AC so you can't be mad at that. It got super hot and humid while there and the fans can only do so much. Maybe they should invest in a portable swamp cooler that rolls around for the summer time. I'd even pay more if that's what it would take. 

Bugs, bugs, and more bugs. I understand it's Hawaii , everything is green and it's country. So I can live with the bugs. It is a little nerve wrecking when you hop in the shower and there's just a lizard staring you down on the wall, or a cockroach that hides inside your jacket. Other than that it's to be expected as it's country, and I'd still come back 100 times over.

The host really should include instructions somewhere on how to turn on the shower. that might be the norm in Hawaii but I've never seen anything like it, and after reading the reviews looks like others have had the same issue. However the host is a short phone call away and you'll have it figured out. 

That being said this is a perfect listing, and is soooooo much better than staying in Waikiki. So do yourself a favor and stay here.

Spacious Appartement with huge kitchen , nearly equipped with everything. Little problems have been solved quickly, the owner responds super fast. 
The 2 bedrooms are comfy, the smaller one is okay for one person. The house is located in a quiet area, shops and good restaurants are only a few minutes away by car.

Great location, private, clean, lay out was very nice and roomy, great deck and view of taro patch and mountain side with the birds and roosters welcoming you in the morning.  I would definitely recommend.  Owner very friendly and responded in a timely manner to questions. Would request instructions on how shower works and that dishwasher and washer would be in working condition.
Very relaxing & spacious, lots of privacy , friendly hosts & would return again..
Lovely home. Fabulous location. Our suggestion would be more attention to detail in all areas.
We loved our stay! It is the perfect location. The house had everything we needed and more. Jeremy made our stay even better by offering insight on where to fish. Such a great place!

This loft is big and really well organized. Everyone has his own space and at the same time a nice living room to share time together. My girlfriend and I had an amazing time and it was no worries sharing this place with my parent. Jeremy and his girlfriend are the best host. So kind and helpful whenever you need. I recommend this place+++

Perfect place to stay on the north shore. Close to famous town of Haleiwa where you will find all the restaurants and close to the beach. Then just follow the nice ocean road all the way to the north shore about 5/10min drive to do the all coast and see all the famous beaches. Jeremy and his wife are very nice hosts and the dogs too. This been our 3rd year staying at this place and we’re never disappointed. We’ve always enjoyed a very nice trip
This location is perfect! It’s peaceful and not crowded. The house is lovely and very clean!
Great location, quiet neighborhood.

Lovely clean apartment in a nice, quiet location. A car would definitely be recommended, as the pipeline etc. are in good driving distance. We had nice views from the terrace! Great to enjoy your breakfast here.
Very spacious and modern. Great mountain views. You'll need a car as it is about 5 mins drive from the town site. There are 2 friendly dogs at the house to greet you. Would stay again.
We had an amazing stay at this location would definitely recommend others to stay here. Beautiful house, spacious rooms, comfortable beds.

This place far exceeded our expectations! It was relaxing, clean, and spacious. Plus we loved hanging w/ the friendly dogs. We hope to come back again because it was our favorite Airbnb experience to date!

name: Gorgeous Ocean Front Home w/ Salt Water Pool
summary: This gorgeous ocean front two acre property includes a main house, guest house, salt water pool, covered lanai and fire pit and is located right on the Hamakua Coast.  The interior is airy and spacious.  The property home is perfect for larger groups and families but also well suited for smaller groups.  For those  traveling as a couple or solo, consider booking the main house or guest house separately.
description: This gorgeous ocean front two acre property includes a main house, guest house, salt water pool, covered lanai and fire pit and is located right on the Hamakua Coast.  The interior is airy and spacious.  The property home is perfect for larger groups and families but also well suited for smaller groups.  For those  traveling as a couple or solo, consider booking the main house or guest house separately.
house_rules: The home is located in a quiet neighborhood in Pepeekeo. Please respect our property and our neighbors. - Observe quiet hours from 10:00 p.m. to 7:00 a.m.  - Valid Photo ID for all guests who will be staying in the home must be forwarded to Host and Rental Agreement must be signed by responsible guest after booking request is processed and prior to check-in. Failure to sign and Return Agreement to Host shall entitle Host to cancel booking. - 13.42% tax (4.166% GET + 9.25% TAT is included in your total)  - We live Hawaiian style - no shoes worn inside.

host.host_about: Aloha -- I am a lifelong resident of Hawai‘i with a family of six.  As a frequent traveler myself, I love sharing the aloha spirit with visitors and residents alike and serving as a host for our Pepe‘ekeo home.  My husband, Jerry, is originally from Indiana, and first came to Hawai‘i to attend law school at the University of Hawai‘i at Manoa.  He loves to enjoy the great outdoors, especially when that means fishing, paddle boarding and taking walks with our dogs.

reviews.comments: Don't follow (Hidden by Airbnb) maps, it's a little tricky to find but easy enough with some local directions

The house is gorgeous and stays in a serene community. The oceanfront is very beautiful. We are a group of ten and the house is big that four beds fits us well. The (Hidden by Airbnb) map gave us a dead end to the house but the host sent us the direction clearly before we came. And Mahi helped us book the lava boat in volcano NP. She is so nice and gave us recommendations of activities in Hilo.

Gorgeous oceanfront property! The house is immaculate, and spacious! The entire property is huge, with a beautiful view. The pool is amazing!! Loved the fire pit! Super quiet. We never saw or heard our neighbors. We had breakfast outside on the patio every morning. Close to Hilo- restaraunts and shops! This place really is to die for. We will definitely be back!

Our group of two families loved staying at Mahi's house. First impression when you open the door is a WOW- a very pretty and spacious great room with high ceilings, lots of comfy couches and a big kitchen, all of which overlooks the pool and courtyard and lawn (all secluded) through a wall of windows and glass doors. Very relaxing! 

Though you couldn't see the sea from the house, it was a very quick walk through the property to stand on cliffs overlooking the ocean. We had mongoose coming through on occasion, several colorful lizards, a fascinating snail, and no mosquitoes.  

The bedrooms were all spacious with plenty of bathroom space and the kitchen was well-equipped. We stayed in the main house, with three bedrooms and the guest apartment above the garage, which is in a separate building, and which has its own kitchenette and bathroom. We ate all of our dinners in and loved a rainy morning spent playing in the pool and just hanging out. 

The house was probably about a 15-min drive from Hilo and we went on outings to Richardson Beach for the sea turtles, Hawaiian Brain Freeze for crazy portions of shaved ice, Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, Akako Falls and the Kapoho tide pools. Nothing was more than about an hour away. 

Mahi was helpful, responded to all of our questions promptly, and left all sorts of goodies and drinks for us, which we all appreciated! We have only good things to say and would definitely return to this house on future trips Hilo-side.

Peaceful Pepeekeo Hale is where you want to enjoy your next stay while on the Hilo side. Private home with an amazing ocean view. A step off of the lanai its swimmimg pool is waiting for you to enjoy anytime of day.
Beautiful home, fantastic view, perfect to spend time enjoying the sun, pool, and friends and family.

The home is nice and secluded with only a short drive into Hilo when you need something. It's quiet and the views are great! Stargazing at night when the clouds break is a must!! I've never seen so many stars in my life! The pool was. Ice and refreshing after a hot day and the home
Beautiful ocean view home. Our family really enjoyed the night swims in the pool.  Great location close to Hilo.  Plenty of room for the 9 members of our family.

Our family of 9 was very comfortable here. The house served as a perfect home base for our daily adventures, allowing us to cook in or eat out, enjoy the ocean cliff views, and cool off in the pool when we wanted a break. Mahi provided helpful advice for us and wonderful amenities in the home. Don't pass up this gem of a location!!

If you seek typical Hawaii tourism.. luau, catered meals, noise, crowds? This piece of pure paridise isn't for you.
Mahi's home is splendid. Be prepared to shop at the farmer's market, cook for your family and spend quality time together poolside and exploring the rocky coast. My teenagers thouroughly enjoyed the grounds and everything the Big Island had to offer. Mahi could not have been more helpful. Would 100% recommend this beautiful home.

Perfect house and location for a week long stay. We had two busy families with teenagers. The pool is perfect, the short walk to a beautiful coastline, rural setting, lush landscaping and hospitality made this a vacation to remember. I only wish we had booked longer. None of us were ready to leave.
The house itself was beautiful, the pool and view were amazing. Only downside it was a bit far to most of the attractions on the otherwise of island.

We stayed here on a family vacation and it was wonderful! The house was very clean and offered us a quiet, cozy stay. We loved the pool! The property is very well maintained and the beds were super comfortable. Communicating with the owner was so easy and she was always quick to respond if we had questions. For the most part the house is fully stocked with everything you could need (beach towels, dishes, cookwear etc...) but we did find that the spices were limited and some of the cooking utensils were flimsy. If you plan to cook meals, just keep this in mind. The house is secluded in a private neighborhood, but is only a 20 minutes drive to Hilo. There is a scenic route to Hilo that starts right near the house and this made the drive into town even more enjoyable. Overall we were very happy with this home and would recommend it to anyone looking for a little privacy, quiet and space. We will definitely stay here again!

Quite secluded place, which is the best advantage and disadvantage at the same time, but Mahi was eager to help us getting there.
The house itself is one of places I've ever liked the best. All the facilities are well prepared and my family enjoyed the pool a lot.

This place is amazing. It feels so secluded and like your own little paradise on the Big Island.  Mahi thought of everything as we cooked several times and the kitchen was fully stocked with necessary cooking utensils. The grill, fire pit, pool, coach house and access to the ocean made our experience unforgettable!

Very responsive and helpful host, amazing house to stay and incredible amenities (pool, close to the ocean, kitchen and appliances, comfy beds, etc). Would recommend this place and Mahi to anyone looking for a place to stay.

This house was perfect for my colleagues and I when we visited the Big Island for work!  Mahi was exceedingly helpful during our stay and responded quickly to any question we had. The home itself is spacious and comfortable with a great kitchen. The pool was great to cool off after a long run along the coast. The sound of waves crashing against the cliffs lulls you to sleep each night and the sun peeks over the trees as you sip coffee on the porch every morning. Five star place with five star host!

Our family of 8 and a baby spent a week here and it was perfect! Lots of space and well stocked kitchen, including spices. Plus, Mahi was kind enough to do our grocery shopping in advance. This was wonderful because we didn't arrive until midnight and our groceries were already there. We love this home and it exceeded expectations!

This is a great house on the Hilo side!  Mahi was great to work with. If you are looking for beaches and umbrella drinks this is not the house. This is secluded (10 mins to Hilo) but close to the botanical gardens and Akaka falls. The scenery is breathtaking and it was a great week long stay with my family.

This airbnb was exactly what we expected and more! Mahi was a wonderful host in the fact of checking in, responding and having the house ready! we would recommend this house to anyone planning on visiting Big Island! Thank you again! 

-Mitchell Collins

Our group of 10 had a wonderful stay at this spacious home.  This was our first Airbnb rental and it was a 5 Star experience.  We were surprised that the bathrooms were equipped with shampoo, conditioner and body wash.  The towels were creatively folded and there were local chocolates and fresh tropical fruit. An extra nice touch was that the hostess had some tropical flowers and a “Happy Birthday” balloon for my dad as we were there to celebrate his 80th birthday.  There was also some paper, crayons, sand buckets and pool toys that were perfect for our two 5 yo’s.   The kitchen was very well equipped and there were some basic staples and spices.  The living room had a large TV with satellite channels. It was a bonus having a washer and dryer and there was even laundry detergent that we could use.  Rooms were all clean and spacious.  Each bedroom had a king size bed and had plenty of extra linens and blankets.  It was great that there were beach towels that we could use as they are so bulky to pack.  The home is located in a scenic, peaceful setting and we enjoyed walking on the cliff walk, exploring and watching the waves.

We really enjoyed our stay.  The house was just perfect for our family of 10.  The kids loved the pool and the rooms were spacious.  The house is nicely decorated but not overly filled with clutter.  We enjoyed the sound of the ocean surf not far from the house.  This house is a great value.

We thoroughly enjoyed the Pepeekeo home. The house was spacious and had everything we needed. The very private grounds are beautiful with great views of the ocean. 10-15 minute drive to Hilo, if necessary. A few hiccups were promptly attended to by Mahi. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.
Place is a real getaway great for families. Walks down to the beach in the morning and afternoon's by the pool. Slightly remote, but that was a plus for our group.

Open concept huge space with tons of windows. Huge green backyard with a wonderful pool. Fire pit is awesome and the grill was convenient for us to cook on. Tools, lightbulbs, and extra linens were stocked. Ceiling fans provide a nice cool breeze along with a natural breeze from outside. It rained 90% of the time we stayed, but it was relaxing and we enjoyed it. We didn’t quite pack for it tho. Close to the ocean, the walk was short and muddy. Exhilarating view from the cliffs. We would stay here again and we will tell all our friends about this lovely home.
The host canceled this reservation 144 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Mahi was a great host and the house was just as pictured.  We had a great time and would stay there again.

The house was just as beautiful as the pictures.   It was more than spacious to accommodate the 8 of us.  Mahi left extra special touches to welcome us.  The beds were comfortable and the area is so peaceful and safe.  Wish we had more time to enjoy the house.  Definitely next time!

Thank you for everything you did, the house was amazing just like in pictures! I loved every minute of it and my family did too! Hope to visit in the future, thank you for all the help truly an amazing experience . Mahi was very helpful and thoughtful truly great!

This home is truly gorgeous. It has a warm and homey feeling to it. The pictures don’t do it justice. We loved being able to have all our family together to enjoy meals and relaxation time at the pool. The pool is a great option to have, when the ocean is rough. The renters have the best set of instructions on the home that I’ve seen. Everything was clearly explained in detail and we referred to it often. This home is better suited to individuals looking for privacy away from the crowds. It’s a little bit away from downtown Hilo. About 20 minutes out, but well worth it.  We loved our time there.

Mahis house was a beautiful get away for our large family.  We had plenty of space to relax together or even be alone.  The pool was very refreshing and it was a very peaceful setting in the country.  Our family is very thankful we were able to have such a great place to catch up on some much need R&R.  Perfect!

Beautiful home and fantastic host! Mahi is extremely fast in responding,  thorough in details, and very hospitable. She had a bowl of local fruit, a sweet note, the closets stocked with pool towels, basic spices, laundry items, boardgame cards crayons for kids, and pool toys waiting for our family.  The salt water pool was perfect (and deep!).  The rooms and common areas are roomy, well lit, and open. We had kids, infants, and adults in the house and it was great for all of us.  Loved that it was a gated home in a gated community.  It does feel secluded (nearest grocery store was in Hilo and almost 30 min away)but that was part of the charm.  Only callout is there is no A.C.  (not a surprise as we already knew this) so if you tend to have a hard time on warm/humid nights - just fyi.

Beautiful place and great host. Mahi is so considerate with many basic needs in the house. We just bring food and our own luggage... The house and studio feel like personal housing with super nice appliances and furniture. Mahi also added many little thoughtful touches through out the house. I will let the next guests experience it without ruin the surprises. Mahi is always a text away when we have a question...

Love the pool with nature surrounding. And no light pollution for the starry night photograph. I was even. captured Milky Way and the glow from Fissure #8 using my LG Go phone camera (manual setting)...

Love the place, and we will return for sure. Mahalo nui loa, Mahi.

We loved staying here.  In spite of being away from town, the location was central to all the places we wanted to go on the island.  When we got home, it was so wonderful to be able to jump in the pool and enjoy eating outdoors.  The kitchen was well equipped so we were able to cook with no problems.  The only slight problem we had was that we had trouble finding the place the first time.  Our gps tried to lead us on non existent roads.  I might suggest that you include some written directions with the other advance information.  Would love to return!!!

This is a wonderful Hawaiian home. Our group really enjoyed the house, the pool, and the ocean view. Close enough to Hilo to be in town quickly to explore but far enough away to really relax and feel secluded. Mahi was a welcoming host. Would highly recommend.

Thanks so much Mahi.  Hospitality was great.  Our experience was that the home was roomy, airy, and had everything we needed. Beds were super comfortable and the sound of the ocean and frogs at night lulled us to sleep.  Light breeze and ceiling fans kept us cool. Flowers, trees, ocean views and privacy were exceptional.  The pool entertained our teenage boys.  Location was just far enough away from the hustle and bustle -but close enough to Hilo for a nice drive into town for restaurants, supplies and experiences.  Again - thank you.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Everything was first class.  Anna

Beautiful property.  Great pool.  There's no AC, but we were there in the summer and as long as you keep the windows open it stays cool enough with the ocean breezes.  The cliffside view of the ocean is beautiful - a bit over 100 yards to the end of the property.  Mahi was very responsive and attentive to our needs throughout the stay.
Lovely home in a lovely setting.  Our family of 5 adults were very comfortable and had everything we needed for a very relaxing, enjoyable stay.

The pictures really don’t do this house justice. The kitchen had just about anything we could’ve possibly needed, the bedrooms were spacious and open with so much natural light and air flow, and the outdoor space was serene. 

There were times we wanted to go out into Hilo to explore but got caught up relaxing and swimming in the pool. 

Mahi was always so quick to respond to messages and questions, and her welcome book detailed everything in the house that we could’ve needed help with. The directions from the airport were especially helpful after dark. 

I had such an amazing time here and couldn’t recommend it enough. I wholeheartedly plan to go back!

The house was awesome!! Check in was easy with thorough explanation for access. Mahi was quick to respond to any communications. Beautiful views of the ocean, and it was fun to walk down to the cliffs and watch the waves. We had high winds for a few days with some power outages. Mahi provides a generator for the house so we still had electricity. This was the nicest house we've stayed in on trips to Hawaii and we would not hesitate to return.

Great  house with lots of room.
Excellent pool

Our family would highly recommend a stay at Mahi's place in Pepeekeo. After spending 4 nights in Kuilua Kona, it was refreshing to stay at Mahi's place with so much land around.  We enjoyed the private swimming pool (even after dark since it is lit!)  The ocean is visible from many spots in the house or on the property and we could hear the waves at night as well.  The house was CLEAN and well stocked for us upon arrival.   The house is beautiful inside as well outside.   My son and I enjoyed hunting lizards on the back porch with a flashlight after dark.  We saw amazing stars after dark as well.  Not only is the property nice, Mahi extended amazing hospitality to us when she found and mailed us a beloved toy that was left by us on check out. She got it promptly in the mail so we'd be without it as little as possible.  I have no hesitation in recommending a stay here.

name: Poipu Peaceful Garden Retreat With Pool & Jacuzzi *Kahala 913*
summary:
Poipu Peaceful Garden Retreat With Pool & Jacuzzi *Kahala 913*
Please Note: 14.42% Hawaii Transient Accommodation Tax is included in the rates provided.
space: Enjoy the beauty of Kauai by day, and rest and relax by night in this one bedroom one bath condo at the Kahala development of the famous Poipu Kai Resort. This unit offers the amenities needed to make a vacation comfortable - washer/dryer, a kitchen equipped with a full-size refrigerator, range/oven, dishwasher, and microwave. Everything you need to cook a meal, mix a mai tai, or bake cookies if you feel like it can be found in the kitchen. The lanai is a great place to sit and read or enjoy a cup of morning coffee while taking in the sunrise. Poipu Kai Resort is conveniently close to the top destinations in Poipu - like Poipu Beach, Shipwrecks Beach, the Spouting Horn, National Tropical Botanical Garden, a beautiful coastline that can be viewed from a horse's back, and various local stores and restaurants. Whether it’s convenience or luxury, this Kahala unit has it all, and will be a perfect home base for your dream Hawaiian vacation! Please note that this unit has sleeping arrangemen

This unit offers the amenities needed to make a vacation comfortable - washer/dryer, a kitchen equipped with a full-size refrigerator, range/oven, dishwasher, and microwave. Everything you need to cook a meal, mix a mai tai, or bake cookies if you feel like it can be found in the kitchen. host.host_about: Suite Paradise has 100's of vacation rental properties to choose from across several of the best resorts in the Poipu Beach area of Kauai. Choose from five beautiful and luxurious beach resorts on Kauai’s spectacular South Shore – Poipu Kai  Resorts: Kahala,Makanui,Manualoha, Poipu Sands, Regency and Regency Villas one of Kauai’s most prestigious beachfront resorts, Nihi Kai Villas, a comfortable and quiet beach resort, Poipu Crater, exotically nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater, Lawai Beach, luxurious oceanfront condos located on the best snorkeling spot on the island, and Poipu Kapili, a beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property and Pili Mai, nestled among a championship golf course, Pili Mai is set in an ideal location on the island of Kauai’s south shore in Poipu Beach. This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums. This central Poipu location offers ocean, golf course, and mountain views and is within walking distance to additional dining, shopping, and entertainment at Poipu Shopping Village and a short distance to world famous Poipu Beach.

reviews.comments: Beautiful condo, close to the beach. We are certainly hoping to be able to return one day.
Just perfect!

What an awesome place,  perfectly located near all the best places to eat and shop in Poipu.  Our favorite beach was less than 5 minutes away and walkable if you wanted to.  Condo was super clean and the extra's (beach chairs, beach toys, coolers, heavy beach towels) were a very nice touch. The bed was super comfy and plenty of pillows.  The constant breeze through the condo kept us nice and cool.   The place was huge with a nice kitchen.
