interaction: I will greet you all personally ... in the apartment!!

host.host_about:
Hi !! I'm Wilson from Hong Kong, a young entrepreneur currently managing a serviced apartments group in HK for more than 5 years!

I am an experienced traveler which have explored over 30+ cities !! 

Looking forward to meeting you soon!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
It has been pleasant for all of us.  Close to variety choices of restaurants, convenient stores and public transportation. 
The shower cubicle is a little too tiny, limited by the available space but overall, its a great place.

The Host has been very helpful and courteous to make sure that we are comfortable with our stay.  

Thank you Wilson.

The apartment is very clean and spacious.   It has everything we need.   The location is also very convenient and close to all types of public transport and great variety eatting places.   The host Wilson is very friendly and helpful.   Highly recommended.   Will book again at my next visit to HK.

10/10 would recommend to all tourists interested in shopping, sight seeing, eating food and the nightlife. With the station right outside the apartment and central being only ten minutes away, all the major areas of Hong Kong were accessible and within reach . I stayed here with 3 other friends and the space could easily fit all four of us. Wilson himself was a very accommodating host and provided us with all the necessities and information to make our trip go smoothly. Overall the stay here was essential to our wonderful experience in Hong Kong!

Great location, friendly host, will definitely recommend. Host kindly agreed to great us in person even though our arrival time is 11pm. He waited for us till 1 am cause our flight was delayed. Space is clean and spacious, very convenient stores and transport at your doorstep. Only concern was the size of the shower it’s only 4 tiles big so quite tiny, it wasnt a big concern for us.

Great property, especially if you would like to experience Hong Kong like a local!! Great for business travellers as well. Check-in was a breeze - Wilson was personally there to help settle down. Apartment was exactly as described. Good size for HK standards. Fantastic location - MTR, tram and cabs were just outside! Nice local, Asian and international restaurants within walking distance. Several grocery stores, fruit marts, etc within a block! You get a bit of traffic noise as it is on the main road, but well worth the convenience of the amazing location!
Good 2BR apartment in a great location. The air conditioning is powerful (nice for hot/humid days). Host is very fast at responding to messages. Thanks Wilson!

name: Studio in Rio block from the beach
summary: OS VALORES SÃO ALTERADOS EM FERIADOS RÉVEILLON/CARNAVAL 2018 ATE 3 PESSOAS/ATÉ 7 DIAS R$4 MIL. 4 PESSOAS R$4.250 MIL Localizado na quadra da praia, lugar conhecido como "Baixo Copa", muito frequentado por turistas e moradores da nossa cidade. Quem aqui se hospedar estará muito bem localizado, praticamente na praia de Copacabana em sua melhor área, podendo ter fácil acesso a qualquer ponto turístico da cida

notes: Após a reserva e antes de chegar no Rio, vamos precisar de algumas informações adicionais:  - A que horas você quer checkin e para fora;  - Nome completo, número do passaporte, e domicílio.  - Cópia do passaporte de um locatário  Se for necessário vou enviar uma cópia do contrato de permanência de aluguel.  After the reservation and before you arrive in Rio, we will need some additional information:  - What time do you want to checkin and out;  - Complete name, passport number, and permanent address.  - passport copy from one renter If it is necessary I will send a copy of the contract of the rental stay.
transit: Aqui você quase não vai gastar com transporte, afinal vai estar no melhor ponto de Copa! E se quiser passear pela zona sul da cidade terá tudo ao seu alcance: metro, aluguel de bike ônibus e táxi. E se quiser passear caminhando, é só atravessar a Av. Atlântica que estará na orla da praia!
access: Quem aqui se hospedar estará muito bem localizado, praticamente na praia de Copacabana em sua melhor área, podendo ter fácil acesso a qualquer ponto turístico da cidade, pois temos todos os tipos de transporte à porta, sem contar as facilidades em razão da proximidade com supermercados, restaurantes,farmácias,  lojas, bancos e etc.
interaction: Como resido muito próximo ao apartamento, sempre estarei à disposição para poder ajudar no que for preciso! Adoro receber meus hospedes!
house_rules: Não ofereço toalhas de praia, então por favor, traga seus próprios objetos de banho e para uso pessoal. Este é um edifício familiar, então faça silêncio depois das 22:00hs. A voltagem é 110V. Somente é permitido utilizar a usar a máquina de lavar roupa com a autorização. Lembre-se de tirar o lixo e não esqueça suas coisas na geladeira. Cuide do Apto sempre com carinho, como se fosse seu!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou mais uma pessoa apaixonada pelo Rio de Janeiro! Adorei conhecer o site, achei incrível as possibilidades que aqui estão expostas para facilitar a vida de quem adora viajar e estar bem acomodado por um preço justo, por isso resolvi aderir e compartilhar, oferecendo também meu espaço em Copacabana! 
O sucesso foi tanto que agora, em 2014 já tenho mais opções de estadia para quem quiser usufruir dessa cidade Maravilhosa! Visitem meus anúncios e consultem as disponibilidades dos lugares que tenho para acomodar vocês!

reviews.comments: Que du bonheur avec la location du studio de Giovanna que nous tenons à remercier. Nous la remercions encore pour son accueil chaleureux, ses conseils,son sérieux dans le timing check-in, chek-out, la propreté de son studio. Idéalement situé (Cobacabana) il nous à plu par sa tranquilité (aucun bruit) et par son (Website hidden by Airbnb) prochaine fois que nous allons revenir sur Rio sans hésitation nous reprendrons contact avec Giovanna pour son appartement. Laurent Lattion

My wife and I stayed at the Studio in Rio - 1 block from the beach at the corner of Rua Domingues Ferreira and Rua Bolivar. It was a quick walk to the beach, surrounded by wonderful restaurants. The apartment itself was all we needed, a bed, a couch, a tv, a bathroom and kitchen - we didn't spend too much time in the apartment as we wanted to see the beautiful city.

Giovanna sat down with us and gave us information and suggestions around the city and what to do during the world cup.

We spoke using (Hidden by Airbnb) if I had any questions.

Thanks again Giovanna!!!

The apartment was great, clean and looks exactly like the pictures. We had an awesome stay there. The location is perfect. Very close to the beach and supermarkets. Giovanna is a great host. Thanks a lot!

I stayed at this studio for a whole month and loved it. The area is absolutely fantastic and it's within two or three blocks from all you will need: the beach (one block away!), tube station, bus stops, supermarkets, restaurants and trendy bars in the corner. The flat is lovely and is exactly as shown in the pictures (actually pretty big for a studio, and carefully decorated in an arty way). It's in the nicest area of Copacabana (30 min walk to Ipanema). While the windows face an internal patio, the flat has natural light and this is what makes it very quiet, despite being surrounded by bars and restaurants. It can get a bit hot inside, but Giovanna has just bought a new aircon which allows you to stay cool inside in spite of the 40 degrees outside. It's good to go out, though. She is the perfect host - anything you may need, she will reply within seconds via (Hidden by Airbnb) and will try to sort it out (i.e. a new iron, a toaster, a new aircon, a plug, etc). Truly recommend this studio.
This was already my second stay at this apartment. Everything was great again. I would recommend this apartment to everyone. Giovanna is very friendly and always helpful.

Apartamento super bem localizado, na minha região favorita de Copacabana. É numa rua tranquila, perto da praia, dos melhores restaurantes e cafés, cinema, supermercados e farmácia.
O apartamento é aconchegante e tem tudo o que você pode precisar na sua estadia.
Giovanna é muito atenta e ficou sempre à disposição para resolver qualquer problema o responder dúvidas. Ela ficou no momento do check-in para mostrar onde achar as coisas no apto, e explicar o funcionamento do aquecedor de água, máquina de lavar roupas e demais.
Recomendo.

Meu contato com Giovanna foi somente pelo (Hidden by Airbnb) . Ela foi super atenciosa e simpática. Nós deu dicas de locomoção do aeroporto até o seu apartamento, dicas de passeios, lugares para comer, etc. Sempre se mostrou disponível para ajudar em tudo o que fosse necessário. Não conhecemos a Giovanna pessoalmente pois estava viajando. Quem nos recebeu foi sua amiga Andrea e, igualmente, foi muito atenciosa e simpática. Nós mostrou o apartamento e explicou o funcionamento das coisas em geral.  O apartamento é aconchegante e muito bem localizado. Localização realmente perfeita. :)  Próximo ao apartamento tem tudo o que um turista possa desejar: fica a uma quadra da praia, tem ótimos restaurantes e bares, supermercado, padaria,..
Gostamos muito de nos hospedar no apartamento da Giovanna e recomendamos tanto pelo local quanto pelo excelente atendimento feito pela Giovanna. Anfitriã 5 estrelas! Voltaríamos a nos hospedar neste apartamento.

I decided on this aparment for mainly one reason: location. It is located in a clean, modern and very nice part of Copacabana, and literally you come out of the house, turn left and you are on the beeach. Great resturants nearby, breakfast places, and bars. Also, the place is quiet as not street faced.

And Giovanna is absolutely lovely. I arrived late and she accommodated check in and check out smoothly. 

Can recommend without reservations.

Giovanna es una gran anfitriona, muy cálida en el trato y disponible para ayudar en todas las consultas que surgieron durante nuestra estancia. Nos dio muy buenas sugerencias de cosas para ver y hacer, así como información sobre como llegar a distintos lugares. El apartamento cuenta con una excelente ubicación, en una zona muy bonita de Copacabana, a una cuadra de la playa y a cuatro de la estación de metro. Es muy fácil moverse hacia los distintos puntos de Río desde ahí. El espacio es pequeño pero muy cómodo y funcional para nosotros que éramos tres personas. Es muy recomendable! Definitivamente es una ciudad para volver, y éste el lugar para quedarse!

O apartamento é uma delícia é muito bem localizado! A Giovanna é uma ótima anfitriã e nos recebeu muito bem, dando dicas e garantiu uma estadia muito agradável. Foi muito atenciosa e eu e minhas colegas ficamos muito satisfeitas :)

Giovanna è stata molto gentile, abbiamo trovato le chiavi dal portiere e la casa in perfetto ordine.è stata sempre disponibile per darci consigli sulla città. La casa è accogliente e curata rispecchiando le foto pubblicate. La posizione è ottima, in piena copacabana a meno di 5 minuti a piedi dalla spiaggia. Inoltre è servita benissimo dagli autobus ed ha sotto casa un supermercato e vari bar/ristoranti. Davvero raccomandabile.

I had to cancel my one month trip to Brazil due to unfortunate circumstances. I asked for money back 6 months prior to my arrival. Airbnb told me I could only get my money back if the host agreed to pay back because my term was 1 month long. Giovanna said she did not want to give back my money because she just became a "super host"(because of me) and did not want to lose her "super host" status. I found this very upsetting.

A Giovanna nos recebeu maravilhosamente bem, nos aguardou no horário marcado, nos passou todas as informações, e fizemos o check out no hotelaria de moda conveniência.
O apartamento é exatamente como está nas fotos, em prédio bem tranquilo e extremamente bem localizado próximo  à tudo.
Enfim só tenho a agradecer e a indicar a Giovanna e seu imóvel a quem quiser ter uma estadia perfeita no Rio

Super apartment. I stayed there for 6 weeks. Apartment looks exactly like on the photos. Its quiet, cozy and still at one block from the beach. Everything is close. 
Can highly recommend it.

I stayed two months here, great location close to the beach, shops and metro. Apartment is big and comfortable.

Eu fiquei para dois meses, ótimo locação perto da praia, lojas e metrô. Apartamento é grande e confortável.
Es muy recomendable! es un departamento chico pero muy cómodo y giovanna siempre a disposición es una gran anfitriona!

Giovanna es muy amable y atenta a todo lo que uno pueda necesitar durante la estadía.
El departamento es muy cómodo y la ubicación es inmejorable. 
Lo recomiendo.
De locatie van dit appartement is geweldig. Je bent zo bij restaurants, winkels, metro en het strand. Het appartement zelf is toe aan modernisering en kan een grondige schoonmaak beurt gebruiken.

Excelente el departamento, todo lo necesario, ducha increíble, porteros muy amables, Seguridad, buenos vecinos, supermercado a 20 metros. Está muy cerca de la playa, es una cuadra de 50 mtros. con bastantes bares en la esquina, lo cual la hace de noche muy segura. Con Giovanna no nos vimos pero la comunicación funcionó muy bien vía Celular. Sin dudas lo recomiendo! Gracias por todo, saludos. Ricardo

Excelente apartamento! Super funcional, bem decorado, uma gracinha. Perto de tudo, com portaria 24h. Chuveiro a gás maravilhoso também. Giovanna é atenciosa e fica à disposição sempre que foi solicitada. Voltaremos com certeza!
Nossa estadia foi ótima e a Giovanna é muito querida, prestativa e ágil na resolução de qualquer coisa. O Studio é uma graça, super bem localizado e aconchegante. Certamente voltaremos! Recomendo.

Giovanna es una gran anfitriona. Siempre dispuesta a ayudar y ofrecer respuesta rápidas. El departamento es como se muestra en fotos. Cerca de muchos locales comerciales y restaurantes y a una sola cuadra de la playa. El apartamento cuenta con seguridad 24 hs y los conserjes son muy amables. Estamos muy satisfechos

name: Chez NHN
summary: Mon logement est proche de Station Côtes-des-neiges. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour la vue, l'emplacement et l'ambiance. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.
description: Mon logement est proche de Station Côtes-des-neiges. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour la vue, l'emplacement et l'ambiance. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.

reviews.comments: Very neat and comfortable!

neighborhood_overview: Times Square/Theatre District is the heart of New York City. This unceasingly energetic area is a year-round hotspot for the throngs of visitors flocking to its flagship stores, only-on-Broadway productions, and iconic television studios. As one of NYC’s most frenetic neighborhoods, Times Square/Theatre District exemplifies "bright lights, big city" like nowhere else.
transit: Located just steps from great shopping in the Theatre District, restaurants including Blue Ribbon and Baked by Melissa. Conveniently located around the corner from the M11 and M50 bus lines and close to several subway lines, including the C, E, and 1 trains.
access: Guess have access to everything in the apartment!
house_rules: Please treat my home as if it were your own.  NO PARTIES  NO SMOKING   NO LOUD NOISES  DO NOT LEAVE WINDOWS OR DOORS OPEN WHEN YOU LEAVE  DO NOT BREAK ANYTHING  PLEASE RECYCLE OTHERWISE WE WILL GET FINED.  NO ADDITIONAL GUESTS WITHOUT PERMISSION.  not respecting my house rules will end up in losing your security deposit.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Live, laugh, love :-)

reviews.comments: The place is nice.

Everything was perfect. Our group of 6 stayed comfortably. What you see on the pictures is exactly what you will see in person. Quiet neighborhood. Approximately 6-10 minute walking distance to Times Square. Loved having a washer and dryer. Will definitely recommend this host!

This was a great apartment, well located in central Manhattan and easily walkable to Times Square and Central Park. The neighborhood is relatively peaceful (for NY) which provides a welcome break from the mania. The apartment is immaculate, stylish and comfortable - the space/layout is well thought through and a good size for a short stay.

We had a wonderful time in the apartment and Allan made every effort to accommodate our late arrival and special sleeping wishes. Everything was in very good condition and clean. The space was roomy enough for three people with two separate bedrooms and a comfortable sleeper sofa and we all had our own space. Also starting our daily sightseeing tours from this part of town, which BTW seemed safe - added another flavor to what we had experienced up to then. It is a stone through away from the Hudson promenade for running and long walks and not too far to the West Side subway trains. We used to spend a lot of time in NY and this definitely was something new. Bottomline, we would seriously consider staying here again.

Le logement est fidèle aux photos et à la description. Très bien placé, l'idéal pour un séjour à NYC. Seul petit bémol, un frigo en panne 2 jours et il faisait froid dans l'appartement.Sinon, tout était parfait.

It was overall a great experience.  Our flight was delayed and the host didn't have any problem waiting for us.  The place it's exactly like the pictures and the neighborhood was great, walking distance to Whole Foods, train station and the best Mexican restaurant in the area Toloache serving the best Hibiscus Margaritas.

Very accommodating to our group of 6! We had a wonky arrival / departure schedule that would have been tricky to bring our bags with us so it's very appreciated. Super clean apartment in an easy to find safe area. Thanks for a great stay!

I have no complaints at all for my stay at Angela's apartment. Angela was polite and helpful whenever we communicated. Her assistant, Allan showed us the apartment and helped us whenever necessary. Also, the apartment looks exactly like the photos on airbnb website. I will definietly be back.

We had a wonderful stay at Angela's apartment, it was perfect for our family of 6.  It was exactly like the pictures and in a great location, walking distance to anywhere in Midtown.  Her assistant Allen was very helpful and we had absolutely no problems during our stay.
Great location and very smooth process of checking in. The apartment was smaller than I thought from the pictures but nice non the less.
Really great place and really great location.
Angela's apt. was great! It was exactly what we expected and the location was ideal for us. We would definitely stay again.
Everything was fine and perfect in that apartment thanks for your time
Everything was as promise!!
It was a great trip

A few long blocks from Central park and Times Square.  Many great restaurants close by.  Master bedroom did not border the street which made it quiet for sleeping.  Great location if you can walk a little way to subway and main attractions.
Great location, very cozy and comfortable! Was very easy to communicate with hosts.
Close to lots of restaurants! Nice size bedrooms and lots of sleeping space! Perfect amount of security as well
Good

This lovely apartment is as pictured in the listing photographs. There is ample sleeping space as the living room couch opens to a sleeper, and the futon in the front bedroom also opens up. We did not use the air mattress but one was available. This is in addition to the two beds. 

The building security is nice as residents have to come through two locked doors to enter. Then there is the apartment door as well. 

The location is wonderful. Basically a mile to Times Square, and a half mile to a mile to Broadway theaters. We saw three shows while we were there and walked to them all. There is every kind of restaurant you can think of in this area. We had great pizza and pasta at Uncle Mario's around the corner. We had great Tex Mex at El Azteca. We had great breakfast at Galaxy Diner. I was with 3 kids so we didn't try anything too fancy. 

Check in with Angela's assistant Allen was easy and he showed us around the apartment. He's very friendly and available to handle any issues. 

This apartment felt very safe. The front bedroom is bit noisy as it faces the street and is also near the front door of the building so you can hear everyone coming and going plus street traffic noise. It was quiet though between midnight and 6 am. The back bedroom is very quiet as is the living room. 

Overall this is a great place to stay. I did have some trouble reaching Angela for check in instructions in the 24 hours before my trip which made me nervous, but it all ended up working out.
Great experience

Great location in Hells Kitchen, inexpensive to get anywhere with Uber or Lyft. Loved the place BUT no central heat... wall heaters not warm enough, and only 2 portable heaters - really needed 1 for freezing cold bathroom, and should have had 2 others for bedrooms. Noisy from people walking by window at night, and upstairs neighbours very noisy. I would stay again however if they resolved heat issue on cold winter days.

Location is good bc it's a several block walk (easy enough) to Times Square, etc, but quiet for sleeping. A grocery right on corner, Starbucks close, etc.
However, we did not have enough hot water for quick showers.  It didn't feel as clean as it could've been. Having washer dryer was. Ice, but the dryer was very weak- so each load has to be dried over and over again.
The person who checks you in was easy to communicate with and did exactly as he said he would making check in and out easy!

Angela's apartment is very well located, close to Times Square and the subway. It is an area of bars and restaurants, although the apartment block is very quiet. There are supermarkets and delis nearby. Regarding the amenities the apartment is very well equipped and as is shown in the photos. We are a family with three children and we were comfortable. The master bedroom faces the street, but it is not noisy. Just keep the curtains closed to maintain intimacy. We had a very cold week, and the heating was just and necessary. Allan, Angela's assistant, complied with the advance check-in we requested and was kind and willing to respond to our requests. Surely we would consider it for a new visit to New York.

Very cozy and clean 2bed room 1bath apartment. Few blocks away from the subway station. Safe and colorful neighborhood with access to many restaurants. Stocked kitchen and wine cooler. Props on the netflix, extra blankets and the heaters. Will consider use upon return to NYC
Lovely place to stay, in a perfect location in central Manhattan!!

We are a family of four and were very comfortable here.  Great location - we walked to Times Square, Circle Line, and Rockefeller Center.  Tons of restaurants nearby for going out or eating in.  Loved the 3 smart TVs.  Check in was very easy.

It was my first time in NY and it was everything I could have imagined.  The pictures of the home were accurate, great living space for me and my guests. Angela was a great host, very responsive and accommodating.  This apartment is centrally located and walking distance to all major attractions and close to all public transit.  I would definitely stay here again!

We enjoyed staying at Angela's apartment and Allan was very helpful. We never got to meet Angela in person but theyade sure that our stay was comfortable. We enjoyed our vacation and the apartment was a big part of it. Location was perfect. Numerous restaurants around the place and so close to places the make New York what it is. Would definitely recommend the place.
The apartment was centrally located so most of the tourist attractions were within walking distance. Plenty of nightlife and restaurants to keep you busy for weeks.

So close to great food choices and fun bars! Walking distance to central Park, Time Square, etc.  The front room was near the street and was a little noisey but wasn't bad at all! We loved staying here and would definitely do it again!

Our stay for two adults and three children (ages 12, 14 and 16) was wonderful. The location is excellent- close to lots of subway lines, safe and comfortable. The apartment is spacious and comfortable. My only suggestion is that a little more kitchen ware (glasses, cooking utensils, silverware, etc.) would have made our stay perfect.

Friends and I stayed here for a trip to NY with the goal of seeing as many shows as possible. The location is perfect--close to Times Square but far enough away to be out of tourist-central. Lots of great restaurants on 9th nearby. The apartment was clean and the logistics easy!

We enjoyed our stay at Angela's, the location was great and the apartment had a lovely feel. It is small but to be expected for the location in New York. Beds were all comfy and the checkin process was very simple. It was also lovely having Allan meet us there and show us how things work. The only issue we had is that there was not enough cutlery and glassware for 6 people and the hot water also was in short supply for that many people. Overall,great and we would definitely stay there again.
Loved our stay! Close to everything! Allan was a pleasure to deal with!
Can't beat the location and price. Very spacious with all the amenities needed for extended stays.

This apartment was in a fabulous location. Central to so many great areas. We were never in need of trying to find something to do. The apartment is on the smaller side but was plenty of room for 7 of us. Had no issues at all.
Nice apartement, perfect location. Perfect for 4 possible for 7. Maybe a littlebit noisy at the ground floor but hey, you are in NYC not in the woods
It's a great place to stay. Cozy and great location.

This apartment is just as pictured! (Beautiful). We traveled to NYC as a girls trip and felt very safe in this neighborhood. We were able to walk to Time Square, the cutest restaurants and bars without any problems! So glad the apartment had a washer and dryer, made packing so much easier! Angela and Allan were so easy to contact and such a pleasure. Would definitely love to stay here again!!

The place is suitable for groups of 4 but can sleep 6 easily if you are willing to share a bedroom and/or the lounge room. It is walking distance to central park, times square, 5th avenue, loads of resturants and the subway. The front bedroom is a bit noisy as its street level but otherwise waa a great space for a week in NYC.
Angela was very helpful and made sure to be connected for any assistance. Check-in/out was as good as it can be and the place was prepared for us. Thanks!

I would go back to this apartment if I needed to stay in the area again. Some friends have inquired about our place already.  Allan and Angela respond quickly. The apartment was secure and we felt very safe.
便利な場所でとても良かったです

Had the opportunity to stay for 1 week with my husband & 2 kids (7 & 10 years) at Angela's place. The location was perfect for us. Nearest subway was 2 short blocks and 2 long NYC blocks. Tons of different types of eateries on 9th Street (Obao, Vynl & Annabel's were excellent). Check in with Angela's assistant was easy. She was waiting for us at the front door to greet us & show us around the apt. Place was clean, beds were very comfy after a busy day of sightseeing. Noise level was not too bad, other than your typical New York sirens, horns, etc. The air conditioning in the room in the back was much stronger than the one in the front. I would recommend staying at Angela's & would consider it again if I were to visit NYC soon.
Location was great. We were a family of 6 and there was enough space for us all. We would definitely love to stay there again, in our next visit to Manhattan.

Great location (in a nice neighborhood close to Times Square) and apartment (easy first-floor entry), but be VERY leery of the hosts. Our group of six stayed here for three nights (August 17-20, 2017), and worked only with Allan, Angela’s assistant. Upon our arrival, he told us if we got there early to NOT wait outside with our suitcases. Then once inside he asked during our stay that we NOT talk to the neighbors, and that if we happen to run into them – to lie and tell them we are “Angela’s friends” who were visiting. Immediately, we got the impression that the building’s management wasn’t aware they are operating Airbnb through their apartment, and felt uncomfortable. It was upon our arrival that we were also disappointed to find the space not ready or very cleanly. There were leftover bottles of alcohol in the refrigerator, dirty dishes in the dishwasher, no sheets on one of the bedroom beds (luckily there were extras in the closet), and the bathroom was the worst. The bathroom sink’s faucet was broke (so every time we turned it on it lifted off); the shower curtain was a cheap plastic one that was hard and full of soap scum and mold / mildew; and along the bathtub / bathroom floor there was also mildew. Our group had a busy itinerary while visiting NYC, and was only at the apartment to shower and sleep. We had a great trip; my only regret is that I didn’t document some of the things I noted above regarding this apartment because upon our checkout, we got a very unprofessional message from Angela (who we had never even worked with) claiming that we didn’t leave her property in the same condition as when we arrived. In her message, she not only requested / tried to charge us $250 (!!!), she also scolded us for using too many towels (again, there were six of us there for four days – what does she expect?) and wrongfully accused us of puking (?!?!) on her cheap plastic shower curtain (which was an appalling accusation, as we are adults – if someone had got sick, we would have certainly cleaned it up). Basically, we overlooked their dirtiness and then they tried to blame us for it. Our group checked out on time at noon that Sunday, 8/20, and everyone showered that morning and used their towels. Out of pure courtesy to them, we placed our wet towels in the bathtub for the cleaning people to easily access, and apparently that was a huge no-no too. From the message we received, it sounded they wanted us to wash, dry and put away the towels the towels we used before we left. If that was the case, they should have told us. Our group thoroughly cleaned the apartment’s kitchen area (ran the dishwasher and put dishes away; took out the garbage, as requested; emptied the refrigerator), made beds (and even removed the sheets from the ones that...
This is a great place to stay in New York City.  Very close to walk to many sights and restaurants.  I would definitely book this place again.

This apartment was great for our family of 6 adults in many ways! There was enough room for sleeping as well as hanging out in between activities. One futon wasn't as comfortable for my daughter, but it worked out ok. It was a challenge with only 1 small bathroom, but we got a rhythm going!! There is a small functional kitchen although we went out to eat each night. We also liked having a washer and dryer to use when needed. Everything was clean which is important to me! What we all really liked was the location...close to Times Square, Central Park, Broadway plays as well as the subway! There are a variety of restaurants and bars close by which we checked out nightly! Angela and Allan were easy to communicate with and always replied to all my emails. Check in and check out went smoothly....Allan was there when we arrived as we texted him when we landed and on our way to the apartment. Our week in New York was great as we chose a perfect accommodation!

The location of the apartment was great - easy walking distance to Central Park in one direction and Times Square in another.
The apartment was very comfortable for 4 adults and we had everything we needed.

Great place in an A1 location for Midtown, Central and Broadway activities. Easy access to the subway, local supermarkets and restaurants on 9th Ave. Not a huge place, small bathroom, but was fine for a family of 5 for a week.

BEWARE OF ANGELA: I'm sad I have to write this review because I really enjoyed Angela's home. What I liked most about her home was the location, close to everything and walking distance to time square. When I made the reservation with Angela she was nice and answered all my questions... even though it took her a few days to respond. A few days before my trip, I did not hear from her and had to reach out to her to ask if she needed anything from me since the trip was approaching, she said her assistant Allan would check me in. Upon arriving in NY, Allan, who was really nice reached out to me via text and gave me check in time and instructions. A few hours before check in, he texted me again and said he would not be able to make it on time and sent me to another assistant who would check me in. There was a lot of back and forth with Allan and the new assistant about check-in and I did not speak to Angela at all before or during my trip , until after I returned home.
She sent me a message claiming we damaged her property and requested $500!!! She claimed we threw a party when there was only 6 of us, saying we broke a "noise device" when all we did was unplug it to plug in a phone charger, saying we broke her chair and "kicked in" her door when neither of those happened since we were barely there, spilling beer and "ruining" her couch when we only had two six packs of beer over the entire 4 days which definitely wasn't spilled, harassing me by sending me pictures and screenshots of the convos with her very unprofessional cleaner who claimed to take an EXTRA 5 hours to clean a two bedroom one bath apartment that just needed trash thrown away and sheets/towels washed. And lastly both her and her cleaner accused me of doing drugs in her apartment when it was very clearly my translucent makeup left over on the counter since there was only one mirror other than the one in the bathroom. My advice to anyone looking to reserve Angela's home: DON'T!!! And if you do make sure you take pictures of every ding and dent in her apartment because she will accuse you of "damages". After she accused me of damaging her property , I read a review from a previous guest who she tried to scam as well.  She is clearly running a SCAM and airbnb needs to shut down her operation.
Good location.

We had a great stay in this apartment. 2 adults and 3 children and there was plenty of room. Great location...we walked easily into time square and to Central Park. Check in was great...Allan was there to meet us when we arrived. Thanks for the great time!

Angela's place is in a great location. The apartment is right in the heart of Hell's Kitchen, close to many theaters and restaurants.
The place is as described and can accommodate five to six guest easily. The beds are great.
Angela's assistant was very helpful and available to come over when we needed an extra set of sheets and a couple extra towels.

The only issue was that I'd asked if we could leave the luggage before check-in. At first I was told it was a possibility, in case there were no other guests. On the day we had to check-in, the apartment was being vacated and cleaned. When we made it to Manhattan from the airport, I informed Angela's assistant that we had arrived a bit early (about two hours before check-in) and we would be waiting outside if she couldn't let us leave the bags early. 
Apparently, this was a big issue, because just by waiting on a public sidewalk, we would be disturbing the tenants of the building. Just mentioning that we would be waiting outside prompted several messages from Angela that were pretty rude. 
"My assistant told you four times already check-in is at 3 pm" (we only wanted to leave our bags) "Find a coffee shop or something" and so on. While I do understand check-in is at a certain time, I have been to many Airbnbs that have made it possible for me and other guests to leave their luggage. 
I just would have preferred a simple NO in the beginning and I wouldn't have asked again.
In the end, even before I got the messages from both owner and assistant, my friends and I had gone to a nearby restaurant, heavy bags in tow, and waited to check in at 3:00 o'clock.

I did like the convenience of the apartment, but it wasn't as clean as I would have liked it to be. The washer and dryer had mold stains and the rug in the living room felt like it hadn't been vacuumed in a while.
Other than this, it was a pleasant stay. 
If you're looking for a convenient place with no frills, this is the place for you.
Great place to stay

Great apartment in a quiet street which is easily accessible to Times Square and Central Park.  Tons of restaurants and bars within easy walking distance and a couple of grocery stores for soda/milk.
Access was easy and the accommodation was great for 2 couples.  There is another double bed available, but the apartment may be a little cramped with 6.  For those visiting from outside the US, a Roku account is needed to access the TV (if you wish/need to watch).  Highly recommended.

Phenomenal hospitality! The home is accommodating, clean and spacious. Location is key in New York and with this home being located in a central area, you have access to everything and more; dining, transportation and entertainment. You will enjoy your experience! Angela is a great host and I will definitely book again, no question.

If you want to stay in Hell's Kitchen, close to the theater district, Times Square, subway, and a ton of delicious restaurants, this is your spot. It's super clean, very comfortable and with the exception of being a little on the chilly side due to a broken heater in one of the bedrooms, it's a brilliant place to stay, at a super reasonable price. (Mind you the heater problem is probably only temporary and won't matter much once the month of May comes around, and they did supply a nice little space heater that helped take the chill out of the air) In all seriousness location is key with this place. I mean I walked everywhere, but what I really loved was having a washer and dryer! Man oh Man it's good to travel light and wash your clothes. Lastly, I can't forget the hospital of Angela's assist Allen who was our contact point for the stay and he couldn't have been better. Prompt, friendly, and just a cool guy. He even went so far as to ship me back a left behind headset the same day I left it. Thank you Allen. This is a great example of what an airbnb property should be.
Great location, just a few steps to Time Square. Room was very nice, clean and stylish. It is a best idea to stay in NYC, valuable with the price. Host was friendly and supported .
Localización muy céntrica

We loved Angela’s place. Really nothing was wrong about it, everything was super accurate. The decoration was nice as well, very artsy. Though we didn’t see Angela, we got to meet her assistant Allan, who was super helpful from day 1 and very responsive. They were very flexible and friendly when communicating and we will definitely stay there again if possible!!
If we come back to the New York we would stay at this place again. Once we got our bearings we found it close to everything we wanted to do
Great location and wonderful host! Always got a quick and detailed response every time I sent a message. Perfect spot for traveling groups and families. Highly recommend!

Angela’s place was a solid place to stay.  Andy was very responsive, communicated with us quickly and was very gracious about letting us in early and about leaving outmr bags a couple of hours post check out.
The host canceled this reservation 348 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We absolutely loved staying here! Everything was within walking distance and we saw everything we wanted to (when we wernt working during the day). There is a lovely bar called the distillery up on 9th (out the front door turn right then left). Apartment was nice and clean and just what we were after for a business trip. We will be using this apartment again.
Adorable home, great location, very accommodating host. I would definitely stay there again!
Good communication, good location, recommended.

Angela: I can’t thank you enough for extending your place to us.  I am so glad I cancelled the hotel because your place was above and beyond anything we could have gotten at a hotel.  The biggest plus for me was the fact that after a full day of sightseeing, we were able to come back and relax in a comfortable place with more amenities than any hotel could offer.  

The place was convenient to Times Square and many restaurants and other places we were able to walk to. Although it was really cold outside, the house was warm and very comfortable. 
The washer/dryer, Netflix/SlingTV and numerous sleeping arrangement options made the stay perfect for a family. 

Allan was an absolute joy to work with.  He was extremely responsive and very proactive in communicating the details to us.  

I plan to come back to NYC when school is out and I would love to stay again!!

Thank you!
Very good location, close to good restaurants and walking distance to many sightseeing places and shopping

Angela’s place was very nice, comfortable and clean.  Very convenient to Time Square (about a 10 minute walk).   Great access to a huge variety of restaurants.  Walking distance to Penn Station.  Allan checked us in and was very prompt in meeting us and answering texts.  Very close to the theater district and Central Park.  All within walking distance.  There were 6 of us so it was a little difficult getting everyone showered in the same night because the hot water only lasted for about three people but that was not a big deal.  I would definitely stay here again.

We had a great 10 day visit in New York. The location was great, about one block away from subway. Short walk to times square, central park. Great host, easy to contact and we received help when we needed. Place is excactly like described.

We had an amazing week in this spacious apartment, the location was superb and we walked almost everywhere! Only 10mins walk to times sq, 20mins to 5th ave, 10mins to Central Park etc. Very professional host and greeter and we were very pleased with our choice. My only negative feedback was the front bedroom was a little noisy from the street and doors of other block users (but not so noisy that it would stop me going back) Overall the apartment was very clean/modern and if I was to re-visit New York I would stay here again. Also to state the obvious, as a first timer in NYC the place is amazing!!

We were a group of 5 and a baby, having a small reunion and seeing a show together. This apartment was the perfect location for us to walk to the theaters and very convenient to public transit when we went exploring. Checkin and checkout were a breeze, the amenities were excellent, and the building and street were surprisingly quiet for being so centrally located. Price was very competitive and I consider it to be a great value. Overall, we loved our experience here and highly recommend it to others!
Awesome place. You can’t go wrong here.

Very conveniently located to Times Square and lots of restaurants and markets very close by. The apartment was Ultra Modern, clean and comfortable. Large enough for my family of 6 people. expensive and small, but it's Manhattan, so that's normal. Excellent person to check you in and help you throughout your stay.

Angela's place is located in the heart of the city, yet it's on a quiet street. This was a real plus. There was ample sleeping space for our entire family. Being able to stay together as a family made our trip that much more enjoyable.

The pictures are an accurate reflection of Angela’s place. The apartment was bigger than we expected for New York. Also we hit the city on a heat wave and the AC was excellent and much appreciated. The kids also enjoyed Netflix and Stan as we got ready for days out that didn’t see us returning until very late. The closest subway station is still a bit of a walk for kids. Lastly, the towels were a bit thin and worn, and the shower curtains stained but overall we were happy with the air BNB and would recommend.
This is a great place in a central location close to a lot of amazing restaurants. The place is much better than a hotel.

Cuando llegamos al departamento nos dimos cuenta que la fachada no correspondía a las fotos publicadas , es un departamento viejo y pequeño no diseñado para 5 personas .solo tiene 1 baño 
Presentó varios problemas como aire acondicionado con mucho ruido , la habitación principal con Maia aislacion de ruido por lo que se sentía todo el ruido exterior desde muy temprano , una de los televisores nunca funcionó , en varias oportunidades la ducha tenía agua helada . Lo único bueno era la ubicación 
No volvería
Better than advertised!

Angela's place is spotlessly clean and has everything you could need to sleep, eat and relax comfortably and we were a family of 7, youngest 12 years. The location is absolutely perfect. We walked everywhere, liberty cruise(pier 83), central park, empire state, chrysler building, Grand central station, no need for the subway although we didn't explore south manhattan this time as we only had 3 days. Allan met us and was very friendly and helpful, making good suggestions for places to shop and eat. Hells kitchen is rammed with fab quirky restaurants, we went Italian (Uncle Marios), Cheese and wine and America (route 66). Cycle hire is a 20min walk away at most and our car hire for leaving was 10/15 min walk, so convenient. Would highly recommend.

Nous avons été reçu par un jeune homme, Allan, il nous a expliqué qu'il était le représentant de Airbnb à NYC, Angéla n'a pas l'air d'être impliquée dans la location de son appartement ce qui nous déçu parce que nous pensions lui offrir un cadeau. Les photos ne correspondent pas à la réalité, la salle de bain est minuscule,  les joins de la baignoires sont noirs de moisissures, il n'y a pas de verres à dents. Le canapé est usé et sa housse est sale. Le caoutchouc du tambour de la machine à laver le linge est noir de moisissure et n'invite pas à laver son linge. Le climatiseur de la chambre qui donne sur la rue est plus petit que le trou dans le mur, pour combler les vides il y a du polystyrène et du scotch, ce qui donne l'impression de dormir dehors tellement le bruit est dans la chambre. L'appartement est au rez de chaussé collé aux deux portes de l'immeuble qui claquent très fort à chaque entrée et sortie, ça nous faisaient sursauter surtout le matin au lit. on a été envahis par des moucherons alors qu'on avait presque pas de poubelle puisqu'on mangeaient dehors et on a dû acheter un insecticide. Un problème surement  récurent et un insecticide devrait être mis à la disposition des locataires. A notre arrivée les draps étaient humides et dépareillés. Les oreillers sans les taies. La télévision de la chambre ne diffusait que  Netflix. L'appartement n'est pas proche de Times Square, il y a une trotte et comme il a plut toute la semaine c'était une galère pour se déplacer. Nous sommes déçus et nous ne le conseillons pas surtout qu'il n'est pas donné.

Best location ever! Less than 10 minutes walking to Times Square and a lot of grocery stores and restaurants nearby. The flat had everything we needed and Allan and Angela provided us all the Information we wanted and answered always very quickly. I would really recommend it!

We had arranged an early check in but there was some mix up and Angela hadn’t let Allan know about our arrival. We had to wait at nearby cafe for a couple of hours. Alan was very accommodating and friendly so that made up for the inconvenience. The place itself is in a great location, it was clean but definitely needs a repaint. A lot of marks on walls etc but I suppose with an Airbnb it’s expected. 
The only other thing I’d mention was the noise from the upstairs tenant. Could hear them stomping from one end of the floor to the other. We were so tired after walking all day we slept regardless but if you’re a light sleeper it may grind. 
Overall we had a great time and I’d definitely return.
A well located apartment and good layout however in need of some maintenance.

The location of the apartment was great, and considering how central it is the street it was on was relatively quiet.

We stayed with our young daughter, and unfortunately, on arrival, the apartment had none of the items it listed for children, including the baby cot or the high chair. This would have been a big issue, but the hosts assistant Allan was brilliant. He ran across town to pick up a travel cot and brought it back within the hour.

The front bedroom is pretty noisy at the weekend but absolutely fine during the week.

Brilliant breakfast spots and bars all just a short walk away.

All in all, it was a great stay at a pretty good apartment.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Host didn't tell us they were cancelling. We showed up to check in, couldn't contact host and then had to find out through AirBNB that she was cancelling.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 80 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Sunny Room (for One) Minutes from Coogee Beach!
summary: Close to Coogee Beach, Ritz Cinema, University of New South Wales (UNSW), Prince of Wales Hospital, Randwick Racecourse, bars, restaurants, shops, public transport... Yet, in a very quite suburb.
space: This renovated 70's style building is located in a small block close to Royal Randwick shopping centre, Fred Hollows Reserve and transport.  Features include: near new kitchen with gas stove, bathroom with quality fittings. Communal laundry. Your bedroom: spacious bedroom with a comfy queen size bed, soft pillows, clean bed linen, bedside stools, bedside light, built-in wardrobe, drawers, blinds and fluffy carpet. Big window with street views.
description: Close to Coogee Beach, Ritz Cinema, University of New South Wales (UNSW), Prince of Wales Hospital, Randwick Racecourse, bars, restaurants, shops, public transport... Yet, in a very quite suburb. This renovated 70's style building is located in a small block close to Royal Randwick shopping centre, Fred Hollows Reserve and transport.  Features include: near new kitchen with gas stove, bathroom with quality fittings. Communal laundry. Your bedroom: spacious bedroom with a comfy queen size bed, soft pillows, clean bed linen, bedside stools, bedside light, built-in wardrobe, drawers, blinds and fluffy carpet. Big window with street views. Living room (TV, dinning table), kitchen, bathroom. The flat has 3 bedrooms and fixed residents are a couple: Cindy from Brazil and Claudio from Italy. There is your bedroom (Airbnb) and a guest bedroom we plan to turn to a home office soon. We both work full time during the week and have busy schedules, but when home we like to cook, chat and watch TV t
neighborhood_overview: Randwick is a suburb in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney, in the state of New South Wales, Australia. Randwick is located 6 km of the Sydney CBD and our home is less than 3 km of famous Coogee Beach.
notes: We like to keep the place clean and organised, so we request that you help us to maintain the house as you found.
transit: - Close to Transport - Close to Shops, Pubs and Restaurants - 15 minutes walk to beautiful Coogee Beach - 10 minutes walk to Prince of Wales Hospital  - 15 minutes walk to our traditional Ritz cinema - 20 minutes walk to University of New South Wales (UNSW Australia) - 30 minutes walk to Randwick Racecourse (Royal Randwick - Australian Turf Club) - 30 minutes to Sydney city (by bus)
access: Living room (TV, dinning table), kitchen, bathroom.
interaction: The flat has 3 bedrooms and fixed residents are a couple: Cindy from Brazil and Claudio from Italy. There is your bedroom (Airbnb) and a guest bedroom we plan to turn to a home office soon. We both work full time during the week and have busy schedules, but when home we like to cook, chat and watch TV together. We rarely party at home and our place is nice and quiet. If we do have friends over, we will advice Airbnb guest in advance. We're looking forward to meeting you and will do our best to welcome you so that you feel as staying with friends.
house_rules: > Guests are not allowed to bring their own guests into our home.  > No parties allowed. > To ensure we keep the carpet clean for our guests’ enjoyment, we have a NO SHOES policy inside our home. > Guests will be responsible for the cost of having the lock replaced in case of lost key. > Whilst we do a thorough professional clean between each guest stay, we kindly ask that you clean and put away any dishes or kitchenware used. It helps us get through our cleaning process quicker. > Since this is a share house we kindly ask guests to refrain from entering the hosts' bedroom and varanda. We’ll ensure your space is likewise respected in return. > To prevent plumbing problems, we kindly ask you to please place things other than toilet paper in the sanitary bin we’ve provided in the bathroom.  > What you do in your personal time is entirely up to you, but when staying at our place we have a strict no drug use policy. This is just the law… not so much one of our rules. > To keep our costs do

host.host_about:
Me:
I'm Brazilian living in Australia since 2010. I speak Portuguese and English and I love meeting new people from different cultures and languages!

As host:
I hosted over 80 people in 2 years of Airbnb and we earned Super Hosts status 2 years in a row! 
My husband Claudio is Italian and I'm Brazilian. We work from home and we are very fast replying guest messages when we are not here to answer in person. Despite our apartment being small, we have a comfortable size bedroom with a double bed and many cosy pillows so you can relax and rest after exploring Sydney! Also, we are 15 minutes walking distance to Coogee Beach (our favourite!).

As a traveller: 
I prefer quiet and relaxing homes and when travelling I barely stay on my Airbnb room as I am constantly exploring. I like to chat with my hosts to find out the best places to eat and see from a local's point of view as well as building friendship with my hosts.
I either travel alone or with my Italian husband Claudio.

reviews.comments: This is a great place to stay! Very clean and fresh apartment, close to beautiful coogee beach and easy to travel around in Sydney. The hosts are great, made you feel welcome and had good communication. I strongly recommend this place!

Cindy is lovely, easy going and very pleasant to talk to. The house was very cozy and clean. Slightly away from the city but has bus right outside that goes directly to the city which is very good. There are many buses slightly longer opposite which takes about 5-10min walk. In the same area, it has restaurants and other shops so it pretty good and near all you need. Close to beautiful Coogee beach as well. Nice to stay at Cindy place.

The location of Cindy's house is great, quite accessible from the city. You can walk to the Coogee beach easily. The neighbourhood looked safe and is very quiet. Due to my busy schedule I couldn't spend much time at Cindy's house and chat with her. But the evening we met and sat down for a chat was great. She's kind, funny and very helpful. I wish her all the best and hope her place will be available when I visit Sydney next time.

Cindy is kind, lovely and easy going. Her house is nice,clean and also  quite at night. There are many buses  around there and restaurants just in walkable distance.  I stayed there during my final exam period, and I felt like at home. Nice to stay at Cindy's place !

Ich habe der Aufenthalt bei Cindy und Miki total genossen. Obwohl wir uns in den 3 Tagen kaum gesehen und gesprochen haben, hatte ich immer das Gefühl willkommen zu sein und habe mich total wohlgefühlt. Ein schöner Aufenthalt. Die Stadt ist schnell mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen und trotzdem liegt die Unterkunft ruhig. Alles in allem ein sehr schönes wenn auch einfach eingerichtetes Zimmer. Alles sauber und gemütlich. Vielen Dank nochmals.
This was a lovely home for a short stay. Cindy and Miki were welcoming, nice and informative. Cindy is punctual with her responses to messages.
I loved that the place was in a quiet area and close to Coogee Beach. From there you can do the Coast Walk to Bondi Beach which is amazing.
A nice place to stay. well equipped:)

This place is great!
Cindy & Miki are lovely hosts and make their guests welcome.
The room is very nice & the location of the apartment is good because Coogee beach is approx 20 mins walk away & bus stops outside lead to the City & Coogee beach.
I recommend this place for your stay in Randwick :-)

The room was exactly as described, small but cozy and comfortable. Ideal for a short stay! It was very clean, and Cindy and Miki absolutely lovely hosts.
Located close to shops, restaurants and the beach it was only a short bus ride into central Sydney.
Highly recommend it!
Ambiente agradável, limpo e bem localizado. Recomendo!

Lovely stay at Cindy and Micky's place, the location is quite convenient, although space of the room is a bit small. But it is so nice that Cindy provide me with fans in this hot weather! Rooms are also clean and elegant.
Great place to stay! Cindy was a great host. Check in and out was easy. Good advice on where to eat out.
The room is really cosy and the bathroom is nice and clean. It was a good place to stay in Sydney eventhough it's not in the inner city, because the bus stop is right in front of the door. :)
Fantastic! Very comfortable, clean and neat. Road noise started early but wasn't too bad.

I didn't really want to leave! This is a great place. The location is fantastic, 10 mins to beach, 5 mins to shops and bus stops directly outside the building. Couldn't ask for better. There is only one negative I can think of and even this is minor, no offer of teas or coffees for the morning. But that really doesn't take away from how much I enjoyed my stay! The bedroom was pretty much perfect, very comfortable. Bed was amazing! The apartment itself is very clean and tidy. And Cindy the host was great too! So friendly and welcoming. There is no doubt that I would definitely go back to this AirBnB room. Big thanks to Cindy for having me.
Cindy is a wonderful host, I had an awesome time during my stay in Sydney! The place is close to Randwick and public transport and not far from the city by bus.

No need to transfer to the city. This place is a good location and nice host:)
Just wifi connection is not so good. 
I had a good sleep at there.
I didn't see too much of Cindy or Miki, but they were both lovely! Great apartment, super comfy bed and spotlessly clean. Thanks guys!

I havent met Cindy but her communication prior the checkin was perfect. I met Miki and her bf and they were really friendly and welcoming. I really enjoyed my chats with them and my stay was perfect. Highly recommend! I had a great time, 20 min walking distance only from Coogee beach and the start of the coastal walk.

I had a good time staying with Cindy and Miki (although I saw Miki just one time). The room is cozy, comfortable and clean, so is the bathroom. The apartment has a great connection to public transport which allows you to be at Bondi Beach or downtown in about 30 minutes. I also enjoyed that there are restaurants close by.
Cindy was welcoming and a great host.
I would come again.

Awesome quiet place, yet right near everything you'd want. I stayed at Cindy' s place for 3 nights. Not once did I need a cab. There's a bus stop right at the front door, which is great since Australia's public transportation system is so convienant . Theres a fun lively area right near there with bars and restaurants. Getting in contact with Cindy was very easy. I would stay at Cindy's again.

Cindy is extremely helpful and friendly. 
The place is lovely and cozy. 
and very clean & tidy.
There is close to bus stops & beach
So easy to go where you want.
There is perfect room for single travellers
I hope to stay here when i come to Australia again .
Thank you  again to Cindy & Miki :)
Location was perfect for attending a workshop at the local University. Somewhere to sleep, friendly, clean and comfortable. Was able to walk to Coogee beach in 20 mins and the Uni.
I really enjoyed my three-nights stayed in Cindy's apartment. It's clean, quite, comfortable and has a good location.
Room located in a nice suburb, easily accessible to beaches and the airport
Clean, organised, well set up.
Welcoming friendly easy going host. Clean unit. Perfect location!

I really enjoyed staying at Cindy's place. She was friendly and helpful. The apartment was in a great location and so convenient to supermarket and cafes, everything was in walking distance and a short walk to Coogee beach.

Location is perfect! Transportation wasn't a problem at all during my stay. The place is really neat and warm. Everything is great! Checking in and out are really convenient too. I really enjoyed my stay!

Cindy's place is a small, clean and cosy room to explore Sydney. Cindy and Mikki are friendly and helpful and gave me my own space. It is near Coogee beach but I missed a chance to go to the beach due to the rain while I was there. It is near several buses to get into town and also near cafes, restaurants and shops.

This is a very comfortable room in a lovely little flat. It's in a great location - close to UNSW and Coogee Beach, and the 374 bus line into the cbd is right outside. 

Excellent value for money, great communication with Cindy - highly recommend.

Transportation is convenient, there are several bus routes to city within 30 minutes. Cindy's room is good for holiday and relaxation, it is near Coogee Beach and different parks. There also have shopping center, restaurants and supermarkets.  I will definitely recommend this room to all of you^^
Enjoyed staying with Cindy and socializing a bit with her and her roommate. The space was very comfortable and in a convenient location to Randwick and Coogee Beach.
People were friendly and the communication was great.
It was really nice stay. Room was really nice and very cosy. Everything was perfect. Cindy is very friendly and helpful host. Probably, my best experience of AirBnb so far.

Cindy's place was comfortable, clean and quiet. Cindy was easy to comunicate with. The apartment included a comfy bed, a good shower, well equiped kitchen in a convenient location with a bus stop out the front door. 

Thank you, Cameron

I stayed with Cindy while working at the University in Sydney for few days. The apartment is cosy, tidy and comfortable, well located close to everything (including the uni, Coogee beach, restaurants, cafes, supermarket, and a short bus ride to the city centre). Cindy and Claudio are a very welcoming couple, smart and friendly.

Cindy and Claudio's place is very clean and smells fresh. I was in Sydney for work and needed to stay near UNSW. The location was perfect for me, walking distance to work, as well as walking distance to beautiful Coogee beach. There are a couple of nice restaurants nearby for food, as well as some nice cafe, though I only tried 22 Grams by Cindy's recommendation (and liked it so much that went there for breakfast twice more!). My room (which looks like they are turning into a home office) was small and cosy, and had all I needed. Several towels, a rack for clothes, as well as hot water bottle and a small heater that were very useful as Sydney was rather cold during my stay. The only non-pleasant point w.r.t. my stay was the very loud banging noise that was due to the construction in the building (upstairs I think). It would start rather early (sometime between 7 and 8). So if you are not a very early riser, and are booking in very near future, I recommend checking with Cindy and Claudio as to the level of noise. Otherwise, I had a great stay and highly recommend this place, specially if you want to be near Coogee as well as UNSW.
房间非常的干净,设备齐全,就是初到澳洲,英语不行,也没跟房东多交流交流,总体不错,好评!

Everything about my stay with Cindy and Claudio had been lovely. Their cozy apartment was the perfect place to go home to after a day spent out exploring Sydney. The room was so comfortable, their place was accessible to everywhere quite easily and I had a totally wonderful experience altogether. My brief encounter with them also showed how friendly they are. This place is definitely recommended and I wouldnt hesitate to stay here again if I'm back in Sydney. Cheers. :)

Cindy and Claudio were lovely, interesting, and welcoming. Communication was excellent, check in and check out flexible, the apartment was spotlessly clean, and the room was nicely equipped. It’s a residential street conveniently close to cafes, shops, and public transport. Less than 20 mins walk to UNSW.
Lovely couple who make you feel at home.  Perfect place for what I was looking for. Clean, close to the uni and lots of shops around.

Super logement sur Sydney : a 20min a pied de Coogee beach, très bien relié au centre et a l'aéroport avec un arret de bus face à l'appartement, commerces à proximité, jolie deco et surtout l'accueil  de Cindy et Claudio était adorable  ! Merci encore, Je recommande !

Die Wohnung und das Zimmer waren sehr sauber und alles war vorhanden, wie beschrieben. Zum Strand sind es nur 15 Minuten und die Stadt ist mit dem Bus problemlos zu erreichen. Mit Cindy und Claudio habe ich mich super verstanden und ich würde das Zimmer immer wieder buchen.

Tolles Zimmer mit einem sehr sauberen Bad in unmittelbarer Umgebung zum Coogee Beach. Zu Fuß ist dieser in 10 Minuten zu erreichen. Cindy und ihr Mann sind jederzeit für Fragen zu erreichen und ein super Gastgeber. Ein Zimmer welches ich sofort weiterempfehlen kann, hier bist du für einen Aufenthalt in Sydney perfekt aufgehoben.

Very nice place to stay, really clean and cute !
Close to the beach and not too far from the city and airport.
Cindy was really nice and helpful ! 
I will be back :D
Cindy and claudio have been very helpful and friendly. Thank you guys so much!! can just recommend your flat to everyone else who's travelling on his own. Hope to see you again
That’s my second time with Cindy & Claudio and it was great again! :-)
Cindy is very welcoming and her place is very sweet, clean, has everything you would need and close to both the beach and shops

Absolutely lovely stay! Very clean and comfortable, in a wonderfully quiet area. 
Location was perfect and access to public transport was a breeze. Hosts were friendly and accommodating - I will definitely be staying again. Thanks so much! :)
I really enjoy my stay here. Cindy’s house is really cozy and very comfortable. And both Cindy and Claudio are very nice person. I will live here again the next time I come to Sydney.

Cindy and Claudio were both amazing hosts! Their apartment is very clean, cosy, and comfy. The location is great, next to many shops and Coogee Beach. Would definitely recommend for someone who needs a quick stay near UNSW or someone who is new to Sydney.

Had a short and sweet stay in Sydney. Cindy was very welcoming and friendly from the moment I arrived. Perfect location with easy accessible transport routes into the city and wherever I wanted to go. Would defiantly stay here again in the future.
I don’t wanna say anything. I was expelled.

Great apartment - lovely and airy. Cindy and Claudio are calm and peaceful, and the decor reflects their personalities. The bedroom faces a main road, but it is surprisingly quiet at night and didn't bother me. The location is great - you can walk to Coogee beach, the racecourse, the university; and the restaurants/supermarkets are very close. Randwick is a really cool suburb for travellers in Sydney to visit, so I'd definitely recommend a few nights in this BnB.
It is a very clean and cozy place. Little far from the main city thogh but if you want to stay close to the beaches, it is the perfect location. I really enjoyed my stay here.

What a lovely stay! The apartment is spotlessly clean, and the bed is very comfortable. It is a 20 minute walk to Coogee Beach, but several supermarkets and a fitness centre are less than 10 minutes walk away.
Had a great stay with Cindy and Claudio. Highly recommend to anyone looking for somewhere in the Randwick/Coogee area.
Great place to stay, really nice hosts, super clean place, comfy bed.

I had a nice stay at Cindy's place. Cindy and Claudio are very friendly. The room is spacious, clean and comfortable. The location is great, with only a short walk to restaurants, shops and supermarkets. It is also very easy to get into the city center as the bus stop is just in front of the house. I would love to come back  when I visit Sydney next time.
Nice and close to UNSW, clean, great communication, good wifi. Overall excellent.
Cindy and Claudio were welcoming and helpful. Bed was very comfortable, plenty of clothes storage, handy to bus stop to Sydney  and coogee. Shop close
Cindy has an unbeatable location and is one of the friendliest, most organised hosts I've stayed with :)

The room was so clean and cozy and it was pretty big space for a person 
they were really thoughtful , polite and friendly 
i didn't have to wait to use a bathroom 
i'd love to go there again
Sunny room in very central location close to everything.
Travelled solo to sydney and it was nice to have a great cosy place to stay in!!! The place is super clean and the hosts are so welcoming!!! Cant wait to be back the next trip ^^
worthwhile
Perfect room and perfect host

As my previous stay, I had a very comfortable stay at Cindy's place. The room is spacious, clean and very comfortable! Only a few minutes walk to the major shops and restaurants and the public bus stop is just at the door. Highly recommended!
The apartment is in a great location, very clean and excellent value. Thank you Cindy and Claudio!
Cindy’s place is fantastic! 15 mins walk to Coogee Beach, 15mins to UNSW, bus to city is just in front of your door. The room is very clean and cozy, really sweet home for travelers.
Cindy's house is very clean and awesome. and They are very kind. So I can enjoy for my travel in sydney. I strongly suggest for you.
Clean and friendly. The bed is big and comfortable

The house of Cindi and Claudio is a very good place to stay Sydney, is only a few minutes walk to the beach and is easy to take a bus to the city.
The flat is clean and tidy and the bedroom is very comfortable, Cindi and Claudio always help me whit all the questions I had, very kind people.
I recommend the place. 



La casa de Cindi y Claudio es un muy buen lugar para conocer Sydney, queda a pocos minutos de la playa y es muy fácil tomar el bus para ir a La Ciudad. la casa es muy limpia y la habitación es muy cómoda, Cindi y Claudio siempre me ayudaron con cualquier duda que tuve y siempre muy amables, muy recomendado.

Sorry for my late comment.This house is super good.I like it very much ,near the Coogee beach and it is very quiet area.Cindy and Claudio are very nice .Especially the koala on the bed,very cute.And also sweet recommendations:)I will choose again next time when I go to Sydney
Lovely room, good location, and friendly hosts.

This is a wonderful place to stay. Cindy has everthing thought through for her guests, from the late-night check in to the neighbourhood information and hand-labelled little shampoo bottles in the room. Lovely neighborhood, quick walk to UNSW and verv convenient to catch the bus into the city.
Cindy was very welcoming and easy to communicate with. The space was everything I expected, and it made my weekend easy and comfortable. Thank you!

Cindy is a really kind host and I loved to stay at her place. The room is cozy and perfect for one person.  Coogee beach is not far away and if you need to get to the city centre, then there is a bus stop just around the corner.  I would recommend and return again.
Cindy was lovely and welcoming, the room was bright and airy and very clean. I’d highly recommend staying here
Nice flat, great location for getting to the beach and into the city. Comfy bed.

Cindy and Claudio exceeded my expectations. They were very welcoming, quick to respond and took such good care of me (I had indigestion one night and Cindy gave me meds)! I really felt like I was staying with friends. Also, they keep their place very neat and clean. Would stay again! And again! Thanks so much guys!
Nice location, close to UNSW and Coogee beach. Cindy and Claudio were very hospitable. The place was very clean. I would not hesitate to stay with them again.
Everything’s was good

Great apartment! Super clean and tidy, comfy bed and overall homey place to stay. Super close to the beach and very easily accessible to the city! Would highly recommend and very much enjoyed my stay there!

I would not recommend staying here, I did not feel comfortable at all. I felt like a bother or as if I was in their way. Claudio never introduced himself to me which made it very awkward to stay with them, he only spoke to me on the last night of my stay. Overall my experience was not great, the hosts were not very welcoming and I would recommend going somewhere else.
Highly recommend Cindy and her place. They were awesome and the room was perfect and great value.

I enjoy the overall experience. - Cindy is very nice, thoughtful and willing to help and her husband is friendly. -The bedroom was clean and cosy. -It's convenient to go to the City and Coogee beach by bus.
Cindy and her husband are really kind and helpful hosts. We had good conversations and they felt like good friends to me. It was great to stay with them!
Claudio and Cindy are a really nice and friendly couple. You can ask them anything. Also the room was very nice and clean. Great place to stay!
lovely place, very close and easy access to beaches and city!  lovely couple very kind and helpful! couldn't praise them higher.

Cindy and Claudio are such a greatly couple and wonderful hosts! Their home has everything you need for a great stay and even more. I barely slept that well anywhere than in this bed. Cindy and Claudio are always down for a chat and answer any questions. On top, they have been super flexible with my arrival and departure. Thanks for the pleasant stay and hope to see you soon!
Friendly couple who give you your space when required. Very comfortable bed. Close to bus stop and 15 minute walk to Coogee beach. Thank you for a great stay!

name: Price Right Great Waikiki Location
summary: Our studio is 2 blocks to Waikiki beach and International Market Place.Comfortable, easy cooking for the efficient traveler.A/C ,Portable Twin bed ,high chair,and playpen available for a small daily fee. 日本語でお気軽にお問合せ下さい｡
description: Our studio is 2 blocks to Waikiki beach and International Market Place.Comfortable, easy cooking for the efficient traveler.A/C ,Portable Twin bed ,high chair,and playpen available for a small daily fee. 日本語でお気軽にお問合せ下さい｡ Onsite Manager for security and questions, Coin operated Laundry facilities 1 block to Bus Stop. Additional guest can be added as long as the portable twin bed has been reserved. The cost of adding a guest is $20.00 per day.
notes: Additional guest can be added as long as the portable twin bed has been reserved. The cost of adding a guest is $20.00 per day.
transit: 1 block to Bus Stop.
access: Onsite Manager for security and questions, Coin operated Laundry facilities
house_rules: Our building has mature tenants so renters need to be respectful and honor quiet times

reviews.comments: Great location ! They were quick at responding to any issues we had and their werent really any big ones. would use this place again for sure!

This place was super convenient for exploring the Waikiki area and for heading to the beach (5-10 min walk). 
There was an on-site building manager who we could contact for any questions. Trans Pacific provided great pre-trip communication as well which made our arrival run smoothly. All amenities listed were provided.
Everything was very nice, just as expected, a great value and that is all I can ask for plus the hosts were attentive, helpful and pleasant, the location is great and it was a pleasure staying here!

Location was great.  Parking was great. Very clean and safe.  You will need to bring earplugs in order to get a good night sleep.  It is on the third floor but the street traffic noise is very loud.  My favorite was the delivery truck backing down the entire street at 3 am followed by a Harley group at four.  The location and the price far out weigh this issue so it still gets a five star from me.  Also John, the onsite guy was very helpful and quick to reply to text and calls.  I would stay here again if I was traveling solo.

l'host è stato sempre disponibile e veloce nelle risposte alle mie esigenze... l'appartamento era pulito e necessita di cio' che puo' servirti per una vacanza alla hawaii... c'è il minimo indispensabile... la posizione dell'appartamento è in ottima posizione meno di 5 minuti a piedi dalla spiaggia di waikiki e vicino a negozi e in qualsiasi posto si vuole andare.... poi molto comodo se per caso avrete un auto grazie al parcheggio free , che in quella zona è impossibile parcheggiare tutta zona rimozione e i parcheggi privati costano moltissimo..
consigliato a tutti... grazie

The apartment is clean n cosy.  The location is perfect.  Car parking is great.  John is a super host. Thank you John! Go all out to help your stay as pleasant as possible and attend to your query almost immediately. Highly recommended! :))
約1週間滞在しましたが､なに不自由なく生活できました｡ﾜｲｷｷ中心部にも近く､交通も便利で快適でした｡安いしまた利用したいと思いました｡ありがとうございました｡
Great place to stay. Few minutes walk to the beach. The host respond to our request quickly. Recommend this place if you are looking for a good deal. Free parking was a perks for me.

Beauty is definitely on the inside.  It's centrally located in Waikiki, a couple of blocks off the main road. The exterior does look a little rough (almost feels like a motel). However, once you open the door, the inside has been fully upgraded.  The bathroom is a little small, but otherwise it's well-equipped.  I'd recommend this place if you are looking to be centrally located and save a few $.  Owner is very responsive and super friendly.

This place is fantastic! 5/5 stars. The location is ideal for the main hub in Waikiki. Conveniently located near  supermarkets, restaurants, and bus stops (including to/from the airport). The place is safe and secure too. Last but not least, John has been very helpful to answer any questions and we enjoyed our stay. Great value for money and I highly recommend this place!

Really good communication with the hosts. They let us leave our luggage at the appartment early the first day
so we could go visit the city. They are flexible. They are always present if we have questions. We really enjoy our 5 days in Waikiki.
