This little studio apt. has a great Waikiki location, at a very good rate.  Well suited for 1 or 2 people, and perhaps one child.  It was very clean and has been remodeled I'm sure.
The building is very close to the action in Waikiki.... lots of shopping & restaurants within a few blocks,  just a short walk to the ocean (2-3 blocks).  It's very busy in the Waikiki area, therefore lots of traffic, busses, scooters... can be loud... recommend sleeping with earplugs if you have trouble sleeping.  It has a nice big TV with cable, wifi, full size refrigerator, small 4 burner stove and small oven, micorwave, very nice dining table with 3 chairs.  One bed sleeps 2 people and the other is for 1 person.  The linens were very nice and clean, good pillows.  The view is of the neighboring apt. buildings.  It has 1 off-street covered parking place, which is an excellent asset.  If you want to be in the Waikiki area and don't want to spend a fortune at the hotels, I recommend this studio apt.
The location is great, it is just a few minutes from the city. There is also a parking space available and the hosts are really helpful
good rant house, near to beach
The apartment is located at the Waikiki beach,it's so great.Also the house is very clean,I really like it.

This is a great place to stay for a great price. The only downfall was that the bathroom was to small to move around in and it was somewhat a noisy neighborhood. I would say this unit is more for maximum 2 adults or 2 adults and one child.

Wir hatten ein paar schöne Tage in John's Wohnung. Persönlich habe ich ihn nur kurz getroffen, aber da war er sehr nett. Die Kommunikation vor der Reise hat super geklappt und durch einen hinterlegten Schlüssel konnten wir ganz flexibel anreisen und es war kein Problem, dass wir erst um 23 Uhr ankamen. 
Für einen Start einer Hawaii Reise kann ich die Wohnung für ein paar Tage gut empfehlen. Sie liegt zentral in Honolulu, nur wenige Straßen vom Waikiki Beach entfernt. 
Da das Bett allerdings direkt am Fenster zur Straße steht, ist die Nacht etwas unruhig und das Bad ist sehr klein.
Ein guter Start in den Urlaub

The hosts were very quick with their communication with us when we arrived and any time we had a question. They live close to the room and are willing to come by and help with anything. The apartment was as advertised; it had everything we needed. The bathroom was a little small but, other than that, no complaints! The place is nice and close to the Waikiki action. It is loud if a few drunk tourists walk by or if a truck rumbles down the street, but it is removed from nightlife noise. Great value! Highly recommended!!

The host was very friendly and available for any questions. The place was comfortable, clean, restroom small & tight but it did the job. Location is great walking distance to beach, shops, restaurants.

The apartment is really central, 2 blocks from the beach and the "Duke". For a short stay at waikiki beach it is the best choice, if you want to spare your money bag. You get some towels, a lot of beach gear and have a big fridge, cooker and coffeemachine for using. A lot of Restaurants a few steps away. We really liked it and would come back! Thanks so much!!!
John is a wonderful host. We stained at his condo for 16 nights and it was amazing. I wish to stay longer. See you soon.

This place is about proximity, affordability and ohana: It's one of the old quirky budget apartment units that are constantly being encroached upon and subsumed by designer malls and name-brand hotels. Parking spot is invaluable. Unit is accessible by three short flights of stairs. Air conditioning unit is controlled by "light" switch next to the bathroom.

This is a great spot (only a few blocks to beach and stores) with available parking, air conditioning and has everything one would need for a comfortable stay in HI. The host lives nearby and is also very nice and  very responsive to any questions.

Great location at a great price.  It exceeded my expectations.  Management lives on site and were always around if we needed something.  If you're looking to be near Waikiki on a budget this is a great spot.
Awesome property manager very helpful with local destinations

This place was exactly as described.  We had three adults with us and we had plenty of room. The bathroom as a bit on the small side. The best part about this apartment is the location. It's right in the heart of Waikiki and walking distance to literally everything. The hosts were great to communicate with and quick to respond to any of our questions. We will definitely be back!

The hosts are very considerate and communicate well. I would say that they had the best price for all the amenities that are not available in most airbnbs in Waikiki like air conditioning, stove/oven and a TV. The pictures and description are exactly how it is. Although there are some drawbacks like tiny ants at the kitchen counter and sinks. As well as extremely loud engines around 3 am every night (even though the windows are fully shut it is still very loud, and I am a heavy sleeper). These are things that can be ignored. The hosts would respond within minutes of an inquiry. Overall I was very satisfied with my stay and what really made this place great was the communication with the amazing hosts. Would I stay with them again? Yes. Would I recommend them? Yes, if they want a great deal and cheap prices.
This apartment is exactly as described so my expectations were met. It was clean and had the necessary basics. The owners were responsive, kind and accommodating. Hope to visit again soon!
Close to all the action in Waikiki. If you don't mind some city noise, the place was clean, and having a parking spot in Waikiki is key. Great value and communication from the host was solid.

given grate room and kindly help?
enjoyed

Exceeded expectations! Location is central to Waikiki transportation and shopping / restaurants, apartment is well-stocked, hosts are courteous and friendly, and you would be hard pressed to find better value for lodging for a vacation.

We couldn't have ask for anything better than what we got! The unit is very clean and it has all the comforts you might need during your stay in Waikiki. Very close to the beach, shops and restaurants (5min walking)

This home was perfect for our stay. Very central in Waikiki. We could walk to the beach, great restaurants, and the freeway wasn't too far. We could communicate easily with the owner when needed. I would stay here again. Thanks John!
ｵｱﾌ島で1泊のみの利用が出来､かつｺｽﾊﾟを考えるならお勧めします｡ただし3階建でｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰがないので荷物の運び込みは苦労しました｡ｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑ的に利用したい方向きです｡建物は古めですが､清潔で何でも揃っています｡wifiも完備されていて無料で利用出来ます｡使い方はｵｰﾅｰに聞く必要がありますが｡
really enjoyed our stay here. the apartment was perfect for our stay, and the location was perfect. just a quick walk down to the beach. recommended.

This place worked out great for me and my 2 boys.  Originally from Oahu and just needed something simple with a descent price. John is awesome! He was already outside doing some work and greeted us. Helped with our luggage to our studio.  When we checked in we looked around to see what we needed to buy because there are thing's already there that you might not have to spend on. There's bath towels,  beach towels, some toiletries. Check behind the medicine cabinet, there's some sunblock and stuff. There's a first aid kit in the closet by the front door. There's beach mats, floaties, hair dryer, and more. The kitchen has dishes, cups, silverware, pots, and even a crockpot. Parking is right under the building. We felt safe and didn't  have to worry about anything. You will see people walking up and down this street and it is a one way street that drives towards the Ala Wai canal. Waikiki beach is a few blocks away. Food pantry (grocery store) and a coffee shop inside Food pantry is a block away. The bathroom is small but suffice. For the price it was great and with a friendly guy like John and his lady friend, I'm glad I got the chance to meet them.  They are both amazing!!! Thanks again for welcoming us and all the help when we needed you!! Mahalo nui loa a hui hou kakou!
We had a wonderful time there. The flat was really nice and really well located ! And the communication was perfect. I recommand it 200 % . Thank you for everything

Perfect location, highly recommendable. 
Excellent communication, Thank you very much!

The apartment is exactly what we were expecting. Just a small studio with a couple beds, bathroom, and sufficient kitchen. We knew all we needed was a place to sleep and this certainly was just fine for 2. Would I put more than 2 people in here? Probably not. You'd be pretty crowded if trying to "hang out" in the room at all. Just a couple blocks from the main happenings and beaches of Waikiki but tucked back enough that it wasn't loud. Hosts were very responsive and nearby. Overall I'd definitely stay here again.
Great location! Good place, let us add an extra person last minute for no extra cost! Easy to find, great communication.

John was a class act from the beginning. He answered all my questions in a timely fashion and was able to accommodate my concerns, especially for checking in very late (key lockbox) and also supplying a parking spot. Parking in Waikiki is a premium and that definitely took alot of stress out of my vacation. The location of the AirBnB can't be beat. It's walking distance to everything in Waikiki, really in the middle of it all so you can easily turn left to the Zoo end or right to the Hilton end. John was able to provide extra perks like snorkel sets and beach gear free of charge. You really can't get that at hotels. Yes, the bathroom is tiny and the place isn't the most lux, but it's clean, convenient, and has everything you need, great for budget travellers. When returning to Hawaii, I will definitely remember my stay at John's.

We had a great time apartment was clean and had all you would need  . Location was great short walk to beach and bars restaurants  good supermarket near by 
Apartment contained all we needed for cooking  and many other extras as well 
Hosts were great  communication was excellent and they were so nice and friendly 
Would book again

John is a great host and the location of his place is perfect. Everything is within a walking distance, the beach, the shops, bus stops to almost everywhere on the island. The condo is a little too small, especially the bathroom. It is good for people who don't spend much time in the condo.

Mr. John's unit is awesome
He help me to get parking lot and anykind of support 
Unit is clean,everything we need is inside
We heart warm up by john and will comeback again.
We had a great stay here! John was always quick to answer our questions. The location was great, easy walking distance to the beach and Waikiki restaurants. I'd love to stay again on a future visit.

John was a wonderful and very responsive host!  We had a minor hiccup with parking on the first night, but John responded right away and helped us resolve our issue very quickly.  We really appreciated the care he took to ensure our stay at his apartment was problem free.  The apartment is comfortably furnished with two separate beds which was well suited for us traveling  with our 3 year old toddler. Has all the convenience of a well located stay, John even provides some snorkel and beach accessories you can borrow in the home.  Thanks John for our wonderful stay, we would love to stay with you again in the future!  Mahalo : )

Nice apartment with everything you need including beach gear. The location of the apartment is just a few steps from famous Waikiki beach thus you can explore the area even by foot. I definitely can recommend staying there.
John is very nice and easy going. We’d got to checked in early in the morning. The location is excellent where is only two blocks away from Waikiki beach. The room is a bit cramped.

Incredible hosts who will be readily available should you need anything. The location is pristine - you're only steps away from Waikiki. If you don't rent a car, there is a bus stop nearby with multiple bus lines going through, so you won't have any trouble getting around. The apartment is pristinely clean and large in size. Our stay was incredibly pleasant and cozy.
Amazing location and most all amenities are provided! Please note, though, that there is a lot of noise let in by windows reinforced not by glass, but by shutter-type panels.
Gut

This place is great. The location is a very close walk to the beaches at Waikiki and the international marketplace with a lot of food options along the way. The room is nice and clean and check-in was very easy. John is incredibly nice and very responsive to any questions you may have. 10/10 would recommend
Wonderful experience, and great value! Highly recommended host!
Great place, would recommend it to anyone in Waikiki. Close to the beach, grocery stores and restaurants. The hosts were super communicative and helpful. Coming again :)

John and Stacey gave new meaning to 'superhost' - they were helpful above and beyond. The apartment was exactly what we expected. It's not huge, but had everything (and I mean *everything*) you could possibly need. Check in was super easy and John was very responsive. It's a perfect location, very close to everything around Waikiki. When we come back to Honolulu we hope we can stay in one of their apartments again.

This was a great location. Close to markets and great waikiki restaraunts. We were able to walk to the beach in 5 minutes. John and Stacy are friendly hosts and always quick to respond. If you are looking for a local waikiki experience this is a great place to stay.

Trans Pacific was exactly as it is advertised- perfect location to walk to Waikiki and enjoy downtown. The apartment was a bit loud- but nothing to really complain about. AMAZING HOST- we arrived early and they met with us before check-in to store our luggage! They also recommended us restaurants and bars during our stay- this couple was incredible at communication. Definitely will stay again next time we are in Waikiki!
Perfect for an overnight night in Honolulu. Close to the water, near restaurants and affordable. Clean, basic amenities, and appropriately priced for a simple night.

ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝもよく､部屋も綺麗でした｡
ﾎｽﾄも親切でとても満足です｡

事前に知っておいたほうがいい点としては､街の中心部に近いので朝でも車の音が聞こえることくらいだと思います｡
Absolutely amazing place to stay right on Waikiki! Two minute walk to the main Waikiki beach with all the shops. Highly recommend staying here if you are booking a trip to Oahu!
Good location.

Great deal, great location, very clean, and tons of amenities in case you forgot anything. Loved the full-sized refrigerator and good shower. Even though it is on a side street, it still was pretty noisy even with the louvers shut. If you are a light sleeper, be sure to bring ear plugs. The bathroom is pretty tiny too. Other than that, it really is a great deal for the price.

Great location if you're looking for something central. The towels, boogie board, and other amenities provided are thoughtful touches. Hosts are quick to respond. The area can be a bit noisy at night. Otherwise, great stay, I'd recommend it!

Great little place right near shops & the beach. Can’t beat this value! Even a kitchen & full fridge in the place. The owners were very accommodating and responsive. I would definitely stay here again :)

Great location for the value , the place is a bit small but it is Waikiki and for the price it is definitely worth it. It will be pretty comfortable size for two adults and a small child . Any more people it would be too small. Bathroom is also the very small side, but it is clean. 

Behind the mirror there is some sun screen, and there is also a boogie board and a life jacket and a chair and an umbrella and a noodle. 

The condo has parking if you request the owner for a parking for a fee, it is more convenient than finding parking else where. It is a very small space so don’t get a huge car..

It does get noisy at night , I brought some ear plugs as suggested on the reviews. 

John and Stacey are both real quick at responding to messages , made it easy to get things taking care of

This is a fantastic location and very affordable based on the location that you'll be staying in. For those of you who have heard of Marukame Udon, this is just a 5 minute walk from the restaurant, so this is a very strategic location if you plan to visit. If you like to cook your own meals from time to time to save money, their kitchen is fully functional and great for a small family. John was very quick to respond to questions and help out whenever we needed it - would definitely stay here again!

One of the best places I have stayed in Oahu. Great place to get away from the city but still a walking distance to Waikiki beach. And troubles that we had the owners responded very quickly. The place was amazing, would definitely stay here again.

This place is exactly as advertised. It's very small but the price is worth the location. John was extremely helpful and greeted me on my arrival. The only downside is the noise from outside which can be disturbing if you're planning to stay in the room during daytime but it becomes calm during the night and I was able to get a good sleep. There is also a small kitchen which essential utensils if you're planning to make some quick meal. I would recommend this place to tourists (party of 2 or 3 at max) visiting Waikiki.

Hosts were quick to respond and provided easy directions to check in. The studio was as expected - can fit 2 people comfortably, maybe 3. Bathroom was small, but had everything needed. Location was great - easy walk to the beach, shopping center, etc. Great value for easy stay.

約一週間､3人でお世話になりました｡Jhon,Stacy,お二人共とても親切でした｡
ﾒｯｾｰｼﾞを送ると､すぐに対応してくれました｡心強かったです｡
ABCｽﾄｱ,ﾌｰﾄﾞﾊﾟﾝﾄﾘｰ,ｲﾝﾀｰﾅｼｮﾅﾙﾏｰｹｯﾄﾌﾟﾚｲｽ,ｷﾝｸﾞｽﾋﾞﾚｯｼﾞ,ﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁ等は徒歩すぐの場所にあり､大変便利でした｡
その分､朝方は外が少し賑やか｡

快適な滞在でした｡ありがとうございました!
Be prepared to climb stairs
This place was great!  Easy to get to the beach and local stores to go eat at or shopping.  John was a great host! Highly recommended!
房間非常舒適 還提供海邊的用具 地點很好!房東人很親切回覆也很及時 非常滿意這次的體驗
I highly recommend this place and I will likely stay here again. Excellent location to rest your head at a great price point!
tolle LAge gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis

Fine basic accommodation. We appreciated the beach accessories and towels. There is also a pretty ok grocery store called " food pantry" on kuhio ave. a couple of blocks away. Walking distance to the beach, and to bus #2 to Diamondhead on Kuhio ave.

便利な場所にありすごく快適にすごせ過ごせました!
また宿泊したいです!
This is a great place good location and excellent host
Great! place to unwind. Awesome host. Clean and quiet

This is the best location at the best price and I cannot stress that more. You are literally down the street from an ABC store (convenience store) and just blocks away from the beach, International Market, local restaurants, shops, zoo and Alamo car rental. I do want to warn anyone that has issues with stairs though, this place has no elevators. I stayed on the third floor and had to lug everything up those stairs and lug everything down. I don’t have an issue with stairs nor the girls I traveled with since it’s just extra cardio I’m happy to add into my day, so that wasn’t an issue, but I do see it as a potential problem for old folks and people with babies with lots and lots of luggage and stuff. I mean you might as well climb those stairs because you’re saving money, just saying. Keep in mind that you’re not paying for a 5 star Ritz-Carlton so don’t be a brat. The place is older, therefore some of the things are older and the owners are trying their best to keep it in its best shape as much as possible. Such as the AC. It works just fine and we were always so happy to come back to a cool room but it does leak (our unit’s AC leaked outside anyway so it never bothered us) and the owners are aware of it, did warn us about it before hand and have plans to fix it for future guests. The honesty was appreciated. If you use a crap ton of towels like I do, then bring your own few extras because they only supply enough for the amount of guests staying. You can use the laundry downstairs for $1.50-1.75 to rewash the towels or anything else you want to wash. Which is nice because I would hate to lug everything to a local laundromat on vacation! The microwave works just fine and I’m glad they have it along with the full fridge too. We didn’t cook so didn’t use the stove and cannot comment on that but it looked really clean. They also supply dish soap, a broom and a vacuum we didn’t use. My favorite would probably be the beach toys they supplied!! OMG it was our favorite!!! There’s a cute beach umbrella, beach bags and towels, a noodle, donut, and mini surf floaty-thing and even a large Asian mat to use at the beach that’s big enough for a whole family to use as a picnic. I was so happy to see all of it because it meant we didn’t have to buy anything. Talk about being grateful for those and SAVIN. THEM. DOLLAS for other shenanigans. They have a really nice flat screen TV but we were never in the room long enough to use it. We’re in Hawaii! Why would we stay inside to watch a movie?! There’s also fast, dependable and free WiFi. Great for students that need to do some...
Hospitality is the best! Close to everything. Felt at home.

The place was quite convenient. It is only a few min away from Waikiki beach and the main streets. They have various water equipment for us to use (e.g. life jacket, boogie board, folding, etc.). There is A/C so that was nice to cool off when we got back after a long day out in the sun.

Only a few of cons:
- The washroom is a bit smaller than we expected.
- We did see a few small roaches in the unit. Not sure if this is a common issue for these types of apartments in Hawaii.
- It is a bit noisy. We can heard the people on the street and neighbors.
Cozy and nice. Very close to the heart of Waikiki making it very convenient as well. AC helped with the hot nights.
立地も良く使いやすかったです｡
Middle of Waikiki....Great Location. AC works great. Host is easily accessible to communicate, if needed.
great location in the city.  was also comfortable.   would stay again

Always the best unit for your stay in Honolulu! No need to be bothered by hectic happenings in the nearby resorts, and the quiet location gives you a better appreciation for Waikiki as a getaway and not the Atlantic City of the Pacific.

This unit is always the absolute best value for the price in Waikiki. If you're traveling alone or need few frills, you're foolish to not consider this location. I've stayed here several times and have always enjoyed everything about it. The unit managers are very friendly and eager to make your stay memorable. Don't hesitate to book your next stay with Trans Pacific!

This place is great for the location and value. 
The only negative thing I have to say is the bathroom is a bit smaller than expected but still manageable, and if you rent a car, there is no parking for you on the premise.

It was a great stay! It is very convenient location and very good value accommodation. John responded my message quickly. Neighbors are nice.  
Just one heads up, the street is sometimes very noisy and I could hear it in the room.

It’s a very small studio, the bathroom is very tiny. The location is great! A few minutes walk to the beach and a grocery store. The host was very nice! The building is quite dated, towels and bedsheets were a bit old and kind of dingy. The room was clean. There’s no elevators, so it might have been a problem carrying a lot of luggage up 3 flights of stairs. There was a hole at the base of the door. Would have appreciated a full length mirror. Didn’t use the stove, so can’t comment on that. Couldn’t regulate the temperature in the room, it was either too cold or too hot. These were all minor issues,  the major problem was with the windows. The noise from outside was unbearable, even with the windows closed. I barely got any sleep due to a lot of noise from passing vehicles and people walking on the street , AND I had ear plugs in my ears! I would not recommend this place to a light sleeper but if you can sleep through anything and you’re looking for a very budget accomodation , go for it.
Certainly not without charm, beautiful new fridge, lots of hot water, close to bus stop. John, my host was friendly and helpful. Bring good earplugs, as it's noisy.
숙소 너무좋았어요. 체크인시간보다 일찍갔지만 다행이 시간이 맞아 짐도 보관해주셨고 위치도 너무좋어어요.다시 하와이를 간다면 또 묵을꺼에요:)
Perfect, 5 min walking to the beach

name: Hab. individual en Barcelona / Single room in Bcn
summary: Somos dos chicas jóvenes con una habitación libre, dispuestas a acoger a  aventureros, turistas, viajeros de negocios... En definitiva a alguien que busque un alojamiento acogedor y bien ubicado para pasar un fin de semana o una semana completa en Barcelona. Lugares de interés: Plaça d'Espanya, Fira de Barcelona, Sants Estació, Av. Paral·lel, Plaça de Sants, Montjuic.
space: Nuestro piso es acogedor, soleado y está muy bien comunicado. Línea de metro L1 y L5  a menos de 10 minutos, así como estación de autobuses, tren y AVE. Por la zona podrás encontrar diferentes supermercados. Además, cerca de la zona podrás encontrar vida nocturna.
description: Somos dos chicas jóvenes con una habitación libre, dispuestas a acoger a  aventureros, turistas, viajeros de negocios... En definitiva a alguien que busque un alojamiento acogedor y bien ubicado para pasar un fin de semana o una semana completa en Barcelona. Lugares de interés: Plaça d'Espanya, Fira de Barcelona, Sants Estació, Av. Paral·lel, Plaça de Sants, Montjuic. Nuestro piso es acogedor, soleado y está muy bien comunicado. Línea de metro L1 y L5  a menos de 10 minutos, así como estación de autobuses, tren y AVE. Por la zona podrás encontrar diferentes supermercados. Además, cerca de la zona podrás encontrar vida nocturna. Los huéspedes tendrán acceso a la cocina, así como a los utensilios de esta. Sal, aceite y azúcar estarán incluidos. Sí en la medida de lo posible ya que las dos anfitriones trabajamos 8 horas diarias pero el resto del día estaremos encantadas de atenderte para explicarte más detalladamente todas las dudas que tengas acerca del piso así como dudas de la ciudad.
neighborhood_overview: Es un barrio muy tranquilo en el que encontrarás supermercados, bares y tiendas. Nos encontramos cerca de Plaza Huesca, l'Eixample, Plaza España, Poble Sec.
notes: Cuando quieras acomodarte en nuestro salón, deberás convivir con nuestra mascota, un pequeño conejo llamado Coffi. No obstante, no tienes porque preocuparte por él puesto que es muy independiente y a la vez, sociable.
transit: Estamos cerca de todos los tipos de transporte público. La L1 y L5 de metro la encontrarás a 5-10 minutos del apartamento, así como diferentes líneas de autobús que te llevarán al centro de la ciudad. También nos encontramos cerca de la Estación de trenes de Sants, que te llevará directo al Aeropuerto.
access: Los huéspedes tendrán acceso a la cocina, así como a los utensilios de esta. Sal, aceite y azúcar estarán incluidos.
interaction: Sí en la medida de lo posible ya que las dos anfitriones trabajamos 8 horas diarias pero el resto del día estaremos encantadas de atenderte para explicarte más detalladamente todas las dudas que tengas acerca del piso así como dudas de la ciudad. Cuando estemos en el piso, estaremos encantadas de conocerte un poco más y hacer de tu estancia lo más agradable y acogedora posible.
house_rules: - Fumadoras esporádicas - Hay un conejo como mascota - La estancia no incluye desayuno

name: appartement RDC - prime spot, quiet first floor
summary: Mon logement est tout rénové et parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs d'affaires et les familles/This appartment is all renovated and wonderful for couples, families or business traveler.
space: La cour est belle et ensoleillée. La ruelle est verte. L'espace est très agréable et calme. Le coin fantastique pour l'accès aux services et aux commerces de quartiers. Very nice green alley in the back. Very enjoyable for a family.

La cour est belle et ensoleillée. La ruelle est verte. L'espace est très agréable et calme. Le coin fantastique pour l'accès aux services et aux commerces de quartiers. Very nice green alley in the back. Very enjoyable for a family.

host.host_about: Femme d'affaires, maman et résidente du Platau depuis 15 ans

reviews.comments: Martine was amazing. The apartment was was so stunning that we spent more time here than out in the city. She was generous with time checking out, responded to texts immediately, and made us feel extremely welcome. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Nous avons beaucoup aimé rester un mois dans ce bel appartement avec un jardin. Nous étions deux, très à l'aise dans ce grand espace, avec une belle cuisine, un salon confortable,  deux grandes chambres et une super salle de bain. L'appartement a été rénové et est tout neuf. Il est très bien situé, à côté des bons commerces de nourriture et un bon café. Il est très calme, avec le jardin qui donne dans une ruelle verte. Martine est très à l'écoute et nous avons été contents de la rencontrer.
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Private room in convenient & trendy location - Rm2
summary: Double bedroom in charming 3 bedroom Victorian terrace set in a leafy street only a few minutes walk to Redfern station.  Right next door to the ever-popular and fashionable Surry Hills. Filled with creatives. Less than 3kms from the CBD.  Close to trendy bars and cafes.  One stop away by train from Central station. Added - we have a washing machine and air con in the lounge room
space: Hi there! My house is a charming 3 bedroom Victorian terrace set in a leafy street only a few minutes walk to Redfern station. I will be staying in one of the rooms, but can happily give it up if someone wants to hire the whole place. HOUSE: The house features a seamless flow throughout - separate living and dining area with a gas stove and oven. There are 3 bedrooms (1 x master bedroom with balcony, 2 x double sized rooms), combined internal bathroom (toilet and shower), and courtyard with external W/C. Being a terrace, it is quite  We have a tv and Wifi. Bedrooms - All three bedrooms have queen sized beds for one or two people (2 people maximum per room). Mattresses are thick and very comfortable. All bedlinen is provided. If you need a clothing rail, and/or curtains, I will organise to put these in the room/s - please request this. I will do what I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you need anything else, please let me know and I'll see if I can meet your needs. E

neighborhood_overview: LOCATION: Suburbs close by - Surry Hills, Chippendale, Alexandria, Newtown, CBD, Central, Eveleigh, Waterloo, Moore Park, Darlington.  Redfern is an inner-city suburb of Sydney. Once decidedly bohemian, Redfern is in the later stages of gentrification. Situated alongside the ever-popular and fashionable Surry Hills, and just moments from the CBD, Redfern is a perfectly positioned city base.  Conveniently located close to Sydney’s CBD (Redfern station is just one stop way from Central station by train) together with a well-serviced bus network, Redfern is primed for getting around. Also in close proximity to the airport. Redfern residents are thoroughly enjoying its revival. There is a mix of young professionals, young families and mature locals enjoying the convenient lifestyle. There is a hip and creative vibe in the area. With a mix of warehouse conversions, Victorian terrace houses and new apartment buildings, it’s a vibrant and eclectic mix of architecture. People can be found enjo
transit: Closest train station - Redfern Station. Next stop is Central Station, which is central to all trains and a central part of the city. There are buses that go into the city also and can be found close by. These run regularly. My favourite places to go for brunch are – Bean and Berry, Baffi and Mo’s, Three Williams, Henry Lee’s, Brickfields. Great food, coffee and service. My favourite bars are – The Dock, Arcadia Liquors, The Bearded Tit, Cake Wines Lovely places to go for dinner – Pitt Street Diner, The Continental. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, location, the people, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids), and big groups.
access: Their room, lounge room, kitchen, bathrooms, courtyard.
interaction: Certainly be able to help with anything you need. Please let me know and I'll do the best I can to answer your questions or point you in the right direction. Ask away! I am very sociable and will be happy to stay and have a chat or if you would like your privacy, I'll also respect that.
house_rules: No shoes in the house.

host.host_about:
Hi!

My name is Lilian and I am a designer. I have lived in London, Berlin, New York and have just returned home to Sydney, Australia.

I am really easy going and friendly and always up for a chat and a laugh.

I like to keep fit and spend my time going to exhibitions and finding new things to do in my own city. 

Whenever I can, I like to travel and see the world and catch up with my friends.

reviews.comments: Lilian made the stay lovely, the place was extremely clean. Lilian went out of her way to organise an iron when I needed one which was a huge help. She also wrote me a lovely list of places to eat around the location and they were awesome suggestions!

Lilian is a good host. She has welcomed me with a smile and made sure I know everything about my accommodation. Her communication is very good and made sure she managed every small thing. Will stay with her again. Lilian's location is very close to Redfern train station and it saved me a lot of time.
Lilian's place is in a quiet street with excellent access to train and food places.    Clean. Secure comfortable. Lilian is friendly and helpfu.

Location is really close to the train which was crucial to my stay. The house was really minimalistic/clean. I was staying there for a month so I wish the kitchen had been a little better supplied. Internet worked well. All three rooms are available to rent so  I do wish there hadn't been as much traffic with other Airbnb guests checking in/out. Lilian herself was almost always available if I had questions, needed anything or simply locked myself out of my room.
Lilian and her Mum were very accommodating allowing me to check-in early. Her place was clean, tidy and close to transport - very convenient!
The room is good value, clean, with access to a good shower and close to public transport. It would be excelent if it there was a bed under the mattess :) Lilian is lovely and makes you feel at home
A great place to explore the city from. Less than a 5 minute walk to Redfern station, which gives you easy access to the whole city. Great house and great hostess! Thanks Lilian!

My stay with Lilian was my first using Airbnb. I was very impressed. 

Lilian was very quick to respond and was flexible with my check-in time. A definite plus, having just gotten off a long-haul flight.

The place was centrally located, a few steps from a major train station. Despite this, the house was quiet at night, making it easy to attend to my jet lag. The house was also clean and well maintained.

I would definitely recommend staying here.

Lilian's place was just perfect. Gorgeous, clean and super central. I didn't meet Lilian in person, but her brother was kind enough to let me in and was only ever a text away (Lilian was put if town). Probably the best place I've stayed in Sydney!
Super charming little house mere steps from Redfern Sta. Lilian and her housemates are great hosts who made me feel very welcome. Highly recommended.

The room and the house were so cute! Very well designed! I really enjoyed the little garden (I had my breakfast there, just perfect!) Lilian and her fried are really friendly and lovely! Gave me advices ect... 
Can not expected better! Next time I sydney i already know where I will stay!
Thank you so much Lilian! Was perfect !
Xxx

I couldn't have wished for a better start to my trip to Australia.lilian and her entourage where exceedingly friendly ,welcoming and helpful.the room was very elegant in a reduced style.everything  was kept spick and span.you needed sunglasses IN the house for every surface was (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a lovely experience.hope we meet again and best of luck with your projects ,lilian!

Lilian was a great host! I stayed at her place for 2 weeks whilst relocating to Sydney. It is an amazing location, super close to the train station but also walking distance to the centre of Sydney. She was very responsive to email and any questions I had via text once I was staying with her. The house is exactly as shown in the pictures and was always very clean. Lilian was really helpful in terms of local advise and is a very friendly host. I would highly recommend staying at this great terrace house!
Great location. Lilian made the arrival and leaving process easy, with very prompt communication

Lilian's house is a perfect place. Great location, 5 minutes walk to the Redfern train station or bus station, which can take you to almost everywhere in Sydney.  Many good restaurants and bars in 10 minutes walking distance. 
The house is super clean, tidy and stylish. The guest bedroom is very quiet, bright with natural light. The bed is also very comfortable. 
Lilian and Dave are very nice hosts, they are thoughtful, caring and easy-going.  They made me felt like being home on the first day. They are also very generous, did everything to help me when I stayed in their place. I highly recommend Lilian's place.
Lilian and David were very friendly and obliging. Their house is great, in a quiet street yet close to transport. Redfern is a great neighbourhood. Thanks, Lilian and David
A very homey and comfortable house. Extremely convenient (Redfern station was right around the corner!) too :)

name: Belle chambre au coeur d'Outremont
summary: Au coeur d'un quartier tranquille et sécuritaire, belle chambre lumineuse, confortable et tranquille. Transports en commun à proximité. Magnifiques espaces verts, épiceries, restaurants et cafés géniaux à proximité.
space: Au coeur d'un quartier tranquille et sécuritaire, belle chambre lumineuse, confortable et tranquille. Transports en commun à proximité.
description: Au coeur d'un quartier tranquille et sécuritaire, belle chambre lumineuse, confortable et tranquille. Transports en commun à proximité. Magnifiques espaces verts, épiceries, restaurants et cafés géniaux à proximité. Au coeur d'un quartier tranquille et sécuritaire, belle chambre lumineuse, confortable et tranquille. Transports en commun à proximité. Votre chambre, votre toilette privée et la douche partagée. Le quartier d'Outremont déborde de magnifiques espaces verts, d'épiceries des quatre coins du monde, de restaurants et de cafés géniaux. De plus il se trouve à quelques pas du fabuleux Mont-Royal, du quartier Mile-End, du Marché Jean-Talon, et j'en passe… Il y a deux stations de métro à proximité : Station Outremont et Station Rosemont. Accès direct aux lignes d'autobus (Website hidden by Airbnb)
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier d'Outremont déborde de magnifiques espaces verts, d'épiceries des quatre coins du monde, de restaurants et de cafés géniaux. De plus il se trouve à quelques pas du fabuleux Mont-Royal, du quartier Mile-End, du Marché Jean-Talon, et j'en passe…
transit: Il y a deux stations de métro à proximité : Station Outremont et Station Rosemont. Accès direct aux lignes d'autobus (Website hidden by Airbnb)
access: Votre chambre, votre toilette privée et la douche partagée.
house_rules: Le petit déjeuner est offert tous les jours, sauf le dimanche, jusqu'à 10 h 30 am. Merci de ne pas faire de bruit après 22 h 00.

host.host_about:
Je suis une personne relax, sociable et ouvert d'esprit qui travaille dans le domaine de la musique. J'aime rencontrer des gens, nouer de nouvelles amitiés, voir des films et jouir des plaisirs de la table entouré d’êtres chers.

J’ai eu la chance de me balader en Europe, en Asie et dans les Caraïbes. À mon avis, c’est dans le rapprochement avec les habitants de chaque pays, ville ou village que j’ai visités que mes voyages ont pris leur plus grande valeur.

J’essaie de vivre intensément chance journée et de savoir saisir l'instant…

reviews.comments: Jean-François is very kind, generous and welcoming. He has everything covered and more. He offered breakfast which was very kind of him. He is a very interesting man and talking to him was always thought-provoking. The room was in an excellent condition and so was the flat overall. The area is quiet and ideal for your stay in Montreal.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Private Room in Renovated Library w/ Swimming Pool
summary: A double room in a unique villa located on top of Tibidabo, with a lovely garden, an amazing swimming pool and spectacular views over the city. Perfect for those who want to be in a relaxed environment, enjoy the privacy and intimacy and still be 20min from the center of Barcelona.
space: What makes this space special is the combination of culture, history and nature. The room is located in a natural park, with spectacular views into the valley.
description: A double room in a unique villa located on top of Tibidabo, with a lovely garden, an amazing swimming pool and spectacular views over the city. Perfect for those who want to be in a relaxed environment, enjoy the privacy and intimacy and still be 20min from the center of Barcelona. What makes this space special is the combination of culture, history and nature. The room is located in a natural park, with spectacular views into the valley. The main building housing the old library is where we live. The room referenced in the listing is an independent unit. This room, together with the garden and swimming tool is to be enjoyed by our guests. Having said that, we invite all guest to have breakfast in the main building every morning and love to love to invite guests to use and visit the old library. We are Øyvin from Norway and Martha from Colombia. Since 2000 we have been living in this old library on the roof of Barcelona, which we have and are still renovating. We are travelers, and lov
neighborhood_overview: The setting of the house is what really sets it apart. It is located in the heart of the Natural Park of Collserola that rises up over Barcelona’s Metropolitan Area. This well-preserved, 8,000-hectare natural area is a paradise for hikers, bikers and nature lovers. The house offers amazing views to both sides of the mountain: to the east you are greeted with a fully-fledged panoramic view of the city. From the garden, you have view of the valley, and on clear days you will see the mountain of Montserrat. Vallvidrera village is only less than 1 km away, and it is a lovely walk if you are in need of some basic groceries or if you want to enjoy a beer in the sunny plaza. The village has one convenient store and a bigger supermarket. In the mornings it is an experience in itself to walk to the village and buy fresh bread at the local bakery. The house is also only a 5-minute walk away from one of Barcelona’s main family attractions, the amusement park of TIbidabo. In addition the house is
notes: 1) We have a young, energetic but very beautiful and good german shepherd called Black. 2) We sometimes host events such as small concerts and events 3) The kitchen is not available for guests' use
transit: When going to the city, it will only take you 25 minutes to get to the center (Plaza Catalunya) using public transportation (Bus del barri + funicular + metro). The whole trip is paid with the same ticket (T10) and it is truly an experience in itself. If you opt for taking a taxi, it will only cost around 15€. There is parking area in our garden. From Barcelona city: LÍNEAS FGC: SABADELL - TERRASSA: Do not enter the first 3/4 wagons (since the doors do not open at Peu de Funicular where you have to get off). Alternatively, take Funicular of Tibidabo (plaça Dr. Andreu) or Tibibus T-2 (Plaça Catalunya) until Plaça del Tibidabo and walk down (3 minutes) -note that this only applies when the amusement park of Tibidabo is open. Once you have done this one or two times you will find it extremely easy and convenient!
access: The main building housing the old library is where we live. The room referenced in the listing is an independent unit. This room, together with the garden and swimming tool is to be enjoyed by our guests. Having said that, we invite all guest to have breakfast in the main building every morning and love to love to invite guests to use and visit the old library.
interaction: We are Øyvin from Norway and Martha from Colombia. Since 2000 we have been living in this old library on the roof of Barcelona, which we have and are still renovating. We are travelers, and love discovering new places by land. We went around the world with our own Toyota Land Cruiser for about 5 years ago with our 4 kids ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) Now that our kids are all studying or working abroad, we want to open our house to meet travelers like us, that want to experience the local life in a distinct neighborhood of Barcelona, and share their experiences with us.

address.government_area: Vallvidrera, el Tibidabo i les Planes

reviews.comments: We had an amazing weekend here! Martha and Øyvin are inspiring people, really open and kind. We were the first people to stay there after the renovations. Because of that, there were some minor complications to the room. This was handled well by the couple. Definitely recommend this place!

My mum and I stayed at Martha's and Oyvin's place in the beginning of April for 6 days and we had the most amazing time! The house is newly renovated and situated on a very privileged location with amazing views over the city of Barcelona on one side and the hills surrounding the city on the other side. It takes you about 30 minutes to get down to the center of the city by public transportation (first a bus, then a funicular and then the metro), which makes it a perfect place for those wanting to combine the calmth and peacefulness of the nature surrounding Barcelona and little trips to the inner city. Martha and Oyvin are a very warm and inspirational couple who like to share their life experience (which is mind blowing) and are really eager to meeting new people and getting engaged in all sorts of projects. My mum and I came back from this trip inspired and will definitely keep in touch with them! I would definitely recommend it to everyone, and mostly to open-minded people looking for an escape in an amazing setting!

I travel a lot. But this stay with Martha and her family was one of the biggest travel memories that I will remember forever. The place is stunning and it's a 10 min beautiful walk to the nearest communication transport into the central city. But I never wanted to leave :) 

Can't wait to get back!

I taveled a lot in my life, but never experienced so much at one place. Marthas house and family made my stay in their amazing house one of my absolute best travel memories. Can't wait until I come back!

We had a great time at Martha's. She's a lovely host with a great family that invited us into their home like we were one of their own. They were generous with everything and shared many inspiring stories with us. Advice, food and drinks were offered without even having to request. The place is located in a beautiful scenic village on the top of a mountain. It has an excellent towering view of Barcelona. Despite not being in the city centre, Barcelona was very accessible through public transport which did not even cost very much. This is the perfect place for someone who wants to learn about the rich culture Spain has to offer while relaxing in a place away from the hectic tourist areas yet still being within reach of Barcelona.

Martha made us so welcome and went out of her way to travel down to the town with us the first day to help orientate us. We did not expect to be invited to sit at Martha and Onyo's table every morning for the wonderful breakfasts Martha prepared, and we really appreciated that. We absolutely loved being able to walk in the woods, see wild     (tame really) boar, hear birdsong, breathe the clean air and swim in the pool in the mornings before we headed down the fenicular railway into town - we definitely had the best of both worlds. If we return to Barcelona we would love to stay here again and enjoy the reading room too that they  developing, Fiona and Jen

We had the privilege of staying with Martha and Øyvin for four days- whilst their property is incredible (along with the view that it offers), the undisputed highlight was the hospitality they provided and their dedication to an outstanding guest experience. Don't ask whether you should go but indeed how quickly you can get there- we'll be sure to return.

"Una calurosa acogida y una experiencia fantástica"

Venga a descubrir una maravillosa antigua biblioteca sin vacilación. Este lugar permite de relajarse a la calma después un día en Barcelona. La habitación es muy limpia y confortable con una vista sobre la piscina, el jardín y la iglesia de Tibidabo. En una palabra: magnífico.  
Todas las mañanas, hemos compartido un momento con Martha y Øyvi durante el desayuno. Ofrecen productos sanos y frescos para empezar bien el día. Esos momentos han permitido de intercambiar sobre experiencias, viajes, (Website hidden by Airbnb) 
Martha y Øyv son personas con altos valores, son sonrientes y son generosos. 
Muchas gracias para todo y volveremos pronto, es cierto.

Beatriz y Chloé

Un bel endroit et un accueil très chaleureux de Martha et de sa famille. Il est facile de rejoindre le centre ville par le funiculaire et le métro. Les photos sont justes. Un lieu calme que nous avons apprécié pour une pause en journée ou après la visite des lieux touristiques de Barcelone.

Martha and Oyvin's place is breathtaking. They were one of the most gracious hosts I've had through airbnb! The room is newly renovated and very comfortable with everything you need. The views, the hills, the running and hiking trails, the breakfasts in the morning, the converted library with the grand piano! I could go on and on. Not to mention, their very adorable dog Black. Who is very friendly! You are able to get a cab to the city centre if you don't have a car. Overall, it was such a nice change of pace and I hope to return! I highly recommend their place.

lovely hosts, nice people, very charming family with many inspiring stories. The room is very comfortable and has everything you need. 
They have a super nice dog and very friendly. 
I really recommend their place, calm and has some amazing views. We'll connected with the center. 
highly recommended.

My boyfriend and I stayed here for 6 days and would highly recommend it! Martha and Øyvin were such great hosts. Their place is absolutely gorgeous! Our room, the pool, and garden are absolutely beautiful - not to mention the INCREDIBLE views. The whole place is breathtaking. We were made to feel so at home, with a lovely breakfast each morning too :)

The property is situated a short walk from public transport in form of a bus or funicular, but better, it is surrounded by woods and picturesque trails which we loved exploring. It is incredibly peaceful and serene but is well connected to the city.

Martha and Øyvin are a very kind and inspirational pair - also their family we met are lovely too! They really made our holiday special and we loved chatting to them each morning. We hope to see you again - this place is so great! If not, thank you and good luck for the future.

Sally & Max xx

El lugar es muy agradable, y los dueños son muy acogedores. Desayunos excelentes! Solo hay que tener en cuenta que es un lugar alejado del centro con buena conexion de transporte publico. En el Tibidabo! Un lugar apasible para desconectar de los dias llenos de actividades.

the house and location are beautiful and Martha and Øyvin are very welcoming and kind people.. we couldn't have asked for more from our hosts, they really go the extra mile. once you figure out the public transport it takes no time at all to get to central barcelona, and if you are coming late then you can hail a taxi from the bottom of tibidabo without any problems.
we definitely didnt spend long enough here to enjoy properly so come for at least 3 days.

Wundervolle Menschen und ein einzigartiger Ort. Einfach unvergesslich! 
Nix für Menschen mit Angst vor Hunden.

What an utterly dreamy home & location! My Brother & I were so incredibly looked after by Martha & her family - it was amazing! The utterly unforgettable views & memories shared at Martha's home will be fondly remembered! I look forward to visiting again sometime soon! Xxx

Words cannot express how wonderful this residence is!  Martha and her husband made our first trip to Europe a magical experience!  She was open to communication before arrival, letting me know what items I needed to have with me and providing directions.  Breakfast with the family each morning was an unexpected treat!  Through open and meaningful conversation, I was able to learn about some of Barcelona's traditions and history.  The private room was very well kept and provided amazing views of Tibidabo and the city.  The house is close enough to the city, about a 20 minute funicular and train ride, but far enough away that the evenings were peaceful and quiet.  Staying at this residence made our trip magical and a return trip a necessity!  You will definitely leave a piece of your heart at the top of Tibidabo if you choose to stay at this amazing house!

A beautiful place located upon the hills of Tibidabo. Well worth the journey to get here and very close to excellent public transportation.  Martha and her family are incredibly kind and made us feel right at home. We are travelling with a toddler and they were very accommodating.

It was really in every way a nice spent time
Ania ,Marek and Zosia from Poland

This place made our trip to Barcelona amazing! We enjoyed the great breakfast (which Martha prepared for us every single morning), took a swim in the pool when it got too hot and gazed at the stunning sunset with a glass of wine. If you want to combine a city trip with a few relaxing days, there's no better place! 
Most of all we loved spending time with Martha and her lovely family! It was super interesting and nice to have chats and discussions with them! We'll for sure come back! Thank you!

The appartement is apart from the house, you've got your own place and the pool in front. 
Every morning a very nice breakfast, with all kinds of cereals and nuts and warm bread. Hospitality is erywhere! 

The place is high above Barcelona City. We walked a nice walk down to the edge of the City through the woods in about 30 minutes.  But when you dont like to walk, you can take the little bus to the funicular and get into the metro. All is in zone 1, so you dont have to but extra tickets. 

I will certainly go back to this place!

Superbe location qui correspond en tout point aux photos, 
Proche des transports en communs calme et frais la nuit, dans un cadre de verdure et une vue époustouflante .... 
Un accueil comme dans notre famille, merci à Martha et Ovin pour cet accueil si chaleureux et leur chien gentil mais foufou que notre fils à adoré, la piscine est très agréable surtout le soir en rentrant de Barcelone après avoir beaucoup marché ! Et le matin avant de partir pour se rafraîchir pour la matinée ... 
on a apprécier le petit frigo dans la chambre qui nous a permis de mettre des boissons au frais et de quoi faire l'apéro au bord de la piscine ..... 
nous avons aussi apprécier le petit déjeuner le matin ... et la salle de la bibliothèque est à couper le souffle, vraiment un endroit à voir et à connaître.
Merci encore pour cet échange dans la convivialité et l'amitié, à bientôt surement pour une prochaine visite.

This has been one of my favorite experiences with Airbnb. My only initial hesitation with booking Martha's place was the location given that its a bit outside of the city. This turned out to be one the biggest perks of staying here: stunning scenery, spectacular views, felt like staying in a private villa in an exclusive location. Getting into Barcelona was not difficult or time consuming at all, and taking the Funicular was super fun and different. Martha was gone during our 4 night stay so we were hosted by her daughter Alexandra who treated us like family instead of guests. The property is beautiful, right below the Temple Expiatori del Sagrat Cor which is just a short walk. Breakfast was a big plus and moving around was not a hassle. This was the perfect escape from the city, especially during the scorching summer heat, as the temperature in Tibidabo was always cooler and of course you could take a dive in the pool whenever. Overall, amazing place and excellent stay. Dont let the location deter you, it will end up being the highlight like it was for us. Thank you Martha, Alex and family, we will surely be returning to your lovely home!

We had an amazing stay at the house at the beginning of August. Martha was away, so her daughter Alex hosted us. She met us in the city centre and showed us the way up to the house. (it is a little bit out of the city, but easy to access and the views are worth it!) The funicular was off, but replacement buses were on to take us from the metro station up to the house. A taxi from the city centre is only around 20 euros if you want to stay out late too. The house was absolutely beautiful and we were in the pool everyday! If I was back in Barcelona I'd definitely stay here again, and have already recommended the house to people thinking about visiting the city.

What could I write that has not been said already? We traveled to Barcelona as tourists, but Martha, Øyvin and their family made us feel at home. We enjoyed several delightful days at their place surrounded by nature and the most beautiful views of the area. It was very easy to get to central Barcelona, but also to walk around the stunning paths of Collserola, where you can easily forget you are a stone's throw from the city. We will visit you again, without a doubt! Thank you so much for everything!

My father and me had a very pleasant  stay at Martha's home.  The home is easily reachable by public transport, and offers an amazing view on the city at the front side and  beautiful hills at the back side.  We will always  remember the hospitality, delicious breakfast and intense discussions about life with this inspiring family. Highly recommended.
Perfect location for an escape out of busy Barcelona. Martha and her family are just as welcoming as the house.
Amazing location and the owners were very easy to get on with. A+

A stunning place to stay in Barcelona!
Martha is an excellent and caring host und the house is more than beautiful. 
Good transport connection, amazing view over the town and a totally peaceful place.
We can recommend it to everyone looking for a spacious, quiet and luxurious home in Barcelona.

We had a wonderful time at Marthas place! She and her family are great hosts and we almost felt like we belong to family, especially when we had breakfast together in their kitchen. And as this was not enough, the house is just amazing and has a breathtaking view.
Good to know: 
They also have a big (nice) dog... maybe just good to know if you are scared. 
The connection to the city is very good, if you take the funicular.

Oh my, what to say! Our stay with Martha and Oyvin was nothing short of perfect. We felt right at home throughout our whole stay and absolutely feel in love with Black! Sharing life stories and listening to advice during breakfast was so lovely and really made us feel comfortable and not one bit intrusive. Our private room was equipped with everything we needed. The location is a prime spot for a more quiet scene as opposed to the hustle and bustle of the city, which is exactly what we wanted. Super easy transportation into the main city and it was a delight with panoramic views on your walk down to the bus or cable car station. We would highly recommend Martha and Oyvin as host and the location in itself to anyone! Thank you so much for everything once again!!! See you in Australia ☺️
Very spacious place. Martha was a really nice and helpful host.
Beautiful place to stay, friendly atmosphere away from the noisy crowds. Would love to be back!

Words can not even scratch the surface to the deep positive impact and memories, Martha and her lovely family left in our hearts, while sharing their home for a few days with us. Inspiring. Warm-Hearted. True Philantropists.

This was such a great spot to be at during my time in Barcelona! Martha and her family were so welcoming and hospitable--I felt like a part of the family immediately. The location has a private entrance, so you can come and go as you please. The house is a bit farther outside of the city than expected, but the view is spectacular, and the house is so beautiful (make sure to ask for a tour of the salon). Thank you again Martha for a lovely home away from home.

Located on the top of Mount Tibidabo with incredible views of Barcelona below. We enjoyed our easy funicular and tram ride up/down to the city and our quite oasis waiting for us at the end of our day. With everything that was going on in Barcelona during the time we were visiting, it was comforting to get away from the hustle & bustle and stay in a beautiful private suite. Martha and her husband are incredible hosts and made us feel comfortable and apart of their family. It was nice to start the day with a healthy breakfast, great conversation and tips on where, what to do and to how to get there.

Superb room and location - views are stunning

Martha and family (and Black the dog) were very friendly and bent over backwards to help us-  booking trips, taxis etc. 

Lovely breakfasts.

Highly recommended

Martha and her family curate an amazing historical property which was the library of Almirall. Almirall was a founding figure in the Catalan independence movement. It was a real honor to stay in such a significant, beautiful, and serene setting. But what made my stay great was simply interacting with Martha and her family. Martha is incredibly kind, open, interesting and generous as a host. She has a wonderful family who are all inspirational people. This is what the sharing economy and airbnb are all about.

This room suited our needs in Barcelona perfectly. The beds were comfy, the shower was hot, and the views were incredible. Martha and her family’s generous heart and hospitality made the trip. They took incredible care of us: offering great food recommendations, showing us their incredible home, spending time with their very loveable German Shepherd, and even making us soup when we got terribly sick. It was an unforgettable stay and we are blessed to have met them and stayed here.

We had five amazing days in Barcelona and enjoyed M. and Ø.'s hospitality very much. A very good room with a view (into the Collserola nature reserve and the valleys surrounding Barcelona) and with excellent mattresses. Thanks for the lovely breakfasts!
Super friendly family and nice clean and beautiful room. A bit small unit and car required.
Stunning view, gorgeous space and wonderful hospitality, what more can you ask for? This is a MUST for people looking for a cool experience in Barcelona!!

I have loved my stay in this lovely house! Alexandra and Carolina have been amazing and so helpful, even with my delayed and late check in. I have felt like home, a great place to stay in Barcelona and the view up to the hill is amazing! Thank you girls :)

We had an amazing time at one of the most beautiful places on the top of the mountain. It is close to an amusement park, but you can’t hear a thing. The view is amazing. It is very easy to go from the house to placa de Catalunya (30 min by public transportation). The breakfast was local what was very nice and delicious. We recommand this place to everybody. There is a dog who listens to the name ‘black’. He is very playfull but so sweet. Thank you for a beautifull vacation!!!

Our stay was amazing. It was the perfect place for my niece and me for our stay  in Barcelona. The room is private, with its own entrance and has an amazing view. Alexandra's hospitality was authentic and she created a warm, welcoming atmosphere. Even the dog, Back, was charming. Alexandra provided us with good tips and recommendations for places to eat in Barcelona. Highly recommend!
Great hosts and the views were amazing. They have a very friendly dog which reminded me of home. Would recommend this option to any and everyone.

I couldn’t recommend this enough! Tibidabo is beautiful and an amazing oasis away from the city. We were served a beautiful breakfast every morning and our hosts were so friendly, accommodating, and helpful. There is a friendly German shepherd named Black who will want to be your best friend from the moment you arrive - he’s big but gentle. Public transportation into the city is very easy, although if you are a night owl, you’ll have to take a cab up to the house if you are out past 930. The space is comfortable and serene, it was hard to leave every morning! Overall I would highly recommend staying here, just make sure to budget some time in your agenda to hang out at this comfortable home.
We really enjoyed coming home to the beautiful views overlooking Barcelona. The entire family go out of their way to accommodate a unique and enjoyable experience.

We were just enchanted by your hospitality and openness. And your wonderful place on the Tibidabo with that spectacular view over Barcelona, in that old library, we couldn't have found any better. Kind regards, Jann

This accommodation is amazing if you’re looking for spectacular views, peace and quiet and somewhere to get away whilst you visit Barcelona. It was extremely clean, access to a pool and patio in the evening and the girls provided breakfast each morning. The best thing by far is the view down to the city and the cathedral at night. Amazing!
Quite far from the City. You should take into account time and $$ to get to city central.

Great Place! Great Location on the top of the mountain!
Hosts are great! Best breakfast I ever had on AirBnb!

Wouldnt say that this type of Appartements is usual for airbnb. It was more like a 5 stars hotel with a cute, local breakfast every morning. The view is breathtaking and the hosts were friendly and gave us good tips for eating and exploring barcelona. 

Thank you! ❤️

This is a truly special place. Maria and her husband were out of the country, so I was hosted by their lovely daughter Alex. The home is one of the most stunning Airbnb’s I have ever had the pleasure of staying in. The views are lovely, and I enjoyed taking a dip in the pool at the end of each day. Their German Shepherd became my best friend and followed me around during my stay (great if you love dogs). Mass transit stops nearby, and once you get your bearings it is not difficult to use. Truly a remarkable stay.
Accueil très chaleureuse et appartement très bien équipé. Une vue époustouflante et un calme parfais.

Staying here was the highlight of our trip to Barcelona. Martha was away, but her children are wonderful - very generous, warm, inviting - and made a lovely breakfast for us each morning. The library is amazing! And the views are breathtaking!
Stay here if you get a chance - it is a very special place and family!

Martha’s place is truly special. Her kids showed us the utmost hospitality and care. We were so impressed with the breathtaking views and the history of the library property. The room is a nice size for two. Clean space, comfy beds, and hot shower. The home is not a far travel to the city and is easily accessible by public transportation.  For late nights we were able to take a cab home with no problem. For a short stay we were able to relax, take a dip in the pool, hang out with black (very sweet dog), and make our way to the city. Well worth the visit and travel around town. Highly recommended!
Great host. Beautiful location and nice views.  Relaxing place.

Beautiful villa - very peaceful! Breathtaking views especially during sunset...

Alex (Martha‘s daughter) and her siblings took great care of us, always responded quickly and were very helpful and flexibel. They also prepared a delicious breakfast - including the famous ‚pan con tomate‘ - every morning!

Great for those who enjoy being in nature, have a car (in case you want to be in the city for dinner etc - cab drivers didn‘t find the place easily) and love dogs (black, the dog, really enjoys company)...

Depending on the purpose of your stay, it is a lovely and very special place!

Many thanks - we hope to be back!

My mum and I had a lovely stay here. The room we stayed in was comfortable and clean. Carolina and Alex were really friendly and helpful and had some good tips for things to do. The views from the house were amazing and watching the sunset from the patio outside was so relaxing. Getting into Barcelona was so easy - following the instructions Carolina gave us, it took between 20-30mins. I would definitely recommend staying here - thank you!

Alex, Carolina and Blacky are the best host! warm, friendly and very relaxed. the villa is a paradise. I love everything about it. I am looking forward to staying there again. again, I am grateful for the warm welcome at your home.

Best single Airbnb experience that I've ever had. A great stay was made unforgettable with the unexpected additions of Black (the dog) and Alexandra (Martha's daughter). Stay here if you get the chance!!

Notre séjour a été fantastique. Le lieu a une vue magnifique sur Tibidabo et sur Barcelone. Tout est très propre et conforme aux photos. Nous avons été très bien reçues et Alexandra nous a même accompagné au supermarché pour faire quelques courses. Notez juste que la cuisine n’est pas accessible normalement pour cuisiner. Et le chien, Black, est très joueur et infatigable :)
Amazing place, must visit! Such a unique location and building. Martha’s daughters were lovely. Thank you for taking care of us!

Thank you for an amazing time at your house. This place is truly magical, and your daughters took such good care of us during our stay. We will miss the catalan breakfast with the incredible view accompanied by the dog Black! We really hope to be back sometime. 
Katrine & Peter

We had an amazing stay. The home, the pool and the surrounding area are beautiful! Martha was not around for our visit but her daughters were very helpful. Communication, restaurant recommendations, and public transit advice were all amazing. The private space is just that, very private. We didn’t have much time to enjoy the shared space but it is very beautiful as pictured. Staying here made for an amazing introduction to Barcelona, we would absolutely love to stay here again.

A peaceful setting with easy transport links into the centre. Alex and Caro could not have looked after us better. It was a perfect place to spend a few days relaxing. Black, the young German Shepherd, is a big part of the experience, so if you love dogs, this is highly recommended.

Martha's daughters were hosting us. They were so kind and nice. Place was best airb&b I ever been. So clean and awesome. They gave us breakfast which was so good. There are big dog "black" which is so cute. Everything was so perfect in their place.

Perfect place to discover the city when you like incredible views and quitness at the end of the day. Martha's daughters were our hostesses during our stay, they where super friendly and served us a nice breakfast every morning. Placa catalunya is only 25min away with public transport, altough we rented a Vespa which makes every trip up and down the mountain of Tibidabo like a dream! Don't look any further, this is the place you're want to stay in Barcelona.

Maison splendide avec une vue sur le tibidabo à couper le souffle! 
Hyper simple à trouver, vous êtes sur les hauteurs de barcelone, au calme et en même temps à 20 min du plein centre en transports, c’est top!
Black le chien est très joueur mais gentil! Attention pas de clim dans la chambre donc en été les nuits sont très chaudes mais heureusement on peut se baigner à toute heure c’est top;)

What an amazing space hosted by such wonderful people. The room is a perfect bolt hole set in gorgeous surroundings just a 25 minute trip on public transport from the centre (or a very reasonably priced taxi when it’s late). The short distance out of town is worth it for the unique stay and hospitality of Martha and her husband, who are faultless hosts; not forgetting their adorable dog who will just want to play with you all the time. A delicious breakfast is provided each morning (yogurt, bread, cheese, fruit etc) perfect fuel to head out and explore the city all day. Some days we would come back for a siesta before heading out again in the evening, but the travel links are great so was very easy to follow Martha’s instructions even on our first attempt. If you look for places with character and warmth, then I couldn’t recommend this highly enough! We hope to be back in the near future!

I honestly dont know where to begin, absolutely everything about this place was wonderful: lovely hosts, cutest dog, best views and comfy beds. This is one of the reasons I love airbnb, Martha and her daughters opened their home for us and made us feel so welcome.

A most  memorable, unique  and special experience not only of Barcelona trip  but of  decades of travel . A truly magical setting , amazing hosts , comfortable stay - an ideal retreat : close enough to the main attractions of the city but perfect distance to revitalize and rest after a day of sightseeing . It’s a retreat vacation within a vacation . The views from the room and through out the grounds of the property were breathtaking and out of this world . Martha and entire family went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable , well taken care of , with great recommendations and  invaluable warmth and welcome . The site itself of the Antigua Biblioteca Almiral has a remarkable  history aswell as an  inspirational story . It’s a work of love and creativity and as guests we really felt it . The breakfast and  beautiful Black, the German Shepherd added to an already perfect stay . It’s a rare treat , a deep memory , and nostalgia to return as we say goodbye.
Beautiful setting if you don't mind being away from city centre and like dogs, host family extremely hospitable and caring.

Wir haben uns bei Martha oben auf dem Tibidabo-Berg, hoch über Barcelona, sehr wohl gefühlt. In dem sehr schönen Zimmer mit eigenem Bad konnten wir uns sehr gut von den Eindrücken der Großstadt entspannen.
Die Gastfreundschaft und Hilfsbereitschaft der Familie ist außerordentlich gut. Nach kurzer Zeit fühlt man sich schon fast als deren Mitglied.
Das Frühstück war super lecker und abwechslungsreich.
Wer die Unterkunft bucht, sollte ein Herz für Hunde mitbringen, da das Anwesen von einem lieben aber unternehmungslustigen Vierbeiner gut bewacht wird.

This stunning property was the perfect place to recharge after spending the day in the bustle of Barcelona. There was so much to love about  this AirBnB.  Located on a mountain overlooking the city, the views from Martha's property and the drive up to it are simply breathtaking. The accommodations were stylish, comfortable and very clean. But what truly makes this property five-star quality was the warm hospitality of Martha and her family, including the family German Shepherd that you cannot help but love. Martha went above and beyond, providing us with a hearty breakfast each morning, directions and tips on transportation, and sharing the history of her beautiful home with us. 
By far one of the best AirBnBs we have stayed at. Highly recommend.

Amazing!!! Martha was so nice and helpful! She has such a beautiful soul! The place is a bit far from town but we had no regrets. The view was amazing! We enjoyed walking to Tibidabo and looking at the beautiful place. Martha's place is small and cozy. My husband and I loved it! Muchas gracias Martha!

This is a truly special place with views that are beautiful all times of the day. Make sure to set aside time late afternoon and evening to enjoy the incredible sunsets and relax on the terrace by the pool. The hosts are very helpful with all questions. Their gorgeous shepherd will look to bond with you on arrival so be sure you are a dog fan! The history and beautiful view make this special. Plan  on meals down the mountain and a little extra time if you want to go downtown Barcelona.

Fantastic accommodation, perfect location, u could get the whole view of Barcelona. Very enjoy the stay in Martha’s place, clean, comfortable and nice shower. It’s very nice to talk with Caroline the host’s daughter, beautiful girl, sharing the gap year which drive through China. Special experience choice of your first time in Barcelona, love this city, so relax and chill.

Thank you for an exceptional time. You made us feel exceptionally welcome and your property is simply beautiful. We especially loved the conversations with Martha and her daughters about the stories they shared of their childhood, travels and family. It was all well received. We look forward to keeping in touch with Martha
A really stunning location and facility with hosts who truly understand the word “hospitality”  highly recommended and surprisingly accessible to all of Barcelona.

It ‘s was very amazing place. All was very perfect. The room was very clean and modern. It was the best view in my life. The way from apartment to center of the city is 20 min. Every day we were walking up and down the street, and enjoyed the walk. I recommend each guest, try to stay here. It’s very nice trip!

Staying at Martha and Oyvin's home on Mount Tibidabo was one of the highlights of our trip. They are wonderful hosts - very welcoming and accommodating. The location was wonderful - the views of Barcelona were breathtaking, and you were really able to appreciate life as a local walking through the village. It was a nice retreat to return to Tibidabo after a day or time in the city and would highly recommend to anyone.

Just as the reviews say, this place was magical and just perfect. My stay was absolutely wonderful. Martha and her kids were extremely nice and helpful. They called me a taxi to ensure I was on time for the airport (as the home is a little out of the city and taxis can be tricky at times). I felt safe and comfortable which was a huge deal to me as a single female traveler. Martha checked in with me every day to make sure I was happy and doing okay, I loved this. It made me feel even better. If you get the chance, stay here...you won't regret it!

It was our best Airbnb experience so far. Martha and her great family did their best for us to feel comfortable and welcomed, as we were at home. We stayed at their place for almost a week, and we want to repeat this experience as soon as possible (and advice everyone we know to do the same ). 
Every morning we had a Catalonian breakfast all together, talking about literally everything! Martha’s family travelled all around the world, so believe us — they have so many stories to share .
