Our room was so simple and so perfect. It had everything we needed for comfortable stay (great view is included ). 
Can’t not to mention Black — the cutest and the biggest puppy we ever played with . He is definitely the part of our great time at this house. 
I guess, it’s just impossible to share our thankfulness and describe how we miss that time at Martha’s place. You should just try once...

You should stay here.

The apartment is up in Tibidabo, which is a thirty or forty-five minute commute from most of Barcelona. From the street out front you can clearly see all of Barcelona -- and on a clear day, Mallorca. The view is the first memory you'll make here. 

Martha and her family are very warm and interesting. Take time to ask them about their travels and the history of the home. Their dog Black is enormous, and enormously charming.

The library and attached homes are really something. There's a pool, though it was too cold to swim in when I was there in November. The grounds are beautiful. The church and amusement park nearby are worth a visit. 

The lodging itself is clean, comfortable and private. It has a terrific view. They have gone to some lengths to make sure that everything feels right.

I can't say enough nice things about this place or these people. I will be back.

Martha and her family hosted us in a warm and aimicable way. They provided everything needed for our stay in the house,as well as some useful advice and recommendation about the trip and traffic to Barcelona landmarks. The breakfast is provided every morning and their house is very fantastic with a modern & classic style after refurnishing the main hall of a previous famous Spanish writer. Plus,Martha has a cute dog called black and we played with him everyday. Tips:he likes playing sticks with people. Next time we will stay in Martha‘s venezuela airbnb house maybe
It was the second and hopefully not the last time we stayed here and that probably says it all. M. and Ø. are fantastic hosts in an exciting city. A very inspiring way to start the New Year!

Our stay at the library was fantastic. There are beautiful views from the property, including of the church atop Mt. Tibidabo. Martha and her family were gracious hosts that made a wonderful breakfast each morning and joined us to chat about current events and the day ahead. They were also always willing to provide great recommendations. Public transport very near the Airbnb made getting into Barcelona easy each day and yet the distance offered great serenity and quiet for good sleep each night. We highly recommend this Airbnb.

name: Nice room in artistic apartment, very central
summary: My place is close to Picasso Museum and the Cuitadella Park. The room is a good size for one person with a balcony.  The apartment is quite a big old style flat with original features and tiled floors. I look forward to welcoming to the heart of the city. *Keep in mind  Because the flat is old, the bathroom is very tiny.   It can also be noisy during the night, earplugs are a good solution The apartment is on the 4th floor with no lift I don't have central heating, just electric heaters
space: The room has a double bed and an exterior balcony. It is great for one person.
description: My place is close to Picasso Museum and the Cuitadella Park. The room is a good size for one person with a balcony.  The apartment is quite a big old style flat with original features and tiled floors. I look forward to welcoming to the heart of the city. *Keep in mind  Because the flat is old, the bathroom is very tiny.   It can also be noisy during the night, earplugs are a good solution The apartment is on the 4th floor with no lift I don't have central heating, just electric heaters The room has a double bed and an exterior balcony. It is great for one person. The Born area, in the heart if Barcelona, offers numerous restuarants and bars as well as beautiful architecture.  The flat is on the 4th floor with no lift, so be ready for stairs. The flat has 3 bedrooms rooms. One is my study and the others are bedrooms. I like to meet people but happy for guests to be independent. The famous el Born neighbourhood is part of the old town and the architecture is wonderful.  There are many b
neighborhood_overview: The famous el Born neighbourhood is part of the old town and the architecture is wonderful.  There are many bars and restaurants close by.
notes: The flat is on the 4th floor with no lift.  Noise from the street sometimes.
transit: Juame 1 is the closest metro station.
access: The Born area, in the heart if Barcelona, offers numerous restuarants and bars as well as beautiful architecture.  The flat is on the 4th floor with no lift, so be ready for stairs.
interaction: The flat has 3 bedrooms rooms. One is my study and the others are bedrooms. I like to meet people but happy for guests to be independent.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments: genial todo bien . he estado como en casa. y buena ubicación y mery es muy amable y atenta. lo recomiendo!

Très bon accueil de la part de Mary !!! Une chambre idéalement placée pour un prix humer raisonnable !
Je recommande ;)
Wonderful location, old town <3

I didn't have the opportunity to share a lot of time with Mary, but she was kind when I arrived and when I left. Regarding the house, I missed cleaning in the room as well as in the bathroom. For a couple of days its a cheap place to have a roof over your head
Great location, cool apartment, nice host. Highly recommend.

I love the location of Mary's place! Its really close to a nice park where also the Arc de Triomf is. Also a walk to the beach is easy to do. Mary was really nice to me. I arrived late in the night and I had also some delay with the flight. And she still gave me a very kind welcome. The place itself was good for me. I slept there everyday really good and I felt everything was clean. I can recommend everybody this place. Also the price is amazing! its definitely worth it. If I come back to Barcelona in the future I probably check if her place is still available!!! Thank you for your kindness and the nice staying!

In one sentence - worth of the value. The district is very central, you can reach the beach in 15 minutes, bars, restaurants, amazing Gothic district - all of these are around. The room is for one person, since it is really small. And keep in mind about the ear plugs that Mary mentioned - on weekdays it's ok with the noise, but on weekends there  is more of it. Mary is helpful and a nice person, so in general - i liked my stay there, thanks once again!

La chambre est très agréable et bien située à Barcelone. Si on aime marcher, plusieurs lieux d'intérêts sont accessibles à pieds. Sinon, les transports sont au bout de la rue, des deux côtés. Mary a été très gentille et arrengeante. Il faut cependant éviter les bagages trop lourd, il n y a pas d'ascenseur ! Je recommande.
The host canceled this reservation 48 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very nice room with a small balcony and great view. Really central, close to everything. The bathroom is small and simple and the kitchen is not included and there is no elevator but for the pice it's great. Perfect for a short stay in Barcelona!

Für den günstigen Preis befindet man sich super zentral mitten in der Altstadt Barcelonas. Alles ist schnell erreicht, sowohl Sehenswürdigkeiten als auch Hafen, Meer und die berühmte La Rambla. Für den Preis sollte man aber auch kein Luxuszimmer erwarten, gedacht ist es wirklich zum übernachten um Tags Barcelona erkunden zu können.

It's close to the Gothic quarter and you reach every places easily
Next Subway is just 5min far away from home
Price performance was perfect

Very central, perfect to explore Barcelona by foot! I very much enjoyed my stay in Mary's lovely apartment. Mary is very helpful and we had good communication throughout my stay. Je recommande vivement !

I couldn't have asked for a more perfect place to spend my time in Barcelona. Mary was communicative and attentive. The room was comfortable with lots of natural light and best of all the place is within walking distance to all the main attractions. I recommend Mary's place without hesitation. Thank you Mary for a wonderful stay!
Excellent location in old district of Barcelona, the place is perfect for solo travellers and adventurists who plan to explore day and night life in this vivid city!

name: Cozy private room on the UES
summary: Beautiful cozy apartment is located on a quiet street on the UES. However, it's just a few blocks away from restaurants, bars and stores. There is also a park next to the water a few min away! A private room is a perfect place to crash!
description: Beautiful cozy apartment is located on a quiet street on the UES. However, it's just a few blocks away from restaurants, bars and stores. There is also a park next to the water a few min away! A private room is a perfect place to crash! Internet, TV, kitchen, dishwasher, juicer, heater I'm happy to share my recommendations of restaurants, bars, lounges, events, museums etc. I am a busy NYker, work long hours in finance and barely in the apartment.
access: Internet, TV, kitchen, dishwasher, juicer, heater
interaction: I'm happy to share my recommendations of restaurants, bars, lounges, events, museums etc. I am a busy NYker, work long hours in finance and barely in the apartment.
house_rules: Quiet respectful guests.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Kristina was very flexible about letting me in, both when I first arrived and late at night. The rest of the stay went well too. I would recommend staying with her if you're just looking for somewhere to sleep after a long day in New York.

Great area, the central park is 15 mins by bus, the flat was clean and ready to take, Cristine was nice and friendly. 
I recommend that place! 
Thank you so much!

Le aspettative che avevo al momento della prenotazione riguardo questo soggiorno non sono corrisposte alle reali condizioni in cui mi sono ritrovata.
Nell'appartamento eravamo in tre anziché in due, con la madre di Kristina.
Inizialmente sono riuscita ad adattarmi ad abitudini e usi differenti dai miei, Kristina e sua madre sono state gentili nel permettermi di utilizzare il loro sale, fornirmi asciugamani puliti, prestarmi caricabatterie, sono state carine quando sono stata male, pensavo di aver instaurato un buon rapporto di convivenza, anche accettando situazioni particolari e condizioni diverse da quelle per cui avevo scelto questo alloggio, ma i successivi due mesi sono stati difficili.
Ci sono state pesanti incomprensioni verbali riguardo le condizioni igieniche e pulizie, a mio parere non accettabili e per le quali non mi sono mai lamentata, ma anzi sono stata rimproverata, e sull'utilizzo degli spazi comuni e regole casalinghe. Non mi sono sentita più  libera di muovermi in casa.
Ultima spiacevole sorpresa è stata essere svegliata il giorno del check-out per dover lasciare la stanza in anticipo rispetto a quanto Airbnb mi aveva comunicato.
Credevo Airbnb fosse un buon sistema per viaggiare, conoscere nuove persone, creare scambi culturali e magari rapporti con chi vive e conosce altre città, non è stato così e purtroppo non so se mi fiderò ancora di quel che è scritto negli annunci.
Credo che  per soggiorni lunghi come il mio non sia una buona opzione, ma per vacanze di pochi giorni, stando poco in casa, questo alloggio possa andar bene, è in una buona posizione, vicino alla metro Q, efficientissima, 20 minuti a piedi da Central Park e vicina ad un altro piccolo parco lungo l'East river, adatto per correre e rilassarsi, a starbucks, sempre utile e buoni supermercati.
Buona fortuna e viaggio a chi va a scoprire New York, città da molte sfaccettature, ma sicuro da vivere nella sua palpabile libertà.

A fine, comfortable bed in a clean, convenient apartment that's a good place to just stay the night, but don't expect to want to hang around. No air conditioning means it will likely be pretty hot in the summertime. Convenient to the subway (2 long blocks away), on a busy street, shops and food are nearby, as is a lovely park on the East River. Kristina is very communicative and nice, and her place is a fair price for a NYC stay in a nice neighborhood.

It is all about guests having the right expectations and landlords being honest about what they have to offer. This place is not for everyone and you need to see if it is a suitable for you. I personally this this place is good if you:
-Only stay for a short term and just need a cheap place to crash at
-Do not care much for messiness
-Do not care much for privacy
-Can sleep easily under any circumstances

Below is the pros and cons of this place.
Pros:
- Located in UES with many bars and restaurants around
- Q line is only 5-10 min away on foot
- Mattress is comfortable
- Walk-in closet in the bedroom
- Water pressure isn’t too bad
- Rent is inexpensive (is it worth what it has to offer? It’s up to your expectations)

Cons:
- There is no heating system for this unit; the building controls it. It’s only automatically turned on during the winter. On the chilly nights in spring/fall, they use their gas oven in the kitchen to heat the house. (Isn’t this a safety hazard? (Hidden by Airbnb) says it run the risk of carbon monoxide poisoning but they would probably say it’s been working for them well.)
- There is no air conditioning system in the bedroom. Apparently it’s only in the living room and they were reluctant to turn it on when it was 84 degrees outside (that was 29th April (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , you can check the weather history).
- It is misleading that they have laundry as the amenities. The building does not have washer/dryer. You’ll need to use a laundromat open for the public outside the building. It is $3 to use a small washer and $6 for a bigger one. To use dryer, it’s a 25 cents for 7 min.
- It is a 1-bedroom apartment. The landlord and her mom sleep on the couch outside. She told me her mom is going to stay there only for a week. I cut my stay short before verifying this is true, but based on the review below written in italian, it seems that the mom stayed there for the whole time. Given that the landlord doesn't know how the laundromat outside works because only her mom has been doing the laundry for her, her remarks are credible.
- Bath tub and bathroom sinks were clogged. But this is easily fixable.
- Bathroom is quite messy but I found it tolerable. It’s really up to the individual. The italian lady down there seemed to have been not OK with that.

I find the description of their listing quite misleading but I do NOT have the evidence that they intentionally try to trick people on purpose. You just need to know what the place has to offer and see if the price you’re paying is worth it. Ask the right questions and have the right expectations and you will be fine.

Kristina was a great hostess. Super helpful and understanding. Always available if I needed anything but totally gave me my space. The apt is great, clean and comfortable. Neighborhood is very safe, easy to get around with plenty to do if you want, yet quiet enough if you don't. I strongly recommend Kristina as a hostess & her apt as well.

Kristina fue super amable durante mi estadia. Fue muy flexible con mi check in y check out. La ubicación del apartamento es cercana al metro y es una muy buena opción precio-calidad. Lo recomiendo y sin duda volvería a hospedarme aquí!
Nice stay in UES. Kristina is a nice host.
Kristina is very helpful and nice. I arrived late and it was not a problem at all. Everything was very uncomplicated. Many Thanks.
Great location, close to transit and room is spacious. Host is very accommodating and sweet.
Great location wonderful accommodations overall a positive experience

This apartment was in a wonderful location, in a quiet and safe part of the city. It was close to the train, and easy to catch a cab if needed. It is on the 4th floor, so if you have a suitcase larger than a carry-on, it is a bit of a struggle to lug it up to the 4th floor. Kristina was very sweet and I enjoyed chatting with her.
Kristina is a very sweet and warm host. The room itself was very comfortable and location is great. The internet didn't work during my stay which was a huge letdown.

Kristina is a really nice and special person. I lived with her for 6 weeks and for the whole time she has always been really nice, friendly, she always gave me precious advices and helped me in case of need. Her flat is located in the Upper East Side a beautiful area, quite and safe with subway, supermarket and CVS nearby. It is close to Central Park, Met museum and with an half an hour walk also to Time Square, Rockfeller Center and many other attractions. The  room has a really comfortable bed and a pretty big closet. 
I advice everybody to enjoy their trip at Kristina’s place she is a great host.
Great location on the upper east side. Kristina is a very helpful host. Overall, I had a great visit

Kristina is a very gracious host; always a smile. The bedroom is at the back of the building away from the street so fairly quiet. The bedroom closet has plenty of shelves and room for hanging clothes. Very nice for a stay of more than a day or two if you don't like living out of a suitcase.

It is a really good place if you are expecting to spend a couple of days in NYC. The location is perfect, really nice neighborhood, lots of restaurants near and you can do many things by walking. The Central Park and MET museum are close to the apartment.
Kristina is a great host. Apartment is great location.

The host was amazing 
The apartment is a very good location
I loved everything!
Great place and great price!

Kristina est très accueillante et attentionnée. mon séjour d’une semaine s’est bien passé. La chambre est confortable, un grand placard et un bureau, (il manquerait juste un miroir), la salle de bain, vieillissante mais propre. Au final le logement était conforme à mes attentes et à la description. Rapport qualité prix correct. à 3 blocs du métro et les bus devants. Je pouvais aller à pied vers Central Park ou le MET... à refaire
Great stay for a quick overnight trip.
Very friendly and responsive, great place to stay.

Kristina was very welcoming and gave me the opportunity to visit NYC on a budget.  The location was terrific: short walk to Central Park and all sorts of connections within a short walk for public transit (buses and subways).  People staying at Kristina's should be prepared to walk up to the fourth floor (i.e. relative fitness to climb 3 sets of stairs).  Thank you Kristina!!

Originally, I had wanted to stay two nights at this place and was disappointed that only one night was available.  However, it turned out to be a blessing in disguise. Although I checked in during the afternoon to pick up the keys and meet Kristina, a gracious, friendly host, I did not check out the bed.  As for the PROS, this place is convenient, near transpo, safe, and relatively reasonable.  As for the CONS, I discovered a very old, worn, stained bottom sheet covered with pilling that felt like sandpaper, along with an old lumpy pillow that was covered on both sides by a very stained pillowcase.  The lack of a top sheet increased my concern and discomfort for potential health hazards from countless guests who used the comforter in place of a top sheet. The air conditioner cools the living room, not the guest room (especially when closed for privacy), which only has small fan. The bathroom sink continues to drain very slowly as reported in May 2017 (I did not try the shower for the same reason). If the host secures new, comfortable sheets along with a new pillow for the guest bed and gets the drains cleared, I would definitely give this place more stars! It’s a great location if you want to get some exercise. Be prepared to climb 50+ steps from the street level to the 4th floor!

Kristina was very kind and communicated quickly. Checking in and out was easy.  Location was amazing! Beautiful park around the corner right on the river, and only 2 blocks away from the Q train. Streets were quiet and well lit at night. Lots of convenient stores/restaurants and a Starbucks next door. Host provided oscillating fan in room which was a nice touch. PACK LIGHT(ish) 3 sets of narrow stairs but definitely manageable. I have suggested to the host to provide a full length mirror in the bedroom, but otherwise advise you to bring your own handheld mirror if you prefer to get ready in your bedroom versus the bathroom. Great for solo travelers and short visits to the city. Looking forward to a return visit.
Affordable option if you’re looking for somewhere just to sleep & clean up for a night. Kristina was very friendly.
Departamento muy padre todo muy bonito dormi muy bien
Great place! Near subway and bus stop! Downtown 10 min. away in metro. Kristina is a great host. Great place near everything you need in NYC.
Quiet, clean space, with a friendly host. Bus and subway stops were conveniently close.
Comfortable room in a quiet building!
Nice room, bid bed, big window, 10 min walk to Q train
Thumb up all around!
Great location......

Kristina’s place is great for those that are budget conscious and are looking for a safe area to stay. Her apartment is a six minute walk to one of the Q line stations where you can connect to basically anywhere you need to go in New York. Kristina also let me keep my luggage at her place for a few hours after “check out time” as I had a later flight. Thanks Kristina!
It was great!
Great location! I'd definitively stay again with Kristina, the place was clean and cozy.
Very friendly and pleasant.  Great location

Location was perfect for what I needed. I was exhausted when I got there so almost immediately went to sleep. I knew Kristina was there bc she greeted me, but never heard her. Gloriously quiet in the city that never sleeps. It’s a 4th floor walkup, so be mindful if you have bad knees or heavy luggage.
Great location, close to both Q and 4/5 green subway line. The host is incredible in making sure everything is taken care of!!
Good value, comfortable & great residential neighborhood with food & drink
This was a nice place to stay, and very convenient for my needs.  My host displayed excellent communication as well.
Great hostess and wonderful place to live for 3 weeks! Thank you so much!
A nice place to stay on the UES. Close to central park and the subway for getting to downtown

I would never stay there again.  I slept there three night and I couldn't wait to wake up to get out.  I had to be at work for 8am 10 minutes walk, I made sure to leave by 6:15AM. Horibble and then both her and her mother slept on the couch in the livingroom. The bedroom had not AC just a small fan.  But the livingroom was freezing because that is where the AC was.  She mentioned that it had AC, not in the room only livingroom. I would never recommend  this place to anyone.  Especially she did not tell me that her mom was there for the week until I arrive and saw the host the second night.

Kristina is very nice and her mom as well, who just so happened to be visiting as well. Although I came in late the nights I was there, you couldn't tell that there was anyone else in the apartment. Kristina is very quick with responding to your messages and does her best to accommodate. The location was only a few blocks from the metro station and the area is relatively quiet.

Kristina was good and clear in communications; the flat is really well-located if you want to be in the Upper East Side. You will be staying at close quarters with Kristina and the flat is small but that's NYC and for the price it is good. (I'd booked 3 nights but my plans changed and I only stayed 1).
It was a great pleasure to stay in Kristina’s place . The location was simply beyond . Kristina is a very gracious host.
Not much privacy, as this was shared with the host sleeping on the sofa.
Super affordable place in Manhattan!

Tudo meio esquisito. Parece uma acumuladora: quarto meia-boca com um ótimo colchão. Dormi bem, não posso negar! Inclusive o local era silencioso. Mas o armário do quarto era cheio de cabides velhos de arame(contei uns 50). A cama estava com lençóis e fronha USADOS. Reclamei, EU troquei os lençóis e mandei lavar a fronha numa lavanderia, Banheiro aparentemente limpo, cheio de tranqueiras(restos de xampu, sabonetes e produtos de limpeza) . Contei uns 60 frascos,Tampa do vaso gasta, cortina do box cheia de limo Preto na base.
Três andares de escada, tudo bem! Mas escada de carpet sujo de pêlos imensos de cachorros imensos.
Comunicação com a anfitriã: não houve, apesar dela dormir na sala, em frente ao banheiro disponível. Tudo ali parece fake, exceto a cama que dormi. Não recomendo

This is a small one bedroom apartment where the owner sleeps in the living room while the guest gets the clean bedroom.  Definitely close environment but great location.  It's good for a one or two night stay.

Overall great place when price considered, but you get what you pay for.  Location is terrific, room itself could use some work. Host was non-existent during the day, but her mother (who slept on the living room couch with the host at night) let me in and was cordial.
Kristina was nice and thoughtful, my mom stayed at her place and allowed me to stop by and visit for a moment after a 7hr flight. According with her, the bed was confortable and the apartment quiet.

Kristina is a good host, the apartment is very well located and quiet. She hosted my sister in law while I was in another apartment, so I've never met her, but she was really kind and approachable and an excellent communicator! Recommended to young travellers. Price absolutely very convenient for NYC.
Convenient to upper east side. Comfortable bed.

日本語を話す方へ向けて日本語でのﾚﾋﾞｭｰを残します｡

単独滞在者向けの物件の多くがｿﾌｧﾍﾞｯﾄﾞにｶｰﾃﾝなどで仕切られた簡易の個室であることに対し､鍵付きの個室とｸｲｰﾝｻｲｽﾞのﾍﾞｯﾄﾞが用意されているお宅だったので快適に過ごすことができました｡
Qﾗｲﾝの最寄駅から5分ほど､ｾﾝﾄﾗﾙﾊﾟｰｸ及びMETまで10分以内と立地条件も大満足でした｡
面している通りも静かで文句なしです｡
州内からの週末旅行として滞在したので荷物は機内持ち込み可能ｻｲｽﾞのｷｬﾘｰﾊﾞｯｸﾞのみで問題は無かったのですが､長期の旅行で大きなｽｰﾂｹｰｽの場合はお宅まで階段で上がらざるを得ないので御注意なさると良いかと思います(ﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝのｱﾊﾟｰﾄの多くは､ｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰが無いので似た条件でｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰ付きのお宅を見つけるのは至難ですが…)｡

It's not a luxurious building or apartment, but I had my own bedroom, a big bed, access to everything I needed including wi-fi, and the place is reasonably quiet and well-located.  Kristina was very easy to communicate with and very helpful. Since her mother was also around, it was easy to check in whenever I wanted to.  The place is a small one-bedroom apartment. When I stayed there, I got the bedroom while Kristina and her mother slept on the living room couch.  All in all, reasonable accommodations for the price.

Great location, Kristina wasn’t easily reachable and I believe her mom was staying in the place on the couch my entire stay. She was very nice. A good place to stay if you’re just crashing for the night.
Nice big private room, Kristina and her mother are very nice and quiet, and the price is right!

The bedroom was fine. I didn’t realize that Kristina would be sleeping in living room, but it was not a problem. Also, 4th Floor walk up is somewhat difficult with luggage and if you have trouble with steps.  Location was great for the Met, Central Park etc.
I have read on other reviews that her mom was there for vacations, well she  was still there. The place smelled bad, and the shower curtain was all moldy and the bathroom was just not pleasant.
Thanks so much for the hospitality!
Excellent location, quiet surrounding,  responsible host and reasonable price. Awesome place for rest during a short-time trip! What else do you want?

Location is perfect. it was my second time in her room. 
Staying Kristina’s room is always awesome and I feel welcomed all the time.

name: The Destination Loft Downtown Montreal #203
summary: In the heart of Downtown Montreal, nestled in the Shaughnessy Village, this studio is close to everything, half a block away from the famous St-Catherine Street, minutes from public transportation, universities, and museums. This Studio is great for anyone seeking short or long term accommodations. We also offer Weekly, Monthly, and Yearly rates for students studying in the City Center. My place is good for students, couples, adventurers, business travellers, families, and big groups.
space: Beautifully decorated, recently renovated this studio apartment will give you the liberty and the chance to live as a local in the city you are exploring. Fully equipped private kitchen and bathroom, dining area, Smart 40'' flat screen TV, Free Wi-fi and much much more...
description: In the heart of Downtown Montreal, nestled in the Shaughnessy Village, this studio is close to everything, half a block away from the famous St-Catherine Street, minutes from public transportation, universities, and museums. This Studio is great for anyone seeking short or long term accommodations. We also offer Weekly, Monthly, and Yearly rates for students studying in the City Center. My place is good for students, couples, adventurers, business travellers, families, and big groups. Beautifully decorated, recently renovated this studio apartment will give you the liberty and the chance to live as a local in the city you are exploring. Fully equipped private kitchen and bathroom, dining area, Smart 40'' flat screen TV, Free Wi-fi and much much more... The building is equipped with state of the art security, the common space doors are with a unique access codes that are given to each guest upon booking confirmation, and an encrypted virtual e-key that is dispatched the day of check-in.
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is the most densely populated area of Quebec, with stately Victorian grey-stone row houses and beaux-arts styled apartment blocks at the edges of the neighborhood. It is a primarily institutional neighborhood, with a university, junior college, seminary, hospital and architecture museum among many private schools, colleges and technical schools at its core.
notes: We will always make sure to check in and check out our guest. With our 24hr checkin service you can be sure that you will always have someone checking you in at any given time. We are always here for any inquiries and we make sure that each and every guest has my number as well to reach out at anytime. Upon arrival or before, you will need to fill out an online pre-check-in form that will be sent to our guest services or front desk manager, so that he can prepare your arrival and everything else that is necessary for your stay. Looking forward to having you as our guest at Destination Stays
transit: The neighborhood is served by two Montreal Metro Green line stations. Guy-Concordia station in the east and Atwater station to the west. Georges Vanier station on the Orange line is just south of Shaughnessy Village in nearby Little Burgundy. The area is also well-served by numerous bus lines terminating at Atwater Station that connect Westmount, Cote-des-Neiges and much of the rest of the urban core. The Claire-Morissette bike path on De Maisonneuve Boulevard cuts through the centre of the neighborhood and the area is well served by Bixi stations.
access: The building is equipped with state of the art security, the common space doors are with a unique access codes that are given to each guest upon booking confirmation, and an encrypted virtual e-key that is dispatched the day of check-in.
interaction: Upon arrival or before, you will need to fill out an online pre-check-in form that will be sent to our guest services or front desk manager, so that he can prepare your arrival and everything else that is necessary for your stay. Looking forward to having you as our guest at Destination Stays

reviews.comments: Tres bien! Facile et propre!
The place was great! The location is a foodie's dream, so many restaurants! The place was also very cute, small, but clean and was great for the two of us.
Daniel was a very welcoming and responsive host. The listing was perfectly located, impeccably clean, and nicely decorated. I would definitely recommend this listing!
Amazing host, amazing place! Enjoyed our stay, Daniel was more than helpful, and the apartment was very clean, if we ever find ourselves in Montreal again, would definitely go back.
Great communication and central location.
Daniel is the best! Super friendly, very helpful, and incredibly responsive. Don't miss out on this guy!

Dan was a great host and did everything possible to make my check-in and stay as smooth as possible. The room was exactly as pictured. It's only a few steps from the Metro which is a real convenience when it's cold and snowy. It was my first experience with Airbnb, and it was a good one.

Infelizmente não foi boa minha estadia no apartamento do Daniel. Apesar da localização ser excelente o apartamento não acomoda 3 pessoas apenas casal . Fomos eu , meu marido e minha filha de 15 anos e o apartamento apresenta apenas 1 cama de casal e a terceira acomodação era um colchão de inflar que estava furado. Imediatamente comunicamos o Daniel sobre o ocorrido e ele demorou 12 horas para nós responder e exigiu foto do colchão furado para verificar a veracidade da informação. Como era véspera de feriado de Natal nos informou que não poderia comprar um novo nem emprestar um outro colchão e que tínhamos má sorte . Ficamos lá por mais três dias nos revezando eu e minha filha num sofá de 2 lugares para não dormirmos no chão em pleno inverno canadense. Além disso não havia lavadora nem secadora de roupas como no anúncio. Recomendo o lugar apenas para casais não serve para família e Daniel não é um anfitrião confiável.
The apartment was in a fantastic area and was cute and clean. Daniel was easily accessible if we had any questions or concerns.
Response time is great and made sure everything was good to go before and after arriving

Daniel was a great host. Very easy to communicate with and the apartment was spectacular. Everything looks exactly as seen in the pictures. Location is a close walk downtown and our stay was pleasant. 

Thanks for everything!

The apartment is cute and comfortable and perfectly located and Daniel and his team were exceptionally responsive whenever we had a question, so we were happy with our stay. It's very small, though, so I'm not sure I would recommend it for longterm stays for more than one person, it started feeling a bit cramped a few days into our stay. But for short visits to the city I would definitely recommend it!
Great place and awesome location!
Everything is good except washroom is too small.
Great location steps from the metro and St Catherine's shopping and restaurants!

Very cute place, within steps of the metro station, shopping and restaurants.  It's smaller then it looks in the photos so I think it's best for one or two travelers.  We had 3 and it was a little tight.  Very clean and neat.  Daniel and Diana were very quick with any questions we had.  I had problems using the Kevo app but found, that if you touch the lock, before you try to open/close it, it worked much faster. Would definitely recommend for a couple or single traveler. Thanks again!
Great place to stay for two people

This apartment is in a great location - extremely central and with easy access to  stores, restaurants and public transport. The room was very clean and tidy with no unnecessary clutter of any sort. It's small, cozy and perfect for a lone traveller or a couple/friends who are comfortable sharing a bed, however 3 people would be a tight fit. Daniel was very easy to reach and a great communicator even though we didn't get a chance to meet him in person. He answered all questions and made sure we were comfortable with the check in process. All in all we had a great stay at this apartment - great value in a perfect Montreal location.

This apartment is in a great location , it's a very central area of the city where you can find everything walking distance . The unit itself is cute and clean . Perfect for couples and short stays . Daniel was very friendly and accommodating , easy to communicate with as well .
great service and lovely place!
Such a great spot! We were able to walk to the Belle center, great location. Super comfy bed! Stay here if you can!
The place is great and near EVERYTHING. +  the host was also really nice.
Great central location downtown, nice clean room as depicted. Recommended!

We enjoyed our stay in #203. It was small, but good for a short stay for 2 people. 
Check in was easy and Daniel was easy to reach by email, if needed. 
It was in a great location near lots of restaurants and only a 12 minute walk to the Bell Centre for concerts and sports. The building was noisy at times and we did hear our neighbours and street noise, but overall it was a good price and good location.

Very unique place within a good walking distance to most amenities. The place is fairly small but you won't be spending most of your time indoors so it shouldn't be a big deal. Adding things like a plunger for each bathroom would definitely improve some people's experience because you never know. Also, we had issues with the wifi. It would either not connect or when it was connected, it was fairly sluggish. 

Overall we had a good experience and saved some money in comparison to standard hotel prices in the same area.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Daniel is a fantastic host, very accommodating and easy to communicate with. The studio in center City Montreal is comfortable with modern decor, and offers a location that lets you get around the city easily on foot.
Es un lugar muy agradable  en una excelente ubicación en la ciudad. Lo recibimos en muy buenas condiciones de aseo.

Nice location and host 
But small studio
Loved staying there, and would definitely stay again! Everything was seamless and being right in downtown made it all the more convenient! Daniel was a great host and very communicative!
Great location, a couple blocks from the night life. Nice apartment has what you need and looks just like the photos.
Great place in a convenient location!
Very nice appartment with an incredible location to enjoy shopping, night life and restaurant. Everything was perfect !
Never saw Daniel, but the place was well-kept and in a convenient location. He was always responsive to our questions via message.
Clean, walkable distance to great nightlife and restaurants  - would recommend for a short stay for 2 people.

Daniel was a pleasure to deal with and very prompt in his communication. Location was ideal and close to a main subway stop and major attractions. The loft was exactly as described in a secure building. We will book with Daniel again! A+
Right in the middle of downtown and communication was fast and efficient. The place is quite small so it would only be comfortable if you're not too many. Thanks Daniel :)
Great
This is a great place. Highly recommended.
Wonderful place to stay. I highly recommend it.

Ein wirklich sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt!
Alles war wie vorher beschrieben, der Checkin und Checkout funktionierten einwandfrei, sodass man direkt in das Abenteuer starten konnte.
Die Dämmung der Fensterfront ist ist etwas ungünstig bei sehr kalten Temperaturen, wenn man jedoch die Vorhänge benutzt und die Unterseite abdeckt ist es auch bei -15°C eine tolle Wohnung. Die Kommunikation mit Daniel funktionierte sehr gut, auch wenn nicht immer alle Fragen komplett beantwortet wurden. (Was für mich aber definitiv kein Negativpunkt ist ;)  )

Die Lage ist ein perfekter Ausgangspunkt für alle Erkundungen in Downtown!
Für dieses Preis/Leistungsverhältnis eine sehr tolle Wahl und empfehlenswert.

Jederzeit gerne wieder, vielen Dank und alles Gute!
Had a nice stay with Daniel always quick to respond. Great location in the heart of Montreal!
Daniel's place was perfectly located near the metro and within walking distance of lots of wonderful restaurants. He was so communicative and helpful, I would happily stay again. Thanks, Daniel!

“Best travel experience" – "BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT" – "The experience was first class"
"The host was so hospitable and thoughtful”

Daniel’s place is beautiful and a great location as it is close to the subway. The  facility was well maintained and Daniel ensured that we were doing well throughout our trip; he is very responsive. 

The only con I have is that the place is a bit dusty and a tight squeeze for two people especially when doing multiple tasks together. 

Other than that, it is a lovely place to stay and Daniel was an amazing host.
The apartment was very clean, right downtown, and very easy to check-in to.  We had a great time!
Great location at a good price
Nice little place with a great location. Host was quick to respond and address everything we needed.
Excellent
The room is nice and very clean. It is easy to get there. I was completely satisfied and recommend it for all.
Good place

A well-placed, but smallish studio apartment, the location was super convenient being close to the Guy-Concordia train line and meant travel around the city was accessible and easy. With a view to Mont Royal, the not-too-taxing climb from the front door will soon reward you with an exceptional view of the city. The aircon was really welcome on the hot and humid summer nights.
Great place!
Great launch spot for Montreal night life.
This place is in a great location, and it was perfect for a romantic getaway in a modern space!
Daniel is easy to communicate with and will respond to your messages within an hour. The place is exactly what the pictures have shown. Also very clean and everything you need is available.

Daniel’s place was my first AirBnB experience and I have only good things to say! Prime location, really close to St. Catherine street and Crescent street which both had tons of stuff. The apartment was exactly as pictured and nice and tidy. I would definitely recommend this place if you’re looking into Downtown Montreal!
Great place to stay. Located in the heart of Montreal and right next to a metro station. The room was clean and provided all ammenities.
Great location, close to Concordia, the Metro and Rue St-Catherine.

Daniel was a great host for our weekend stay in Montreal. He was always very quick to reply with help on any questions we had regarding the area, such as finding suitable parking as it can be difficult at times. Daniel was kind to also check up on us mid way of our stay.
The loft itself is a great space for a single traveler or a couple. The area was close to many amazing local attractions and eats of downtown Montreal. We loved that many of these places were within walking distance for the added convenience. Thank you Daniel for hosting!
Great place and location!
Very stylish and clean. Lovely place.
Daniel is a great host quick response time easy access. Place is tiny but clean and comfortable
great
Overall a good stay in a great location. It is quite small, but adequate if you plan on spending most of your time out and exploring.
Great place to stay
Responsive host accommodated a last minute reservation. Clean, quiet and comfortable place.

La chambre est petite, mais convient pour 2 personnes seulement et non 3. L’espace de cuisine est très restreint, donc cet appartement convient pour des personnes cherchant un endroit où dormir, mais sans plus.
Great location. Clean. Perfect little place.

Staying at Daniel's flat was very enjoyable. This was my Wife and I firs time in MTL and the location was perfect. Plenty of food and shopping just walking distance from the location and a short $5 uber ride to Old Port.
Perfect location for exploring the city. Daniel was quick in responses and was very helpful. The loft worked great as I was traveling alone
Greta lil place affordable clean and great host
Bien place mais vraiment très petit et pas tres clean peinture salle de bains etc
Nice place, accurate description, response time very quick. A bit smaller than I expected.
Cute loft in a great location !
Very clean space located in a very central spot, perfect for the weekend getaway to somewhere new. Metro located literally steps from the door. Would highly recommend as it is a fantastic deal.
House is very clean and the host is very helpful for everything !
We had a great stay at Daniel’s place! The location is perfect, and Daniel was great with communication when we requested a late check out.  Would recommend this place

Daniel's apartment was great! The apartment was so clean and exactly as shown in the photos. Daniel was always quick to respond and our check-in and check-out experience was seamless. We would definitely recommend staying in Daniel's apartment: great location, host and space!
I don’t recommend this place. I had a terrible experience

The host kept in contact and answered all my questions. The self check in was smooth& efficient. The studio was very clean, cozy, had all the necessities, it does have a small bathroom that cannot fit 2 people at the same time but this wasn't a problem for us. The studio is across from a fire station so if you're a light sleeper it may not be the place for you. I do suggest to place a mat to keep all the salt/rocks during the winter seasons! However it was a very good stay!

Good place,
Great location
Me and my mother stayed here for 4 days to see a concert at the bell centre. Location is amazing. Perfect place for a weekend away, especially a downtown Montreal shopping trip!

name: five minutes to Atatürk Airport-CNR
summary: our apartmant is so close the Atatürk Airport and cnr fair center in a silent street. it has two room, one saloon and one sweet balcony. if you want to avoid the istanbul traffic, you can use metro or metrobus which are five minutes away by walking.
description: our apartmant is so close the Atatürk Airport and cnr fair center in a silent street. it has two room, one saloon and one sweet balcony. if you want to avoid the istanbul traffic, you can use metro or metrobus which are five minutes away by walking. metrobus, bus, metro
